description:
Education Alliance Finland provides a science-based quality standard and certification for learning solutions. We help EdTech companies to validate their solution's learning impact and support schools to choose the products with a proven positive impact on learning. 

Our Evaluation Method is an academically sound approach to evaluating a product’s pedagogical design from the viewpoint of educational psychology. Through our evaluation, you get feedback and evidence of the product's learning effectiveness. 

EdTech industry stakeholders around the world trust Education Alliance Finland to ensure solutions are independently certified to high-level quality standards.

Videocation.no AS er et heldigitalt forlag som utvikler og publiserer videokurs for det norske bedrifts- og personmarkedet. Våre kurs er forankret i norsk kultur og formidlet på norsk. Vi brenner for opplæring og arbeider for at alle skal få muligheten å lære av de beste. Vår oppgave er derfor å finne de mest engasjerende ekspertene og foredle deres kunnskap til attraktive videokurs. Vår ambisjon er å utgi de beste videokursene innenfor alle områder hvor folk etterspør opplæring. Alle lærer raskest på sitt morsmål. Studenter. Medarbeidere. Ledere. I en tid med globalisering og økende anglifisering skal Videocation.no derfor være et tydelig alternativ på norsk. Vi skal være:

 - en garantist for faglig kvalitet og høyt læringsutbytte.
 - et attraktivt forlag for våre eksperter, brukere og samarbeidspartnere.
 - en kilde til lærelyst og stolthet for norsk språk, kultur og kunnskapsformidling.

Sustainable Brand Index™ measures and analyses how sustainability affects branding, communication and business development. With the help of nearly 70 000 consumers across 8 countries, the study measures and analyses over 1 500 brands across 35+ industries on sustainability.

ArcticStartup is an independent technology company that reports on digital startups and growth entrepreneurship from the Nordic and Baltic countries. Our goal is to provide exceptional coverage of the news and trends needed to support a developed entrepreneurship community in Northern Europe.

ArcticStartup was founded in 2007 and is currently led by Jan Ameri and Vedat Öndas. Our headquarters are located in Helsinki, Finland, however, we cover the startup scenes of Finland, Sweden, Norway, Denmark, Iceland, Estonia, Latvia, Lithuania and Russia.

Our aim is to encourage entrepreneurship and to promote connectedness in the Nordic and Baltic regions. To do so we have our media arm, events and a number of very exciting plans for expansion.

We continuously gather tens of thousands of readers from over 130 countries, giving the region's startups a media channel for getting global recognition.

Our flagship event Arctic15 gathers an international crowd of investors, startups, scaleups, corporates and influencers to Helsinki every spring.

If you want to share your news with us, please send us a tip through http://tip.arcticstartup.com

www.arcticstartup.com
www.arctic15.com
www.santaschristmaspitch.com

We’re building a sustainable brand that people can trust, now and always. We do this by starting with what goes closest to our skin and what we wear the most. We create innovative sustainable products and build a community that celebrates and supports environmental activism and more responsible living. Through education on our online platforms, our customers are learning how to be better consumers - together with us.

Low Impact
We put sustainability at the core of everything we do. We’ve invested in a green European supply chain to minimise our waste, water, and energy footprint - and by working with the highest globally certified sustainable standards for materials and production. We use sustainability as a core focus - not just as a superficial “nice to have”. Most importantly we invest in the people and the knowledge that makes this fashion revolution possible.

Activism
We over invest in a more sustainable supply chain and in our own sustainable innovation, and we inspire activism by supporting important environmental causes. We always explain the how and why - and communicate with our customers and followers about doing what is right.

Transparency
We believe in showing the true impact of fashion - and always displaying information about where we make our clothes. In order to show the environmental impact to the customer - we’ve developed our own Impact Index - which is a tool for measuring the true cost of fashion. This tool calculates the total savings for water, waste, CO2, chemicals and energy by comparing our supply chain against the typical industry practices.
_x0003_
Honesty
We’re building a brand that people can trust now and forever by going the extra mile and always making things right (and letting our customers and followers know what is going wrong). We want to be a brand that feels so human you would actually want to be friends with them.

Redoxme AB was founded in July 2015 in Norrköping, Sweden. It is an outcome of an entrepreneurial process based on the exploitation of academic technology at Linköping University.

We provide laboratory instrumentation that enables simultaneous in-situ measurements of a number of signals (electrochemical, optical, thermal and other) on thin film and membrane materials. So what we are actually doing is creating an added value for existing laboratory facilities. An extension that combines many measurement techniques. But at the same time, we promote best practice in measurements and data analysis and we impose a concrete standardization in the field of material science. In practice, we are taking needs and opinions of scientist to create new methods that actually benefit to the whole research community. 

Our unique research/business environment consists of many actors from research and industry including Laboratory of Organic Electronics at Linköping University, RISE Acreo AB and PEA-Manufacturing.

Circular since 2006, Mater was created to be the pioneering global brand with sustainability embedded in its core. 

Considering the planet, its resources & its people.

ChriChri er Danmarks største mediekoncern som udelukkende henvender sig til kvinder. 
Bag ChriChri står Chefredaktør Christiane Schaumburg-Müller og et helt team af dedikerede redaktører, som alle bidrager til Danmarks bedste medieunivers for kvinder.

På ChriChri.dk, ChriChri Magazine og ChriChri TV får du en unik platform, med en kendt og personlig afsender, som rammer en købestærk og interessant målgruppe af kvinder mellem 20 og 45 år.

Tise is a Norwegian, fast-growing software company with an experienced team. We do everything from coding to design and business development in-house. 

Our main focus is the app for iOS and Android called Tise. Tise (as in "advertise"​) is a marriage between Instagram and Craigslist for selling and discovering second hand fashion, interior and furniture. 

We believe that second hand trade is an important key to make the world more sustainable. However, even though most people acknowledge this, their barriers are still too high to take action, and they still have too many nice things just laying around unused. To sell your items through a traditional classified service is a timely process and for many it is embarrassing or even stigmatic.

We believe that everyone wants to be a part of the green movement and just needs a little motivation and the right tool to get going. Tise increases your incentives for selling in a fun and inspiring way, while on the other hand lets you go second-hand treasure hunting in your own neighbourhood every day.

Build your brand with the largest Shopify Plus Agency in the EU.
 
From concept to conversion, we'll kick complexity to the curb & build stores that your customers will love. Tech houses make great code, and design agencies create slick designs. We make eCommerce stores that sell. 

From building state of the art eCommerce solutions to growing and supporting your Shopify store, we are your lifetime partner in commerce. 

We are a team of experienced merchants, entrepreneurs, designers, marketing experts, architects, and integration specialists united by a passion for commerce. Building successful commerce solutions to achieve our customer's goals is our passion. And we always do this together, Hand in hand, according to our brand promise. 

Woolman is the largest Shopify Plus Agency in the European Union. We are also an Oracle Netsuite Solution Partner. We will not only superpower your commerce. We will also simplify your financials.

Sports Group Denmark designs, produces and distributes sportswear and leisurewear for men, women and children under one of our 15 brands.

Our clothes are Scandinavian designed and developed with focus on quality at the right price.

The company was founded in Ikast, Denmark in 2012.

Today we have offices all over Europe and China.
The clothes are sold in large sports chains and individual stores in more than 10 countries.

Videoly is the easiest way for online retailers to get hand-picked and automatically embedded product videos to online stores 🎥✨

🛒 For retailers

Videoly sources existing video content such as reviews, presentations, unboxing, how-tos, from YouTube and directly from brands. User-generated content is also covered. Videos are embedded directly to online stores’ product pages.

Before being linked to a product page, all videos are validated by a human viewer to ensure they’re suitable. 

🏷 For brands

Videoly ensures brands’ own videos are efficiently distributed to online retailers’ product pages. It lets brands take control of how and where their videos are shown and gets brand videos to exactly where they should be - next to the add-to-cart button on a reseller’s online store.



✅ Increased sales: Product videos increase conversion rate by an average of 34%.

✅ Enhanced customer experience: Increased video coverage gives consumers richer product information.

✅ SEO ranking: Consumers stay longer on pages with video, boosting time spent on site and Google hits.

✅ Zero hassle: Videoly is fully automated. We add thousands of videos without any manual work required from users.

✅ Replicate the in-store experience online: Nothing beats actually seeing a product in action.

✅ Reduced return rate: Through video, consumers are able to make more informed purchase decisions, thus lowering product returns.

✅ Keep control of your content: Videoly means your videos are shown in the optimal position on resellers’ pages.

NorthQ is a leading-edge PropTech company that delivers a wide range of building and energy management solutions for the real estate sector.

With in-house developed hardware, software and cloud products, NorthQ covers all the steps needed for the reduction of energy waste, CO2 emissions and operational inefficiency across any number of properties. 
With this ability to provide a 360°solution that follows the explicit needs of our customers, we continuously work towards transforming building data into valuable insights that drive savings.

NorthQ was awarded by the United Nations with the Sustainable Development Goals Tech Award in 2019, which was an international recognition that our solutions have the potential to leave a positive economic, social and environmental impact across industries. 

Since then we have been providing this mix of IoT, hardware, software, big data, machine learning and artificial intelligence which inspires our customers to understand exactly how their buildings are performing. In this way, companies can use their resources more responsibly- towards their business, communities and the environment.

INTRODUCING ROTATE
ROTATE is a brand from Birger Christensen, created in partnership with influencers and creative directors Jeanette Madsen and Thora Valdimarsdottir. Based in Copenhagen, Denmark, the brand has taken the world by storm with its fun and bold DNA translated into covetable pieces made for comfort and glamour.

The ROTATE brand is a response to Jeanette and Thora's musings over the gaps in their own wardrobes, designing the pieces that they dream of having in their closets for day and night alike.

www.rotatebirgerchristensen.com

INTRODUCING REMAIN
Copenhagen based brand REMAIN was founded in 2018 by CEO and Creative Director, Denise Christensen. Drawing influence from Christensen’s own life juggling both career and family, the design DNA is a two-way street of timeless key pieces made for the everyday with a bold and fashionable attitude. Cutting to the chase with its signature leather, on-point tailoring, and sleek design, REMAIN is straight-forward fashion translated into your urban uniform life.

www.remainbirgerchristensen.com

Discover UMAGE (formerly known as VITA copenhagen) – a place where beautiful Danish furniture and lighting design meet the Scandinavian feel, high-quality materials and a genuine care for the environment.

UMAGE’s design are created with a focus on aesthetics, simplicity and functionality.

Our furniture and lamps are packed in compact gift boxes to optimize worldwide logistics and storage costs, thereby reducing the environmental footprint on our planet. Simple and sincere – the concept for a brighter future. That is UMAGE.

Aerocrine AB is a medical products company focused on improved management and care of patients with inflammatory airway diseases such as Asthma. Within this sector, Aerocrine is the world leader. Aerocrine markets NIOX MINO® and NIOX VERO®, , which enables fast and reliable point-of-care measurement of airway inflammation. These products play a critical role in more effective diagnosis, treatment and follow-up of patients affected with inflammatory airway diseases. Aerocrine is based in Sweden with subsidiaries in the US, Germany, Switzerland and the UK.  
In June 2015, Aerocrine became part of Circassia Pharmaceuticals plc.
For more information please visit www.aerocrine.com and www.niox.com.

Simris Alg is a biotechnology company, engaged in research, development and production of bioactive substances from microalgae, for nutraceutical, cosmeceutical and pharmaceutical applications. Our technology provides access to bioactive substances with novel functions, while replacing unsustainable raw materials from endangered marine species and ecosystems. Our first commercialised range is a series of omega-3 health supplements marketed under our own Simris® brand.

Simris® Algae Omega-3 is Sweden’s first locally farmed, environmentally caring, ethical and fully plant-based marine omega-3 EPA & DHA. Simris® Algae Omega-3 is a superior and sustainable alternative to fish oil, boasting unparalleled product quality and outstanding product design.

We have received numerous awards for entrepreneurship, communication, engineering excellence, and environmental sustainability, as well as attention from international and Swedish press. Our vision is to be a beacon for positive change in business. 

Our headquarters and algae farm are located in Hammenhög, in Sweden’s sunny Österlen. Our commercial department is based in Stockholm. 

Simris Alg is a public company and our stock is traded on the Nasdaq First North stock exchange (FNSE:SIMRIS B)

RECCO AB produces and sells search technology for avalanche rescue and search and rescue operations in the outdoors. The technology was invented by Magnus Granhed, the founder and owner of RECCO AB, in the 1980s. Today the RECCO system is a global standard for avalanche rescue and is utilized by professional rescuers worldwide. The two-part technology consists of RECCO reflectors that are integrated into consumer products as apparel, helmets, protection gear, and boots. The RECCO® detectors are used by professional rescuers to search for and find people equipped with RECCO reflectors. As a global system RECCO AB works closely with rescuers from many different countries and distributes RECCO reflectors to outdoor brands worldwide.

Ingerfair er grundlagt i 2010, og lige siden har vi holdt fast i vores vision om, at arbejdet med frivillige skal anerkendes som en særlig faglighed. I 2012 udkom vores bog Frivilligkoordinering – hvorfor og hvordan? En grundbog i udvikling af bæredugtige frivilligmiljøer.
 
I dag er vi Danmarks største virksomhed, som udelukkende er specialiseret i at uddanne og rådgive foreninger, organisationer og kommunale institutioner i de redskaber, tilgange og spørgsmål, som knytter sig til arbejdet med frivillige.
Vores store styrke er, at vi arbejder på tværs af forskellige sektorer i den frivillige verden og inden for forskellige forvaltninger i og på tværs af kommuner.
 
Vi kender til de udfordringer og frustrationer som findes i arbejdet med frivillige – og vi har lavet løsningerne på disse i mange forskellige sammenhænge. Det hele starter med et uforpligtende kaffemøde med os.
_______________________________________________________________________________________

We specialise exclusively in educating and advising associations, organisations and councils in the tools, approaches and issues related to their work with volunteers. Our strengths are that we work across different sectors of the voluntary sector and within different council departments.
 
We know the challenges and frustrations that exist in the work of volunteers - and we've made solutions to those in many different contexts. It all starts with a free cup of coffee with us. We look forward to hearing from you.

MOOD is a Visual Development Studio that provides art & design services for the biggest companies in the games & film industry incl. Guerilla Games, Sony Santa Monica, Naughty Dog and LEGO.

With over 15 years of experience we have worked on such acclaimed titles as GOD OF WAR, JUST CAUSE 4 and HITMAN.

We collaborate with our clients in every part of the creative process from concept development and idea creation to production design and marketing visuals.

MOOD also creates original content and produces and publishes its own cinematic novels.

Made for women, by women, in all their glorious shapes and ages. R/H collections represent a unique collage of Nordic minimalism, captivating prints, practical, feminine cuts and a certain spirit of northern, forest magic, all of which come together to create effortless, easy-to-wear pieces that will last well beyond this season's trends.

Hanna Riiheläinen and Emilia Hernesniemi founded R/H in 2010, in Helsinki Finland, after working in different areas of fashion and design. Through a diverse and international experience, both women came to understand the value of a local production practice, which became the operative principle of the company.

Our clothes and accessories are designed in Finland, raw materials are sourced and manufactured in European Union. We believe that this local, sustainable practice is essential for well-being. 

The collections are sold in our R/H Shop in Helsinki, online and through selected stockists in Europe.

Born out of a swimwear obsessed founder in an office in Stockholm, Sweden, Elsa & Rose Swimwear has now reached endless customers around the globe. Today, our teams are based in Stockholm and California. 

Inspired by the beach culture of the American west coast, our designs are the perfect balance of cute and sexy. 

We believe in healthy, no matter what body shape you have. Before casting each model, we make sure that she is healthy and eating normally. Working only with healthy models is something that is fundamental to our core beliefs. 

Spreading the love of swimwear starts with spreading the love of your own body. That is also why we donate to international foundations against eating disorders. For more info, don't hesitate to send us an email. 

Love

/Elsa & Rose Team

Ro Collection is the courage to set the bar high and to transform imaginative emotions into aesthetic design that creats value in our lives. 
All the objects serve a functional purpose that appeals to our aesthetic sense, while simultaneously providing a long lasting perspective. 

All pieces are designed in Denmark and the creative process is grounded by handcraft in small workshops. We support European production and always ensure the highest quality on every product. We work with family owned workshops, where talented and skilled craftsmen have refined their technique for years. 

We never compromise with our values and therefore design everything from scratch in a thorough process - creating designs that doesn't suit a trend but will keep being classic and last for generations. 

Ro Collection work with different materials such as ceramic, wood and mouth blown glass. Every piece telling a different story and that they are made by hand.
Tag sjove billeder til din fest. Skab glæde og minder.
Venner is a nutrition and food education startup tackling the global epidemics of food insecurity, obesity and wellbein

Weekendbee.com is an e-tailer and community specialized in sustainable outdoor clothing and activewear. Weekendbee is a Finnish family company established in 2018. We want to make sustainable sportswear with eco-friendly materials and ethical production more popular choice. We work with sustainable clothing brands, products, and services that we believe has a positive effect on this world. No greenwashing but real effort.

LSV Group har specialiseret sig i rådgivning og uddannelse inden for procesoptimering. Ved at kombinere filosofien bag LEAN og Six Sigma, advokerer LSV Group for et optimeringskoncept, der maksimerer produktivitet, lønsomhed og vækst – ved at reducere fejl, tid og spild i en proces.

LSV Group er den eneste virksomhed i Skandinavien, der er akkrediteret og certificeret af The International Association for Six Sigma Certification (IASSC) og People Cert Group.

A Multifunctional Fairytale

There once was a Danish mother, who wished for more comfortable settings while interacting with her baby boy during tummy time. However, she found that the bed was too soft, the floor was too hard, and there was something not quite right about all the surfaces she tried. No suitable underlay was pleasant enough to lie on for both her and her baby. Finally, she decided to design her own playmat and not only did it solve her problem, it also turned out to be a great tool for stimulating her son’s motor development and a way of strengthening their mutual bond.  It became so popular amongst her friends and family, that she soon found herself producing duplicates of the design. From there, it did not take long before she realised the potential of this versatile piece of furniture, and that was the beginning of by KlipKlap’s multifunctional journey. 

Today, the original design has developed into a full range of products that are being distributed to children and their conscious parents worldwide.

Young Finnish Design connects designers and companies! 
We have :
-furniture designers

Flowlife skapades ur visionen att alla människor ska ha möjligheten att må bra, varje dag. Med hjälp av forskning och empirisk erfarenhet vet vi att en kombination av kost, träning och återhämtning gör att människan mår bättre och får mer energi. Genom att informera, utbilda och tillhandahålla innovativa egenvårdsprodukter ger vi dig de bästa förutsättningarna för att leva ett liv i Flow. Flowlife drivs av engagerade entreprenörer med bred akademisk bakgrund, som lägger sin fulla energi för att hitta de effektivaste och mest innovativa lösningarna för att du ska må bra!

companyName: C A L I S S
description:
CALISS is a Stockholm based online lifestyle brand offering contemporary workwear for today's modern woman. The brand was officially launched online in 2014  to offer high-quality clothes with a contemporary, tailored and feminine aesthetics that are both travel friendly and designed for the work to evening wardrobe.

CALISS'​ vision centers around effortless style and the collection consists of modern still timeless pieces that can easily be combined to facilitate the life of today's busy woman on the go.

Sustainable fashion brand house.

A committee is defined as a group of delegates dedicated to considering, investigating and acting on a particular matter.

The matter at hand for Committee XXIV is to create a new platform for slower and more thoughtfully and ethically manufactured fashion. Behind the boutique fashion group you will find founder Henriette Pieszak and a team of specialists committed to researching, testing and innovating to achieve their joint vision in close collaboration with hand-picked suppliers.

Today Committee XXIV counts the three specialized denim ateliers: Pieszak, IVY Copenhagen, and Tomorrow. With Pieszak being the first brand to receive the Nordic Swan Ecolabel, we consider ourselves pioneers in sustainable fashion. And although sustainability can be an uphill battle it is a fast-developing area, where our focus through more than ten years keeps paying off.

Craft is at the heart of everything we do. With every decision we make, we focus on details and honor aesthetics. Every well-fitting garment is in the end, put on by a satisfied customer. To us, craft means constructing garments that accentuate and fit real bodies. It means choosing high-quality fabrics. Not just some of the time, but every single time. The best kind of fashion happens when beauty is backed up by functionality.

Ebba Biotech provides tools for optotracing – an innovative visualization method developed by scientists for scientists.

Optotracing as a method has been developed by a team of researchers from Karolinska Institute, KTH Royal Institute of Technology and Linköping University in Sweden and is a result of many years of cutting-edge nanoscience and organic chemistry research.

Use our optotracers/fluorescent tracer molecules to search, detect and visualise macromolecular structures; we offer three product families:

Amytracker – Amyloids and other protein aggregates.
For researchers and physicians to gain a deeper understanding of many neurodegenerative disorders, including Alzheimer’s disease.

EbbaBiolight – Bacteria & biofilm.
For hospitals and microbiology laboratories, as well as in industry with high demands to detect bacterial contamination and biofilm formation.

Carbotrace – Composition of bio-based materials.
For detailed and specific anatomical mapping of plants to fully understand their composition. For analysis of polysaccharides for optimization of production and/or recycling of any bio-based material including bio-fuels.

We push the boundaries of the film and camera industry, by empowering the new generation of filmmakers with better tools for content creation. 

Our first product is the Wiral LITE, the first ever portable, affordable and user friendly cable camera kit makes it easy to capture unique cinematic angles when filming. This product was launched on Kickstarter.com in October and during that 4 weeks campaign Wiral pre-sold for $1 million USD.

World of TRE, with a portfolio of 500+ design brands, is Finland’s largest platform for exporting and selling Nordic design. As a retail platform, World of TRE’s aim is to make Nordic lifestyle and happiness, as well as great Nordic design available globally. In the World of TRE’s strategy, the omnichannel shopping experience is the future and good design is for everyone.

The sales collection of furniture, fashion, and home decoration reflect the company’s values; good design, beauty,  and transparency. The carefully curated and unique but plentiful selection of brands include both well-known classics and new emerging designers. All designs are originals from well-known and awarded designers and are made to last a lifetime. 

The Finnish company works together with the best local partners to reach the right audience and top locations. World of TRE’s large portfolio of brands enables carefully curated offering for different locations and audiences.

Korea is World of TRE’s first international market. World of TRE’s first project in Korea was presenting 100 Finnish design companies in the TRE Christmas Market in Seoul in December 2017. At the moment, TRE has a shop in Dongdaemun Design Plaza mall (Salimteo) and in the fall, World of TRE is also opening an online store for the Korean market. 

In Japan, World of TRE will open a permanent store. TRE Store will be located in Metsä Village next to the world’s largest Moominvalley Park in Hanno, near Tokyo.

Unify Underwear is a Danish lingerie brand founded in 2017 by Alberte Simonsen and Simone Gustafson. We design interchangeable underwear, which gives our bras a unique feature to mix and match styles and colors.

about
at menwith_ do we inspire men dedicated to lifestyle and fashion through instagram. we post inspirational material daily to over +10 million followers all over the world. we reach over 230 million views per month and are growing every month since we started in 2012.  

@menwithclass and @menwithstreetstyle are the two biggest accounts.  

the followers are 75% men, mainly 18-35 years who have a great interest in lifestyle and fashion, they are the next generation trend setters and early adopters.

The bbhugme Pregnancy Pillow was created for a single reason: to help make mums and babies happier by keeping them more comfortable. 

We do this through a simple but powerful idea: a pillow that helps mother and baby sit, lie and sleep comfortably throughout pregnancy and early childhood. The company is built on our Scandinavian values and medical professional experience from chiropractors.
bbhugme was created by three chiropractors from Norway, Hilde, Ann Kristin and Elisabeth, who shared a deep interest in caring for pregnant women, moms and babies. They saw many teary, sleep-deprived women who were suffering from pelvic and back pain before, during and after pregnancy. The three realized that the women needed even more support and care – a long-lasting, take-home solution that could support them beyond the care they got at the clinics. This was the origin of the bbhugme pillow.

A better pillow
The three chiropractors worked with designers to develop a unique pillow that mothers could properly count on for support. The pillow evolved from focusing on the details that matters. The optimal shape, filled with a specific type of mircobeads, gives provides sturdy, but flexible support for every body type. 

After the launch in 2013, bbhugme has won several awards in Norway and UK.
 
Customer Service: ✉️ hello@bbhugme.com
Sales & Promotions: ✉️ kine.nilsen@bbhugme.com
Marketing: ✉️ acblix@bbhugme.com

Ramsign offers authentically designed, hand-stenciled enamel signs featuring original design, and a thick and glossy enamel. All our enamel signs including house numbers, name plates, address plaques, are backed with a lifetime warranty and a money back guarantee.

All our signs are manufactured with genuine glass enamel and stenciling technique, which is the original manufacturing method. Production takes place exclusively by hand.

The hand-made stenciling, and the fat, glossy enamel, are important characteristics, and the very soul of the traditionally produced enamel signs from us. 

Our personalized enamel signs are designed for individuals who want to decorate their homes, businesses that value a unique identity, and anybody who shapes the way we experience public spaces. For more information visit us at https://ramsign.com
Foreningen Norden er en partipolitisk uavhengig medlemsforening som arbeider for å styrke og utvikle et folkelig nordisk samarbeid for alle som bor i Norden.

We keep you driving! InterControl is a Nordic specialist of cleaner traffic. We offer Charging Solution for EVs, AC-chargers and DC-chargers (High Power and Fast Chargers) and busbars for professionals.

Our goal at Enkla Kassen is to make it effortless for people to reduce their climate impact from food. We offer our customers an affordable plant-based meal service that makes daily food habits hassle-free.

Historien har sin början 1984 som exklusiv butik för herrar med kläder av högsta rang. Idag handplockar vi kläder & skor i världsklass för både damer & herrar.

Dondup, Philippe Model, Grifoni, Aglini, Massimo Alba, ASH, Lardini, MOMA, Hetrego, Doucals mfl, oavsett om det är jeans, sneakers, chinos, skjortor, tröjor, blusar, skor, klänningar, kostymer, kavajer, slipsar, strumpor, underkläder eller högklackat. 
Vi har det bästa från de mest intressanta varumärkena för kvinnor, herrar, tjejer och killar och du kan alltid ha högsta krav på oss och våra varor. 

ALEXIS vision är enkel - att erbjuda italienska internationella varumärken för damer och herrar som vill ha de bästa kläderna och personlig service.

Oavsett om det är nya jeans, en vacker blus en ny kostym i full canvas som du behöver, så finns vi här för att hjälpa dig.
Hela sortimentet tas ut för hand där vi väljer det bästa från de bästa leverantörerna.

// Nenne Ella Björklund & Johan Arne Berglind.

We took our first staggering steps back in 2007; a group of friends dedicated to learning as we travelled along the great bumpy road of trial and error. The journey had only just begun.

Today we’re driven by an ambition to create a product and a brand sustainable over time. We aim to achieve this through a firm focus on quality, with inspiration taken from the dynamics generated within our creative umbrella. Combining playful design with environmental awareness, our products and projects encompass the fields of clothing, furniture, music and film.
Based in Aarhus, Denmark. We make natural cosmetics with coffee grounds.

What started in 2014 as a concept from a tech company in southern Sweden is now a new start-up revolutionizing the smart home industry. The smart home solution is developed by the three founders and brothers. 
Animus Home connects all smart devices in a home and gives the user a freedom to make their smart home what they want it to be. Be a user who only wants things to work without much effort or become a developer for it.

Kokenut ja luotettava IT-alan kumppani 

Teemme ohjelmistokehitystä, applikaatioita, integraatioita ja kehitämme tietojärjestelmiä sekä suunnittelemme järjestelmien arkkitehtuureja. Toteutamme kaiken AWS:llä eli Amazon Web Services –pilvipalveluilla.

Todisteena kansainvälistä huippuluokkaa olevasta osaamisestamme ovat Amazonin myöntämät statukset: Olemme virallinen AWS Advanced Consulting Partner ja AWS Service Delivery Partner. Rakennamme palvelut aina 100% pilveen käyttäen Serverless-ratkaisuja.

Flowery bygger på en vision att förbättra blomsterbranschen. Från våra noggrant utvalda, rättvisemärkta odlare väljer vi blommor i säsong och tack vare vår prenumerations- och leveransmodell har vi ett minimalt svinn. Design, hållbarhet och ett högkvalitativt hantverk är våra ledord och blommorna sätts samman till tankeväckande kompositioner. 

Flowery drivs med ett hjärtligt engagemang och vår vision är att bidra till ett hållbart och rättvist samhälle där vi försöker göra gott i allt vi gör och berör med vår verksamhet. Vi tycker att allt levande ska behandlas med värdighet och respekt. Därför gör vi vårt bästa för att minimera negativa sociala, ekonomiska eller miljömässiga konsekvenser som kan uppstå till följd av vår verksamhet.

Våra leveranser sker med en budfirma som är ISO- 9001 och 14001 certifierad och kör enligt våra miljödirektiv. Chaufförerna får lön enligt kollektivavtal och är självklart försäkrade. Vi strävar efter att använda minsta mängd förpackningar och annat förbrukningsmaterial för att ha en så låg miljöpåverkan som möjligt.

Våra arbetstagare har gynnsamma arbetsförhållanden och rättvisa löner. Jämställdhet och rätten att engagera sig i fackföreningar är en självklarhet hos oss.

Vi jobbar kontinuerligt med åtgärder för att förbättra vår agenda, verksamhet och prestanda i förhållande till miljö, etiska och sociala frågor.

Tillsammans vill vi skapa en vackrare värld helt utan onödigt blomstersvinn.

— Sandra & Madeleine

AutoSock is the market leading and highest certified textile traction device for vehicles. Our products are available for cars, trucks and forklifts. AutoSock is used for a variety of vehicles from firetrucks and ambulances to public transportation services and airport pushbacks. Between our brands AutoSock and SnowGecko we cover 98% of the commercial tire size market. Our products are available in more than 60 countries. 

We invented the snow sock in 1996 and we were the first to manufacture a textile alternative to traditional snow chains. We went through extensive research and development to deliver the most technologically advanced solution to a simple challenge: winter driving safety. Therefore we collaborated directly with leading automotive manufacturers and international certification bodies.

AutoSock was incorporated in 1998, and became a Fred Olsen company in 2001. We are based in the headquarter of Fred. Olsen & Co. in Oslo, with additional locations in Spain, Germany and France.

Save the Orangutan works to save the endangered orangutan and its rainforest habitat.

We support the rescue and translocation of wild orangutans whose forest habitat has been destroyed and the rehabilitation of orphaned orangutans that — without our help — would die or be sold into the illegal pet trade. 

Our goal is for as many orangutans as possible to be released back into the wild, where they belong and to protect wild orangutans and their rainforest home. 

Save the Orangutan is a Danish based organization fundraising in both Denmark, Sweden and England. Save the Orangutan works closely with Indonesian BOS Foundation to achieve the best possible results. 

To protect the orangutan and the rainforest we rely entirely on donations. 

Please contact us using these e-mailadresses: 

In Danish: info@redorangutangen.dk (www.redorangutangen.dk)
In Swedish: medlemsservice@savetheorangutan.se (www.savetheorangutan.se)
In English: info@savetheorangutang.org (www.savetheorangutan.org

We love literature. We want to change what we cannot accept. We are The New Academy that believes in democracy, transparency, diversity. Join us!

www.dennyaakademien.com
shop.dennyaakademien.com

The New Academy was founded to warrant that an international literary prize will be awarded in 2018, but also as a reminder that literature should be associated with democracy, openness, empathy and respect.

In a time when human values are increasingly being called into question, literature becomes the counterforce of oppression and a code of silence. It is now more important than ever that the world’s greatest literary prize should be awarded.

The New Academy is a non-profit organization, politically and financially independent. It consists of a wide range of knowledgeable individuals. The New Academy works within the time frame of the Swedish Academy and in five different committees. 

The winner will be announced October 14th and presented at a formal event with a grand celebration December 10th 2018. 

The New Academy will be dissolved December 11th.

ViSSEVASSE er et dansk Design & Paper Studio. Bag ViSSEVASSE står Dorthe Mathiesen og Karsten Noel, der de seneste 20 år har arbejdet i krydsfeltet mellem grafisk design, scenografi og mode.

ViSSEVASSE fortæller visuelle historier. Vores mission er at fremkalde dejlige minder hos dem, der ser vores produkter og give dem lyst til at tage en timeout og tænke over de ting, der gør dem glade. Derfor er vores plakater inspireret af Art Deco stilen fra 1930’erne og tegnet med en douce farvepen i et nordisk look, der renser alle overflødige detaljer fra, men bibeholder stemningen af genkendelighed.

Ud over at sælge vores eget design er vi så heldige at arbejde sammen med to internationalt anerkendte fotografer; australske Vee Speers og svenske Dan Isaac Wallin. Deres fotokunst efterlader os, der kigger, med et enkelt og nordisk indtryk tilsat poesi og stof til eftertanke.

Eero Aarnio is the Finnish designer and innovator responsible for some of the most recognisable and best loved pieces of furniture of the last century. Fuelled by his lifelong enthusiasm for fresh ideas and new ventures, we have brought these iconic designs back to life under the label, Eero Aarnio Originals.

At the heart of Eero Aarnio Originals is Eero himself. Not just his designs but his family, his home, his life. Through our brand we are able to recreate these stories in a new universe while remaining true to the philosophy of the man himself. We are not just making furniture: we are sharing the stories behind the designs, issuing an invitation to discover Eero’s world.

Eero has become well known for pioneering the use of plastic and fiberglass in furniture design, and his iconic creations have led to a multitude of imitations. But we are determined to reconnect the designs with their founder, an endlessly innovative, imaginative creator and craftsman.

Eero Aarnio pieces are each characters in their own right, with their own life stories and personalities. They have been designed from a place of love and optimism; shaped by gut feeling, curiosity and imagination.

---

Have questions about the Eero Aarnio Originals collection? Interested in retailing these original design classics of Mr. Aarnio? Or maybe you have a project where you would like to use our products? 

For more information, please email us at hello(at)aarniooriginals.com

Din leverandør av sikkerhetsopplæring
Vi har et bredt utvalg av kurs for dine ansatte. Vi underviser i truck, maskin, kran, HMS, FSE og førstehjelp. Kursene kan holdes som åpne kurs hos oss, hos deg eller som fjernundervisning/videokonferanse.
Kompetansebedriften er totalleverandør av sikkerhetsprodukter og opplæring til industrien. Vår filosofi er enkel: Nøkkelen til en sikker og effektiv arbeidsdag går gjennom kunnskap og riktig utstyr.

 
I vårt kurssenter Oslo holder vi interessante og lærerike kurs presentert på en pedagogisk og lett forståelig måte. Våre kursholdere og instruktører har lang erfaring fra bygg, anlegg og offshorevirksomhet.

Med flere kontorer i Norge er vi representert i nærheten av deg. Vi har kontor i Oslo, Sandefjord, Moss, Fredrikstad, Bergen og Trondheim. 

Har du ikke mulighet til å være fysisk tilstede i et av våre kurslokaler tilbyr vi også flere av kursene våre som fjernundervisning online.

Kompetansebedriften setter kunden i fokus og tilpasser selvfølgelig opplæringen etter ditt behov.

 

Vi tilbyr kurs- og konsulenttjenester innen:

    Sikkerhetsopplæring
    Maskinopplæring
    Kontrollsystemer
    Vedlikeholdssystemer
    Dokumentert og sertifisert opplæring
    Salg av fallsikringsutstyr og løfteredskap
    Årlig lovpålagt «Kompetent kontroll» av fallsikringsutstyr

 
Kunnskap alene er ikke alt du trenger for å sikre en trygg arbeidsplass. Riktig utstyr er også en viktig faktor. Derfor har Kompetansebedriften åpnet egen nettbutikk for salg av sikkerhetsartikler som vernebekledning, fallsikring- og førstehjelpsutstyr. Vi garanterer topp kvalitet og rask levering av alt du trenger for en sikker hverdag i din bedrift.

Berg & Berg was founded to create products based on the foundations of classic style, but from a modern, Nordic point of view. We believe classic menswear has a great future, and want to take a role in building this together with our customers - style and quality enthusiasts from all over the world.

DRAKENBERG SJÖLIN is one of the most influential jewelry brands on the Swedish market. The idea to capture the beauty in simplicity and the choice of combining classic nordic elegance with a contemporary minimalist look is behind the success. DRAKENBERG SJÖLIN’s timeless design fits both the sophisticated, as well as the more fashion conscious customer. The jewellery has a Nordic signature which also appeals to the international market. Besides their own shop in Stockholm they have over 100 retailers in Sweden as well as in Norway, England and Germany.

COMPANY VALUES

TIMELESSNESS. Nature is, despite its shifts in seasons and constant surprise, a symbol for timelessness. Where a leaf has grown and then fallen to the ground, a new leaf will grow again. It stands for endless change that never stops to evoke feelings. A piece of jewellery from drakenberg sjölin can be picked up and worn again and again, no matter where or when.

SIMPLICITY. There is a strength that shouldn’t be overworked or overstated. Strength in that which can stand on it’s own but also be a part of something bigger. A DRAKENBERG SJÖLIN jewellery should always add that little extra without overshadowing the wearer’s own personality

RAW ELEGANCE. When the effortless of nature’s asymmetry meets modern design philosophy a selfevident and urban naturalness emerges. DRAKENBERG SJÖLIN stands for raw elegance that combines classical with innovation.

THOUGHTFULNESS. A piece of jewellery is something personal and, if loved, will follow a person throughout life and then live on through next generations. Therefore jewellery has a history and says something about the wearer. For DRAKENBERG SJÖLIN it is important to put a lot of attentions into details, so that each piece of jewellery will be a comfortable, beautiful, uncomplicated and beloved friend to join you on the journey of life. Just like the intricate pattern of the leaf that keeps fascinating through out time.

Tiny Gardens'​ produkter er fremstillet på et socialøkonomisk og bæredygtigt grundlag.

Jazzhus Montmartre is the historic jazz hotspot of Copenhagen, presenting world class live jazz at the original intimate venue where it all started in 1959 at Store Regnegade 19A (Great Rain Street) in the heart of the Danish capital.

From 1959-1976, the club made jazz history as the European home for jazz giants Dexter Gordon, Ben Webster, Stan Getz, Kenny Drew and many other masters of the 60's and 70's.

They all moved to Copenhagen because of the special atmosphere of Montmartre. The club got under their skin with its special ambiance and extraordinary people.

The photo on the left is from a Playboy Magazine story in 1964 showing the intense admiration at Montmartre for Dexter Gordon.

While living in Copenhagen, the great American jazz icons educated a whole generation of Danish jazz masters, including the famous Danish bass players Niels-Henning Ørsted Pedersen, Mads Vinding, Jesper Lundgaard and Bo Stief, drummer Alex Riel, and trumpeter Palle Mikkelborg.

LOOW is a Danish clothing brand, specialized in making merinowool garments of the highest quality. Through vast knowledge, a personal approach and attention to detail, we aim to make the best product on the market. LOOW was founded in 2014 by Anders Lorentzen, a former Special Operation Forces operator, and conceived on his hands-on learnings through seven years in the force.

LOOW represents a unique approach to clothes making. One that doesn’t pay attention to a fast-paced fashion industry, but instead focus solely on quality, durability and versatility, and the idea that we are supposed to depend on and demand more from what we wear. An important aspect of everyday life working under harsh conditions in high pressure situations. 

The direct inspiration behind the first ever LOOW product was a middle blue Special Operation Forces standard issue wool base layer. A subtle, slim-fit T-shirt merging the uncompromised functionality of combat gear with a timeless civil look. The versatility of the merino wool quickly made this piece of military equipment a trusted companion. Both in the scorching heat of Afghanistan, the Scandinavian winter and anywhere in between.

VEJRHØJ is an independent watch brand based in Copenhagen, Denmark. The company merges natural hardwood, stainless steel and Nordic minimalism to create designs that are simple, yet distinctive.

MALLING LIVING
MALLING LIVING is an interior design company based near Aarhus, Denmark. A sincere passion for timeless and durable design in high quality was the cornerstones in the foundation of MALLING LIVING back in 2013. 

We find inspiration in graphic lines, classic design, and Nordic-inspired interior. We create high quality furniture and accessories that fit effortlessly into any home and interior style – and both private and public environments. Our aim is for each product to carry a host of applications and that they should be able to tolerate excessive use – an aim that stems from MALLING LIVING’s roots in the hospitality industry, in which the use of durable materials is paramount.   

The designer behind MALLING LIVING, Rikke Malling
Rikke Malling is the owner and designer behind MALLING LIVING, but she also has a background as restaurant owner and is educated sommelier. In 2005, she and her husband, Thorsten Schmidt, opened the gourmet restaurant, Malling & Schmidt, which they ran for a decade. In 2007, they expanded and opened their second  restaurant, Nordisk Spisehus.

Coming from a family of architects, Rikke Malling has always had a great fondness of interior design, and since the opening of the two restaurants, she has styled, designed and produced most of the interior of the restaurants to ensure that the overall expression was exactly like she wanted. It was this drive and passion that led to the foundation of MALLING LIVING in 2013. 

Today, MALLING LIVING has retailers all over Europe as well as its own webshop and combined shop/showroom.

ONAR redefines the possibilities of leatherwork. With a wide-eyed dedication to innovation and a defiant disobedience of their artisanal heritage, ONAR stimulates your senses and sensibilities.


Irene Kostas, founder and artistic director, lead the family tradition astray into a dimly-lit, brightly coloured, all night utopia; a suburban nightmare of vibrant, richly textured leathers and shearlings that will ignite your visceral desire to roam.


Audacious and understood instinctively by the brave, ONAR is for those who decide on uncensored expression and for those who know that life’s too short.

BESOS.DK and BESOSSCARVES.COM are exclusive webshops, which specialise in beautiful and unique scarves of the highest quality. BESOS was born in Denmark in 2012 and has a vision to offer a unique selection of scarves, wraps and shawls. The philosophy behind our collections is centred around selecting the best and most beautiful scarves. We carefully select our partners and suppliers, and are only satisfied with the very best, both in terms of raw materials and craftsmanship.

Purity Herbs was established in Akureyri in 1994 by Ásta  Sýrusdóttir and André Raes, after witnessing incredible results of a home-made herbal cream. Ásta Sýrusdóttir is the owner today.

Ásta was working at a local nursery where a little boy was suffering from severe eczema and rashes. Ásta got to try the cream on the little boy's skin. What happened then stunned everyone  - the boy's skin had returned to almost normal within days. 
The boy's grandfather happened to be a local pharmacist. He was as impressed as everyone else and subsequently offered facilities at his pharmacy, along with encouragement to start a formal business. 

 
Today, Purity Herbs produces over 60 skincare products, suited for all ages and all skin types.

The first product, the Wonder Cream, is still one of the top sellers because of it's incredible effects.

Oviku Ltd is founded in 2013. Oviku Inc was founded in 2014. Oviku Ltd has strong knowledge and expertise related to locking systems and other security systems from year 1979. 

We are interested and we develope products to the future of security and smart home industry as well to global environment. Our main goal is to improve exterior door environment in mechanical and smart solutions to protect people more ease comparing existing solutions.

We research and innovate different opportunities and ways to improve security for solutions that already exist. We develop and think hard how to make them work even better. 

In Oviku Philosophy.
Good Design doesn’t only look good, it feels good it works perfectly for all. Good Design needs to be usable and practical. 

Oviku Ltd patented and patent pending locking systems meets  these standard and increases your security and its feel.
 
With these products you are able to lock different space, real-estate and apartments. 

No matter if you want to lock kindergarten, school, home or where there is exterior or inner door, we can offer you a solution that no one else can. 

Innovation for our exterior doors is mechanical and smart lock solution that improves your security from out side. Simple as it should be.. 

All our products are retrofitting to existing locks. Every product has been thought that can be replaced by your self. You don’t have to use locksmith if you don’t want to. 

Oviku Ltd patented door handles, knobs and exterior door locking systems are ease of use and secure innovations for lock bodies gives more security to you, loved ones and for your goods. That’s the most important to use.

JS er ejet og drevet af Casper Seedorff og Emilie Middelhart og deres fælles passion for plakater i alle genrer.
Idéen til JS kom til verdenen efter et mindre impulskøb af 50 serigrafi-plakter på et amerikansk website og da vi ikke havde plads til mere end 
4 plakater i vores lille lejlighed måtte vi jo gøre et eller andet ved de 46 andre plakater som nu bare lå under sengen - og det blev så starten på JS.

Vores mål er at gøre JS til den mest toneangivende plakatshop i Danmark og at kunne tilbyde design og kunstplakater til en fair pris.

Hälsosamt eko-snacks till ditt företag

EC-GO erbjuder en helhetslösning av färdigpaketerade påsar och boxar med ekologiska och organiska snacks från olika producenter. Packat och klart levererar vi direkt till kontor, konferens, event och återförsäljare.

Vi har ett stort utbud av hälsosamt och smarrigt snacks med en blandning av choklad, godis, nötter, torkad frukt och rawbars. Varje månad byter vi ut delar av innehållet med nya eko-favoriter och det finns alltid en blandning av gluten- och laktorsfira, nötfria och veganska snacks. Vi skräddarsyr lösningar efter företags behov, budget och volym.

EC-GO är både en distributör och en marknadsföringskanal. Vår EC-GO Bag och Box är ett naturligt och smart sätt för leverantörer att nå ut till nya konsumenter. Vi underlättar för företag att nå ut med produkter på ett innovativt och roligt sätt.


EC-GO´s uppkomst & vision

Med ett brinnande intresse för en balanserad och hälsosam livsstil samt en märkbar ökad efterfråga på hållbarhet och schyssta produkter, grundades EC-GO under 2014. EC-GO´s ambition är att göra det enkelt för alla att välja ett schysst, organiskt och ekologiskt snacks.

Idag drivs EC-GO av Julia & Isabelle som brinner för att introducera fler till att välja hållbara produkter som man kan njuta av med gott samvete. Vi vet att det kan kännas svårt att upprätthålla en balanserad och hälsosam livsstil i en stressfull vardag. Därför vill vi göra det lättare för dig genom att alltid se till att du har ett nyttigt och ekologiskt alternativ till godis, både i hemmet och på jobbet! Vi anser att man inte ska behöva avstå från allt man tycker är gott, utan tror på unna sig lite då och då!
Amazu Media creates meaningful entertainment, delivering relevant and positive messages in the form of touching interactive experiences.

Rugged footwear for rugged characters.

Dundas Footwear was established to produce quality footwear of the highest order, but also to utilize the knowledge and experience that still exist in Europe. As more and more factories are closed down or moved to more cost-effective countries, the knowledge and tools for making products by traditional methods are dwindling. The Dundas clan name was chosen not only because it is Liam`s old family name, but because it represent hundreds of years of continuous history under the clan motto "Essayez", or "Try". The Dundas tartan is used in the heel straps on our boots, as a reminder of Dundas`great history, and to remind us to always try our best.
True quality is a result of a long and painstaking process, not just the PR-drivel called "perceived quality". True quality is the customers reward for paying for a product that is made with pride, from the tannery to the workshop.
Our reward is seeing a happy customer that wears his boots with pride. A pair of Dundas is the beginning of a long friendship.
We believe in happiness

PREPAIR er et expres brand i modebranchen, stiftet af Lotte Moslund i 2013. 
Med hyppige kollektioner vil vi inspirere modebevidste piger ved at afspejle tidens trends. Hverdagens livstil og nutidige trend er vores inspirationskilde til innovation og differentiering. For os handler det om at være ”PREPAIR”
Filosofien for vores brand, er at skabe nye designs tilpasset den konstant skiftende mode. Med op til 10 årlige kollektionslanceringer, vil vi med ekspres leveringer imødekomme en stor efterspørgsel fra detailbranchen.
Visionen er at skabe feminint tøj vi selv elsker at have på. Kollektionerne er omhyggelig udvalgt med vægt på forholdet mellem kvalitet og attraktive priser, som altid afspejler de sidste nye modetrends.

We strive to always create fashionable and functional activewear that makes you feel beautiful, confident and sassy when wearing them. We continuously and frequently release smaller collections to ensure we stay on trend with the fashion industry.
We are a reliable partner in your life, with the ambition to always exceed what you expect from a brand.

Yoko mixes the best materials with decades of expertise and top designing. Our passion and duty is to manufacture the right products for your demand, as for professional athletes. By choosing Yoko’s sport clothing, you can be sure that the pleasure and comfort of outdoor activities are not going to be depended on your clothing. Outdoors are fulfilled with experiences, the enjoyment and prosperity we will leave upon you.

The Yoko ski range is based on Finnish ski production know-how. Stoorla is an online shopping center that combines different shopkeepers and their stores. Above all, Stoorla is a sales and marketing network where starting and growing of online sales is easy and risk-free. In the shop owner’s point of view, the heart of Stoorla is a cost-effective central stock and competitive delivery.

For the consumer, Stoorla brings the supply of the marketplace closer: The products ordered from Stoorla can be delivered as soon as 1-3 hours in the Helsinki area. In Stoorla the customers can click and collect products and services from different stores to the same shopping bag and pay for them at the same time – even with an invoice. The best part is that the customer pays only for one delivery.

Álafoss - tradition of quality since 1896. When Álafoss was established at the end of the 19th century, it was marked as the true beginning of Iceland's wool industry. Álafoss is located in the old factory house by the waterfall Álafoss that was used to drive the mills of the old factory. There you can find a great selection of the popular traditional Icelandic wool sweater ("lopapeysa"), knitting wool yarn and almost any wool product you can think of as well as experience this important side of Iceland's industrial history in the form of the factory building and an exhibit of selection of old knitting machinery and photographs from the early days. 

Among Álafoss' satisfied customers are prominent world leaders such as Hillary Clinton and Ronald and Nancy Reagan, whose thank-you notes are displayed in the store in Iceland. Not to forget the world's first female head of state, Iceland's own Vigdís Finnbogadóttir.

For further information about Álafoss visit our website, http://www.alafoss.is or email us at alafoss@alafoss.is


Contact us: 
E-mail: alafoss@alafoss.is
Phone: +354 566 6303
http://www.alafoss.is

My goal was and is to offer unique, child-friendly and nice clothes for all occasions. I work mainly in organic fabrics or fabrics I find at second hand. Most of the collections are sewn up in small editions, often in one piece in each size, so if you find something you like, then don’t wait, go for it.

It is not a coincidence that some foods has a greater flavor, than others. - The answer to this is very simple, as Umami is the fifth taste, and also the very DNA of tastiness.

We therefore introduces sauce umami's new Haute Cuisine fond family, of five umami-fied fond products.

Sauce Umami Haute Cuisine Fonds is all about passion, and is developed with a vision to manufacture the most outstanding, authentic fonds of the market. Fonds with a taste of such high quality that they can measure up to what the best chefs produces in their own kitchen.

The prerequisite for creating tasty fond is of course linked to good, healthy, fresh and tasty ingredients. Therefore Sauce Umami's raw materials are allways carefully selected, and by only using the very best and freshest ingredients for each fond, we have created these first class results.

All Sauce Umami Haute Cuisine Fonds is of course, based on a clean label philosophy where flavor enhancers, like salt, yeast extracts and additives is banned, just like in your own kitchen, and Sauce Umami Haute Cuisine Fond products therefore is always 100% natural.

Terhi Pölkki is a shoe and accessory brand focused on women's shoes and leather goods. Since launched in 2011, Helsinki-based shoe designer Terhi Pölkki has established her name-sake shoe brand after graduating from Cordwainers at London College of Fashion in 2008. Terhi Pölkki’s style sums up the brand’s coveted aesthetic of minimalist luxury with a tough edge.

In response to the growing urban existence, Terhi Pölkki emphasises craftsmanship, timelessness and environmental consciousness in her work.

Terhi chooses to reinvent design rather than constantly producing new items. All shoes are crafted out of high-quality and chrome-free leather materials. Terhi’s designs are carving out a new definition of sustainable luxury, refined craft.


The shoe collection is made in Portugal and Finland by using locally sourced components and vegetable tanned leather. Operating in a sustainable manner is an important principle for Terhi Pölkki’s brand. The collection is made within a context that respects people and the environment.

For Terhi, shoes are objects with a story.

Karttaselain is a versatile mapping service and platform for consumers and businesses. Karttaselain provides high-quality maps and data collection features for both outdoor recreational use and field work. Karttaselain is available for iOS, Android, Windows Phone and Windows 10 devices.

"Maailma muuttuu tällä hetkellä nopeammin kuin koskaan ennen, mutta se ei tule enää koskaan muuttumaan yhtä hitaasti."​ -Risto Siilasmaa

Olemme valmentavan johtajuuden valmennustalo, joka uskoo dialogiin ja aitoon valmentamiseen. Teemme töitä organisaatioiden muuttamiseksi kohti aitoja ihmissuhteita. Taistelemme ihmisen puolella, sorron kulttuuria vastaan, kaikilla tasoilla.

ET AL is a designbrand founded in Copenhagen by a band of friends of combined Danish and French descent. Our designs are naturally infused with Nordic understatement and hints of French elegance, but most of all they are made for and are inspired by others. We create classic, high quality, footwear.

Designs that are subtly infused with the mosaic of the modern world: the culture we experience, the music we listen to, the books we read, the movies we watch and the people we meet.

Empowering Growth

Bahini is a Swedish scarf brand that was founded in Stockholm in 2016. The scarves are designed in Sweden and handmade by women at carefully selected Fair Trade certified suppliers. Each handcrafted scarf is unique and made with plant-based sustainable materials and dyes to ensure that Mother Earth loves it just as much as we do. 

Our story began in 2014 at a safe house for young girls in Kathmandu, Nepal. It was there and then our mission was born: to empower a bahini, which means little sister in Nepali, with the freedom of choice and to raise awareness about sex-trafficking. With each scarf sold, we support a bahini in need with a scholarship, and through our Fair Trade suppliers we provide our older sisters with training and employment so they too can become independent and live a life free from enslavement. 

Join our #mybahini tribe and help us spread awareness to empower even more girls.

Drevet af passionen for håndværk, miljø og æstetikken i hverdagen er Tricotages mission at skabe design til den moderne kvinde. Tricotage blev grundlagt i København i foråret 2010 af designerne Karin Mammen Bjørneboe og Ida Anesdatter Schmidt. Ønsket er at formidle anvendelige kollektioner med et konstant fokus på bæredygtighed, pasform og detaljer.

Vi hjælper butikker med at forøge deres kundetilfredshed massivt, ved at tilbyde en skrædderoplevelse udover det sædvanlige!

Nordic Tailors er dit online skrædderi leveret til døren. Med Nordic Tailors er du med til at give dine kunder en oplevelse udover det sædvanlige! En service som er med til at forøge din omsætning, formindske returvarer og naturligvis altid exceptionelt godt håndværk.
Med vores DRIVE BY service kan du tilbyde dine kunder at få leveret skrædderopgaven direkte hjem til deres dør! Vi tager os også af reklamationer af tøj købt i din butik.

Belightful Design is a company specializing in wildlife feeder products and ecological design. Company’s debut product, Belightful Butterfly Feeder, brings nature closer to everyday lives by attracting butterflies, and thus enhancing the well-being of both people and butterflies. Belightful Butterfly Feeder combines form and function into unique design and user experience providing innovative decorative element for any outside space. Company also highlights the desire to use materials that enhance our environments.

Elbilgrossisten aims to facilitate the transition to electric vehicles as a means of transport. We provide information, services, products and accessories to facilitate the transition. Therefore, we cooperate with local, national and international companies in order to make this possible.

Our goal is to make your everyday a little easier with an electric vehicle.

Who are we?
Native North clothing stems from the synergy between timeless Scandinavian
design and meticulous attention to unique and high quality fabric choices.

Taking inspiration from traditional Scandinavian craftsmanship, classic designs
and our culture we aspire to emulate the Scandinavian lifestyle and philosophy.

Founded by designer Morten Hvidtsted in 2014, Native North is based in Nørrebro,
Copenhagen where both the head office, showroom and flagship store is located.

Vi er specialister i Johan Christensen-huse gennem 2 generationer.

Hos Johan Christensen & Søn har vi samlet en stor ekspertise inden for Johan Christensen-huse. Henrik Lundquist har den daglige ledelse over de 11 medarbejdere, som renoverer, udbygger, vedligeholder og nytænker de første typehuse i Danmark.

Det siges, at Johan Christensens søn Holger fik ideen til de næsten 20.000 huse på en rejse til Finland i 1950'erne. Der så han, hvordan finske arkitekter opførte huse, hvor de udvendige vindues- og dørkonstruktioner samtidig var husenes bærende konstruktion. Men Holger var visionær og byggede fra starten i mahogni i stedet for fyrretræ. Mahogni er nemlig formfast, har ingen knaster og er impregneringsfrit.

Hos Johan Christensen & Søn holder vi traditionerne for de legendariske huse i hævd samtidig med, at vi nytænker løsninger for vores kunder. Mahogni er grundstammen i materialevalget, og sammen med bl.a. bæredygtig isolering med træfiber bringer vi hver dag de populære huse fra 1950'erne ind i det 21. århundrede.

Vi udfører altid vores arbejde i overensstemmelse med husenes arkitektoniske kvaliteter og historiske præg og har den specialistviden, der skal til at skifte fx vinduer og døre i husene.

Vi er Velfac-mestre og her eget snedker- og tømrerværksted, hvor vi bl.a. laver vinduesrammer, døre, reparationer på skadede dele til Johan Christensen-huse, glasarbejde, beklædningsbrædder, glaslister, indfatninger, fodpaneler, indvendige dørkarme og skydedøre. Vi løser opgaver både for private, boligforeninger, kommuner og erhverv bl.a. hoteller og virksomheder. Vi isolerer kun med træfiber, som er bæredygtigt og brandhæmmende og har egen maskine til at blæse det ind.

Johan Christensen & Søn samarbejder også med kommuner om at gøre boliger ældre- og handicapvenlige, så de ældre kan blive længere i eget hjem. Vi samarbejder desuden med en lang række forsikringsselskaber om skadessager i forbindelse med storm, vand, brand, insekter, svamp og byggesjusk.

Lyd by Dissing creates elegantly designed speakers for your living room.

Our focus is on creating speakers that match the rest of your interior and at the same time deliver a superior sound quality.
We only use the best materials and our experienced wood workers make every speaker a perfect masterpiece.

A MATTER OF LIFE OR DEATH, ALMOST.. 

No matter if you’re climbing Mont Blanc or sailing past Santorini all true explorers knows the importance of quality equipment during adventures. It could actually be the difference between life and death.

Although a watch probably won’t save your life, quality is a serious matter for us. That’s why we only use premium material such as surgical grade steel and sapphire crystal glass to make sure your new watch handles the pressure.

As genuine watch enthusiast, we saw the opportunity to create something special by combining our passions for watches and exploring. By handpicking our favorite spots in Europe as inspiration for our designs each watch gets their own unique story to tell.

Presentation design and infographic specialists. Webshop for infographics. Custom presentation services. Masters for PowerPoint. Training. Consulting.

Customers and users: Top 100 Danish Companies including Maersk Group, Novozymes, Novo Nordisk, Arla, Haldor Topsoe, etc..

Shop Sliides.com. Created exclusively for Microsoft PowerPoint our infographics builds upon a minimalistic infographic approach on presentation visualization. Combined with our caring focus on user friendliness, it enables you to create astonishing quality presentation infographics in no time. With no hassle. The graphics are all fully editable within PowerPoint and Microsoft Office. Embedded as editable vector graphics giving you complete control of color and design.

byHALL produces unique, discreet and elegant pill boxes with emphasis on stylish modern design, high quality and functionality. The 24/7 MEDICASE pill boxes are available in Gray/ White, Black, Dusty Green, Dusty Blue and Dusty Rose. Dispenser boxes are with English, German or Danish text.
24/7 MEDICASE is sold in our own webshops (https://byhall.com, https://byhall.de and https://byhall.dk) and various partner shops in Europe.

Qoali is a Swedish company formed in 2018 with a mission to inspire people to take care of their sleep in order to improve all other aspects of life. Our initial product is a ‘weighted blanket’, designed to enhance the quality and length of sleep, an essential ingredient to a healthy and productive life.

At Gudenaa Pharma we wish to supply the best products on the dietary supplement market. Our focus is on producing unique quality products. This means that we carefully select the ingredients in our products to suit the modern life style and that the ingredients we use have the highest purity that is possible to produce. We introduce products from infants to senior. Our products are carefully developed so that they interact well with each other and by using all our products that suit your age, you will have a composition that will put your body in perfect harmony.

The result is that you fully meet your vitamin, mineral, antioxidant, salt and Omega 3 needs. Besides water, it's the five most important elements in your body's wellbeing.

Your quality of life and health depends largely on what you eat. We modern people live in a busy everyday life, where we often choose the fast solution when it comes to food in the form of fast food and monotonous dishes. This means that we do not eat varied enough, so we do not get the necessary fatty acids, vitamins and minerals. In addition, we often get too much of some fatty acids and other nutrition, and too often you see in other manufacturers'​ dietary supplements that there is no thought about how humans are eating today. There are too often ingredients in dietary supplements we already get too much of, which is not the purpose of a dietary supplement. We want to change that in Gudenaa Pharma by introducing a wide range of dietary supplements that set the level of thoughtful quality products. We only add ingredients in our products that the modern people is short of.

Gudenaa Pharma is a Danish brand with headquarter in Copenhagen. The name originates from Denmark's longest stream, Gudenåen, and has a significant status in Denmark's history, due to its role as fishing water, transport road, power source and recreation area, and the use of the stream can be carried back to ancient times. Gudenå's original name was Guthen, which meant 'it to the gods initiated'​. Later the ‘stream’ was added. Our logo represents Gudenåen's watercourse. We regard ourselves as an honest, quality conscious and innovative brand with passionate, competent and accommodating employees.

Walkincloset startade med inspiration från en kvinnas drömmar om en perfekt garderob. Varje plagg ska vara noga utvalt samtidigt som det skall smälta in och passa ihop med resten av innehållet för att sätta guldkant på och förenkla din vardag. 

Vi hoppas att du hittar inspiration och nya favoriter till din alldeles egna walkincloset. 

Förutom webbshoppen driver vi fyra butiker: Walkincloset Stenungsund, Walkincloset Mölnlycke, Walkincloset Halmstad och Walkincloset Varberg. 

“Every woman deserves to have a special place to keep all her wonderful things. In this special place she will always feel beautiful and inspired - Every woman deserves her own walk-in closet"​

HIT THE HAY is a Swedish company that set out to slap our industry in the face! But you know, in a gentle way, with a pillow or something... Our industry has since long been dominated by Cotton, a fabric that drains our planet from water and polluting it with harsh chemicals. We said enough! And started HIT THE HAY. 

Our promise is to offer people an eco-friendly yet far more greater option when it comes to beddings. We believe that being environmentally conscious should be rewarded, not the other way around. Our Lyocell fabric derives from rapidly growing eucalyptus trees that grow without artificial irrigation, synthetic pesticides or gene modification. The wood pulp is processed with non-toxic organic chemicals in a closed loop cycle that recycles 99,5% of all process chemicals and reuses water.  

Beyond being eco-friendly, Lyocell has a bunch of other great advantages. This super breathable fabric is smoother than silk and featherlike soft to the touch, it's anti-bacterial, hypoallergenic, thermo-regulating, and moisture-wicking, making it the ideal choice for something to spend 1/3 of your life in.

Zaltify is a Danish company with many years of experience in wine and glassware. We are autorized trader of the Zalto Denk'art wine glasses. 

Zaltify is based on a true passion for great wine moments and great wine taste - and our mission is to share the passion for the Zalto glasses. We want to make it easy to shop the Zalto glasses, why we offer: 

- Online shopping
- Full Zalto-collection and the best prices
- Fast delivery within 3 to 5 days
- Full flexibility - buy down to a single wine glass at a time
- Insured delivery - new glass if breakage during transport

We are computer vision researchers and entrepreneurs from Denmark, who for many years struggled to find high-quality calibration targets that were affordable for CV labs and companies. After evaluating different processes for calibration target manufacturing in terms of accuracy, price, and versatility, we found a reliable process for medium to large size calibration targets that are accurate, flat and very stiff. We established Calib.io I/S to make these products available to others facing the same challenges.

Accurate and robust calibration targets are essential for 3D scanning and photogrammetry purposes. Our targets are compatible with OpenCV, MATLAB, CharuCo, Agisoft Photomodeler, MVTec Halcon and more.

Our checkerboard calibration targets also allow professional photographers and videographers to create accurate lens profiles for Adobe CC.

All of our calibration targets are made from durable aluminium/LDPE material which offers excellent flatness and stiffness, while being lightweight and suitable even for prolonged outdoor use. Additionally, the composite material offers excellent thermal stability and corrosion resistance.

Try the free online pattern generator and test your calibration pattern on standard paper, then order a highly accurate and robust target. For completely customised calibration patterns, please send us your design as a PDF file.

JEWELRY BY GRUNDLED - HANDMADE IN DENMARK

Jewelry by Grundled is rooted in the desire of founder Helle Just Weiling to immerse herself in the detailed work of putting together the miniature parts of each piece.

Wood, steel and colored brass come together in minimalistic expressions of geometry.

The finished pieces hold an inherent contrast between the simple design and the texture of the birch wood and its earthy connotations.

The pieces enclose the nature of the north in light designs creating a connection between the jewelry and its origin. To carry Jewelry by Grundled is to carry nature with you.

Grundled is the Danish word for the grammatical subject, and the name indicates profound personal relations between the maker, her products and her craft. The subject is the matter, the foundation and the thing that drives us forward.

Jewelry by Grundled offers unique but highly affordable products. Every piece is crafted by hand in Denmark and made with a true passion for simple aesthetics and the powerful beauty of the wood.

Helle Just Weiling
Designer and owner

I ENRICHED tenker vi litt annerledes. Istedenfor tradisjonelle kosttilskudd velger vi å utvikle høykvalitets produkter som enkelt og effektivt kan brukes i familiens daglige kosthold. 

Vi vil tilby helsebringende, naturlige og velsmakende produkter fra bærekraftige råvarer, med sporbarhet, som tilsettes din mat slik at du får økt livskvalitet og et beriket liv.

Gjennom bærekraftig og klok bruk av naturressurser skal vi med fokus på kommende generasjoner berike miljøet. Vi skal være anerkjent for sunne produkter fra bærekraftige råvarer med sporbarhet.
Fokus på et sunnere liv er kommet for å bli, krav til dokumentasjon på mat blir stadig høyrere, bærekraft er på dagsorden i alle bransjer, og sporbarhet vil i løpet av få år være nødvendig og ønskelig for alle. Det er viktig at virksomheter kaster mer lys enn skygge på samfunnet i en stadig mer globalisert verden.

ENRICHED skal bidra til å gjøre verden sunnere. Ikke bare gjennom å gi mennesker sunne og gode produkter som bidrar til økt livskvalitet, men også gjennom måten vi lever og tenker på. Vi skal utnytte tilgjengelige ressurser på en klok måte med tanke på kommende generasjoner, slik beriker vi både kloden og menneskene.

Havet, naturen og klimaet på Sunnmøre har inspirert oss. Kunnskap som har gått i arv har ført oss dit vi er i dag. Det er denne arven vi nå tar videre med ENRICHED
