Finnprotein's soy bean processing plant is located in Uusikaupunki, Finland.

Finnprotein’s production facility is the only full scale, multi-stage soy processing plant in Europe. In phase one, the annual soybean processing capacity is 240,000 tonnes. Our clients are the feed, fish feed and food industries. Our main products are soybean meal, soy protein concentrate (SPC) and soy oil. As by-products, soy molasses, lecithin and hulls will be offered.

Finnprotein will generate high quality ingredients that offer solutions to customers’ requirements at the right price through reliable cooperation, delivering a win-win situation.

Production has started in October 2013.

Finnprotein employs currently 67 people. Estimated turnover for 2014 is 150 million euros.

Kåska was born out of a simple idea – Because drinking has changed, it's time for spirits to change too. Less alcohol, full experiences.

Our mission is simple – we want to create social moments. Conversations and good times over tasty light drinks. Every bottle of Kåska is made for your casual afternoons together, for the gatherings that you want to remember.

Kåska products are made in Finland, and we are proud of that heritage. Equal opportunity and treatment of others are some of the most basic Finnish values, and the way we conduct our business is based on that very way of thinking. Someone might call us a socialistic company, and we're pretty cool with that analogy. And yes, being a responsible business and selling alcohol might not sound like the easiest combination, but we are doing our best to live by our word. Visit our website to learn more about our social impact.

Hahle-ryhmä on suomalainen kalustealan tarviketoimittaja ja kokonaisvaltaisten säilytysratkaisujen tarjoaja. Hahle-ryhmän tarina alkaa jo vuodesta 1964, jolloin Hahle Oy aloitti toimintansa huonekaluteollisuuden tarviketoimittajana, markkinoijana ja maahantuojana. Vuonna 2021 ryhmään kuuluu Hahle Oy:n (Espoo) lisäksi työtasoistaan ja säilytysjärjestelmistään tunnettu Ecolam Oy (Polvijärvi), kalusteovivalmistaja Josadoor Oy (Kangasniemi), kylpyhuoneratkaisuja ja keittiöaltaita tarjoava Otsoson Oy (Outokumpu), kalusterunkovalmistaja Eurocomp Oy (Perniö) ja maamme johtava valaisimien valmistaja ja suunnittelija  M-Light Oy (Vantaa ja Muurame) sekä emoyhtiö Hahle Group Oy (Espoo). Baltian markkinoilla Hahle-ryhmää edustaa Hahle Eesti Oü. Konsernin liikevaihto on noin 45 M€ ja konsernimme työllistää reilut 200 henkilöä ympäri Suomen.

Hahle Group is a Finnish company active in the furniture and lighting businesses. The broad selection consists of domestic products as well as products from the European high quality suppliers. The story of Hahle Group begins as early as 1964, when Hahle Ltd started marketing, importing and providing supplies for the furniture business in Finland. Quality materials and constant product development guarantees that we can answer the needs and hopes of our customers in the best way possible. 

In 2021 Hahle Group consists of Hahle Ltd, the well-known producer of laminated worktops and storage solutions Ecolam Ltd (Polvijärvi), furniture door manufacturer Josadoor Ltd (Kangasniemi), Otsoson Ltd (Outokumpu) providing kitchen sinks and bathroom basins and furnituresolutions and one of the country's leading domestic lighting manufacturer and designer M-Light Ltd (Muurame). In the Baltic markets Hahle Group is represented by Hahle Eesti Oü (Tallinn). The Group has a turnover of approximately 45 M € and employs over 200 people.

Industrial production, product development, planning and international trade since 1934. We take pride in continuously developing and discovering new products.

CONSTRUCTION
For Safer Construction. Vepe safety posts, steps, platforms and walkways improve the safety of your construction site. Aim for zero accidents! A clean site is a safe site: cleanliness can be improved by means of waste removal, transportation and storage products. The benefits of investing in Vepe’s durable, high-quality products vastly exceed the cost. Transport trolleys, storage cages, racks, construction trolleys, waste chutes. Vepe products are designed to withstand the harshest conditions.

SPORT
High-quality products for sports facilities. Vepe has manufactured ice hockey dasher boards since 1976. In addition to serving Finland, we deliver Vepe dasher boards to other European countries and to Russia and China. You name it, and Vepe multicourt is ready for it. Vepe multi-purpose sports courts provide young people with safe environments to engage in a variety of sporting activities. Our range of movable and fixed stands is ideal for indoor and outdoor use alike, and our weatherproof team shelters and modifiable stages can be used for a variety of events and occasions. The Vepe product range also includes stylish and durable steel swimming pools.

AREA SECURITY
Vepe is a highly-skilled fence-maker. We protect industrial areas, ports and warehouses. We enclose sports fields and parks. We safeguard school and nursery yards. We deliver and install electromechanical and manually-operated gates and barriers. Our architect-designed special fences and gates are always made-to-measure. Our top-quality hot-dip galvanised steel fences are durable and maintain their appearance for years. The fences can also be powder-coated to meet environmental and client needs.

Adea is a high quality furniture manufacturer in Finland. The company is recommended by renowned designers and distinguished by its timeless and fresh design. Adea's furniture exudes pure Scandinavian design, with the perfect balance of comfort and functionality. 

Working together with leading Finnish and international designers, Adea has created a unique and solid collection of sofas, armchairs, carpets and complementary furniture. To create a good product, materials of high quality, as well as an uncompromising approach, are needed in every link of the chain: furniture frame making, padding and upholstery work. The seams, the stitching and the softness tell much about the product, but its true character doesn’t shine until you have put it to the test. The sculptured design providing flexibility and support in the right places is a result of craftsmanship and pride, albeit unseen to the naked eye. 

Over the company’s twenty-year history, Adea products have been developed and improved with Ostrobothnian superiority and toughness. The family-owned company’s determined policy is true in every sense –“We are known for our timeless and contemporary furniture.”

Pohjolan Peruna Oy manufactures Finnish potato products. Since 1962, we have been under Finnish ownership and have worked closely with our contract farmers to continuously develop the best potato varieties for our products. In the past, our products were labelled under the former corporate name: Profood Oy. Pohjolan Peruna Oy became our new corporate name and brand on 10.6.2013. We are located in the municipality of Raahe, Northern Finland, and are surrounded by the best potato fields in the country. Along the history of our businesses, there have been a continuous focus on upgrading our technology and production facilities. Our latest investment was a boiler plant facilitating steam production using local bio-energy. This investment helped us reduce remarkably our energy consumption and costs.

Our A-brands are Mummon and Mestari. Our potato products are ready-to-use, gluten-free, lactose-free, and preservative-free. We produce a UHT potato mash, a wide range of vacuum packed potato products (chilled food), fresh and frozen French fries products, potato flakes and granules, as well as potato mash powder. All of our potato products are suitable for private label, HoReCa professionals, retail customers, bakeries, food and gnocchi manufacturers.

Pupu is a healthy fast casual restaurant that has so far been missing in Finland: delicious, healthy, sustainable food at the speed and ease of fast food.

Our gastro-salads are prepared with respect for traditional gastronomy. Meals are professionally prepared and constructed from pure and mainly organic premium ingredients. The menu changes seasonally and is designed by one of our co-founders, top chef Petri Hotti.

Our colourful menu is simple and contains no red meat. The few animal-based ingredients – as well as the majority of other ingredients – have organic (Eco) and MSC certificates where possible. We keep cooking of raw ingredients to a minimum in order to preserve nutrients and maximize taste. Our menu is also completely free of gluten, without added sugars or any other preservatives.

We believe in transparency: for those who want to know both the personal and environmental impact of the choices they make - we display all relevant information such as origins and nutritional values in our restaurants.

R-Menu offers a wide and complete range of packed food products, along with many kinds of high-quality equipment for food production. Innovative R-Menu concept suits many types and sizes of companies from amusement parks, sports centers and cafes to service stations and restaurants. Concept is centered on effortless use and true efficiency. With low-scale investment you can serve portions without any loss.

Founded in 2006 and after two years research we finally sold our first concept in 2008. Today we have over 700 concepts sold in Finland and Sweden. 

Finnish leading economic and financiall magazine (Kauppalehti) marked R-Menu Ltd the most growing company in Finland 2010 with annualized growth of 188% and again in 2011. In 2012 R-Menu was 3rd.

For more info please visit our website: 
www.r-menu.com
Restaurant chain with 13 restaurants in Helsinki citycenter area

Pienpaahtimo Porista vuosien paahtokokemuksella. Sijaitsemme kauppakeskus Puuvillan sisäpihalla tunnelmallisessa tiilirakennuksessa, jossa meillä on paahtimo-kahvila. Keskitymme laadukkaseen kahviin suoraan viljelijältä. Haluamme maksaa suoraan viljelijälle, koska tällöin hän saa riittävän ison korvauksen työstään. Kun viljelijä voi hyvin, voidaan tilaa kehittää tulevaisuudessa joka mahdollistaa entistä paremman laadun. 

Vuonna 2020 Helsinki Coffee Festival valitsi Kenya Fram AB kahvimme vuoden suodatinkahviksi. 

Haluamme palvella ja antaa parhaita mahdollisia kahvihetkiä asiakkaillemme ja yrityksille. Otathan rohkeasti yhteyttä, mikäli haluat päästä tutustumaan kahveihimme. 

Yrityksille & Toimistoille:
https://b2b.porinpaahtimo.fi

Kuluttajille:
https://www.porinpaahtimo.fi

A small coffee roastery with long history of coffee roasting. We are located in Pori Finland and have also a cafe. Our main focus is on quality coffee straight from the farmers. 

Best filter coffee in Finland 2020 - Helsinki Coffee Festival

Pellopuu Oy on uusia hirsi-innovaatioita kehittävä asiantuntija, jolla on 60 vuoden kokemus hirsirakentamisesta sekä perinnetietoa ja osaamista jo yli sadan vuoden takaa. Juuremme ovat pitkät: sahatoiminta tontillamme alkoi jo vuonna 1900, ja nykyinen yhtiö merkittiin kaupparekisteriin vuonna 1952.

Olemme vakavarainen suomalainen perheyritys, joka tunnetaan luotettavana ja palveluhenkisenä takuutoimittajana. Tarjoamme kattavan valikoiman laadukkaita hirsiratkaisuja sekä uutta kotia etsivälle että suuriin rakennusprojekteihin. Tuotantomme perustuu alan parhaisiin rakenneteknisiin ratkaisuihin, mikä tekee tuotteistamme luotettavan ja rakentamista sujuvoittavan valinnan projektitoimituksissa.

Ainutlaatuisen konekantamme ansiosta pystymme toimittamaan kotimaan suurikokoisimmat hirsirakenteet erityisvaativiin ja kokoluokaltaan mittaviin rakennusprojekteihin. Kehittämämme erityiskorkea ja painumaton JÄTTIHIRSI on innovatiivinen rakenne, joka mullistaa hirsirakentamisen. 

Käytämme ensiluokkaista raaka-ainetta. Pohjoinen puu tarjoaa ihanteellisen materiaalin hirsirakentamiseen, sillä se kasvaa ankarissa olosuhteissa lajitovereitaan tiukkasyisemmäksi ja lujemmaksi. Myös lujan ja näyttävän sydänpuun osuus muodostuu hitaamman kasvun myötä suuremmaksi.

Käytössämme on ISO 9001:2015 -laatujärjestelmä ja tuotteemme ovat CE- ja PEFC-merkittyjä.
Import and manufactur LED luminaires and components, lighting design and installation in new lighting projects, replacement lighting to old installations.

Schmolz+Bickenbach - konserni on maailman suurin pitkien erikoisterästen tuottaja, jalostaja ja jakelija. Konserniimme kuuluvat mm. seuraavat terästehtaat: Deutsche Edelstahlwerke GmbH, Ugitech, Swiss Steel, Ascometal, Steeltec ja Finkl&Sons.
Konser¬nin kokonaishenkilöstömäärä on tällä hetkellä noin 10 000 henkilöä
ja kokonaisliikevaihto 3,3 miljardia euroa.

Suomessa toimitilamme ja varastomme sijaitsevat Valkeakoskella, 
toisen omistajamme Flinkenbergin teräspalvelukeskuksen yhteydessä

The best solution for finding a happy and trustworthy companion for your elderly loved one. We connect students to seniors who need companionship, help with transportation, technology lessons and more. Friendship across generations.

We create real meaningful jobs.

MUJI, originally founded in Japan in 1980, offers a wide variety of good quality products including household goods, apparel and food.
Mujirushi Ryohin, MUJI in Japanese, translates as “no-brand quality goods.”

MUJI is based on three core principles, which remain unchanged to this day:

1. Selection of materials
2. Streamlining of processes
3. Simplification of packages

There are more than 700 MUJI stores around the world, carrying more than 7,000 items ranging from clothing and household goods to food and even houses. But the foundation of our ideology hasn't changed since the day we were conceived; like the compass that points due North,
we continue to orient ourselves to the basis and universality of daily life.

Olvi on valmistanut juomia jo yli 140 vuotta Iisalmessa, ja nykyisin yhtiö toimii paikallisesti Suomessa, Valko-Venäjällä ja Baltian maissa. Tytäryhtiömme A. Le Coq on Viron suurin juomavalmistaja, Latvian Cesu Alus sekä Valko-Venäjän Lidskoe Pivo ovat toiseksi suurimmat juomavalmistajat omissa maissaan ja Volfas Engelman on Liettuan kolmanneksi suurin panimo.

Emoyhtiö työllistää keskimäärin 370 osaajaa Suomessa ja ulkoistettujen toimintojen kautta lisäksi noin 150 henkilöä. Panimo on suuri kesätyöllistäjä, noin 100 paikkakuntalaista opettelee panimoalan taitoja joka kesä.

Panimomestari William Gideon Åberg ja rouvansa Onni perustivat panimon Iisalmeen vuonna 1878. Tuolloin Suomessa toimi noin 78 panimoa. 
Itsenäisenä suomalaisena niistä on säilynyt ainoastaan Olvi.

Dispelix Ltd is a designer and fabless manufacturer of mass-manufacturable diffractive waveguide displays and display modules for use in augmented reality (AR) and mixed reality (MR) eyewear and headsets.

Dispelix designs, sells, and supplies Dispelix-branded waveguide displays to product owners and their suppliers. Dispelix also designs customized waveguide displays and licenses intellectual property to customers that develop game-changing products for fast-evolving AR eyewear markets.

At Nanso Group we operate two iconic, well-known fashion brands, Nanso and Vogue. 

Nanso is one of the most well-known fashion brands in Finland, established in 1921 in Finland. Nanso offers signature prints and wardrobe essentials inspired by relaxed and uncomplicated Finnish lifestyle. We want Nanso to be the first choice for women, who value sustainable lifestyle, authenticity and beauty of everyday life. Our mission is to create authentic Finnish design by combining style and comfort in a unique way. We design products that make life not just more beautiful, but also easier. One of our principles is to design beautiful products that last time, in terms of quality and style.

Vogue is an internationally recognized fashion brand , launched in 1934 in Sweden. Vogue offers everyday luxury with perfect fit, designed with subtle details and premium yarns to generate a quiet sense of luxury. We want Vogue to be the most preferred hosiery brand for the contemporary women, who value high-quality, perfectly fitted legwear with accessible prices. We are passionate about creating a piece of luxury for everyday life. Rather than being a mere necessity, Vogue pantyhose and socks are the elegant detail that gives the finishing touch to an outfit.

All our beautiful products are designed in Finland.

Apetit is a food industry company firmly rooted in Finnish primary production. Our operations are based on a unique and sustainable value chain: we create well-being with vegetables by offering tasty food solutions that make daily life easier. We also produce high-quality vegetable oils and rapeseed expellers for feeding stuff, and trade grain on the international markets. Apetit Plc's shares are listed on Nasdaq Helsinki. In 2021, Apetit Group's net sales were EUR 284 million. Read more: apetit.fi/en

**

Apetit on suomalainen elintarvikeyhtiö, jolla on vahva integraatio kotimaiseen alkutuotantoon. Perustamme toimintamme ainutlaatuiseen ja kestävään arvoketjuun: luomme kasviksista hyvinvointia tarjoamalla maistuvia ja arkea helpottavia ruokaratkaisuja. Lisäksi jalostamme rypsistä laadukkaita kasviöljyjä ja rypsipuristeita rehuraaka-aineeksi sekä käymme viljakauppaa kansainvälisesti. Apetit Oyj:n osake on listattu Nasdaq Helsingissä. Konsernin liikevaihto vuonna 2021 oli 284 miljoonaa euroa. Lue lisää Apetit-konsernista: apetit.fi

Established in Finland at the end of 2006, VEEN has found multiple unique spring sources where it produces distinctive bottled water products of individual characteristics in recyclable glass packaging.  The Arctic Wilderness of Finnish Lapland is VEEN’s place of origin and the home of its first spring source where the brand discovered the smoothest water in the world.  The brand discovered its second home in 2014, the source of its natural mineral water spring in the Himalayan Kingdom of Bhutan.  Available in 16 countries across Europe, the Middle East and Asia including India and China, the brand portfolio includes its premium spring water and mineral water ranges, the spring water based Nordic Mixer range and the soon to be launched wellness range, Ayurveda Water.  
Find out more here www.veenwaters.com

Spinnova transforms the way textiles are manufactured globally. Spinnova has developed breakthrough technology for making textile fibre out of wood or waste, such as leather, textile or food waste, without harmful chemicals.

Meira Oy on suomalainen yritys, joka valmistaa kahvia ja maustamistuotteita omassa tuotantolaitoksessaan Helsingin Vallilassa sekä vähittäiskauppa- että Food Service -sektorille. Meira on osa italialaista Massimo Zanetti Beverage -konsernia, joka on Euroopan suurimpia kahvialan yrityksiä. Missiomme on "Reilusti Parempiin hetkiin", joka sisältää lupauksen jatkuvasta kehityksestä sekä vastuullisesta toimintatavastamme. 

Meira Ltd is a Finnish company that produces coffee and spicing products both to retail business and Food Service sector. Meira Ltd is owned by Massimo Zanetti Beverage Group, one of Europe’s biggest coffee producers and distributors. Our mission is "Fairly, for far better moments".

Betolar is an innovative materials technology company focusing on turning industrial side streams into a sustainable business and circular economy. We offer sustainable competitive edge to the construction industry and lead the way to build a sustainable future for the world.
The cement industry alone creates up to 7% of global greenhouse gas emissions. Replacing concrete with geopolymer concrete has the potential to cut CO2 emissions by up to 80%. This way we can accelerate the transition towards sustainable construction and a low carbon society.

Firstbeat is the leading provider of physiological analytics and services for well-being and sports. We transform heartbeat data into personalized information on exercise, stress and recovery. Over the course of two decades, we have helped over 10,000 organizations and thousands of sports teams worldwide to reach their health and performance potential with science-backed confidence. Today, Firstbeat services are offered in more than 70 countries.

#YouHaveItInYou

Jungle Juice Bar is a Finnish smoothie chain, established in 2010. Offering is specialized in delicious plant based premium smoothies, juices and healthy shots. Our drinks are made on the spot from 100% fresh and high-quality ingredients. We also have ready-made drinks for those in a hurry. We never allow any additives, nothing processed or any added sugar. We only want the best fruits and greens in our drinks! And the occasional superfood because sometimes we just can’t stop ourselves. 

With over 50 bars now operating in both Finland and Sweden our mission to spread the message of healthy lifestyle and help urban jungle warriors live by their healthy lifestyles is moving ahead fast. 

Our Tribe has now over 400 employees and for many Jungle Juice Bar is their first work experience. We want to offer for as many young people as possible a good start on their career, even if they don’t have any work experience. It is particularly important for us to provide our employees a positive, reliable and fair work environment.

Our growth is now boosted by even more muscle, as the Finnish private equity investor Vaaka Partners bought a majority share in JJB in 2017.

Start spoiling yourself with nature’s irresistible tastes!

companyName: Sako Ltd - Part of Beretta Group
description:
ATTENTION TO DETAIL IS IN OUR NATURE

Sako is the world's most prestigious rifle and cartridge brand. Our acclaimed reputation, high quality products and credibility are rooted in our employees'​ unique skills and pride in what they do.

Our history began when the company was founded in the early 1920s. Sako has come a long way from its early hand manufacture to today’s computer aided R&D and CNC manufacturing. Nevertheless, we have not forgotten the value of traditional gunsmith craftsmanship, which is why we still carry out certain critical steps ourselves.

At the turn of the millennium, Sako was honored to become a member of the Beretta Group, which gave access to new and advanced production methods enabling us to continuously refine our product development. In addition to rifles, Sako produces centerfire cartridges. We make more than 100 different loads in 35 popular calibers for different targets and hunting purposes. Making both rifles and cartridges is a matter of pride for Sako. Our mission remains to offer our customers the very best in accuracy and performance.

OUR VALUES:

INTEGRITY – we work in harmony, respecting each other. We always look at the big picture.

COMMITMENT – we honour the agreed decisions and rules of engagement and act accordingly.

OPENNESS – we maintain an open flow of information and encourage interaction.

PASSION – we have a strong desire to develop our operations, with our heart and professionalism.

OUR BRAND FILMS:

Sako
https://youtu.be/gaev59eo634

Tikka
https://youtu.be/otGJTEGQy9k

Cartridges
https://youtu.be/Xt4UsB1Aofo

Gold&Green Foods is a cross-cultural food tech company, selling and developing novel, delicious and sustainable plant protein foods. 

We combine the latest Nordic food science findings and the naturally nutritious and trendy Nordic ingredients with some specific Asian food technologies in our innovative products. 

With our smart plant protein the people who care about the wellbeing of themselves, their children and the planet can make better nutritional choices.

Honka - Wood living from Finland

The essence of Finnish happiness comes from having a close relationship with nature and its unique light. Our purpose at Honka is to bring the life force of the northern woods and sunshine into people’s lives. This is why we create healthy homes and buildings from renewable wood.

A tree that has grown in the northern woods is a work of art created by nature: it grows stronger in the extreme sub-zero conditions and stores in itself the light of the nightless summer nights. A Honka log home is a lasting legacy for future generations. Construction is the most environmentally conscious use of wood because as trees grow, they absorb carbon dioxide, which remains stored for the entire lifecycle of the building. Certified, renewable wood is a building material that is sustainable, durable and healthy – and energising.

Ever since the Saarelainen brothers founded Honka in 1958, we have studied wood and learned to appreciate its uniqueness. Each Honka log home is not just a work of art created by nature, but a masterpiece of Finnish design craftsmanship. In Karstula, central Finland, we manufacture buildings that are good for people.

The Honka yellow is the colour of hope and joy for us. Nature teaches us to see the good in life and to understand that even the smallest of deeds make a difference. We want to help our customers achieve the dreams that matter the most to them. We are honoured to bring the life force of the northern woods.

Honka® is a registered trademark of Honkarakenne Plc. It encapsulates our family business’s expertise and love of log construction spanning more than 60 years. Our log houses have been sold the most in the world – over 85,000 Honka buildings around the globe. We make sure that our patented Honka technology serves faultlessly in all climates and geographical circumstances, we are a global pioneer in modern log building.

Nature doesn’t need you. You need nature. 

Naava is a nature-inspired technology company from the Nordics. The global market leader in living green walls & biological indoor air purification with proprietary software & patented technology. We improve physical & mental health and connect you with nature. 

We have been recognized as one of Europe’s fastest-growing and hottest companies by Financial Times (2020), Inc (2018), and WIRED (2017). 

Naava creates the most compelling design furniture with living plants by combining nature, technology, and Scandinavian design. We are on a mission to re-seed the respect for nature and thus drive people and the planet towards healthier and more sustainable urban living. 

Experience the power of nature with Naava.

For more information: https://linktr.ee/Naava.io

Heltti is Finland's largest company focused on supporting the vitality of knowledge workers.

All of our organisational development consultants, mental well-being, occupational health and work ability experts are specialised in leadership of knowledge-intensive organisations and teams, the future of work and supporting the well-being of knowledge workers. Our innovative and comprehensive service range and over 120 experts, make us a thought leader and forerunner in services mentioned above.

Already over 1000 organisations and 15,000 customers, including leaders, managers, HR, supervisors and knowledge workers, do better and are more productive with the help of our services. 

Our customers are companies who want to develop the vitality of their knowledge-intensive organisation and knowledge workers. In addition, knowledge workers interested in their own well-being and vitality use Heltti's services as consumers.

We also provide further training for mental health professionals whose work is focused to support and improve the mental health, well-being and resilience of knowledge workers.

In addition to virtual health care services, Heltti has clinics in Helsinki, Espoo, Vantaa, Turku, Tampere, Jyväskylä and Oulu. Our organisational development team serve our clients globally.

At Veri, we help people improve their metabolic health by helping users understand what to eat. 

With the Veri mobile app, users scan a wearable glucose sensor to get actionable insights and recommendations on nutrition and their lifestyle habits.

Puuilo on vuonna 1982 perustettu suomalainen myymäläketju, joka tunnetaan erityisesti laajasta tuotevalikoimasta, edullisista hinnoista sekä myymälöiden hyvistä sijainneista ja helposta asiointikokemuksesta. Yhtiö on keskittynyt erityisesti tee-se-itse-, kodintarvike- ja lemmikkituotteisiin. Puuilolla oli 30.4.2021 eri puolilla Suomea yli 30 myymälää sekä verkkokauppa, joka on tärkeä osa Puuilon monikanavaisuutta.

Puuilo on noussut yhdeksi Suomen halpakauppamarkkinan johtavista toimijoista menestyvän myymäläkonseptinsa johdosta ja yhtiö on liikevaihdolla mitattuna yksi Suomen suurimmista käyttötavaroihin keskittyvistä myymäläketjuista

Puuilon verkkokauppa löytyy osoitteesta www.puuilo.fi

Seuraa meitä myös Facebookissa, Twitterissä ja Instagramissa @puuilo

Asiakaspalvelumme palvelee osoitteessa asiakaspalvelu@puuilo.fi

”We are here to make life of pets and pet owners easier, safer and more fun.”

Musti ja Mirri Group is the largest pet specialty retailer in the Nordics. For us, more important than our size, is our vision to make life of pets and pet owners easier, safer and more fun. We have over 200 stores, of which are located in Finland and in Sweden.  We are proud of our customer service and blessed with excellent employee satisfaction. The combined sales of Musti ja Mirri Group is more than EUR 200 million in different channels, including retail outlets and web shops in Finland and Sweden.

Auntie's mission is to turn crises into growth. Both on personal and company level!

We provide easy-access digital help for companies: whether it is a matter of a Lonely Leader, Overachiever or the continuous changes in work environment.  

Our approach is unique, measurable and efficient, and we are continuously developing our services to match the needs of our customers. 

If your company  is ready for new ideas, drop us a line, info@auntie.fi,  and we'll tell you how we have been able to reduce stress and increase happiness  in our customer companies. And prove that with actual figures!

Halti is an outdoor company from the Finnish Lapland. The headquarters is located in Söderkulla, Finland. Company has a great history as a leading outdoor and equipment supplier since the mid 70's. Today Halti is a fast growing international company.

Halti designs and markets outdoor clothing collections including accessories, footwear and selected outdoor equipments for all seasons. The key product areas are winter sports (Alpine skiing, cross-country skiing) and Outdoor Sports. The products are sold under “Halti” and “Raiski” brands through own webshop, own retail stores, sporting goods retailers, department stores and hypermarkets. Currently, there are more than 1 400 points of sales in over 15 countries. The key market areas are Finland and Central European alpine countries. 

Halti is the most popular and well-known outdoor and sports brand in Finland that is targeted towards outdoor enthusiasts. Raiski brand is more well known in the Finnish market. It offers value-for-money products for women.

Since 2005, Halti has created a strong basis for accelerating export sales through significant investments in international sponsoring and marketing. The brand has received a wealth of international visibility and credibility e.g. due to being the chosen clothing partner for the most highly regarded winter sports events. Today Halti IS the Official Clothing Supplier of the International Ski Federation (FIS) and the Finnish national teams in Cross Country Skiing, Ski Jumping and Nordic Combined.

Papu kids and women's wear - for lasting happiness! 

Papu clothes come from the happiest country in the world. So, they are created by people who know something about happiness. We believe that the best kind of happiness is the kind that lasts. That is why you can trust us to make clothes to last. Always and only with sustainably produced materials and designs to keep you happy _x000B_for a long time. Any time.
_x000B_
Papu
For lasting happiness

The idea for Kyrö, a Finnish all-rye distillery was dreamed up in a sauna, fueled by a sip of rye whisky.

Founded by five friends, Kyrö Distillery Company has been in commercial production since April 2014. We currently export to around 30 countries.

Kyrö Napue gin was selected as the best gin for G&T in 2015. Kyrö Malt rye whisky was awarded a gold medal at IWSC in 2020.

Our distillery is located in an old dairy in Isokyrö. We have sales offices in Helsinki, Berlin and soon in London.

Extraordinary sleep takes extraordinary people.

At Hästens, we strive for a world where people sleep well – one that’s more joyful, peaceful and loving. Every day since 1852, we continue to hone our world-class craft in our factory in Köping, Sweden.

Sleep may be today’s ultimate modern luxury. But it’s more than that; it’s a biological necessity and the foundation of our entire wellbeing. We want people to sleep well so that they can create the future they dream of upon waking. That’s why our master craftsmen consider and handcraft every detail of our bespoke designs using only the finest natural materials.

We are proud to be a world-class international brand, operating in more than 40 countries with over 300 partners in Europe, Asia, America and Africa – and still growing. 

Now, as we enter the next exciting part of our journey, we’re looking for extraordinary people to join our tribe of creative thinkers; those visionaries who embody the Spirit of Hästens, have an open mind, global outlook, and a desire to master their craft.

Together, let’s awaken the world.

Afound offers great discounts on everything, always. The online marketplace (afound.com) offer the customer discounts on products from all H&M Group brands together with a wide mix of external fashion, sports, interior and beauty brands. Afound was launched in Sweden online in June 2018. Since then, Afound has launched online in the Netherlands, Germany and Austria.

Naturkompaniet är en kedja av outdoorbutiker i Sverige som säljer utomhus- och reseutrustning från ledande internationella varumärken. Naturkompaniets äldsta dotterbolag, AB Scoutvaror, grundades 1931 av den svenska scoutrörelsen. 1951 ändrades namnet från AB Scoutvaror till Friluftsmagasinet Scoutvaror AB och 1991 blev namnet slutligen Naturkompaniet.

Vi har våra egna butiker, en franchisebutik samt e-handel. Naturkompaniet ägs av Fenix Outdoor AB noterat på Nasdaq OMX Nordic Mid Cap. Naturkompaniet har tre systerföretag Globetrotter i Tyskland, Partioaitt i Finland och Friluftsland i Danmark, som är de ledande detaljhandelskedjorna inom försäljning av produkter för utomhusaktiviteter och resor i sina respektive länder. Naturkompaniet har sedan starten erbjudit sina kunder kvalitetsutrustning för skog, berg och vildmark

English: 
Naturkompaniet AB is a chain of outdoor retail shops spread evenly over Sweden, selling outdoor and travel equipment from leading, international brands. Naturkompaniet’s oldest subsidiary, AB Scoutvaror, was founded in 1931 by the Swedish Scout Movement. In 1951, the name was changed from AB Scoutvaror to Friluftsmagasinet Scoutvaror AB and, in 1991, the name finally became Naturkompaniet. 

The Company has its branches, franchise stores as well as e-shopping. Naturkompaniet is owned by Fenix Outdoor AB listed on Nasdaq OMX Nordic Mid Cap. Naturkompaniet has two sister companies Globetrotter GmbH and Partioaitta Oy, which are the leading retail chain in sales of products for outdoor activities and travel in Germany and Finland. Naturkompaniet has since its establishment, provided its customers with quality equipment for forest, mountains and wilderness activities.

Blueair was founded on the firm belief that the freedom to breathe clean, healthy air is a basic right. Over two decades ago, our Swedish founder set out to make the world’s best air purifier. By bringing together a team of talented designers and filtration experts who shared his passion for sustainability, quality and design, the Blueair air purifier was born. Today our award-winning air purifiers which combine superior performance and low noise with timeless Scandinavian design, improve the lives of people in over 60 countries around the world – and we continue to fight for people’s freedom to breathe. We are headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden, and part of the Unilever family of brands.

Lagerhaus is an interior design brand that provides practical and affordable items with unique design that easily updates your home. 

The first store opened in Gothenburg in 1996 and today we run around 40 brand  stores in Sweden and Norway.
Our e-commerce ships to Sweden, Norway, Finland and Denmark. 
The head office is located in the city center of Gothenburg.

---

Lagerhaus AB - we create happy places!

Lagerhaus vill hjälpa sina kunder att skapa personliga, trivsamma hem och inspirera till glädje i vardagen. Största delen av sortimentet består av härlig egen design, som skapas av Lagerhaus kreativa designteam i Göteborg. När vi skapar din favoritinredning har vi alltid funktion, människa och miljö i fokus.

Första butiken slog upp portarna 1996 i Göteborg. Idag finns ett fyrtiotal butiker från norr till söder i Sverige, flera butiker i Norge samt en skandinavisk e-handel.

Lagerhaus är inredningsvarumärket med glimten i ögat och hjärtat på rätt ställe. Vi erbjuder ett brett utbud av prisvärda och smarta produkter för hemmet och festen. Inredningsdetaljer, förvaringsprodukter, glas, porslin, presentpåsar, inslagningsprodukter, festartiklar och mycket, mycket mer - allt som behövs för att skapa ett happy place!

Kanske är du en del av Lagerhaus fortsatta utveckling?

RevolutionRace was founded in 2013 by Pernilla and Niclas Nyrensten, in Pernillas fathers garage. Today, with over 2 million pants sold and established in over 30 countries (and counting), we’re continuing to revolutionize the outdoor industry by providing our customers with high quality outdoor gear without any middlemen. Centrally located in our HQ in Borås, Sweden. 

Join us on our journey to become the worlds most recommended outdoor brand!

teenage engineering creates high quality, well designed, electronic products for all people who love sound and music.

teenage engineering’s first product was the OP-1, a portable all-in-one synthesizer used by world famous artists. 

OD-11, the all-in-one wireless stereo loudspeaker made to play cloud music was exclusively released at MoMA NYC summer 2014.

in january 2015 teenage engineering released a new line of musical instruments called pocket operators that now consists of a series of seven pocket sized synthesizers.

our hq is located in stockholm, sweden. here a multidisciplinary team of software / electrical / mechanical engineers and industrial designers are developing our products from start to finish. the studio is fully equipped workshop with state of the art rapid prototyping machines.

Tiger of Sweden is a Stockholm-based fashion house established in 1903 with a heritage in tailoring. For more than a century Tiger of Sweden has stood for style with purpose, dressing men and women for whom true style is about the confidence to be themselves.

The brand founders Marcus Schwarzman and Hjalmar Nordström built the company on the Scandinavian principles of equality and fairness. Tiger of Sweden was first to bring ready-to-wear tailoring to Sweden, making suits accessible not solely for the rich few, but for the working many. Tailoring has defined the brand ever since, with an emphasis on cut, shape and fabric.

The company is defined by a belief in change – a faith that people can change anything, which means everything. Continuing that tradition into the 21st century, Tiger of Sweden sees its role as a curator of culture, believing in creativity as force.

Tiger of Sweden´s collections encompass men’s and women’s tailoring, ready-to-wear and accessories. Headquartered in Stockholm, and owned by IC Group, Tiger of Sweden’s collections are sold globally, both online and at over 1,200 retail stores.

Craft is a Swedish brand specializing in clothing for endurance sports where performance and comfort are crucial for a good result. Working closely with elite athletes and constantly developing new materials and technical solutions, Craft offers cutting-edge training and competition apparel.

Coming soon: www.craftsportswear.com

Founded in Stockholm 1996, J.Lindeberg inspires unconventional thinkers to live life to the fullest. The international fashion house bridges fashion and sport, offering sophisticated, edgy and comfortable products for a modern active lifestyle. The collections bring together creativity and Scandinavian progressiveness – for innovative fashion and outdoor lifestyle wear that is sustainable and delivered through a customer-focused, seamless experience.

With headquarters in Stockholm, Sweden, the distribution covers more than 35 countries. There are 157 J.Lindeberg stores in several of the major fashion capitals of the world, such as Copenhagen, New York, Tokyo, Hong Kong and Shanghai. The wholesale distribution features close to 2000 stores, including the leading high-end department and specialty stores around the world.

Work at J.Lindeberg
J.Lindeberg is a global lifestyle brand with a vision of being the world’s most desirable and successful function and fashion brand of Scandinavian origin. With a unique fashion style that’s effortlessly sophisticated, yet supremely comfortable, we combine creativity and Scandinavian progressiveness to design function and fashion that is sustainably sourced – and delivered to our customers through a customer-focused, seamless experience.

Working at J.Lindeberg gives you the opportunity to learn and grown with some of the most talented, fun and passionate people in the industry. If you like things to move fast, have an entrepreneurial spirit and never settle, you’ll fit right in. Innovation is close to our hearts and we continuously take action to minimize our impact on the world we live in.

We work within different areas, but always as a team. We encourage communication and believe in building team spirit by working towards common goals.

We'd love to hear from you, so please feel free to drop us a line. 

https://careers.jlindeberg.com/

https://www.jlindeberg.com/

https://www.jlindebergusa.com/

Axel Arigato is a contemporary fashion brand injected with counter-cultural references. From the beginning, Axel Arigato has always been about showcasing the imagery the brand was started with and channeling it through a visual language. References include music, art and architecture, which illustrate the kind of world Axel Arigato wants to project.

Before launching Axel Arigato, the founders saw a gap in the market for an affordable footwear brand with a couture quality. By forgoing traditional channels and engaging with customers directly, Axel Arigato has made their mark in the industry as the high-end footwear brand with an affordable price tag.

Axel Arigato aims to individualize each piece by launching a new style every week. The collections include men’s and women’s footwear, clothing and accessories. Axel Arigato goods are produced in Portugal with high standards in quality in the use of materials and fabrics.

Axel Arigato is operated from the head office in Gothenburg and a subsidiary office located in London, UK. It’s an inspiring, fast-paced and energetic workplace that encourages new ideas and creativity.

Livsmedelsjobb.se samlar lediga jobb inom livsmedel. Följ oss här på LinkedIn så får du automatiskt tips om nya jobbmöjligheter.

Vi arbetar löpande för att göra det lättare för arbetsgivare och kandidater att hitta varandra samt att långsiktigt arbeta för att stärka sektorns attraktionskraft.

Livsmedelsjobb.se vänder sig till alla typer av arbetsgivare. Vare sig ni är ett stort eller litet företag, en kommun eller myndighet, kommer ni som annonsör att nå ut till just den målgrupp som ni söker inom livsmedel.

Kontakt
kontakt@livsmedelsjobb.se
