Haglöfs comes from Sweden, a country of extreme weather and extensive landscape. Where rolling lowlands and running rivers give way to thick forests and snow-capped mountains. A place where the outdoors isn’t just a far-off place, it’s in the fabric of the brands culture and community. Haglöfs explore with curiosity and a commitment to creating gear that will support anyone, anywhere on their outdoor adventure - from walking through the forest to reaching the peak of a mountain. 
An attitude of innovation is at the core of Haglöfs’ history. The brand was founded in 1914 by Wiktor Haglöf, a visionary with a dream and a toolbox. A carpenter by trade, Wiktor was determined to create a backpack that would withstand the necessary journeys through the country, no matter the conditions. From humble beginnings, Haglöfs’ story evolved, and so did the offerings. Seeking constant progress, Haglöfs have ventured into new territory, creating technical designs that set a new standard in craftsmanship and committing to do what can be done to ensure that the outdoors will still be there for future generations to explore. The brand pioneered a new standard for perfection, but, like Wiktor, never stops innovating.

Maria Nila is not the usual hair care company. Our 100% vegan and cruelty free-certified products are developed with love for our animal lovers, our nature and your hair. Animals fill our lives with joy and laughter, and should therefore never be part of a beauty product. 

By providing high quality vegan products, we make it easy for you to take a step towards a sustainable and friendlier world. When choosing Maria Nila, you choose animal-friendly and colour-preserving haircare products manufactured locally in Sweden. Our chemists always develop Maria Nila's products with the highest quality ingredients. The content should be nice to hair, animals and nature.

Maria Nila ABs core business is based within distribution, education and private label. 

www.marianila.com

At Eleiko, we work to make people stronger so they can perform better - in sports and in life. Our story is filled with bold ideas and ambitious goals. Rooted in a passion for strength we took a leap from making waffle irons to manufacturing the world’s finest barbells and discs, helping to shape the world of weightlifting along the way. We build on this legacy bringing 60 years of expertise and a well-earned reputation for quality and craftsmanship to our full range of strength training and weightlifting products. With quality, innovation, and customer service as guiding principles, Eleiko is the leading equipment provider and educator in strength.

Totême is a style universe with a singular aesthetic. Based in Stockholm, the label explores the appeal of a modern uniform through distinct design cues, meticulous craftsmanship, and methodic repetition. Inspired by women’s lives and needs, the ambition is to define a dress code and wardrobe that backs their purpose.

With a clear point of view and design DNA, the edit revolves around focused options and signature styles. It’s iconic pieces with a strong identity, styled and proposed for different occasions. The look is precise and considered, defined by distinct silhouettes, perfected cuts and elevated fabrics. Pieces are subtly refined and tweaked over time for a well-curated wardrobe that transcends trends.

Totême was founded by Elin Kling and Karl Lindman in 2014.

HAKI was founded in 1956 in Sweden and already from the start an innovation leader. HAKI offer solutions for safe working conditions in complex and challenging environments, e.g. industry, energy, infrastructure and construction. We have been manufacturing and developing advanced scaffolding systems for 60 years. HAKI modular scaffolding systems and tailored temporary access solutions are trusted by clients and contractors worldwide. They achieve ultimate efficiency and safety when assembling and working at height during temporary works, in a variety of challenging industry sectors.

At HAKI, sustainability is an integrated part of our business. We are focusing our efforts in the areas where we are operating and where we believe we can have an impact. We strive to provide safe and healthy working conditions, play a role in environmental progress and be a role model for high ethics and equality, within our industry.

Estrid is a Scandinavian razor and body care brand offering fairly priced, high-quality products that are 100% vegan. 

We believe that hair removal should be optional, but that great hair removal shouldn’t.

Whether you’re sailing a boat, pitching a tent or starting a revolution, you will have better luck if you bring some friends. Together with an odd band of scientists, artists, designers and adventurers, we are pushing the boundaries of how outdoor clothing is made. Together with our customers, we are recycling, renting, repairing and reusing our way to a new, sustainable outdoor industry. Let’s climb a mountain. Run a mile. Eat a cake. Start a band. Save the world. Call your best friend, your mom and all your cousins. The more the merrier!

Nudie Jeans Co doesn’t just offer jeans. With a wear and tear-way of thinking, reuse and repair program Nudie Jeans Co provides and maintains a tradition true to the fabric’s tradition and characteristics.

Founded in Gothenburg in 2001, the Swedish denim company has been recognized for their work with sustainability, both environmental and social. With a denim selection made from 100% organic cotton and transparent production, Nudie Jeans Co is in the fore edge and has taken a prominent role in the industry’s work for a more sustainable existence.

Casall was founded by Carl-Axel Surtevall in 1980 and has grown to become the largest player in the Scandinavian training industry. Casall quickly positioned itself as an up and coming fitness brand in Northern Europe. When the first clothing line was born in a gym in 1984, it was a sign of things to come: a holistic training brand that was to be both visionary and innovative.

CASALL PRO is an exclusive total supplier of gym equipment and heavier training tools as well as the official distributor of the world-leading fitness brand Matrix Fitness in Sweden and Norway. Our high performance line of equipment can be found in gyms all over Scandinavia and is known for its quality, forward thinking, and timeless design. 

CASALL SPORT stands behind our fashionable performance apparel line known for its uncompromising standards for design, functionality and quality that you can wear seamlessly for exercise and life. Not to forget our high quality and innovative equipment line known for its clean Scandinavian design that inspires you to have energizing and effective workouts at home, at work or anywhere.

The key to our success is that we have always been at the forefront of technology and dare to explore new horizons, regardless of whether that is new products, training methods or taking environmental responsibility. 

Pioneering, Innovating, Forward-thinking; Casall is the holistic training brand of today, designed for a better tomorrow.

CASALL.COM / CASALLPRO.COM

Björn Borg is a Swedish fashion brand since 1984. We make underwear and sportswear designed to make you look and feel active and attractive.

We think that being active and making a difference is far more attractive than playing it safe. It is this attitude that is the core of the Björn Borg brand. That is how we create our fashion and that is how we inspire the people who wear it.

At IDEAL OF SWEDEN we strive to deliver the highest quality in everything we do. Inspired by the latest fashion trends, we design and develop products such as phone cases, phone wallets, charging cables, power banks, Qi chargers, and other accessories in Sweden.

Today, we have 16 local online shops and wholesale activities in 50 countries. In addition to high-quality products,iDeal Of Sweden is known for its massive growth, well established influencer collaborations and collections, and inspiring work culture and atmosphere.

For more info on iDeal Of Sweden, visit our Website, Faceboook and Instagram.

The story of SWATI starts with two people falling in love. Vishal Nanda meets Swati Verma. Boom. Like all great love stories, it transcends borders. Vishal is an experienced Swedish entrepreneur, Swati a well-known Indian makeup artist. He’s struck by her appearance and how it changes with every mood and occasion. A natural beauty one day. Dressed to impress the next. Yet she always looks like herself. Confident. Stylish. Remarkably enough, even her eyes seem to change. From bright to dark and back again. He asks. “Cosmetic lenses,” she replies smiling. The rest is, as they say, history.

Svenskt Tenn is an interior design company located on Strandvägen in Stockholm, Sweden. It was founded in 1924 by Estrid Ericson, who recruited the Austrian architect and designer Josef Frank to the company 10 years later. 

A long and successful collaboration began between Josef Frank and Estrid Ericson who together created a style influenced by both Viennese elegance and Swedish functionalism. With its colorfulness and patterns and inspiration from all kinds of cultures and eras, the style was in sharp contrast to the ideal flourishing in the 1930s. Together, the two lay the foundations for the interior design philosophy that Svenskt Tenn has since come to represent.

Svenskt Tenn is owned by the Kjell and Märta Beijer Foundation. Profits generated by the company are through the foundation used to promote scientific and medical research in Sweden as well as Swedish home decoration traditions.

Mini Rodini was founded in 2006 by artist Cassandra Rhodin and is today one of Sweden's fastest growing brands for sustainable children's clothing. Since the start, we have been guided by a strong environmental commitment and want to offer the customer the best available on the market, without compromising on either sustainability, quality, design or working conditions in the production countries.

With one own store in Sweden, one store in London, our own webshop, 350 global retailers and 330,000 followers on Instagram, we have built a strong brand with a loyal customer base worldwide.

As one of Scandinavia’s leading suppliers of furnishings for public spaces, specialising in offices, hotels, restaurants and shops, our main goal has always been to strengthen our clients’ brands.

As part of the Edsbyn Senab Group, we represent all the major furniture, design and interior decorating brands in the industry. We also carry out our own production and product design. In addition to our local offices in Sweden and Norway, we are now represented in Asia and North America as well. We know that what happens inside four walls and a ceiling has a fundamental effect on people. There are possibilities that extend far beyond ergonomics, wellbeing and aesthetics. Our goal is to create spaces where the mind can be free.

We have developed the only digital method of birth control cleared by regulators both in the US and in Europe. Effective, natural, and backed by clinical research - Natural Cycles has been cleared by the US FDA and CE marked in Europe. Today we have a growing user base, who are happy to have found a method of birth control that is right for them and that allows them to get to know their bodies and cycles. No matter what your choice is, we believe that every woman should know that understanding how your cycle works matters. 

Natural Cycles was created when our founders, Elina and Raoul, were in search of an effective method of natural birth control. Their journey took them from physics straight into health tech for women. The couple were unsatisfied with what they found, so they decided to apply their experience and knowledge in advanced mathematics and data analysis to develop a solution to meet their needs. This turned out to be an algorithm that detects and predicts ovulation and fertility.

In the early days, they used the algorithm for their own purposes but quickly realized that there was a vast unmet need for this type of method. They decided to develop a mobile app so women from all over the world could easily access and use Natural Cycles.

Our company has been up and running since 2013 and has been rapidly growing since our CE certification in February 2017. At Natural Cycles we are always looking for passionate talents to help us strive for change in such a complex, scientific, and controversial field. We have women's best interest at heart and work hard every single day to ensure that we provide the best possible solution. That’s why each and every team member is passionate about what we do.

Gathered from all corners of the world we are a tight-knit international team located right in the center of beautiful Stockholm. If you would like to join us, check our open job positions below, go ahead and connect with us.

Rodebjer makes fashion with wit, heart and conscience. A well-considered uniform, respectful of women’s day-to-day existence and of the planet that she inhabits. Designs to be worn today, tomorrow and far into the future.

Tefal OBH Nordica Group have national companies in Sweden, Denmark, Norway and Finland. The Nordic turnover is approximately SEK 800 million a year and we have around 150 employees across the Nordics. About a third of us are working at our head office in Sundbyberg outside Stockholm. OBH Nordica is part of Groupe SEB International, global leader in the manufacturing of small domestic appliances and cookware. Groupe SEB Nordic develops, distributes, and sells innovative and exciting products under the brand names OBH Nordica, Tefal, Emsa, WMF, Krups, Lagostina and Nespresso.  

We would like to inform you about our Data Protection policy when you apply for a job https://www.obhnordica.se/gdpr
With a passion for user experience, we develop smart connected lighting solutions. We are based in Sweden and pride ourselves on developing everything in-house.

ASKET is an independent apparel brand founded in 2015 with the mission to slow down the fashion industry and change the way we manufacture, market, and consume clothing.

Based on honest production, transparent pricing and revolutionary sizing, we're perfecting a single, permanent collection of timeless essentials and restoring the meaningfulness of the garments we actually use the most.

House of Dagmar is a Swedish fashion brand founded in 2005 by three sisters, Karin Söderlind, Kristina Tjäder and Sofia Wallenstam who decided to pick up the legacy after their late grandmother: Dagmar. She was a tailor  with an extraordinary sense of craftsmanship, confidence and style. Not only does her name carry the brand today, her sense of quality and ambition to create timeless fashion is still very much alive. House of Dagmar creates sustainable and expressive fashion with knitwear at the core of each collection. Much of the inspiration behind the garments comes from architecture and contemporary art.

RNB Retail and Brands owns, operates and develops stores and e-commerce in fashion, clothing and accessories. The focus is on providing a service and shopping experience beyond the ordinary. Sales are conducted through the Brothers concept. Brothers is a nationwide men’s fashion chain with 44 stores including an e-commerce. Brothers is the obvious destination for updated, relaxed and well-dressed fashion in affordable quality with a superb fit for all men in all situations. RNB RETAIL AND BRANDS is listed on Nasdaq Stockholm (RNBS).

Polarn O. Pyret is a Swedish brand for baby and childrenswear that started in 1976 with the goal of making clothes that let kids be kids. After 45 years they can proudly call themselves a leading brand for high-quality kids wear in the Nordics, and their products are sold in several markets around the world. They produce clothes that are made to last and to be worn, loved, and washed repeatedly and to be handed down to the next child, they call this design that lasts. Please visit www.polarnopyret.com for more information about the company.

Bubbleroom started 2005 and is today one of the biggest and fastest growing online fashion retailers in the Nordics. 

The assortment encompasses 15-20 000 products including several unique brands. We are specialist within party outfits, dresses, occasion wear, accessories and casual clothing.

Bubbleroom's headquarter is located in Borås, Sweden and also the distribution center, from which thousands of parcels are shipped every day, is located in Borås.

Caparol är en internationell färgexpert som utvecklar 
och marknadsför ett komplett sortiment av unika puts- och måleri-
produkter av högsta kvalitet. Våra kunniga, engagerade och motiverade 
medarbetare hjälper och vägleder också varje kund när de planerar sitt projekt.

Caparolgruppen är Europas största privatägda färgföretag med verksamhet i över 30 länder. Hos oss finns långt över 100 års samlad erfarenhet kring kvalitetskrav från alla typer av marknader, temperaturer och väderförhållanden. I Sverige ligger huvudkontor, lager och produktion i Göteborg. Med rikstäckande distribution och komplett sortiment är vi idag den självklara partnern till både proffs och privatpersoner när det kommer till måleri.

Pricer is a leading global technology company serving the rapidly growing smart retail market with in-store digital solutions that enhance both store performance and the shopping experience. Through electronic shelf labels, advanced technology, such as optical wireless communication and AI, and continuous innovation, Pricer offers the foundation for in-store communication and efficiency. The industry-leading Pricer platform delivers benefits from 30 years of deployment experience and is fast, robust, interconnectable and scalable. Pricer was founded in Sweden in 1991 and is listed on Nasdaq Stockholm. For further information, please visit www.pricer.com.

HAKI modular scaffolding systems and tailored temporary access solutions are trusted by clients and contractors worldwide. They achieve ultimate efficiency and safety when assembling and working at height during temporary works, in a variety of challenging industry sectors.

Complementing an innovative product range, HAKI’s design engineering, training and technical onsite support services ensure effective operations throughout the project life-cycle. From establishing winning solutions and designing right first time, to encouraging safer working practices, HAKI is an all-round trusted partner.

Scandinavian Cosmetics is one of the leading companies in sales, marketing and distribution of well-known beauty brands in the Swedish market. 

Scandinavian Cosmetics is part of Scandinavian Cosmetics Group that provides exclusive distribution and brand management for Cosmetics, Fine Fragrances, Hair Care and Skin Care Products. With companies in Denmark, Norway, Sweden and Finland we offer an unparalleled route to the Nordic Beauty Consumer.

OUR STORY

aim’n is the creative expression of our childhood dreams and values. It’s a devotion to positivity and a celebration of femininity; it’s our ambition to empower women worldwide to believe in themselves and their potential.

Throughout our lives we’ve experienced the power of dreams, and aim’n is our way of passing that knowledge forward. Behind every creation lies our ambition to give you everything you need and deserve to make your dreams come true! That’s our vision - that’s aim’n.

With love, Tekla and Helen
Founders aim'n

NJIE startades 2008 av Assan Njie, VD och tidigare topp 10-rankad MMA-fighter i Europa.

Första produkten på marknaden var Aloe Vera-Drycken, men den stora succén stod ProPud för som lanserades 2015 och var den första proteinpuddingen på den svenska marknaden. Idag erbjuder NJIE innovativa koncept med fokus på hälsa så som proteinberikade mellanmål, funktionella drycker och snacks. 

NJIE ́s huvudkontor ligger i Krokslätt fabriker utanför Göteborg. Vi är ett team med ca 50 medarbetare inom försäljning, marknadsföring, innovation, strategi, design, finans, logistik och kundservice. Och vi älskar att hålla oss i form - tillsammans!

Våra nyckelmarknader är Sverige, Norge, Island och Finland. Vårt mål är att etablera oss på flera marknader i Europa under de närmaste åren.

Vi är det innovationsdrivna företaget inom functional foods som lever nära marknaden för att tidigt upptäcka trender, lyssna på kunden och sprida energi.

Vi vill hjälpa till att fylla på med rätt ”bränsle” i en tid när balansen mellan kropp och själ är utgångspunkten för ett hälsosammare liv. NJIE - Fuel your life.

Creating the world's most ambitious cheese.

Join us on our journey to reimagined, reinvented and real delicious foods.

Livsmedelsföretagen är en arbetsgivar- och branschorganisation som verkar för att livsmedelsföretagen i Sverige ska karaktäriseras av högt anseende och mångfald samt ha god tillväxt, lönsamhet och konkurrensförmåga.

Livsmedelsföretagen har cirka 800 medlemsföretag utspridda i hela Sverige. Vi representerar alla typer av livsmedelsföretag – små och stora, med svenska och utländska ägare, familjeägda, jordbrukskooperativa med flera.

Livsmedelsföretagen tillvaratar och främjar företagens gemensamma intressen då det gäller arbetsgivarfrågor och branschspecifika frågor.

I Livsmedelsföretagens medlemsföretag arbetar totalt närmare 50 000 personer. Livsmedelsföretagen utgör Sveriges tredje största industrigren sett till omsättningen, och varje år exporterar medlemsföretagen livsmedel till ett värde av 50 miljarder kr.

Björn Jakobson founded BabyBjörn AB in 1961 in the Swedish town of Bergshamra. Today, BabyBjörn products are sold in fifty countries, worldwide, but we are still based in Sweden and a family-owned company.

Our goal, ever since the company started, was to make everyday life easier for families with small children by developing premium quality, safe and functional products for children up to the age of three. We never compromise on the safety, quality and design of our products.

We are also firmly convinced that you shouldn’t have to buy loads of products for your children – just a few that really work.

Our policy of never launching a product that does not live up to our strict quality and safety requirements, means that over the years, parents have developed considerable confidence in us and our products. This is something that has only been possible due to the consistent level of deep commitment to their work shown by every single person who works for and is involved in the company.

Strongers vision är att motivera och inspirera till en hälsosammare livsstil genom att omdefiniera klassiskt träningsmode med starkare uttrycksfullhet. 

Vi har med en banbrytande kombination av mode, träning och motivation gjort oss till ett snabbt växande företag och en pionjär inom träningsmode. Vi inriktar oss på träningskläder för tjejer inom flertalet olika kategorier inom träning, sport och fitness.

Matsmart is an online food retailer, on a mission to reduce food waste. By providing an alternative route to market for surplus food, we aim to revolutionise and challenge the perception and consumption of food. In addition, our discounted prices enable our customers to save money, while doing something good for the environment. Conscious consumption - easy, affordable and fun!

***Background***
The problem with food waste is huge, and a third of all food produced in the world is thrown away.

Matsmart was founded by a team of three passionate entrepreneurs in 2013, who had come up with a simple solution to this problem.

Today we are one of the fastest growing companies in the Nordics, present in three markets and with 200 MSEK in run rate revenue. Backed by well-known investors we have very ambitious and exciting growth plans ahead. Our superstar team consists of 25 people in the Stockholm HQ office and 60 people in the warehouse in Katrineholm. Join us and become a part of the food waste revolution!
Ethically produced, non-seasonal clothing brand

A LOVE OF NATURE WITH AN URBAN PURPOSE 

If you’ve been around long enough, your story tends to be rich in both experiences and achievements. This is certainly true for Tretorn, which was founded 1891. Although Tretorn can be found in stores all over the world, from Paris and New York to Tokyo and Berlin, Tretorn remains inherently Swedish. Drawing inspiration from the Nordic way of living, we fuse a love of nature with urban purpose. Our heritage and rich expertise in rubber-based products have given us the intrepidity to develop collections that rise to any rough weather occasion. 

Our first products were driven by functional needs: high-quality rubber galoshes primarily used by villagers, fishermen and the military. Then came the iconic tennis shoe. As sportswear became the height of fashion in the 1960s,it was clear that Tretorn could design shoes that were as popular on the pages of fashion magazines as they were on the tennis court. And we’ve done whatever it takes, from pushing the boundaries of the technology to making rubber boots by hand to ensure that no shower gets in the way of the everyday life outside. The brand unites function with design and style, offering collections that embody an updated and modern timelessness. Decade after decade, we’ve stood strong – whatever the weather – and developed products that are made for enjoying the outside.

CELEBRATES THE EVERYDAY LIFE OUTSIDE, IN CITIES, IN NATURE. ALWAYS WITH STYLE.

Eytys is a rapidly growing company founded in Stockholm 2013. At the heart of the brand lies a vision of shared, multidisciplinary creativity, building a platform to connect, interact and highlight talented creative minds from all over the world. 

The products are build on a philosophy of no-fuss, straightforward and functional design. All collections are unisex. The brand is currently sold at 200+ top-tier retailers around the world in more than 20 countries, www.eytys.com, and stand-alone stores at Norrlandsgatan 22 in Stockholm and 75 Brewer Street in SOHO, London.

Eytys is operated from the head office in central Stockholm. It is a vivid and democratic workplace, driven by innovation and creativity with big potential for personal growth.

Elektron. A Swedish company with a solid history of musical innovation since 1998. The Gothenburg, Los Angeles, and Berlin locations each represent a unique angle from which we interact with the global music community. Our mission: To save the world through extraordinary sound. All instruments are designed in Sweden and rigorously and individually tested before being unleashed worldwide.

We are a motley crew of musical explorers who focus all our efforts on things that will make life better for music lovers everywhere. We make the instruments we personally dream of playing. We follow our own path. Simple as that.

Our award winning instruments attract both experimental underground acts and high profile artists, producers, DJs and musicians all over the world.

EFG is one of Europe's largest manufacturers of quality office furniture. We hold a leading position in Scandinavia and are strengthening our position in Europe. Our vision is, with the most inspiring, functional and sustainable solutions, to be the Northern Europes leading supplier of furniture within office and public environments. We will get there through sustainable resources, effective processes and true sincere relations.

På Scandinavian Photo erbjuder vi Nordens främsta sortiment inom Foto och Video med en omsättning på ca 750 Mkr. Vi är 140 medarbetare som sätter högt värde i kunskap och passion för bilden och drivs av viljan att uppmuntra alla att ta bra bilder oavsett om man är ny på området, djupt fotointresserad eller fotograf till yrket. 
 
Kameror, tillbehör, utbildning och bra råd är alla viktiga ingredienser i vårt produktutbud och våra kunder möter vi via den kanal som kunden föredrar; på nätet, telefon, eller i våra butiker i Stockholm, Oslo, Göteborg, Malmö och Bankeryd.
 
Du som läser detta kanske är någon av dem som är med på vår fortsatta intressanta resa. 
 
Välkommen till Scandinavian Photo, Nordens ledande inom foto och video.

Green Furniture Concept makes sustainable design for public interiors. Flexibly winding, seamless benches and soft acoustic lamps from Green Furniture can be found in places like Stockholm Central Station, Montreal Airport and Topanga Mall (LA).

‘Seamless’ means room for more people when needed. Benches from Green Furniture seat 30-50% more people than conventional public seating on a given surface.

‘Flexibly Winding’ means benches that can take any creative formation, follow the building and lead the flow of people.

‘Sustainable’ means a story of Lowtox, natural and cycled materials  – visible and functional CSR.

We’re the co-host that cares for your home, guests and community.

The Minut sensor monitors noise, occupancy, motion and temperature in rental properties, helping hosts prevent parties, enhance guest experience and protect their homes, without sacrificing guest privacy. With powerful automations and integrations, Minut empowers property managers to grow their businesses while keeping operations lean. Find out more about how Minut can help you host happy at https://bit.ly/3uoTkjp.

Weleda har funnits i Sverige sedan 1958 och är ett helägt dotterbolag till Weleda AG i Schweiz. Weleda har sedan starten 1921 tillverkat både antroposofiska mediciner och hudvårdsprodukter som framställs på beprövade läkeväxter, mineraler, naturliga växtoljor och äkta eteriska oljor. Helhetssynen på människan och samspelet med naturen är en central utgångspunkt. Weleda har därför en noggrann kontroll över både råvarorna och produktionsprocessen.

Det unika med Weledas produkter är den över 80 år långa kunskap och erfarenhet om de terapeutiska och verksamma ämnen som finns i vår natur. Denna kunskap och tradition, tillsammans med modern produktutveckling används för att ta fram de naturliga kompositionerna i våra hudvårdsprodukter. För att få bästa resultat, väljs alla växter och ingredienser med största omsorg. Slutprodukten kontrolleras alltid noggrant och dermatologiska och kliniska tester utförs kontinuerligt.

Alla produkter från Weleda produceras med följande grundkriterier:
- Inga syntetiska färg- eller doftämnen och inga konserveringsmedel.
- Alla råvaror kontrolleras för att undvika rester av farliga ämnen.
- Så långt som möjligt används biodynamiskt/ekologiskt odlade växter.
- Det förekommer inga tester på djur, vare sig på produkterna eller på råvarorna.

Sandqvist is a Stockholm-based brand which aims to become a leader when it comes to bags and accessories in the fashion industry. Challenging the role of functionality in design and practicing sustainability and respect for the environment at all times without compromising the aesthetics, Sandqvist places its core values as a lifestyle brand firmly at the forefront.

Sandqvist was founded in 2004, initially as an experimental design project by three childhood friends; Anton, Daniel and Sebastian. The brand grew organically as a response to the lack of well-crafted, design-led, functional bags on offer at the time and disrupted the status-quo on how practicality can go hand-in-hand with design. Staying true to their Scandinavian roots, the three founders still believe in Swedish values; sustainability and care for the environment, high-quality designs and an unbeatable approach to function. These principals are ever-present throughout every element of the collection and the brand is living proof all of these can be fused to create expertly-designed products at a reasonable price point.

As part of its continued international expansion strategy, Sandqvist is carried by a selected range of prestigious retailers – including the likes of Le Bon Marché, KaDeWe, Liberty, END, Free People and Selfridges. In total the brand is carried at over 650 doors globally. The first-ever store opened in Stockholm, Sweden in November 2011. Followed by 7 stores, in Stockholm and Gothenburg, Sweden, London, England and Berlin, Germany. Today Sandqvist is represented in 35 countries, with the biggest markets being in the Nordics and Europe.

Bluewater is the Swedish company changing the way the world views water, by delivering the healthiest fresh drinking water around the world, and helping to eliminate the need for single-use plastic bottles. 

We believe the best water is sourced and purified in local communities, not bottled in plastic and transported from faraway places. 
Since 2013, we’ve been purifying water using patented SuperiorOsmosis™ technology – technology so powerful it can expertly purify water from the Baltic Sea. 

We also empower businesses and our planet-conscious customers to consume their purified water with a fully plastic-free solution. For hydration at work, our innovative water purifiers provide up to 7,000 litres daily of the purest still and sparkling water with an impressive recovery rate of up to 60% – so no need for bottled water. We also offer corporate glass and stainless steel water bottles, which can be branded with a company logo.

For hydration at home and on the go, our sleek reusable water bottles are durable, sustainable, and feature a stylish minimalist design. As part of our commitment to a cleaner planet, we also promise to remove 1kg of plastic waste from our world’s beaches for every Bluewater bottle sold.

The Bluewater Group is headquartered in its hometown of Stockholm, with regional offices across four continents.

Scorett Footwear AB är en av Sveriges största butikskedjor för skor i butik och skor online. Hos Scorett hittar du trendiga och klassiska damskor och herrskor samt väskor, smycken, accessoarer, skovård och skotillbehör. Vi har ett stort urval av vårskor och sommarskor såsom sandaler, sandaletter, streetskor, tygskor och ballerinaskor, samt höstskor och vinterskor såsom stövlar, kängor, boots och varmfodrade skor. Scorett vänder sig till mode- och kvalitetsmedvetna skoälskare. Scorett utsågs av Habit till årets modekedja 2012 och årets skobutik 2013.

Carex was established with a young and dynamic team in 2010, that adopted the principle of respect for nature and science. In 2018, the company moved its headquarters to Sweden and brought a new vision to the journey made at the source of nature and science.

Since its inception, Carex Sweden has been providing innovative and high-performing products without harming nature. In Sweden and Turkey; production facilities are keeping natural conditions, yet manufacturing effective skin & hair care products. Carex Sweden, offering products formulated with Sweden’s natural thermal water and cosmetics science, brings together nearly 100 types of endemic plants selected from organic sources in Sweden and the world with respect for biodiversity.

With this mission successfully carried out in nearly 35 countries, it meets the needs of hair and skin problems of consumers in different channels with chemical-free, herbal, and organic solutions.

Bionnex is the only product line in the "Dermo Organic"​ category which offers 100 % organic solutions against hair and skin problems. In 2011, it reinforced its success; and introduced Uvela, a mother-baby product line in 2014. When it comes to 2018, natural oil brand "Dr. Oil"​ which has been produced by cold-pressing method has been introduced to the market. Carex Sweden continues to multiply its success with "Celenes By Sweden"​ in the category of “Quality Natural Cosmetics” which the company launched in 2019.

As the world’s leading electric jetboard company, Radinn embodies the next-generation of water sports: a completely modular, 100% electric jetboard that lets you soar across the water at incredible speeds. 

Radinn started as a student project at Lund University in Sweden back in 2013. The prototype for our first electric jetboard was launched a few years later, with the Generation I line following in 2016. From there, Radinn—short for radical innovation— went on to become the world’s first mass-produced jetboard company, completely disrupting the industry with our product's innovative design and technology.

We have since grown from a team of 8 engineers working out of a small office in Malmö to a company of 70 plus employees working in offices throughout Sweden, Poland, Australia and the U.S. Our latest line of jetboards, Generation III, was launched in 2020. 

Our brand motto, Make Waves, celebrates the go-getters chasing their dreams and risk-takers swimming outside the lines. The thrill-seekers willing to dive in headfirst, dig deep, and get absolutely soaking wet. After all, sometimes you gotta rock the boat to land on unknown shores. 

Finally, our business' core values are defined by the acronym PURE:

Passionate
We are driven by passion. Passion for exploring different parts of this planet, and interacting with it in new and exciting ways. 

United
We work in unity with one another, our partners, and our global community through a transparent and cooperative mindset. 

Radical 
We are revolutionary. Our DNA is to disrupt. It’s in our name. It’s in our nature. In a like-minded world, we will always strive to be one-a-kind. 

Entrepreneurial
We are driving the creation of a brand new industry.  As we carve a new path in outdoor adventure, we’ll face challenges with an innovative, solutions-based attitude.

Hestra was founded in 1936 in the town Hestra in Småland, Sweden by Martin Magnusson, who began producing durable leather gloves for lumberjacks. Hestra is still run by the Magnusson family and produces gloves for winter sports enthusiasts, outdoor recreation, mountaineering, mountain biking and cycling and fashion. Hestra selects natural materials including leather and wool, to develop high-quality gloves with the user’s needs and application in mind. Hestra currently produces over 400 glove styles with a diversity that allows each user to find their ideal Hestra glove in terms of fit, function and style.

ABOUT US
Quality beauty that cares
Born in Sweden over 30 years ago, we’re a makeup brand that believes in empowering everyone to embrace their unique beauty. Since day one, all our products have been fragrance free, cruelty free and clinically tested against some of the highest standards in the industry, making them safe for even the most sensitive skin types. We think that makeup should be fun, never a complicated compromise and always a personal choice that expresses more of you. 
Welcome to the world of Isadora! 

JOIN US
Want to join the world of Isadora?
IsaDora has grown and developed over decades to become the proud beauty brand it is today. We could never have achieved any of it without all the wonderful, hard-working people that stand behind the brand passionately. For us it’s all about teamwork, dedication, and happiness (why do it if you’re not having fun while you’re at it, right?).
We’re a bunch of creative, nerdy, techy, curious beauty fantasts who love standing behind what we do: a cruelty free, fragrance free, clinically tested makeup brand that brings out the best in you.
Even when there are no open vacancies, please feel free to send us an open application with your resume and letter to: work@isadora.se
https://www.isadora.se/en/about/#joinus
We are always on the lookout for new, bright and committed talent!

Imagine a world where every foot can effortlessly find its perfect-fitting shoe, from anywhere at any time. That’s what we do at Volumental. We dream big and then merge industry-leading computer vision hardware with artificial intelligence software solutions that make those dreams come true for our retail partners and their customers. 

Volumental's FitTech solutions empower brick & mortar and online retailers to match individual foot scans to point-of-sale purchase data in order to bring their footwear shoppers truly personalized omnichannel buying experiences that are virtually guaranteed to increase conversion rates, retention, and lifetime customer value. Partners using Volumental hardware and software solutions deliver shoppers perfect product recommendations in increasingly frictionless and profitable ways.
 
Launched in 2016, Volumental is now the world’s leading FitTech company and has already helped over 11 million people enjoy a seamless and satisfying footwear buying experience. Today, footwear and retail brands in 46+ countries use Volumental’s products in over 2500 locations, from small specialty retail outlets to global powerhouses such as New Balance, Bauer Hockey, The Athlete’s Foot, Red Wing Shoes, XXL, Stride Rite, Fleet Feet, Road Runner Sports, Hoka One One, Under Armour, and Ecco.

Inet erbjuder det senaste för gaming- och teknikentusiaster. Vi har idag 100 kunniga, engagerade och prisbelönta medarbetare som erbjuder branschens bästa kundupplevelse. Försäljning sker till både privatpersoner och företag via Inet.se och butiker belägna i Stockholm, Göteborg och Malmö. Verksamheten startades år 2000 och huvudkontoret återfinns i Göteborg. Inet erbjuder branschens bästa köpvillkor med fri frakt och fria returer och omsätter 1 miljard kronor. 2021 utnämndes Inet till Årets e-handlare av Pricerunner, 2020 till Årets butik av Prisjakt samt 2020 till Årets Datorbutik av Sweclockers.

GRANIT was founded in 1996 by two Swedish women around a kitchen table in Stockholm. Their vision was to create a lifestyle concept that simplified people’s everyday life with smart and functional products in natural colors and materials inspired by nature. 
 
Our design philosophy is all about lasting design for the future.  We don’t believe in trends, instead we use sustainable and natural materials that age with beauty. We trust in homes with few things of quality that match well and that together creates a space of ease. Inspiring function is the core of our design process, smart solutions and multi-functional products for everyday life. We believe in creating a peaceful and living atmosphere by surrounding ourselves with seasonal plants and natural materials. Our products are designed to inspire creativity and to simplify your life, giving you more time to live.

OUR LEGACY is an independent fashion brand based in Stockholm, Sweden founded in 2005 by Jockum Hallin, Cristopher Nying and Richardos Klarén.

Known for applying custom-developed fabrics on signature shapes, OUR LEGACY has amassed a devoted following over the years establishing the role of a cult brand.

The collections include men’s and women’s ready-to-wear, defined by a progressive exploration of seasonal themes through an intricate attention to detail and repurposing of materials.

OUR LEGACY exists in the junction between familiar and irregular, with reworked yet recognizable silhouettes across recurring sub-categories.

Midsona Sverige marknadsför väldokumenterade produkter inom ekologiska livsmedel, hälsolivsmedel, egenvård och hygien för dagligvaruhandeln, för apotek och för hälsofackhandeln.

Vi vill göra det lättare för alla människor att själva bidra till sundare liv i vardagen.

Midsona Sverige ingår i den nordiska koncernen Midsona som är noterad på Stockholmsbörsen.

Polygiene® is the market leading ingredient brand for stays fresh solutions. In partnership with clothing and product brands, we deliver a product that is effective, safe to use, prolongs product life, contributes to a more sustainable lifestyle as well as a more profitable business for our partners.

Wear More. Wash Less© with Polygiene

Hövding started out in 2005 as a master’s thesis by the two founders Anna Haupt and Terese Alstin, who, at the time, were studying Industrial Design at the University of Lund.

The project resulted in the concept of an airbag helmet, which won Innovationsbron’s Ideas Grant. This kick-started the process of developing Hövding into a real product. In 2006 Hövding won the Venture Cup, after which Hövding Sweden AB was founded.

Over the years Hövding has grown from just two people with a great idea, to a NASDAQ-listed company that handle everything from development and production to marketing and sales. Today Hövding consists of a team of around 30 people, all triggered by the word impossible, and Hövding’s airbag for cyclists is available in 16 markets across Europe and in Japan. 

The headquarters are located in an old chocolate factory in Malmö – the sixth greatest cycling city in the world. Final assembly of Hövding is carried out in association with the Japanese Company Nihon Plast.

Mackmyra Svensk Whisky AB was founded in 1999 and is Sweden’s first producer of Single Malt whisky. Mackmyra is market-leader in Single Malts in the Swedish domestic market and is also distributed throughout the Nordic and in France, Germany, Canada and the U.S. The portfolio consists of premium and super-premium Single Malts, liqueurs and malt vodka as well as 30 liter casks sold B2C. The Distillery is located in Gävle 200 kilometers north of Stockholm. The company is listed on Nasdaq First North.

Ridestore was founded over ten years ago. If we summarize the journey with one word it would be change. But one thing has always stayed the same, the customer focus. Today we are empowering an e-commerce tribe. A tribe in which we have to earn our right to exist. It’s not a job, it’s a connection. No long-term strategies are needed, no bosses making decisions. We know what to do by co-existing with our customers.

Our team are a bunch of passionated individuals and teams. We work from anywhere we feel like. From the alps, Sweden, Bali and Ukraine. Anywhere that lets us experience life. The world is our playground, slack is our office.  Performance and execution rules. Location or hours worked are secondary. We work from different places but our team spirits are filled with energy and love for each other.

Our mission is to empower the creativity of our customers. Our souls are filled with their passion.  To keep this freedom we have no interference with VC companies or external investors. We are funded by our customers. This keeps our souls pure and lets us live in harmony with our customers.

By empowering our customers we have co-created the fastest growing snow brand in Europe. Dope Snow  -> www.instagram.com/dopesnow

And we are just getting started.

NESPRESSO PROFESSIONAL - COFFEE AT WORK

We offer quality coffee solutions to all professions; offices, restaurants, cafes and hotels.

Nespresso's unique concept is based on a wide range of portion-packed coffees that, together with state-of-the-art coffee machines, guarantee consistent, high quality - in every cup.

We at Nespresso Professional strive to create the perfect coffee experience that will contribute to the well-being of both employees and customers, which leads to increased productivity and profitability in companies. With our 14 coffee variations, there is a coffee for every occasion and taste and everyone can choose their personal coffee favourite.

Our comprehensive environmental program Nespresso AAA Sustainable Quality™ Program helps over 110,000 coffee farmers to grow high-quality coffee through long-term sustainable methods. The Nespresso AAA Sustainable Quality Program™ was established in 2003 in collaboration with the independent environmental organization Rainforest Alliance.

Vi erbjuder en arbetsplats med högt tempo där du får möta många spännande människor. Hos oss får du möjligheten att utvecklas och vi vill ständigt utmana oss att bli bättre. Vi tror att en mångfald av erfarenhet och bakgrund bidrar till en dynamisk arbetsplats och din insats har stor betydelse. Ihop med andra engagerade och stolta medarbetare får du vara med och göra skillnad. Vi strävar konstant efter att slå våra högt satta mål samtidigt som vi har riktigt roligt på vägen. 

Rizzo Group är en ledande aktör inom väskor, skor och accessoarer i Sverige och Norge med totalt ca 100 butiker. Verksamheten drivs genom de helägda butikskedjorna Rizzo och Morris, som även finns online, samt avdelningar på NK med ett utbud av egna och externa varumärken.

Swedese is a classic Swedish furniture producer with a strong anchor in both the public and domestic domain.
Swedese's ideals are the same today as they have been for the past sixty years. These are to create beautiful furniture for the future, which build on the foundations of Scandinavian modern traditions, designed by forward-looking designers who share in the timeless ideals of architecture.

Swedese was founded in 1945 by the two brothers Yngve and Jerker Ekström and Sven Bertil Sjöqvist, with Yngve leading the company until his death. The present owner of Swedese is Mrs. Elisabeth Johansson. The headquarters are located to Vaggeryd in Småland, Sweden, where one of the factories can be found. The second factory is located in Äng, a small village outside Nässjö, Sweden.

Many modernist architects were universal designers with not only a clear understanding of designing houses, but also the interior, the furniture and almost the clothes the owners might wear. Swedese's founder, Yngve Ekström, was no exception. Together with names including Alvar Aalto, Bruno Mathsson, Arne Jacobsen and Poul Kjaerholm, Yngve Ekström was at the core of a generation of designers who made the concept "Scandinavian Modern"​ famous all over the world. With a keen eye, he designed Swedese's furniture, he designed together with L + M Architects also the head office building, logo, catalogues and personalised Christmas cards including their own poems. And so on.

The most well known design of Yngve Ekström's extensive portfolio is the Lamino armchair from 1956, which is still manufactured and sold all over the world. In 1999 the Lamino was voted the Twentieth Century's Best Swedish Furniture Design by the Swedish interior design magazine Sköna Hem.

ATP ATELIER – All Tomorrow's Parties, was founded in 2010 by old friends Jonas Clason and Maj-La Pizzelli. They first met in the late 80’s at legendary Swedish fashion brand and retail stores Gul & Blå. Each recognising in the other a passion for style rather than fashion. ATP Atelier was born out of the desire to create shoes that couple contemporary Scandinavian design and authentic Italian craftsmanship with a keen eye for details.

ATP Atelier shoes and handbags are designed in Sweden and handcrafted in Italy, using vegetable tanned leathers as whenever applicable. The brand has a great presence in Scandinavia, as well as international in places like London, Paris, New York, LA, Tokyo and Australia, where their products can be found in high-end boutiques and the finest department stores. Net-a-Porter and The Line also feature ATP Atelier.

The ATP Atelier team are direct an unfussy straight-talkers. They love a good story and a fresh way of saying things.

Trademax är ett familjeföretag som bildades 2008. Vi startade företaget då vi tyckte att många inredningsprodukter i Sverige var onödigt dyra. Många företag köper in varor där flera mellanled ska ha betalt på vägen, vilket leder till höga priser som du som kund får betala i slutändan. Med hjälp av goda kontakter och ett litet antal mellanhänder vill vi erbjuda kvalitetsmöbler till marknadens bästa priser.

Vi är ett entreprenörsdrivet bolag med korta beslutsvägar, snabba ryck och högt tempo. Hos våra medarbetare värdesätter vi eget initiativ, beslutsamhet och hög grad av genomförande mycket högt.

Vill du bli en del av vårt team? Håll utkik efter våra jobbannonser.

Röhnisch is Swedish activewear for women, by women. Founded in 1945, Röhnisch purpose is to make active women feel confident, comfortable, and strong. Röhnisch offers training wear, golfwear, outerwear, and beachwear for all shapes and sizes, never compromising style for function and with sustainability at heart. Designed in Sweden by an all-female design team.

Varumärken för sportälskare

En sportåterförsäljare för människor som lever och andas sport och träning. Oavsett vilken atletisk nivå du ligger på för tillfället så strävar vi efter att förbättra dina prestationer.

Sportamore är en del av Footway Group AB.

At Desenio, we are passionate about interior decor and design! Our business idea is simple: on-trend and attractive wall decor should be available to everyone. Since our inception in 2010, we’ve experienced steady growth and can now boast web shops available in more than 30 countries, with new markets opening continuously. At Desenio, you’ll find a wide selection of posters and mounting solutions, such as poster hangers and clips - often inspired by Scandinavian style. We regularly update our selection to meet the latest trends in interior decor and design. You are sure to find something for every room and style!

Choosing what brand of baby products to use for your child can seem like an overwhelming decision. There are so many alternatives. Some focus on aesthetics, some on technical gimmicks. We know that for you, the wellbeing of your baby is always the focal point.

That’s why we want you to be able to give your baby the time and the attention he or she deserves, without the burdens of everyday life coming in the way.

Twistshake aspires to develop products that are simple and safe to use, yet also offers an appealing design. We are of the opinion that aiming for functionality does not mean that we can ignore aesthetics, and our designers are always looking for ways to combine practicality with eye-pleasing design. We have won several awards regarding design and functionality which for us is a confirmation that we develop safe, functional and appealing products.
Babies are unique. They all have their individual needs, and these change at the same fierce rate that the babies themselves grow and develop. Our goal is to become experts in all the phases babies go through. When a child is faced with new challenges, we want to be there to assist them with our innovative and safe line of products.

All of Twistshake’s products are BPA-, BPS-, and BPF-free. Twistshake cares about your safety. We want to give your child the best possible start in life.

We have hand-picked materials of only the highest quality, and we believe this is something that becomes clear when you encounter our products.

HOPE is a Swedish fashion brand that creates contemporary, high-quality fashion, aimed to inspire and emphasize individual style. We believe in progressive – yet timeless – design, strong tailoring and meticulous attention to detail.

The HOPE Collection can be found in 20 markets worldwide – in 9 HOPE Shops and in over 300 exclusive retailers and online shops.

For further information about HOPE please visit our website http://hope-sthlm.com/

Nordiska Galleriet is one of the world's most prominent destinations for design furniture. Originally founded in 1912, the company now combines two major showrooms in Stockholm and Gothenburg with online retail in Sweden and Norway to create a contemporary context for its eclectic mix of international design brands.

Vårt familjeföretag har funnits i Kivik sedan 1888, då Henric Åkesson planterade våra första äppelträd. Vi finns kvar på samma plats, med Hanöbukten på den ena sidan, Stenshuvuds Nationalpark på den andra och våra äppelodlingar på den tredje. Med fem generationers samlade hantverksarv gör vi idag fortfarande must, cider och annat gott i samma anda och med samma passion.

Odd Molly’s award-winning design in everything from clothing to interiors encourages women of all ages to feel and be their best selves. The clothes are celebrated for high quality, colour, pattern, natural materials and lots of details made by hand. 

Today Odd Molly is sold all around the world but the story all began as a tribute to one girl, a skater girl called Molly in Venice Beach back in the 80s. Breaking with convention and following her heart, she became Odd Molly’s constant muse, whose love for life lives on in every step the brand takes. 

Odd Molly will always be inspired by, and fight for more Mollys in the world.

Axstores var tidigare en del av Axel Johnson, och inkluderade Åhléns, KICKS och Lagerhaus. Bolagen ingår fortfarande i Axel Johnson, men är idag fristående från varandra. För mer information, vänligen besök respektive bolags hemsida eller www.axeljohnson.se.
 
Axstores was previously part of Axel Johnson and included Åhléns, KICKS and Lagerhaus. Today these companies are three separate units within Axel Johnson. Please visit the companies'​ websites or www.axeljohnson.se.

Outnorth is a net based store which focuses on Scandinavian brands for outdoor activities. We believe that these brands represent high quality, good design and excellent functionality.
 
We ship all over the world, using safe payment methods and well known partners for distribution. Our company has been selling on the internet since 2005 but we have roots back to 1926.

We create ambitious food experiences, fully tailored to home delivery. We're a kitchen full of kitchens, serving you the world under one roof and in one bag - putting comfort back in comfort food. We don't compromise, so you don't have to either. Try us, love us, name a kid after us. Cause we're bringing yummy back to the tummy. We're bringing world peace to the dinner table. And no matter where your cravings go, we'll keep following your gut. Because our tables have legs.

Sunda system och produkter för hållbart byggande
Weber har en marknadsledande ställning inom mineralbaserade byggprodukter på den svenska marknaden. Weber utvecklar, tillverkar och säljer produkter och system för bygg och anläggning inom mur- och puts, golvavjämning, betong, plattsättning/tätskikt samt Leca® block, -husgrunder och -element. www.weber.se

Saint-Gobain Sweden AB är företaget bakom varumärkena Dalapro, Gyproc, ISOVER och Weber. Företaget ingår i den franska Saint-Gobain-koncernen med ca 170 000 anställda. I Sverige bidrar drygt 800 anställda till en omsättning på ca 3 miljarder SEK. 
------------------------------------------------------------
Weber är ett företag med sina rötter från den svenska byggmaterialindustrins allra tidigaste period. Det hela började med kalkbrytning för cirka 350 år sedan i Limhamn söder om Malmö.

Det är från den verksamhet Skånska Cementaktiebolaget - som startade 1871 i Malmö-området som Scancem-koncernen och därmed också Weber har sina egentliga rötter. Tegel, mur- och putsprodukter stod på programmet redan på 1870-talet och gör det som bekant även idag.

Webhallen Sweden AB was founded in 1999 in a small apartment in central Stockholm and has quickly grown to be one of the leading dealers in hardware, consumer electronics, games & movies in Sweden.
We have in recent years expanded our range from games and hardware, and today you can find everything from refrigerators to LEGO in our very wide selection.

Today we have over 20 stores located throughout central and southern Sweden.

As a customer you mainly browse through our products on the website. You can then choose to have the product delivered to your home by post or visit one of our stores for pickup. Or of course you can visit one of the stores to buy the product directly or get some help from our helpfull staff to find what you need.

Beleco is a prop-tech startup that offers furniture on-demand (Product-as-a-Service). Our concept brings together high-quality design with simplicity and high availability letting users access the items both shorter and longer time. By maximizing the value of furniture throughout its life cycle, we will transform the furniture industry and develop a more sustainable society.

Lexington Company is a premium lifestyle brand offering both Home and Clothing influenced by the typical New England style. The collections are true to the American tradition of superior craftsmanship and provide premium quality products. Welcome to our world! Welcome to our dream!

Lammhults develops and markets furniture of international design for companies with high demands on quality and design. We cooperate with some of the leading contemporary furniture designers. What we accomplish together shall be elegant, effective and eco-friendly. Lammhults is part of Lammhults Design Group.

We are an independent family owned company driven by our entrepreneurial dreams since 1994. Over the years we have successfully grown to a company with sales in 36 countries on four continents. 

At Naty, our vision is a simple one; we want to provide environmental friendly hygiene products to babies and mothers throughout the world.

When it comes to your baby´s wellbeing you have a choice. A choice between products made of environmental friendly plant based materials or products made of petrochemical materials. It´s a choice about sustainability.

For us sustainability is all about persons that want to make conscious choices, people that want to change society and our planet that needs to be protected. 

One of the stigmas of green products has been that their performance was considered to be inferior to traditional ones. We’ve introduced a new concept – sustainable performance. Our core belief is that true performance minimises environmental impact. Instead of achieving technological performance at the expense of babies’ and the environment’s well-being, Naty invests most of its resources to develop products that deliver premium performance while reducing their environmental impact.

Since 1975, Klättermusen has crafted durable outdoor clothing and backpacks. We are based in Jämtland in northern Sweden, where the wilderness next to the office is our inspiration for living and creating. We believe that how we make our products is as vital as the product itself and that’s why we mainly use organic or recycled materials to minimise our footprint on the planet.

We have a vision of becoming the best brand in the world at making premium, high-quality performance products designed for global users, and in connecting them through real experiences.

Pierce Group is a leading and fast-growing e-commerce company selling gear, spare parts, accessories and streetwear to over 1.1 Million active customers across Europe through the online stores 24MX, XLMOTO and Sledstore via some forty websites adapted to the local markets. Pierce has two major segments targeting two different customer groups, Offroad – sales to motocross and enduro riders, and Onroad – sales to riders on paved roads and tracks. With a large and unique product assortment, including a number of its own brands, an excellent customer experience and attractive prices, Pierce is changing the motorcycle enthusiast market in Europe.

The headquarter is located in Stockholm, Sweden, the central warehouse is located in Szczecin, Poland, and the customer support is located in Barcelona, Spain. During 2020 Pierce had around 400 employees and net revenues exceeding SEK 1.5bn (€150MM). Pierce also hosts a very active social media community with over 1.3 million followers.

During 2016-2020 Pierce was awarded a DI Gasell, given to Sweden's fastest growing companies. During 2020 we were nominated as one of the top 3 e-commerce companies in Sweden ('D-Award'). In 2020 Pierce also received the Sweden's Best Managed Companies recognition, sponsored by Deloitte in partnership with Nasdaq.

During the first quarter of 2021, Pierce concluded an IPO and listed its shares on Nasdaq Stockholm's main market.

We aspire to become the most admired retailer within the motorcycle industry and shape the way motor enthusiasts shop by offering a state-of-the-art online shopping experience built on passion, professionalism, and a good dose of rebellious spirit.

As we grow we always look for new talent to join our company. Riders and non-riders are welcome in one of our offices in Stockholm, Åre, Szceczin, and Barcelona.

”We create better soundscapes.”
As a pioneer in the field of acoustics, Abstracta has embraced the growing interest in sound absorption and more efficient working environments. Unlike visual landscapes, soundscapes can’t be seen. Sound doesn’t disappear when we close our eyes. The soundscapes that surround us are perpetual and affect us more than we think. Abstracta has used this as its starting point and, combined with the company’s knowledge in this area, has developed products that create effective soundscapes for different office environments. Abstracta is a Swedish company with its own factory in Småland which is home to both production and development. The company has been operating since 1972 and about 50 percent of production is currently exported worldwide. Abstracta is part of Lammhults Design Group.

Euroflorist is the market leader of flower delivery services in Europe. We have a network of professional florists in 12 European countries. Together we help you send flowers anywhere you want, anytime you want. Whether it is across town, to another city or anywhere else in the world.

Euroflorist sends more than 1.8 million bouquets a year. The company was founded in 1982 in Malmö, Sweden and was the first online flower delivery on the Internet in 1995. We make it easy and safe to make your friends , family, partners and colleagues happy. Who do you want to make happy today?

A Day’s March is a clothing label offering quality shirts and wardrobe staples at a friendly price. The company was founded by Marcus Gårdö, Pelle Lundquist and Stefan Pagréus. Together they have a mixed background from different disciplines including retail, branding, graphic design and interior design. Their vision is to update the essential wardrobe and create a store they wished existed. A Day’s March is a direct-to-customer brand. By cutting out the middlemen the label can offer high quality products at a friendly price.

DesignTorget är Skandinaviens ledande marknadsplats för kunder och formgivare som värdesätter form, funktion och förnyelse. Vi väljer ut bruksföremål med kvalitet, från kända och okända formgivare, och säljer via Designtorgets 16 butiker i Sverige och Norge, samt via e-handel, http://www.designtorget.se.

ROYAL DESIGN GROUP AS AN EMPLOYER
We believe that giving a person room to take initiative and responsibility is a great way to learn and grow within their field. Our work environment is built on passionate people who operate as a team, helping each other out and lifting each other up. We believe that our workplace have the perfect mix of easygoing and hard working.

ABOUT THE COMPANY
Royal Design Group AB was founded in 1999 and is Northern Europe’s leading online shop for design, home décor and furniture. We strive to present high quality Scandinavian brands, focusing on design that fits all styles and homes. Our company is represented by our two stores; RoyalDesign.com and Rum21.se. 
RoyalDesign.com is available online in 13 geographic locations, and Rum21.se has online shops in the Nordic countries (Room21). We can also be found in 14 physical stores throughout Sweden. Royal Design Group AB have three offices, two located in Stockholm, and a headquarter in Kalmar.
Want to work with us? See our career openings and apply at https://royaldesign.se/information/jobba-hos-oss or https://www.rum21.se/sv/info/jobba-pa-rum21.html

Sudio lives our values in everything we do. What we do is sound. 

Every sound you’ve ever heard was a collaboration between you, the airwaves, and the source. Sound - by its very essence - is meant to be shared, whether it’s a voice, a melody, a beat, or a signal. 

We share in a collaborative workforce who, in turn, share differing points of views from their diverse personal backgrounds. We share a common purpose: to share the creativity of artists, elevating their work with auditory excellence.

All sound is a challenge to silence; to the status quo.

We challenge ourselves to innovate, thereby challenging the boundaries within our industry and the expectations of consumers.

Every sound is initiated in an act of creativity. 

We initiate small ideas and scale fast, proving even the softest voice can cut through the noise. We initiate incremental improvements that lead to leaps and bounds over time.

Sound is evolutionary. 

We evolve because sound evolves; just as technology evolves; just as art evolves; just as human beings evolve. 

Our purpose is progress. Our process is sound.

JC har varit närvarande på den nordiska marknaden och erbjudit kunder jeansplagg sedan 1963. Vår kärlek till denim kommer aldrig falna. Denim är vår aldrig sinande inspirationskälla. Drivna av denna passion presenterar vi nu vårt nya koncept Scandianvian Denim House.

Vårt mål är att skapa en plats där kunden känner sig hemma, en plats där vår mångåriga erfarenhet av denim och service kombineras med det skandinaviska utseendet och värderingar. Vi är övertygade att vi kommer stiga till en ny nivå på den nordiska jeansmarknaden och vidare internationellt genom att vi skärper vårt fokus genom nya kärnvärderingar. Våra värderingar är; hållbarhet, innovation, mode, enkelhet och service.

Vi vet att vi konkurrerar i en utmanande bransch, men vi vet också att vi fokuserar på våra värderingar kommer att skapa en passion för konsumenten att välja JC för deras shopping. Vi är medvetna om JC: s utmanande senaste resa. Det blir inte lätt och vi måste agera ödmjuka och alerta. Vi är dock mycket övertygade om framtiden. Vårt säkra relä på vår expertis men också på våra konsumenters styrka som kräver och passande vill att JC ska vara en del av sitt liv för framtiden. De flesta av dem växte upp med JC, och JC var en del av sitt liv.

Vi vill att våra kunder ska hittade senaste och mest moderiktiga och hållbara produkterna, få den bäst möjliga servicen och bli inspirerade i vårt skandinaviska denim hus.

The obesity and diabetes epidemics are worsening - more than two billion people are overweight and over 400 million have type 2 diabetes. 

We believe these diseases can be prevented and reversed by evidence-based lifestyle changes. This includes eating a low-carbohydrate diet, intermittent fasting and other factors. By making low carb simple, we aim to empower people everywhere to dramatically improve their health. 

Diet Doctor in brief:
- Founded in 2007 by CEO Dr. Andreas Eenfeldt, MD.
- Purpose: Empowering people everywhere to dramatically improve their health.
- Mission: Make low carb simple.
- Values: Goodness, Trustworthiness, Simplicity, and Inspiration.
- Fast-growing, close to 100% a year on key numbers, now 50+ employees and about 20 freelancers, moderators and partners.
- 10 million visits per month for DietDoctor.com, making it by far the largest low-carb or keto site in the world.
- The #1 ranked fitness or nutrition website in the world according to Trustpilot.
- Highly rated on Glassdoor.
- Site is available in English, Spanish and Swedish.
- No money from industry, no products for sale, no ads.
- Fully owned by our coworkers – zero outside investments.
- Profitable, not just recently but also overall since the founding!
- Material thoroughly evidence-based by the 20+ medical doctors on our medical review board and expert panel, led by our Medical Director Dr. Bret Scher, MD.
- Fully funded by the people – over 75,000 paying members (membership is optional).
- Everything people need is available for free.

Picadeli provides food retail a full concept of self-service salad where the customer is offered everything from an innovative, fresh and tasty assortment to high-tech salad counters, support and service. In 2009, the very first salad bar was launched in Sweden with the ambition to change people's lunch behavior through a brand new way of buying salad. Today, the company has over 100 employees, is European market leader and can be found in more than 1900 stores around Europe. Picadeli has since 2015 been part of the Greenfood Group which is the Nordic leader in healthy food with a 4 billion SEK turnover. Find out more at www.picadeli.com

At Aarke, we envision a world where homes are equipped with exquisitely designed essentials that people will use and love for a lifetime. We are a creative collective, a group of design fanatics, a family of home appliance enthusiasts. Based in Stockholm, Sweden, we design and engineer the perfect home essentials for our conscious community.

Founded in 2013 by two experienced industrial designers and friends, Jonas Groth and Carl Ljungh, the brand is on a mission to re(de)fine the home appliances industry and support people to choose a more sustainable lifestyle.  Their first product, the Aarke Carbonator, has gained a cult following around the world with customers from more than 30 countries. 

In a category of products that has been forgotten by the design community, we merge made-to-last quality, premium materials and a unique design approach. Join the movement.

Sedan 1989 då Teknikmagasinet grundades säljer vi tekniska produkter som gör livet lite roligare. Idag finns vi i över 80 butiker i Sverige och Norge, samt online på teknikmagasinet.se och teknikmagasinet.no.

Hos oss hittar du ett spännande sortiment bestående av allt från elscootrar och stressbollar till gamingtillbehör och soldrivna robotar. Vi håller koll på trender och är snabba på att få in nyheter. Vi säljer även begagnade mobiler samt utför mobilreparationer när din iPhone har fått sig en törn.

For over 30 years, our mission has been to protect and improve the performance of working hands. Besides developing high quality gloves with great performance, we advise the customer to choose the right glove for the right use. The right choice contributes to a safer work situation, higher performance and a better experience for the end user. That is also a big step towards our vision – a world where everyone is safe and healthy at work.

We are a full-service retail agency focusing on sales and seamless customer experiences.

Welcome to Nordic Retail Group

At Didriksons we have one simple philosophy: We don’t challenge the elements. We adopt to them. That is the same idea used by Julius and Hanna Didrikson when they started making workwear for the fishermen in Grundsund, on the rim of Sweden’s western coastline, back in 1913. Functional garments that kept the wearer dry and happy whatever the weather. For more than one-hundred years we have stayed true to our concept, and probably that is why we still are the leading brand of rain- and weatherproof garments in Scandinavia.

Our garments are made for everyone, for you and me. For everyday people, aged 1 to 100 years old. Didriksons once started out as a family company, and we still act like one. We love the family. Our concept is to create functional clothes, with a timeless design, to be worn every day, no matter what the weather.

Today the world is different than it was when we started. That means we have to take better care of it. We constantly develop our environmental work, and strive to reduce our footprints in this world. We minimize chemicals, we ban all toxic substances, and we try to reduce our use of water, energy and transportation as much as we can. This is an ongoing work, and we’ll probably never finish.

So if you decide for a Didriksons garment, remember that we put all our expertise, every single year of product development and knowledge, into every single item that we put our brand on. Because we want you to stay dry, happy – and active.

using the finest craftsmanship and are characterized by simplicity, functionality and timeless design.
Lane Crawford, Breuninger

Hernö Gin is the world’s leading and most awarded craft gin producer. Proud pioneers who started the first gin distillery in Sweden back in 2011. It all began with a passion for the juniper predominant spirit and a dream evolving to gin crafting. A journey that took Hernö Gin’s founder Jon Hillgren to places and gin distilleries all around the world in his thirst for knowledge and search for inspiration. Finally settling in the small village of Dala just outside Härnösand in the High Coast of Sweden.

Hernö Gin is crafting the world’s most awarded gins from natural organic botanicals in the hand hammered copper stills Kierstin and Marit. With a mindset of crafting, transparency in all parts of the process and total focus on quality, Hernö Gin intend to bring premium gin culture to every home.

The Danone Group was founded in 1917. We have been in the Nordic countries since 1993. Danone is active in more than 120 countries.

Danone is a dedicated, personal and entrepreneurial driven company, which manufactures good and healthy products that has serious scientific research in the foundations.
