When Tina Søgaard started mixing her own skin care, she was not aware that it was the beginning of a successful skin care series. At the time she had just been through a difficult divorce, which affected her skin that became tired and dull. With her many years’ experience within the personal care industry, she knew which ingredients would give her skin a much-needed boost. Thus, she began making creams, serums, and oils in her own kitchen.

It did not take long before Tina’s family and friends noticed that her skin had improved significantly. Therefore, they also wanted to try the products. Helping family and friends with their skin problems became therapeutic for Tina – and even though it was never her intention to sell the products, beauty therapists and stores soon heard about their effect. Therefore, they were interested in making the skin care part of their assortment. 
From then it went fast, and this is how Ecooking came about: A Danish skin care line with a focus on effect and rich in natural and organic ingredients.

“The basis for healthy skin is to cleanse and moisturise. If you only have time for two steps in your skin care routine prioritise these two” 
Tina Søgaard, founder & owner.

Liva Healthcare is Europe’s leading provider of scalable digital health coaching. Through an app Liva is providing personal human coaching programmes to help people manage obesity, pre-diabetes, type 2 diabetes and cardiovascular diseases.

Liva is headquartered in Copenhagen with offices in London and Berlin, and the company's multi-award winning platform is now operational in nine countries across Europe and the South-Pacific. 

The company was founded in 2015 by the founders behind Europe’s leading independent health information portal, NetDoctor.com, Rune Bech and Carl Brandt, together with Kristoffer From.

In 2017, Liva was selected by NHS England among 84 providers as a digital provider to their world-leading National Diabetes Prevention Programme (NDPP).

Among Liva’s other major clients are insurance giants like AXA and Bupa, and pharmaceutical companies like Amgen and Novo Nordisk, and public and private healthcare providers across Europe. 

Through Liva’s app, users have access to a real human health coach, designing a personalised lifestyle change programme for them based on their individual needs. 

After a live video kick-off the participant then receives continuous professional guidance, support, motivation, and empathy via Liva's app. The goal is to help them prevent, manage or reverse chronic conditions through a new sustainable healthy lifestyle and behaviour changes. 

Participants can track their progress real-time via the app and engage with a support group of peers to keep them motivated. 

In several studies, Liva has been proven to drive substantial clinical outcomes, also in socio-economic backgrounds normally hard to reach.

Liva is funded by VerlInvest, MIG, Digital Health Ventures, Santo Venture Capital, and Maj Invest.

For more information visit livahealthcare.com

TAKT looks to the future with our sights set far beyond furniture. Because society needs new ideas about how to make quality goods accessible for more people, and we need to do it in a sensible way that doesn’t adversely affect life on the planet. We take on this challenge as we create refined Danish furniture for the mutual benefit of people and planet.

We’re on a mission and we would like you to join.

Manufacturer of Acoustics panels

In 2010 Troldtekt celebrated its 75th anniversary as a supplier of natural acoustic panels. The acoustic panels are made from completely natural raw materials- wood and cement, which generate a healthy indoor climate and an efficient sound absorption.

Troldtekt is made from cement-bonded wood wool, sourced from Danish natural materials - the wood from Danish forests and the cement from the Danish geology. Troldtekt has a constant focus on the environment, both through the extraction of raw materials and during the production. As a result, Troldtekt products are environmentally justifiable. Since the production waste is composted and used for soil improvement, it contributes to improvement of nature. This is a part of Troldtekt’s life  cycle approach.

Troldtekt A/S have been awarded the Danish Construction Industry Environment Award at TUN BYG 2010, the biennial trade fair. The award was presented by HRH Crown Prince Frederik.

Urtekram er pionér i den økologiske branche og er stadig først med det nye, når det gælder økologi. Om KiMs
KiMs er danskernes foretrukne leverandør af chips og snacks.

Alle danskere kender KiMs som leverandør af chips og snacks i høj kvalitet. Poserne fra KiMs møder du i dag stort set i enhver dagligvarebutik over hele landet. 

KiMs kommer ind  på 1. pladsen som det stærkeste brand på det danske marked i en undersøgelse fra 2010 blandt andre stærke mærkeværer. Undersøgelsen blev lavet af GfK Consumer Tracking Scandinavia.

Hos KiMs har vi lanceret den ene bestseller efter den anden, og KiMs’ Sour Cream & Onion er i dag forbrugernes absolutte favorit. En ”nyklassiker” er KiMs Favorit Mix, mens andre egentlige klassikere er KiMs Skruer og KiMs Saltede Peanuts.

Netop KiMs Saltede Peanuts var med til at starte det hele. Rigtig mange voksne danskere er vokset op med KiMs, der indførte den hyggelige snack-stund tilbage i 60’erne, da danskerne første gang blev præsenteret for saltede peanuts. 

Virksomheden bag
Mens KiMs er synlig for enhver på indkøb, har langt færre et billede af virksomheden og menneskene bag. Bag navnet KiMs findes virksomheden på Nordfyn, som består af omkring 200 entusiastiske medarbejdere, der hver dag går på arbejde for at levere bedre produkter og bedre resultater i morgen end i dag.

At Les Deux, we have the courage it takes to embrace difference. This is how we create something new. This is how we move forward.
Les Deux was born from a chance meeting between two very different people, with contrasting personalities, who found themselves united in recognising opportunities. Two distinct souls on divergent paths with shared ambitions.

Often, in the meeting of opposites, something profound happens. A spark ignites.It is then you can excel and stand out from the crowd – you can dare to carve your own path. This is our raison d’être. We design clothes that make people challenge their habits, confront the status quo. We do what it takes - and we do it with a shared sense of purpose.

Some might say that you are as classy as the clothes you wear. At Les Deux, we
believe true class is shown by your actions. Class is consideration, compassion,
and the willingness to give your all. We never give up. We give back. We share our success, and we persevere. We work as one but let each individual pursue their own dream. Les Deux is about leaving a mark – a legacy that has lasting meaning. Ensuring sustainability and compassion are at the heart of what we create, our designs and our communication – and how we give back.

We say: believe in what you do and get the job done. Life has its own driving forces and so do we. Opposites spark opportunites.

Embrace difference.

Les Deux is currently stocked globally in more than 800 international retailers.

RareWine was founded in 2006 by the Danish entrepreneur Rasmus Nielsen. The drive and passion that initially established RareWine still rings true today. It is first and foremost a love for wine, and commitment to seek out the finest and rarest of them. For more than a decade this passion has driven us to always aim for the best service possible and has grown RareWine into Scandinavia’s leading fine wine merchant, with a selection that encompasses a plethora of different types of wine and spirits from all over the world.

We offer fine and rare wines from all over the world including Bordeaux, Burgundy, Champagne, Rhône, Italy, Spain, USA and Australia

With more than 25.000 bottles representing more than 2.500 different wines and vintages from the best and most exclusive wine producers in the world, we offer the most comprehensive selection of fine wines in Scandinavia.

Our wines are sold to more than a thousand wine professionals and shipments are sent daily from our warehouses to customers all over the world.

High-quality Danish design – at fair prices

In 2012, Sofacompany set out to challenge the furniture industry by making high-quality Danish design available to all. We set up a new business model, carefully handling all steps of the process making us able to deliver our products directly from our own factory. A unique concept that removes all non-value-adding links from the supply chain – and renders what we like to coin “fair prices”.

Our strategy furthermore enables us to offer customisation for all consumers – and full-on tailormade solutions for professionals in collaboration with our talented in-house design team. 

Online might be our thing but seeing is believing, which is why we have beautifully designed showrooms in 22 cities around the world for you to visit. In our opinion that’s the best way to not only display our hand-crafted designs but meet the customers face-to-face.

We're on a mission to upgrade the well-being of people and our planet through a line-up of plastic-free and plant-based products. Our chewing gum and pastilles are free from plastic, aspartame, and anything artificial. They are palm oil free, vegan, and 100% biodegradable. 

Most of today's chewing gum is filled with petrochemicals (plastics), aspartame (an artificial sweetener), and BHA (a synthetic antioxidant). We exist because gum can be made without plastic and unnecessary additives. And because people and planet Earth deserve better.

What started as a passion project between four friends in 2017, has now turned into a company on a mission to produce planet-friendly goods that only do good. We're headquartered right outside of Copenhagen, Denmark, where also each and every piece of gum is carefully crafted. Today, our products are being sold in over 10.000 stores across Europe.

Odense Marcipan is the world’s leading manufacturer of marzipan and marzipan-related products. The company is represented on all markets where marzipan is used, and ODENSE is the largest brand in the Scandinavian countries. ODENSE products are available on the bakery, food service and retail markets, and the products are widely used in the food industry by many leading cake and confectionery manufacturers.

Ever since it was founded in 1909, Odense Marcipan has focused its efforts on producing marzipan of the very best quality. The company’s range of products has expanded over time, and today Odense Marcipan stands for quality and inspiration for those tempting moments.

Odense Marcipan manufactures more than 170 different types of marzipan, all adapted to a variety of different recipes, markets and customers. Odense Marcipan is one of the few manufactures to use original Italian millstones, which give the marzipan a good, coarse texture that brings out the flavour of the almonds. Moreover, the company also has a wide range of nougat, chocolate, couverture sauces, nut products and various baking and confectionery ingredients including a range of icing products.


Odense Marcipan has since 1991 been owned by Orkla and is part of Orkla Food Ingredients. Today Odense Marcipan is 1 out of 4 companies in the ODENSE Group, consisting of:
•	Odense Marcipan in Odense, Denmark 
•	Bæchs Conditori in Hobro, Denmark
•	IGOS in Hedehusene, Denmark
•	Frödinge Mejeri AB, Sweden

Tradepoint A/S is a trading company that provides retailers around the world with furniture and homeware for both indoor and outdoor spaces. 

Based on our customers' needs and wishes and our eye for spotting bestsellers, we develop and carefully select products from only the best suppliers. 

By our qualified teams in Europe and Asia and by the production sites in the supplier countries we follow the productions closely from start to finish.

We operate globally, but our roots are firmly planted in the Scandinavian soil. Our headquarter and 4900 square meters showroom is located in Hans Christian Andersen's birthplace of Odense in Denmark. 

However, our business is not based on a fairytale, but on solid know-how, business excellence and a passionate desire for creating value for our customers and suppliers which we prefer to call business partners. 

Tradepoint is a family-owned limited company established and founded by Rene Liocouras Nielsen in 1997. Rene is still head of the company, which today is the workplace for more than 150 skilled and passionate colleagues in Denmark, Germany, China and Vietnam. 

We make complexity simple.

NG ZINK A/S er en dansk salgs- og produktionsvirksomhed, som repræsenterer førende europæiske producenter af tag og facadeprodukter i zink, kobber og aluminium.

NG ZINK A/S er leveringsdygtig i råmaterialer til egen forarbejdning, såvel som færdigt producerede produkter - klar til montage, samt diverse relaterede tilbehørs produkter og værktøj.

NG ZINK A/S benytter kun materialer som lever op til de strengeste kvalitetskrav med hensyn til langsigtet vedligeholdelsesfri holdbarhed, ekstrem vejrbestandighed, fremragende bearbejdningsevne og stabilitet. På afgørende punkter ligger produkterne betydeligt over de europæiske normkrav.

Kvalitet, fleksibilitet, erfaring og leverancesikkerhed, er nogle af nøgleordene i virksomheden.

Ditur.dk tog sine spæde skridt på drengeværelset hos Kasper og Mikkel Dissing i 2014. I dag er vi Danmarks største webshop med salg af ure og accessoires, og vi er på vej ud på flere internationale markeder. Varesortimentet byder på mere end 5.000 varenumre, og vi servicerer mere end 150.000 kunder om året. 

Ditur.dk har sit domicil i Hasselager lige udenfor Århus, hvor vores mere end 60 medarbejdere er fordelt på lager, kontor og i vores in-house butik. 1 juni 2021 udvidede vi forretningen med vores første fysiske butik, beliggende i hjertet af Aarhus, hvor vi allerede er blevet taget rigtig godt imod.
 
Fra den spæde start har det hos Ditur.dk været intentionen at sælge moderne og anderledes ure, hvor kunden ikke betaler for mærket, men blot betaler for kvalitet og design. I februar 2020 deltager Kasper og Mikkel i DR1’s program ”Løvens Hule” med selv samme budskab og får derigennem Jacob Risgaard og Jesper Buch med i ejerkredsen.

Vores vigtigste forudsætning for succes, at vi har tilfredse kunder. Det opnår vi ved hele tiden at sikre en simpel og brugervenlig hjemmeside med sikkerheden i top, og hvor kunderne og købsoplevelsen er i fuld fokus.

Ditur.dk har en butik på Elmegårdsvej 12, 8361 Hasselager og på Store Torv 14 i Aarhus, hvor det er muligt at komme forbi og se på og købe diverse varer fra vores sortiment.

Summerbird er på få år blevet anerkendt som noget af det bedste chokolade i verden. Det skyldes den kompromisløse tilgang til råvarer, den nænsomme forarbejdning, de innovative smagskombinationer samt den æstetiske emballage. Se mere på www.summerbird.dk

DALI (Danish Audiophile Loudspeaker Industries) is 37 years old Danish loudspeaker manufacturer that currently has its products in more than 70 markets world wide. 

DALI grew out of Scandinavia's leading audio retail chain in 1983, based on the observation that customers often requested a combinations of size, shape, performance and price that existing brands could not offer. We committed ourselves fully to the task of creating loudspeakers with outstanding performance and natural sound at competitive prices.

Today we have more than 150 employees whereas more than a third is based in DALI's headquarter in Nørager, Denmark. The two thirds are located at DALI's own factory in Ningbo, China, as well as our own sales offices in Germany, China, and the UK.

Today, DALI offers an exciting range of speakers to suit every taste from the cost-conscious SPEKTOR and ZENSOR series to the ultimate performance speaker the MEGALINE. With more than one million satisfied DALI owners around the world, we bring music and film to life in the home, giving proud DALI owners a more honest, nuanced and richly detailed listening experience.

Erik Jørgensen was founded in 1954 by saddler and designer Erik Jørgensen. During the 1970s, the company was considered a frontrunner in Danish furniture design. Jørgensen earned a reputation for his remarkable upholstery skills, inventive upholstered furniture and unsurpassed expertise in Scandinavia with sofas.

FDB Møbler has been creating Danish design classics since 1942. New generations of designers have joined the team throughout the years, but the philosophy remains the same: to create beautiful, functional and high-quality furniture for the many, not just the few. FDB Møbler is part of a movement that began in the ’40s but remains as relevant as ever. It’s not about flamboyant statements, but about designs that benefit those who matter: people.

We believe that the best solutions work in harmony with nature’s forces. That's why we develop products and solutions that help the construction industry meet their sustainability goals through natural ventilation and facade automation.

Simply stated, our mission is to create the best indoor climate solutions in the world in the most sustainable way possible.

WindowMaster employs highly experienced cleantech specialists in Denmark, Norway, Germany, United Kingdom, Ireland, Switzerland, and the United States of America. In addition, we work with a vast network of certified partners.

Taasinge Elementer er Danmarks ældste og største producent af præfabrikerede tag- og facadeelementer. Siden produktionen startede i 1971, har Taasinge Elementer præget udviklingen af det industrialiserede træelementbyggeri.

Løsningerne skrædersys til byggerierne ved hjælp af moderne, 3D-baseret informationsteknologi, og produktpaletten omfatter løsninger til stort set alle typer nybyggeri, herunder produktion, lager, institutioner, skoler, kultur, idræt, kontor og ikke mindst "tæt-lav"​-boligbebyggelser, samt etageboliger op til fire etager. Hertil kommer en række nye løsninger til energirenovering, når f.eks. den gamle facade eller det gamle tag skal udskiftes, eller når de dårligt isolerede betonfacader fra 60'erne og 70'erne skal efterisoleres.

Elementproduktionen foregår på vores to fabrikker i Svendborg og Hampen i opvarmede produktionshaller, hvor vi med avanceret produktionsteknologi og omfattende kvalitetssikring skaber løsninger, som afleveres klar til montering på byggepladsen.

Frankly betyder "helt ærligt"​ eller "ærlig talt"​. 

Hos Frankly Juice har vi taget kampen op med især juice producenter, som vi til tider mener lukrerer på nogle af de trends og buzzwords, som figurerer i fødevarebranchen løbende, for på den måde, at sælge deres produkter som værende sunde. Vores bud på hvorledes en juice skal kunne defineres som værende sund er, at råvaren er frisk og økologisk, presset i bedst mulige temperaturer for bevarelse af mest mulig smag og næring og uden tilsætning af nogen art. En juice presset friskt af konventionelle råvarer kan i virkeligheden være en koncentreret mængde af giftstoffer fra pesticidrester og det skal folk bare vide inden de vælger det som en ”sund vane”. 

Buzzwords som ”koldpresset”, ”ingefær”, ”havtorn”, ”protein”, ”glutenfri” og mange flere kan IKKE i sig selv være garanti for, at et produkt er sundt – det handler mest af alt om kvaliteten/friskheden af den råvarer der er blevet brugt. Og det kan ofte være misvisende for forbrugeren. Det vil vi gerne være med til at skabe gennemsigtighed og ærlighed omkring, således at folk er rustet til at træffe deres valg om eventuelle sunde vaner. Både for dem selv og for miljøet. Frankly betyder som nævnt ”helt ærligt” og er vores bud på et ægte buzzword! 

Vi presser vores safter i egne faciliteter i Danmark, udelukkende af økologiske råvarer fra Aarstiderne.
For din skyld og til gavn for miljøet har vi fokus på kvalitet frem for kvantitet. 

Vi leverer vores produkter til mange forskellige led:
- Virksomheder og kantiner for øget sundhed på arbejdspladsen
- Private gennem juicekasser hos Aarstiderne og egen webshop
- Cafe, bageri og restauration gennem egen logistik og grossister
- Events, messer, mødeforplejning m.m.

/TeamFrankly

CeramicSpeed is one of the world’s leading suppliers of ceramic bearings. We have more than 15 years’ experience in bearings applications, and have developed close relationships with our component suppliers over the years – each of whom are the very best in their fields. All of our bearings are hand assembled in Denmark.

We have many years of experience developing hybrid bearing solutions, using ceramic balls of a unique quality together with other specially developed components. CeramicSpeed bearings have unique properties that can solve challenges where ordinary steel bearings are not good enough. In addition to this, CeramicSpeed bearings have a lifespan that is 4-8 times longer than steel bearings.

Our products are distributed worldwide, and you can find them either in our web-shop or in shops in more than 20 countries. We are the only bearing brand in the world to sponsor three World Tour cycling teams and we sponsor many other athletes within both triathlon and MTB. We furthermore supply CeramicSpeed bearings directly to a number of top brands, including SRAM, Specialized, PowerTap, MadFiber and 3T, working closely together with their R&D teams. 

CeramicSpeed was founded by Jacob Csizmadia, who was the first person to introduce ceramic bearings to the world of professional cycling, back in 2000.  Jacob personally supervises upgrades of bicycles for professional teams and individual racing enthusiasts, to ensure unsurpassed quality, performance and high value.

CeramicSpeed bearings for sports applications are developed to give you the lowest friction and the longest lifetime. Our vision is to develop bearings solutions without compromises! We have high standards and want to contribute to better performance for the athletes who use our bearings.

It is not about being in the race - it's about winning the race!

With CeramicSpeed you have a better chance than your competitors!

1 People is a sustainable luxury fashion brand that creates timeless pieces for conscious women who seek luxurious, stylish, and sustainable wardrobe that benefits both people and the planet.

We have, and always will, continue to operate sustainable, ethical and transparent business practices using eco-friendly products that do not harm the environment. We donate 40% of our profit to Business For Planet, our educational programme that provides future entrepreneurs worldwide the tools to create socially-responsible businesses. This way, they, too, can go on to launch businesses that will positively impact the world and alleviate poverty.
We believe that businesses nowadays should be transparent about how they operate - that is why social responsibility is at the forefront of our mind and strategy. 

The current cultural approach in businesses promotes quick fixes and instant gratification, which disregards the importance of the journey in reaching the goal. We are people- and planet-centred, believing that businesses must be honest and helpful in order to elevate society in a harmonious manner.

Quality and trust are terms that can be seen as mainstream or tokenistic in this current climate, but at 1 People, we firmly believe both terms are the true essence of our company.

By sharing knowledge, techniques, business acumen and everything else it requires to become a force for positive change, we will create greater harmony and equal opportunities for all who embrace creativity, diversity and responsibility, in all four corners of the Earth 🌍

We are already joined as humans, now let us walk, as 1 People, Together.

BabySam blev etableret i 1973 og er Danmarks største og mest innovative kæde for babyudstyr med et landsdækkende netværk på 30 detailbutikker, samt institutionssalg og webshop.

Vi vil være Nordens største og bedste, når det gælder de mindste. Derfor understøtter BabySam udvikling og sikkerhed gennem salg af kvalitetsprodukter og rådgivning. Med mere end 40 års erfaring i rådgivning af babyudstyr, ønsker vi at gøre det nemt for vores kunder at træffe trygge valg, og derfor står vores rådgivere altid klar med den nyeste viden og vejledning.
Vores medarbejdere er certificeret i rådgivning i barnevogne og autostole og tilbyder vores kunder personlig rådgivning med ansvarlighed og faglighed i højsædet. For at øge sikkerheden og trygheden hos vores kunder, tilbyder vi derudover også en times gratis og unik rådgivning i valg af babyudstyr.
BabySams leverandører bliver valgt ud fra principper, som: ansvarlighed, etik, miljø, sikkerhed og høj kvalitet. Som eneforhandler af en lang række velkendte mærker, herunder det velkendte danske barnevognsmærke Odder, sørger vi for, at også leverandørerne lever op til samme standarder som os om optimal komfort, kvalitet, design og sikkerhed. 
Vi har mange varianter af behageligt basis- og gennemtænkt funktionstøj fra 0-6 år fra mærker som Minymo, WHEAT, Småfolk, BeKids, Mikk-line, ej sikke lej og mange flere. Derudover har BabySam også et stort udvalg af elementer til børneværelset, så du kan skabe rammerne for et sjovt og kreativt børneunivers. Blandt andet gør mærket Sebra det muligt at skabe et hyggeligt og gennemført børneværelse i moderne design og nytænkende farver som altid går hånd i hånd med gamle håndværksformer og naturmaterialer.
Du kan stole på vores rådgivning, da vi aldrig går på kompromis med vores værdier om sikkerhed, tryghed og ansvarlighed. Vores børn er det dyrebareste, vi har, derfor bliver BabySams ansatte løbende uddannet, trænet og certificeret, hvilket betyder større viden og bedre rådgivning for dig.
