Træ gennem tiden
Frøslev Træ A/S, som virksomheden hedder i dag - blev startet i 1931 af Johannes Carlsen på grundstykket, som hustruen Mariane havde fået i medgift. Johannes Carlsen begyndte savværksvirksomhed under trange og slidsomme kår, hvor Hans Hansen, den lokale skraldemand, med hest slæbte træstammerne ud af skoven og med hestevogn transporterede træet hjem til forarbejdning på savværket i Frøslev. Det var et opslidende arbejde, hvor han ene mand måtte læsse de tunge træstammer.

Til opskæringen havde Johannes Carlsen i begyndelsen én enkelt fritstående sav, der blev trukket af en gammel, larmende petroleumsmotor. Denne var overdækket med et primitivt tag båret af en nedgravet granpæl i hvert hjørne, hvorved han fik ly for vejr og vind. Virksomheden blev under 2. verdenskrig brugt som tilholdssted for danske frihedskæmpere. Savværket var i familien Carlsens eje frem til 1978, hvor Jens P. L. Petersen og Fuglsang Savværk købte det til eksportvirksomhed og lager med Jens P. L. Petersen som primus motor og daglig leder. I 1982 overtog Jens P. L. Petersen savværket, og i de følgende år blev der løbende foretaget moderniseringer.

I perioden frem til 1985 blev der savet omkring 30.000 m3 pr. år. I november 1985 blev Frøslev Savværk desværre flammernes bytte, hvor både produktionsbygninger og maskiner nedbrændte til grunden. Savværket lå stille indtil 1988, hvor Jens P. L. Petersen og hustru Christa L. Petersen atter pustede liv i det, nu under navnet Frøslev Træ. Virksomheden blev ændret til en handels- og engrosvirksomhed med speciale i forarbejdet og/eller trykimprægneret fyrtømmer.

Sønnen Martin L. Petersen indtrådte i januar 2011, som et led i et planlagt generationsskifte, i den daglige ledelse. I slutningen af 2012 overtog Martin L. Petersen virksomheden, efter endelig gennemførelse af generationsskiftet.

Frøslev Træ A/S beskæftiger i dag knap 100 medarbejdere og regnes for at være blandt landets største grossister indenfor træbranchen.

The Karmameju DNA is a first class collection of aromatherapeutic skincare products. We create pure, natural, and active products with clinically proven age-defence ingredients and 100% natural fragrances. All products are developed in cooperation with our award winning British apothecary and perfumer. Blended at therapeutic ratios, our products not only deliver visible results, but actively promote physical and mental wellness, inner radiance, and vitality.

We are always looking to stimulate the senses. Life must be lived NOW, and it is to be fully enjoyed. Skincare must pamper the body, mind, skin, and the senses.


METTE SKJÆRBÆK - FOUNDER / 

Natural health has intrigued me since I was young, living in Denmark. At age 16, I left Denmark for my career as a model, and it led me to the world’s farthest corners and the largest metropolises. Ten years later, I returned to lovely Denmark with a broad knowledge of health, beauty, fashion, design, diverse cultures and the strong belief that there is NO BEAUTY WITHOUT TRUTH.

Karmameju reflects my love for natural beauty, health, positive thinking, and the art of natural perfumery. Ten years in the beauty and fashion industries and my participation in a ‘Bachelor of Science in natural health’, during my six years in New York, was the key inspiration to create Karmameju in Copenhagen in 1999. My dream was - and is - to redefine wellness. I am convinced that beautiful skin is achieved through natural health and good skincare routines. Your skin has an innate ability to regenerate when given the right conditions.

Xx Mette


WHEN YOU CHOOSE KARMAMEJU - PURE / NATURAL / ACTIVE SKINCARE

/ CLINICALLY PROVEN INGREDIENTS

/ NATURAL ART OF PERFUMERY

/ PURE & NATURAL PRODUCTS

/ HIGH RATIO OF ACTIVE INGREDIENTS

/ AROMATHERAPEUTIC EFFECT

Cembrit er en del af Cembrit Holding A/S, der er en af Europas førende virksomheder inden for fremstilling og salg af vedligeholdelsesfri byggematerialer. Hovedprodukterne er fibercementbaserede løsninger til tag og facade.

Hos Cembrit er vi andet og mere end leverandør af byggematerialer. Hos os står professionelle medarbejdere klar til at hjælpe dig med alle faser af dit byggeprojekt. Når du vælger Cembrit får du også glæde af vores store erfaring med fibercementprodukter, indsamlet gennem virksomhedens mangeårige historie.
 
Med erfaring fra store byggeprojekter i Danmark og udlandet samt omfattende investeringer i produktion og produktudvikling er Cembrit en af byggebranchens mest visionære og kompetente samarbejdspartnere.
 
Vi ser frem til at hjælpe dig med dit næste projekt.

The proud weaving traditions of Georg Jensen Damask can be traced all the way back to the Danish craft society of yore. We have been weaving since 1756, and our identity truly took shape when Johanne Siegumfeldt and Henrik Georg Jensen set the stage for what is still our purpose: To weave the finest textiles for everyday life – based on our knowledge and proud traditions going back generations.

At Lactosan A/S we take pride in our interest in Cheese Powder, in fact we cannot stop thinking about it. After all, we did invent it! 

Established in the early 50’s as one of the true pioneers in spray dried Cheese Powders, LACTOSAN A/S manufacturers and markets a broad range of Cheese Powders solutions to the global food processing industry.

With regional sales offices in Denmark, UK, Russia, Japan and China and supported by a extensive network of agents and distributors, we service a broad customer base throughout Europe, the Middle East, Africa, Asia and the Americas. 

Backed by years of experience we take pride in carefully sourcing and selecting our raw materials from a multitude of countries, ensuring we have access to a world of traditional as well as region-specific speciality cheeses. This combined with highly specialized processing and drying techniques enables us to manage the unique flavour, functionality and mouth feel characteristics naturally inherent in the cheese

In Denmark and Uruguay, Lactosan operates two modern manufacturing and R&D facilities and in close co-operation with our customers and distribution partners we continue to be at the forefront, developing new processing techniques and novelty product concepts to help food manufacturers meet the challenges of tomorrow’s global food markets.

Our broad portfolio of cheese powder technologies offers food and flavour manufacturers a variety of functional and natural flavour solutions in categories, such as savoury snacks, biscuits, bakery goods, sauces, dips and dressings, ready meals, creams, processed cheese, confectionary and flavour systems.

THE HISTORY OF FYNBO
Fynbo Foods began life in 2002 in brand new production facilities on Sigenvej in Vrå – a small town in the heart of Vendsyssel in the northernmost part of Denmark. It is an area of rich countryside and strong traditions for the production of jams and marmalades.

Today, the company has grown to become Scandinavia’s leading jam factory and a well-established, market-oriented food producer. We are proud of the support of consumers and not least of being market leaders with respect to organic and Fairtrade preserves.

All our products continue to be produced at our facility in the attractive region of Vendsyssel.

MISSION AND VISION
With focus on sustainability and innovation, to produce, market and sell processed fruit and vegetable food products of uniform quality at competitive prices.

On the basis of the above, the company’s mission is to meet the needs of quality-conscious and price-conscious consumers for safe, fresh and great-tasting products, just as we also want to provide retailers with private label products.

Furthermore, the company has a vision to be the retail trade’s preferred business partner in Scandinavia and a supplier of Danish food specialities throughout the rest of the world.

Welcome to Contrast Company!

At Contrast we design, innovate and re-define the way brands are built and marketed. Our aim is to exceed the expectations of all our business partners – through innovative and reliable solutions and long lasting partnerships. Therefore, we consistently provide a wide range of high quality products with unique designs at competitive prices and with customized services.

We aim to be the preferred partner and top supplier of license, private label and non-license products on the European market. We bring you a wide selection of the most popular brands. You will meet the most creative designers and skilled buyers working with the best and most reliable suppliers in the Far East and Europe.

Our sales team aim to provide excellent service to Nordic and European retailers. We focus on continuously developing unique products and designs in close cooperation with all of our customers.

The idea behind Contrast has all along been to become a preferred partner and top supplier of licensed, non-licensed and private label products on the European market.

Contrast Company A/S - a part of N.O.C. HOLDING ApS
NJORDIC Company A/S and Milestone Company ApS

Producing quality biscuits and cakes, primarily for the Scandinavia marked. 

Bisca has been on the market since 1890 under different brands. The most known brands is Karen Volf, Bisca, My Choice

Bisca producion is located in Stege (Møn),  Denmark

companyName: Naked Copenhagen - Supplying Girls With Sneakers
description:
Since first opening their doors in 2004, Naked Copenhagen has grown to become the world’s leading sneaker supplier for women around the globe. Naked Copenhagen focuses solely on catering to and meeting the unique needs of female consumers. As a part of Naked’s DNA, they strive to empower girls - in a usually male-dominated industry - worldwide on different platforms like social media and editorials.
 
Founded by business partners and friends Tommas Olsen and Stine L. Pedersen, Naked started out as a store in the heart of Copenhagen, and has now expanded to a global webshop, one more store in Copenhagen and one in Aarhus. Naked Copehagen mainly carries sneakers, but also clothing and accessories from big brands like Nike, Adidas, Asics, Vans, New Balance, Air Jordan, Reebok, Onitsuka Tiger, Puma and more.
 
Through time, Naked Copehagen has collaborated with big tycoons in the sneaker world – Adidas, Vans, Reebok and Asics – on creating sneakers and apparel with Naked’s own aesthetics and visual DNA. Keep a look-out for more collabs to come in the near future!
 
At Naked Copenhagen we understand that the success of our brand is due to the contribution made by our dedicated and awesome team. In return, we seek to provide our colleagues with a supportive working environment that facilitates learning and individual growth. We also provide a very social workplace, which we believe engages and creates happier employees.

Hungry er hjemstedet for take away i Danmark, og tusindevis af lokale restauranter over hele landet venter på at tage imod din bestilling. 
Hungry har én mission: at give dig den bedst mulige oplevelse, når du har lyst til noget lækkert.

Som de første i landet, har Hungry.dk introduceret det digital stempelkort, hvor du optjener bonus hver gang du bestiller. Hver bestilling udløser et stempel til dig, og når du har 10 stempler hos én restaurant, så får du en ganske gratis bonusbestilling. Det er da en fordel der er lige til at blive sulten af.

Hungry.dk er stiftet af bestyrelsesformand Morten Larsen, og holdet bag består bl.a. af adm. direktør Rune Risom og salgsdirektør Mattias B. Løwe.

HOWE a/s is a strong international brand and one of the pioneers in development and sales of multi-usage and space-saving design furniture for the contract market. For more than 80 year’s HOWE has been working closely with A&D’s in order to create beautiful and functional environments with the focus on well-being. 

HOWE’s HQ is in Odense, Denmark and has 100% owned subsidiaries in the US, UK and Poland and a branch in France.

We are hunters at heart. Outfit International A/S has been producing quality hunting clothing for more than 40 years, and our focus has always been to find new and innovative ways to allow hunters to realise their full potential. Our two brands, Seeland and Härkila, are leading hunting brands in their category and price range across Europe, both developed and designed in close collaboration with dedicated hunters and uncompromising, experienced designers. We have a profound curiosity towards traditions, functionality, and quality materials. Combined with a Scandinavian mentality, an eye for practical no-nonsense solutions, and a true passion for hunting, we pride ourselves on making superior clothing that fits the needs of the hunters across countries.

DermaPharm has been developing, producing and setting the standard for environment-friendly, mild and skinfriendly bodycare products for over 35 years. The company is environment and quality certified according to ISO 14001, ISO 9001 and ISO 22716. We are licensed to bear the Nordic Ecolabel and Ecocert label on our products, and the Asthma Allergy Foundation declaration. Our own brand, Derma, was the first skincare range to be awarded the official Nordic Ecolabel, the Swan, and Asthma Allergy Foundation’s declaration, and several Derma products now bear the Ecocert label as well, indicating that our products are kind to the environment, allergy-friendly and organic.
Turf Tank is the company behind the world's first autonomous line marking robot.

It all began with a passionate barbecue enthusiast named George Stephen, who invented the world's first kettle grill in 1952 – a grill that ended up changing barbecuing culture throughout the world. He did not do it in order to enrapture the whole world – he simply wanted to find a way to barbecue better steak for his family and friends. And he succeeded! That was over 60 years ago. 

"We are not metal benders – we are in the entertainment business"​. That brief sentence sums up Weber. For us, a grill is much more than a grill – it is a focal point for unforgettable experiences. This was the philosophy George Stephen founded Weber on... it is the philosophy that has revolutionised the world of barbecuing... and it is the philosophy that still permeates Weber today.

Masai is a Danish womenswear brand founded in Copenhagen in 1992.
Today Masai has become an international brand with a multichannel distribution and a loyal customer group around Europe and in the US. 

At Masai, we believe that what women wear should lift their spirits, express their creativity, and enable them to do everything with joy and ease. We design to delight and support women. Our collections combine uplifting prints, shapes, and silhouettes that enhance feminine figures.

Thoughtfully designed in Copenhagen
... inspired by women

Eat fresh, locally caught fish.

We connect fishermen and fishmongers with local fish consumers, by allowing fish consumers to see where and what fresh fish is available. 

There is currently no easy or universal system that connects consumers directly to the source of their seafood, although there is a desire and a global trend towards eating locally. Our service is currently the only one in Denmark that would allow fish consumers to communicate in an effective and efficient way with the fishermen and fishmongers who provide locally caught fish to the area.

Football is more than just a game, it's a lifestyle. We call it unisportlife. It represents the unconditional love for football, and bring people with the same passion together. It lives and exists in our daily routines, from the clothes we wear, to the news we read, and the moments we live.

We have been in love with the game since 1995. That's when Unisport was founded in a small Copenhagen apartment. In 2002 we launched our first webshop, serving football players and supporters with the best football gear, all over Denmark. Since then we have successfully launched football stores in Sweden, Norway, Finland, Holland, Germany, France, and Austria. And this is just the beginning.

unisportstore.com
youtube.com/unisportlife
instagram.com/unisportstore/
snapchat.com/add/unisportlife

🏆 🏆 🏆 
FDIH Brugerprisen 2011, FDIH Social Commerce 2012, FDIH Brugerprisen 2012, FDIH E-Handelsprisen Guld 2013, FDIH B2C 2013, European E-commerce Entrepreneurial Award 2013, FDIH Cross Border 2014, Børsen Gazelle 2015, FDIH Cross Border 2016, Prisjakt.nu Årets Nätbutik 2016, Børsen Gazelle 2016, FDIH Brugerprisen 2017, Børsen Gazelle 2017, YouTube Gold Creator Award 2018.

Since the company was founded in 1993, the idyllic seaside town of Hornbæk in north-east
Denmark, which is famous for the relaxing atmosphere around its small harbour, wide sandy
beaches and dunes, has been the backdrop for Danish Designer Ilse Jacobsen's life and
creativity. 

Inspired by the natural and raw beauty of her surroundings, Ilse Jacobsen sets the
ideas for the company ILSE JACOBSEN HORNBÆK which encompasses the mother brand
ILSE JACOBSEN HORNBÆK, flower shops, a spa- and beauty line and a spa.

The international lifestyle brand ILSE JACOBSEN HORNBÆK includes 23 concept stores, 3
flower shops, 11 shop-in-shops, 1 outlet and a spa. 
Today, the brand is sold in more than 1500 shops across 26 different countries. 

ILSE JACOBSEN HORNBÆK is represented in all major cities around the world – Paris , New York, London, Milan, Amsterdam, Copenhagen, among others.

Danmarks mest erfarne forhandler af billige hårde hvidevarer - og vi er nu også taget til Norge.

Hos Skousen er det naturligvis hårde hvidevarer, der er i fokus. For os handler det om at servicere vores kunder med billige hvidevarer i høj kvalitet og at matche kundernes individuelle ønsker og behov hver gang. 

Vi har arbejdet med salg af hårde hvidevarer siden 1957, og vi synes selv, at vi har klaret det ganske godt med mere end 50 butikker i Danmark og snart 25 i Norge, alle i franchisemodel. Kombineret med online salg via skousen.dk og skousen.no arbejder vi i et omnichannel marked med fokus på prismatch: Hos os er der ikke forskel på priser online og i butik på hårde hvidevarer.

Og det hænger sammen med vores andre fokusområder, som er vores kunder og vores dygtige medarbejdere. Vores tilgang til kunderne er at give god service i form af kvalificeret rådgivning og fornuftige priser. Hver enkelt kunde skal gå ud af døren med det helt rette produkt for dem, så de oplever, at deres nye produkt netop er en god investering og en hjælp i hverdagen.

Vores tilgang til vores medarbejdere er, at vi vil tiltrække de bedste medarbejdere, så vi netop kan holde det høje serviceniveau over for vores kunder: Det gælder både i butikkerne og på hovedkontoret i Risskov, hvorfra overordnet salg- og driftsstrategi udgår kombineret med marketing, kommunikation og projekter på tværs af butikker og online-kanaler.

Conaxess Trade is Europe’s leading independent distributor and has a presence in six countries (Central Europe with Austria and Switzerland; and Nordics with Denmark, Finland, Norway, and Sweden).
Based on extensive experience of all the key distribution channels and product categories, Conaxess Trade is able to provide manufacturers of FMCG brands easy access to markets with a total of more than 40 million consumers.

The flexible value chain of Conaxess Trade encompasses a range of tailor-made, modular distribution and marketing solutions for international brand owners. These include professional services in the fields of marketing, category management, key account management, point-of-sale services, market intelligence, purchasing, logistics, warehousing, co-packing, distribution and customer services.

It all began with a horse-drawn carriage. In 1895, the young Niels Eilersen started out as a coach builder. To make his wheels, he was the first person in Denmark to use steam to bend wood. When cars eventually ran horse-drawn carriages off the road, Eilersen started making handmade bodies for cars and busses. In 1934, the factory burned to the ground, however, this marked the start of an entirely different production process. From then on, Eilersen focused on producing high-quality upholstered furniture. The sofas soon became very sought after, and they still are to this day. Today, the company is run by the fourth generation. Eilersen furniture, is the result of proud traditions and modern development. As such, the creation of every piece of furniture is based on genuine craftsmanship and fashion-conscious design. To many people an "eilersen"​ is also a unique feeling of comfort... or as we say "enjoy an Eilersen!"​. Making quality since 1895.

Alefarm Brewing is a Copenhagen-based craft brewery with a focus on modern hoppy offerings, a wide array of unique, flavorful farmhouse ales and full-bodied stouts, rich in flavor and character.

Throughout a production year, we'll offer a fixed line-up of beers supplemented by seasonal offerings, new releases and collaborations. The production is carried forward by an explorative, creative and spontaneous brewing philosophy resulting in quality drinking experiences for all.

We run an avidly creative sour programme, experimenting with several different fruited varieties. All these beers are fermented with a well-established mixed house culture that results in our own unique flavor profile.

Alefarm Brewing is driven forward by a team of highly ambitious people. We call ourselves the Alefam, the family of people that works at the brewery.

Feel free to reach out me, Kasper Tidemann, at any time via kt@alefarm.dk. We are excited to bring you excellent, spontaneous and fun beer experiences!

All the best,

Kasper Tidemann

Founder and CEO
Alefarm Brewing

At Creativ Company we sell arts, crafts and educational products to private customers, the public sector as well as being a B2B supplier. It is our ambition to be the preferred supplier in our field.

Creativ Company was founded in Denmark in 2000, and today we have 320 dedicated employees in nine European countries. Our ambitions have grown at the same rate, although our basic attitude is the same: Creativ Company must be best in class, both in terms of the working environment and the way we operate and develop the business. 

Creativity is our passion. We want to help to encourage the creative spark and thereby develop creative, innovative and imaginative people. We develop our own groundbreaking products, designs and ideas, and through a network of worldwide suppliers and partners, we make sure to find the products that satisfy our creative customers requirements. 

During our 21 years in the market, we have received several accolades and awards for creating job satisfaction - and not least for our social commitment. We were awarded the title Europe's third best workplace by “Great Place to Work”. Also we won the special prize in the competition for being the work place in Europe, where employees are most proud to work. 
It is a natural part of our DNA that we want to be able to help people who for various reasons, have difficulty in gaining a foothold in the labour market. Therefore, 10-15% of our employees are employed under special conditions in sheltered jobs.

Nextfood provides food professionals with automated vertical farming solutions ranging from small in-store systems to large high-efficiency farms. Grow exceptionally flavourful, nutritious and fresh vegetables sustainably, anywhere, year-round.

✅ Taste and nutrition are second to none
✅ Hyper local and minute fresh vegetables
✅ 98% water saving
✅ 40% less food waste
✅ 75% less fertiliser
✅ No pesticides or contaminants
✅ No (or very little) transportation
✅ Grow all year round
✅ Anyone can do it
✅ Significantly less CO2
✅ Improved biodiversity

WE PROVIDE BOTH VERTICAL FARMING TECHNOLOGY AND OPERATIONS:

We provide the entire vertical farming technology stack as well as daily operations of vertical farms in collaboration with partners.

🥬 Nextfood in-store farms 🥬 
A soilless indoor vertical greenhouse inside a supermarket, restaurant or other foodservice company growing hyper fresh and exceptionally flavourful vegetables, herbs and leafy greens. Engaging guests and bringing life, light and fresh air to the room.

🥬 Nextfood large-scale farms 🥬 
A warehouse-size indoor vertical farm in the city or elsewhere producing fresh, local and high-quality crops sustainably year-round at large scale.

Simplicity - Few styles - lots of colors...

﻿All the best...100% Organic cotton to keep your conscious clean, pre-washed
so it doesn't shrink when washed, made in Portugal under the best conditions
and we even donate 5% for a good cause...

100% ORGANIC COTTON ✓
We only use the finest, organic, high quality cotton.

PERFECT FIT ✓
Countless of hours and customer feedback has gone into the development of our products ensuring a perfect fits.

PRE-WASHED ✓
All our products are pre-washed before they leave the factory. This prevents shrinkage when washed and keeps the fit over time.

MADE IN PORTUGAL ✓
We produce all our products in Portugal and we work under the European guidelines for best practice production and work enviroment. Feel free to come visit and see for your self.

GARMENT DYED COLOR PALETTE ✓
All products are colored using the garment dye technique. The color is added to the style after it's cut and sewn to gain an extra deep and lively feeling to the fabric.

5% DONATION TO CHARITY ✓
We donate 5% of our proceedings to charity.

ARKK Copenhagen is a Nordic sneaker brand committed to designing the world’s finest minimalist sneakers. Established in Copenhagen, ARKK was founded by two life-long friends with a passion for architecture, design, and fashion. Unable to find a sneaker brand that expressed the essence of Scandinavian streetwear style, Kasper and Thomas set out to create their own. Since the release of the Raven silhouette in 2014, ARKK Copenhagen has grown exponentially, and now drops four innovative collections per year in more than 37 countries around the world.

www.arkkcopenhagen.com

We are a passionate skate shop that strives to be trustworthy, professional and customer oriented. We listen to our customer's needs and wishes, and we do not recommend something we would not use ourselves.

SkatePro was founded in 1996 and has grown to become the largest skate shop in Scandinavia.

Egernsund Wienerberger er Nordens største teglvirksomhed. Vi forener dyb lokal forankring med internationalt udsyn og globalt perspektiv og vores historie går adskillige generationer tilbage. Det giver os en unik ekspertise og erfaring, som hver dag præger vores tilgang til mulighederne med tegl. Netop derfor er vores program formentlig det bredeste, mest komplette og mest innovative i hele Norden.

Vi brænder for tegl
I Egernsund Wienerberger brænder vi for kvalitet og kreativitet – bogstavelig talt. Vores tegl er sande naturprodukter – ler formgivet med vand, tørret og brændt i ovne ved høje temperaturer. Det betyder, at alle vores produkter er unikke og har en naturlig variation fra brænding til brænding, en variation, der udfordrer og inspirerer kreativiteten. 

Vi brænder samtidig for en bæredygtig fremtid. Ud over løbende indsatser i vores produktion for at nedbringe CO2-aftrykket satser vi på produkter, der reducerer ressourceforbruget og indgår i naturens eget kredsløb. Vi tror på kvalitet, der kan ses og mærkes. Tegl, som formes og udvikler sig i takt med tiden.

Når man bygger med tegl, kan man lege med formater, former, forbandter og fuger. Og vi elsker, når teglets muligheder udnyttes og bidrager effektivt til murværkets udtryk. Med denne bog ønsker vi at invitere dig indenfor i vores verden, en verden af tegl i et væld af farver, overflader og formater. 
Tegl til at bygge huse, hjem og drømme af. 
 
Persondatapolitik: https://www.egernsund.com/persondatapolitik.html

Scan Office er en 100% danskejet og danskdrevet virksomhed. Vi er landsdækkende leverandør af kontormøbler, boligtilbehør og kreative indretningsløsninger.

Gennem adskillige år har vi arbejdet med B2G og B2B salg. Hovedsædet ligger i Herlev og huser både ledelsen, de sjællandske konsulenter, vores egen tegnestue og vores største showroom. Ydermere har vi showrooms i både Horsens, Ålborg, Fredericia og Herning. Scan Office har 6 kompetencecentre og mere end 35 sælgere fordelt rundt om i landet, som alle har et godt tæt lokalkendskab. Logistikken er placeret både øst og vest for Storebælt, så uanset hvor i landet du befinder dig, kan vi være hos dig indenfor kort tid.

Scan Office har et stort og bredt sortiment af kontormøbler og boligtilbehør. Selvom vi har rødder i den skandinaviske møbeltradition, så gør vi os i meget andet end de populære designklassikere. Vi kan levere stort set alle slags kontormøbler i alle prislejer til konkurrencedygtige priser. For vi lægger vægt på, at kunne imødekomme alle former for behov og ønsker. Vi går aldrig på kompromis med hverken kvalitet eller lovgivning, for vi ønsker kun at levere møbler af høj standard. I vores univers skal møbler kunne fungere i mange år både æstetisk og kvalitetsmæssigt.

Hos Scan Office sætter vi barren højt, når vi løser indretningsopgaver. Vi lægger vægt på troværdighed og gør en dyd ud af at forstå din virksomheds DNA. Og vi lytter først og fremmest til dine ønsker og behov, når vi skaber indretningsløsninger, der lige netop passer til din virksomhed. Vi er gode til at rådgive og være din professionelle sparringspartner, for vores konsulenter er alle specialister indenfor deres felt.

På tegnestuen sidder vores kreative arkitekter klar, hvis du har brug for visuelle oplæg eller nye skræddersyede løsninger. Har du allerede en arkitekt tilknyttet, så samarbejder vi meget gerne, hvis ikke, kan vi tilbyde assistance fra vores egen tegnestue.

PRECURE is developing smart wearable IoT devices, which provides real time data analytics on muscle strain and user feedback in order to promote behaviour modification and help reduce repetitive strain injuries.

IDdesign is an international market leading furniture and lifestyle franchise concept, dedicated to bringing extraordinary value to both our customers as well as our carefully selected franchise partners.

Thanks to our unique Scandinavian roots and traditions, IDdesign is highly recognized as a leading consumer lifestyle brand, demonstrating both innovation as well as originality in all its aspects. The dedicated IDdesign design team constantly seeks to enrich the product range with furniture and lifestyle products of the highest of qualities and contemporary designs. 

The proven success of the international IDdesign franchise concept provides our franchise partners with a sound and highly profitable investment. IDdesign aims to be the preferred concept for the professional retailer who strives to be market leading within the furniture and lifestyle business.

IDdesign operates in some of the most prestigious locations in Eastern Europe, Southern Europe, the GCC area and the Middle East in general.


IDdesign - Your home. Our passion

Aurora Group's business concept consists of creating value for our partners by building brands and building business. Our goal is to be the strongest partner in the Nordics, to be respected for our concepts and service provision, and trusted for our highly qualified employees and excellent delivery.

Aurora Group was founded in 1999 through a merger between the Danish Rudolph Schmidt A/S (founded in 1915), Norwegian OSK Elektrotilbehør AS (founded in 1937), Swedish Ortoconnex AB (founded in 1981) and Finnish Teletarvike Järvinen Oy (founded in 1982). In 2006, the group was expanded with Norwegian tCom AS (1995), and in 2010, we added Swedish white goods brand Hanestrom (1999) and Gameo (1930) to our range. In 2013, Aurora Group was acquired by the listed Swedish distribution group DistIT AB, whose growth strategy involves the acquisition of well-run niche distributors in IT and electronics.

Aurora Group is a leading partner in the Nordics, with more than 100 years of experience within electronics and with activities in 10 different countries. The distribution is based in a central warehouse in Jönköping and a satellite warehouse in Lilla Edet in Sweden. Internal sales are handled locally while support and back office functions are located at the head office in Ballerup, Denmark.

We build your business – We build your brand

More info at www.auroragroup.eu

Brands4kids A/S develops and markets the children's clothing brands Pippi®, CeLaVi®, ME TOO®, Minymo® and Creamie®.
We are a Danish company, solidly grounded on the Jutlandic heath. At the same time we feel well at home in a European context and we consider the whole of Europe our playground.
The clothes that we develop also reflect our local and European heritage. Our mid-Jutlandic roots cause us to emphasize sturdiness and quality. In the European metropolitan areas we acquire inspiration for design and ideas for new prints, fabrics and models. The result is clothes that are perfectly suitable for smart and active 0-14 year olds who live and play around in the northern European weather.

Founded in 2006 in Denmark, AIAIAI is an audio design company dedicated to developing premium headphones. Trusted for music creativity and in the most vigorous environments - on the road, in the studio, and on the stage.

AIAIAI boasts a world-renowned network of professional music makers as part of its highly collaborative development process. Driven by a responsible design philosophy, and with a heritage in Scandinavian design, AIAIAI products are designed to last.

To Øl is a young Danish craft brewery founded in 2010. We brew a wide range of different craft beers; some potent and provocative, others fresh and floral. We brew hoppy, balanced and complex beers both light, dark, strong and simple. We brew the beers we want to drink ourselves and work to brew the best beers in the world.

In 2016 we opened our brewpub BRUS in Nørrebro, Copenhagen and in March 2017 a small BRUS bar in Oslo, Norge. To Øl is apart from this co-owners on a number of bar and shop projects counting; Mikkeller & Friends, Koelschip, Mikropolis, Bottleshop in Torvehallerne PLUS Mikkeller & Friends bar i Reykjavik, Island.

To Øl is in a thriving development and we constantly experience an increased experience for our products. We export to more than 45 countries around the World. To Øl has been among the Top 100 brewers on RateBeer since 2012 and was in 2014 awarded the 9th best brewery in the world. 
To Øl was also appointed as a Gazelle-company by the Danish business paper Børsen in 2016 and 2017.

Cocio Chokolademælk A/S blev grundlagt i 1951 af Anker Pallesen, og er i dag Skandinaviens suverænt største producent af steriliseret chokolademælk og har til huse på selskabets fabrik i Kjersing nord for Esbjerg.

Virksomheden beskæftiger i dag ca. 50 medarbejdere og er danskejet. I 1999 overtog E. Bank Lauridsen Holding A/S og IAT-koncernen Cocio fra amerikanske The Borden Food Corporation. Siden 2002 har Arla Foods været medejer af og ejer således i dag 100% af aktiekapitalen i Cocio Chokolademælk A/S.
Januar 2008 er Cocio helt ejet af Arla Foods.

Imerco A/S har overtaget Inspiration. 
Pr. 1/2 2018 hedder de tidligere Inspiration butikker Imerco Home.

A/S Bryggeriet Vestfyen er et dansk bryggeri, beliggende i den lille vestfynske kystby Assens. Bryggeriet blev grundlagt i 1885 og har over 135 års erfaring i fremstilling af øl og mineralvand.

Bryggeriets fokus er på egne brands inden for øl- og mineralvandskategorien samt Private Label og lønproduktion.
Udover vores klassiske øl- og mineralvandsserier, som går under navnet "Vestfyen", står vi også bag de kvalitetsorienterede specialølserier Willemoes, Frejdahl, Indslev og Ugly Duck Brewing Co. samt den originale danske sodavandsserie Jolly Cola, som bedst kendes af alle, når der skal siges "Jolly til din cola"​.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 

A/S Bryggeriet Vestfyen is a proud Danish brewery with over 135 years of experience - founded in 1885.

We produce, market, sell and distribute quality beverages both national and international. Our focus is on our own branded products within beer and soft drinks aswell as Private Label, contract manufacturing & co-production. 
With brands as Willemoes and Frejdahl we continue to be be a crucial part of the craft beer market in Denmark.

Our classic soft drink brand; Jolly Cola have been a part of the Danish soft drink market since 1959.

The Whole Company A/S er et 100% danskejet holdingselskab for en række af Danmarks mest kendte brands.
Kernefilosofien i virksomheden ligger i at GØRE EN SUND FORSKEL – såvel i vores produkter som for vores medarbejdere.
The Whole Company A/S er en ambitiøs virksomhed, der til stadighed drives af at skabe produkter, som afspejler udviklingen inden for smagstrends. 
Målet for vores produktudvikling er at forene nye trends med danskernes behov, ønsker og høje krav til kvalitet.
Hovedparten af vores produkter bliver fremstillet på egne fabrikker og pakkerier. Vi har hovedsæde og produktion i Køge samt produktion i Vadum og Stege. 
Virksomheden står i dag bag brands som:
Castus, Fredsted The, Trope, Toftkær, Superfood, JemoPharm og VitaCare

100% DANSK - 100% NÆRVÆR

Himmerlandskød er en familieejet virksomhed, der tilbyder 100% dansk okse- og kalvekød af høj kvalitet fra dyr, der er født, opvokset, slagtet og opskåret i Danmark - heraf størstedelen fra Himmerland.

Alt kød kommer fra vores slagterier i Aalestrup, Hadsund og Kjellerup og udbenes samt detailpakkes i Farsø og Hadsund.

Vores formål er at fremme produktion og salg af danske kvalitetsfødevarer, hvor der er lagt vægt på fødevaresikkerhed, dyrevelfærd, sporbarhed, ensartethed og kvalitet.

Vi ønsker ligeledes at understøtte de danske landmænd og den danske produktion af kvalitetsfødevarer.

Vores dyr er opdrættet, slagtet og opskåret under høje hygiejniske og etiske forhold, hvilket garanterer en høj fødevaresikkerhed, sikrer produktets kvalitet samt efterlader “en god smag i munden”.

SELECT is one of the world’s leading manufacturers of hand-sewn balls and produces approx. two million balls a year exporting to more than 50 countries.

In addition to balls, the company's range comprises literally everything within particularly football and handball, including sports bindings, sports care, goalkeeper gloves, training equipment and clothing.

The company was founded in 1947 by Eigil Nielsen, the Danish national football team’s goal keeper. In Eigil Nielsen’s days top players could not live solely from their sport so he chose to train as a sports psychologist and also had a job in the shoe and leather industry. Here he created the first SELECT football.

In 1962 SELECT introduced one of the greatest inventions in the history of football - the 32-section ball. At the beginning of the 1970's Eigil Nielsen was again a forerunner when he and SELECT brought out a handball with 32 sections.

All sorts of football and handball tournaments are still played with balls based on Eigil Nielsen’s 32-section principle - just as all the balls produced in the world today are built on his innovation.

SELECT is partner of a long list of federations and clubs in the world of football and handball and is furthermore deeply involved in a number of humanitarian projects around the globe.

GLOBAL FUTURE OF AQUACULTURE
Alpha Aqua A/S was founded in 2017 by two well-esteemed Danish companies, each with long track records in the aqua industry. They were determined to gather the best and most innovative technicians, vets and biologists in the international aquaculture industry in order to design and build the next generation of RAS systems for the global market.

A LAND-BASED RECIRCULATING AQUACULTURE SYSTEM FOR A SUSTAINABLE FUTURE
Alpha Aqua A/S provides a unique approach to the aquaculture industry: 
•	Turnkey solutions
•	Modular systems/production units developed in phases
•	Faster construction, no fixed concrete structures implying
•	better Return on Investment (ROI)
•	Efficient planning, safer production units, and lower total costs
Producing total solutions within on-shore fish farming, Alpha Aqua A/S has developed a system that ensures that fish farming can take place on land in a recirculating aquaculture system where the water is purified and not replaced to any great extent - this has the potential to disrupt the industry since we have the solution to the environmental challenges that fish farming can entail.

WE SUPPORT THE UN GLOBAL COMPACT 
At Alpha Aqua, our mission is to contribute to the development of more sustainable aquaculture production, thus making it possible to utilize the world’s aquacultural resources more effectively. As such we want to help facilitate a change towards consumption of more sustainably produced protein.

To enable us to continue supplying the growing world population with enough protein in the future, fish production will need to rise. In the future of aquaculture, the concept of circular agriculture is essential.
Alpha Aqua uses recyclable food grade PP (polypropylene) for their Water Treatment Units as well as the tanks and production systems. The concept has been developed and designed with a strong emphasis on sustainability, fish welfare, a minimum of environmental impact and strong construction principles.

H+H kan spore sin oprindelse tilbage til 1909, da murermester Henrik Johan Henriksen og teglværksejer Waldemar Kähler sammen etablerede “Singels-forretningen Omø”. Formålet med virksomheden var udvinding af sten og grus. I de efterfølgende år udvider virksomheden sine aktiviteter betydeligt og i 1937 påbegyndes produktionen af porebeton i Ølsted ved Frederiksværk.

I dag er H+H en international koncern, som udvikler, producerer, sælger og distribuerer porebeton og kalksandstensprodukter og -løsninger primært til vægge i boligbyggeri, industribyggeri og erhvervsbyggeri. 
 
H+H har en stærk position i markedet og er Europas andenstørste producent af porebeton. Vi tilbyder en bred palette af løsninger og services for at sikre en høj kundetilfredshed.

Vi ved, at det er afgørende at vælge den rette samarbejdspartner og tror på, at samarbejde skaber varig værdi. Derfor vil vi være din one-stop shop inden for vægbyggeri og vejleder dig gennem hele processen, så du får det bedste resultat. H+H - PARTNERS IN WALL BUILDING®.

H+H koncernen har fabrikker i England, Tyskland, Schweiz og Polen samt salgsselskaber i Norden, Benelux og Tjekkiet.

HELE DANMARKS ISMEJERI - SIDEN 1933

Premier Is i Thisted er et af Danmarks ældste ismejerier. I over 80 år har ismestrene værnet om håndværkstraditioner, gode råvarer og piskefløde i vores flødeis. Hos Premier Is laver vi is, der smager som i de gode, gamle dage. Vi er inspireret af originale opskrifter med piskefløde og de bedste ingredienser uden kunstige tilsætningsstoffer. Dette har været vores grundværdier lige siden 1933. 

Gode råvarer giver god smag. Og det er netop den gode smag, som i mange generationer har gjort Premier Is til nogle af de mest populære is på det danske marked. Det er derfor, vi er hele Danmarks Ismejeri.

Stauning Whisky er et dansk whiskydestilleri.

Vores destilleri ligger ved den jyske vestkyst nær byen Stauning. Og placeringen er skam ikke tilfældig!

Da det hele eventyret begyndte var den grundlæggende idé at vi som udgangspunkt skulle gøre alt selv og gerne efter skotsk tradition. Vi ville lave en røget i whisky i beste Islay stil. Derude hvor vinden er frisk og der rigtig dufter af hav og tørv.

Meget har ændret sig siden de dage. Men ønsket om at holde alle processer i huset står stadig ved. 
Så her ved Stauning Whisky har vi valgt selv at stå for alle dele af produktionen, lige fra vi modtager byggen fra landmandens marker, til vi tapper de gyldne dråber på flaske. 

På den måde kan vi sikre os, at der på intet sted bliver gået på kompromis med kvaliteten. Det er meget vigtigt for os, at slutresultatet er whisky af højeste kvalitet. Samtidig giver det mulighed for, at gæster kan se alle dele af en whiskyproduktion, når de besøger destilleriet i Stauning.

Stauning Whisky laver whisky baseret på rug og byg.

Hos Sika Footwear udvikler, producerer og leverer vi fodtøj til det arbejdende folk. Fra sygeplejersken med 12-timers vagten til entreprenøren, der bygger veje og broer. Behovene varierer, men der gælder det samme for dem alle: Fodtøjet skal passe til både fødderne og til det arbejde, der udføres!

Sika Footwear er en dansk virksomhed, som tog sine første spæde skridt i 1870. Ikke at alder i sig selv er lig med kvalitet, men det er svært at argumentere imod over 150 års indsigt og finpudsning. I dag bruger vi den viden til at udvikle vores egne produkter fra bunden samt udvælge og markedsføre de absolut bedste mærker på markedet.

Ja, vi ved en del om fodtøj hos Sika Footwear. Men for os er det lige så vigtigt at lytte til dem, der rent faktisk skal bruge skoene i dagligdagen. Derfor udvikler vi vores egne produkter i tæt samarbejde med brugerne, for det er i sidste ende deres mening, der tæller. Så uanset, om det betyder en ekstra skridhæmmende sål eller endnu bedre komfort, så går vi den ekstra mil. Fælles fodslag skaber nemlig de bedste resultater.

Vælger du Sika Footwear får du med andre ord hele pakken og er i øvrigt garanteret service lidt ud over det sædvanlige. Hurtig og sikker levering, kompetent rådgivning og salgsfremmende marketing-support er bare et par af de fordele der gør, at du kan være et skridt foran og sikre tilfredse kunder og medarbejdere!

In 1927, the textile company F. Engel was founded. Mr Carl J. Engel senior had just been on a visit to the USA where he noted the special denim clothing used by construction workers. He took inspiration from it and decided to introduce it in Denmark which is why he brought a pair of Bull Denim-overalls home from 'over there'​. This was the start of one of Denmark’s very first workwear manufacturers.

Subsequently, development speeded up. In 1964, F. Engel entered fashion business. At first, it was a series of men’s trousers called IN-CA, later the brand Easy Line and, in 1990, it was the purchase of the Sunwill brand.

The workwear production has also been developing rapidly with the purchase of the exclusive WorkZone workwear in 1996.

Mr Carl D. Engel’s very big leisure passion, hunting, resulted in 1985 in the founding of the exclusive hunting clothing Deerhunter.

Today, our group is divided in three strong and independent divisions: The workwear division, the men’s clothing division and the hunting & outdoor division. We are 120 employees in Denmark and we manufacture our products in our own dressmaker’s workrooms in Lithuania.

The textile group F. Engel is today run by the 4th generation of the family and the brand is stronger than ever. We can thank two things for this success. Our ability to constant development as well as a firm conviction to stand on our traditions on non-compromising high quality.

MUNTHE is a women’s luxury ready-to-wear label established in 1994 and based in Copenhagen.

The brand’s signature style represents the carefree attitude of the cool, casual Scandinavian girl; Beautiful suits that are strong but not unfeminine, floaty silhouette dresses, artistic hand-painted prints and a constant innovation in fabrics.

MUNTHE characterizes the Nordic style; It is clothes for women who work, run a family, go grocery shopping and navigate the streets by bicycle.

MUNTHE curates a fashion-tradition that extends beyond the wardrobe. It is all about buying into a lifestyle and appreciating shared values. Captivating cues from art, nature, music, photography and trends.

MUNTHE’s design is best known for its artistic hand-painted print, feminine silhouettes combined with contrasting characteristics, which are shown through six annual collections. With a predilection to unique details and well-executed ideas, MUNTHE has become synonymous with clothing that is made to be worn and loved in both relaxed and festive situations.

BB fiberbeton produces glassfibre reinforced concrete (GRC) elements for the construction industry. 

We have specialised in GRC for buildings in Denmark and abroad since 1984. We are a family-owned business with more than 80 employees - not too big for the small projects and not too small for the big projects.

We have a Danish, eco-friendly, and green production with low energy consumption. Glassfibre reinforced concrete is a new era concrete. It is a hard material with a dense surface and extreme durability of more than 100 years.

We are recognised as a "Full Member" of the International Glassfibre Reinforced Concrete Association (GRCA).

BPI  is an international food trading company with HQ in Denmark, and several Office Representations worldwide. 
BPI consist of different business divisions: Bulk Meat, Dairy Ingredients, Foodservice and Retail.

We offer a wide range of products within poultry, beef, pork, fish, lamb, cheese, vegetarian and vegan products, in own brands and private label brands.

We are a team of committed employees who strive every day, all year round, to offer our customers the right quality at competitive prices in a timely manner with the highest service level.
Our deals are based on competence and trust. We generate trust throughout the value chain, and nurture long-term partnerships in the food industry – both on the supplier and on the customer side.

The company is founded by Ole M. Hansen in 2003, today functioning as company CEO.

At PWT GROUP, we dress fashion-conscious men in quality clothing from our wholesale company PWT Brands and our two leading menswear chains Tøjeksperten and Wagner. With five well-known menswear brands, 146 stores in Denmark, Norway, and Sweden and attractive web shops. PWT Group has more than 375 employees and is owned by PWT Management and external investors. 
 
PWT Brands 
Our five strong brands are sold in stores and online by more than 650 independent retailers in over 20 countries. 
From our headquarter in Aalborg, PWT Brands markets Lindbergh, Jacks Sportswear Intl., JUNK de LUXE, Bison and Morgan in more than 20 countries through stores and web shops alike. 
 
Tøjeksperten 
With more than 110 stores, Tøjeksperten is Denmark’s largest menswear chain, providing quality clothing and strong brands from the PWT Brands portfolio and other external designers. We have several years of experience in working with clothing and fashion for men of all ages. The carefully selected products and brands reflect our ambition to maintain Tøjeksperten as the leading menswear chain in the medium price range. 
 
Wagner 
A growing and comprehensive store network in Scandinavia form the foundation of Wagner’s selection of menswear – ranging from trendy denim to classic fashion. Established in 1946, Wagner currently has 36 stores in Denmark, Sweden, and Norway. The chain offers an outstanding and affordable selection of contemporary fashion and strong brands including Lindbergh, JUNK de LUXE, Bison and Jacks Sportswear Intl. 
 
Working with us 
At PWT GROUP, our employees are the key to our success. We think and work as a team, and we take care of each other - so we can reach new heights. We are proud that our employees have chosen PWT Group as their workplace. 
 
Are you interested in a career within PWT Group´s menswear brands? 
We continuously update our LinkedIn with new positions. Read more at: www.pwt-group.com

Foodpeople ønsker at skabe en kompromisløs fødevarevirksomhed, der udfordrer den etablerede fødevarebranche. Vi ønsker en virksomhed, hvor stolte kulturer og en bærende passion for mad mødes. Vi mener, at man kan smage håndværket og den ærlige råvare. Vi repræsenterer en spændende, agile og sjov arbejdsplads. Foodpeople er en virksomhed i vækst og vi skal fremstå som en endnu stærkere, fleksibel og professionel samarbejdspartner for vores kunder. 

Vores udgangspunkt findes i italienske og danske håndværks- og gourmet traditioner – med udspring i vores Københavnske bagerkollektiv bestående af Il Fornaio, Trianon og Jalm&B. Il Fornaio er kompromisløst italiensk bagværk og fødevarer – Trianon klassisk dansk bagværk – og Jalm&B repræsenterer et nutidigt og urbant tvist på nordisk bagværk og fødevarer. 

Vi finder glæde i fællesskabet og den gode madoplevelse - og vi nyder at forkæle os selv og andre med udsøgte råvare og smagfuld mad. Vi er nysgerrige, tolerante og inspireres fra alle sider. Vi begejstres af at innovere og udvikle vores produkter, til den bedst mulige smagsoplevelse. Vi er ikke belærende, men elsker at dele vores passion, for at inspirere til rigere, bedre og smagfulde madoplevelser. Vi ønsker ganske enkelt, at alle kan opleve fornøjelsen af, at lave og spise god, sund og ærlig mad hver dag. 

www.foodpeople.dk
www.ilfornaio.dk
www.jalmogb.dk

NORDEX FOOD A/S is a privately owned dairy company with its base in the idyllic rural setting of Dronninglund, just 20 minutes'​ drive from Aalborg. We produce and sell dairy products focusing on white cheese and have our own manufacturing plants in Denmark, Austria, Romania and Wales as well as several international sales offices. Our annual turnover is around DKK 2.1 billion and we employ 400 staff, of which 80 work in our head office in Dronninglund.


NORDEX FOOD A/S, Nordre Ringgade 2, 9330 Dronninglund. Tel. 96 47 15 00.  export@nordex-food.dk / www.nordexfood.dk / www.taverna.dk

Labflex A/S is one of Europe's leading suppliers of innovative customised laboratory solutions to industrial and university laboratories and to the research and hospital sector. Labflex has been a trendsetter in laboratory design and functionality for more than 50 years.

Labflex is a reliable and quality-conscious cooperation partner in laboratory inventory solutions at local and international level. A common denominator for all of Labflex’ solutions is flexibility, customisation and user innovation. Labflex’ vision is to be a cooperation partner that sets new standards for functional customised solutions where pride of place is given to high safety and an impeccable working environment.

Labflex supplies custom-made turnkey laboratory solutions. Labflex offers consulting, project planning, concept development, project management and a wide, well-documented product range as well as installation, service and financing.
OrganiCup is now AllMatters. Changing everyday habits – we make sustainability doable. Small actions lead to big change 🌱 It AllMatters.

Jerslev Stilladsservice har mere end 30 års erfaring indenfor stilladsbranchen. Vi har konstant fokus på kvalitet og sikkerhed og er leveringsdygtige i alle former for stillads og byggepladsoptimering: 

Vi leverer og opstiller stilladser til alle former for industri og byggeri. 

Vi har afdelinger der leverer til/i/på:
- Region København
- Region Sjælland
- Fyn 
- Trekantområdet

• Murerstillads
• Facadestillads
• Rullestillads
• Industristillads
• Trappetårne
• Totalinddækninger

Hos Jerslev Stilladsservice er vi kundeorienterede og vores arbejde leveres altid til aftalte betingelser og konkurrencedygtige priser. 
Med veluddannede montører og en innovativ tankegang er vi en moderne virksomhed som altid er på forkant med udviklingen.

Du er altid velkommen til at ringe til vores døgnservice på tlf. 21 77 85 22 eller besøge vores hjemmeside stillads.dk, som du finder et link til nedenfor.

Invita er en af Danmarks førende leverandører af køkkener. Derudover producerer og sælger vi løsninger til bad, bryggers, garderobe, ligesom Invita leverer løsninger til husets øvrige rum.

Vores filosofi har fra starten været at levere personlige og individuelle løsninger frem for standardløsninger. Siden etableringen i 1974 har Invita leveret over 300.000 køkkenløsninger. Ikke to løsninger har været ens.

Invita er et dansk designet og dansk produceret produkt. Det er udviklet til at opfylde den moderne forbrugers ønsker og krav til individuel kvalitetsindretning. Vi er ordreproducerende og har således ikke elementer liggende på lager.

Vi har markedets bredeste sortiment. Det betyder, at vi sammen med kunden sammensætter det individuelle køkken ud fra tusindvis af muligheder.

Et væsentligt element i Invitas forretningsfilosofi er, at en køkkenløsning altid omfatter et besøg hjemme hos kunden for at skabe en personlig løsning til den enkelte kunde, og til det rum som køkkenet skal være en del af.

INTERSPORT Danmark er en frivillig kæde med butikkerne som aktionærer.Kæden består af knap 90 butikker fordelt over hele Danmark med omkring 700 medarbejdere. Kædens hovedkontor har adresse i Odense.

INTERSPORT Danmark A/S opstod via indkøbsorganisationen Dania Sport, som blev etableret i 1959 af en række danske sports- og campingbutikker og som i 1968 tilsluttede sig INTERSPORT Int. Corporation, der har hovedsæde i Bern, Schweiz. INTERSPORT er i dag verdens største sportskæde med mere end 5500 butikker i 44 lande.

Udover samarbejde med de velkendte brands som adidas, NIKE, hummel, reebok, PUMA m.fl., udvikler og sælger INTERSPORT en række egne mærker. F.eks. ENERGETICS, PRO TOUCH, Firefly, Tecno Pro og McKINLEY, som i dag er Europas største outdoor brand.

Vi tror på, at sport er for alle og det er vores mission 'to bring sport to the people'​ gennem et bredt og dybt sortiment, en høj grad af service og engagerede medarbejdere, der yder god og kompetent rådgivning.

Gumlink Confectionery Company offers a full-line, high-quality private label and private brand range of chewing gum, mints and other types of confectionery. The assortment comprises all the currently best-selling products in the market as well as pioneering innovations in all categories.

At +Halle we research, analyse and think carefully about how we put together, facilitate and create furniture that helps people get the most out of the environment they are in. The key to proceedings in our work is a shared vision of enjoyable and dynamic public landscapes with a clear sense of purpose.

We believe in challenging the composition of office environments and public spaces.

A day at work might have become less physical; yet, greater demands are made on for the surroundings to be evocative. Dwell time in public may have increased, and a range of diverse - both lively and quieter - areas are needed at all hours of the day.

We are knowledge driven, open and collaborative, this, to find new withstanding elements for both social time and private space. With advances in multidisciplinary research and collaborative design projects, we offer well-thought trough human settings, resulting in qualitative and functional improvements to any commercial or institutional space.

Our design philosophy is clear; resourcefulness matters to us. Which is why, we have a shared commitment to designing better public environments in every way. However, resources to us are not only about being rational. We improve the public realm by designing for humans, developing narrative tools, as opposed to static sedentary installations.

Our methods are immersive and include teams of researchers, experts and designers, who build scenarios, sets and urban fictions. Our furniture is made as configurations of public habits, continuously pushing the boundaries of what a piece of furniture—if seen as a consequential resource—could possibly deliver.

Soulland’s head designer, Silas Adler (b. 1985), founded Soulland in 2002 and what started as a small company specialized in print t-shirts has now grown into a well-established menswear brand represented in leading stores across the world. Soulland’s design esthetic is rooted in traditional Scandinavian craftsmanship and through great attention to the detailing of the clothes, classic menswear is reinterpreted with a present-day esthetic. This approach is recognizable in key Soulland items such as the Adler Fedora, which merges a classic fedora hat with a baseball cap.

Bodylab.dk is a privately owned company that manufactures and markets high quality nutrition products to professional athletes, fitness enthusiasts and other health conscious groups worldwide. 

Our company is not based on private labels and all products are manufactured at our own approved facility in Hadsund, Denmark – trust can’t be transferred. This enables us to have complete control over all aspects of production in order to produce high quality and great-tasting nutrition products.

All raw materials are carefully selected from leading manufacturers all around the world and every batch is tested for purity. We feel this is the only way to guarantee our customers the best possible products the industry offers. We absolutely refuse to compromise quality for profit! 

A large share of our annual turnover is each year invested in R&D in order to make sure that all products are up-to-date with the latest scientific findings. 

Our customers are our number one priority and you can be confident that from the moment raw materials arrive to the moment when finished products leave our facility the greatest possible care is taken in order to ensure that you only put the best into your body.
DANISH ENDURANCE is a sports and outdoor brand that creates their products in collaboration with world performance athletes, in order to bring your endurance to the next level.

Lædervarer har været  Neye's speciale siden 1881.
 
NEYE kæden blev grundlagt af Johannes Neye den 5. oktober 1881. Han åbnede som 24 årig en galanterihandel i Vimmelskaftet, København. Her ligger NEYEs hovedkontor stadig. 
 
I dag ejes kæden af NEYE Fonden, der har som formål at drive butikkerne - og igennem sit overskud at støtte sygdomsbekæmpende forskning. NEYE Fonden har støttet cancer forskning med mere end 20 millioner kroner gennem årene.

”De penge, der indtjenes i lædervarefirmaet NEYE, skal komme det samfund til gode, i hvilket pengene er tjent” 
NEYE-FONDENS vedtægter

Danmarks nye fødevarehus for styrkelse af innovation, forretningsudvikling og vækst.

Food Innovation House er en triple helix innovationslegeplads på 3.000 m2 hvor store og små fødevarevirksomheder kan samarbejde med vidensinstitutioner og det offentlige for fremme af velsmagende, bæredygtige og sundere fødevarer for vækst, jobskabelse og eksport.

Huset åbnede officielt 7. juni 2018 og er placeret i Dandy Business Park i Vejle Nord, tæt ved E45 motorvejen og forventes at have 5.000 besøgende per år til konferencer, workshops, minimesser, foredrag, innovationsprojekter o.m.m. og daglig plads til 150 vidensmedarbejdere.

Huset er indrettet med fælles udviklingskøkken, udviklingsbageri, demo-supermarked, demo-restaurant, taste lab, foto-/filmstudie, udstillingsområde, kantine, konference- og mødelokaler samt erhvervslejemål til små og mellemstore virksomheder og tilbyder match making, fx i forhold til samarbejdspartnere, mentorer og investorer – samt hjælp til scale-up – ligesom huset vil arrangere aktiviteter og innovationsprojekter i tæt samarbejde med vores partnere.

WE ARE DENVER A/S
Denver A/S manufactures and sells Denver, a mass-market consumer electronics brand with over 400 products. Our large catalogue means one-stop shopping for retailers, we have worked with top European retailers since 1990, so you get an experienced and stable partner. 
 
We work directly with retail buyers and purchasing departments.
Our focus is on producing affordable electronics with the right design and performance at the right price. We can even provide customized and private-label consumer electronics for your retail brand.
From smartphones, to televisions, to home security, photo and video equipment, E-mobility, and much more - we have years of experience with consumer electronics, and our product portfolio is continuously expanding.
Whether it is work, play, entertainment, staying fit, staying safe or staying in touch, Denver can meet the need.

WHERE ARE WE
Main office is in Soeften/Hinnerup, Denmark, and we have subsidiaries  in Hong Kong, in Passau, Germany (also responsible for Austria), in Woerden, The Netherlands. (which also includes countries Belgium & Luxembourg) in Valencia, Spain, and in Warzaw, Poland.

MORE FOR THE MONEY
We manufacture quality products that lives up to consumer needs – without the big brand-name price. We can produce products with the highest possible quality and lowest prices

AFTER SALES SUPPORT
We provide a locally-based after sales service concept. This means that your customers can get telephone support, service home visits, direct exchange programs or repairs based on their needs and your business requirements 

SAFETY AND PEACE OF MIND
All Denver products comply with the highest EU safety and quality certifications and standard. And all of our products are covered by a two-year warranty and a local, after-sales service concept

Where our products perform: 
Anywhere and everywhere that uncompromising cleanliness is the overarching requirement. Typical market types that appreciate our producys include: food and beverage processing, food handlers, service sector and retail outlets, pharmaceutical and medical manufacturers, hospitals, municipal cleaning, contract cleaners etc.

BKI foods er et velkonsolideret familieejet selskab med en stærk kultur. Kontinuerlige investeringer har sikret BKI foods en markant konkurrencekraft og et solidt økonomisk fundament. BKI foods rummer i dag en række kendte kvalitetsbrands og beskæftiger 150 dygtige og engagerede medarbejdere.

BKI Kaffe a/s har siden opstarten i 1960 leveret kvalitetskaffe til de danske forbrugere. Stifteren af BKI Kaffe, Svend Mathiesen, blev under sit lange ophold i Brasilien, inspireret til at starte virksomheden ”Brasil Kaffe Import”. Virksomheden er sidenhen vokset støt således, at vi i dag er den største kaffeleverandør til det kaffeglade Danmark – hertil kommer en stærkt voksende eksport.

Vi rister og pakker i dag kaffer fra hele verden, på vores højteknologiske fabrik i Højbjerg ved Aarhus. BKI er i dag, blandt de største aktører på kaffemarkedet, det eneste 100 % danskejede kaffefirma, med salg til detail- og foodservicesektoren og med produktion i Danmark. 

Vi forhandler i dag, foruden kaffe også andre fødevarer bl.a. Lindt chokolade, De Cecco pasta og olivenolier samt mange andre specialiteter til specialhandlen. Derfor besluttede vi i 2008, at ændre vores navn til BKI foods, som vi anser for mere retvisende for vores virksomheds aktiviteter.

Men kaffen alle ka’ li´ - hedder stadig BKI.

For 45 years, uno form has embodied innovative and uncompromising Danish kitchen design. A uno form kitchen is your guarantee of the finest joinery created by passionate craftsmen of long-standing tradition.

uno form was originally developed by the ingenious visionary Arne Munch, who in 1968 designed the very first uno form kitchen. The kitchen offered a radical alternative to the inflexible, heavily crafted kitchens of the time, which allowed neither freedom nor originality in terms of kitchen layout. From the basement of his home in Lyngby, Arne Munch created an entirely new kitchen concept, whose simple ingenious design revolutionised kitchens.

Arne Munch was inspired by the attractive and original cabinet furniture of the time and insisted on incorporating this same elegance and high quality into his kitchen design. With this in mind, he created the uno form kitchen with its characteristic slotted fronts, which have made uno form a genuine Danish design classic and one which has retained its originality for 45 years. With the refined slotted design, Arne Munch also introduced the handle-free kitchen, a revolution that highlighted both functionality and aesthetics.

NASSAU har siden 1970 produceret industriporte af højeste kvalitet. De mange års erfaring gør at NASSAU i dag tilbyder kvalitet i alle led. Alt lige fra teknisk assistance i planlægningsfasen, kvalitetskontrol i produktionen, montage udført af højt kvalificerede montører og løbende support, service og vedligeholdelse af portene, sikrer kunden den optimale oplevelse igennem hele portens levetid. Efter stor forespørgsel fra arkitekter er NASSAU også begyndt at producere NASSAU Garageporte til private i samme gode kvalitet.

Produktion i Danmark
NASSAU's hovedkontor og produktion ligger i Ringe på Fyn. Herfra administreres salget til Danmark samt eksportkoordineringen til virksomhedens respektive datterselskaber og forhandlere i hele verden. NASSAU er stærkt repræsenteret i Europa gennem datterselskaber i Norge, Sverige, Holland og Belgien. Derudover forhandles NASSAU’s produkter af et netværk af forhandlere i Europa’s øvrige lande, i mellemøsten og i Asien. I alt beskæftiger NASSAU Door A/S ca. 400 medarbejdere. Over 75% af den totale produktion bliver eksporteret til mere end 30 lande.
http://www.nassau.dk

Livsstil, kvalitet og design. Det er hjertet i Sinnerup og har været det siden Poul Sinnerup åbnede sin første butik i Holstebro i 1971. 
Selvom det er længe siden de første forventningsfulde kunder trådte ind i butikken, er konceptet det samme som dengang.

Vi har altid tid til dig.

BROEN-LAB solutions are used by professional users in many kinds of laboratories, from the education and health sectors to industry in general. BROEN-LAB’s products are already an integrated part of many workplaces. From fittings for purified water, nitrogen, vacuum and compressed air, to the control and regulation of pure gases in critical applications such as a gas chromatography and spectrometry.

BROEN-LAB has developed BROEN-LAB UniFlex – a solution package to fulfill the requirements of the ever changing and demanding laboratory environment. It provides unique flexibility for installers, OEM-customer as well as end-users. BROEN-LAB UniFlex is the right choice when there is need to adapt to external changes such as furniture design, trends, technical requirements, directives, etc. 

BROEN-LAB is also a world leader in the supply of emergency showers, eye washers and safety equipment to professional laboratories, the education sector and industrial workplaces. Our complete solutions are designed and developed for dynamic workplaces, and the system is modular so that transport and installation are as simple as possible.

Beauté Pacifique er dansk hudpleje, der virker effektivt på både aldersforandringer og solskader.

Vores specielle koncept med dokumentation af produkternes virkning på kundernes egen hud, er slået så godt an, at Beauté Pacifique nu sælges i lande i alle fem verdensdele.

I Beauté Pacifique stræber vi efter at nå ud til så mange kunder som muligt i hele verden, men også fremover vil vi drive vores virksomheder fra vores faste adresser i Danmark.
Enorm udvikler og producerer fødevarer med insekter - en bæredygtig kilde til animalsk protein. Det skal være nemt og lækkert at få en bid af fremtiden og dele den gode historie med vennerne.

Siden 2003 har Unidrain revolutioneret gulvafløbssystemet og er i dag et stilrent designikon i det moderne badeværelse. 

Unidrain er byggebranchens foretrukne og tilbyder endeløse muligheder – uanset om du ønsker det klassiske linjeafløb, en unik afløbsløsning, som kun findes i dit badeværelse eller udstyr fra produktserierne GlassLine og Reframe Collection.

Alle Unidrain-produkter er udviklet af danske arkitekter og designere i tæt samarbejde med eksperter i vådrumsteknik. Besøg vores hjemmeside for yderligere information og inspiration.

Strøjer Tegl er et af Danmarks mest moderne og innovative teglværker. Vores succes bygger på en kompromisløs holdning til høj kvalitet i alle aspekter af vores teglproduktion. Ikke bare når det gælder fremstillingen af mursten og fliser, også når vi løbende agerer udviklings- og sparringspartner for landets dygtige entreprenører og arkitekter i vores udviklingsafdeling Brick_Lab.
Brick_Lab er Strøjer Tegls inspirations- og udviklingsværksted. Her kan arkitekter og bygherrer få sparring og rådgivning på højt plan og deltage i innovationsprojekter og produktudvikling. 

Diversity
3D-baserede teglfacader, der er skabt af robotteknologi, er den nye satsning hos Strøjer Tegl. Formen på tegl kan være andet og mere end en rektangulær byggeklods. I et krydsfelt af arkitektur og kunst kan vi nu arbejde med nye dimensioner, hvor struktur og dybde giver en levende overflade med spil og forskelligartet udtryk.

En stor kapacitet på markedet
Kapacitetsmæssigt kan vi producere mere end 45 mio. mursten fordelt på både maskinsten (hulsten) og blødstrøgne sten i mange varianter samt specialsten, spændarmerede overliggere og teglbjælker samt kirketegl og TerraCotta-fliser. 

Med 40.000 m2 produktion under tag kan vi opretholde en stabil produktion hen over hele året - også i de måneder, hvor vejret i Danmark sætter ind med regn og sne. Det giver os de bedste styringsmæssige betingelser, så vi kan i møde stort set alle leveringskrav.

Om selskabet            
Strøjer Tegl A/S er en del af Vedstaarup Gruppen, som udover består af yderligere 2 selskaber: Strøjer Ler A/S og Strøjer Samlingen A/S. Fælles for alle selskaber er, at de ejes af Vedstaarup Holding ApS, hvis anparter besiddes af familien Strøjer Hansen.

At DAVA Foods, we are all about eggs. We are Scandinavian market leader in the egg business and handle approx. 2.0 billion eggs a year. The group processes, wraps and distributes fresh eggs and a variety of cooked and pasteurised egg products, boiled eggs and egg-based convenience products.

We are a leading egg producer when it comes to food safety, animal welfare and innovation. Quality and food safety are crucial concepts in our HACCP quality management system.

Einar Willumsen is a modern mid-sized international flavour house with own in-house analytics, flavour creation, and production facilities for flavourings and compounds. We employ around 100 people and sell our products primarily in Europe, Middle East and Asia. The company was founded by Einar Willumsen in 1901, and our Swedish subsidiary was founded in 1904. Today, the majority shareholder of the company is a foundation, which ensures a long term commitment to the marketplace and donates part of the profit to medical research.
Our mission is to help our customers develop and market exciting and innovative new taste experiences for consumers. We use nature’s own recipes as inspiration for creating new exiting tastes. We base most of our flavourings on own extracts and distillates. In our beverage compounds we supplement with juice, wine, active ingredients, colours, cloudifiers etc. 
We use insight from the Nordic food tradition and harness global trends to transform today’s international concepts into tomorrow’s exciting local food and beverages.
We live our strong Nordic values on a daily basis, and we believe in openness, honesty and effectiveness. We work in an informal atmosphere with short decision processes. We are convinced that true partnership generates true value for both parties. 
Our signature values are: Speed, taste, flexibility, reliability and innovation
Our core competencies are: Flavour creation, analytics and applications – primarily beverages, dairy, confectionery, bakery (but also: Sauces, soups, marinades, dressing, jams, fruit preparations, brines, pickles, snuff, mouthwash, toothpaste, chewing gum etc.) 
Einar Willumsen is an agile company. We are a living example that “less is more” and we demonstrate on a daily basis how to deliver true value to our partners by combining the knowledge of our dedicated local and international specialists, with our own core competencies to benefit our partners and enhance the value creation.

Kvalitet − Hele vejen igennem − har altid været hovedfokus for HORN.
Men hvad er ”HORN kvalitet” og hvad mener vi, når vi siger ”Hele vejen igennem”?

I branchen er kvalitetsbegrebet i mange år blevet defineret som: Pris, leveringstid og det at have et bredt produktprogram.
Det efterlever vi stadig, men vi har også udfordret os selv med spørgsmålet: Kan vi ikke mere end det?

Det både kan og vil vi.


HORN ønsker at gentænke kvalitetsbegrebet. Dette gør vi gennem grundige overvejelser om vores rødder, CSR profil, værdisæt, indhentning af certificerede produkter, læring, uddannelse & vidensdeling, løbende udvikling og innovation der sikrer optimal materiale udnyttelser og hertil selvfølgelig en effektiv produktion og overholdelse af internationalt gældende love og reguleringer.
