Tomex was founded by Tom Andersen In 1988. Since then, Tomex has evolved into a global wholesaler with headquarters in Aalborg, Denmark, and approx. 80 employees around the entire world. Tomex establishes the essential connections on the global market for primary food products and makes it just as easy to do business globally as locally.

Today, Tomex boasts a net turnover of more than DKK 1.5 billion and has decentralised sales offices in Denmark, Sweden, Poland, Hungary, Spain, China, USA, Argentina, Columbia, Serbia, Dominican Republic and Vietnam. With the aim of being close to our customers and maintaining our global reach, we plan to expand our presence outside Denmark even further.

Our services involve international trade with a wide range of both fresh and frozen foodstuff including meat, poultry, seafood, dairy and vegetables, and we strive to ensure that each of our business dealings match the customers’ expectations as well as the high standards of Tomex.

Vi går forrest med de nyeste energirigtige LED-løsninger. Vi er en dansk virksomhed, der har udviklet en revolutionerende patenteret LED-teknologi, som er en helt ny måde at tænke belysning på. 

I stedet for at smide eksisterende lysarmaturer ud, fordi de er for dyre i drift eller for dårlige, opgraderer vi dine gamle armaturer med vores teknologi, der omdanner armaturet til LED. 

Du slipper for at skifte hele lysarmaturet ud, du sparer på din fremtidige elregning og samtidig passer du godt på miljøet. Det synes vi, er sund fornuft.

Passion for vin siden 1875.

Kjær & Sommerfeldt er grundlagt i 1875 af Charles Christian Kjær og Wilhelm Ferdinand Sommerfeldt, siden 1928 med hovedsæde på Gl. Mønt 4. 

 I 2008 blev Kjær & Sommerfeldt igen et privatejet selskab, da Adm. Direktør Mads Stensgaard sammen med 2 eksterne investorer og ledende medarbejdere købte K&S. 

Kjær & Sommerfeldt er en dynamisk og kundeorienteret virksomhed, hvor mere end 130 års erfaring kombineret med høje krav til kvalitet og service har skabt stor tillid hos både leverandører og kunder. Vi er en af landets mest betydningsfulde leverandører til hotel & restaurations-sektoren og erhvervslivet, og vi leverer vin til mere end 1.200 virksomheder og 1.500 hoteller, restauranter og caféer.

Kjær & Sommerfeldt beskæftiger i dag 40 personer, heraf 25 i salg og marketing, som er fordelt på det kommercielle hovedkontor på Gl. Mønt, og i en moderne business support med domicil i Odense. 

Kjær & Sommerfeldt åbnede 22. november 2013 vinværksted og showroom i Århus, og 1. maj 2014 flyttede Business Support til nye og større lokaler i Odense.

Vi har beskæftiget os med kaffeløsninger til det professionelle marked i mere end 50 år. Over 7.000 virksomheder, institutioner, caféer, restauranter og hoteller har valgt os som partner. Vores styrke er kvalitet og service - Vi håndtere selv hele værdikæden fra grønne bønner, ristning, levering med egne salgschauffører og et komplet dækkende maskin/Automatprogram og en landsdækkende serviceorganistation. Kort sagt: Svaret på dine bønner...

SAYKSKY is a young award winning sportswear brand with a mission to create premium performance sportswear with an urban and casual attitude.

SAYSKY is currently sold in specialized running and triathlon shops in 7 countries.

Quooker Skandinavien a/s er en selvstændig virksomhed, der har eneretten på distribution af Quooker i hele Skandinavien med et distributionsnet på 850 detailforhandlere. Vi er en fleksibel organisation på ca. 50 medarbejdere, hvor der er højt til loftet og plads til at udfolde sit fulde potentiale. Men vi er også en ejerledet virksomhed, der stiller store krav til kvalitet og kreativitet i alt, hvad vi foretager os. Det er årsagen til, at vi fortsætter vor vækst, mens det meste af branchen oplever det modsatte. Vi har en klar ambition om at sælge det bedste produkt – og være den bedste samarbejdspartner for vores kunder. Intet mindre.

Markberg is the title of a true love story. A love for creating, for making a difference and for each other.

The brand name is representing the founders, Mette Astrup (MA) and Rune Klemmensen (RK) – a couple both professionally and privately.

We believe in quality in products. Things, which will stay with you for many years. Beautiful items you don´t just throw away.
We always mix business with pleasure! Not only in our way of working, but also in the products. All Markberg items have a contemporary look as well as thought-through functional details. You may fall in love with the design of an item, but the functionality will determine if you love it for life.
We never compromise. It is simply not in our nature!

Welcome to our world.

Hos Phønix Tag Materialer A/S sætter vi en ære i at forsyne forskellige aktører i byggebranchen med gennemtestede kvalitetsprodukter, der hjælper med at holde Danmarks tage tætte.

Vi både sælger og producerer tagpap og sikrer gennem løbende kontrol og optimering, at produkterne altid lever op til gældende standarder.

Social Foodies er en værdidrevet virksomhed. Vores mission er at forbedre fødevaresystemer en råvare af gangen.  I 7 cafebutikker, webshop og på flødebollekursus, kan du med god samvittighed nyde en smagsoplevelse med frisklavet is, kaffe, flødeboller, snackbarer, chufaboller, cookies, chokolader og andre håndlavede søde sager. Alle de velsmagende produkter er fremstillet med råvarer, der så vidt muligt dyrkes og forarbejdes i Afrika. Dermed skabes gode jobs, som muliggør forbedrede levevilkår for småbønder, lønmodtagere og deres familier.

Find webshop og din nærmeste butik på socialfoodies.dk

Since 1950 Sika Design has created handmade furniture with comfort, quality and sustainability as our main requirements for the design and the manufacturing process. Our wicker furniture are handed down through generations, and world- wide several hotels, restaurants and cruise ships are furnished with furniture from Sika-Design.

All sales, administration and logistics are handled from our headquarters in Rynkeby, Funen, where our warehouse is shared with our sister company.

Hos Orskov Foods dyrker vi danske æbler og pærer, som vi avler lokalt ved Oure på Fyn. Dertil køber vi danske æbler og pærer hos lokale avlere, som vi sælger til fødevarehandlen. Derudover presser vi dansk æblemost på eget mosteri i Ørbæk, som vi sælger til både detail og industri. Vores største forretningsområde er dog vores køb af frugt og bær, som vi fryser ind og sælger til den danske og udenlandske fødevareindustri.

Orskov Foods' largest business area is fruit and berries, which we process, freeze and sell to the global food industry. However, we also grow local Danish apples and pears in our plant at Oure on Funen and buy fruits from local growers, which we sell to retail. In addition, we press Danish apple juice in our own cider mill in Ørbæk, Denmark, and sell it both to retail and industry.

Eurofins compliant products for a safer world

Eurofins provides high standard quality assurance and control services, such as testing, certification, inspection, audits, technical and regulatory services, worldwide, to:

- Manufacturers,
- Brand owners,
- Distributors and trading companies
- Buying associations
- Consumer associations,
- Retailers…

Local focus, the key to success in global markets

Eurofins’ competence centers in the various countries provide the local expertise in their specific field to our international laboratory network, contributing to our “global offer”.

Such an approach allows us to create close partnerships with clients, offering a one-stop, customized and seamless service.

Vores løsninger bygger på både erfaring og dokumentation og er udviklet i samarbejde med arkitekter og bygherrer.

Vi arbejder ud fra bæredygtige principper som design-til-adskillelse, og vores løsninger er dokumenterede med materialepas.
I vores tilgang til både samarbejdspartnere og hinanden er vi ordentlige, fremsynede og løsningsorienterede - fordi førstehåndsindtrykket varer ved.

KOMPROMISLØS ØKOLOGISK KVALITET
I dag virker det uforståeligt, men da Thise Mejeri bliver grundlagt i 1988, er der ingen der tør satse på økologi. Hverken politikere, butikker eller mejeriselskaberne.

Alligevel sætter syv naive øko-idealister sig omkring et spisebord en sen aften i Nordvestjylland, og beslutter sig sammen med en mejeribestyrer fra et mindre landsbymejeri, for at starte Thise Mejeri.

For de otte omkring bordet handler det om to ting: Selvstændighed og økologi. At de som herrer i eget hus endelig kan udleve drømmen og drive økologiske landbrug og producere økologiske mejeriprodukter af fineste kvalitet. Også selvom Danmark måske ikke er klar til det.

Eventyrsport startede i et lille butik i et 46 m2 stort kælderlokale i midten af Århus. Navnet på butikken var på dette tidspunkt ikke Eventyrsport men Toursport, og vi havde kun åbnet fra kl. 13 til 17. Men stille og roligt blev åbningstiden udvidet, og inden længe kørte butikken på fuld tid. Derfor tog vi i 1998 et stort skridt, ud af kælderen og ind i en ny og mere professionel butik.

Snart var vi atter på udkig efter mere plads. Men intet virkelig passende dukkede op - indtil en dag ... En smuk butik i det gamle shopping område, kendt som latinerkvarteret, i midten af Århus var blevet ledigt. Denne forretning var det bedste, vi havde set hidtil, men desværre var lokalet ikke meget større end den nuværende Toursport. Og derfor besluttede vi os for at åbne en ny butik med mere fokus på beklædning og fodtøj end tidligere. Navnet på den nye butik blev: "Eventyrsport"​. 

Navnet er sammensat af ’Eventyr’ og ’sport’. Ordet 'sport'​ understreger et element af at være aktive samtidig med at man nyder sine egne personlige eventyr - rejser, vandreture, skiløb, og har det sjovt. Vi fandt det var et passende navn til en ny outdoor-butik i Danmark. 

I dag har vi 10 butikker - og forhåbentlig er vores eventyr først lige begyndt. Det tror vi det er, for vores engagement fra begyndelsen - kvalitet og service, kvalitetsprodukter og gode priser - har virket indtil videre, så det har vi ikke tænkt os at lave om.

Beirholm competes in the global flat linen market. We develop, design, source and sell textiles to rental laundry chains and individual rental laundries in the linen rental industry. We bridge the gaps and develop synergies between four distinct industries – the textile manufacturers, our rental laundry customers, the customers of the rental laundries, e.g., hotels, restaurants, hospitals, and rest homes, and the consumers who actually experience and enjoy the textiles in use.

We see ourselves in a unique role at the center of a commercial “galaxy.” It is a challenging role. It requires long-lasting collaboration across industrial, national, and cultural borders. We synchronize customer and market demands, technologies, logistics, and pricing in order to achieve the best possible results for our rental laundry customers. 

We select our partners with care, and we perceive them as our value creation network – independent partners who work together to optimize the opportunities in a complex business system.  

We interweave knowledge across industries to meet specific production, purchasing, laundering, and marketing challenges, and we work closely with the experts within each business partner organization. 

Our only real company asset is the people in our organization, the knowledge they possess, and their ability to apply it effectively every day.

2-Connect ApS is a Danish furniture trading company, merging Scandinavian design with premium craftsmanship resulting in a well-balanced blend of quality furniture and highly competitive prices benefitting customers and partners all over the world. Our product range includes Indoor & Outdoor furniture, Bathrooms and Accessories.

We make our product development in Denmark, in close cooperation with our customers. We travel to fairs in Europe and Asia, to get inspiration, most of the times together with our customers. We buy in the part of the world with best competences in specific product areas; therefore, we have partners in both Vietnam, China, Taiwan, Brazil and Baltic states. The diversity of competencies at these markets enables us to supply a broad range of products in many different materials.

We have our own, strong setup, with 2-Connect QC staff in both Vietnam, China, Brazil and the Baltic States securing a high and consistent quality level, firmly kept delivery schedules and developing new business opportunities in short time. We keep daily, personal presence at our suppliers’ premises, monitoring production schedules and securing agreed quality of the products.

In 2-Connect ApS right quality and timely delivery is greatly prioritized.

Visit our website for more information:
www.2-Connect.dk

H.J.Hansen Wine Ltd. is founded in 1829 and still family owned (Danish family) which is quite unusal in the wine business today. We are regarded as one of the leading wine retailers if not THE leading wine retailer in Denmark when it comes to quality wines. Experience and tradition play a main role in this more than 180 year old success story, although foresight and vision are cast for support. 
Through the years, the key words have remained the same: QUALITY, CHOICE AND SERVICE.
We import wines from all over the world through very close contacts/ relationships with a very well developed producer network with the very best wines from f.ex. France, Italy, Spain, Chile, Argentina, the US, South Africa, Australia and New Zealand.
We supply the hotel, restaurant and catering sector as well as the business-to-business sector and private customers. Private customers are mainly supplied through our own two H.J. Hansen shops in Odense and Copenhagen and through the voluntary shop chain Vinspecialisten where we have more than 50 shops all over Denmark.

Philipson Wine is a dynamic 30 years old company, which in a very short time has become the leading importer of quality wines from all over the world and Bordeaux Cru Classéfrom France.
In 1987 Christian Philipson started Philipson Wine after having worked 5 years in Burgundy and made his first contacts in the Wine World
In 1992 Philipson Wine introduced mail order sales which made it possible to remove costly intermediaries and establish direct sales to consumers
Since 2002 Philipson Wine has sold wine online and is today Denmark’s leading online wine distributor.

Nordic Seafood is one of Europe’s leading distributors of top-quality fish and shellfish from the whole world. It was founded in 1988 and is today part of the Nissui group. As importer and distributor we stay ahead/take the lead in terms of quality, dependability of deliveries and price. To ensure safety - from catch to delivery – we have our own quality control department.
Nordic Seafood actively supports sustainability in the seafood industry through the international non-profit organizations Marine Stewardship Council (MSC) and Aquaculture Stewardship Council (ASC).

companyName: Danitacom - ”Italian Chamber of Commerce in Denmark”
description:
The Italian Chamber of Commerce in Denmark has its headquarter in Copenhagen. 

The Chamber was founded in 2010  with the mission to increase trade between Italy and Denmark, and to support the development of business activities for those Italian companies that are interested to move into the Danish market. Since its establishment, the Chamber has developed many structured projects always with the purpose to boost trade between the two markets and to promote the Made in Italy-brand in Scandinavia. The Association has offered different services to numerous Italian companies that were interested to approach for the first time the Scandinavian market or to consolidate their position in Northern Europe. At the same time, the Chamber has supported Danish companies interested into the Italian market, thanks to translation activities, legal and commercial assistance.

In November 2013 the Chamber has been granted the full membership to the Association Assocamerestero, which represents the major network for the Italian Chamber of Commerce in the whole world, and in 2015 it was fully recognized by the Italian Ministry for Economic Development. Since its constitution, over 500 Italian companies and 700 Scandinavian companies took part in the Chamber's activities in order to support and to establish new trade flows between Italy and Denmark. 90% of these companies are small or medium enterprises, and most of them are family-owned.

Magnus Olesen A/S, founded in 1937, is a well-reputed and highly quality conscious furniture company, developing and manufacturing design furniture.

The furniture is sold in the contract market - to private and public companies, where it is used in conference rooms, canteens, auditoriums, lobbies and waiting areas - in i.a. airports, hospitals, schools and universities as well as in many other institutions with exceptionally high demands for quality, both with regards to durability and function.

In cooperation with leading designers the ambition is to create unique products, meeting the users'​ needs and wishes and at the same time making a difference, visibly and elegantly. The result is an expressive and flexible design range with independent product series, making it possible to find solutions for all interior design purposes, small or large, in a coherent concept.

OUR VALUES:
Credibility, quality and innovation are our core values at Magnus Olesen A/S though out the entire value chain. 

OUR MISSION:
To create original and high-quality designer furniture, matching the needs and demands of our customers.

Hans Just A/S is a  company of dedicated people working with premium brands. Established in Denmark in 1867, today Hans Just A/S is part of Hans Just Group that also consists of Nigab AB in Sweden, Robert Prizelius AS in Norway, Beverage Partners Finland OY and BJC Distribution Z O.O. in Poland.

Hans Just Group holds the position as the leading independent, privately owned distributor of spirits and wine in the Nordic. We also have our own warehouse facilities at Trans-Alko, centrally located in the Copenhagen area. We can offer delivery in Denmark within 24 hours, and within 48 hours to the rest of the Nordic countries.

The Hans Just A/S head office is located in Copenhagen in a ten floor, red brick building from 1917 near the harbour. Originally serving as a warehouse, the building is now an attractive office facility and you will find us on the two top floors.

Eico A/S is a supplier of quality products for kitchen and bath. 
Today many homes are equipped with the hoods, taps and sinks from the company - sold under EICO brand – as well as the factory´s own brands. 
 

EICO represents key European manufacturers, and for example the company was first to introduce the special Elica wire hanging cooker hood throughout Scandinavia. 

Eico operates in Denmark, Norway and Sweden through a wide distribution network of professional kitchen suppliers and manufacturers. 
 

Eico has been in the market for 37 years and therefore has extensive knowledge about markets and trends.
We aim to bring the right products to the market – offering our services to both customers and suppliers.

We hold a AAA credit rating.

We believe in extraordinary furniture with history, passion and a love of great craftsmanship. 

"Furniture since 1916"​.

A Part of Design Concept Denmark.

Bactoforce has a long and successful history within the field of inspecting tanks, spray dryers, pasteurizers, heat exchangers, pipes and other installations for global companies in the food industry.

Bactoforce is the preferred supplier for a number of leading food manufacturers in Europe. With more than 10.000 inspections annually, an ISO9001 certification and a dynamic training program for our employees, 

Bactoforce provides the necessary experience and competence to meet all our customers'​ needs and comply with the strictest criteria. 

Do not hesitate to contact us and lets us help you secure that your equipment is hygienic and safe 
+45 86 80 63 20 or bactoforce@bactoforce.com

“We're on a mission to change the social norm around drinking. By providing a sophisticated, alcohol free alternative, we include the people who doesn’t want to drink or simply wish to limit their intake in social gatherings, where alcohol typically is the focal point.” – Morten Sørensen, founder

Our award-winning Mixology range includes GinISH and RumISH, made from natural botanicals to create the familiar flavor and perfect punch. RumISH is currently the world's most awarded alc-free spirit.

Our Ready-to-Drink range makes it even easier to be a mindful drinker. SpritzISH and GinISH & Tonic er also made from natural botanicals and with a low calorie count, they are the perfect go-to for the mindful drinker.

Airofit is a Danish developed training system, tailored to athletes who expect more from their performance. 

The original device was created for asthma and COPD patients. Since then, the breathing trainer has been developed to improve the breathing of athletes and be a tool to assist the athlete in his or her ambition for greatness. 

So, how does it work? 
The Airofit device is connected to an app that measures your results and improvements after each breathing session. In the app, there are multiple programs which all focus on different areas of your breathing. Each session results in a different benefit that takes you to a higher level of performance.  

Having different training programs gives you the freedom to improve and focus on the areas, that are the most important for you. The goal is to train your respiratory system overall, as having a thorough knowledge of how this works and obtaining a powerful breathing helps your overall performance.

PLACE • FOR • MORE
Karup Design is all about living. About making room for more. In less space. Karup Design products are perfect for small and unconventional spaces and homes. Versatile. Functional. Beautiful. All products can find their way to living rooms, bedrooms, teenage rooms, guest bedrooms, and summer houses alike.

ABRA • CA • DABRA
Each product from Karup Design is actually … two products from Karup Design. Or, in some cases, even three. And what’s more, getting from product A to B or C (and back) is surprisingly intuitive and easy. Almost like magic. This kind of multifunctional design thinking has been part of company DNA since the earliest days in 1972. With the simple purpose of making room for more. In less space. 3 is the magic number. In an example, the Karup Design products may all be defined in just three words by their properties and functions. Like: Sleep . Roll . Sit

SPACE • MADE • EASY
The multifunctional and Scandinavian design that encapsulates the Karup Design brand appeals to a wide range of consumers. All products can find their way to living rooms, bedrooms, teenage rooms, guest bedrooms, and summer houses alike. Moreover, the space-making magic featured in every piece of furniture from Karup Design mirrors the downsizing trend that arises from urbanization. From more people living in less space.

companyName: Stadsing A/S - Clean Knowledge. Safe Solutions.
description:
Stadsing A/S - professional cleaning and safety solutions wordwide

Stadsing A/S has 60 years of experience in providing professional cleaning solutions to our customers worldwide. 

The company was established in 1956 by Olf Stadsing who initially developed cleaning detergents in his basement. Over the years, Stadsing A/S has grown into being one of the most important and distinguished companies both in Denmark and abroad within the cleaning business. 

At present, Stadsing A/S is run by the founders two sons. Karsten Stadsing is in charge of the company's business in Denmark and Henrik Stadsing is responsible for the worldwide export division of the company. At present, we export to more than 28 countries worldwide.

Stadsing A/S is well-known for trade, production and stock-keeping of cleaning detergents, cleaning articles and cleaning machines. Our objective is to offer professional cleaning solutions in which our competences, knowledge and skills are able to strengthen and improve our customers'​ cleaning efficiency and quality. When buying your cleaning articles at Stadsing A/S, you are not only buying products but also solutions and professional cleaning advice. 

During all phases of finding the right cleaning solution, we take pride in coming to one conclusion: satisfaction for all parties involved.

Palsgaard Spær har samlet langt over 100 års erfaring med træ, og vi er stolte af at give vores viden og kompetencer indenfor spærkonstruktioner videre til dig som kunde - fra projektets start til slut. 

Hos Palsgaard Spær følger vi markedet tæt, og vi agerer som en moderne og innovativ virksomhed - trods vores lange historie i markedet. Vi stræber til enhver tid efter at være på forkant med udviklingen og give vores bidrag til ny- og videreudvikling af de produkter, vores kunder efterspørger. 

Palsgaard Spær ved at prisen er vigtig. Vores medarbejdere uddannes i at tænke totaløkonomiske fordelagtige løsninger for kunden, men vi ved af erfaring også, at der er så meget andet der vægter lige så tungt. Nemlig alt det, der giver dig som kunde sikkerhed og ro i maven, lige fra den første kontakt til konstruktionen står færdig.  

Palsgaard Spær er fagfolk - og vi er aldrig længere væk end et opkald eller en mail. 

Kontakt os på tlf. 75 77 51 55 eller mail palsgaardspaer@palsgaardspaer.dk

We develop and market iconic eyewear brands which have been sold by quality opticians world wide for more than 40 years. Great design is what defines all our brands. They are versatile and clearly positioned: from audacious French design to a clean-cut Scandinavian look

Please visit designeyeweargroup.com for more information on our brands.

Hos DESIGNA KØKKEN banker vores hjerter for høj kvalitet i flot og funktionelt design til fornuftige priser. Skabt til din hverdag. 

Med mere end 30 års erfaring inden for produktion af dansk møbelkvalitet, fremstiller vi køkken, bad, garderobe og skydedøre efter kundernes ønsker og behov. Vi lytter, mærker efter og ved derfor hvilke krav vores kunder stiller og hvad de drømmer om. Det giver en god og tryg købsoplevelse hos os.

DESIGNA KØKKEN er en kæde af selvstændige køkkenforhandlere med +50 butikker fordelt i Danmark, Norge og på Færøerne. Ud over salg til private, består kæden også af en lang række erhvervsafdelinger og store erhvervscentre, der leverer til det professionelle marked – fra små lokale tømrervirksomheder til store entreprenørvirksomheder – med garanti for en kort leveringstid og en høj leveringssikkerhed.

DESIGNA KØKKEN er kvalitet og håndværk i dansk design.

Mere end 45 års stadig fokusering på kvalitet, produktudvikling og service har gjort STM VINDUER A/S til en førende dansk producent af vinduer og døre i træ (fyr kernetræ, mahogni og eg) og træ/aluminium.

Tiden har lært os at værdsætte solidt kvalitetshåndværk, og uanset vind og vejr holder vores vinduer og døre generation efter generation. 

Kvalitet, rådgivning, markedets flotteste finish og kundeorienteret service er nøglebegreber, når vi leverer vinduer og døre til din bolig.

Vi har et komplet vindues- og dørprogram, der fremstilles efter mål og opgave med moderne produktionsmetoder og højteknologiske bearbejdningsmaskiner, så hos os er det muligt at få fremstillet elementer, der tilgodeser individuelle ønsker og behov. Vore energirigtige facadeløsninger tager udgangspunkt i den danske arkitektur og skaber smukke løsninger, god komfort og god økonomi. Måske er der flere muligheder for at realisere din ønskebolig, end du lige umiddelbart tror!

Svendsen Sport are making the fishing experience better. Our passionate team – from fishing fanatics who spend thousands of hours on the water, to the highly skilled professionals at our Denmark headquarters – share a dedication to achieving this goal. As one of the biggest and most trusted fishing tackle suppliers in Europe, we are a global business, with a wholly owned subsidiary company in the USA and a truly international fanbase. 

We have established some of the fishing market’s leading and best-loved brands including Savage Gear, Prologic, DAM, Scierra and MADCAT. Your passion is our profession. Whether you are a carp angler, a predator hunter, a fly fisherman or a pleasure angler, we speak your language and pour pure dedication into every product we make. 

A TRUE HOUSE OF INNOVATION
Since 2010, our brands have been recognised with more than 40 international awards at two of the industry’s biggest trade events, ICAST and EFTTEX. Our pioneering products have set new standards in every discipline of the sport. Examples include the invention of 3D scan technology and Line Thru designs on Savage Gear lures, the WaterWolf HD underwater camera, Prologic’s high-spec Fulcrum bite alarms, the fast-growing Savage Gear saltwater collection of unique lures and rods, and the MADCAT A-STATIC catfishing range. 

AN INDUSTRY LEADING, DIGITAL BRAND
Our brands are consistently spearheading new ways to connect with anglers, resulting in more than 4,000,000 followers on social media. Introducing our online partner platform, we have transformed our interaction with trade customers.

A PARTNERSHIP FOR THE FUTURE
We provide the best working methods for our partners - online or in person, for small transactions or large orders, for customised products or well-known best-sellers. Focusing on transparency, integrity and communication we deepen our connections with our customers for today - and tomorrow.

BIBS is a premium Danish baby brand established in 1978. Our journey started with the iconic ‘Colour’ pacifier which since has been joined by many new designs and product categories.

We are a visionary company with a creative and progressive mindset. We have high standards for quality and uniqueness in everything we do, with a strong focus on sustainability, functionality, and safety. 

We are driven by strong values based on high ambitions, originality, as well as inspiring and innovative designs - always with an aesthetic mindset. All this has contributed to, that BIBS today is one of the favorite baby brands in the world.

All our pacifiers are still carefully designed and manufactured in Denmark/EU.
Read more about our vision and products at www.bibsworld.com

Global shortage of health professionals has made it difficult for practitioners to meet the rapidly growing healthcare needs of patients. This creates a gap between supply and demand of healthcare services. Practio’s mission is to bridge this gap by building health technology that turn pharmacies into local healthcare hubs, making safe and affordable healthcare accessible for everyone.

Roslev Trælasthandel A/S byder dig velkommen til en professionel leverandør af byggemateriel. 

Roslev er lokalforankret med afdelinger i Herning, Holstebro, Ikast og Skive. Ved hjælp af 200 dygtige og engagerede medarbejdere kan vi yde dig en unik service som gør, at vi kan levere materialer til byggeprojekter i hele Danmark. Besøg www.roslev.dk og du vil få et indblik i Roslevs lange historie, du vil se de rammer virksomheden forsøger at skabe omkring en attraktiv og udviklende arbejdsplads og du vil ikke mindst få en oplevelse af en trælast virksomhed som, konstant har fokus på at være en professionel samarbejdspartner for dine byggeprojekter og som gør at dine forventninger til en seriøs materialeleverandør bliver indfriet.

Kentaur er en BtB virksomhed med design og produktion af vaskeriegnet professionel erhvervsbeklædning. Det vil sige, at vi hovedsagligt distribuerer vores tøj via Textile Service (vaskerier) og forhandlere på det europæiske marked. 

Vores erhvervsbeklædning dækker en bred faggruppe inden for servicefag som for eksempel social- og sundhedssektoren, køkken, rengøring, hotel- og restaurationsbranchen samt levnedsmiddelindustrien. 

Vi interesserer os som virksomhed ikke kun for de store kunder, men lytter og produktudvikler vores erhvervsbeklædning efter også slutbrugerens behov. Kombinationen af denne brede viden sammensmeltet i ét produkt vil efter vores overbevisning skabe optimal professionel erhvervsbeklædning for såvel Textile Service som for den enkelte bruger.

KPK Døre og Vinduer producerer nogle af Danmarks bedste dør- og vinduesløsninger. Det sker under overskriften respekt, der er et nøgleord på alle niveauer i virksomheden. Vores udgangspunkt er en kombination af gode, danske, håndværksmæssige traditioner med fokus på kvalitet og holdbarhed og en moderne, højteknologisk produktion. 

KPK er et dansk vinduesbrand med produktion, udvikling og ledelse i Nykøbing Mors. Vores medarbejdere er dedikerede fagfolk, der i samarbejde med den lokale håndværker sørger for, at kunden får god kvalitet hver eneste gang. Vi har konstant fokus på at sikre, at det er de rigtige materialer, der får den optimale behandling, inden vi leverer den færdige løsning.

KPK Døre og Vinduer blev grundlagt i 1976 og har 270 medarbejdere. Siden 2007 har KPK været en del af det børsnoterede selskab Inwido. Inwido forbedrer indeklimaet med vinduer og døre. Som Europas førende vindueskoncern er det Inwidos mål at udvikle og sælge markedets bedste, skræddersyende vinduer og døre igennem en decentraliseret struktur med fokus på konsumentmarkedet for at sikre langsigtet, bæredygtig vækst – enten organisk eller via opkøb. Inwido udgøres af 29 forretningsenheder og beskæftiger ca. 4.600 medarbejdere i 11 lande. I 2021 omsatte Inwido for 7,7 milliarder SEK og havde en operationel EBITA-margin på 11,7%. Inwido har været noteret på Nasdaq Stockholm siden 2014.

Læs mere på www.kpk-vinduer.dk.

Wheat was founded in 2002 in Denmark by Charlotte and Peter Galsgaard.

With her clean lines, light color combinations and original patterns, Wheat’s chief designer Charlotte eloquently carries on the Scandinavian design tradition.

For Charlotte, children have always been her focus. Having raised three children of her own, she understands the special demands of children’s wear. Each garment is therefore tailored for a child’s wear and tear. The use of natural fabrics and adjustable elastic waists ensures the child's wellbeing and freedom of movement.

When wearing Wheat, children embody the relaxed Scandinavian lifestyle of quality and comfort.

Wheat's strong design philosophy, together with Charlotte's desire to interact closely with both manufacturers and consumers, has paved the way for a well-organized, successful company that continues to grow season after season.

Vi er vilde med kartofler - og andre råvarer, der kommer fra jorden.

Vores virksomhed startede med forarbejdning af kvalitetskartofler til restauranter, kantiner og offentlige køkkener. Her blev der - og bliver der stadig - stillet høje krav til produktkvalitet og bæredygtighed. Og det har givet os en erfaring og nogle standarder, som vi har ført over på vores produktsortiment til detailhandelen og danske forbrugere. Vi producerer nu meget mere end kartofler og er i detailhandelen hoppet med på den populære bølge af convenience og laver spiseklare måltidsløsninger i mange afskygninger. Med fokus på grønne råvarer, god smag og ansvar for, at produkterne er produceret bæredygtigt med respekt for mad, mennesker og natur. Med vores placering langt ude på landet i Vestjylland har vi et helt særligt forhold til naturen og vores omkringliggende samfund. Det har vi det godt med.

MyTrendyPhone sells quality accessories for mobile phones, accessories for iPods and other MP3 players, accessories for digital cameras and camcorders, PC and laptop accessories as well as Bluetooth equipment. With a product range of over 100,000 different accessories we have a strong position on the mobile market. MyTrendyPhone currently stocks products in the following countries: United Kingdom, Denmark, Norway, Sweden, Germany, the Netherlands, Spain and France.

We can accommodate any size of order from small to large quantity orders and will give you our personal attention at any time.

THE HISTORY BEHIND MYTRENDYPHONE
MyTrendyPhone was established in 2003 and since then the company has grown to be one of the largest online shops for mobile accessories. We have extended our product range to include: mobile phones, music players, consoles, iPad, laptop accessories etc. With a team of 90 throughout Europe it now has 10 online shops in different countries.

PRICE AND SATISFACTION GUARANTEE
MyTrendyPhone guarantees you will get lowest prices on the market. To keep our customers satisfied we offer a price and satisfaction guarantee when they do business in our online shop. If you find the same product for less within thirty days of purchase, we will refund you the difference. Read more about it here.

SECURE ONLINE SHOPPING AT MYTRENDYPHONE
MyTrendyPhone is one of the TrustWave accredited shops. This means that we offer 100% secure online shopping experience. TrustWave protects your personal information and reduces security risk, as well as prevents cybercrime

About BoConcept

BoConcept is the brand name of Denmark's most global retail furniture chain with more than 340 sales units in more than 50 countries around the world. 

We offer customised, coordinated and affordable design furniture and accessories. Customised because our products can be fitted to the needs and dreams of our customers. Coordinated because we take a holistic approach in the development and design of our product range. Design because we are a design company with our own designers. Affordable because we want to spoil our customers by giving them great value.

Thisted Bryghus

Siden starten i 1902 har Thisted Bryghus været et selvstændigt bryggeri beliggende i Thisted.

Med en enestående folkelig lokal opbakning har bryggeriet overlevet verdenskrige, kartoffelkure og finanskriser. Thisted Bryghus fremstår i dag som et særdeles veldrevet bryggeri med en flot vækst i både omsætning og resultat fra år til år.

Bryggeriet har de senere år markeret sig som et af landets absolut mest innovative, og sender løbende en række nye spændende produkter på markedet.

Mange produkter indeholder ingredienser, der er dyrket i et af landets smukkeste naturområder: Nationalpark Thy.

Det har kastet en række priser af sig. Blandt andet er Thisted Bryghus udnævnt til Årets Danske Bryggeri i 2015, 2016 og 2017. Bag prisen står Forbrugerorganisationen Danske Ølentusiaster.

10-4 er det moderne fællesnavn for en traditionel tømmerhandel, som startede i 1947, da Henry Kjeldsen åbnede sin første tømmerhandel i Ringkøbing. Siden er virksomheden udvidet med åbning af 10-4 Byggecenter og Tømmerhandel i Varde, Viborg, Videbæk, Ulfborg og Aarhus. Inden for onlinehandel er 10-4.dk med helt fremme, og i webshoppen, der tæller ca. 40.000 varer, kan du købe byggematerialer, elværktøj og en lang række andre varer til særdeles attraktive priser.

Natur-Drogeriet udvikler, producerer og markedsfører naturlægemidler, kosttilskud og helseprodukter til hele familien. Produkterne findes hos den autoriserede forhandler, helsekostforretninger, Matas og apoteker. Vi har fokus på "Naturmidler der virker"​ og lever og ånder for dagligt at gøre en forskel for andre mennesker via sundhed og helse.

Vi er godkendt af Lægemiddelstyrelsen som lægemiddelvirksomhed og lever dermed helt op til de lovgivningsmæssige krav (GMP-regler), som myndighederne stiller til firmaer, der producerer og sælger naturmedicin. Samtidig er vi en godkendt levnedsmiddelvirksomhed, dvs. at vi opfylder myndighedernes krav til egenkontrol (kvalitetsstyring). Dette giver bl.a. tilladelse til økologisk produktion.

Siden 1945 har vi leveret produkter til både ind- og udland, hvilket gør os til Danmarks ældste naturmiddelfirma. Dr. A. O. Hansen grundlagde firmaet og holdt fast på århundredgammel viden om urter og planter. I 1976 overtog Jonna og Peer Christiansen firmaet og gav det navnet Natur-Drogeriet. Frem til 1988 havde Natur-Drogeriet domicil i Åbyhøj, hvorefter firmaet flyttede til Hørning, hvor det fortsat ligger. I juni 2015 blev Natur-Drogeriets 70 års jubilæum fejret og samtidig blev et generationsskifte markeret, idet Jonna og Peer valgte at overlade roret til parrets to yngste døtre og deres ægtefæller. De driver virksomheden videre ud fra et ønske om at viderebringe den årtusindgamle viden om det skatkammer, naturen byder på. Virksomhedens mission er at fremme folkesundheden med urter, droger og vitaminer og mineraler og essentielle olier.

Natur-Drogeriet beskæftiger ca. 45 medarbejdere, fordelt på produktion, administration og kvalitetskontrol.

Spejder Sport A/S er Danmarks største udbyder af udstyr til friluftliv. Vi har over 60 år på bagen og ved alt om, hvordan vi bedst udruster dig med udstyr til eventyr. Du finder os i over 20 af landets byer og selvfølgelig også på www.spejdersport.dk.

Ytong er verdens førende producent af byggematerialer i porebeton og kalksandsten. Fælles for vores sortiment af Ytong porebeton og Ytong Multipor er, at det opfylder kravene til bæredygtige, varmeisolerende, stabile og omkostningseffektive byggematerialer. Alle vores løsninger er uorganiske, indeklimamærkede og bidrager til et sundt indeklima samt en god komfort. Produkterne leveres i modulmål og kan derfor anvendes i kombination til både nybyggeri og renovering.

Ytong porebeton giver maksimal termisk beskyttelse, bæreevne samt brandsikring og produceres med et begrænset energispild og CO2-emission. Ytong Multipor er ikke-brændbar, mineralsk isolering og et bæredygtigt alternativ til oliebaserede isoleringsmaterialer. Både Ytong Energy+ og Ytong Multipor er Cradle-to-Cradle-certificeret og derfor 100 pct. genanvendeligt.  

Ytong og Ytong Multipor er en del af Xella International, som har flere kvalitetsmærker under sig, herunder Fermacell, Aestuver, Silka, Hebel og Fels. Koncernen har mere end 6.000 medarbejdere og 97 fabrikker i 20 lande samt salgsorganisationer i over 30 lande.

Med mere end 170 medarbejdere er Zurface partner for professionelle leverandører indenfor arkitektur, byggeri, landskab og renovering.

Zurface er organiseret med en aktiv salgsorganisation af generellister inden for naturstensløsninger og råder over en række specialister, der har særlig kompetence indenfor enkeltområder som interiør, facade og belægning. Herigennem tilbydes løsninger der sikrer at byggeriets forskellige overflader komplementerer hinanden.

Virksomhedens kompetente projektafdeling er endvidere garant for, at logistik og timing planlægges minutiøst, således at produkterne kommer til rette tid og hverken trækker unødig likviditet eller forsinker andre elementer af byggeriet.

Zurface lægger vægt på at kunne rådgive vore kunder om nye attraktive materialer i sten, nye anvendelsesmetoder/montageløsninger og kan tilbyde naturstensprodukter, der passer til såvel prestige- som budgetbyggeri.

Vordingborg Køkkenet er leverandør af køkkenluksus alle har råd til.

Vores produkter fortjener at være i danskernes hjem eller rettere; danskerne fortjener ordentlige, miljøvenlige køkkener i godt design, i god kvalitet med masser af lækre detaljer og uden, at de behøver koste en bondegård.

Hvordan kan det lade sig gøre at levere fantastiske køkkener helt ned til 20.000 kroner alt inklusive - også hvidevarer?

Svaret er, at:

 - Vi er gode til at producere stort og effektivt.

 - Vores designere og indretningseksperter er i front.

 - Vi har fjernet alle fordyrende mellemled.

Vi er en kreditværdig virksomhed baseret på Soliditets kreditvurderingssystem. Vurderingen er foretaget ud fra en mængde forskellige beslutningsregler. Oplysningerne bliver opdateret dagligt via Soliditets database. Kreditvurderingen af virksomheden er således altid aktuel.

Vordingborg Køkkenet er også en solid virksomhed at handle med. Vi ejer selv vores 27 butikker. For dig som kunde betyder det, at du aldrig risikerer at få penge i klemme. For bag dit valg af køkken står Vordingborg Køkkenet A/S, der er AAA-kreditgodkendt - en vurdering som kun et fåtal af danske virksomheder har opnået. Vi er med andre ord en økonomisk meget solid virksomhed.

Vi lægger desuden vægt på at opføre os ordentligt i ordets bedste betydning. Vores succes bygger på tilfredse kunder. Derfor bruger vi megen energi på at rådgive dig ordentligt og på at servicere dig perfekt - fra vores første møde, og indtil du steger din første bøf i dit nye Vordingborg Køkken.

Back in 2013, Basic Apparel was founded. This was the start of an exciting travel - and it still is. The idea was to create clothes, that people would use again and again. We wished to create that piece of clothes, that you continually grab from your closet, because that particular piece makes you feel most comfortable. It was and still is, clothes like that, we are creating for our customers and ourselves. 

Furthermore we wanted to give the brand a clean Scandinavian expression - good basic clothing with few details, made with good qualities and reasonable prices.

We want to work against the flood of fast fashion, and create slow fashion instead. Fashion that lives more than one season, simply because it's everybody's favorite clothing. 
Our philosophy was and still is - there is no need to make it harder than it is, which makes our brand simple and basic. 

We design every style ourselves and only get our clothes produced at places we feel safe traveling to. We visit our manufacturers many times a year, to ensure that the working environment and our clothes meets our standards.
We are proud to be represented in the following markets so far: Denmark, Norway, Sweden, Iceland, Greenland, Netherlands, Belgium, Germany, Switzerland, Austria, France, England and Israel. 

We hope you like our philosophy and our styles as much as we do. 
Stay tuned and follow us and our journey.

Lots of love, 
// the Basic Apparel team

Unique Furniture A/S is a Danish furniture company with branches in Asia as well as representation in Great Britain and Germany. 
We specialize in designing, producing and distributing high quality furniture to retailers all over Europe and throughout the world.
We constantly strive to develop our product ranges and selection of materials and finishes.

Our dedicated team will assist you through the process from selection of your product range to delivery and aftersale.
Our mission is to change society through better meals. This means organic produce, meals made by people and served with care and dignity for those who eat it.

Glulam – Made in Denmark – Available here.  National network of stockists plus weekly deliveries throughout mainland GB.   

We have improved the availability of our high quality, FSC certified Scandinavian Glulam – cut to length and delivered without waste, from a single beam to a full load.  

Firstly, we have established a network of Stock Partners, holding popular sections for immediate availability.

In addition to this we deliver to GB every week from our factory in Denmark and supply your exact requirements, cut to length.  This gives access to our huge stocks (around 1,000m³) which includes beams with lamella thickness ≤35mm permitting their use in Service Class 3 conditions – much of the Glulam available from landed stocks in UK does not meet this requirement.

Our service: Order stock section beams by 11:00 on Wednesday and beams are delivered, cut to length, to your yard or direct to your customer’s site the following week – anywhere in mainland GB!

All deliveries are made on curtain sided articulated trucks to keep your beams in the best possible condition.

If you would like to send details of your current or future requirements we will be pleased to offer our quotation or pass you on to the relevant stock partner.

Should you have any questions or queries, please feel free to contact our UK office on +44 1226 720 760 or email uk@lilleheden.co.uk

GripGrab strives to make the World’s best cycling essentials that will have you covered on all surfaces and in all conditions. We are passionate and active cyclists and we understand the importance of the right cycling essentials. We strive to deliver high-quality products that you will love to use again and again. Our products offer Comfort, Functionality, Performance and Style.

GripGrab is a family run business. Founded by three brothers Kristian, Bjørn and Martin the company is today run by CEO Martin Krøyer and CPO Kristian Krøyer. The company is based in Greater Copenhagen, Denmark and employs 40 people around the world who are all passionate about enriching people’s lives through cycling.

Hos Merrild Lavazza Danmark brænder vi for kaffe. Vi er en stor KAFFEFAMILIE, vi er frontløbere med eget risteri, og vores kaffemisssion er ret enkel. Vi lader kaffebønnen tale og bønnen være kernen, så vores kunder får glæde af et nysgerrigt og simpelt kaffesprog, fra KAFFEFOLK til KAFFEFOLK.

Få fat i vores toperfarne sælgere på Linked-in: 
Sjælland, Henrik Andersen, Susanne Møller
Østjylland, Mikael Jensen
Sydjylland & Fyn, Frits Greve 
Vest- og Midtjylland, Keld Thomsen
Indirekte salg og KAM Kommerciel, Jette Bekke

Merrild Lavazza Danmark ApS er kaffefirmaet med de to stærkeste kaffebrands i Danmark: Merrild og Lavazza. 

Med Merrild tager vi afsæt i danskheden, og med Lavazza topper vi det op med et kulinarisk løft fra espressoens højborg Italien. Vi drager fordel af den italienske mad, vin og kaffekultur, og sætter kaffen i bevægelse ved at gøre det bekvemt for dig at kommunikere kaffe med gastronomisk ID.

Merrild Lavazza Danmark byder velkommen til en helt ny gastronomisk kaffekultur, der løfter niveauet med flere bønner!

Aliga is a young and highly entrepreneurial company specializing in the cultivation and commercialization of microalgae-derived products for the aquaculture and aquafeed markets. 

We have revolutionized the cultivation of microalgae by utilizing the most modern bioreactor technology. This enables us to simulate, monitor and optimize nature’s own photosynthesis process in order to produce large quantities of high quality, nutrient-rich and pathogen-free microalgae biomass. Through different extraction processes are we able to derive concentrated fresh and frozen paste from the biomass which we supply to hatcheries, aquafarms and aquafeed manufacturers worldwide.

We want to offer our customers exceptional value through a combination of competitive pricing, enhanced service and quality. We guarantee that every product produced and every bag leaving our factory always meets our strict quality standards and that our customers’ needs always comes first, without compromise. So let Aliga be your natural choice for microalgae products supply!

companyName: A/S Saeby Fiske-Industri / Saeby Fish Canners Ltd.
description:
Saeby Fish Canners Ltd. was founded in 1947 and is owned by the Vanggaard Foundation. 

By delivering unique standards for chemical-free production and traceability in the consumer- and private label industry, Saeby Fish Canners Ltd. is now the world’s leading mackerel manufacturer. 

More than 85 percent of our export is to large international supermarket chains in Europe.

Every year Saeby Fish Canners Ltd. produce around 97-105 million cans – and we are currently expanding our capacity to 110 million cans a year. 

Today Saeby is the largest provider of canned Scomber Scombrus Mackerel in the EU, represented worldwide.

Our story: 

Scan Wear started in 2004, and is placed in Vojens, Denmark.
Our aim is to be our customers preferred partner/supplier of underwear, nightwear/homewear, socks and babywear.
We believe in honest and precise business relations, and understand that a cooperation is much more than easy-to-sell design.
We support our customers in design, packaging, product development to warehouse facilities and sales support.

BrandFix is ​​one of Scandinavia's fastest-growing retail companies in beauty care. Based in Aarhus, Denmark, we help many retailers, wholesalers, and webshops from different countries every day.
We take care of the entire process from research, purchasing and logistics, to administration, sales and follow-up.

From stock, we can offer branded goods for immediate delivery. In addition, we produce our own brands and distribute third-party trademarks on an agency basis. We are the official distributor of Ivy Aïa, Curl Girl Nordic, The Scapologist, Essentiél, Cantu, Calypso, As I Am, Girlz Only, So Fragrance, Miss So, BeSpoke, Color Shake, HairBeliefs, SkinBeliefs, and more to come.

The vision behind our presence is to be a dynamic and healthy trading company that can adapt to customers, suppliers, and markets. The success criteria are successful tradings, which ultimately can only be measured on one parameter, repeated trading.

We strive to deliver what the individual trading partner wants. To achieve this goal, we are dynamic, flexible, and work with high integrity. We believe that beauty is an individual and changeable cause, which we must be able to meet with different products and so are the wishes and needs of our partners. That is why the choice of products is decided by our customers.

HITSA forsyner og forskønner byens rum med inventar af høj kvalitet.

HITSA har i 30 år produceret inventar til byrum og parker i samarbejde med arkitekter og kommuner.

Vi bestræber os på at fremstille design, som komplementerer omgivelserne og skaber merværdi - også flere år frem.

Hos HITSA vægter vi kvalitet højt. Derfor er alle vores produkter fremstillet af solide materialer, så de kan holde til at blive brugt, samt modstå vind og vejr.

Alle vores produkter bliver produceret og sendt ud fra vores fabrik i Kolding.

DFI-GEISLER is Europe's leading supplier of worktops to kitchen, bath and the rest of the home. 


We offer the broadest and most integrated range of materials: wood, steel, glass, Corian®, terrazzo, concrete, granite and composite. That means you can get inspiration and compare the different materials and their qualities in one place. 


Our range is always in development - and you can put together solutions and combine materials exactly as you want. Our professional expertise is a guarantee that you never have to compromise with quality.

Organic Plant Protein A/S is a company with the mission to support and enhance the important transition towards a more plant-based and sustainable diet by development and production of organic high-quality plant-based protein products.- All products are organic, soyfree, glutenfree and without additives

The world has become very fond of electronics. We buy in substantial numbers, yet we also throw out more and more. In 2016 the world’s electronic waste amounted to 44.7 million tons – which is equivalent to 4,500 Eiffel Towers! According to an UN-report it is expected to increase to 52.2 tons of waste in 2021.

Out of this enormous amount, only 20% is recycled. 

That is why, Blue City’s mission is to give electronics a new life. 

This is being done by giving companies and private persons a safe and simple place to sell their electronics with a guarantee of their data being securely erased. Additionally giving buyers better terms than if they bought new electronics, with 14 days full return rights and a 2-year warranty – no matter whether they purchase on our online platforms or in our network of stores. 

Since we deal directly with the end consumers, we can offer both companies and private customers better prices than our competitors.

Does your company currently have electronic devices that are no longer being used?

Blue City can offer you a simple, safe, and sustainable solution that includes:
1) Competitive prices
2) Secure handling/deletion of data by 3rd party provider
3) Sustainability certificate for your CSR profile
4) Simple process and possibility for long-term partnerships
5) Easy and fast payment

Write to us at b2b@bluecity.dk to get an offer without obligations on your electronic devices.

KRONE er en dansk producent af kvalitetsvinduer med mere end 60 års erfaring. Vi er ca. 180 dedikerede medarbejdere, og vi leverer vinduer og døre til såvel den private boligejer som til større byggeprojekter i ind- og udland.

Vi lægger vægt på, at fleksibilitet er en standard. Det betyder, at KRONE er løsningen til dit projekt, uanset om du ønsker særlige mål, dybe karme, buede vinduer eller rammer i en helt speciel træsort. Og uanset om du designer den eksklusive villa eller det unikke kontordomicil.

Tag os med på råd tidligt i projektet. Så hjælper vi med at gøre dine visioner til vinduer til virkelighed – inden for byggeriets budgetramme. Se mere på www.krone.as, kontakt os på tlf. 9624 2860 eller find os i vores udstillinger 3 steder i Danmark.

I mere end 50 år har fischer leveret befæstigelsesløsninger af den højeste kvalitet og sikkerhed over hele verden. I dag er fischer a/s en af de førende leverandører af befæstigelsesmateriel på det danske marked.

Vi tilbyder et stort udvalg af bl.a. nylondybler, stålankre, skruer og kemisk forankring til ”gør-det-selv” manden, den professionelle bruger og specialprodukter til projektopgaver. Alt kan lade sig gøre.

Som noget helt nyt har fischer som de første i verden lanceret et produktsortiment lavet af genanvendelige materialer og med omtanke for miljøet. Læs mere om Greenline på vores website.

Vi har også specialprodukter som SaMontec, et komplet installationssystem for rørophæng, og A|C|T et æstetisk og montagevenligt facadesystem for ophæng af natursten, el-befæstigelsen E-fix, montagesystemet for solceller Solar-fix og meget mere. 
Af reference projekter kan vi nævne, den københavnske Metro, Øresundstunnelen og Øresundsbroen. Ingen opgave er for stor eller for lille.

fischers produkter finder du hos førende forhandlere, byggemarkeder og trælaster.

Hos Klarvinduer sætter vi kunden, kvalitet og gennemsigtighed i højsædet – fra du placerer din ordre, til elementerne er færdigmonterede. Men vi laver ikke bare fantastiske vinduer og døre, som selvfølgelig er 100 % dansk design og som selvfølgelig giver dig den bedste udsigt. Vi stræber efter at du får realiseret dine visioner!

Made for great adventures since 1901. Nordisk has been a company for the outdoor scene for many years - as long as there has been a scene, actually. We create outdoor equipment with outstanding functionality, quality and a build- in “hygge-factor”.

Designed by Nordisk in Denmark
At Nordisk we place great emphasis on design and the goal is to make a real difference for you. 

To us, great design means that products need to do more than just look good. They need to feel good, be innovative, have a clear purpose and a high degree of functionality. 

And finally, to be made with utmost respect for nature. These are all very traditional Danish design values reflecting our craftsmanship and history.

Everyone at Nordisk continuously do their utmost to infuse this into any product 
proudly carrying our logo.

Excellent Wine A/S er en specialiseret full service vin- og spiritusleverandør til HoReCa segmentet. Vi tilbyder et bredt, fast sortiment af kvalitetsvine fra hele verden. Vi arbejder målrettet og strategisk med at yde den absolut bedste service med professionelle konsulenter. 
Vi tilbyder desuden hjælp med grafiske opgaver, så som design og opsætning af vinkort, menukort, etiketter og meget mere.

Hos Excellent Wine vægter vi langsigtede og værdiskabende aftaler og relationer med vore kunder. Vores størrelse gør os agile og fleksible og dermed sikrer vi et gnidningsløst samarbejde hvor det gode samarbejde fordres. 

Vi har gennem årene indgået agent- og eneretsaftaler med velkendte udenlandske vinproducenter og der kommer hele tiden nye produkter og producenter til. 

Baggrund og historie:
Historien om Excellent Wine tager sin begyndelse tilbage i 1920. Her blev virksomheden De Danske Sprit Fabrikker stiftet. I 1962 blev selskabet Spritlageret Danmark stiftet, og da DDSF i 1969 mistede deres monopol gav det mulighed for Spritlageret Danmark til også at føre vin i sortimentet.

Salget af vin udviklede sig eksplosivt de følgende år og da vinen efterhånden blev den absolut vigtigste del af forretningen, besluttede medlemmerne af Spritlageret Danmark at danne et aktieselskab med navnet Excellent Wine.

Excellent Wine A/S har hovedkontor og centrallager i Herning og er en 100% danskejet virksomhed.
Ansvarlig for Danmark

The history of New Nordic dates back to the beginning of the 90's in Copenhagen, Denmark. Two friends, Marinus Blaabjerg and Karl Kristian Jensen, shared a passion for healthy living and decided to quit their job, and create a company using a new technique to extract a natural-source antacid found in the fruit fibers of citrus fruits. The product relieved heartburn and acid reflux without disturbing natural acid levels in the stomach. Since the launch of Frutin, for over 20 years New Nordic has been producing effective natural supplements in Denmark, Sweden and Norway that sell all over the world. We have built our own operation in more than 20 countries from Canada in the west to China in the East.

We have continued actively along this path, seeing the development of numerous vitamins, minerals, herbal and other food supplements that help to promote vitality, well-being and fight age-related degeneration.

We believe in long-term commitments and are dedicated to establishing New Nordic as a significant supplier to the health and beauty market. We are a company that takes the social and environmental implications of its activities seriously and respect the well being of all of our employees, customers, and business partners. We believe uncompromising quality in every product we deliver and we are concerned about the quality from field and forest to the package in the shop.

DOLLE Nordic har eksisteret siden 2013 og er, som navnet antyder, det nordiske salgskontor og center for de nordiske markeder. DOLLE Nordic er et datterselskab af DOLLE A/S, som siden 1951 har udviklet sig til at være verdens førende inden for udvikling, produktion og salg af lofttrapper, og samtidig en markant aktør inden for pladsbesparende trapper, facadebeklædning, listelofter og vægge samt terrasse- og gelændersystemer. Visionen er at tilbyde branchens bedste kundeservice med skræddersyede løsninger, den korteste leveringstid og den højeste produktkvalitet. DOLLE har skabt en tankegang, der er gennemgående i virksomhedens produktudvikling. DOLLE ønsker at flytte den traditionelle tankegang fra kvadratmeter til kubikmeter, når det kommer til boligens rummelighed.

Alle vores produkter opfylder de opstillede EN-krav. Vi er desuden FSC®- og PEFC certificerede.

Roth Danmark sælger og markedsfører komplette brugsvands- og gulvvarmesystemer. Vi er en del af Roth Industries GmbH og med vores stærke logistik- og systemløsninger fra vores nordeuropæiske hovedkontor Roth North Europe, er vi godt rustet og står stærkt på det danske marked. 
Vi er specialister i gulvvarme- og brugsvandssystemer og har et bredt og komplet produktsortiment. Vores fageksperter har alle en VVS-teknisk baggrund og erfaring fra branchen, så de ved hvad de taler om.

Vores eksterne salgskonsulenter dækker hele Danmark og sørger hver dag for at uddanne vores kunder i vores produkter og systemer, således at der opnås en høj effektivitet når der bruges Roth systemløsninger. 
Vores produkter forhandles gennem VVS-grossister og dermed er vores produkter let tilgængelige for den professionelle installatør.
Roth Danmark hjælper med projektering og vi er kun et telefonopkald væk, hvis du får brug for support. Vi har dygtige fageksperter til at hjælpe dig videre – både med de praktiske opgaver og de lovgivningsmæssige udfordringer du kan støde på i din hverdag. Vi leverer tegninger, materialebestykninger samt dimensioneringsforslag og udarbejder også installationsforslag, beregninger og energianalyser inden for områderne:

•	Gulvvarmesystemer
•	MultiPex® brugsvandssystem 
•	Alu-LaserPlus® brugsvandssystem
•	SnowFlex® snesmeltningssystem 
•	Vortex pumper til brugsvandsinstallationer

Hvis du vil vide mere om vores virksomhed, kan du se mere på vores hjemmeside: www.roth-danmark.dk

DEVI  founded in 1942 as DEVI Electric Heating Systems, is the global leader brand in high-performance electric heating systems for indoor and outdoor applications. 

As from January 1st, 2003, DEVI has become a part of the Danfoss - Denmark's largest industrial group. Danfoss is one of the world's leading companies within heating, cooling, and air-conditioning. Danfoss is still privately held by the founding family and employing 23,400 employees and serving customers in more than 100 countries. 

Today DEVI’s production takes place in Saint Malo - France and Grodzisk Mazowiecki - Poland. DEVI's central office is situated in Vejle - Denmark.

All our products conform to all appropriate international safety and energy standards and offer up to 20 years warranty. DEVI heating solutions have proven to be cost-effective and environmentally friendly and have been the first choice for many total heating solutions in low-energy homes and buildings. They are designed and made in the EU with the highest standards of quality control.

DEVI provides intelligent solutions with lasting effect for electrical heating with a dedicated focus on advanced and user-friendly systems. These solutions are covered by our wide range of products e.g. heating cables, heating mats, self-limiting cables, contemporary thermostats and accessories.  They are applied all over the world into a wide range of purposes e.g. residential houses and apartments, public buildings, specific areas like elevators, trains,  airports, stadiums, highways etc.  

With DEVI you can rely on lasting, intelligent solutions. We have put all our experience into making each product reliable, easy to install and easy to commission.

Skovby was founded in 1933 by cabinetmaker Thorvald Rasmussen. With vision, strenuous effort and professional pride he created a foundation for sustainable and functional furniture design, which his son Villy Rasmussen and grandsons Preben and Jørgen Rasmussen have carried on ever since.

The driving force, and a shared passion spanning the three generations of cabinetmakers, is function. Skovby was among the frontrunners within functional extension systems for tables, and today the furniture company is world renowned for a special talent to combine design and functionality. The continuous and direct reason for Skovby’s success is the ability to develop designs, which unite strong aesthetic expression with innovative function.

Today, Preben and Jørgen Rasmussen run an international, high-technology business with a positive environmental imprint

Freehand Coffee Company - kaffe med god smag i munden. Vores kaffe er bæredygtig hele vejen i gennem – fra bærret på busken til den færdigbryggede kop. Målet er at bidrage til at afskaffe fattigdom, bruge naturens ressourcer med kærlig omtanke og sikre bæredygtig produktion. Intet mindre. Det mener vi godt kan lade sig gøre. En kop kaffe med ren samvittighed smager bare bedre. Vi benytter vores egne risterier i Freehand. Det forkorter bønnernes rejse, fraskærer de unødvendige mellemled og efterlader en større del af fortjenesten i Honduras hos kaffebønderne. Med Freehand Coffee Company kan du, dine medarbejdere og kunder nyde en kop kaffe med god smag i munden.

BANEGAARDEN - KØBENHAVNS GRØNNE NARNIA
​
Midt i København, på DSBs baneterræn, ligger et stykke ’uopdaget’ land med vild natur, brombærkrat, buske og gamle træer. En grøn verden fyldt med sanselighed og magi. Her er vi i gang med at udvikle et grønt fyrtårn, hvor æstetik, bæredygtighed, sundhed, planter, smagsoplevelser og naturlig sanselighed er omdrejningspunkt. Et fyrtårn lokalsamfundet begejstres over, og som turister hører om, undres over, besøger og vender tilbage til. Lokale, tilrejsende og politikere anvender stedet som inspiration, livsnydelse, forretning og bare et sted man må kopiere.

BÆREDYGTIGHED
​
På BaneGaarden – midt i alt det grønne - ligger ni bevaringsværdige trælader i dårlig stand. De oser af liv og historier, som vi gerne vil værne om. En gang var de DSBs opbevaringslagre til træ, men de sidste 50 år har forfaldet tæret på dem, og særligt tagkonstruktionerne er hårdt ramt.
Vi vil over de næste par år  istandsætte alle ni lader med nænsom hånd og med respekt for de hænder der i tidernes morgen har bygget dem.

GIV DIG TID
​
BaneGaarden giver dig mulighed for at udforske en række aktiviteter – både for hoved og hånd, høste viden om jordens ressourcer, økologi og bæredygtighed. Her er gaardbutik og spiselige økologiske, plantefokuserede oplevelser. Stedet samler på de nyeste spiselige planter, fermenteringsoplevelser, kombucha og kefir i mange afskygninger. BaneGaarden opleves som fremtidens mad; mere råt, flere planter, mere lokalt og så øser det af sin viden til dig, så du går inspireret hjem og vil mere bæredygtighed, fordi du pludselig ser det som en gave i stedet for et påbud. Alt sammen baseret på fællesskab og engagement, og som udfordrer den travlhed mange oplever i dagligdagen. Coffe to stay – not to go…

TING TAGER TID
​
Du vil opleve at BaneGaarden bliver til på organisk vis over de næste par år - med tiden vil vi bl.a. etablerer den vildeste planteskole, et japansk tehus, vise bæredygtige byggematerialer og skabe rum for

Fit&Sund er en lokaltejet franchiseorganisation og ambitiøst fagligt fællesskab, der bygger bro mellem fitness- og sundhedssektoren. Hos Fit&Sund gør vi mest muligt i fællesskab som kædeorganisation på basis af fælles standarder samt vidensdeling og erfaringsudveksling med vores lokale ejere. Når vi lover vores lokale medlemmer og sundhedsforbrugere, at de hos Fit&Sund møder branchens højeste niveau af personlig service og træningsfaglighed i indbydende, inspirerende rammer, er det vores konkrete målsætning at sikre forbrugeren netop denne kvalitet – ved hvert besøg hos Fit&Sund. 

Derfor mener vi det, når vi siger, at succesfuldt kædesamarbejde forpligter. Vi ser det som en af vores kædes væsentligste styrker på markedet, at hvert af vores lokale fitness- og sundhedshuse har lokale særpræg og størst mulig tilknytning til sit lokalområde; men samtidig er det også et meget væsentligt kendetegn, at Fit&Sunds forretningsmodel, kædens fælles standarder og målsætninger er grundlaget og rammen for hvert af vores huse.

Fit&Sunds forretningsmodel bygger grundlæggende på idéen ”faglighed til forretning”. Vores forretningsmodel tager udgangspunkt i konkrete faktorer, der måler og understøtter vores lokale fitness- og sundhedsforretningers, kædeorganisations og -fællesskabs succes på markedet.

Founded in 1970, Kinetico was started by two engineers who pioneered the development of non-electric, fully automatic water treatment systems. Evolving from the Tangent Company, a small consulting design firm, Kinetico soon became a global organization of independent dealers, international distributors representing nearly 100 countries. Through the dedication of its founders, employees and distribution network, Kinetico has experienced tremendous success. The company has grown from a two-man, creative undertaking into a strong and dynamic organization.

Kinetico water filters, reverse osmosis systems and water softeners use the most advanced and innovative technology in the industry to remove contaminants and hardness, improving overall water quality while simultaneously protecting your investment in expensive water-using equipment. Suitable for a wide variety of commercial and industrial applications, our equipment is exceptionally durable, highly efficient and brilliantly designed.

Today, Kinetico is part of the Axel Johnson Group of companies, a global organisation and fifth generation company that continues to be successful in developing leading businesses.

At the Kinetico International Sales Division we help bring our state-of-the-art technology to all corners of the world. Contact us if you are interested in learning more about opportunities in your countries.

Maileg was founded in 1999 by Dorthe Mailil and Erik Mailil - combining their last name “Mailil” with the “leg”, the Danish word for play. Since founding Maileg, Dorthe has won many awards and honors for both her toys, as well as for her well-known illustrations that appear around the world in books, magazines and even TV shows. 
 
Maileg is today a well established global brand with headquarter in Herning, Denmark and Maileg Inc. as a subsidiary in Atlanta, USA. 
 
In September 2019 Maileg GmbH was established in Hamburg, Germany - handling all customers in Germany, Austria and Switzerland. Maileg Concept Store was launched at the same time in Hamburg, Germany – located at Eppendorfer Weg 77. 
 
Maileg is represented by agents and distributors in France, Australia/New Zealand, Finland/Sweden, Holland/Belgium, Italy, Spain, Portugal, Japan, Poland/Ukraine, Russia + CIS countries. 
 
We believe in story making! 
We believe that memories are made through the simple joys of children, bringing their imaginations to life. The best stories are their stories. We believe in inspiring children and everyone in their life to bring themselves and their stories to the world through innocent imaginative play. Play that connects and creates something greater. Something that endures through generations. Something that brings us all together. 
 
In a busy world of bright lights, bells and whistles, where new stories are continually impressed upon us… Maileg is a world in which matchboxes can be beds for mice; princesses make perfect teatime companions; and adventures can be found on a friendly forest walk. It is a world where cats and mice are friends. Ours is a world of childhood imagination - and this is a world we value. 
 
Maileg (pronounced My’lye) is a brand of charming Danish-designed toys created to inspire our children’s favorite playtime stories. By bringing storybook whimsy to everyday moments, Maileg toys help children explore the pure and simple wonder of imagination.

HYDRACT CONTROLLED by WATER... ENGINEERED by HEART

The name HYDRACT is an abbreviation of the two words HYDRaulic ACTuator.

HYDRACT was founded on the fact that water is incompressible and, therefore a more reliable media for process valves, in terms of energy consumption, total cost of ownership, and functionality. 

The development of the HYDRACT water hydraulic technology was based on the recognition of 4 basic needs in the brewing industry, which have subsequently also proved to be valid in other industries.

Reducing CO2 emissions, improving profit and reducing capital investments, Increasing requirements for food safety, and the need for speed to market.   

Our goal is to make the beverage producers more profitable, sustainable and to make it simpler for the industry to produce.  

We make sure that our customers can deliver each and every product they manufacture with pride and confidence.

We have helped one of the industry’s largest and the group's most complicated breweries by turning their processes upside down and given them a whole new way to pursue energy efficiency and operational excellence.  

We develop water hydraulic solutions for the world's beverage producers, simplifying the processes and tackle the climate challenges by reducing the need for electricity and water.

We make the beverage industry more profitable and sustainable.

Did you know that you can create a positive social and environmental impact in the world by changing to the right coffee supplier?

Slow helps larger companies take tangible action on their sustainability strategies by offering a cutting-edge regenerative coffee solution. No greenwashing here; we simply mean business.

With total transparency and no carbon offsetting programs, we are working directly on the ground with local farmers to produce good-tasting and forest-grown coffee with 91% lower carbon emissions than conventional coffee. We even offer regenerative and nature-positive coffee solutions for our larger clients!

Slow has removed up to 15 intermediaries in the coffee value chain to have full ownership. The released value is then reinvested in nature and communities to grow coffee in forests and preserve and regenerate more forests. 

Our team in Laos works directly with our community of micro farmers to preserve forests and grow great coffee. Additionally, we are converting many hectares of monoculture coffee plantations into diverse coffee agroforestry, giving life back to nature. 

We have taken “fair trading” to the next level by offering farmers a 40% pre-payment to balance their cash flow. We have established an emergency health foundation for the farmers. We educate them in sustainable agriculture practices, helped them get bank accounts and even make individual livelihood improvement programs.   

All this and much more we do because we want to be the best coffee company in the World - for the World.

Tenax Sild blev stiftet i 1987 af Jørgen Pedersen, der som driftsleder havde årelang erfaring fra fiskeindustrien. Jørgen Pedersen etablerede Tenax Sild med den helt klare og konkrete ambition at skabe bedre produkter end dem, der blev tilbudt på det eksisterende marked. Kvaliteten skulle være kompromisløs.

Grundlaget var – og er – de fede sild fra de rene farvande mellem Island og Norge. Sildene skulle desuden forarbejdes i hånden af fagfolk, der kunne deres kram, nemlig at udskære fileterne så både udseende og smagsoplevelse blev optimal. Og sådan er det stadig.

Starten var vanskelig, for konkurrencen var hård. Men stædig fastholdelse i kvalitetskrav gjorde, at markedet for alvor fik øje på Tenax Sild. Og i dag er det sildene fra Tenax Sild, der efterspørges af krævende kunder, både i Danmark og på eksportmarkederne. I 2018 fusionerede Tenax Sild med Launis A/S, og i dag er produktsortimentet udvidet med fiskefrikadeller, fiskepaté og fiskespecialiteter.
 
Tenax Sild er et ægte familiefirma. Sønnen Michael Pedersen har i dag overtaget virksomheden. Flere familiemedlemmer er ansat i virksomheden, og det gør, at også de øvrige medarbejdere betragtes som en del af familien. Det giver et fælles engagement og en stolthed over at arbejde i en virksomhed, hvor der aldrig slækkes på kvalitetsbegrebet.

Our business is based on competence, trust and flexibility as well as the philosophy of delivering value-based and thought trough solutions and services that help our customers achieve their goals.
