Merrild Kaffe blev etableret 1964 af Møller Holflod Merrild. I 1969 startes egen produktion i Kolding. I 1979 overtages Merrild Kaffe af Hollandske Douwe Egberts. I 1992 etableres Merrild i Letland, og med salg til Litauen 1996 og 1999 til Estland. 2011 lukkes produktionen ned i Kolding, der flyttes til Holland og Polen. 2014 fejrer Merrild Kaffe 50 års  jubilæum. 1. juli 2015 fusionerer Merrild Kaffes Moder selskab Douwe Egberts med kaffedivisionen i Mondelez. Af konkurrencemæssige årsager frasælges Merrild brandet i detailsegmentet i Danmark og Baltikum til Luigi Lavazza Torino. Overtagelsen sker pr. 1. oktober 2015. I slutning af januar 2016 flytter Merrild Kaffe til andre lokaler på Erritsø Møllebanke 3, 7000 Fredericia.

Thermex — siden 1958
Thermex designer og udvikler emhætter og emfang — og har gennem næsten 50 år leveret løsninger til både private og erhvervslivet. Vi har Danmarks største sortiment af emfang og emhætter — og har vores produkter udstillet hos flere end 900 køkken- og hårde hvidevareforhandlere over hele Danmark.

Thermex har hovedsæde nord for Limfjorden i Hjørring, hvor der er hav til alle sider, højt til loftet — og masser af frisk luft. Det er inspireret af disse rammer, at vi designer og udvikler vores produkter.

Foruden hovedsædet i Hjørring har Thermex afdelinger i Rødovre, Norge, Sverige og Spanien.

People Like Us er en dansk bryggervirksomhed, der drives af folk fra kanten af arbejdsmarkedet og supporteres af Mikkeller.

People Like Us arbejder for
1. At brygge gode specialøl, som skal sælges i hele verden
2. At skabe en masse jobs til mennesker fra socialt marginaliserede grupper, samt at inspirere andre til at gøre det samme
3. At udfordre samfundets opfattelser af normalitet og fællesskaber

People Like Us er en platformsvirksomhed, der foruden bryggeri-delen tæller grene som: 
- En outsourcingsafdeling, der outsourcer arbejdskraft til andre virksomheder
- krigsveteranprojektet "364 - it's about the rest of the year"​ 
- PLUC; en medlemsklub og fællesskabsgenerator, der skaber nye fællesskaber på tværs af eksisterende:  Strik & Drik er det første i rækken. 
- foredrag, oplæg, præsentationer og showcases 
- et iværksætterhub for unge autistiske talenter
- udlejning af fadølsanlæg, beertenderservice og rullende bar til events. 

Alt dette udspringer af vores mission med at skabe en social bevægelse, der kan gøre verden til et mere tolerant, inkluderende, kreativt og entreprenant sted - en øl ad gangen: Det vi kalder en #socialrevolutionbybeer

Sports Connection ApS is exclusive distributor of the American footwear brand SKECHERS in the Nordic countries. Our products are also distributed through a strong wholesale footprint, of more than 1600 retailers in the shoe- and sports industry in the Nordic countries. 

SKECHERS is the world's third largest footwear brand, sold in more than 170 countries and in 2020, 163 million pairs of SKECHERS were sold worldwide, through multi-brand shoe stores, sports shops, department stores and online, and, in more than 4,000 SKECHERS concept stores around the world.

SKECHERS USA, Inc., based in Manhattan Beach in California, designs, develops, and markets a broad range of lifestyle-, fashion- and leisure shoes men, women, and children, and is an established shoe brand in the performance segment with functional golf-, running-, walking-, and training shoes. ArcelorMittal Construction Danmark er en del af verdens største stålproducent ArcelorMittal. ArcelorMittal er repræsenteret i over 60 lande og har i alt ca. 250.000 ansatte.

ArcelorMittal Construction i Danmark er specialister i tyndpladekonstruktioner. Vil tilbyder bl.a.:
-	sandwichpaneler til facade med mineraluld / PIR-skum
-	sandwichpaneler til tag med mineraluld / PIR-skum
-	sandwichpaneler til akustikregulering (mineraluld)
-	højprofiler / selvbærende trapezplader
-	Letbjælker (Z- og C-åse)
-	trapezprofiler
-	sinusprofiler
-	bagvægskassetter

ArcelorMittal Construction i Danmark drives af Steen Carlsen (tidl.: Jernkontoret, Grønbech Construction og Haironville), Arne Rasmussen (Tidl.: Nordisk Byggemontage og Haironville) og Søren Møller (Tidl.: Plannja og Lindab). Alle har vi en lang baggrund med salg og projektering af tyndpladekonstruktioner. Vi kan hjælpe med at finde de rette løsninger inden for vore primære kompetenceområder og kerneprodukter. Vi udfører selv alle beregninger på tyndplader – herunder skivevirkning/forskydning i trapezplader, hvor vi har vores egenudviklede og gennemprøvede softwareprogrammer til tyndpladeberegninger.

ArcelorMittal Construction i Danmark drives som agentur med eneforhandling af alle produkter fra ArcelorMittals enorme produktprogram. Vi har vel nok markedets bredeste profilprogram inden for både sandwichpaneler og trapez-/sinusprofiler samt et meget stort farveprogram i vores mange forskellige overflader, bl.a. overflader op til korrosionsklasse RC5.

The idea behind RAWBITE was to create a simple and honest product that delivers energy and is easy to bring along and enjoy anywhere. This idea resulted in the organic fruit and nut bar, RAWBITE.

Since the first RAWBITE bar was created on the kitchen table, the interest for the product has not stopped growing in Denmark, as well as in more than 30 countries, where RAWBITE bars are now available. Everything in RAWBITE is driven by simplicity, joy and enthusiasm for the product. Even though the kitchen table can no longer fit the production, recipes are still developed here and no one stops until the taste is amazing. The product itself is created with the utmost respect for the natural ingredients which are processed as gently as possible. We continue our work with the strong conviction that less is more, just as we state:

ENJOY EVERY BITE!

Nupo - "To make life a positive experience for people while they're on a diet"​

In 1981, the leading Danish obesity researcher Dr. Flemming Quaade
developed a solution that would change the lives of his overweight and
obese patients. A formula to help them lose weight while providing all the
nutrition the body needs.

At the time, dieting generally meant abstaining from certain foods or from
eating altogether. We knew that unhealthy and unbalanced diets negatively
impacted people’s health and psychology, resulting in failed weight loss
attempts and fatigue.

In pursuit of our ambition to set a new standard for weight loss products,
we innovated the Nupo Very Low Calorie Diet (VLCD). The VLCD diet
liberated dieting making it healthier for the body with products containing
all the essential vitamins, minerals, proteins and fibers. Once the diet
products were in place, we needed a compass to guide different lifestyles
and diet preferences. The Nupo Brick System was born out of this need.
It removed strictness from dieting, making it flexible to the needs of every
individual. Nupo Brick System liberated the mind from dieting, making it OK
to eat the things that made you happy, as long as you stayed within the
boundaries of your daily brick count. At the time, such adaptability was
unheard of.

Our goal has always been to help people maintain as normal a
lifestyle as possible and still lose weight.

That’s why Nupo is considered the world’s most comfortable diet.

Biltemas sortiment udvikles hele tiden. I dag finder du mere end 19.000 produkter i vores varehuse. Produkterne er inddelt i 9 produktkategorier;

Bil-MC, Cykel . Elcykel,  Båd, Fritid, Hjem, Kontor-Multimedia, Byggeri, Bilpleje og Værktøj.

I dag findes der flere end 150 Biltema varehuse i Norden.

Biltema kataloget er stadig den centrale del af vores markedsføring. Kataloget udkommer to gange om året og uddeles til samtlige husstande i Danmark.

Hos Biltema har det stor betydning, at hele vores virksomhed følger love og regler, og at vores leverandører lever op til grundlæggende sociale rettigheder, arbejdsvilkår og miljølovgivninger i de lande, hvor de producerer. 

Derfor stiller vi krav!
Alle leverandører og producenter skal leve op til de sociale rettigheder, der findes i de respektive lande. Alle leverandører og producenter skal leve op til gældende miljølove. Nationale arbejdsvilkår, som f.eks. mindsteløn, højeste arbejdstid og sikkerhedsstandarder, skal helt og holdent efterleves. 
Børnearbejde må under ingen omstændigheder forekomme, og gældende minimumsalder for arbejdstagere skal helt og holdent efterleves. 
Alle leverandører skal informeres om vores krav, og skal skriftligt bekræfte at efterleve disse. Biltemas ansatte rundt om i verden, kontrollerer løbende, at ovenstående regler efterleves ved planlagte og ikke-planlagte besøg hos leverandørerne.

Biltema Café
I flere og flere varehuse finder du en hyggelig Biltema café. Her har du muligheden for at slappe af med en god kop kaffe eller få stillet din sult med lækre caféretter – eks. vores populære kyllingesandwich. Har du travlt kan du snuppe en fransk hotdog med dig på farten. Alt sammen til rigtigt gode priser. Hjerteligt velkommen!

The name WODEN stands for Works of Denmark. Staying true to our Scandinavian heritage has allowed us to focus on what really matters: creating durable quality sneakers with a simplistic design and a sustainable approach. It’s not just about creating another sneaker. We care to meet and match the demands of women and kids on the go. We do that by focusing on craftsmanship, functionality and that perfect fit. WODEN is designed to last and crafted to be worn all day long.

GABBA is a family-owned denim brand with more than 30 years of experience in jeans making. With a global mindset, we gather inspiration from around the world, and the originality in our in-house denim archive to create four annual collections, each of them well-balanced, unique and with an authentic denim identity.

TRESS AS er beliggende i Skanderborg og blev etableret den 1. juni 1982. Vi er et skandinavisk handelsselskab som har det formål til enhver tid at være den førende udbyder af kvalitets sports- og aktivitetsudstyr i hele Norden.

Vi vil udvikle og sælge miljørigtige produkter, der fremmer en bevægelseskultur som er båret af positivt menneskeligt sammenspil, bæredygtighed, sundhed og oplevelser.

companyName: Dan Modul A/S - Producent af inventarløsninger
description:
Dan Modul er eksperter inden for udvikling og produktion af Inventar til retail, kontor og byggeri, i bl.a. Skandinavien såvel som resten af Europa. Det er såre simpelt i hvertfald for dig, for hos Dan Modul tilbyder vi at varetage hele processen fra idéudvikling og design til projektstyring, produktion, installation samt opfølgning. Vi matcher altid din opgave op mod nøje udvalgte nøglepersoner, hvad end de sidder inhouse eller er eksterne håndplukkede leverandører.

Fleksibilitet, kvalitet og hurtig respons er vores nøgleord.

Og hvorfor fortæller vi dig så det? Det gør vi, fordi vores arbejde handler om at skabe gode resultater for dig og din forretning. Vi sætter os ordentligt ind i din forretning, og vi gør os fortrolige med dine ønsker og målsætninger. Vi opnår de gode resultater med fleksibilitet, kvalitet og hurtig respons, og ved altid at have for øje at skabe de bedste løsninger, som matcher netop dit behov.

Du er altid er velkommen til at kontakte os på tlf. 97 15 66 33  –  Og husk vi påtager os opgaver af alle størrelser.

Hanegal is an organic producer of high-quality products with a wide selection of cold meats, sausages, convenience, fowl products, free-from and products without meat.

Founded in 1966, Nemco is the exclusive Nordic supplier for leading International manufacturers of food processing industry equipment.

Our expertise and experience encompass all stages of food production within a wide range of industries; meat, bakery, fish, dairy, confectionery, fruit and vegetables - as well as non-food and medical packaging.

Our mission
We're committed to providing our customers with optimal solutions including machines, technical equipment, packaging film and shrink bags combined with outstanding maintenance and support.

Competitiveness
Our focus is our customers'​ competitive performance together with the needs and preferences of their end users.

Our goal is our customers'​ complete satisfaction.

The Perfect Process
Our passion is to create perfect processes. We combine quality with flexibility and innovation to produce the best processes - providing premium quality in every part of the product and every part of the process.

Our solutions are based on half a century's experience, the newest and most advanced technologies plus close cooperation with our customers and partners.


Business is about people!

Svaneke Bryghus is an organic craft brewery located on the sunny Island Bornholm in the Baltic Sea. As one of the first microbreweries to open in Denmark, Svaneke Bryghus is today known for its authentic taste, sustainable production methods and wide range of craft beers. 
In the experienced hands of brew master Jan Paul, Svaneke Bryghus produces around 1.5 million liters of beer a year, including several alcohol-free beers and gluten-free beers. Fifty per cent of the beer production is powered by nature – solar panels. 
Jan Paul is an acknowledged teacher within his field in Denmark and abroad. Combining nature’s inspiration with time and patience is, in his opinion, the key to the creation of a good beer. Time is the quintessence of our production; it’s what essentially gives our beer its balanced and perfectly rounded taste. We don’t release anything before the beer has had the time it needs.

Tilmeld dig vores nyhedsbrev på www.pr-trading.dk og vind flotte præmier hvert kvartal.
pr trading a/s har i mere end 50 år været en vigtig og pålidelig leverandør og partner til detailhandelskæder og mærkevareleverandører i hele Danmark. Vi designer, udvikler og producerer unikke displayløsninger, POS materialer, hyldesystemer og møbler til butiksindretning i alle tænkelige designs. 

Vi varetager opgaven fra start til slut - og det vi ikke selv producerer inhouse, får vi fra vores dygtige samarbejdspartnere i Sverige, Storbritannien, Tjekkiet, Polen, Kina og Baltikum.

Alle vores projekter - store som små -, har til formål at optimere din virksomhed, så det kan mærkes på bundlinjen. Om ønsket er at øge salget, reducere arbejdskraft eller differentiere sig i forhold til konkurrenterne, tilbyder vi kvalitetsløsninger og garanterer høj service, konkurrencedygtige priser og hurtig levering.

At Skandinavisk, we believe a more Scandinavian approach to life is better for all, and that living more 'Scandinavian' is not just where you come from, it's also how you think, how you treat others and the world that surrounds you, and what you treasure.

Certified B Corporation since 2019. Founding member of the B Corp Beauty Coalition.

It is VELA's desire to enhance the daily lives of people who spend considerable time sitting.

Lactalis er en franskejet familievirksomhed, der producerer mejeriprodukter, herunder ost. Vidste du, at Lactalis har det største udvalg af AOP-oste? Med stærke brands som Galbani og Président i bagagen og 240 mejerier i ryggen er vi klar til at finde de bedste og mest egnede mejeriprodukter til de skandinaviske detailbutikker og professionelle køkkener.

Arca er i verden for at udbrede glæden ved træning og en sund og stærk krop. Vi er Danmarks største udbyder af holdtræning af meget høj kvalitet. Hos os bliver du stærkere, sundere og en del af et fællesskab, der rækker langt ud over træningssalens vide rammer. Et træningsfælleskab, der går på tværs af medlemmer og trænere, på tværs af byer og lande.

Vores træning
Vores tilgang til bevægelse er unik. Funktionelle øvelser, intensitet og styrke - uden begrænsninger af æstetik, maskiner og ensidige workouts. Høj faglighed, gennemtænkte træningsprogrammer og sjov træning. Dét vi laver hos Arca, er ikke noget, du finder andre steder.
Vores holdtræning er omfavnende og inkluderende. Vi hepper hinanden igennem træningen, har det sjovt og motiverer hinanden undervejs. Det gør træningen sjovere og giver flere resultater.  

Vores trænere
Trænere i Arca er dygtige formidlere og dedikerede til trænergerningen. Deres viden inden for funktionel træning er stor og de brænder for at motivere, dygtiggøre og styrke hvert eneste medlem på vores hold. Som træner i Arca er man bidt af at træne, af at bruge kroppen og mener, ligesom vi, at træning skal være lige så sjovt, som effektivt!

Du er altid velkommen! På dit første hold og til træning nummer 500 - og som en del af trænerteamet. Vi glæder os til at tage i mod dig.

Tytex A/S is a world-leading company within medical fixation and compression textiles. We are  headquartered in the town of Ikast, Denmark. 
For more than four decades, we have focused on developing, producing and selling textiles for special medical needs ranging from post-op care to incontinence and maternity care.
Our products are developed to make the lives of our users safer and easier. We partner with distributors and with healthcare companies interested in private label products.
Tytex A/S is the parent company, with sales divisions in Denmark, the US, Germany and Thailand, as well as sales representatives who cover the entire world. Our production facilities are located in Slovakia

PP Møbler is a family owned Danish joinery workshop, established in 1953, with a strong tradition for crafting design furniture of highest quality. Motivation has always been the love of wood and a stubborn belief that technique, ingenuity and craftsmanship can be combined in the strive for quality.

We want to offer furniture that makes a difference in everyday life. Good design that combines style, comfort and functionality. Innovation Living is not just a name, but what we do. Combining decades of experience in the furniture business with an eagerness to evolve and surprise. In this way we can offer attractive and useful furniture for modern people.

At DILLING, we want to make the best and most sustainable underwear you will ever wear. 

DILLING is a family-owned company founded in 1916. We manufacture organic underwear for all family members and sell it directly to the consumer via our own webshops in Denmark, Germany, the Netherlands, Sweden, Finland, France and UK. 

The keyword for us is sustainability. Our products are made with the highest respect for the environment, the people in our supply chain, and the customer. We have our own dye house in Denmark, where only the purest and most eco-friendly colors are used. This has made it possible for us to be certified with the Nordic Swan Ecolabel, as the first underwear brand in Denmark, which we are quite proud of. We have been sustainable in our way of producing, even before we first heard that expression. 


RESPECT PEOPLE   -   UNDERSTAND QUALITY   -   BE SUSTAINABLE

Tøjeksperten er Danmarks største herretøjskæde med over 110 butikker rundt omkring i landet og webshoppen www.tojeksperten.dk.

Vi sætter en ære i den ekstraordinære kundeservice og forsøger hver eneste dag at leve op til vores navn ved at være eksperter inden for herremode. 

I mere end 50 år har Tøjeksperten leveret kvalitetstøj og god service til danskerne. Med en attraktiv kundeklub (Klub Tøjeksperten), 365 dages bytteret, Click & Collect og meget mere er Tøjeksperten mange danskeres favorit herretøjsbutik, og vi kan bryste os af at være den herretøjskæde i Danmark med højest kendskab. 

Vi arbejder konstant med at udvikle vores forretning – blandt andet ved at udvikle vores medarbejdere, sikre de bedste varer og brands og ved at implementere bæredygtige tiltag, der kan mindske vores miljømæssige fodaftryk. 

Derudover har synergien og samarbejdet mellem vores butikker og webshop højeste prioritet. Med udvikling af omni channel-principper der skal sikre, at vores kunder kan være sikre på at varer, brand, udtryk og service er det samme, uanset hvor vores kunder handler hos Tøjeksperten.

Vores medarbejdere er nøglen til, at vores forretning og alle vores tiltag lykkedes, og vi er stolte over, at vores medarbejdere har valgt Tøjeksperten som arbejdsplads. Ønsker du en karriere hos Tøjeksperten? Skriv dig op i vores jobportal: https://butikstalent.dk/

Systemløsninger til det professionelle byggeri

Cantona ApS er en danskejet virksomhed, der sælger byggematerialer til det professionelle segment i byggebranchen.
Vi har specialiseret os i at sammensætte verdens bedste leverandører af byggematerialer, med fokus på systemløsninger i et konkurrencepræget marked.

BITTE KAI RAND is an international luxury brand with a rich history in Scandinavian design.

BITTE KAI RAND has 6 yearly collections with a wide distribution in more than 15 countries, being available in 400 stores including 15 concept stores in Scandinavia.

With an innovative and curious approach to the western worlds fast pace, the brand is known for its unique style based on the design concept; quality, functionality and comfort.

Every season you will find beautiful prints and colours of the season, elegant silhouettes with contrast and graphic details in the collections - that are designed according to the philosophy - "A Feeling to Wear"​.

Renowned for knitting and graphic silhouettes, BITTE KAI RAND is open to the always-changing world and displays a bold curiosity towards using new and inspiring cuts, contrasting material mix and handmade prints as well as new edgy updates on the simple, timeless designs.

BITTE KAI RAND was established in 1981 by Bitte Kai Rand (Creative Director) and her husband Michael Rand (CEO). The head office is located in the old harbour area in the heart of Copenhagen.

The 15 concept stores are located in Denmark, Norway and Sweden, combined with a presence in selected multibrand stores worldwide. 

Showrooms are located in Denmark, Norway, Sweden, Finland, Germany, UK, The Netherlands, Ireland, Poland, Belgium, Russia, Switzerland, Austria, South Africa, USA and Australia.

The underlying philosophy in Noella is to create feminine fashion designs, that are consistently relevant for you, who love fashion.
We embrace the daring girl with our voguish take on the latest trends and timeless pieces.

With a fast-forward approach to the latest trends, our team of dynamic designers work with the greatest commitment to ensure that our contemporary design is always available to anyone - they take immediate action, when they spot a seasonal must-have.

2LP provides shop-fitting solutions based on an “in store, on time” promise to customers.
Balancing interior store design, budgets and tight timelines can be a tricky task. We understand that. And that is why for more than 15 years we have been delivering innovative retail furniture solutions our way, the 2LP way.

Our focus is not only on creating the ultimate experience for your customers, but also for you as we work together on bringing your ideas to life. We are by your side all along, from briefing, to installation, to follow-up – we make sure your store’s design reflects your brand identity.

To fulfil our “in store, on time” promise we rely on our network-based work model. We outsource design, manufacturing and installation to some of the best teams within the industry to ensure highly customized solutions. We provide you with the design you want, the way you want it.




2LP leverer butiksinteriør og indretningskoncepter ’in store, on time’.

Det kan være svært at jonglere med både projektledelse, konceptudvikling, design og budgettering, når indretningskonceptet til den nye butik skal på plads. Særligt, hvis alt skal spille sammen og passes ind i en stram tidsplan.Det ved vi. Og det er derfor, vi i mere end 15 år har dygtiggjort os netop her– og i dag udvikler og leverer innovative detailløsninger til små og store kunder i mange forskellige lande.

Vi fokuserer ikke kun på at skabe den ultimative oplevelse for jeres kunder. Vi vil også være den bedste samarbejdspartner for jer. Derfor er vi med jer hele vejen – fra ideudvikling og design til installation og opfølgning, så vi sikrer, at butikkens interiørløsninger afspejler jeres brand-identitet.

Vi stræber efter, at alt, hvad vi gør, sker ’In store, on time’. For at sikre, at vi kan leve op til det, arbejder vi med en netværksbaseret arbejdsmodel, og outsourcer design, produktion og installation til de bedste teams i branchen. På den måde skaber vi unikke løsninger – for alle vores kunder.

Founded in 1954 by legendary and four times Olympic Gold winner Paul Elvstrøm Elvstrøm Sails is today the largest loft in Europe and the marketleader within the sailing industry. 
Every day some of the most innovative sails for both cruising and racing are produced at our modern facilities in Aabenraa and sold by our colleagues/sailpoints all over Europe. 
With all the central aspects of sail production as sales, design, marketing, production, economy and administration gathered in one place Elvstrøm Sails are always right next to the production process and with our superyacht loft in Palma/Mallorca we also have a central position in order to cater for the superyacht industry.

Dansk  Byggeindustri er en branchesammenslutning i DI Byggeri og repræsenterer: Industrisektionen, Snedkersektionen, Alufacadesektionen og Stenhuggersektionen.

Dansk Byggeindustri repræsenterer medlemmer, som har en industriel produktion og proces, og som leverer materialer eller løsninger til byggebranchen. Branchesammenslutningen arbejder for at styrke produktiviteten hos medlemmerne og i værdikæden. Branchesammenslutningen varetager medlemmernes interesser i DI Byggeri og eksternt overfor andre organisationer, det politiske system og myndighederne. 

Vi ønsker at være tæt på medlemmerne, understøtte det tværfaglige samarbejde og kollegaskab og skabe værdi for medlemmerne med aktiviteter, som kan hjælpe dem i hverdagen og inspirere dem til fremtidens løsninger.

Vi er specialiseret inden for afvikling af sundheds- og relationsskabende forløb.

Vi har mange års erfaring med at bruge fysisk aktivitet som katalysator for at knytte stærkere relationer mellem folk, samt at bringe ekstra energi og overskud ind i hverdagen – og dermed højne både kvaliteten og udbyttet af de timer vi er sammen på arbejde, i møde eller til konference. 

Vil I tættere på kunderne, styrke sammenholdet på arbejdspladsen, skabe et unikt koncept med stor synlighed eller noget helt fjerde? Vi tager udgangspunkt i jeres målsætning. 

Running26 er skabt af et passioneret team, der igennem mange år har oplevet de positive individuelle og sociale aspekter ved at inkorporere bevægelse i hverdagen. 

Vi nyder at hjælpe virksomheder med at skabe de samme typer af oplevelser for deres kunder, samarbejdspartnere og ansatte.

ANOUR is a Copenhagen based lamp manufacturer, specializing in bespoke handcrafted LED lamps. 

Anour is lamps for a unique clientele. We combine traditional Danish materials and methods with new technology and trends to create a lasting, yet unique product.

Arash’s Persian roots and Danish upbringing influence his company’s products and policies. The company name – nour – means ‘light’ in Farsi, and the design of his lamps reflect traditional Danish values of simplicity and sustainability.

Arash claims that the secret to Scandinavian success in the design world can be summed up in two words: “no nonsense”. Rather than incorporating excessive design features into products, the Danes focus on crafting the essentials with quality. 

To Arash, the word ‘simple’ does not mean settling for the ordinary. Arash strives to create or exceed trends, not just follow them. He reveals, “I combine rare materials made by one of the last braziers in Copenhagen with new materials on the market.” This mix of old and new differentiates Anour from competitors in the lighting industry.

Arash defines sustainability as the creation of something that lasts. He says, “I hope to create a product that people cherish enough to restore.” He also hopes his product will become a classic design icon for future Scandinavian designers.

Sustainability also incorporates quality. Arash ensures that each lamp is handcrafted to perfection through his employment of a traditional Danish brazier who has worked with brass, copper and bronze materials for decades. This expert brazier implements the natural colouring processes of browning, oxidising and polishing to ensure the lamps’ quality do not deteriorate over time.

“Having a company is like having a child. You must nurture it and maintain its health so it develops into the best example of you.”
- Arash Nourinejad

www.anour.dk

European Freeze Dry is a market leading producer of freeze dried products and provider of specialist freeze drying services to a diverse range of industries. Established in 1964, our knowledge, experience and industry experts can help with your products. Our capabilities are extensive and we are continually investigating and developing new freeze drying applications. Part of our DNA is freeze drying of dairy cultures, probiotics and other highly specialized products.

Beckers blev grundlagt i 1865, og vores kunder tæller alt fra professionelle malere til private brugere. Vi er en af Nordens førende malingsproducenter – ikke mindst inden for miljøvenlige produkter. Vores produktion foregår primært i Nykvarn på en af Europas mest miljøvenlige fabrikker, og vi tilbyder flere miljømærkede produkter end nogen anden malingsproducent i Europa. 

For os er det vigtigt at levere produkter, som er produceret med omtanke for dem, der bygger, dem der bruger og dem, der bor. Vi er den første malingsproducent, som fik sine produkter Svanemærket, og vi kan bryste os af at have både det svenske Astma- og allergimærket, MI-frie og M1-mærkede produkter på hylderne.

Vores fokus på miljø og bæredygtighed er en nødvendighed og noget vi arbejder med hver dag. Maling påvirker miljøet, og vi har et ansvar for at gøre, hvad vi kan for at mindske den påvirkning. Derfor har vi blikket rettet i mod, hvordan vi konstant kan forbedre produkternes miljøpræstationer. Det gør vi bl.a. ved kun at have vandbaserede produkter og ved at have fokus på de emissioner vores produkter afgiver til indeklimaet både under og efter brug. Men den grønne omstilling er ikke noget nyt for os, det har været en del af vores DNA i 25 år. Seneste aktiviteter er brugen af genbrugsplast til vores spande og derudover har vi introduceret de første produkter, der er udviklet med udgangspunkt i massebalance-princippet. Princippet går ud på at udskifte nogle af de fossile råmaterialer i malingen med biobaserede.

Kort sagt: Maling med omtanke.

Beckers er ejet af Tikkurila Danmark, der dækker over flere stærke brands, herunder Tikkurila Master Solution og Tikkurila Industri. Tikkurila Danmark er en del af Tikkurila Group der er en ledende producenter af maling i Norden, Østeuropa og Rusland. Tikkurila Oyj blev grundlagt i 1862, og har 2.400 ansatte i 11 forskellige lande.

NiceHair.dk er Danmarks største beauty shop med salg af skønhedsprodukter i høj kvalitet i både ind- og udland. Derudover har vi 2 fysiske skønhedssaloner og -butikker, et blog- og videounivers, sociale medier og meget mere. Vi har hovedsæde i Esbjerg med 40 administrative medarbejdere og 60 lagermedarbejdere. Vi har en ambition om kraftig vækst og har derfor i 2016 fået en investor i ryggen i form af Egmont, der sammen med Nicehair’s stifter og direktør er klar til at indtage positionen som Nordens største beauty shop online.

We have more than 30 years of experience in the fashion industry. Our 2 brands, LauRie and ECHTE, target different segments and have different aesthetics, BUT share a common belief in the beauty of quality-consciousness, great design and a perfect fit. And always with sustainability as the core of everything we do.

Gumlink is the biggest independent B2B supplier of chewing gum operating with customers all around the world. We supply leading super market chains as well as branded manufacturers with cutting-edge chewing gum technology.

We manage the complete product process from idea to market launch. Our in-house R&D centre Chew Tech monitors the chewing gum market closely, especially with regard to innovation, development, preferred lay-out and flavours. This enables us to advise our customers on how to be successful in their local markets.

Gumlink operates through various joint ventures and partnerships on a global scale in order to offer competitive pricing and proximity to the market.

Since our foundation in 1915, product quality has always played a major role in the company. Today, Gumlink and its joint ventures hold all the certificates necessary to produce and sell chewing gum of the highest quality.

Based in Vejle, Denmark.

Leca International is a Saint-Gobain company developing, producing and marketing Leca products. Our main product is the Leca® Lightweight Aggregate (Leca® LWA), which is a simple, flexible and long-lasting product. Alone, it is just an expanded clay pellet, but combining multiple into an aggregate, the possibilities become numerous.

Traditions and history
Leca has been around for a long time, starting up in Scandinavia in 1938. Because of our high life expectancy we know that our products work and that they are long-lasting with a minimum of maintenance. In Leca we continue to develop and innovate our products, always looking for new partnerships and business models, that can boost Leca, our partners and the environment. 

Organization
Leca consists of more than 500 employees in 12 different European countries. Leca® LWA are produced in factories in Denmark, Sweden, Finland, Norway, Poland and Portugal. Furthermore, we have sales offices in the UK, Spain, Germany, Lithuania, Estonia and Latvia. 

Products and markets
Our main product is the expanded clay pellet, used for various purposes, such as projects concerning infrastructure, housing and water management, where product properties like light weight, strength, durability, drainage capacity and thermal insulation are highly appreciated. In addition, the pellets are used for producing blocks and elements, which hold a high position in several of the national Leca markets, especially in Northern Europe.

TOGETHER we BUILD for the FUTURE
We have defined the brand essence of Leca as “TOGETHER we BUILD for the FUTURE”. 
'Together'​ because we include our partners/ customers/ allied in the process. Many challenges are solved in close co-operation between us and designers or builders. 'Future'​ because the building industry is constantly changing. It is important for us to keep up with the new development within building, technology, economy and environment. Those who do not think ahead, will not be part of the future.

INGVARD CHRISTENSEN er et af Danmarks mest anerkendte møbelhuse, med afdelinger i Esbjerg, Aarhus, Vejle, Odense og Lyngby. 70 år med indretning, i tæt samarbejde med førende europæiske møbelproducenter og designere.

- "Danmarks mest inspirerende møbelhuse"​ - Det er ikke bare noget vi siger... Vi beviser det med et af landets største udvalg af designmøbler og tilbehør, som spænder fra dansk klassisk møbeldesign til eksperimenterende international møbelkunst.


INGVARD CHRISTENSEN er frem for alt en stærk og solid samarbejdspartner. Vi tilstræber innovative og moderne løsninger som afspejler hverdagens behov. Løsninger hvor design og kvalitet går hånd i hånd.

Faaborg Pharma har været førende inden for problemløsende hudpleje til meget tør og irriteret hud siden 2001. Huden er kroppens største organ. Derfor er det vigtigt at pleje sin hud med rene og sikre produkter, og at de cremer, vi vælger at smøre os ind i, er nærende og beskyttende. 

Hudpleje til hele familien
Faaborg Pharmas produkter er noget af det mildeste, reneste og mest beskyttende, man kan forestille sig. Faaborg Pharmas produkter vurderes som et sikkert valg fri for problematiske indholdsstoffer og derfor velegnet til hele familien. Det er ansvarlige, allergivenlige produkter, der plejer de mest almindelige hudproblemer - mildt og effektivt. Hudpleje skal hjælpe dig - ikke genere dig. Som din garanti bærer flere af produkterne AllergyCertifieds logo. 

Hudpleje med effekt
Uanset produkt har alle én ting til fælles. De indeholder ingen parfume. Fordi vi ved, hvad huden har bedst af. Kunsten består i at udvikle hudpleje, der ikke indeholder mistænkelige ingredienser, men som stadigvæk virker. Faaborg Pharmas produkter er baseret på traditionelle apotekerværdier om rene og sikre ingredienser. Vi følger selvfølgelig stadig udviklingen, og der kommer hele tiden nye ingredienser til, som har dokumenteret virkning. Dem bruger vi også i vores hudplejeprodukter. Velkendte og veldokumenterede ingredienser er et gennemgående kendetegn for alle Faaborg Pharmas produkter. Her tilføjer vi udelukkende de nødvendige aktive ingredienser i en koncentration, der har dokumenteret virkning. 

Hudpleje produceret i Faaborg
Faaborg Pharma ligger i den sydfynske købstad Faaborg med i alt 11 ansatte. Her designes, udvikles og produceres alle produkterne under kontrollerede ISO-certificerede forhold. Det sikrer, at kvaliteten og sikkerheden altid er i orden, da vi kan følge processen tæt og ved, at vores produkter bliver til under de bedste forhold

Øland A/S ✦ Samarbejde med respekt ✦ 70 20 19 11 ✦

Øland A/S er en af Danmarks førende producenter/leverandører inden for ventilations- og isoleringsprodukter til det professionelle marked.

Med respekt for både historie og erfaring, udfordrer vi konstant fremtiden gennem en modig og udfordrende innovativ tankegang. Med afsæt i en stor nysgerrighed, samt et brændende ønske om at gøre både produkter, ydelser og ikke mindst service bedre.

Vi glæder os til at samarbejde med dig.

Med over 90 års erfaring inden for lingeri, er det perfekte fit i højsædet hos Femilet – og det feminine og funktionelle går altid hånd i hånd. Funktionalitet, komfort og behagelig pasform er fundamentet for alle Femilets serier, og med et bredt udvalg af både over- og underdele kan du altid finde en model, der passer dig og dine former – så du kan gøre en god figur. Femilet henvender sig til den moderne, stærke og uafhængige kvinde, og ønsker at følge hende igennem livet og skabe lingeri, som giver hende velvære indefra. 
Femilet A/S er en del af den internationale lingerikoncern Groupe Chantelle i Paris og varetager – udover udvikling, salg og markedsføring af mærket Femilet – også salget af mærkerne Chantelle og Passionata i Danmark og Norge. Femilets lingeri- og badetøjskollektioner sælges i Femilets konceptbutikker i Danmark, via danske stormagasiner og kæder samt via specialhandelen i Skandinavien og Europa.

We are pragmatic, simple & honest.

We are curious by nature and never stop exploring new ways to combine denim with the newest trends and new ideas from the most talented people. 

We blend denim with the current again and again and again. We always do it with ambition, passion, honesty, courage and an independent creative mindset.

Haugen-Gruppen AS Denmark is a part of Haugen-Gruppen Nordic, operating with companies in Norway, Sweden, Finland and Island. 

We import and distribute leading food and beverage brands. Our company is one of the strongest companies within our business area. Among other brands we distribute Tørsleffs, Paradiso, Green Choice, Twinings, Blue Dragon, Kikkoman, TABASCO, Nissin, Pataks, Monini, Gaea og Oscar.

We operate in both grocery, confectionary and out-of-home channels.

Our team is highly skilled and our company culture is based on strong cross functional team spirit and freedom to act within the given frames, in order to contribute to our stakeholders targets.

Deerhunter® was established in 1985 as a direct result of the Engel family's passion for hunting and outdoor pursuits.

Deerhunter's vision is to develop and manufacture clothing for modern-day hunters and outdoor enthusiasts for whom freedom of movement and high-technical quality are of paramount importance. For more than 25 years, Deerhunter® has grown and expanded its collections so that we are now able to supply a complete range of hunting and outdoor wear.

In 2009, Deerhunter® was granted a Royal Warrant to supply HM the Queen and the Royal Danish Court, an appointment we are extremely proud of.

#Deerhunter #OutdoorClothing #Hunter

VEKSØ er en førende virksomheder inden for urban design. For os handler udviklingen af fremtidens byer i høj grad om at skabe sammenhængende løsninger, hvor der er plads til både ophold og færdsel. Vi har derfor fokus på hele byrummet og arbejder med løsninger inden for både byrum, cyklisme og belysning.

EASIS was founded back in 1993. At that time the possibilities were few if you wanted an ice cream with no added sugar - and many did. EASIS saw this potential and started a small production of ice cream in Aarhus and within a few years the success expanded into other categories of sweet products. 

Today, EASIS is a privately owned company offering products with no added sugar in many different categories such as ice cream, protein bars, snack bars, chocolates, candy, sugar replacement products, crisps, breakfast cereals, ketchup, etc. Our mission is to give the consumers the opportunity to make a conscious and informed choice concerning their sugar intake, and thus offer alternatives to all traditional products containing added sugar. 

We value innovation very highly, and we continously launch new products whenever we see new consumer needs. Our organisation works in a very agile way with high performance goals and care for details. 

EASIS products are available in all major Danish retail stores and we also deliver to the food service industry and major online shops. At easis.dk you will find our own B2C webshop. This webshop holds a significant role in our success allowing us to sell directly to end users and launch new products to evaluate potential.

Sjællands Erhvervsbeklædning A/S tilbyder arbejdstøj, profiltøj, sikkerhedssko, sportstøj, merchandise og gaveartikler m.m. - og vi har alle de førende mærker til stort set alle brancher.

SJEB A/S består i dag Sjællands Erhvervsbeklædning, Sportigan Rønnede og Onlysports. Hovedsædet er i Rønnede, men du finder os også i Køge og Vordingborg.

Firmaet har eksisteret siden 2008 og har kunder fra den lille håndværker til den større entreprenør- og produktionsvirksomhed samt kommuner og andre offentlige institutioner. 

Vi benytter et brugervenligt online system, der holder styr på medarbejdernes erhvervsbeklædning. Hver enkelt medarbejder får sit eget log-in og et antal point samt et forudbestemt sortiment.  På denne måde sparer medarbejderne tid, fordi det foregår online - og ledelsen sparer administrationen, for det klarer vi.

Så let er det hos os!

Vi udfører alle opgaver indenfor disse områder, og sikre dig og din virksomhed en optimal drift. Vi har eget serviceværksted, som består af dygtige medarbejdere der har en bred viden indenfor vores produktområder.

KOBAJ is an online-marketplace, where you buy together with others. In this way, wholesale discounts and all the other benefits of buying in bulk are passed on directly to our buyers. Our online-marketplace also gives winemakers across Europe the opportunity to display and sell their products directly to the Danish market. KOBAJ handles all the practicalities of payment, fees, insurance and transport of the goods from the producer to the customer. 

KOBAJ is a universe where we collect the buying power of our community members, allowing anyone to buy wine for prices that have previously reserved only for importers and wine merchants.

DYKON A/S is the leading manufacture of duvets and pillows with down and feathers in Northern Europe. 
We have produced high quality lifestyle products for more than 70 years.

With DYKON, you get a partner with all processes in-house. 
We have our own feather factory with washing, drying and sorting of down and feathers. 
Furthermore we have our own production and development of duvets and pillows. 
Shortly said: We have the entire production process under the same roof, thus ensuring a very high, uniform quality of all our products.

We will do everything for you to choose DYKON as your preferred partner for duvets and pillows. We offer you many years of experience and a unique concept that meets your demands and needs for high quality products.

At DYKON we only use down and feathers from carefully selected European suppliers who – like us – have a high level of ethics and who care about animal welfare.

DYKON has one of the world’s most efficient and highly automated production facilities. This makes it profitable to produce duvets and pillows in Denmark.
At our factory in Lunderskov, Denmark, we have everything in-house, allowing us to control the entire production process down to the smallest detail. We do our best to ensure that all our products are a safe choice and we always look for the highest standard in our field.

DYKON has its own EDFA certified laboratory to measure and test the quality of down and feathers. It is the largest and most advanced of its kind in Northern Europe. This ensures that all our raw materials comply with the strict standards and requirements we have set for our suppliers.

In a manufacturing company like DYKON we focus on the environment and sustainability. Our consumption of energy varies in accordance with our work load. We are introducing ongoing initiatives that contribute to a lower consumption of water, natural gas and electricity. In this way, we ensure even lower CO2 consumption.

From the docks to the spotlight…
I årtier var det gamle havneområde ved fjorden i Horsens den daglige arbejdsplads for hårdtarbejdende mænd og kvinder. Dette vejrbidte område blev formet af hårdt arbejde og dedikationen til at gøre sit bedste, fordi intet andet var en mulighed.

Ude på havnen. Derude hvor den rå fortid møder fremtidens stilrene linjer ligger et renoveret bådhus, som i 2013 blev domicil for DEPECHE - de rå og stilfulde rammer på havnen var funderet på de værdier, DEPECHE har dedikeret sig til for at skabe et ærligt og underspillet design. Siden CEO Janni Hørdum revitaliserede DEPECHE i 2008, har vi fokuseret på at gøre netop det, som vi er bedst til, da alt andet ikke er en mulighed.

Fra værdier til vision…
Fra tidligere at have en bred vifte af forskellige produkter i mange materialer, er det nye koncept hos DEPECHE at fokusere på bælter og tasker i ægte læder af høj kvalitet. Jannis vision om at skabe et fashion brand, der er funderet i kvalitet, funktionalitet og med produkter i et tilgængeligt prisleje, danner nu værdigrundlag for virksomheden. Hendes kreative vision udspringer af modet til at stole på sin feminine intuition, en stærk forretningsforståelse og et skarpt øje for de vigtige detaljer. Med kåringen som “Årets Unge Erhvervsleder 2014” har Janni og teamet skabt et brand med en oprigtig passion for det grundige håndværk, de bedste materialer og underspillede detaljer. Alt det, der i dag gør DEPECHE til en ærlig dedikation til læder accessories, der er genuinely different.

 
DEPECHE.
Dare to be Genuine.

Midsona Danmark markedsfører veldokumenterede produkter inden for økologiske fødevarer, helsekost, plejeprodukter og receptfri kosttilskud og urtemedicin. Du kan finde vores produkter og mærker overalt - i dagligvarehandlen, større supermarkeder, på apoteker, i helsekostbutikker og online butikker.

Vores mission er at udvikle og markedsføre produkter, der gør det lettere for mennesker at leve et sundt liv.

Midsona Danmark er placeret i det nordjyske Mariager, og er søsterselskab til Midsona AB, der er noteret på Stockholm Stock Exchange og har hovedkontor placeret i Malmø. Midsona opererer på det nordiske marked, i Tyskland, Frankrig samt Spanien og har flere søsterselskaber i Finland og Norge.

At Biomega we live by our mantra of being the best solution for your urban commute. We are breaking the car-centric status quo and pioneering a new lifestyle driven wave of urban bike transport. We want to put an elite electric bicycle brand like Biomega at the forefront of the global solutions conversation.

Ultimately our mission at Biomega is to reconfigure and clean up the urban commute, in doing so we believe that there is no substitute to industrial quality. 

To meet these high standards we need to control all parts of the value chain, requiring sizeable investments in cutting edge technologies and groundbreaking designs, rooted in our Danish heritage.

We believe that this quality is what clearly sets us apart; delivering comfortable, durable and affordable bicycles that meet the needs and daily grind of commuters globally.

DOLLE established a presence in more than 40 countries worldwide. Our flagship product category remains attic ladders, but we also produce modular staircases, spiral staircases and space-saving staircases as well as comprehensive and sought-after banister systems.

DOLLE is located in the village of Frøstrup, in the north-western region of Denmark. This is where we have our administration and our product line and in addition, we have factories in China and Ukraine. Our products are distributed through retail chains in more than 40 countries worldwide, and more than 90% of our revenues are sold to the export market. 

More than 300 dedicated and skilled employees take part in producing DOLLE products at our factories in Denmark, China and Ukraine. We are a dynamic team who always focus on developing new products and solutions. We have a great interest in providing our employees with the best and highest competences to provide our customers with the best service.

JUAL A/S producerer tilbehør til tage og facader til byggeindustrien i Danmark og store dele af Europa. Vores standardsortiment er bredt og dybt ligesom vi fremstiller specialprodukter i store mængder. Produkterne monteres af blandt andre tagdækkere og tømrere.

Vi er en moderne metalvirksomhed beliggende i Juelsminde i Østjylland, hvor vi pt. er 125 kollegaer. Derudover har vi et søsterselskab med 60 medarbejdere nær Shanghai i Kina, som producerer standardkomponenter til fabrikken i Danmark.

Virksomheden blev grundlagt sidst i 1960'erne og er i dag en solid og rodfæstet virksomhed med stærke værdier, erfarne medarbejdere, stor viden - og med blikket rettet mod fremtiden og mod byggebranchen i Danmark og resten af Europa.

JUAL A/S en del af JUAL GROUP A/S som også driver selskaberne JUAL Kina, Bygtjek A/S, Perform A/S og FIXNORDIC A/S.


JUAL A/S manufactures accessories for roofing and facades for the construction industries in Denmark and much of Europe. Our standard product assortment is wide and deep, and we produce large volumes of special-purpose products as well. The products are typically installed by roofers or carpenters.

We are a modern metalworking company located in Juelsminde in West Denmark, where we currently have 125 employees. In addition, we have a sister company with 60 employees near Shanghai, China, which manufactures standard components for the factory in Denmark.

JUAL A/S was founded in the late 1960s and is now a sound, firmly established company with strong values, experienced employees, vast know-how and looking to the future and to the construction industries in Denmark and the rest of Europe.

JUAL A/S is part of JUAL GROUP A/S. JUAL Group also manages the companies JUAL China, Bygtjek A/S, Perform A/S and JUAL Solar A/S.

Hos Atria Danmark har vi en stor forkærlighed for mad, og vores ønske er at mætte danskernes munde med velsmagende madoplevelser. Vi arbejder derfor altid ud fra missionen: ”Good food – better mood”. Vores vision er at skabe inspirerende fødevarer til enhver lejlighed – og være danskernes favorit! 

Vi er stolte af at være blandt Danmarks førende fødevarevirksomheder. Vi producerer forarbejdede kødprodukter som pålæg, pepperoni, pølser og bacon på vores egne produktionsfaciliteter i Horsens og Farre ved Give, samt fra udvalgte fabrikker fra vores svenske søsterselskab. Desuden har vi vores egen slagterbutik beliggende i Farre ved Give.

Atria Danmark blev grundlagt i 1950, i starten som Aage Jensen Salamifabrik. I dag tæller vores produktportefølje varemærkerne 3-Stjernet og Aalbæk Specialiteter, som bliver solgt til danske detail- og foodservice-kunder samt til udvalgte eksportmarkeder.

Kombinationen af mange års tilstedeværelse på flere markeder, faglig ekspertise og engagerede medarbejdere har gjort os til en velanset virksomhed, der er i stand til at opfylde kundernes krav om kvalitet, fornyelse og høj fødevaresikkerhed.

Vi har konstant fokus på at udvikle os i retning mod en mere ansvarlig fødevareproduktion, og vi arbejder målrettet med en CSR-strategi, der tilgodeser både product, people & planet.

Atria Danmark indgår i den internationale, finskejede koncern, Atria Plc. Med en opsætning på ca. 10 mia. DKK er det en af de største fødevareproducenter i Norden med repræsentation i både Finland, Sverige, Rusland, Polen og Estland.

Worktops are not just a surface. With 50 years of experience, our dedication to producing the finest is seen in every detail
The best material and our great craftsmanship, ensures you with a 30 year warranty. It certainly has already been shown that the quality and design are some of our hallmarks. When you decide to invest in a product from SPEKVA you can be sure that every little detail has been carefully selected, inspected and manufactured by hand.
We place great emphasis on craftsmanship and for decades have used a special method to join wood staves. Instead of gluing the staves flat side together, which is the most common, we join the staves by tongue and groove which are pressed together then glued. This allows up to 40% more surface area for the glue to bond, which prevents cracks from appearing later in time. 
 
This method together with the best raw material provides an incredibly strong construction and a very long warranty of 30-years.

Safe Water Management

Verden rundt er ACO kendt for vores førende rolle I håndtering af vand, fra kendskab til vandets karakteristika til alle aspekter i at kontrollere og håndtere vandet. Det er dette dybe kendskab der gør det muligt for os at udvikle innovative produkter, materialer og services der er optimeret til nutidens behov og fremtidens krav i byggeriet. 

Som leverandør til den danske Bygge -og Anlægsbranche leverer vi unikke kvalitetsløsninger til sikker håndtering af regn og spildevand baseret på vores viden og produkter.

­­­­­Cykelgear.dks målsætning er at blive den foretrukne leverandør af cy­kler, reservedele ­og tilbehør. Det betyder, at du vil møde en leverandør, der er meget engageret, ikke blot i at levere varen ­hurtigt og præ­cist, men også i god kundeservice.

LIP Bygningsartikler A/S med hovedsæde i Nørre Åby, Danmark, er et dansk firma, som siden starten i 1967 har produceret produkter af høj kvalitet til konkurrencedygtige priser.
Produktprogrammet var fra starten fliseklæb og fugemasser, der siden hen er udvidet med produkter
indenfor gulvspartelmasser, vandtætning, puds og facadesystemer, tørmørtler og radonsikring m.m.
Alle vores produkter er løbende under intern såvel som ekstern kvalitetskontrol, således at vi altid kan leve op til vores slogan:
LIP - når der bygges på kvalitet!

LIP Bygningsartikler A/S er i dag en international orienteret virksomhed, med forhandlere og datterselskaber i flere europæiske lande.
Al produktion til det europæiske marked foregår i Danmark.

Amanda Seafoods A/S producerer og markedsfører et bredt sortiment af fiskepålæg, som vi med stolthed har leveret til dansk detail, foodservice og industri siden 1916 under varemærkerne Amanda og Dronningen.

I 2019 har Amanda Seafoods A/S overtaget de kendte varemærker Bornholms og Glyngøre – begge bærer titlen ”Leverandør til Det Kgl. Danske Hof”.

Ambitionen er at fastholde positionen som Danmarks seafood leverandør nr. 1 og inspirere danskerne til at spise meget mere fisk. Med stor motivation, nysgerrighed og fiskefaglig stolthed sammensættes det bedste seafood sortiment i alle kategorier.  

Høj kvalitet, innovation og vækst er Amandas styrke og drivkraft.

Hos Amanda Seafoods er der ledelsesmæssigt plads til, at alle medarbejdere kan sætte deres eget fingeraftryk på succesen. Amanda er den bedste arbejdsplads for dem, som kan og vil og har vedholdenhed og vilje til at vinde kundernes gunst.

Amanda Seafoods blev i januar 2017 en del af Insula koncernen. Et nyt og spændende kapitel, der har givet adgang til det ypperste indenfor seafood i én samlet værdikæde.

Fish caught from the clean, cold fjords of the North Atlantic ensure high quality and great taste, which is what you will get when collaborating with Vega Salmon A/S.
Vega Salmon is a Danish salmon processer established in 2004, which is now a part of the Danish equity fond Maj Invest Holding A/S. We focus on processing, selling and marketing high-quality products with a continued dedication to building strong relationships with our customers by exceeding their expectations.   In addition to our own Vega Brands, we supply some of the strongest private-label brands to customers all over the world. Vega Salmon A/S offers customers the opportunity of producing special brands tailored to their specific needs in Private Label.

Vega Salmon provide retailers, wholesalers, food service, and industrial companies with high-quality products.
Our factory in Handewitt, Germany was completed in September 2012. With the capacity to process more than 30.000 tons of raw material per, the 12,000-m2 plant is one of the most technologically advanced facilities in the world. Our modern and flexible production facilities can handle both small and large production quantities. Our efficient production processes and extensive experience in logistics management enable low costs and timely delivery.
To ensure the highest product quality and food safety, Vega Salmon has an extensive quality assurance and food safety program and is certified according to the international recognized food safety standard IFS Food.

DAMPA has more than 70 years of experience with developing and manufacturing steel and aluminum ceilings and wall linings for the building- and marine industry. Our wide variety of standard and custom ceilings, all produced at our own factory in Tommerup, ensures that we can always deliver the optimal solution in correlation with design, functionality and quality, at a fast and flexible pace.

Solutions for creating beautiful architecture with curves and customized surfaces is a core competence of DAMPA. In close cooperation with project supervisors in the business, we innovate to resolve the obstacles that surface in every building project.

We insist on adding value to every building project, we focus on optimization of acoustics, indoor climate, durability and low installation and maintenance costs, all of this encased in a sustainable design.

Let us use our expertise together and create common advantages. The possibilities are endless and we will help you find them. We have the competences, the experience and the expertise, together we can transform this into extraordinary results, aesthetic as well as economical. Something special happens when brilliant minds get together, we are challenged, inspired and invited to walk new and innovative roads. With a special focus on developing sustainable solutions, together we will achieve results that will benefit all.

Dryk udvikler innovative plantebaserede erstatninger for mejeriprodukter. Vores produkter sælges primært i Europa, mellemøsten og asien via distributører eller som abonnementsordninger. 

Det er nødvendigt, at vi i fremtiden producerer og forbruger fødevarer langt mere bæredygtigt, end vi gør i dag. Vi skal finde løsninger på de globale udfordringer med folkesundhed samtidig med, at vi skal reducere det globale ressourceforbrug til fødevareproduktionen. Hos DRYK tror vi på en fremtid, hvor der er balance mellem mennesker, fødevareproduktion og naturressourcer. 

Sammen med vores kunder udvikler vi innovative plantebaserede fødevarer, som reflekterer fremtidens bæredygtige produkter og forbrug, med fokus på en sund udvikling for kloden, mennesker og natur. 

Vores produkter smager fantastisk skal opleves som relevant og attraktivt i hverdagen for vores kunder.

"Vi vil ændre måden man køber maling på"

Sådan tænkte de to barndomsvenner Brian Dennis Jensen og Jesper Laursen, da de i 2013 satte sig for at ændre måden man køber ind til sit malerprojekt på. Handlefrihed og hurtig levering var svær at forene, og det blev grobunden til at opbygge Danmarks største online farvehandel. 

Vores koncept bygger på idéen om, at det skal være slut med at bruge kostbar kvalitetstid i - og på vej til og fra - byggemarkedet eller farvehandlen. Vi har kort sagt skabt den 100% fleksible farvehandel, der gør det hele lidt nemmere for dig. Aldrig længere væk end din computer, smartphone eller tablet og altid tilgængeligt.

Vi har udfordret malerbranchen og gentænkt, hvordan man nemmest og billigst køber sin maling. Det er en branche som indeholder rigtig mange forskellige typer produkter – og du vil opleve, at du finder alt du skal bruge til dit malerprojekt samlet ét sted hos os.


Next level farvehandel

Vi vil skabe rammerne for den bedste købsoplevelse gennem en overskuelig og brugervenlig webshop, professionel rådgivning og hurtig levering. Hos os bliver du mødt med en uformel tone, hvor du som kunde er i centrum. Vores koncept er bygget på idéen om at tage imod alle kunder som venner. Vores dygtige medarbejdere vil tage imod dig med oprigtig interesse i netop dit projekt og hjælpe dig med det, du har brug for. Vi deler nemlig glædeligt ud af vores viden og ekspertise på e-mail, chat, telefon og på de sociale medier.

Vi tror på e-handlen. Og på at skabe en helt exceptionel shoppingoplevelse. Vi vil overgå dine forventninger til, hvordan det er at besøge en farvehandel, der forhandler maling online.

AndLight is a leading retailer of designer goods in Europe. 

Based in Copenhagen since 2007, we have made it our goal to guide people in the search for designer goods to their home. 

designer lamps to their home. This has been done partly via our centrally located showroom in Copenhagen, AndLight’s localised webshops. We offer a one-stop solution for customers looking to upgrade their homes and engage in the beautiful world of design.

AndLight has critically selected all brands available in the shop combining both great international design brands and smaller niche brands. Currently, AndLight represents more than +100 brands and more than +10.000 products hence allowing customers to find just the look they are searching for.

THUESEN JENSEN A/S er et skandinavisk brandhouse, der råder over 3500 forskellige kvalitetsvarer til køkken og bord.
Vores produkter er alle af internationale kendte high-end mærkevarer, hvor design, innovation, trends og funktionalitet er helt i top.

Thuesen Jensen har agentur på nogle af isenkrambranchens stærkeste brands:
Pillivuyt, KitchenAid, Magimix, Peugeot, Gense, Rösle, Mauviel, Alfi, Lion Sabatier, og mange flere.

Produktporteføljen er bred – alt lige fra el-maskiner, køkkenredskaber, spisestel, bestik til termokander, knive og kogegrej.

Nøgleordet er kvalitet, hvilket gælder for både vores produkter og i vores arbejde til dagligt.

Hovedparten af disse har base i Glostrup, Danmark. Hvor hovedkontor, varelager og det danske showroom er beliggende.

VTI is among the world biggest producers of edge glued panels and posts to the furniture industry, the window industry and the DIY market. Our yearly capacity is more than 2.5 million m2. We use our human and financial resources to grow in efficiency for the benefit of our customers as we gain experience of new requirements and demands.
 
We see it as our most important job to meet the requirements of our customers regarding commitment, innovation and quality in all aspects.
We believe in cultivating a valuable co-operation that is based on a mutually open and trusting relationship.
  
The key to maintaining and improving VTI’s position as a clear market leader is the mutual development of components, employees and the latest technology in a close relationship.

On the 8th of June 2005 VTI received King Frederik the 9th prize of honour for excellence in export.

VTI is proud to present AAA in creditworthiness - latest awarded in november 2021.

Leca Danmark A/S is a Saint-Gobain company developing, producing and marketing Leca® products in Denmark. Leca® Lightweight Aggregate (Leca® LWA) is a simple, flexible and long-lasting product. Alone, it is just a single expanded, lightweight clay pellet, but combining multiple into an aggregate, the possibilities become numerous.

Traditions and history
The company we know as Leca Danmark A/S was founded in 1938, where it produced its very first lightweight aggregate. The following year, the first rotary kiln was built and this has delivered lightweight aggregates to our customers ever since. 

Organization
Leca consists of more than 500 employees in 12 European countries. Leca® LWA are produced in Denmark, Sweden, Finland, Norway, Poland and Portugal. Furthermore we have sales offices in the UK, Spain, Germany, Lithuania, Estonia and Latvia. 

Products
Our main product is the expanded clay pellets, used for various purposes, such as infrastructure, housing and water management, where product properties like light weight, strength, durability, drainage capacity and thermal insulation are highly appreciated. In addition, the pellets are used for producing blocks and elements, which hold a high position in several of the national Leca markets, especially in Northern Europe.

TOGETHER we BUILD for the FUTURE
We have defined the brand essence of Leca as “TOGETHER we BUILD for the FUTURE”. 
'Together'​ because we include our partners/ customers/ allied in the process. Many challenges are solved in close co-operation between us and designers or builders. 'Future'​ because the building industry is constantly changing. It is important for us to keep up with the new development within building, technology, economy and environment. Those who do not think ahead, will not be part of the future.

OBS! Not located in DK? Take a look at Leca International's LinkedIn page: Leca® International

Siden ØnskeBørn blev etableret, i 2001, har vi betragtet det som vores vigtigste opgave at få vore kunder til at føle sig trygge som forældre, og vi giver altid en god og uvildig vejledning, både i de fysiske butikker og på web-shoppen.
Vi er en frivillig dansk kæde af større butikker med et stort udvalg af produkter, der gør det sjovere og lettere at være forældre til småfolk. Siden starten har kæden haft succes, og det skyldes ikke mindst, at alle butikker stiller en udstrakt service, et stort udvalg og faglig viden til rådighed for forældrene.
Det store udvalg dækker mange aldersgrupper, og du kan vælge mellem økonomisk fordelagtige produkter og markedets bedste og mest eksklusive.
Hos ØnskeBørn finder du også et personale, der ved stort set alt om butikkens produkter. Derfor er vi i stand til at give dig den rådgivning og vejledning, du har behov for, når du ønsker det bedste for dit barn.
Vi syntes at børn er sjove, derfor tager vi dem alvorligt. Det afspejler sig også i vore mange servicetilbud, der gør det endnu sjovere og lettere at være forældre til småfolk.

Founded in 1990 by Ivan Hansen and Henrik Sørensen, Onecollection manufactures designer furniture of a very high quality at its own factory in Ringkøbing. In 2000, Onecollection acquired the exclusive rights to produce Finn Juhl’s iconic furniture from the 1940’s and 50’s. Since then, the company has re-launched a comprehensive range of Juhl’s designs. In 2013, Onecollection manufactured all new furniture for the Finn Juhl Chamber at the UN Headquarters in New York. Today, Onecollection is present in more than 30 markets.

Otto Suenson er blandt landets ældste vinforretninger med en historie, som går helt tilbage til 1880.
Vi har altid været drevet af passionen for god vin og har gennem tiden opbygget et af Danmark's største udvalg af kvalitetsvin fra Bourgogne, Italien og Californien.

European House of Beds A/S is an innovative bedding company with broad experience in the industry. We add value to your total bedding offer by delivering innovative design and superior service. Our HQ and production facility is located in Horsens, Denmark. We create and promote strong consumer brands such as Ecobed, Livingbed, Temprakon and Kinnabädden. Our design teams also create unique customer brands for selected customers. Working closely with the customers, we develop innovative bedding concepts tailored to their needs. This allows them to attract and profile the consumer for increased brand loyalty and profitability. We are privately owned and have an ambitious plan for organic growth.

ProOwnedCycling offers cycling products with a story. Get your hands on original items sourced directly from the Tour de France teams.

A modern slaughterhouse based on good craftsmanship
DanePork - is an independent, privately owned slaughterhouse located midway between Vejle and Billund. We value good craftsmanship and high quality, as well as proximity to our customers and suppliers.
We ensure and appreciate having close contact to our customers, with whom we jointly develop new products and packaging. Our production has great flexibility and thus a quick conversion. Our capacity allows us to service the small butcher’s shop and the large food group.  
DanePork was started St. Lihme, and therefore the local area is a very important place for the owner. It is important for DanePork to support the activities and initiatives that take place in the local area, and in this way help to maintain and develop the local area of which we are part.
•	The slaughterhouse started in 1989, was EU approved in 1996, and in 2001 the slaughterhouse was approved for export to the United States and Japan.
•	Other countries we export to include Italy, China, Canada and Australia.
•	Today, DanePork currently employs approx. 185 dedicated employees, all of whom guarantee the company's high level of service and flexibility.
•	In 2011, we changed our name from Slagtergården St. Lihme A/S to DanePork A/S.
Our products is the best meat supplied by Danish farmers
We supply the highest quality meat that meets the production requirements, which enable us to supply meat all over the world. 
Our dry slaughter and gentle cooling ensures that the meat you buy can get a crispy crackling and you obtain a good taste experience.
Flexibility, craftsmanship and quality
We are innovative and continuously optimise our production to follow the changing needs of the customers, still never forgetting that our craftmanship must be in proper order.
We have set up our production equipment so that it can be quickly adapted to all types of cuts. This means a fast delivery time for our customers.

Since 1982 Nordic Sense has developed and manufactured private label products for personal care in corporation with a wide range of respected and well-know companies.

Our team of highly skilled and service minded employees are all experts within their field. Each one is dedicated to guiding our customers safely and professionally through the entire process.

Skitech har forhandlere i hele Danmark og Grønland. Alle butikker bliver naturligvis oplært i brugen af vore produkter for altid at kunne yde en professionel service over for kunderne. Cervello arbejder for, at mennesker ramt af hjerneskade kommer hurtigere og bedre tilbage til hverdagens fællesskaber. 
Igennem fleksible, innovative løsninger understøtter vi kommuner med hjerneskade-indsatser i NÆR-miljøet – altid med fokus på at inddrage både borgere og pårørende i rehabiliteringsprocessen. 

Cervello er desuden en social impact virksomhed, og det forpligter.
Vi arbejder med hjertet på rette sted, og stræber aktivt efter at indfri FNs verdensmål #8 og #10 for at skabe anstændige job og økonomisk vækst samt reducere ulighed.

The Danish Lung Association is a patient association with a history of more than 110 years. Orginally, our main purpose was to fight Tuberculosis. However, times have changed and today we work on improving lung health and preventing all lung diseases through Education, Advocacy and Research.

bisgaard is one of Europe's fastest growing brands within the children’s shoe market and an established international enterprise, with a team of highly professional and energetic employees. bisgaard design, produce and sell high quality children's shoes through more than 700 retailers both online/offline in 16 countries. Quality and design is the highest priority in our daily work. 

We have a simple philosophy at bisgaard: only real leather is used, we always ensure a good fit, and focus on innovative design. We strive to make every day more exciting for children, so that they don’t feel like they are walking in someone else’s footsteps.

The company owners Marianne and Henrik managed 3 enterprises operating within sales of children and women’s shoes for 12 years. She is creative and innovative while Henrik has a more structured approach and a passion for sales and marketing. In 2005 bisgaard became reality. Marianne is the designer for bisgaard and Henrik is the company’s CEO. The growth has been steady the last years and a strategy for further growth in international markets is already established with a clear digital strategy.

companyName: Den Engelske Pub YNWA and its subsidiaries
description: The English Pub - "You'll Never Walk Alone"​ was started up in the heart of Kolding in December 1990 as an attempt to create an authentic ENGLISH pub with an authentic atmosphere as opposed to so many others in this country who seemed to think that by hanging a Union Jack in the window they had found an alternative to traditional Danish beer taverns. Today the pub is renowned throughout the country, nor least thanks to its unique selection of beers and for its exciting food menus. Two function rooms allow us to cater for all types of parties and reunions. We pride ourselves on being vastly different from run-of-the-mill bars by trying to fill each week with a varied selection of activities from quizzes to Open Mic evenings, from interesting tastings to beery themed days such as our highly succesful "Beer & Cheese"​ event. The majority of our more than 250 beers are imported by ourselves - along with a range of spirits such as gins from The Lakes in Cumbria -  and are only to be found here at YNWA. The owner Torben Mathews is well known throughout Denmark for his unique ethnic beer tastings where relatively unknown beers from all over the world are accompanied by his distinctive mix of English and Danish humour.

Viking Rubber Co. A/S is a family owned company, established in Denmark 1935. 
We have always, produced quality wear for the Fishing industry, and as the company grew, we began making work and rainwear for far more industries. Now we see a still growing need for wind and waterproof apparel, therefor we produce and develop better and stronger rain and work wear, for the company that believes in  quality just as we do. In 1975 Svend Aage Andersen bought Viking Rubber Company A/S, and right after, we began the first export to England, now we export approximately 90 % of what we produce, from our Factories in Vietnam. 

In 2004 we established partnership with a textile factory in Ho Chi Minth City. Since 2010 we have owned 100% of Viking Vietnam ltd. The ownership of our Vietnamese factory makes us particularly flexible. And that is exactly one of our 5 values. At the moment we have 450 employees in our Factory in Vietnam. 

In Denmark we have designers which are working very close together with our customers, to ensure the absolute best outcome. Our Team in Denmark work hard each day to make sure the customers get the exact product that was ordered, and they are available during the process from begin to the end. 

Our newest collection is called Evolution 35, or EVO35. We are very proud of this new collection, with which we have moved the boundaries for work wear, as it has a twist of fashion, and is of very high quality. 

All Our Values is listed underneath: 

• Flexibility 
• The costumer is most important

KFI er resultatet af tre fusionerede fonde og har til formål at støtte frie danske købmænd

KFI i sin nuværende overordnede form blev en realitet i 1995 med fusionen mellem Købmændendes Finansieringsinstitut (1955), Instituttet for KøbmandsEtablering (1961) og Institut for Købmandsfinansiering (1971).

I forbindelse med KFI’s arbejde med at fremme den frie danske købmands interesser, er der fastlagt en række kriterier for at definere den hos KFI støtteberettigede frie danske købmand.

Fri: Selvstændigt ejerskab, eller evne og plan om at udvikle butikken mod selvstændigt bestemmende ejerskab.

Dansk: Den frie købmands aktiviteter sker under normale omstændigheder udelukkende via fysiske butikker placeret i det geografiske Danmark.

Købmand: En person, der driver mindst én fysisk butik, som primært handler med et bredt sortiment af dagligvarer. Typisk med et salgsareal på mindst 450 m2 og en årlig omsætning over 15-20 mio. kr.

Wireless loudspeakers for anyone who values exclusive Nordic design and authentic sound.
All six loudspeakers are named after Scandinavian capitals, a testimonial of Vifa’s dedication to its Nordic heritage. A DNA that is also deeply anchored in the materials, all chosen in order to convey the core value of true Nordic authenticity: A special-designed textile cover from Kvadrat gives the loudspeakers a genuinely groomed look. And the solid aluminum frame underlines the idea of a robust premium product. Finally, the discretely embossed logo and embroidered interface that has become Vifa’s signature in the Nordic series, is to be found on all products.

Founded in 2004, Rosemunde is rooted in Scandinavian values, with feminine, elegant styles and business dynamism at its core.

Today, Rosemunde is an established lifestyle brand retailing in more than 1,500 selected shops and department stores worldwide as well as online. The company is built on beautiful clothes that is easy to wear, such as our bestselling signature silk camisoles, cardigans and fine knits accompanied by fashion forward pieces like luxurious lace dresses, feminine shirts and skirts. Adapting to the international fashion scene, Rosemunde still places a great honour in staying true to the cores DNA, i.e. functionality and femininity are two essential elements in each and every piece that bears the Rosemunde name, offering women around the world a feeling of luxury – every day.

Dencon was founded in 1964. We can proudly say that we have over 50 years of experience in manufactureing ergonomic, functional furniture.

Today, our production area is 8,500m2; we employ around 60 people. The company's core skills are the manufacture of board-based furniture on modern, streamlined machinery. This allows us to meet our objective of delivering value-for-money products.

Today's product range is exclusively office furniture, with flexible, customer-specific solutions in small or large quantities our particular strength. Numerous finishes, colours and sizes make for  ample opportunities to personalise a setting and to make something quite unique.

Products are sold through professional dealers in Northern Europe – primarily Scandinavia.
