Expanding into most European markets, a steady growing turnover, always expanding, and latest launching two additional brands, makes BOS ready to magnify and unfold even further in the years to come.

The people behind our new brand are all skilled and dedicated souls, selected from the fashion industry. We have decided to make a difference, and we are ready to do what it takes to get there! Impressing our customers, dealers, partners and ourselves by working hard and keeping focus on the process.

Eventyret tog sin begyndelse, da familierne Laudrup og Buhl valgte at forene deres lidenskaber for spansk vin og gastronomi i starten af 90'erne. Laudrup Vin begyndte i 1993 at importere et lille antal flasker hjem til venner, familie og bekendte.
Allerede i 1999 blev der solgt 95.000 flasker, primært til restauranter, hoteller og erhvervsvirksomheder, samt specialforretninger i Danmark. I 2013 blev der solgt mere end 1 million flasker, og passionen for god vin og delikatesser er i 2018 blevet til en mindre virksomhed med over 20 ansatte med hver deres spidskompetence. 

I dag importerer vi vin fra hele verden. Vi mener, at der er en nøje sammenhæng mellem mad og vin, og derfor har vi begge dele. Vores gastronomi-produkter kommer primært fra Spanien og sekundært fra Italien. 
Vi har et fantastisk netværk af kendte og dygtige køkkenchefer, som vi har en god sparring med. Vores kunder er ofte nysgerrige livsnydere, som elsker nyheder fra vinen og gastronomiens verden, og som ikke stiller sig tilfreds med en billig mellemvare. 
Vi har samlet alle vores passioner for det gode liv i et eksklusivt, men samtidig ekstremt bredt sortiment - vores kunder behøver således kun at handle ét sted.

Udover vin og delikatesser er vi specialister i at arrangere indholdsrige vinrejser, fyldestgørende uddannelse, winemakers arrangementer og andre vinevents.

Globus Wine's main activty is filling of wine in bag-in-box'es, import and sale of wine.

By focusing on professional expertise, a deep passion for innovation and new ideas Globus Wine has gained a market position as a leader in designing and advising customers om commercial bag-in-box solutions. 

As one of  the few distributors Globus Wine are represented in all major Danish retail chains such as COOP, Dansk Supermarked and SuperGros and through the German subsidiary one of the major distributors in the Danish-German border. In addition, Globus Wine experiences growing revenue from other scandinavian countries and the countries around the baltic sea.

Our bag-in-box bottling plant is applying one of the leading BIB technologies from Scholle that through a "Form-Fill-Seal" proces creates a hygienic and efficient in-line production of the bags directly from the film. The 6 head rotary filling technology encures the longest life through the gentle flow of the filling process and the industri's smallest content of air in the BIB-filled bags.

The bottling plant is integrated with fully automated and robot-driven packet and palletising. The entire facility is designed for highest level of full automation and thus minimal use of manual labour.

Globus Wine is certified according to IFS (International Food Standard). Accordingly, premises, plant and procedures are complying with the strictest standards in the market and setting the future standards for the industry. Furthermore, Globus Wine is among the few ECO-certified for bottling of organic wines. Globus Wine has its own in-house laboratory where all wines are analyzed in a number of parameters using a highly professional FOSS Wine scanner.

The company is established in 2006 and have within 3 year realised a amazing turnover growth above 1.300% and expect to reach a turnover in 2010 above EUR 24 million.

Bedre Nætter er en online forhandler af Senge, Madrasser, Dyner og Puder. Produkterne der sælges på siden er fortrinsvist fra Nordiic - Interior of Denmark, der er en nyt dansk mærke indenfor møbelverdenen. 

Med Nordiics højkvalitets produkter, samt en stram omkostningsstrategi, er det Bedre Nætters mål at leverer en høj kvalitet til overskuelig pris. Dette kan i særdeleshed lade sig gøre pga. placeringen i et møbelmarked der endnu ikke har formået at tilpasse sig online verdenen i samme grad som den resterende detailhandel.

Fårup Betonindustri A/S fremstiller idag et bredt udvalg af betonelementer til alle former for byggeri inden for bolig, landbrug, miljø og industri og er en virksomhed i ekspansiv udvikling på betonelementmarkedet.

Fiberpartner is a leading supplier of staple fibres,  to customers across the globe.

Falengreen A/S is a Food and Beverages company located in Stilling, Denmark. After it was originally introduced to the market as DKI A/S in 1989 by founder Ole Falengreen Nielsen, the company grew steadily year after year into what is today known in the market as a trusted producer of dairy products. It has since then won a multitude of awards for its achievements – including numerous Børsen Gazelle-awards. 

Falengreen develops, produces and imports a wide selection of cheeses, dairy products and beverages as well as convenience products. Foreign brands, private label products as well as our own brands are sold in most Danish retail and food service chains. 

Finding the right cooperation partners and creating long-term relations with these partners are in focus. Our services range from category and product development, strategic feedback and packaging designs as well as storage hotel, optimum logistic solutions, market knowledge and key account management.

We as a company work with great flexibility in order for us to meet the demands from our suppliers on one hand, and at the same time deliver customized solutions. 

Our customers are the major retail chains in Denmark as well as the food service sector. We focus on our own concepts, private label development and foreign brands sold on the Danish market. Furthermore, we distribute our products to several other countries than Denmark. 

•	We develop and produce our own dairy products 
•	Import specialty cheese from all over Europe, and distribute them to multiple Danish supermarkets
•	We have built up a strong expertise within food and beverages, 
•	Each year we produce 3.500 tonnes of cheese
•	On our production lines various cheeses and pizzatopping are grated, cubed and packed. 
•	We have a production of melting products; a product similar to cheese, in which the milk fat is replaced by   vegetable oil
•	Falengreen holds a IFS certification as well as Halal and organic certifications.

Motivated by our 1969 heritage, we make clothes that take a stand. Our mission is to provide our customers with sustainable fashion choices, without having to make any compromises when it comes to style, comfort or quality.

From the very beginning, sustainability has been at the core of our business. Designing for tomorrow, we produce timeless, long-lasting products and promote clothing that is as sustainable and as natural as possible. All our garments are produced by certified manufacturing partners using sustainable methods and materials. It’s fundamental.

The style of Knowledge is about attitude. Urban, casual or active outdoor – we provide the authentic alternatives. Sustainable apparel choices to follow the user through all happenings of life. True to our Spirit of Tomorrow.

On the small Island of Funen, in the heart of Denmark, the story of Naturfrisk begins in 1997, when Niels Rømer and his son  Nicolai bought the abandoned ‘Ørbæk Bryggeri’, a brewery  established in 1906. 

In the brewery Niels and Nicolai started the world’s first commercial production of organic carbonated soft drinks. Later,  other kinds of soft drink were introduced, and in 2001 the brewery once again began making beer — all organic, naturally.

Since 2009 single malt whisky also became part of the portfolio, and in 2017 Niels and Nicolai revived the historical train workshop of the Danish national rail company in Nyborg, and turned it into a beautiful distillery for organic spirits.

In Naturfrisk Group we believe in nature, and that food products should be as natural as possible. Without artificial ingredients, pesticides or other things that don’t do good for man or nature.

In harmony with nature and the environment, we want to create indulgent beverages for people. That’s our mission.

Leander is a Danish furniture manufacturer designing high-quality furniture for children that unites functionality and aesthetics.

It all started in 1998 by Stig Leander and the idea of the cradle. Stig Leander’s ability to see and unite shape and function has created a unique range of furniture for children. A range that is strong enough to stand alone - and a range that is much more than merely furniture. Today Leander is an international furniture manufacturer designing furniture for children. We believe in shape, function and honest materials. And that the best ideas emerge from a need; a problem that needs to be solved. We still keep to the same design philosophy it all began with. That design and function have to come together. That each item of furniture should fit the child and never in reserve order. Leander is no ordinary furniture manufacturer. Leander is a way of thinking. A feeling. And approach to materials, designs and function.

In 1853, the young N. A. Christensen left his occupation as a bookkeeper to begin his iron foundry adventure – an adventure that took its beginning in Nykøbing Mors. 

Despite fierce competition from other foundries in larger towns, the small handful of blacksmiths, turners and joiners created an icon that extended far beyond this North Jutland town from which it sprung. 
It was an icon created through innovation, based on design, quality and fine workmanship. And, thus, it will forever be sitting pretty in Danish homes as well as out in the great wide world. 

An icon that we have all come to know as Morsø.

Jeppe and Jesper - founders of forét

 



[fo-ré]

Have A Coffee er en pan-europæisk B2C, B2B og HoReCa leverandør af Brasiliansk Direct-Trade Speciality kaffe og Cup of Excellence kaffe. Vi samarbejder med +300 små familie drevne kaffeplantager og fører hele bønner (ristede og grønne), formalet kaffe, Cold Brew kaffe og eksklusive nespresso kaffekapsler og leverer på markederne Danmark, Tyskland, Italien, Sverige, Færøerne, Island og Grønland.

Have A Coffee er ydermere en officiel forhandler af bl.a. SAGE, Rocket, San Remo, La Marzocco, WMF, Fellow, Joe Frex, Frank Green, Hario, Chemex, Aeropress, Espressogear, Eureka, Wilfa, Dafi m.fl.

Vi har lager, webshop og showroom i Aabenraa og kaffebarer i Danmark (Aabenraa), Tyskland (Flensborg) og Italien (Parma)

Mikro-farmene leverer prisvindende og præmierede single estate special bønner, de er direct-trade, BIO-dyrket (fri for pesticider og sprøjtemidler) og og kan udelukkende fås hos Have A Coffee, som månedens udvalgte mikro-farm.

Med månedens kaffe får man også hele historien bag kaffeplantagen, bonden, billeder, CoE point rangering, tips til brygning og et indblik i en verden fyldt med nydelse.

Vi laver også private label, shop-in-shop løsninger og spændede infused kaffe som Barrel Aged-Rolling coffee m.m.

Södra Timber is one of Sweden’s leading sawmill companies. There are ten sawmills within Södra Timber, specializing in different species, products and markets. This enables Södra Timber to effectively satisfy customers of all kinds.

Et Juliana drivhus bygger på danske designprin­cipper om enkelthed, æstetik og funktionalitet. Den kraftige profilkonstruktion gør husene robuste og funktionelle samtidig med, at de er smukke at se på. Et Juliana drivhus er en æstetisk ramme, hvor der er kælet for detaljen. 

Juliana Drivhuse har mere end 55 års erfaring. Drivhusene er gennem alle årene tegnet, fremstillet og videreudviklet på den danske fabrik. I dag står tredje generation i spidsen for familievirksomheden, og produktionen af Juliana drivhuse foregår fortsat på fabrikken i udkanten af Odense. 

Det betyder, at med Juliana får du et drivhus, der er kendetegnet ved ’danish design’ fra udvikling af idé til fremstilling af færdigt produkt.

Virksomheden LE KLINT 
Tage Klint, søn af P.V. Jensen Klint, var den kreative iværksætter, der i 1943 valgte at gøre Klint-familiens folderi til egentlig forretning.
Han tilføjede også de oprindelige Klint-skærme en afgørende detalje, nemlig den unikke gribekrave. Desuden tegnede han en række lamper, der i perioder indgik i LE KLINTs sortiment.

I 1953 tog sønnen Jan Klint over. Han var som forretningsmand lysår forud for sin tid. For at sikre sine medarbejdere oprettede han den fond, der siden 1972 har drevet virksomheden LE KLINT. Fonden støtter desuden tidligere medarbejdere, designere og arkitekter.

Dansk Wilton’s reputation is based on the development of beautiful designs and world class carpet solutions. Our outstanding product quality and a never failing will to pursue perfection, make impossible projects possible.

Berner Group består af 25 virksomheder i Europa og Fjernøsten med rundt regnet 9000 ansatte. Berner Trading Holding GmbHs hovedkvarter er placeret i Köln. Vi er ”Experts with passion”

Med ovenstående motto i baghovedet, sætter vores salgskonsulenter stor ære i deres arbejde. Vores salgskonsulenter ved ikke bare hvad de taler om, de taler samme sprog som vores kunder – en meget vigtig ting for Berner. Siden Berner blev grundlagt, har vi differentieret os med ekspertise og entusiasme. En succesfuld kombination, som vi gentagne gange kan læse i vores kundeundersøgelser. 
Ekspertise, samarbejde og tillid er det der differentierer Berner fra konkurrenterne.

Time has evolved since the establishment of the Brdr. Krüger in 1886, yet the company’s dedication to craftsmanship and timeless design hasn’t changed a bit. 

Brdr. Krüger’s design dna is born out of the aesthetics of the mid-century Danish modern movement, reinterpreted for a contemporary audience. With a design philosophy that encourages originality, honesty and playfulness, Brdr. Krüger seeks to bring a new turn on tradition, in close creative partnership with prominent designers and architects of the times.

OVODAN - RELIABLE EGG SOLUTIONS

Over the years, wehave developed an unrivaled depth of expertise in egg processing. From freshly laid eggs through to final end-products, we can help you take advantage of the functionality of eggs. Today we offer a wide variety of existing and potential solutions. These solutions are customizable to your individual product requirements and compatible with all production processes and equipment.

Many customers also use us as a knowledgebase for market developments and B2B support. Our experts stay up to date with the latest global trends and technical sales strategies. This will help you to identify new market opportunities and align your product development accordingly.

A solution for every need
OVODAN Egg Products provide functional benefits in various food applications like

•	good taste
•	emulsification
•	binding qualities 
•	whipping qualities

For instance, OVODAN Egg Products provide good emulsification of yolk in mayonnaise. This means you are able to declare cleaner labelling on your final product.

OVODAN Egg Products are also used in the health care industry, and we do carry out research within biotechnology in collaboration with international recognized universities.

Innovation for new applications
Eggs can be used to enhance different product qualities. By combining our solutions with other key ingredients, for example soy protein, we can help you to meet specific flavor profiles and create exactly the result you need for your requirements.

NorviGroup Denmark A/S (fka. Quilts of Denmark) is a Danish-based company which produces high-quality down bedding, with focus on "Functional Bedding"​. This means down bedding developed and produced to actively improve sleep.

NATULIQUE is a private limited company situated by the port of Aarhus, Denmark.

NATULIQUE consist of a team that is passionate about health and ecology and a constant development for professional organic products within the personal care sector.

NATULIQUE today has a network of distributors in Europe, Middle East, Asia, Pacific, and North America.

The roots of NATULIQUE lay within private health as well as ecological reasons.

Having been confronted by challenges related to harsh allergies, asthma and other health issues within their family and circle of friends, the founders of NATULIQUE became aware of the link that existed between many health issues and the toxins, harmful chemicals and pesticides that were to be found in their cosmetic products.

Realising that the market for trustworthy natural and organic hair and skin products was extremely limited, they decided to make it their mission to bring safer, cleaner cosmetics to a market desperately in need of change.

From there, the NATULIQUE brand was created and today provides a trialed and trusted product range to professionals throughout the world.

We see value where others see trash!​
VAER contributes to a circular fashion industry, by utilizing textile waste to create sustainable, modern and unique sneakers for the conscious consumer. We don’t see used textiles as waste, but as a valuable material, that we can use to make awesome and sustainable footwear.

Vi er en af de mest erfarne servicevirksomheder inden for opsætning, justeringer og nedtagning af stilladser til byggebranchen og industrien.

Her bringer vi korte erhvervshistorier om ordentlighed og samarbejde. Vi deler også ekspertråd, nyheder og kommer med konkrete eksempler fra stilladsbranchen.
 
Du er naturligvis meget velkommen til at kommentere historierne og deltage i samtalen med egne erfaringer og betragtninger.

Mødestedet for alle!

I Vejen Idrætscenter - SportsCenter Danmark har vi oplevelserne i fokus. Med nytænkning og engagement arbejder vi aktivt på at skabe et mødested for sportsfolk, foreninger, erhvervsfolk og private. Her lever idræt, sundhed og kultur side om side.

Vi tilbyder en bred vifte af muligheder, der passer til enhver alder og livssituation, og det afspejles i de mange forskellige aktiviteter og tilbud, vi tilbyder. Vores engagerede medarbejdere lægger sig i selen for at give vore kunder de enestående oplevelser. Det betyder kvalitet i både service, personlig vejledning og indhold af aktiviteterne. Hertil lægger vi vægt på at følge med udviklingen, så vores center følger de seneste anvisninger og tendenser inden for idræt, motion, sundhed og kultur.

Vi tilbyder:
•	Idrætsaktiviteter for alle
•	Stort udbud af fitnessfaciliteter og træning
•	Store idrætshaller
•	Svømmehal og SPA
•	Sundhedsfremme inden for kost, massage og fysioterapi
•	Gode overnatningsmuligheder
•	Kultur- og event arrangementer
•	Sportscamps
•	Gode konference- og mødefaciliteter
•	Sunde og velsmagende madoplevelser

Mød os i Vejen Idrætscenter – vi er et center for alle!

Velkommen til Plastmo. Følg med i vores grønne udvikling og få et indtryk af hvad Plastmo, som dansk producent, gør ift. miljøet🌿 #grønomstilling #bygmedomtanke 

Vi deler vores viden, tips og erfaringer indenfor afvandingsløsninger samt løsninger til udemiljø.

Workwear producer with focus on trends in colors and qualities. We have four general business areas: Traditional healthcare, Casual healthcare, Gastronomy and Light industry. We are active in more than 16 European markets.

Online catalogue: http://ipaper.ipapercms.dk/NYBO/2018-uk/

The Ambition
As we are aiming to be the preferred supplier of workwear within gastronomy, healthcare and light industry in Europe, it is our ambition to enable profitable business and a smooth daily handling for our customers. 
Our task is to deliver our customers workwear, which fits the high demands for comfort, function and design, of the end-user. We do this in order to attract and keep quality-minded, well-qualified and passionate employees
We do this by a constant focus and improvement within:

Availability
Our garment is made for people at work. This means that it must be available in the right sizes, models and volumes – at the right time

Durability
During use at work and during washing and drying in industrial laundries the garment is exposed to harsh conditions. Our knowledge of fabrics, accessories and production minimize problems during the products lifetime.
 
Every day thousands of people are wearing our garments on their job. This makes us very proud. We see it as our ambition to carry this sense of pride all the way to the user by focusing on:

Function
The users job function has very specific and vital demands to the garment. Our products meet these demands and will make the garment an integrated part of the handling of daily tasks.

Design
The users job and personality go hand in hand. By a constant focus on smart design solution, we ensure the personal well-being alongside a professional and credible appearance.

Kontormøbler.dk is Denmarks largest webshop, that offers furnitures and office design to companies.

We focus on high quality and ergonomics at reasonable prices, where we have chosen the best furniture suppliers, in order to offer the best office furnitures to our customers.

Our company has been awarded as a gazelle company 6 years a row.

Get the best offers and advices in our newsletter: http://eepurl.com/cS82hv

The Fletco Group is based in a Danish region with a proud tradition of manufacturing industrial textile products to high-quality craftsmanship standards. 

We are one of Europe's leading suppliers on the contract market offering a three dimensional product range: Broadloom, carpet tiles and rugs.

Our story goes back more than 70 years, and today we are a modern company focusing on product development, technological innovation and efficient, eco-friendly production. 

Flexibility, creativity and sustainability are key values woven into all our carpets, and into all our partnerships and relations. We have great experience in working close with architects and developers on visionary solutions for all kinds of projects from hospitality to office.

NS System A/S made its first print in 1965. The concept is still the same - to find the solution that is right for the job and in the best quality ... of course. NS System A/S is based on a solid understanding of the customer’s needs. The delivery time is highly prioritized, and it must be easy to be a customer of NS System A/S. Today we don’t only think  in print, transfers or embroidery, but in hole solutions where the customers always are assured the right textile labeling as required - in high quality and on time delivery! 

NS System A/S consists of more than 60 dedicated employees at a state of the art company in Frederikshavn. NS System A/S is today one of Europe's largest manufacturers of products that create branding on textiles.

You are always welcome to contact us: Phone +45 9622 1020

We develop and produce interior wood doors - customized for each project. We see doors as an aesthetic element in the architecture, it is a part of. Our products are often used as a replica doors in restoration projects where fire, sound and safety requirements must be met, but we also believe that the custom door has a great aesthetic potential in modern design and construction.

Our doors are build by Nordic craft traditions - our door constructions are massive, our designs are detailed and quality-driven and we only use the finest materials to ensure a high quality. We thrive for quality and architectural freedom.

Our aim is to always create new and exciting projects that challenges both the technique, aesthetics and function. We want to fulfill the potential that architecture holds for the end user, and we are always available for technical help in the design process.

Vahle A/S is located close to Aarhus in Denmark, and we employ 20-25 man, mainly in production, administration and sales. We have more than 30 years experience in building architectural doors and we want to set a positive mark on the surrounding interior.

Please contact us for an informal review of your project, tel. +45 86 37 24 77 or mail vahle@vahle.dk

Composite specialist and the World’s largest webshop for CE marked fibreglass profiles! 

For more than 40 years, our sustainable building materials have inspired customers to create more with less. Our products have a proven track record for construction purposes where high strength, low weight and corrosion resistance make a decisive difference. These unique qualities make our fibreglass products an excellent and cost-efficient alternative to traditional materials such as steel, aluminum, wood or concrete.

With the World’s largest webshop for CE marked fibreglass profiles we provide our customers with easy access to high quality fibreglass profiles, gratings and planks for building and industry applications. 

At Fiberline Building Profiles, we are keen to facilitate our customers’ demands for energy-efficient solutions. Therefore, we use an energy-efficient production process and also provide our customers with unequalled composite know how.

CBPs mission er at tilbyde ingredienser og bageriløsninger som skaber værdi, vækst, inspiration og tryghed til markedet. Vores vision er at sætte nye standarder. Nysgerrighed er vores natur og sammen med viden, faglighed og passion skaber vi morgendagen.

CBP vil være en værdifuld partner, der hjælper kunderne til succes. Det skal ske ved at give kunderne viden og inspiration, ved at udvikle nye koncepter, der styrker kundernes salg – og endelig ved at støtte kundernes forretning med nye initiativer. CBP har fire forretningsben: 
•	Bageri (håndværksbagerne)
•	Industri (fødevareproducenter) 
•	Retail & Convenience (supermarked, conviencebutikker og restauranter)
•	Nonfood+ (emballager og spiseligt pynt)

Vi er eksperter inden for indkøb, sortiment, udvikling, logistik og distribution. Vi favner hele værdikæden, er tæt på, og agerer lokalt i markedet. Samtidig er vi en global spiller, der indgår i Orkla. Vores netværk inddrages aktivt i innovation og samspil med kunderne samt i optimering og effektivisering af løsninger til gavn for markedet.

Tromborg is a Danish family owned business and was founded in 2003 by Marianne Tromborg, as a coveted makeup artist before starting the company. She has shaped Tromborg based on her own personal and professional approach to beauty. This approach centers around the use of natural therapeutic remedies which of course are all organic – but it’s also about offering a product that is easy to use for everyone, especially those with busy schedules, while leaving no doubt about the quality.

Marianne’s husband biochemist Tim Schyberg has used his many years of scientific experience from the pharmaceutical and biotech industry – including research and knowledge about skin care – to develop the perfect combination of innovative active ingredients necessary for a modern, natural and effective product line.

companyName: Celsa Steel Service – kun 425 kg CO2 pr. ton armeringsstål
description:
Celsa Steel Service producerer alle typer armeringsstål. 

Vores kunder er entreprenører, grossister og betonelementfabrikker, der værdsætter et tæt samarbejde og solid rådgivning. Vi har været med på Danmarks største projekter herunder Storebælt, Øresundsforbindelsen og Metroen i København. 

Vi er anerkendte for vores QR software, som giver vores kunder fuldt overblik og en hurtig, ukompliceret og risikofri ordreproces. 

Alle råvarer produceres på eget stålværk beliggende i Norge, som er miljøcertificeret efter ISO 14001. Celsa Steel Service Danmark opererer under CELSA GROUP™, som er Europas førende stålproducent.

DAN-doors develops and manufactures insulated doors for several industries. The product range is among the leaders in the world market. One of DAN-doors targets is to manufacture high functional quality products combined with after sales on a high level.
Vi er en detail kæde med 20 butikker rundt omkring i landet. Vi bestræber os på at være Danmarks bedste leverandør af modetøj til unge i alderen 18-28 år.

Indeklimaløsninger, der gavner arbejdsmiljøet og sparer energi

Venti tilbyder ventilationsløsninger optimeret på performance, ydeevne og energiforbrug. Vi tager hånd om problemer som følge af træk, lyd eller lugt. Det giver løsninger med høj fokus på indeklimaet. 

Vi spiller gerne en aktiv rolle i dit næste projekt. Vores mangeårige erfaring, gennemarbejdede projekttilpassede beregninger og tætte dialog med vores samarbejdspartnere, giver optimale og energieffektive løsninger. Se mere på www.venti.dk

companyName: Elements Group - Distributor of selected beauty brands
description: ”We work with fragrances, skincare, make-up and hair products, that we believe 100% in ourselves. When choosing new brands we are extremely selective and we always wait for the right brand to show. We have to believe in the brand, before we can expect others to do so! It is the foundation of our success to believe in what we do and the brands we work with. Our heart is present in the entire process from the product is presented to us at our foreign suppliers to their presentation on the shelves at the retailers we work with where the products are sold to the consumers.”

Storm Textil was founded in 1991 by Niels Storm, who still owns and manages the company. Storm Textil has since experienced a solid growth and today we employ approx. 40-50 employees in our office and production in Brønderselv, Denmark.

Storm Textil is a well renowned supplier of textile goods like, T-shirts, sweaters, pants, hats, baby clothes, canvas bags, jackets, towels and much more. Our collection includes different qualities, colors, sizes and prices. We have more than 1 million items in stock in our in-house storage and nearby warehouse in Brøndeslev, why we are able to deliver from day to day.

Not only are we a supplier of textiles, we also do prints on most items. Our staff is experienced in making quality prints, including screen prints, transfers, sublimation, DTG, lithographs and more. We use only the best materials and always try to do better.
  
Our textiles are produced in cooperation with our suppliers in Portugal, China and Bangladesh, all of which meet our quality standards. Because we are in close collaboration with out overseas partners, we are also able to make special collections, meeting out customers specific and individual needs within the range of our existing collection of t-shirts, polo shirts, sweatshirts, towels and canvas bags.

A/S HAI HORSENS is a modern B2B company with Northern Europe’s widest range of surface treatment for aluminium (anodisation) for offshore applications, the pharmaceuticals industry, the armed forces and the construc- tion and transport industry, among others. 
The company has over 60 years’ experience of the surface treatment of aluminium. This means that we are able to quickly start on even very specialised manufactures.

Handmade Danish luxury chocolate since 1996

Peter Beier's handcrafted and award-winning chocolates are sold in our own stores at home and abroad, on our website and via selected distributors across Denmark.

At Peter Beier Chokolade, we have created a solid and sustainable Farm-to-Table concept, which runs throughout our entire production and out in the shops.


At our plantation in the Dominican Republic, we have a dedicated team of skilled employees who produce some of the world's very best raw materials for our production of excellent chocolates.

Our chocolates are 100 % handmade using cocoa beans from our own plantation, and ingredients from Ørsholt Estate.

As a completely integrated part of our Farm-to-Table concept, we work carefully to maintain the natural balance of nature, while we create the best possible conditions for growth of our cocoa trees.

Sneakerstore est 2011. 
3 physical store in Denmark, 2 in Copenhagen and 1 in Aarhus. 
#Becausewelovesneakers

Mette Munk offers high quality Danish pastry (freezer to oven) for the Foodservice, Convenience and In-Store Bakery markets. At Mette Munk, we take great pride in producing the best authentic Danish pastry.

We combine the centuries-old Danish pastry tradition with one of the world’s most advanced production plants, counting 3 modern high speed production lines - placed in Odense, Denmark. We select only the best ingredients from all over the world to ensure a superb taste experience. We employ highly skilled people with extensive experience in producing Danish pastry.

In 2014, Mette Munk became part of the international bakery group and leading frozen bakery supplier, Aryzta.

Med mere end 35 års erfaring er Friluftsland godt forberedt til at betjene kunder på nettet og i de fysiske butikker. Godt produktkendskab og medarbejdernes egne friluftserfaringer, giver kunderne tryghed og kompetent vejledning ved valg og køb af nyt tøj og udstyr.
 
Specialforretningerne byder på udstyr, grej og beklædning til det aktive liv i naturen – og på rejser. Vi udvælger kun produkter af høj kvalitet, som vi selv importerer fra de bedste producenter. Du finder alt fra jakker og vandrestøvler til soveposer og Trangia-sæt.
 
Det bedste udstyr er ikke billigt, men vores priser er konkurrencedygtige. Samlet er vores filosofi: Godt udstyr giver bedre oplevelser.

Med vores store og brede produktprogram indenfor forskalling og understøtning leverer vi løsninger til hele den danske byggebranche omfattende både udlejningsmateriel og teknisk support - lige fra enkle opstillingstegninger til komplicerede beregninger. Og så tilbyder vi også markedets bedste system til interimslukninger.

Fra vores 2 afdelinger, centralt placeret i Århus og Glostrup, er vi tæt på kunderne og kan udvise stor fleksibilitet i leverancer direkte til byggepladsen eller ved selvafhentning på vores lagre.

Vi lægger stor vægt på at give vores kunder den rigtige løsning og service - hver gang. Derfor har vi bl.a. certificeret alle vores processer i forhold til materielhåndteringen efter kvalitetsnormen DS-ISO9001 og alle vores medarbejdere gennemgår til stadighed træning og uddannelse indenfor samtlige relevante produktkategorier. På den måde opleves processtyringen positivt og kvalitetsmæssigt korrekt af både kunder og medarbejdere. Vi er ligeledes certificeret efter DRA's (Danish Rental Association under Dansk Byggeri) certificeringsordning for udlejningsvirksomheder, og var den første virksomhed, der fik denne certifisering.

PASCHAL-Danmark A/S er blevet kåret som Årets Udlejer af DRA og har i mere end ti år været AAA klassificeret af kreditvurderingsinstituttet Bisnode (tidligere Soliditet). Vi har også fået tildelt en Gazelle af Dagbladet Børsen.

Scandi Supply a/s er den professionelle byggeindustris totalleverandør af produkter til passiv brandsikring. Produktgruppen omfatter produkter til brandtætning samt produkter til passiv brandbeskyttelse af bærende stålkonstruktioner.

Scandi Supply er én af Danmarks førende leverandører af produkter til passiv brandsikring og fremstår som byggeindustriens professionelle partner, for hvem, kvalitet, dokumentation og god rådgivning er en selvfølge. Vi er centralt beliggende i Vissenbjerg, hvorfra vore produkter distribueres. Herudover kan Scandi Supplys produkter fås hos førende El- og VVS-grossister landet over.

Siden 1990 har vi leveret produkter til en lang række byggerier i Danmark, og vores store erfaring indenfor brandsikring er til rådighed for projekterende og udførende.

//

In case of fire, buildings need protection, valuables need shielding and human lives must be saved. The cornerstone in this respect is passive fire protection of building constructions, and Scandi Supply is a leading supplier of complete solutions to this end.

Safety has top priority for Scandi Supply, and we take pride in choosing the right solution for every task. We never take a task lightly, and we are committed to making it easy for our customers and business partners to create valuable and secure results. Close cooperation is what leads to long lasting relations.

With over 20 years experience our advice and guidance are thoroughly tested - just like our products. We constantly work to develop innovative solutions and obtain new approvals.

Hos DRINX har vi alle de varer, der skal til for, at du kan skabe en god forretning – og vi leverer med stor sikkerhed, både i det daglige, og når det brænder på. 

DRINX har landets bredeste og stærkeste udvalg af spiritus, vin, øl, bitter, vand, tobak, barudstyr og rengøringsprodukter af høj kvalitet; fra tandstikkere og rengøringsklude til store farverige flasker og gulvvaskemaskiner, og alt det der imellem. Du behøver derfor kun at handle ét sted og på den måde optimere dine indkøb.

Når du handler med DRINX, er du ikke bare et nummer i køen. Vi følger vores kunder hele vejen og kender deres indkøb. Vi er kendt for vores fleksibilitet, vores leveringssikkerhed og vores strukturerede tilgang til kundeservice. Det er vores service, som gør os unikke – og det er vi stolte af.

DRINX har hovedsæde i Frederikshavn og en afdeling på Sjælland med salgskontor og lager på begge lokationer. Vi er mere end 50 medarbejdere inden for kundeservice, salg, indkøb, lager og administration, som står klar til at hjælpe dig, så du kan ’levere varen’ overfor dine gæster og kunder døgnet rundt.

Taster Wine A/S is the biggest privatly owned and independent wine and spirits company in Denmark. We import wine and spirits from all over the world both in bottle as well as in bulk. Our facilities include both storage, production and bottling of the products we import.

Our customers  can be found in all segments of the Danish market: restaurants, fine wine shops, supermarkets, etc.

AT MADS NØRGAARD – COPENHAGEN WE ARE DEEPLY IN LOVE WITH FASHION AND IN THE EVER-CHANGING WORLD WE INHABIT. BUT WE DO SOMETIMES THINK THAT THINGS ARE MOVING JUST A LITTLE TOO FAST IN THE WORLD OF FASHION. BECAUSE OF THAT FACT, WE ARE ESPECIALLY DRAWN TO THOSE FASHION ITEMS THAT DO NOT CHANGE CONSTANTLY. ITEMS THAT REMAIN RELEVANT SEASON AFTER SEASON.

.506 is a culinary lab an a mission to create new sustainable food habits. We do this by creating food experiences and events, by catering our sustainable lunch concept to companies, as well as by consulting and developing new products. 

All our activities follow a carefully researched set of principles that put sustainability and magnificent taste at the very center. Our Principles are to "make plants play the central role", "carefully select all ingredients", "embrace change", "create reflection through storytelling" and "turn waste into value".

BACKTEE is a Danish company which was established in 1994 with headquarters in Silkeborg, Denmark.

Our collections are sold through selected pro shops in Denmark and abroad and through our online shop at www.backtee.com.

At BACKTEE we design, manufacture and market high-performance golf & sportswear. At every step in that process, we are driven by a strong focus on performance, functionality, fashion, and high quality. The idea behind the concept is to create beautiful and high-performance clothing that can be worn before, after and in connection with all golf and outdoor activities. Using only the best technical fabrics, our products fit any golfer's game or active individuals in all kinds of weather. 

All our products are designed to Challenge all Conditions by fitting into at least one of our 4 concept conditions called Wind, Sun, Cold & Rain.

Challenge all conditions:

WIND - Windproof material, effectively protecting against windchill. Offering style, breathability, comfort, and maximum freedom of movement.

SUN - Sporty, high-performance designs. The latest in functional fabrics 
keeps you cool and dry in high temperatures.
 	
COLD - Perfect for demanding weather. Technical material draws moisture
away from the body and layering keeps you at an optimum performance temperature.
 	
RAIN - The technology of the fabric keeps wet weather out while allowing                                                                        moisture vapour to escape. Ensuring maximum comfort and outstanding rain protection.

Our passion for golf and an active lifestyle is reflected in every aspect of our collections – from design of the garments to the smallest functional details.

Tømmergaarden betjener og servicerer de professionelle håndværkere, industrien og private. 

Uanset hvem vi sælger vores varer til, skal vi sikre, at den oplevelse kunderne får bliver så positiv, at de får lyst til at handle hos os igen.

I samarbejdet med hinanden og med vores kunder og leverandører vil vi kendes for følgende værdier:
• Positivt opsøgende 
• Effektivitet 
• Respekt og loyalitet

Vores medarbejdere er vores vigtigste ressource. Derfor arbejder vi kontinuerligt på, at Tømmergaarden opleves som en spændende og attraktiv arbejdsplads med fokus på både faglig og personlig udvikling.
 
Tømmergaarden så dagens lys tilbage i 1974 og har i dag 17 afdelinger med i alt 400 medarbejdere i det nord-, øst og vestjyske.
Tømmergaarden er en del af indkøbs- og markedsføringssamarbejdet XL-BYG.

Welcome to the company of WO A/S. Here you will be introduced to our company and its two subsidiary companies; WO Interior A/S and WO Airport Interior A/S. Each company will continously inform its followers with news and other exciting information on their respective showcase-pages, which you will find when looking to the right side of this page. 

WO Interior A/S
We are manufacturing furniture. We are specialised in working with linoleum as surface - and edging material for furniture parts (i.e. Tabletops, doors etc.) using a unique method (patent pending) that enables us to produce both small and large series in a rationel production. 

Being able to use linoleum as an edging material allows the design implement linoleum on all surfaces and the furniture part.

WO Airport interior A/S
We focus on interior solutions to airports. Since 2007 we have been supplying customized interior solutions to some of the world’s leading airports. 

We don’t believe in standard solution, but know, that the best solution is designed in close cooperation with the different stakeholders in the airport. We build our solutions on a broad range of flexible modules that can be connected and customized according to the specific needs of the airport. 

We have our own team of engineers working closely with our partners within control systems, mechanical sub supplies and design to provide the best solution.

GASA NORD GRØNT is the leading supplier of fresh fruit and vegetables produced in Denmark. We supply fresh products to the Nordic retail and foodservice markets – delivered directly from the individual producers. Our company is rooted in agricultural cooperative principles and is owned by more than 60 Danish fruit and vegetable producers and we represent several of the leading organic vegetable producers in Denmark. We are proud to offer a broad assortment of products, covering almost the entire span of Nordic produced fruit and vegetables.

We not only specialize in selling fruit and vegetables. At GASA NORD GRØNT our ambition is to make the healthy choice easier for the consumers. We strive to develop the market for fruit and vegetables in collaboration with our customers and partners. This is done through a strong focus on product and category development, which we do based on market and consumer insights. 

Our customer team consist of specialized resources within both foodservice and retail sales, marketing, business development, customer service, and quality control. We have very high standards with respect for quality and food safety. As a result, all our products have achieved the international certification for fruit and vegetables, GLOBAL G.A.P.

På rolige og smukke Læsø, finder du Læsø Fiskeindustri. Her ligger vi, som en inkarneret del af øens kultur, og omkranset af havets skattekammer. Vi har været her i mange år. Mange læsøboere kan nok ikke huske en tid før os, for vi har været her siden Ruder Konge var knægt. I 1963 besluttede en flok af øens fiskere, at de ville sikre fiskeriet gode afsætningsbetingelser og udvikle en stærk, lokal arbejdsplads – A/S Læsø Fiskeindustri så dagens lys.

Der er løbet meget vand i åen siden, og Læsø Fiskeindustri har nu udviklet sig til en af verdens største eksportører af den efterspurgte delikatesse, jomfruhummer. I dag er Læsø Fiskeindustri en topmoderne fødevareproducent med dygtige og erfarne medarbejdere fordelt på tre danske afdelinger, samt et 100% ejet datterselskab i Peterhead på den skotske østkyst. Selvom vi nu rækker ud over Læsøs grænser, drives Læsø Fiskeindustri stadig forankret i de samme kerneværdier, som vi blev grundlagt ud fra, den gang tilbage i 1960’erne – øen, havet og fiskeriet. Det betyder også, at vi stadig er stærkt tilknyttet til det lokale liv på Læsø, hvor vi ser os selv som en vigtig spiller til at sikre øens beskæftigelse, men også som en vigtig lokal samarbejdspartner for øens øvrige erhverv, ligesom vi gerne støtter nyetablerede fiskere økonomisk, når de skal søsættes som selvstændige. 

Læsø Fiskeindustri ejes af godt 350 aktionærer, der alle har en stærk tilknytning til virksomheden og dens lokalområde, og helt som i 1963, består ejerkredsen primært af fiskere, medarbejdere og læsøboere.

Redtz Glas og Facade A/S er din lokale glarmester og nationale totalentreprenør af løsninger i glas og aluminium til erhverv og private. Vi løser alt fra mindre glarmesteropgaver til store og avancerede projekter i glas og aluminium. Uanset opgavens art og størrelse, står vi altid gerne til rådighed med vores viden, indsigt og mange års erfaring i branchen.

Siden 1914 har vores forretning udviklet sig fra en mindre glarmesterforretning til i dag at være en omspændende og velkonsolideret glas- og facade virksomhed som er forhandler for bl.a. Klein, MWE, Schüco, Cover og Sky-Frame.

Redtz Glas og Facade A/S udfører alle former for glasarbejde og aluminiumskonstruktioner – fra mindre glarmesteropgaver til store og avancerede totalentrepriser for private kunder, erhvervskunder og offentlige institutioner.

Fælles for vores forretningsområder er, at de er solidt funderet i vores kernekompetencer og mange års erfaring inden for glas og aluminium.

Kombinationen af kompetencer inden for glas og aluminium betyder, at vi kan levere en skræddersyet totalløsning målrettet jeres projekt samt give inspiration til den kræsne og detaljeorienterede husejer

Mangler du ideer til den ideelle løsning til dit projekt, står vi klar med professionel rådgivning.

Ever since our foundation in 2005, it has been our mission to establish Nature Planet as a leading supplier of quality toy products for gift shops in and around attractions.

PETTINAROLI A/S is a supplier of high quality components and complete system solutions  to the Danish plumbing industry and a large number of European customers. The company has been around since 1976 where it was founded under the name of Jørgen Pedersen VVS.

In 2000 the company changed its name to Pettinaroli A/S and became part of the Italian group Fratelli Pettinaroli SpA. The production and product development of hot forged brass products takes place in Italy.

Pettinaroli A/S is located in Middelfart and from here Pettinaroli distributes the large range of products for all Danish plumbing wholesalers and to 22 countries in North, Central and Eastern Europe.

Besides brass components and under floor heating systems, we are also able to deliver a wide range of renewable energy solutions. Among other things, Pettinaroli is the supplier of Stiebel Eltron heat pumps, ventilation and solar heating systems, see www.stiebel-eltron.dk and photovoltaic solar panels under the name EVOSOLAR, see www.evosolar.dk

Computersalg A/S er en af Danmarks største online handel for salg af forbrugerelektronik, computere, laptops, desktops og meget mere.
ComputerSalg.dk startede i 1996 som en detailbutik med salg af computere, hardware og software.
I 1999 udvides butikken med online salg og siden har virksomheden vokset sig stor, og er i dag en af de største webshops i Danmark for salg af forbrugerelektronik.
I efteråret 2013 flyttede ComputerSalg.dk til Borup i den gamle pibefabrik på Kimmerslevvej og åbnede samtidig en butik i direkte tilknytning til eget lager og administration.

I 2020 flyttede ComputerSalg på ny lokation da adressen på Tinvej 7 i Ringsted blev indviet. Her kom virksomheden til en lokalitet der både kunne rumme det hastigt stigende varelager samt med gode muligheder for udvikling. I det nye domicil med 10.000 m2 lager og 1000m2 kontor, kan virksomheden indfri vækstpotentialet og ambitionerne for de næste mange år.

Tryg online handel
ComputerSalg.dk er kendt for at yde tryg online handel med god kundeservice, hurtig levering og lave priser og med en af branchens højeste score på Trustpilot er det en meget populær online butik.

Frederiksdal Kirsebærvin / Frederiksdal Cherry Wine

We've been making fine cherry wine from fruit grown in our orchards since 2006.
 
Frederiksdal Manor lies on the westernmost point of the island of Lolland, minutes from the waters of the Langelandsbæltet strait - one of the warmest, sunniest corners of Denmark.
 
The climate's perfect for the cultivation of cherries. The abundant sun's reflected in the ocean; winters are mild; spring comes early. The long growing season expresses itself in the complexity and depth of the flavour of the fruit.
 
It's impossible to imagine a more magnificent origin for a dessert wine that holds its own against exquisite wines from Banyuls, Rivesaltes and Maury.

Selek's mission is to create value between supplier and customer.

Selek's history - 45 years as a supplier of consumer electronics and accessories.
1973 Selek was founded in Sweden
1983 Invirgo was founded in Sweden
1990 LIFT was founded in Norway
1993 Bandridge Denmark was founded in Denmark (AV-LINE)
1993 Selek Sweden merges with Invirgo
1996 Selek Norway was founded after LIFT Norway acquired Selek Sweden
2001 Bandridge Denmark becomes Selek Denmark
2005 3S Company A/S is founded. Logistics Center for Selek Group based in Aalborg.
2007 Supply Forum became a subsidiary of Selek Denmark
2010 Selek's own brand Sinox became a reality. First with TV fittings, later also cables etc.
2011 Sinox Europe A/S was launched at IFA in Berlin.
2013 Selek Group takes over ITSKINS distribution in Europe.
2015 China office established 
2017 MISFITS Industries Europe Founded - OEM Solution Concepts.

Selek customer service and distribution are centrally located in Aalborg - Denmark
from which we honor high service, fast and secure delivery.
Our export department is located in Tring Herts - UK.

som kun skal tilsættes vand, før det kan bruges på byggepladsen.

Bon Coca opstod i 2014 ved at Blåvand Bolcher og Coca Luxury Chocolate fusionerede. Vi oplever fortsat vækst i ind- og udland.

Flere og flere virksomheder ser værdien i at samle deres indkøb af konfekture og lækre specialiteter hos Bon Coca, hvilket vi naturligvis er rigtig glade og taknemmelige for.

Flere gange om året besøger vi fødevaremesser både i DK og i det meste af EU for at sikre os, at lageret er fyldt med de rigtige varer - til de rigtige priser. 

Vi udvikler også vores egne lækre varianter inden for bl.a. slikkepinde, chokoladedrageret lakrids og bolcher, som vi er sikre på vil pirre både dine smagsløg og nysgerrighed.

Vores egenproduktion er vi rigtig stolte af. Her har vi den højeste fødevaregodkendelse i EU, hvor vi også bruger de ypperste aromaer i vores bolche-produktion. Skulle du som privatperson have lyst til at prøve at lave din egen slikkepind, så kig forbi vores store butik i Blåvand og se, om ikke vi har en produktion i gang. 

Husk, at vi stadig kører et bredt og stort sortiment indenfor reklamekonfekture, som twistede bolcher, logochokolade etc. 

God service er individuel service.
På vores kontor sørger vores smilende og engagerede medarbejdere altid for personlig service på et højt niveau, samt hurtig og effektiv logistik. Vi udvikler konstant vores systemer og er derfor altid blandt de bedste til at pleje vores nuværende samt nye kunder på bedst mulig måde. Vi er altid interesseret i at blive bedre, så kontakt os endelig, hvis du har ris eller ros. 

Koncepter, brands og varemærker kan kombineres på mange forskellige måder helt efter kundernes individuelle behov.

Gode grunde til at vælge Bon Coca:
- Specialproduktioner såvel store som små.
- Engagerede sælgere - som brænder for at hjælpe netop dig med at gøre din forretning bedre.
- Konkurrencedygtige priser.

Vi har et knivskarpt fokus på at blive de bedste til at producere det mest komplekse betonelement, nemlig sandwichfacader i beton. Med vores unikke produktionskoncept og vore dedikerede medarbejdere  tilbyder vi et vidtfavnende spektrum af løsninger - fra de mest simple lagerhaller til markedets suverænt billigste priser til avancerede og unikke designfacader i beton.

• Vi kan skabe merværdi ved kvalificeret rådgivning i designfasen – få råd til mere.

DENCON FOODS A/S is an import company for Scandinavia. We are specialized in fresh and frozen meat products. We import quality products from all over the world and supply retail, wholesalers and foodservice clients in Scandinavia.

We have worked closely for many years with more than 150 foreign suppliers – from major South American meat producers who supply Argentinean beef and tenderloin, to smaller French producers, who supply barbary duck, quail and poussin to Denmark.  

We are passionate about high-quality meat and it is the foundation of our business. Each year we travel the world, seeking out new and exciting products and always focusing carefully on quality when we visit our suppliers. At the end of the day, it is high-quality producers who provide the biggest sales successes with our customers and the best culinary experience for consumers.

Pro Montage A/S er specialist i tag- og facadebeklædning. Vi har knap 20 års erfaring og udfører facadebeklædning, facaderenovering, energirenovering, lukningsentrepriser og tagbeklædning. Vi laver både standard- og specialløsninger og med vores datterselskab; Midtjysk Pladebearbejdning har vi både den rette fleksibilitet og Know How til at agere hurtigt og professionelt. Vi udfører entrepriser inden for nybyggeri og renovering i hele landet og har hovedkontor i Sunds udenfor Herning. Med ca. 40 medarbejdere og stort fokus på kvalitet og tid, er vi det sikre valg.

Hvorfor Pro Montage

Pro Montage har siden 2002 udviklet sig til at være en solid og erfaren spiller på markedet. Vi er kendt for problemfri løsninger og har en reklamationsprocent på under 1%. Vi varetager tag- og facadeentrepriser primært i stål og aluminium til boliger, erhverv, bilhuse, butikker, fabrikshaller, industri, stadions mv. og vejleder vores kunder i forhold til at finde den bedste løsning. Vores datterselskab Midtjysk Pladebearbejdning sikrer, at vi konstant har de bedste materialer og maskiner til at udføre opgaverne professionelt og på kort tid. 

Medarbejderne – vores stærkeste kompetence

Vores medarbejdere er vores stærkeste kompetence. Vi sætter en ære i, at de trives og afspejler virksomhedens værdier. Derfor har vi stort fokus på oplæring af nye medarbejdere. Høj kvalitet, god service og tilfredse kunder skal sikres hver gang. Vi har mange medarbejdere med lang anciennitet og sørger for, at bemandingen på projekterne er afstemt i forhold til kompleksitet, erfaring og tidsplan. 

Solid og stærk spiller

Pro Montage blev i 2017 og 2018 Gazelle-virksomhed og har en AAA kreditvurdering. Vores værdisæt – troværdighed, loyalitet, respekt og høj kvalitet er vores fundament, som virksomheden er gennemsyret af. Vi har fokus på CSR i forhold til ledelse, arbejdsforhold og risikostyring.

Vores kunder
Vi har mange direkte kunder som f.eks. Einer Hessel, Bauhaus, Ørbæk Food, Danrise, Ebrofrost.

Nimbus Nordic is a fashion brand from Copenhagen. We started out as an entrepreneurial idea, and for over twenty years we have built upon that idea. Our main objective is to deliver retail inspired outerwear and clothing that is tailored towards providing a positive corporate fashion experience. 

From the beginning, we have kept true to our Scandinavian heritage and our Copenhagen roots. Since our founding, we have watched the city grow, and we have grown with it. Copenhagen is a city that is proud of its traditions and its history. Its cobblestone streets, grand cathedrals, majestic royal palaces and stunning waterfronts views. It is a city that has always punched above its weight and sought to outdo itself. 

But for us, the Danish capita is so much more than just a home, it is inspiration. Copenhagen manages to be aware of and build upon its history, without losing sight of the future. Without forgetting to push on, to go forwards – and we plan to go with it. 

Copenhagen is the city that made us

Altiflex designs, manufactures and provides modules for sealing buildings. The modules  
- are adjustable in size 
- are wind and waterproof 
- gives huge energy-saving 
- protect against theft
- make the use of security railings superfluous.  

Altiflex modules effectively seal doors, windows, walls and facades during construction. The system consists of flexible window and door modules, which are made of aluminum and semi-transparent breakproof plastic. Each element can be adjusted by 25 cm in both height and width and can be put together in all imaginable sizes to seal any size of hole. 

Altiflex system is completely unique in the world and is patented in a large number of countries. It is a more sustainable, secure and gives particularly more efficient engines and more economical sealing than traditional closing with plastic sheet mounted on the batten frames.

The Altiflex system is reusable and can be reused from project to project.

stoy er en lokalt forankret butik med globalt udsyn. Den centrale placering i Aarhus gør stoy til naturligt samlingspunkt for mode, kultur og udvikling, der bliver fordret af en engageret og vidende medarbejderstab, som aktivt tager del i bylivet. Aduro develops, produces and markets wood burning stoves, hybrid stoves and pellet stoves in modern Danish design. For many years, we have been specialising in developing high-technology stoves with the most modern and advanced combustion principles. We do not compromise with product quality, and we always seek to combine technology and aesthetics with end-consumers’ demand for user-friendliness and attractive prices. More than 400,000 Aduro stoves are installed across Europe.

Aduro and the environment
All our stoves are designed by Danish architects whose principal aim has been to create modern and environmentally friendly stoves. We strive to make it easy to do it right and thereby obtain a clean combustion with minimal CO2- and particle emissions. Among other things, all Aduro stoves have automatic control of air supply, so you can obtain a clean combustion more easily. When firing correctly with wood, an Aduro stove is a CO2 neutral heating source – on average, each stove saves the environment from the emission of 4 tonnes of CO2.

Firing with firewood provides you with renewable energy, as the trees store CO2 while growing. When the trees decompose or are burned, they release the same amount of CO2 again. Meanwhile, Aduro ensures the growth of trees and forests through restoring of forests and sustainable forestry. Aduro invests in large areas of forest, in which we expect an annual sustainable growth of wood corresponding to the consumption in approx. 10,000 Aduro stoves. 

In June 2018, Aduro was awarded with the prestigious European Business Award for the Environment on a national level. The award was given for the innovative and sustainable product Aduro Hybrid in the category “Sustainable products and services”. The European Business Awards for the Environment pays tribute to the most environmentally conscious companies in Europe, thus aiming to promote innovative and sustainable initiatives.

It was with the idea of creating something new and innovative which started Vernon Sport in 1988, by the founder Morten Vernon. Vernon has extensive experience in spotting new currents and tendencies. In 1988 Vernon introduced snowboarding as the first player on the Scandinavian market followed up by the In-Line rollerblades in 1992 and the skate scooter brand Micro in 99`.

It was within the occupation of Waseem Ahmad that Vernon went from being 100% focused on the sport to move into the footwear and fashion scene. Entailed that Vernon through 2000s had great success with Le Coq Sportif, which resulted in more than 200.000 pairs of shoes were sold into Scandinavia. The success continued with similar powerful brands like Russell Athletic, Onitsuka Tiger, Clarks originals and Birkenstock. Later on, came brands such as Ellesse, Aigle, Moon Boot, Hi-tec, Blundstone etc.

At Vernon, we love to work with heritage brands, which has led to excellent knowledge of this type of brands. We do what we do best, we build brands and never forget the story behind the brand.
Do not hesitate to contact Vernon if you have something on your sport or fashion heart. In the creative Vernon environment in Copenhagen, we always have room for new ideas & new brands.

Brejnholt Gruppen er en familie- og medarbejderejet trælastkoncern med knap 2,0 mia. kr. i årlig omsætning og 400 medarbejdere fordelt på 12 afdelinger i vækstbyer i Jylland og på Fyn samt én på Sjælland. Vi bygger vores forretning på relationer, og stræber efter at være en attraktiv, effektiv, konkurrencedygtig og fair samarbejdspartner.

Vores forretningsånd bygger på et nærhedsprincip, hvor vi lægger så mange beslutninger som overhovedet muligt helt ud til den enkelte medarbejder, så du som kunde skal opleve at den medarbejder du taler med selv kan træffe de beslutninger der får dit byggeri til at lykkes.

Vi lægger vægt på samarbejde og relationer med både kunder og leverandører, så tingene kommer til at ske.

Vi startede i Randers i 1991 og beskæftiger i dag næsten 400 medarbejdere med en årlig koncernomsætning på ca. 2 mia. kr.

Vores netværk af forretninger gør os i praksis i stand til at levere til dig over hele landet.  Vi er medlem af indkøbssamarbejdet XL-BYG. Som proff kunde i Brejnholt kan du hente de ting du lige står og mangler i alle XL-BYGs forretninger i hele landet.

Vi ser frem til at se dig i en af vore butikker!

Green Cotton Group is a Danish private label company founded in 1983 and today an internationally acknowledged, reliable, innovative and trustworthy manufacturer of sustainable baby, children’s, ladies and men’s apparels, offering value for money and supported by a very high level of service in an internationally experienced, dedicated and competitive team across countries.

Founded in 2007, the Coffee Collective is to this day 100% owned and run by Peter N. Dupont, Casper Engel Rasmussen og Klaus Thomsen. With several competition awards in the bag, including gold in both the World Barista Championship and World Cup Tasting championships, we continue to explore exciting coffee experiences.

We roast coffee daily and ship directly to wholesale customers, our own coffee shops, subscribers and web shop customers. And yet, freshly roasted coffee is just a small part of the equation.

We source coffee directly from the farmer for two main reasons. To guarantee we get the best green beans, and to make sure the farmer is rewarded for the high quality coffee. It is actually quite simple. For the farmer to continue to produce specialty coffee, he or she should be paid extra for the hard work.

In our opinion, sustainability in coffee starts with financial sustainability for the farmers. To make a difference, we believe that we have to start with ourselves by making coffee experiences that contributes to this development.

Certifed B Corporation since 2019

companyName: Wiley X  |  Europe, Middle East, Africa
description:
In 1987, U.S. army veteran Myles Freeman Sr. founded Wiley X, with a focused determination to create the world’s best protective gear for the armed forces. With time, the company has grown and become one of the leading brands. Today we are a family-owned company located in California, with the subsidiary company, Wiley X EMEA, located in Denmark, who manages the sale to Europe, Africa, and the Middle East. We create innovate sunglasses and eyewear, where functionality, safety, technology, and fashion go hand in hand.

As pioneers in protective eyewear, we have also experienced a great need for high quality sunglasses that can be worn with confidence outside the battlefield. We recognize that today’s lifestyle poses constant threats to our eyes’ health, and that is why we have created some of the most innovative, functional and color enhancing sunglasses in the world.

When it comes to sunglasses and safety eyewear, we have constantly innovated our brand, design, and technology, ultimately, making us specialists and one of the leading brands, within the business. Stylish, sleek, rugged, fashionable, and versatile, Wiley X delivers it all to our customers worldwide.

We sell our supreme products through three distinctive channels: our own webshop wileyx.eu, selected online marketplaces, and significantly through local presence in the form of all the dealers we have in our three sales areas. We service our dealers both from our office in Denmark, but also through our many sales agents. 

Are you interested in becoming a dealer or sales agent in your area, then feel free to contact us by sending an email to info@wileyx.eu.

Vibholm er en moderne og nytænkende smykkekæde med alle de førende mærker indenfor branchen.

Vibholm er en smykkekæde med fokus på et bredt sortiment af forskellige mærker. Vi lægger stor vægt på at have de nyeste trends og tendenser indenfor smykker og ure i vores butikker, samt at vores faguddannede personale giver vores kunder den bedst mulige service. 

Vores butikker består af 23 egne butikker i henholdsvis Aarhus, Aalborg, Skanderborg, Herning, Horsens, Silkeborg, Sønderborg, Vejle, Randers, Kolding, Esbjerg, Odense, Hillerød, Holbæk, Vanløse, Frederiksberg og Lyngby. Derudover har vi en franchise butik i Aabenraa, en dansk webshop på: www.vibholm.dk og en svensk webshop på: www.vibholm.se

Vibholm er del af den landsdækkende bytteservice, Danske Guldsmede- og urmageres bytteservice. 

Følg med i vores spændende smykkeunivers på Facebook og Instagram (vibholmguldogsoelv).

Online møbelbutik med Danmarks største udvalg af lækre kvalitets-møbler. Vi har gjort det let for dig at finde alt til hjemmet på bare én side, og vi leverer gratis til din dør. Med vores samarbejde med både danske og udenlandske leverandører, tilbyder vi dig Danmarks bredeste sortiment af møbler til hjemmet. Priserne er uden gebyrer, er yderst konkurrencedygtige og vores gratis levering gør det nemt og bekvemt for dig at handle hos os. Lige som det skal være, når du handler på nettet.

Vi er naturligvis godkendt af E-mærket.

Meld dig til vores nyhedsbrev og opnå endnu flere fordele. Få tilbud og kampagner som den første, få specielle rabatter, og hold dig opdateret med de seneste nyheder i vores butik og i møbelverdenen.

Riemann A/S is a Danish manufacturer of specialised skin care products.

The company was founded by Claus Riemann in 1979 and is based on his original vision of creating products with an “objectively identifiable effect”, an effect the consumer can see for himself. In other words: Products that work.

This simple yet challenging ambition remains our defining objective.

I.C. Nielsen er et Smede- og VVS-firma med 90 år på bagen!

Firmaet beskæftiger over 25 personer, der udfører følgende:
-	VVS.
-	Energivejledning.
-	Blikkenslager.
-	Fjernvarme.
-	Smed (CE 1090 EXC 3).

Indenfor de fire områder udføres både mindre og større opgaver. Ingen opgaver er for små!

Helle Nielsen og Kasper Nielsen ejer i dag selskabet. Efter en årrække væk fra I.C. Nielsen, hvor de drev DWA VVS & Blik, vendte de tilbage i sommeren 2019, hvor de overtog firmaet fra Lars & Aase Nielsen.
Helle står for bogholderiet. Mens sønnen Kasper, der var søn af Henning og nevø er af Lars, er fjerde generation, og direktør for selskabet.
Efter overtagelsen er Lars forsat ansat i firmaet.

I forbindelse med overtagelsen blev I.C. Nielsen & Søn Smede- og VVS firma og DWA VVS & Blik lagt sammen til I.C. Nielsen VVS & Blik og I.C. Nielsen Smede.
Samtidigt blev begge selskaber samlet i nye og renoverede lokaler i Sædding, Esbjerg.
I lokalerne er der faciliteter til både Smede- og Blikkenslagerarbejde.
Der er bl.a. fire 2-tons svingkraner og to mindre, samt en række maskiner til pladebearbejdning. Bl.a. kan der klippes og bukkes i 3 meter stykker.
Endvidere haves der to profilvalser.

DWA VVS & Blik blev stiftet af Dieter W. Andersen, som i februar 2006 valgte at gå på pension.
I 2005 købte Helle & Henning Nielsen firmaet. Siden januar 2014 har sønnen, Kasper Nielsen, været medejer. Kasper er uddannet såvel bygningsingeniør som autoriseret vvs-installatør.

En række højtkvalificerede medarbejdere løser hver dag opgaver for såvel private, erhvervsvirksomheder som offentlige institutioner.

Christopher Cloos is a Danish Eyewear Company originated from South of France, with HQ in Copenhagen. We are a fast growing brand, currently represented at +500 authorized retailers across Europe, North America, South America and Australia, while expanding to new cities every day.

Our mission is simple, because to us, glasses are more than a functionality, it is a way of living. Inspired by the French "mode de vie"​ and with our Scandinavian design and craftmanship, we create truly timeless and unique pieces. 

As our legacy continues, we hope that our love for quality eyewear will meet and inspire your own inner "bon viveur"​ – just the way it did for us.

Representing multiple high-end international brands, Danish Fashion Agency is one of the most influential agencies on the Scandinavian fashion scene. 

Our client portfolio consists of over 300 premium multi-brand boutiques and department stores in Denmark, Sweden, Norway, Finland and Iceland, ensuring optimal exposure and positioning for our collaboration partners.

Founded in 2012 by Camilla Delbing Pitzner, the agency today has a dedicated sales team with profound experience and knowledge within both wholesale, retail and public relations.

Danish Fashion Agency is handling all womens collections distributed by JAYMJAY.

Brands we represent:
Alberta Ferretti, Philosophy Di Lorenzo Serafini, Moschino, See by Chloé, MSGM, M Missoni, Karl Lagerfeld, Aspesi, Dsquared, Boutique Moschino, Love Moschino, Dsquared2, Majestic, Emporio Armani and more.

NÜ means naked in French and woman in Chinese, and it fits perfectly into the designers’ vision of fashion with a raw simplicity, pure natural materials and ethical production.

NÜ is fashion defined by a modern, provocative and laid-back design, expressed in a sexy and glamorous way. Luxurious fabrics such as silk, wool and leather embellished with handmade prints, embroideries and characteristic details of exquisite workmanship providing the unique DNA that characterizes NÜ. Feminine elements and rock ‘n’ roll vibes are combined beautifully in a passionate universe of raw masculinity and sensual femininity.

UD Vinduer A/S er en privatejet uafhængig vinduesfabrik, der producerer kvalitetsvinduer og døre på egne fabrikker i Danmark. Vi producerer både almindelige vinduer og døre samt energi vinduer og døre. Vi producerer i følgende materialer: Fyrretræ, Fyrretræ/alu, Sipo mahogni, Mahogni/alu, Egetræ.

Med UD Vinduer får du et partnerskab, hvor dialog, sparring, fleksibilitet og engagement er i højsædet. Vi er mere end din leverandør af vinduer og døre – vi er også en værdifuld samarbejdspartner. 

Vi elsker at involvere os, for det giver os den største sikkerhed for, at du bliver glad og tilfreds.

Dialog & sparring
Vi kender vinduer og døre ud og ind, og vi stiller spørgsmål og lytter. Kombinationen af faglighed, dialog og sparring giver dig den bedste løsning. Og det gælder både, når du køber standardvarer, specialløsninger til herregården eller til den krævende renoveringsopgave.

Fleksibilitet & engagement
Vi engagerer os i vores kunders projekter – også ud over det sædvanlige. Vi har et skarpt fokus på dine behov og arbejder hårdt for, at imødekomme dine krav. Du kan stole på, at UD Vinduer leverer kvalitetsprodukter og ekspertviden, der sikrer den bedste løsning og gør livet lettere for dig.

DANSK KVALITET
UD Vinduer er den foretrukne leverandør af vinduer og døre til de professionelle og kvalitetsbevidste kunder, og det er med god grund. 

Vi tilbyder vores kunder et stort udvalg af produkter, høj kvalitet, samarbejde og ekstraordinær service. 

Nybyggeri, ombygninger eller energi-renoveringer – i fællesskab finder vi den rigtige løsning. 

Vi leverer både standardprodukter og unikke specialprodukter, der alle er produceret på vores fabrik i Ulstrup.

Vi leverer det andre ikke kan eller vil, hvis det på nogen måde er muligt. Vi leverer det usædvanlige.

Velkommen til UD Vinduer.

V. Løwener A/S is a trading and engineering company founded in 1889. The company sell and service engineering products and solutions for industry, contractors, transport industry and the public sector in Denmark and neighboring markets. 

Our 131 year history documents the company's strengths: the ability to innovate and develop technical competence in line with technological developments and to anticipate market requirements. 

Today, V. Løwener A/S is a growing business, a stable and reliable supplier, and a partner with a wide range of capital and consumer goods in the areas of: 

- Industrial Engineering 
- Automotive Technology 
- Construction Equipment 
- Service & Installation 

In Sweden, we handle oil and lubrication equipment and DURA workshop equipment for the automotive industry 

The company has approximately 65 employees in Denmark

By having our two own production factories in Ukraine, we are able to offer our customers a cooperation of great flexibility. We ensure to deliver a product of high quality and standard, made in Europe.

Check out our website www.hrt.dk for further info and contact details.
