For three generations, Bosweel has been a family business with roots in the successful Danish textile industry. 

The company and brand was founded in 1937 and has designed, produced and manufactured shirts in nearly 80 years. 

Bosweel is the last remaining independent Danish shirtmaker. We are both proud and grateful to have survived the many changes in the clothing and fashion industry. 

First of all, we are shirtmakers, and we will never be anything else.

Secondly, we believe strongly in independence. Being able to think and act independently is fundamental to us, and enables us to maintain a corporate culture with focus on creating customer value. 

Thirdly, at Bosweel we will continue to follow our strong quality and design principles. We will never become blind followers of trends or the business models of other brands.

At Bosweel our creativity is inspired by strong and independent men and women who are able to stay true to themselves in our rapidly changing and turbulent world. We exist to learn from, appreciate, and dress strongly indent independent men and women.

A large portion of our turnover comes from B2B sales and private label sales. 

To serve this important business we have a dedicated B2B division where we offer a wide range of choises, and can help tailor specific solutions for both large and small businesses.

Depending on requirements and the desired quality, we can produce shirts at all price levels. 

All our production facilities are in Europe, which enables fast and flexible delivery.

We offer countless variations and options, and in consultation with our customers we always find a solution that meets their requirements.

Ausumgaard omfatter i dag både konventionelt landbrug, nicheproduktion indenfor landbrug, produktion af bæredygtig energi, nicheproduktion, branding og slag af eget brand indenfor fødevarer samt event, arrangement og messeafholdelse. 

CSR:
I alle virksomhedens aktiviteter tilstræbes der en aktiv social profil og medansvar på arbejdsmarkedet.

InVentilate ApS er et 100 % danskejet selskab, der leverer ventilationssystemer til byggebranchen. 

Blandt ejerene er EnergiMidt, Invactor og Innovation MidtVest, som administrerer Styrelsen for Forskning og Innovations pulje til investeringer i innovative virksomheder.

Med det drifts- og energioptimerede decentrale ventilationssystem MicroVent medvirker InVentilate til at indfri de nye skærpede energikrav til bygninger fra 2015. 

MicroVent-systemer foreskrives både af projekterende og installatører, ligesom InVentilate sælger systemerne direkte til såvel professionelle bygningsejere som private boligejere.

Lake Victoria Vanilla is situated in Kagera Region in the northwestern part of Tanzania, overlooking Lake Victoria. The area has perfect climatic conditions for vanilla cultivation and is not plagued by tropical storms, floods or droughts. Vanilla from the region is of superior quality with vanillin crystals forming on the outside of the pod (frosting) as a result of high vanillin content. 
In this setting we will produce certified organic vanilla of exceptional quality.
The farm is expected to harvest for the first time in 2023 and be in full capacity by 2025.

companyName: Airshoppen Travel Retail (part of Nordic Leisure Travel Group)
description:
Airshoppen Travel Retail origins in the Nordics but has expanded and developed the business within the European travel industry.
The business is setting the industry standards, positioning us as a leading European inflight retailer.

Vores virksomhed bygger på fire meget vigtige grundsten: innovation, nærvær, fleksibilitet & kvalitet. 

Innovation er en hjørnesten i virksomhedens strategi og har altid været det, siden virksomheden tog sin spæde opstart i 1947 med etablering af Axel Toft A/S. Med innovation som udgangspunkt har man kunne konkurrere med store multinationale selskaber om at levere den bedste løsning indenfor ernæring. Innovationstankegangen tvinger hele tiden nye tanker og idéer frem, og det er det materiale, der bærer udviklingen i Toft Care.

I alt hvad vi gør er nærvær væsentligt, og det har det altid været. Ser man tre generationer tilbage i virksomhedens historie, var den daglige kontakt til f.eks. lokale landmænd en vigtig del af virksomhedens nærvær, da disse var virksomhedens grundlag. I dag forsøger vi at udnytte teknologiens muligheder for at skabe nærvær via f.eks. sociale medier. Her kan vi både skabe og holde kontakt samt udvikle nye produkter, få hurtigt feedback og ikke mindst øge serviceniveauet. Selve nærværet kommer til udtryk gennem både sociale medier og igennem direkte menneskelig kontakt. 

Selvom vi vokser os større med tiden, er det vigtigt for os, at du opfatter os som en fleksibelpartner. Vores fleksibilitet kommer til udtryk ved altid at være lydhør overfor ønsker og kritik og samtidig forsøge at være en aktiv sparringspartner indenfor ernæring og udvikling af retter med proteiner, kulhydrater, fedt, fiber, vitaminer og mineraler. 

Vi har en klar holdning til kvalitet og sporbarhed, hvilket kommer til udtryk i vores opmærksomhed på at efterkomme gældende lovgivning og kvalitetskontrol. Vi værner meget om vores Elitesmiley, da den er et udtryk for førnævnte. Vi stiller strenge krav til leverandører og samarbejdspartnere omkring fødevaresikkerhed og fører dokumentationen igennem hele vejen.
SPA kompagniet har 17 års erfaring med at designe og producere spa, sauna, badekar og brusekabiner samt mange andre møbler til wellness og badeværelsesindretning. Indendørs såvel som udendørs.

DK-Foods specialises in producing pepperoni, salami and chorizo for the industrial market. Every week, our products can be found as topping more than 4 million pizzas in Europe. 

We are known for our fast decision-making process, flexibility, high service standards and quality at competitive prices.
Jacobsen Plus er i dag en af Danmarks mest spændende og progressive detailvirksomheder, som byder på det bedste af både dansk & udenlandsk design.

Ørbæk Ventilation producerer og sælger rektangulære og cirkulære ventilationskanaler og fittings.
 
Vi råder over en komplet maskinpark for produktion af rektangulære produkter, endvidere har vi maskiner til fremstilling af Spirorør og segmenterede fittings. Vi har en betydelig kapacitet og vi har en stab af meget erfarne og dygtige medarbejdere.
 
Vores egenproducerede cirkulære fittings suppleres med produkter fra Spiro, og vi lagerfører et væsentligt sortiment af TROX-lyddæmpere og -comfortprodukter. Vi er således i stand til at levere et stort set fuldt cirkulært program i en kvalitet svarende til markedets bedste.

Hatten is one of the leading wholesalers on Zealand and Lolland-Falster. In our branches, you will find a wide range of products for plumbing, sewer, steel, tools, technical articles as well a welding and shielding gases. We make sure to obtain the products we do not have in stock on a day-to-day basis. 

At our company, the customers set the agenda, regardless of whether you are a small company or a large, nation-wide contractor. Our experienced and competent employees make sure to find the solution that fulfills your needs. 

With branches on Zealand, Lolland-Falster and Møn, we are always near you. You are always free to contact us as we take you seriously with emphasis on flexibility, knowledge, and customer service.

Siden 1955 har DanRoots dyrket rodfrugter, og idag tæller sortimentet et spændende udvalg af gulerødder, pastinakker, persillerødder og rødbeder. Gulerødderne fremstilles både som økologisk og konventionel, mens de øvrige rodfrugter (pastinakker, persillerødder og rødbeder) udelukkende fremstilles om økologiske. I dag foregår al dyrkning under vigtig hensyntagen til miljøet, og der er stor fokus på fødevaresikkerhed, kontrol og sporbarhed. Gartneriet har gennem tiden opnået flere internationale certificering, for frugt og grønt; herunder GLOBALGAP og GRASP.
DanRoots leverer varer til flere førende supermarkedskæder på det danske marked. Virksomheden eksporterer ligedes en stor del af sine produkter og er generelt en vigtig medspiller på et europæiske marked.

botex er danmarks største faghandelskæde specialiseret indenfor gardiner, solafskærmning og boligtekstiler. botex har butikker fordelt i hele landet, heraf 3 på Færøerne. Hver dag kører mere end 50 botex-busser rundt i landet og servicerer både erhvervskunder og private med solafskærmning, gardiner, markiser og boligtekstiler. 

botex erhverv er en specifik erhvervsafdeling som rådgiver om og leverer indvendig og udvendig solafskærmning såsom screens, markiser, stofgardiner, liftgardiner og panelgardiner, screenrullegardiner, Duette og plisségardiner samt akustikplader og meget andet. Vores indgående branchekendskab og erfaring gør os til anerkendte, professionelle leverandører af alt inden for gardiner og solafskærmning til alle typer af virksomheder.

OMRÅDESIKRING, STØJVÆGGE, ADGANGSKONTROL & OVERVÅGNING. ISHØJ HEGN A/S har hovedkontor med produktion og lager i Ishøj samt afdelinger i Fredericia og Silkeborg. The company Axel Månsson A/S is one of the most innovative producers of
organic vegetables and organic eggs in Scandinavia. Focusing on the soil, the plants and animal welfare, Axel Månsson has been producing vegetables and eggs for more than 40 years. Axel Månsson has an eye for tomorrow’s needs, and the company is constantly evolving. The range is expanding in line with product demand.

New products will typically arise from the local development and demonstration areas on the farm, where many new species and varieties are tested and produced each year.
Samples and smaller lots are shipped to customers for testing, and it is ensured whether it’s possible to produce the relevant product organically, on Brande’s light soil. New emerging organic products include: Fresh herbs and edible flowers, new types of cabbages and new specialty lettuces, as well as more exotic species.

Convenience products, such as whole peeled onions, have been part of the range for many years, and this segment is still being developed – first and foremost as peeled onions diced or cut into rings. All products come in a variety of packages and in both organic and conventional variants.

The farm is wellknown for being open to the public. Guided tours, lectures and workshops etc. are available upon request. A former hen house is converted into a well-stocked organic farm shop, and an organic farm café is on its way. 

Sustainable production
Axel Månsson has a vision to become self-sufficient of nutrients in order to fulfill the organic cycle. An organic biogas plant converts different biomasses to natural gas, for heating appr. 12,000 households. The degassed biomass is used as valuable fertilizer for the vegetables. The latest technology is used in e.g. weed control and packaging. Sustainability is in focus in all aspects of the production. Monitoring and analysis is continously used in the production to ensure efficient utilization of the resources supplied, as well as full 
traceability.

Frejlev Cementstøberi blev etableret i 1942 af familien Mølgård, hvor den primære produktion bestod af cementsten, der blev håndstøbt med skovl og trillebør.Sandet til produktionen blev sorteret om aftenen af Jens og Anne Mølgård og fragtet med hestevogn til støberiet hver morgen.

Støberiet i Frejlev eksisterer stadig i dag, dog under helt andre moderne rammer og en ny ekstra fabrik er det også blevet til. FC Beton er stadigvæk ejet af familien, hvor det nu er sønnen Jens Erik og barnebarnet Jens, der står for virksomhedens gang. De nye moderne faciliteter har skabt et betonstøberi, hvor høj kvalitet og ensartethed er den primære fokus faktor i dag. Her produceres færdigbeton og mørtel til industriel brug og et meget stort udvalg af havefliser, belægningssten og tilbehør.

I den store online webshop, kan både private og erhverv vælge iblandt det store udvalg af farver, tykkelser og tilbehør til belægning som f.eks. granitskærver og stenmel.

Der er altid et stort lager og leveringen er naturligvis direkte til døren, til aftalt tid.

Kærsgaard A/S er en familieejet stål- og smedevirksomhed, som har over 90 års erfaringer indenfor udvikling, produktion og montage af stålkonstruktioner. 

Vi arbejder ud fra en enkel filosofi om at levere ensartet høj kvalitet samt – via effektiv procesledelse, nyeste teknologi, erfarne medarbejdere og fleksible løsningsorienterede indsatser – at overholde alle aftaler til glæde for bygherrer og slutbrugere.

Hos os får du individuel tilpassede løsninger, som involvere enkelte eller flere af vores kompetenceområder indenfor: Bygningsstål, altaner, trapper, facebeklædning og skure. Men skulle der opstå et specielt behov, er vores kompetencer brede og vores arbejdsområder mange, så tøv ikke med at kontakte os for mere information om hvordan vi kan hjælpe dig. 

Kærsgaard A/S  er certificeret til at udføre bærende dele i stål, rustfri stål og aluminium - ECX 1, EXC 2 & EXC 3. 

Du er velkommen til at kontakte os for at hører nærmere eller se mere på vores hjemmeside www.krsgaard.dk

Værftets Madmarked har siden sin åbning i maj 2017 været et samlingspunkt for gamle såvel som unge og byder på et hav af street foodkoncepter i rustikke, maritime omgivelser. Sæt tænderne i fish’n chips, pizza, lækre kager, tacos, indisk mad, bløde pandekager eller noget helt syvende og sluk tørsten i Værftets Madmarkeds bar, der byder på en stort udvalg af kolde drikkevarer.

Tag din mor, en ven, kæresten, en kollega eller hele familien under armen og oplev sammen Værftets Madmarked, der er et hyggeligt, afslappet og oplagt sted til venskabelige møder, familiebesøg og en romantisk aften med din udkårne.

Og på Værftets Madmarked kan man ikke kun spise! En lang række faciliteter gør det muligt at hygge sig før og efter en bid mad. Faste ugentlige aktiviteter som Foody Banko og Værftets Løbeklub sikrer, at der er sjove og sociale arrangementer på Værftets Madmarked, mens du i baggården kan spille et slag petanque, slippe børnene fri i legeområdet i street food-hallen og spille en omgang street soccer eller basketball på banerne i hallen ved siden af. Læs mere om aktiviteterne herunder.

Med Kulturværftet og Museet for Søfart som nabo og med udsigt til Kronborg bliver Værftets Madmarked et oplagt sted at besøge som et naturligt led i udflugten til Helsingør. 

Så kom!

Kiwi Group A/S was established in 1991 with the aim to install and operate candy machines in retail stores, businesses and public educational institutions. 

In 2004 the current management took over the company and has since developed it to include three business areas:

KIWI VENDING
Operates around 10,000 small vending machines (candy, toys and entertainment) in Denmark, Norway, Sweden, Finland and Germany. Purchases are made at coin-operated vending machines. The machines are serviced by partners, franchisees and our own staff.

KIWI TRADING
Kiwi Trading was established in 2007 and is a trading company that mainly sells FMCG products, including chocolate, confectionery, soft drinks, coffee, etc. in the global market.

KIWI RETAIL
Kiwi Retail was established in 2012 and today operates as a total supplier of confectionery, soft drinks and other impulse related FMCG products for non-food chains in Scandinavia. With the development of the concept SweetSpot™, Kiwi Retail seeks to optimize, manage and renew chains impulse sales, so that the retailers can focus on their core business.

Focus is to develop "odd segments"​ and identify "hard-to-reach"​ markets and customers. Our core business is aimed towards top branded products & FMCG, such as chocolate and confectionery; soft drinks; beers; liquors; toiletries and consumer electronics. We mainly deal directly with brand holders, and new trade lines are constantly being sought and expanded.

Primotex is a Danish button manufacturer with its own production facility in China since 1997.

Primotex is very strict on quality and regularly tests all buttons. Primotex is Oeko-tex certified. Primotex stresses high manufacturing quality while keeping the price affordable and on par with other manufacturers in China.

Primotex works directly with a lot of brands but also through a lot of production companies, trading companies, and vendor factories around the world. The list of well-known clothing brands that use buttons manufactured by Primotex is too extensive to exhaust but includes among others H&M, American Eagle, Macy‘s, Calvin Klein, MaxMara and many more.

In order to meet the growing customer demand Primotex has revamped their organization in China and have been increasing its capacity.

Er du træt af idéforladte produkter og fødevarer uden smag? Det er vi hos Aalbæk Specialiteter. Derfor giver vi dig økologisk pålæg og pølser fyldt med kvalitet og oplevelse.

Hos Aalbæk Specialiteter er livsfilosofien og tankegangen enkel.

Vi har nemlig en helt igennem kompromisløs holdning til valg af de bedste råvarer og gennemført håndværk - og det har gjort os til Danmarks største producent af økologiske pålægsprodukter og pølser. Vi vil give den danske forbruger absolut topkvalitets charcuteri i verdensklasse!

Det betyder med andre ord, at vi har stor respekt for traditionen og historien i vores fag. Men det betyder ikke, at vi bare gør, som vi altid har gjort. Hos Aalbæk Specialiteter må det gerne være vildt, skørt, anderledes, umuligt og eksotisk - så længe det har masser af kvalitet og smag. Vi elsker udfordringer, og vi har en erklæret målsætning om at være med til at skabe fremtidens fødevarer.

Pointen er, at vi hos Aalbæk Specialiteter hele tiden flytter os - uden at forlade vores fundament i slagterhåndværkets traditioner. Og vores tilgang er i bund og grund meget simpel: Vi anvender masser af gode naturlige råvarer og krydderier, så vi får så ægte og velsmagende fødevarer som muligt.

Kig efter vores produkter i dit lokale supermarked.

KødGrossisten er en af Danmarks største udkørende og landsdækkende specialister i fersk kød, pålæg og specialiteter. Vi har en ægte passion for kød af høj kvalitet, og vi leverer dagligt til flere end 1500 kunder på Food Service markedet. Vi producerer alt på vores topmoderne 4800m2 store fabrik i Vemmelev ved Slagelse på Vestsjælland. 

Hos os er fødevaresikkerheden i top, og vi sørger hele tiden for at forbedre os, så du trygt kan handle med os. 

Vores specialistviden og erfaring gør os til det oplagte valg, når du skal vælge en leverandør af kød. Vi ved, at fleksibilitet og personlig service er vigtige parametre, når du skal vælge en ny leverandør af kød- og pålægsleverancer, og derfor bestræber vi os på at skabe løsninger, der passer til dig og din forretning.

Vores vision – vi vil være det bedste valg! 
Vi vil ikke bare være Danmarks største- vi vil også være det bedste valg af kødgrossist på det professionelle Food Service marked. 
Derfor arbejder vi til stadighed med at få dybere indsigt i vores kunders behov, så vi kan udvikle løsninger og produkter i takt med tidens trends. På den måde styrker vi vores kunders forretning og vækst. Vi arbejder løbende med fleksible åbningstider, nye muligheder inden for e-handel og udvikling af andre koncepter til gavn for dig som kunde. 
Vores medarbejderes store engagement og passion for kød og kvalitet er en del af vores DNA, og det skaber tryghed for dig som kunde. Du kan være sikker på, at vi kun bruger de bedste råvarer til vores produktion, og vi leverer kun de bedste kød- og pålægsprodukter på markedet. 

Hos os får du en unik og personlig service, så du får en god oplevelse fra start til slut – vi vil nemlig være det bedste valg for dig som kunde.

Velkommen hos KødGrossisten!

PrimoVinduer er Nordens største producent og leverandør af vinduer, døre, udestuer og karnapper i træ/alu, træ/plast, plast/alu og plast.

Virksomheden, der er ethundrede procent danskejet, blev grundlagt i 1975 og har lige fra starten været blandt de førende indenfor den teknologiske udvikling af vinduesprofiler til bolig og erhverv. Et vindue fra Primo er en holdbar og vedligeholdelsesfri løsning med fokus på funktion, kvalitet og design. Alle vinduer udføres efter mål, vel at mærke uden at det koster ekstra.

Primo Vinduer yder rådgivning til såvel private boligejere som fagfolk - forhandlere, håndværkere, projekterende, arkitekter m.fl. Om ønsket står vi for opmåling, tilbudsgivning, ordrestyring og montage, når dette er optimalt for kunden.

PRIMO Vinduer er tilmeldt Dansk Vindues Verfikation (DVV), hvilket garanterer en løsning, der i enhver henseende er kvalitetsmæssigt helt i top.

Hopballe Mølle ligger ved Grejs Å mellem Vejle og Jelling i den nordlige ende af den naturskønne
Grejsdal. Gården er en gammel selvstændig mølleejendom, hvorpå der igennem næsten 600 år 
har været mølleri. Her har bønderne fået malet deres korn til mel og gryn, og ved stampeværket
blev der lavet klæde til dyner, kørekapper, mandstøj, drengetøj og kjoletøj i den kvalitet, 
skrædderen ønskede det. I 1860 grundlagdes flormelsmølleriet, som blev ved til 1925. I 1921 oprettedes
et elektricitetsværk, som ved hjælp af vandkraften leverede strøm til hele Hover sogn.
 
Ved møllen var der også et savværk – og her blev der under krigen lavet fiskekasser og savet 
generatorbrænde.
 
Hopballe Mølle er en gammel slægtsgård, som har været i familiens eje siden 1807 – hele tiden
gået i arv fra far til søn. Den nuværende ejer er således 6. generation. Der har altid været tradition
for dyrehold på stedet, før i tiden var det heste, køer, får, grise, gæs, ænder, høns og kyllinger. 
I dag driver 6. generation Hopballe Mølle som landbrug med planteavl og kyllingeproduktion - og 
7. generation hjælper til!. Vi ønsker at sætte fokus på dyrevelfærd og den gode råvare og vil derfor 
tilbyde kvalitetskød direkte solgt fra gården uden fordyrende mellemled.

Vi har produceret kyllinger i mere end 20 år og den erfaring bruger vi selvfølgelig i vores arbejde 
– kyllingerne trives og har masser af plads til at røre sig på - det kan ses og smages på kødet.

Kødet har mere struktur, smag og kraft. Kødet er gyldent og mørt på grund af majsen.

På vores skønne beliggenhed har vi en restaurant hvor vi bl.a serverer vores lækre Hopballekyllinger tilberedt på flere forskellige måder og du kan indtage maden i de dejligste omgivelser på terrasserne ud til søen. Derudover har vi en hyggelig gårdbutik hvor du har mulighed for at købe mange af de produkter vi bruger i restauranten - og skulle det ikke være nok kan du i vores webshop købe Hopballekyllinger, leveret lige til døren!

Decoflame is a of the leading manufacturers of high-end bioethanol fireplaces and was launched in 2008 by the designer Kjell Thomsen. Located in Northern Denmark, the Decoflame premises include the factory where all the fireplaces are carefully manufactured and tested, Scandinavia’s biggest showroom with over 30 bioethanol fireplaces on display, and the offices.
​
Decoflame fireplaces combine cutting-edge technology, quality and the functionality of Scandinavian design and will add a style statement to any residence.
​
With a well-established worldwide network, professional staff, comprehensive informative materials and technical specifications, Decoflame offers architects, interior designers as well as private customers, the perfect fireplace solution for every unique project.
​
All Decoflame fireplaces are manually crafted and tested by highly skilled professionals at the local factory using premium quality materials that increase fireplace safety. Decoflame biofires are equipped with a number of safety sensors, e.g. spillage, temperature and tilt sensors, which ensure the safe operation of the fireplace.
​
Decoflame applies its expertise and design competences in creating both standard and made-to-measure biofires for luxury property developments, private homes, as well as for the hospitality sector.

Fredericia Idrætscenter ligger midt i Madsbyparken – et af Fredericia’s smukkeste områder.

Vi forener sport, kultur, sundhed og erhverv i et bredt udvalg af aktiviteter og arrangementer. Fredericia Idrætscenter byder på muligheder der passer til enhver alder og livssituation. 

Vi tilbyder:
•	Idrætsaktiviteter for alle
•	FICNESS - fitnessfaciliteter og træning
•	6 moderne idrætshaller
•	Svømmehal og Tropisk Badeland
•	Konference- og mødefaciliteter
•	Overnatningsmuligheder
•	Kulturelle arrangementer og events
•	Forplejning fra Café FIC

Fredericia Idrætscenter (FIC) blev indviet d. 27. september 1969. Siden indvielsen har centret gennemført et stort antal udvidelser. I 1976 kom bl.a. svømmehallen til, i 1987 kom hal 5 & 6 til og bowlingcentret blev indviet i 1988. Indvielse af badelandet skete i 1993. Stadionanlægget - Monjasa Park blev bygget i 2006.

FIC er i dag Danmarks næststørste indendørs idrætsanlæg på ca. 25.000 m2, og rummer både svømmehal, badeland, et stadion, et træningscenter, et bowlingcenter, keglebaner, 6 idrætshaller og udendørs flexbaner.

I januar 2015 blev FIC fusioneret med Den Historiske Miniby og Madsby Legepark, som lægger helholdsvis 10.000 m2 og 60.000 m2 til et sammenlagt kvadratmeterantal på 95.000 m2 for Madsbyparken.

01. august 2018 står der en ny hovedindgang klar. Byggeriet kommer bl.a. til at indeholde en lounge til 300 personer på 1. sal, hvor der kommer panoramavinduer ud til hal 1 - thansen arena, og der konstrueres en hængetribune.

companyName: MUNCHOLM A/S ➡ leverandør af tyndplader og maskiner
description:
MUNCHOLM only do business with B2B on a professional market.

MUNCHOLM A/S was founded in 1979 and has been owned by Lars Nørskov Pedersen since 1998 with Søren Klausen as part owner since 2007. For os er trygheden det vigtigste. Vi står altid til rådighed, når kunden har brug for hjælp. Både ved køb og service. 
Vi er landsdækkende og fremviser gratis på kundens adresse. Vores dygtige teknikere kan med deres ekspertise hurtigt hjælpe kunden, hvis der skulle blive brug for vores assistance efter købet. Vi udfører gerne service og reparationer på den private adresse.

Lindebjerg er blandt landets absolut største leverandører af køretøjer specielt designet til seniorer. På mange af vores produkter er vi med i udviklingen fra første skrue til færdigt produkt. Dette giver os en unik mulighed for at kende de produkter vi handler med ned i mindste detalje.
 
Vores teknikkere arbejder udelukkende med Lindebjerg’s egne produkter. Det er kundens garanti for, at køretøjet er i sikre hænder, når de vælger os som leverandør.
 
I 2008 byggede Lindebjerg nyt hovedkontor og lager i Middelfart. Her har vi samlet administration, lager og showroom med tilhørende butik. Alle interesserede er velkommen til at komme og få råd og vejledning omkring sortimentet og modelvalg, samt prøve et eller flere af vores produkter. Ofte har vi også mange gode brugte eller demo modeller stående på lager.

Skov Industri løser alle typer støjproblemer, produktion i kontrollerede miljøer og renrum, rum i rum løsninger, afgrænsninger i industrien, kommuner, institutioner og hospitaler, reol opbevaring, arealudnyttelse mv.

Skov Industri er en danskejet produktionsvirksomhed, som er stiftet i 2004.

Vi producerer og markedsfører MATADOR vægge, MATADOR renrum, MATADOR skærmvægge, Smith lagerreoler, Akustik produkter og Mezzaniner.

Salget sker med rådgivning direkte til kunder i den private og offentlige sektor i det meste af verden.

Skov Industri beskæftiger ca. 20 medarbejdere og er beliggende i Nr. Aaby på Fyn i en 3.300 m2 stor fabriksbygning, med den nødvendige plads til en mangesidet produktion.

Udover en stor maskinpark råder vi over eget jernfosfateringsanlæg og pulverlakeringsanlæg.

Medarbejderne hos Skov Industri har mange års erfaring med konstruktion, produktion, rådgivning og salg af kvalitetsprodukter til såvel danske som udenlandske virksomheder.

Produkter fra Skov Industri efterspørges på grund af en anerkendt og veldokumenteret kvalitet, fleksibilitet og genbrugelighed.

Alle produkter af egen produktion jernfosfateres med efterfølgende pulverlakering, hermed sikres en meget høj korrosionsbeskyttelse og en robust og rengøringsvenlig finish. Det giver et flot resultat og lang holdbarhed.

HISTORY 📃 
The company Munkebo Seafood A/S, who is located on the Danish island Funen, was established by Hawesta and F. Tengberg Hansen back in 1974. 
In 1997 the company was taken over by a four-leaf clover with different approaches to the business. The name was changed to Munkebo Seafood A/S. 
In 2000 the range was changed to what it is today which includes salmon, herring, mussels and soups. 
In 2022 Bakkafrost acquired stock majority of Munkebo Seafood a/s. 

VISION 🌟
Munkebo Seafood A/S wants to be known as a reliable and trustworthy supplier of canned fish products of the finest quality. Daily we work hard to meet our customers demands and meet the growing demand to deliver canned fish of the highest quality and to supply fish to meet the increasing demands for sustainability.

WHAT WE CAN ✅ Today we can proudly say that the factory stands as a modern cannery with a high productivity. Our production capacity is currently around 40 million cans per year. Our main emphasis is salmon and pollock, but also mussels, seafood soup, fish soup, trout, shrimps and other specialities are produced. Always from natural raw materials and as gentle as possible. 

INNOVATION💡
We constantly work our brand portfolio and our optimization of the production. In the past years we have developed various new products lines, which makes us THE specialist in driffent categories (for example shrimps, trout, and pollock)

Please fell free to read more about Munkebo Seafood on our website. ↙️

Miss Bagel er et moderne håndværksbageri beliggende i Espergærde i Nordsjælland. Vi elsker godt brød og var det første bageri i Danmark til at bage bagels baseret på originale amerikanske opskrifter og bageteknikker. Derudover bager vi hovedsageligt amerikansk inspirerede produkter som bl.a. burgerboller, cookies, muffins og brownies. Vi specialimporterer også et spændende udvalg af lækker chai-latte, cacao og frappe fra Californien.

Vi er stolte af vores håndværk og lægger meget arbejde i løbende at perfektionere vores opskrifter og finde de helt rigtige ingredienser. Margarine hører f.eks. ingen steder hjemme i Miss Bagels bagværk, vi bruger udelukkende rigtig smør for at opnå den gode smag. I vores bagelproduktion bruger vi kerner og mel produceret i Danmark, mærket med NaturAks. NaturAks er garanti for at kerner og mel er fri og kontrolleret for stråforkortere og nedvisningsmidler, hvilket er bedre for både miljø og mennesker. 

Hos Miss Bagel handler det først og fremmest om smag og konsistens frem for det perfekte ydre. Her er det, det indre der tæller og ikke hvorvidt bagelen er helt rundt eller glasuren er glat.
Miss Bagel er en visionær og kompetent leverandør af kvalitets bagels, brød og kager, og dermed en uundværlig samarbejdspartner i foodservice industrien såvel som i detailhandlen. Vores størrelse, organisatoriske opbygning og kultur gør, at kunden altid vil være i fokus, ligesom vores økonomiske soliditet sikrer vore kunder en stabil, langsigtet leverandør med evne og vilje til fortsat udvikling. Miss Bagels styrke er kvalitet, god kundeservice og kompetente medarbejdere.

Miss Bagel forsøger altid at involvere sig i nærmiljøet, f.eks. ved at sponsorere diverse lokalforeninger, invitere på rundvisninger og holde oplæg på skoler. I 2009 og 2010 blev Miss Bagel kåret som Gazelle virksomhed og i 2014 blev vi indstillet til Helsingørs LBR pris, for at udvise et særligt beskæftigelses ansvar i virksomheden.

Öxneholm blev grundlagt som WP Kød i 1972, og vi har lige siden opstarten produceret og leveret velsmagende kvalitetskød til alle segmenter af den danske HoReCa-branche. Vi har med stolthed og ordentlighed bestræbt os på at varetage vores kunders behov, og altid med vores passion for smagfuldt kød først. Vi beskæftiger i dag ca. 60 medarbejdere fordelt på alt fra chauffører til produktion og administration, og vi spænder over en bred aldersgruppe fra 20 til 63 år - men fælles for os alle er at vi elsker kød. 

Vi elsker virkelig kød, men da nogle af vores kerneværdier er ærlighed og ansvarlighed, anerkender vi samtidig at kødproduktion er klimabelastende. Vi har derfor sat os for at levere det mest smagfulde kød, der kan produceres bæredygtigt.  Når du køber og nyder Öxenholm, kan du altså have tillid til at vores kød er produceret og leveret med den størst mulige hensyntagen til global bæredygtighed, som beskrevet i FN’s 17 klimamål. 

Med omstillingen til Öxenholm har vi iværksat en dynamisk proces med gennemgang af alle produktionsprocesser, lige fra i råvarernes oprindelsesland til den nære produktion på virksomheden i Roskilde. Vi har altså startet en udvikling henimod at blive en så ansvarlig og bæredygtig leverandør som overhovedet muligt. Og det er vi meget stolte af!

Öxneholm stræber således efter at være det mest velsmagende og bæredygtigt producerede kød, du kan servere for dine gæster. Öxneholm er ganske enkelt ”Kærlighed til kød”.

-Velbekomme

At Halodi we are passionate about robots. Our mission is to bring capable humanoid robots to everyone. To achieve this,we have developed Eve, a full sized humanoid robot that will serve industry and consumers at an affordable price.  

Eve is unlike any other robot, due to our Revo1 drive system with in-house developed motors and close to frictionless transmissions. This enables her to be the world’s first human strength direct drive robot, she operates silently and can safely interact with people. We have already set the world records for highest torque to weight ratio servo motors, most transparent transmissions and highest payload to weight ratio for a robotic arm, and we have barely started.

After developing our prototype robot, and successfully securing funding, we are preparing to scale up our organization to further develop our robot and handle production. 

Eve has been developed from the ground up to be mass produced at low cost and to handle the latency inherent in cloud computing. This will enable her to utilize modern artificial intelligence approaches for both reasoning and dynamics, and be affordable for domestic use given sufficient volumes.

Eve is a general purpose full size humanoid robot, capable of a wide variety of tasks. She will start mainly in the industrial and healthcare segments, where our high payload fully equipped wheeled platform with vision, arms, hands, hips and ankles will enable a lot of uses that are not cost effective today. As her intelligence develops she will gradually move towards the domestic consumer market.

In 1929, Jørgen Jørgensen, a Norwegian outdoor enthusiast, began his search for durable outdoor equipment to perform in Norway’s harsh and rugged land. Starting with simple innovations such as leather straps, canvas backpacks and cotton clothing, he set Norrøna’s direction: to search for the best in technical advancements, to create the ultimate in performance product.

Today, four generations later, as traditional mountain life broadens, we are still a Norwegian family-owned and run company. We inherit from our forefathers our commitment to advance the boundaries of product function, with design-bred solutions to equip you with the highest-grade, protective, sustainable gear for your outdoor needs.

We control the ultimate detail with the promise to bring you excellence through experimental, technical perfection assisted by our dedicated testers and ambassadors. From concept to creation, our in-house team of designers and craftsmen are compelled to stretch the edges of innovation. We build touchstone products, establish construction techniques, and redefine the meaning of fit, fabric, function and finish, based on our design principle of Loaded Minimalism™.

Ethical trade and sustainability are essential in all parts of our value chain, and we believe that the only way to run a company is on a sustainable platform. We are completely transparent about our processes through our roadmap, ensuring we keep pushing ourselves towards reducing our environmental footprint and creating a positive impact. 

Our vision: 
Welcome to nature

Our mission: 
Make great products our way for people with an active lifestyle

Our company values: 
Roots, Innovation, Passion

Our design philosophy:
Loaded minimalism™ – great products made as clean as possible with all critical details

The Norwegian Seafood Council works with the Norwegian fisheries and aquaculture industries to develop markets for Norwegian seafood through local market intelligence, market development and reputational risk management. The Seafood Council is headquartered in Tromsø and maintains local offices in thirteen of Norway's most important international markets. The Norwegian seafood industry finances the activities of the Norwegian Seafood Council via a tariff on all Norwegian seafood exports. The Norwegian Seafood Council is a public company owned by the Ministry of Trade, Industry and Fisheries.

Bergans of Norway is a leading provider and developer of outdoor equipment and technical clothing. We have a wide range of clothing for expeditions, outdoor, hunting, mountaineering, skiing and lifestyle. We also manufacture tents, sleeping mats, sleeping bags, backpacks and Ally folding canoes. We are a major supplier to large and small expeditions around the world.

Bergans of Norway has been driven by dedicated and passionate outdoor enthusiasts for over a century. We introduced and patented the backpack as we know it today, an invention famous polar explorers such as Amundsen and Scott recognized and used on their expeditions. No other manufacturer of outdoor equipment can match our experience in polar exploration – or our ambition to share this legacy with today’s adventurers. Founded in 1908, Bergans has played a major role in Norwegian outdoor life for more than a century.

Arcus is a leading Nordic branded consumer goods company with a range of iconic Arcus spirits brands and a broad wine portfolio. Arcus is the world’s largest producer of aquavit.

Vectura, a wholly owned company, supplies complete logistics solutions for the beverage industry and is closely integrated in Arcus'​ production.

Arcus was spun off from the Norwegian state monopoly, Vinmonopolet, in 1996 and since then has grown from a local company to an international group with the Nordic region as its home market. The Group also exports a significant volume of spirits to markets outside of the Nordic region, the most important of which is Germany.

Arcus is listed on Oslo Børs.

Vestre is a leading manufacturer of furniture for towns and cities, parks and outdoor public spaces. We have been involved in creating social and democratic meeting places for millions of people for 70 years. Vestre collaborates with well-known Scandinavian designers and has received many design awards. Vestre’s products are manufactured in Norway and Sweden from top-class materials to a consistently high standard, ensuring a long lifespan. Vestre is a family-owned company and is now being managed by the third generation of the family. Our head office is located in Oslo, Norway.

Granberg® is a Scandinavian leading manufacturer of protective gloves for various industries, healthcare and retail markets. With a product portfolio of more than 220 different types of protective gloves Granberg group offers cost-effective and relevant solutions for hand protection: cut-resistant, chemical–resistant, vibration absorbing, water- and cold-resistant, extreme-fit assembly, disposable and other special protective gloves. The Granberg® brand of safety gloves is well known within the oil & gas industry, food processing and fisheries, assembly and construction industries, healthcare and retail. With more than 55 years' experience, Granberg group is constantly implementing new technologies. The European market is served from our Swedish subsidiary Granberg Sverige AB. The Middle East market is served from our United Arab Emirates office Granberg Middle East FZC. We offer great solutions for hand protection: safety, durability and efficiency. We are ready to assist you in choosing correct hand protection. Contact us at post@granberg.no.

Wenaas - Ekspert på å beskytte folk i arbeid.

Wenaas har helt siden 1950-tallet arbeidet for å skape en trygg og komfortabel arbeidsdag for norske industriarbeidere. Vi var en av de første som startet med utvikling og produksjon av arbeidstøy i Norge. 

Siden den gang har vi gått fra å være en liten norsk produsent av arbeidstøy til en markedsledende internasjonal leverandør av topp-til-tå sikkerhetsløsninger. Vår misjon er å beskytte folk i arbeid med all vår kompetanse. Fordi vi vet at våre produkter kan bety forskjellen mellom liv og død gjør vi ingen kompromisser i vår produktutvikling – brukerens sikkerhet er alltid vår høyeste prioritet. Våre brukere kan derfor konsentrere seg om å utføre arbeidet sitt – trygt og komfortabelt.

Devold of Norway AS is an independent company with a long and proud history. We have produced high-quality wool clothing since 1853, and we are thereby the oldest manufacturer of knitted garments in Norway. Our aim is the same today as when Ole Andreas Devold founded the company 160 years ago: to create comfortable, high-quality clothing that protects people against the elements.

Devold of Norway serves two different markets, offering sports & leisure wear and protective work wear. Our goal is to maintain our renowned product quality, which is the result of a long tradition of craftsmanship combined with the best available technology, while continuing to develop new functional garments of appealing design.
 
Devold® sports and leisure wear comprises a wide range of comfortable wool underwear, socks, headwear, various types of mid-layer garments and knitted sweaters.
 
Within protective clothing we supply underwear, mid-layer garments, socks and accessories. All designed to protect users against cold, heat and flames.

FJONG is transforming the word’s second most polluting industry by introducing a convenient way to rent and share clothes. We reinvent the way people consume by introducing clothing rental and subscription from our shared wardrobe. We recently set the double Norwegian record in crowdfunding (highest amount raised and highest female investor share) and are now about to expand internationally and step up the game further. If you want to change how clothes are consumed, join us!

We have Scandinavia's largest and best range of technical clothing for teams, clubs, federations and companies. Trimtex has delivered profile clothing and special design for over 40 years.
Through quality, accuracy, creativity and price focus, we've delivered to thousands of clubs and companies. Customer satisfaction is always the main focus through all stages of the process. Let us help you with your unique design, we promise you will not be disappointed.

It's easy to order, pay and get the goods delivered. You do not have to be many! We deliver down to 5 products per product. If you are many, we will be happy to do that for you too. We set up your own online store in which we offer payment by card, invoice or PayPal. The goods can be delivered together or to the individual member / employee. We find the perfect solution for you - at no additional cost. We are not only concerned about the quality of our clothes, we also know that the shopping experience is about the entire journey you have with us.

"A smile is the coolest thing you can wear"​

In the creative cellars of the picturesque town of Stryn, Norway (population 6750), just over 10 years ago, two local designers Simen Staalnacke and Peder Børresen, after years of global travels, international studies and nights of sizzling cocktails, gave birth to a concept soon to be known, worn, and adored; the Norwegian fashion lifestyle brand “Moods of Norway”. Soon the duo met up with the third musketeer, Stefan Dahlkvist and drew their lines for the coming collections. 

As of this golden minute, Moods of Norway is presented in the most polished and happy stores around the world. 

Our main goal is to make “Happy Clothes for Happy People"​ around the world by blending our Norwegian heritage with vibrant colorful fashion


Welcome to Our Universe!

Brav is a major player in the sport and outdoor industry, and manages some of the most influential brands in the marketplace. 

We own and manage the Swix, Toko, Lundhags, Ulvang, Helsport and Hard Rocx brands. We also own and operate the digital platform skisporet.no. Our business is balanced across seasons and markets, with approximately 50% of our turnover originating from the Spring/Summer season and 50% from the Autumn/Winter season.

The mission of Brav is to improve our customers’ quality of life. Acting responsibly, we will do this by connecting and developing the best talents in the sport and outdoor industry – and support them to develop and produce the most innovative products and services.

We build our company and community upon our three values; teamwork, passion and courage. Our vision is to turn dreams into memories – for our customers, for our employees and for our owners.

Skala utgjør Norges største og bredeste fagmiljø innen prosessteknologi og driftsstøtte til norsk matindustri. Vår jobb er å gjøre norsk matproduksjon mer bærekraftig, mer effektiv og mer konkurransedyktig.

Etterhvert som verden og matindustrien har utviklet seg, har vi bygget opp fagmiljøer som gjør oss til en erfaren og fremtidsrettet partner for spesielt matindustrien, men også til annen industri. Vår erfaring kombinerer vi med dedikert satsing på ny teknologi og løsninger.

Skala AS er morselskap og en del av et stort kunnskaps- og leveransemiljø til næringsmiddelrelatert industri gjennom eierskap i fire selskaper; Skala Maskon, Skala Robotech,  Skala Fabrikk og Forberg International. Skala Gruppen omsetter for 600 mill årlig og vi er totalt ca 200 motiverte ansatte. Vårt hovedkontor er på Helsfyr i Oslo og øvrige kontorer ligger i Stavanger, Drammen, Heimdal og Stjørdal.

Kingsland is a Norwegian brand which has, since its creation in 1999, grown to become one of the world's largest manufacturers of equestrian wear and horse gear.

Lin Kingsrød, the creator of the brand, herself comes from a family of top riders. Her vision was to make functional equestrian clothing with eye-appeal, by blending the elegance and sophistication of classic equestrian wear with up to date styling. Today, more than ten years later, Kingsland has more than 900 equestrian retailers in 25 countries and Lin Kingsrød is still the designer and creative director. 

Kingsland has a reputation for its subtle blend of classic equestrian and up to date styling. This combination, together with the use of top quality materials, has made Kingsland the favorite brand of many of the world's top riders. 

The increasing popularity of the brand has led to the development of a whole new range of products. Kingsland now presents four collections a year which, in addition to equestrian competition clothing, also include a wide range of quality casual wear.

Kingsland Breeches Concept and Kingsland Dressage are both sub-brands of Kingsland Equestrian.

Scandinavian Cosmetics is the leading cosmetics and beauty company in Norway. We are a distributor of more than 80 international brands within the cosmetic trade. The company represents many of the most important principals in the business and distributes a number of international brands like: IsaDora, Shiseido, Clarins, Guerlain, NARS, Versace and others. 

We have 90 years experience in brand building, sale and distribution. The company’s strategic focus is to be "The Most Valuable Partner"​ within our business.  We have 110 employees and a turnover of NOK 500 million to the retail trade, equaling almost 1 billion in the consumer market.

Stormberg er Norges største sports- og turtøymerkevare målt i antall solgte produkter.

Helt fra oppstarten i 1998 har Stormberg vært opptatt av å ta et aktivt samfunnsansvar. 25 % av alle som rekrutteres er personer som normalt havner utenfor arbeidslivet, og Stormberg var den første sports- og tekstilgrossisten som ble tatt opp i Initiativ for etisk handel i 2002. I Stormberg jobber vi kontinuerlig med å redusere klima- og miljøbelastningen og 1% av omsetningen går til humanitære og samfunnsnyttige formål. 

De fleste av oss som jobber i Stormberg har en ting til felles - vi liker å være ute på små og store turer, fordi vi føler at naturopplevelser gir mye.

Før Stormberg kom på markedet, forundret det oss at godt sports- og turtøy måtte koste så mye. Kjøpte du dette, fikk du riktignok klær du kunne dra på ekspedisjon til Sydpolen i. Men vi skulle ikke dit. Vi ville bare ut på tur med venner eller familie, og ofte var det ikke lenger enn til et skogholt eller en strand rett i nærheten.

Det fantes noen billige merker, men de manglet praktiske løsninger og vi stolte ikke på at de ville gjøre nytten hvis det ble virkelig dårlig vær. Vi var sikre på at vi ikke var de eneste som savnet et alternativ til det dyre sports- og turtøyet. Derfor etablerte vi Stormberg i februar 1998, for å lage sports- og turtøy som skulle fungere godt, se bra ut og ha en fornuftig pris. Vi ville gjøre det lettere for hele familien å komme seg ut på tur. Steinar J. Olsen er Stormbergs gründer, og mannen som ga liv til konseptet.

Siden 1998 har vi hatt en god vekst i omsetning og antall medarbeidere, og den fantastiske mottakelsen Stormberg har fått over hele landet, viser at nordmenn ønsker funksjonelt sports- og turtøy til familievennlige priser.

Vi lover å fortsatt gjøre vårt beste for at det skal bli enklere og rimeligere for hele familien å komme ut på tur.

 Eplehuset er et helnorsk selskap med hovedkontor i Trondheim.

The global market today is increasingly requesting stable deliveries of fresh cod and for the first time, farmed cod of a very high quality can be produced successfully to a large scale to meet these demands.Norcod aims to become the world’s leading producer of farmed cod produced to the highest sustainability standards.

Rift Labs provides cutting edge light-based solutions for a brighter, better world. We explore the optical spectrum to create amazing products loved by people, plants and planet.

At Rift Labs we are continuously looking for top talent to join us on our quest to conquer the spectrum of light.

We look for driven individuals who are motivated by achieving ambitious goals and who wants to make an active contribution to society as a whole, identifying with our core values:

◆ Explore, dare to dream big, be bold and challenge yourself and the world around you.
◆ Inspire, allow yourself to be inspired, it will in turn inspire others.
◆ Grow, never be satisfied with the status quo, improve yourself through dedication and effort over time.

We are a rapidly growing team of pioneers who are passionate about innovation and technology, always looking to be at the forefront of cutting-edge light-based solutions. Rift Labs has been developing LED and sensor-based solutions since 2010, and as part of our team we expect you to make an impact on where we’re heading next. We offer the opportunity for personal growth and a rewarding experience by joining a true pioneer within LED technology.

To learn more about Rift Labs, please visit riftlabs.com.

Fora Form is one of Scandinavia’s largest furniture manufacturers for social areas wherever people meet. Fora Form has a vision of creating great interaction in our four focus areas wherever people meet: Eat together, work together, breathe together and experience together. 

Since the 1950s, we’ve used design as a strategic tool to create great meeting places for companies and public environments. Our design vision has given our collection some of Norway’s most recognized and well-known classic furniture designs for the past 70 years. Through the relentless focus on Norway’s and top Scandinavian designers Fora Form is the most winning design company regardless of industry. 

In 2019 we celebrated our 90th anniversary. Through innovation, our heritage, sustainable manufacturing and great designed furniture we will continue to elevate the meaning of human interactions between people in the future as well.

Varier is a furniture company based in Oslo, Norway. We design and produce high-quality ergonomic chairs that invite people to move when they sit. Since 1979, our products have lead the innovation within our field and inspired creativity in workspaces and homes across the world.

At Varier, we believe that we can live healthier and more sustainable lives by being in balance. Our versatile collection of products reflects our commitment to human-centred design as a driver for form. This approach is also manifested in our application of colour, textures, materials and shapes.

Grundig Nordic is a fast growing company in the Nordic market for home electronics and appliances. An exciting portfolio of brands like Grundig, Beko and Blomberg makes us increasingly attractive for consumers across the Nordic region.

Grundig Nordic is present in all Nordic countries and is headquartered at Skøyen in Oslo, Norway. We are owned by Arcelik, a part of Koc Holding, which is one of the world's top 400 companies ranked by total revenues: with a total turnover of 30 bn USD within various industries, and a total of 90,000 employees.

Grundig has 75 years of heritage and a reputation for premium design and trusted quality. In 2016 we launched a unique collaboration with the Nordic Royal Yacht Clubs and established Grundig Sailing Cup, a Nordic J/70 Regatta League. We are also the proud title sponsor of the historic sailing venue Grundig Hankø Race Week.

Read more about Beko here: https://www.linkedin.com/company/bekonordic

And Blomberg here: https://www.linkedin.com/company/blombergnordic

Findus Norge AS er en del av Nomad Foods Ltd. Nomad Foods er Europas ledende selskap innen ferskfryst mat, med 4800 ansatte og en omsetning på ca. 2 mrd Euro. Findus Norge AS har ca. 250 ansatte, og selskapets hovedkontor ligger på Lysaker. Findus har to fabrikker (Tønsberg og Larvik) og jobber gjennom fire salgskanaler; Dagligvare, Private Label, Foodservice og Industri. Mer enn 80% av maten Findus leverer er kortreist mat produsert i Norge.

I Norge utvikler, produserer og selger vi produkter av fisk, grønnsaker og poteter, samt ferdigretter. Bakervarer og bær inngår også i vårt sortiment. Findus Norge AS har en samlet omsetning på NOK 1,2 mrd. Bedriften har som mål å levere sunne og smakfulle måltider på en bærekraftig måte. Vi jobber for å inspirere til smarte vaner og matlyst med god samvittighet. Hemmeligheten bak Findus sin 80 år lange historie og suksess er menneskene som jobber i bedriften og den positive kulturen vi har. Findus gjør godt!

At BeSafe we have been protecting children for more than 30 years. Our eagerness to improve child safety and our ability to challenge the existing has taken us from Krøderen to more than 40 countries all over the world. By constantly embracing new trends and quickly adopting new technologies we have achieved outstanding test results and become the favorite brand of many families.

GetInspired.no er en norsk nettbutikk med lager- og kontorlokaler i Trondheim. Vårt sortiment består av et stort utvalg av sporty klær, sko og tilbehør til friluft, trening og fritid fra over 80 kjente merkevarer.

Selskapet ble etablert i 2009 og har gått fra å være en liten gründerbedrift til å bli en av de ledende aktørene i bransjen med en omsetning på over 400 MNOK i 2020. Get Inspired har i flere år vært blant eliten av nettbutikker, og har blitt nominert som finalist til "Årets Nettbutikk"​ hele fire ganger. Både i 2016 og 2020 gikk vi helt til topps og vant den prestisjefylte kåringen!

Volt is a menswear clothing concept with over 90 shops throughout Norway, Sweden and Finland. 

The brand portfolio consists of over 35 different brands. Filippa K, Eton, Tiger of Sweden, WoodWood, J.Lindeberg, Samsøe Samsøe, Whyred, Nudie, Tiger Jeans, These Glory Days plus many more. 

Volt is a part of Varner which houses 13 fashion concepts with a total of 11.000 employees and 1.500 stores in 8 different countries. The Service office is located at Slependen outside Oslo.

The founder of Viking, Peter Mathias Røwde laid down the cornerstone for his rubber factory on the 17th January 1920, in the Norwegian Askim. He realised the vast, outstanding potential of wellington boots, particularly in the damp, Norwegian climate – and so the “Classic Rubber Boot” arose, tailor made to these conditions. Today Viking stands for high class quality, waterproof shoes which defy the rules of nature in spite of challenging conditions, often on difficult terrain. Made in Norway’s unrelenting climate, Viking footwear is the first choice for those who want to out-brave rain, snow, ice and all other forces of nature every minute of the day. Viking – Norwegian footwear since 1920!

NutraQ is an international company within the health and beauty industry. In a sustainable way, we develop, produce and distribute a broad range of high-quality products directly to consumer through a digital and subscription-based business model. 

Our core values are: Responsible, Respectful, Brave and Innovative. 

We are specialists, researchers, marketers, controllers, HR, IT and office administration, all with one purpose in common – always searching for new sources to help people live better everyday lives.

Idun Industri er markedsledende på bakeri og konditoriingredienser på det norske markedet. Vi selger til næringsmiddelindustri, industrielle bakerier, håndtverksbakere, storhusholdning og forbrukermarkedet. Idun er del av Orkla Food Ingredients (OFI) som er en betydelig aktør innen bakeri-ingredienser i Europa. 

Idun produserer og selger også isbartilbehør gjennom datterselskap i Norge, Sverige, Danmark og Storbritania.

Idun-gruppen omsatte for 950 millinoner kroner i 2011.Idun Industri sitt hovedkontor er lokalisert i moderne lokaler på Hvam nord for Oslo. I tillegg til Hvam har Idun produksjonsanlegg i Bergen, Rakkestad og i Malmö.

HEPRO AS er en moderne og fremtidsrettet kompetansebedrift som utvikler, produserer og selger hjelpemidler og velferdsteknologi av høy kvalitet og rent design. Vårt hovedkontor ligger på Rognan innerst i Saltenfjorden, omringet av fjell og mektig natur.
Bedriften ble etablert i 1987 og har lang erfaring med utvikling av produkter og løsninger som skal gjøre hverdagen enklere for våre kunder. Vår visjon er å gi våre kunder muligheten til å klare seg selv, delta aktivt i egen hverdag og bo lengre hjemme. Gjennom høy kvalitet, rask responstid og kort kommunikasjonsvei skal Hepro være det naturlige førstevalget for våre kunder.
I nært samarbeid med ergoterapeuter, utvikler vi produkter og løsninger skreddersydd våre kunders behov for hjelp til mobilitet, balanse, komfort og hygiene. Målet er å gi trygghet, mestring og økt aktivitet gjennom funksjonelle og brukerorienterte produkter. Vi engasjerer oss i den enkelte brukeren og strekker oss langt for å levere produkter tilpasset dine individuelle behov.

Interfoto - professional photo equipment since 1966.

Oslo based Interfoto is a must visit destination for everyone interested in photography or video and is offering a dedicated service for photographers at every level.

The company is only selling high end professional equipment and software from all major brands and holds a leading position in the Norwegian market. 

In addition to a comprehensive stock of photographic equipment and accessories, Interfoto's services are including second hand trade, camera servicing and repairs, and courses teaching a wide range of photographic topics.

As the leading Norwegian photo and rental dealer for photographic specialists, the rental department has multiple units of lighting kits, including generators, lamp heads, Hasselblad cameras, DSLR cameras, Canon Cinema film cameras, optics and diffusers / reflector screens. Go to Utleie for more info.

Interfoto's dedication to photographic expertise and service has been a successful formula for 50 years. With a focus on education, government, corporate & professional photographers, Interfoto has a specialized staff that can help you with any enquiry, both online and in store.
Gadus Group is a fully integrated seafood company with focus on sustainable production of premium quality farmed cod - from roe to finished product locally in Norway

Seaborn – a company for you!

Seaborn AS was founded in 2001 by a number of family-owned enterprises with extensive experience and a long-standing tradition of fish farming dating back several generations. Our fish farmers are located in 46 locations along the coast of Western Norway and in the Lofoten islands. The company has become a major distributor of Norwegian salmon and Norwegian fjord trout. We offer a rational, integrated sales organisation that focuses on efficiency and economies of scale.

Our owners produce salmon and trout. They represent the whole value chain from broodstock and roe, via hatching, fry and smolt to marine growers of the highest quality. Satisfied customers are the key to Seaborn’s ability to compete in a tough market.



Vision: Seaborn shall be the fish farmers’ own sales company.

Mission statement: Seaborn shall be the bridge (link) between production in Norway and the global market for salmon and trout.

Values: Seaborn’s fish farmers are families that have been in the industry for generations and have been pioneers. Our customers shall feel proximity to production and that they have partners in Norway they can rely on for personal follow-up.

DET BESTE FRA TO VERDENER.
Andfjord Salmon bygger framtidens havbruk. Med det beste fra to verdener, kombinerer vi fordelene med både sjø- og landbasert oppdrett. Resultatet er høy laksevelferd og bærekraftig produksjon i arktisk farvann - 69 grader nord.

Brynild er et familieeid, moderne og utviklingsorientert næringsmiddelselskap med lange tradisjoner. Kompetansen og markedsposisjonene er hovedsakelig knyttet til forbrukermarkedet for nøtter og godterier. 

Den Lille Nøttefabrikken, Brynild, Dent, Minde Sjokolade og Michael's Farm er våre største merkevarer. Brynild Gruppen er i tillegg distributør for tyske Beiersdorfs merkevarer på det norske markedet, hvorav Nivea er det største. Brynild Gruppens markedsposisjoner spenner fra å være en mindre utfordrer (sjokolade) til å være markedsledende (nøtter). Virksomheten omfatter alle verdiskapningsprosessene fra produktutvikling, innkjøp/logistikk og produksjon, til salg- og markedsføring av hovedsakelig egne merkevarer. 

Brynild Gruppen har 230 ansatte og har en årlig omsetning på 710 millioner kroner. 90 % av omsetningen skjer i Norge og det resterende i Norden forøvrig. Hovedkontor og produksjonsanlegg er lokalisert i Fredrikstad.




Brynild Gruppen AS is one of Norway’s largest family-owned confectionary manufacturers with roots going back to 1895. 
The company is owned and managed, as it always has been, by the Brynildsen family. Now by the 4th and 5th generation.
Brynild Gruppen operates within the segment fast moving consumer goods, such as chocolate, confectionary (sweets) and snacks (nuts and dried fruits). 
Brynild Gruppen Holding AS is the parent company and includes all business in the Nordic countries within sweets, chocolate and snacks.

 
Brynild Gruppen has one production plant in Norway, situated in Fredrikstad. The turnover is about 710 million NOK and there are about 230 employees.

The Dale brands have been synonymous with superior textile quality for well more than a century. Over the past 40 years, since inventing FR work wear fabrics for the North Sea oil industry, Daletec has become a worldwide leader in flame retardant and protective work wear fabrics.

Our pioneering research has led to on-going innovation for the unique Daletec products now used in energy, electrical, metal and other heavy industries in more than 100 countries.

We have pioneered unique processes and specialized FR treatments for more than four decades, including impregnations, laminations, special coatings and other innovative FR technologies.

Our fabrics are famous for their consistent high quality, comfort and extreme durability, and Daletec is respected for delivering reliable service and environmentally friendly solutions. 

We’ve provided enough FR fabric -- to heavy industry work wear manufacturers in more than 35 countries, on all continents – to circle the planet several times over. 

Daletec fabrics provide the best flame protection in industrial work wear – certified to all relevant EN ISO and NFPA/ASTM  standards  -- with flame retardant strength guaranteed for the garment’s entire lifespan. 

Other fabrics use technology that loses protection during wear and washing. Through Daletec’s unique processes the FR chemicals penetrates and bonds the textile fibre to ensure your protection lasts and lasts.

Onepiece is a contemporary lifestyle brand specializing in comfortable jumpsuits and adult onesies. Perhaps mostly known for being the creators of the Original Jumpsuit, and the catalyst for the global onesie phenomenon that has blown over the globe the past years.

We create comfortable yet confident wear with premium fit and top shelf materials.

At Onepiece, we take comfort seriously. We believe it is a cornerstone in most achievements, and an imminent factor for success. Without being comfortable with who you are and what you're in, you simply can’t do your best. Thus we believe; comfort brings confidence.

Onepiece today one of the most successful international Norwegian fashion brands, with products sold in close to 150 countries, with US, UK, Germany, Netherlands, France, Sweden & Norway as our biggest markets. Our retail model is structured around e-commerce, with the majority of our sales coming from onepiece.com.

Dale of Norway is a vertically integrated apparel company known for its beautiful Norwegian designs and technical outerwear.  The company was established in 1879; its designs has represented Norwegian mountain living for over a century.  It is the favored sweater or jacket for hiking, skiing and apres ski activities.

Dale of Norway has been part of the winter Olympics since 1956.  It has been the official supplier of  sweaters and uniforms for Norwegian teams for more than 50 years -- and it was the official sweater for the U.S. Olympic team at the 2002 Salt Lake Winter Olympics.

Dale of Norway's designs are considered lifestyle fashion for an urban and active lifestyle; the collections are distributed through premium winter resort shops and urban-based specialty retailers worldwide. 

The company maintains offices in Norway and North America with a global network of sales representatives.

Based in Norway, we have been brewing pretty awesome beer at our independently own medium-size brewery.  

We are constantly pushing the boundaries of brewing and we like to play out of our comfort zone. Combining the inspiration coming from our creative friends throughout the craft beer world with our recognized masterbrewer Mike Murphy, we have been producing some of the most iconic craft beer brands from easy-drinking pilsners and pale ales, barrel-aged barley wines and sour beers.

Craft beer is an art, and as any other art - it should be shared and appreciated by everyone. That’s why our mission is to ‘Brew the best beer in the world’ and we are now focusing on international growth. We are damn proud to be exporting nearly 50% of our production across more than 30 countries. 

Believe us, it’s easy to fall in love for the craft beer world. And we are here to help you getting some butterflies in your stomach.

Our story began in 1951, when Hans and Bergit Slettvoll opened their own little business at their home in Stranda in Norway. Nail by nail, their dream of uniting comfort, quality and beauty through solid handicraft became a reality. Since then, the Slettvoll brand has crossed the country's borders and become a symbol of genuine Norwegian furniture design.

Our factory is still located in Stranda, where the family business has its roots. It is here that furniture of the highest quality is produced by our skilled and experienced craftsmen using local raw materials. 

The furniture in our collection is available in many different sizes and varieties, and with the possibility of tailor-making them in accordance with the customer's needs. With a variety of textiles, soft or harder seat comfort, and woodwork in many colours, we provide the means to create the home, summer house or cabin to suit your own perfect style.  

There are currently 18 Slettvoll stores in Norway and Sweden, and our first store in Denmark will be opening in October 2019. The stores have a broad selection of both indoor and outdoor exclusive furniture, carpets, lamps, cushions, blankets and decor. Our goal is to create everlasting classics in a world of temporary trends.

Haugen-Gruppen’s history goes back to before 1900, when a lad named Erik Haugen, moved from Valdres to Oslo, and started as a travelling salesman. He achieved great success so rapidly that he was able in 1916 to found his own wholesale company, and soon after he added two factories producing fish and shellfish for export. 

The first “revolution” in the grocery trade took place around 1960, which lead to a lot of mergers. 

Erik Haugen did not support this change, and when his son Gunnar L. Haugen took over as chairman, the idea of specialising in imports of branded products took root. 

Today our head office is in tailor made premises in Vestby 40 km (E6) south of Oslo. We are one of Norway’s leading providers of international well known brands within foods and beverages, being no. 1 or 2 in almost every category we operate.

In addition we can now offer the same services and a leading position in all Nordic countries, through our companies in Sweden, Denmark, Finland and Iceland.

Norges største helhetsleverandør av møbel- og interiørløsninger

Kinnarps leverer komplette interiørløsninger til kontor, skole og helse. Høy kvalitet og lav miljøpåvirkning kjennetegner hele kjeden - fra råmateriale til ferdige løsninger for arbeidsplassen.

Kinnarps AS er landsdekkende gjennom 11 avdelinger og 20 forhandlerlokasjoner. Les mer på www.kinnarps.no

Ocean Quality was the sales organisation of Grieg Seafood and Bremnes Seashore. The organisation sold Atlantic salmon produced by Bremnes Seashore in Norway, and Grieg Seafood in Norway, Scotland and Canada. 
 
The sales company’s main office was located in Bergen, Norway, while three regional offices operated at Bømlo on the south west coast of Norway, in Lerwick at Shetland and in Vancouver, British Columbia at the west coast of Canada.

In 1877 Ludwig Mack founded the world’s northernmost brewery and thereby started an industrial fairytale far north of the Polar Circle. Today, more than 130 years later, Mack is arguably the strongest brand name in the region and still owned by the descendants of L. Mack.

«As the world’s northernmost brewery we have access to naturally clean and ice cold water and use only the best raw materials»

Some things are simply better in the tongue of the north of Norway.

________________________________________________________________________________


Mack har siden 1877 vært brygget på godt humør og fantastisk natur. Som naturen i Nord-Norge er Mack friskere, renere og mer spennende enn de fleste av våre internasjonale konkurrenter. Noen ting er rett og slett bedre på nordnorsk.
BioMar er en ledende leverandør av fiskefôr til akvakulturnæringen. BioMars hovedforretningsområder er fôr til laks og ørret i Norge, UK og Chile.

Acrylicon provide high quality flooring for for any business interested in minimizing the lifetime cost of their floors. Acrylicon system focus on fast Curing times, high compressive strength, efficient chemical bonds and easy maintainance.

Acrylicon products focus on minimizing the lifetime cost of products without compromising on quality. Longevity and efficiency are terms anyone who ever bought an Acrylicon flooring system should be familiar with.

AcryliCon's® Mission 

To inform those that are not already aware of the benefits of AcryliCon®, that they and their clients no longer have to live with spalling or delamination or floors that fail to meet hygiene, aesthetic, safety and longevity criteria. 

Perhaps the most important of AcryliCon's® benefits is that of long term confidence, a confidence that AcryliCon®, as the foremost manufacturer, installer and warrantor of industrial floors, shares with customers worldwide. AcryliCon® demonstrates this confidence by sinking a dated stainless steel ingot into each new floor, a true mark of confidence for the long term. 

AcryliCon® does not fear the age of its references - how many other, if any, flooring systems can claim this level of confidence?

Siden oppstarten i 1958 har Lindbak utviklet seg til en ledende aktør i kontor- og databransjen, innen et bredt spekter av produkter og tjenester. Vi er i dag et solid, familiedrevet selskap, med hovedkontor i Trondheim og ca. 250 medarbeidere fordelt på nesten 30 avdelinger. Våre verdier kundefokusert, engasjert og nyskapende gjenspeiler de holdninger og innstilling vi i Lindbak vil kjennetegnes av.

Lindbak er en av Norges ledende leverandører av interiør og kontormøbler, lyd og bilde (audiovisuelle løsninger), utskriftsløsninger, kaffe- og vannløsninger, IT-løsninger og kontorrekvisita til både private og offentlige virksomheter i Norge. Liindbak består av 7 datterselskap og er lokalisert i Oslo, Drammen, Bergen, Stavanger, Trondheim, Tromsø,  Finnsnes, Bodø, Mo i Rana, Namsos, Verdal, Kristiansund, Kristiansand, Molde, Ålesund, Ørsta, Førde, Gjøvik, Tynset, Alta, Karasjok, Kautokeino, Kirkenes, Lakselv, og Vadsø.

Vårt slagord er WE MAKE IT WORK. AT WORK og det er en god dag i Lindbak når vi skaper verdier for våre kunder.

TEMPTECH - Discover the best of your wine!

Temptech was established in 2004 and is a Norwegian producer and distributor of white goods. Our headquarter and warehouse is located in Stokke, Norway with sales offices in Norway, Sweden and Finland. Temptech is the Nordic region’s largest producer and supplier of wine cabinets.

Our wine cabinets meet the highest demands on design and technology and ensures an optimal environment for wine storage. It is not without reason that well-known restaurants, wine bars, wine importers and wine connoisseurs choose our wine cabinets.

Temptech has a wide range of wine cabinets with over 50 different models of various dimensions, capacities and price range, for private or professional use. In addition to wine cabinets our range includes refrigerators for professional and home use.
SATS og ELIXIA fusjonerte i 2014 og skapte en ledende treningssenterkjede med en visjon om å spille en viktig rolle for helsen og livskvaliteten til mennesker i Norden.

Nomono is a family of 27 coffee-driven engineers, creatives, programmers, sound scientists and audio experts that share a passion for storytelling and innovative sound solutions. 

Except for Ingunn and Magnus. They are tea-driven.

We're located in Trondheim along the Norwegian coast where most Nomonoers go to work. A select few hang out in Oslo, Sweden and New York but secretly wish they lived in Trondheim.

We're developing ground-breaking products and experiences set to transform an industry that has seen little innovation for decades. Our ambition is to redefine the listening experience by enabling anyone to record podcasts and spatial audio with uncompromising quality and ease.

Few countries have more experience using wood materials in building constructions, than Norway. This experience has given Hunton Fiber a strong foundation in developing advanced products based on wood fibre to be used for modern housing and construction.

The process from a wood block to a finished product is complex, and it calls for experience and in-depth knowledge of the wood fibre and its qualities. Having a culture of investing resources to evolve its own advanced products as well as add new products to the portfolio, makes Hunton the market leader for wood fibre-based construction solutions.

Mother Nature gives us our raw materials, and this is why at Hunton we focus on the environment all the way from wood chip to the end user. For many years we have imposed demands on ourselves and our suppliers to ensure that the wood fibres we purchase come from forests with replanting programs. We continuously strive to reduce our CO2 emissions. For example, when we increased our production by over 10% and we did so without increasing our energy consumption. 

Business concept: “We will produce and sell natural and energy efficient building solutions based on wood and wood fibre”.

Our main products will be based on wood and wood fibre from sustainable forests, regardless of whether they are merchandise or products of our own production or contract production.

The sea, or sjór in the old Norse language, has granted Norwegians nutrition and riches for generations. Although harvesting methods have changed through the millennia, the taste for freshest possible remains the same. We are proud to carry on this seafood legacy – serving our customers the “Finest Norwegian Seafood”.

As the sales arm of the Seashore Group – the innovative quality pioneer in sustainable salmon farming and supplier of the renowned SALMA and BÖMLO brands – we know quality.

With a decade of experience, our dedicated staff look forward to securing your next delivery of Norwegian seafood delicacies!

Solera Beverage Group is one of the largest beverage groups in the Nordics, specializing in imports of wine, spirits, beer and other alcoholic and non alcoholic beverages. Solera imports and distributes its products primarily to the state retail alcohol monopolies in Norway, Sweden and Finland. Thereto, Solera offers access to HORECA, travel retail in the Nordic and Baltic region as well as grocery and convenience chains in Norway. The company is headquartered in Oslo and employs about 150 people.

Solera group has for many years been successfully operating and representing a number of major international brand owners. Soleras'​ roots can be traced back to 1924 with the company Einar A. Engelstad in Norway. In 2014, Solera in Norway celebrates 90 years of growth and prosperity.

Solera Beverage Group is your gateway to the Nordic beverage market!

Please visit www.solerabeveragegroup.com for more information.
Vi leverer fabrikkbehandlede gulv, vegger og tak etter dine fargeønsker. Vi brekker og blander våre egne, unike farger, samtidig som vi kan levere alle fargekombinasjonene til Jotun.

Etter 11 års drift er vi stolte av å konkludere følgende; Enklere Liv vokser raskere enn de fleste andre kjedekonsepter, vi skiller oss ut med produkter du ikke finner så mange andre steder og vi har et ambisjonsnivå de færreste våger å uttale.
Enklere Liv har i dag 63 butikker i Norge. I 2010 ble vi kåret til nr. 7 på Gasellelisten i Norge, i 2012 ble vi kåret til Årets butikkjede i Norge, i 2014 vant vi tittelen som Årets Nettbutikk.  Slike resultater oppnår man ikke uten entusiastiske medarbeidere med stor passion og sterk motivasjon.

Europe's leading supplier of high-quality, waterproof wall systems. 

Founded in 1952, manufactured in Norway and distributed across Europe and North America

Our wall panels are easier to install, more affordable and more eco-friendly than ceramic tiles
