Dansk Ejendomsmæglerforening (DE) er brancheforening for ejendomsmæglervirksomheder og ejendomsmæglere i Danmark. DE arbejder for, at formidling af fast ejendom sker på en tryg og professionel måde hos foreningens medlemmer og for medlemmernes faglige selvstændighed. Det sker via aktiviteter som omfatter medlemsservice og interessevaretagelse.

Reform collaborates with internationally acclaimed architects and designers to create modern kitchen spaces and push the boundaries of our industry. We work across architecture, design, and interior with the aim of offering bold, accessible and adaptable kitchens. As we enter the 2020s, we’ve set out to explore future-focused methods within craft and technology. Reflecting the kitchen’s vital role as the center of our homes, Reform meets the new demands of everyday living.

Imaginative designs of obsessive quality.
 
At Hem, we believe great design can enrich lives. We’re an independent design brand and platform for progressive thinking, inspiring the creative community through collaboration, innovation and experimentation.
 
We collaborate with vanguard designers and renowned European manufacturers in order to bring truly unique furnishings to those who won’t compromise on design, quality or sustainability.

With abundance of creativity, possibility, complexity and energy – Hem is the perfect environment for someone who wants to help build the next generation design brand.

Hem is always on the look-out for those who have intuition for the times in which they live. People who are motivated by curiosity and a who applies a researching attitude, have the guts to ignore conventions and come up with their own distinctive answers.

Designer Stine Goya established her namesake brand in Copenhagen, Denmark in 2006.  Each collection is informed by the key words playful, artistic and bold. The label’s unique approach to design and colour, using unorthodox techniques and colour combinations to create new and expressive wearable works of art, has earned STINE GOYA a distinguished place on the international fashion scene.

The privately owned independent label presents four international collections a year, Autumn/Winter, Pre-Spring, Spring/Summer and Pre-Autumn, comprising approximately 150 styles in a main collection and 90 in a pre collection, including accessories and footwear.

Collections are developed at the label’s in-house design studio, and are initially presented at the Copenhagen-based showroom with support from the Sales, Customer Service, Own Retail, Production, Graphic, PR & Marketing, and Finance departments, who together with the management team oversee the global exposure and expansion of the company.

In 2016, Christian Larson and Andreas Palm set out to revolutionize men’s underwear, creating a new generation of products built with intention and purpose. Today, CDLP is a design house of focused, luxury essentials within the categories of underwear, tops, swim, performance, and home. Developed with innovation in Sweden, the line is consciously constructed in Europe using future-orientated materials.

Nationalmuseet er Danmarks statslige og største kulturhistoriske museum. Museet omfatter en række besøgssteder udover udstillingerne i Prinsens Palæ i København: 
Frilandsmuseet, Kongernes Jelling, Frøslevlejrens Museum, Trelleborg, Krigsmuseet, Liselund, Kommandørgården, Frihedsmuseet, Christiansborg Slot, Kronborg Slot og Musikmuseet. 

Nationalmuseet udfører en række centrale opgaver på landsplan inden for især følgende områder: arkæologi, etnologi, numismatik, etnografi, naturvidenskab, bevaring, formidling, rådgivning vedrørende kirkerestaurering, behandling af danefæ og udlån af museets genstande.

Suicide Zero arbetar för att minska självmorden radikalt

Suicide Zero is a Swedish NGO working to radically decrease the suicide rate.

Welcome to Mediplast
 
Mediplast is a Swedish company, who sells and distributes medical devices, primarily in the Nordic region. Our product range comprises both our own products and products from selected and well-known suppliers, with whom we have exclusive marketing agreements. We also export our own products to the rest of the world. Mediplast is part of Addlife, noted on Nasdaq/OMX Stockholm. 

Our products are available in a wide range, from disposable products to high-tech products. We offers products in six main areas: Surgery, Thoracic, Radiology, Wound Care, Anaesthesia / Intensive Care (AN/IVA), Home Health care, Ostomy and Ear, Nose, Throat (ENT). Our central warehouse is located in Malmö, which means that we have effective processes and can quickly reach our customers.

Our goal is to be a strong partner for you who use our products in the healthcare sector and with our suppliers. We know that through this partnership and shared knowledge about the products, usage and benefits for the customer we will keep developing.

We offer our customers, in addition to marketing our products, a shared knowledge. We firmly believe that "knowledge makes a difference"​ for our customers and for our employees. To work at Mediplast is varied; we have an extensive product portfolio with both the products we distribute and own products, we work closely with both customers and suppliers, and we have a broad cooperation between our businesses. We are goal-oriented, want to improve and achieve goals for the benefit of our customers. If you also want to work at a Mediplast, check our website for open positions.

POC is a leader in the development of new protective technologies for cycling and snow sports. We’ve been awarded more than 60 international safety, design and innovation awards for its helmets, eyewear, body armor and apparel and continually innovate for safety. Founded in Sweden in 2005, POC’s mission is to protect lives and reduce the consequences of accidents for athletes and anyone inspired to be one.

Verpan is an official licensed manufacturer of a large collection of original Verner Panton lighting and furniture designs and is, much like Verner Panton, a product of the Danish design tradition, which have put Denmark on the world map for functional, modern and unique design. 

In 2003 the production of lighting was initiated and in 2010 a furniture range was added and a continious process of picking and choosing new products in the wast threasure cest of Panton work will bring many more items
to life yet again. 
All of the Verpan products stands out as some of the most elegant and memorable of Verner Panton’s designs. We do products that create life, sound, movement, colour and light - we bring design and value into the visual world around us all.

Verpan is part of the FRANDSEN Group - a family owned lighting company - with a danish based headquarter.

LIEWOOD is an international children's lifestyle brand designing and producing toys, interior, accessories, and selected clothing for babies and children. 

LIEWOOD products are created with a sustainable mindset - from design and functionality to carefully selected materials such as organic cotton, recycled polyester, wood, and silicone, following the highest quality standards.

LIEWOOD is a dynamic, design-driven, and highly commercial company in rapid growth - founded in 2015 by Anne Marie Lie Norvig with the desire and commitment to create a unique children’s lifestyle brand focusing on functionality, aesthetics, and sustainability. LIEWOOD is based in Copenhagen, and our universe is deeply rooted in the Nordic design tradition.

DAY Birger et Mikkelsen was founded in 1997 with one singular mission: to offer women a new look and a sense of style based on Scandinavian virtues and a bohemian mindset. The brand has always been rooted in Danish design ideals. It is distinguished by its contemporary feel, strong sartorial choices, attention to detail in the quality of materials as well as the chosen embellishments, and the idea of offering everyday affordable luxury to the independent woman.

Passion for interior decoration since 1935

Vallila Interior is an industry leading Finnish family-run home textile company with ambitions to be a creative and refreshing leader in the world of interior design. The Swiss, Otto Berner, founded the company in 1935. 

At Vallila, we design our own collections of textiles and interior accessories and we are a well-known partner throughout the interior design and contract sectors. We represent the contribution and know-how of Finnish design in our work and enthusiastically spread this across the world.

Alongside our work, beauty is generated – it has the effect to connect people when working sustainably. We use this asset when designing brilliant fabric collections and captivating interior spaces. The connecting factor can be found from a fabric or an architectural plan of a hotel. We feel – all you need is Vallila!
The Humble Co. makes products that are good for you and kind to our planet. Every Humble purchase goes towards funding projects for the benefit of children in need.

about minimum a/s

minimum was founded in 1997 as a retail store in the city of aarhus in denmark but quickly developed into an independent brand. in 1999 minimum launched its first male collection and in 2007 the brand expanded its potential by introducing a female collection.

today minimum consists of a dedicated team of more than 70 employees with a steady drive, informal tone and a great appreciation of the daily work that they’re carrying out. the headquarter of minimum is located in an old shipyard that has been repurposed into an authentic and open office environment at the industrial habour of aarhus.

minimum is a well-established brand and available in several retailers and showrooms across europe and canada and we always have a global outlook with a wish to expand to new and interesting markets.

minimum creates several annual collections and we pride ourselves in selectively picking out just the right designs and fits for each collection. the philosophy is to create eclectic, scandinavian fashion products of sublime quality – always at the right price. We produce both the versatile classics for the basic wardrobe and the unique, eye catching styles that are perfect for those special occasions.


social responsibility at minimum a/s

at minimum we believe that the success of our business cannot be at the expense of humans, animals or the environment. moreover, it’s important to us that our employees are part of a healthy working environment which is why their well-being is our top priority. we are determined to take proactive actions that secure a responsible way of doing business in all aspects and we actively communicate these principles to our business partners and associates.

Pas Normal Studios is a Copenhagen based brand of contemporary, technical cycling clothing.

The concept of Pas Normal Studios is to create technically perfect apparel, combined with visionary aesthetics.

Through innovative designs, brand collaborations and sourcing of new production methods, Pas Normal Studios strives to bring out collections that define modern cycling in a different context.

The brand honors the great traditions of cycling, but is above all committed to the patterns and colors that define state of the art fashion today.

The uncompromised attention to detail and hand-made, sustainable quality is paired with an inspired take on today’s look and feel.

Pas Normal Studios produces high-end clothing with textiles and methods at the same level as demanded by professional riders – but at the same time, all styles created for long-term usage and durability.

Based in Scandinavia, but with a specific international element, Pas Normal Studios can now be found throughout Europe, parts of Asia and the United States.

Bruuns Bazaar was launched in 1994 and quickly became a frontrunner of Scandinavian fashion, pioneering an identifiably Scandinavian yet international design aesthetic and look. 

Bruuns Bazaar was the first brand to present this look; one that generated a great deal of attention, interest, and admiration around the world. In January 1999, the brand entered the official show calendar in Paris, as the first ever Danish fashion brand. Today, Bruuns Bazaar is a contemporary brand on the rise, creating mens - and womenswear as well as accessories. 

Bruuns Bazaarʼs signature style is all about relaxed elegance. The look is vibrant and charismatic, and the individual expression is understated yet distinct. The blend of classic styles and modern pieces has created a group of loyal devotees, both throughout Europe and in other parts of the world. The keywords are cool comfort and Scandinavian simplicity. 

A team of entrepreneurs with extensive experience from all areas of the fashion industry, is now leading the brand towards a new vision and launch.

Since the beginning “rock and roll"​ lifestyle have been an influential source of inspiration at Won Hundred, which over time have shaped the heart of our identity. This is embodied in the continuous use of denim and leather, where we always try to move the boundaries of our Scandinavian and minimalist approach. That being said, our collections range from daring pieces with raw attitude, as well as versatile quality staples which will fit into everyone’s wardrobe. It is founder and creative directors Nikolaj Nielsen’s vision to create a brand that never loses its relevance, whether the occasion is work or leisure. 

Today we offer men’s and women’s ready-to-wear collections, including shoes and accessories.

Urbanista was born in 2010 in Stockholm, Sweden out of love for cities and urban life. Our products are rooted in Scandinavian tradition and inspired by music, arts, fashion and urban culture. We believe that lifestyle audio products should not only sound great, but also look good. Today, our products are available in over 90 countries, and sold in 30,000 stores worldwide.

The Icelandic Glacial brand is owned and operated by Icelandic Water Holdings ehf. based in Hlidarendi, Ölfus, Iceland. Icelandic Water Holdings controls the sole commercial rights to bottle and sell water from the legendary Ölfus Spring. The capacity of the Spring is recognized as one of the largest in the world. Its daily overflow is more than double the total quantity of bottled water consumed worldwide, delivering a naturally replenishing supply of exceptionally pure water which is bottled for discerning consumers to enjoy. 

Icelandic Water Holdings was established in April 2004 by a group of private investors and with an experienced management team, they have developed a world-class, NSF-certified bottling plant and a multi award-winning product under the Icelandic Glacial brand. 

The company has been exporting Icelandic Glacial to consumers around the world since 2005. In the United States, it is distributed by Anheuser-Busch, which took a 20% ownership stake in the company in July 2007. Since that time, Icelandic Glacial has become one of the fastest growing premium bottled waters in the US.  It is available at fine retailers, restaurants and hotels nationwide.  In addition, Icelandic Glacial is available in the United Kingdom, the Netherlands, France, Russia, Canada, Peru, Singapore, South Korea, China and of course Iceland.  Additional markets are forthcoming.

Life is full of contrasts. As we navigate expectations and dreams in the search for meaning and comfort, we long for a balanced life with room for chaos and calm, moments of reflection and times of joy. A place where we can be ourselves, realise the true value of things, and feel at home.

Based on a passion for authentic design and clear functionality, we challenge ourselves to shape the future and take pride in creating products that help you balance the contrasts of life.

Our soft forms, rich textures and deep colours allow you to create an authentic and composed atmosphere, while avant-garde shapes, striking patterns and curious details add a touch of the unexpected.

From our base in Copenhagen, we work with artisans around the world, fusing our Scandinavian mindset with global skills and traditions.

We take our responsibility to people and the planet seriously, and expect the same of our partners. We create collections of furniture, accessories and lighting, so you can create space to feel comfortably you.

Welcome home.

Cecilie Bahnsen, founded in 2015, is a luxury-clothing label based in Copenhagen with a stockiest list counting 70 of the finest doors worldwide. Drawing on a rich culture of design, the collections combine couture craftsmanship with sculptural silhouettes, reinterpreted for a contemporary audience. Each garment is manufactured in Europe and handmade with traditional techniques, intricate detailing and uniquely designed fabrics to present a timeless expression of modern femininity.  Cecilie Bahnsen is showing on schedule at Copenhagen Fashion Week and is selling 4 collections a year during the Paris market. 

“For me, there is power and strength in romance and femininity. I make clothes for women to feel comfortable and strong and independent in. I started out in London and Paris and the romance and the detail is the inspiration I bring from those cities. But always with the Scandinavian minimalism and ease that is me. It needs to feel effortless.”
– Cecilie Bahnsen, Founder and Designer

Our story begins back in 2006. We had a simple idea and a big vision — to create great music experiences that everyone could enjoy and love. 

Our mission started out in Sweden in a small scale, but with a global ambition when it comes to stronger musical experiences in all people’s everyday life. We’re all pretty much the same and we strive towards being better in all things we do and are. Our way of making better is to do what we do, greatly enhancing the experience of portable music.

We have a heritage of simplicity that permeates everything we do, and it renders products that are intuitive, timeless and built to last. Our promise is devotion to authenticity and rigorous attention to details through design and engineering excellence. Jays Group AB is listed on NASDAQ OMX First North in Stockholm, Sweden.

FORCIOT LTD is a technology start-up company. We deliver high-quality sensor-based IOT solutions and provide related integration services. 

Our revolutionary FORCIOT MEASUREMENT SYSTEM can be integrated in products and equipment to accurately and dynamically measure FORCE, weight, balance and motion in real time. 

FORCIOT technology is based on expertise from a highly experienced engineering team flavored with researchers in wearable and elastic electronics from Tampere University of Technology. We have extensive knowledge in sensor technologies, consumer electronics and global business.

Kristeligt Dagblad er avisen om livets store spørgsmål – den avis, der skriver mest om tro, etik og eksistens. Vi skriver om livsindhold og ikke livsstil, og vi tør prioritere vores avis og vælge fra, hvor det er nødvendigt.
Kristeligt Dagblad arbejder løbende på at styrke avisen. Vi går i dybden og fortæller baggrunden for nyhederne og sætter det hele i perspektiv. 

Vi har en stærk dækning af kultur og prioriterer den seriøse og grundige journalistik meget højt – måske er det netop det, der gør, at Kristeligt Dagblad har øget oplaget hvert eneste år siden 1994, og at Kristeligt Dagblad i dag er Danmarks hurtigst voksende avis.

Kristeligt Dagblad ejes af omkring 3000 aktionærer, hvoraf en stor del er læsere. Aktionærer med mere end 5 procent af aktiekapitalen: Kristeligt Dagblads Fond og Chr. Augustinus Fabrikker A/S.

Kristeligt Dagblads adm. direktør og ansvarshavende chefredaktør er Erik Bjerager.

Følg avisen og læs mere online på www.k.dk.

Nordgreen is a watch company which blends Scandinavian minimalism with fine craftsmanship of a leading Danish designer who has previously worked with Bang & Olufsen and other major design brands. Based in Copenhagen, Nordgreen created more than a mere watch. Each of our timepieces has a unique story, inspired by local design thought, sustainability and warm generosity.

Nordgreen does primarily operate in the online sphere, targeting markets all over the world through fully localised websites which are all build on a proprietary end-to-end industry-leading technology platform. A novel cross-border e-commerce strategy coupled with an intelligent approach to global online marketing is what will make nordgreen the next major watch brand coming out of Scandinavia.

The company is founded by Pascar Sivam, Vasilij Brandt, and Christian Arnstedt three ex-consultants and e-commerce professionals with extensive experience in growth strategies, cross-border e-commerce, and supply chain & operations. The venture is backed by Blazar, which is founded by the same three individuals.

Kalevala Jewelry has for the past 80 years been the most beloved jewelry brand in Finland. The classic and timeless designs have for decades been part of Finnish culture, celebrating the beauty and the power found in each of us.

Kalevala Koru Oy is one the largest jewelry manufacturers in northern Europe. The company designs, manufactures and markets high-quality gold, silver and bronze jewelry, and owns two high-level consumer brands: Kalevala Jewelry and Lapponia Jewelry. 

Our employees are top professionals in their expertise on handicraft and high technology and our production facility, sales and administration all operate under the same roof in Helsinki. All our jewelry is manufactured in Finland and sustainability and respect for the environment is at the core of the company.  

The company is fully owned by the Finnish Kalevala Women's Association, who aim to preserve and advance the Finnish national cultural heritage.

War On Cancer is a tech company aiming to radically improve the wellbeing of everyone affected by cancer, with a focus on mental health. The War On Cancer app is one of the world’s largest social mental health apps for life with and beyond cancer allowing its members to connect with others who can relate, journal their experiences, share their stories, and help others. The app also amplifies the patient voice in cancer research through in-app studies, making it easy for members to contribute their insights and improve the future of cancer care.

We are a small dedicated team with a mission to end the need for single use items. Single use items are the main source of marine pollution and costs the earth huge amounts of CO2 and resources every day. Our goal is to create objects that replace single use items. Our first is LastSwab. Our successful Kickstarter campaign for LastSwab, the reusable cotton swab, sold more than 122,000 (as of October 2019). As the first of many new reusable products in the coming years it has become an astounding success.

Globe Hope is an innovative Finnish company that designs and manufactures ecological products by upcycling discarded materials. Through re-designing and re-sewing, left over and old materials are turned into new and unique clothes, bags and accessories.

Here at Globe Hope we live by our three key values: aesthetics, ecology and ethics. We are committed both in our design and production to the principles of sustainable development and want to offer consumers an ecological alternative and to encourage people to think about their environment. Our clothes, bags and accessories save and reuse the limited resources on earth and their production is ethical. While we’re not ready to compromise our ecological values, creating interesting, beautiful and practical products is the most fundamental driver for our design team.
Famme is a clothing label for women. We combine function and fashion to make beautiful, functional garments for your workouts and everyday use.

Custommade is inspired by a dream about creating custom made and beautiful clothing that defies trends. It was established in 2002 by Christian Dam in Copenhagen, Denmark. Custommade offers an array of urban essentials appealing to modern-minded and cosmopolitan women who crave simple sophistication. 
 
Custommade is creatively driven by creative director and founder, Christian Dam and head designer, Anne Rasmussen. Anne Rasmussen is focusing on timeless designs with contemporary edge and energy specially focusing on fabrics with a fantastic feel. Understated enough for relaxing at weekends, easy enough to dress up for a quick trip to Paris. With its strong and recognizable brand identity, it perfectly underlines the sophisticated Scandinavian design.

Custommade is distributed in more than 400 retail stores around the world, represented by agents and distributors in 11 countries selling to 25 markets. It has 12 showrooms, a variety of shop in shops and an online store selling to almost all of Europe.
 
Custommade is easy to wear - easy to love.

Our business was founded in 2009 in Denmark. We believe that health is an ever-evolving journey centered around making quality decisions within the four cornerstones of a good life: a healthy diet, physical activity, recovery, and balance.

We don’t sell quick fixes but we help people understand their origin and show them how to achieve their natural potential. In Lactobio we focus on the creation of new microbiome and microbial solutions to target and fight the problem of increasing infections caused by microorganisms being resistant to antibiotics. We work with the skin, vaginal, and gut microbiota to treat a variety of diseases – with projects spanning various pathogens. 
 
Lactobio has obtained very promising clinical results, with newly isolated lactic acid bacteria having a significant antibacterial activity against Staphylococcus aureus, Methicillin Resistant Staphylococcus aureus (MRSA) and other pathogens.
We help Product Managers communicate better with team and stakeholders. Create OKRs, Roadmaps, Impact & Outcome maps, and product documentation in one app and connect the workflows.

Räddningsmissionen bedriver socialt arbete utifrån kristen grund i Göteborg med omnejd sedan 1952.
Vårt uppdrag är att uppmärksamma och motverka förhållanden i samhället som leder till och förvärrar utsatthet och utanförskap. Vi är en idéburen organisation som arbetar helt utan vinstintresse och allt överskott investeras i verksamheten.

Räddningsmissionen arbetar inom följande verksamhetsområden:
• Hemlöshet och social exkludering
• MatRätt, social supermarket som säljer matsvinn och bekämpar matfattigdom.
• Communityskolan Tynnered
• Utsatta kvinnor i prostitution och människohandel
• Solrosen - barn med en frihetsberövad förälder
• Skyddslägenheter för kvinnor utsatta för våld
• Missbruksvård
• Psykiatriboenden
• Arbete med barn och ungdomar i riskzon
• Kulturarbete för barn och unga
• Daglig verksamhet för människor med funktionsnedsättning
• Utsatta EU-medborgare

Vi har ca 100 anställda som arbetar i våra olika verksamheter.  Vi har även volontärer som förstärker vårt arbetssätt genom sitt engagemang, erfarenhet och kompetens. Våra huvudmän är 30 kristna församlingar i Göteborg med omnejd. Utöver anställda, volontärer och huvudmän har vi även flera starka samarbeten med företag. 

Tillsammans gör vi skillnad!

Sensative is a tech company offering IoT services and products for a wide range of applications. Founded in 2013 in Lund, Sweden, Sensative has become a leading supplier of innovative solutions in the physical worlds' digitization. With a horizontal open IoT integration platform and non-intrusive, no-maintenance sensors, we provide users, services, and digital twins with live data and enable control for every need. 

IoT is not about collecting data to store for possible future benefits. It is about insights from live data and acting on that data in real-time. IoT means generating new data in a new way.

Developed for total freedom of operations through interoperability and open standards, Yggio is the IoT platform for any company that prioritizes flexibility and autonomy from siloed end-to-end solutions. By becoming independent from any specific developer when using an open API IoT platform, the customer will be free to choose the technology and supplier that best suits their needs.

To complement our IoT platform, or any platform that allows Z-Wave or LoRaWAN technology to be employed, we offer a wide range of IoT multi-sensors. With some differences in configurations, our multi-sensors offer humidity, capacitance, light, and presence monitoring, and the widely popular magnetic open/close sensor. As our IoT sensors are ultra-slim (3mm) and designed to be as widely employed as possible, they can be used in a multitude of challenging spaces or easily be hidden for aesthetic reasons. Besides the flexible design, our sensors also offer a battery life of up to 10 years. Our LoRaWAN sensors that can easily be employed indoors as well as outdoors also offer a range of up to 10km.

Harklinikken was established in Denmark almost three decades ago by our Founder & Lead Researcher, Lars Skjøth. Today, Harklinkken operates across three continents, with spa-like clinics at prime locations such as 5th Avenue in New York, Jumeirah in Dubai, and by Amalienborg Palace in Copenhagen.

Harklinikken provides a uniquely customized Extract, and a full range of natural and efficacious hair products without any problematic ingredients such as perfume, essential oils, color, and parabens.

All our products are made with a "scalp-first"-approach and carefully engineered for maximum efficacy. A happy scalp equals beautiful hair – and all our products aid in achieving optimal scalp health for our clients, thereby addressing hair thinning at its roots.

Our uniquely customized Extract is hand blended for each individual following a holistic consultation in one of our clinics around the world. The Extract works in symphony with our products, all toward the purpose of reversing hair thinning, and thereby enabling our clients to look and feel their best throughout life's journey of growth.

With naturally derived, pure, and safe ingredients, we achieve unparalleled results by creating optimal conditions for hair growth.

At Kofoed's School, we help socially vulnerable people, homeless and unemployed people to help themselves.
 
Our teaching method is what we call help to self-help. The school believes that every human grows and experience joy when it gets the opportunity to create and take responsibility for his own life. We create this through workshop activities, teaching, advice, practical help and socializing, where each student will learn to help themselves ahead in life.

The school based on a humanitarian and Christian principle. At the heart of all the school's work is a deep respect for the individual. We believe that everyone has equal status and rights in society.

At Neutral®, we want our clothing to matter. We want it to be okay for everyone. Our planet. Farmers. Workers. Us. And you. That's why every Neutral® product is manufactured and certified according to the highest environmental, social, and ethical standards in the world.

WHAT 
Neutral® is premium quality apparel for men, women and kids. Contemporary styled T-shirts, sweatshirts and more made from 100% organic Fairtrade cotton. Based in Copenhagen, Denmark, with all manufacturing taking place in India, Neutral® is a market leading producer of sustainable apparel to the B2B-market.

WHY 
Neutral® is the result of more than 20 years of experience in the conventional textile industry witnessing a constant pressure for lower prices at the expense of natural and human resources. The defining aspects of Neutral® have been a holistic approach driven by commitment and above all a focus on action and continuous improvement. Today, Neutral® has developed into a platform for responsible clothing production and sustainable storytelling. 

HOW 
All Neutral® products are manufactured and certified according to the highest environmental, social, and ethical standards in the world. Alone, none of these certificates meet the Neutral® criteria for responsible production. But in combination, they address all relevant issues throughout our supply chain. Defined and monitored by external organizations, the certificates are our way of making the most sustainable clothing we can. In that way, the certificates are more than just funky looking stamps. They are our guarantee.

We call it Certified Responsibility™

	• Fairtrade
	• GOTS
	• EU Ecolabel
	• SA8000
	• Neutral® Responsibility
	• Oeko-Tex

If you need further information or have any questions, please contact us at neutral@neutral.com

Did you know Neutral® is the winner of CSR Abroad 2015 and Sustainia Fashion 2013? Read more at www.neutral.com

We are called ‘Feel Good Company’ as it reflects our outlook on life, as well as our business strategy. 

We believe that if you eat well, you will feel good. And that is exactly why our food bars are made from the very best raw materials, always produced in the highest possible quality.

RATION isn't a regular food bar, but developed by dietitians and athletes. Nutritiously made according to the official dietary guidelines.

This means a healthy, tasty, food snack, full of apple and oats, packed with fiber and whole grain, giving you something to chew, providing stable energy and blood sugar.

So whether you're at work, school, out running or exercising or just hungry, you will experience that RATION is the healthy good for you source of fuel for body and mind.

Our bars are obviously 100 % all natural, no artificial stuff and suitable for vegetarians, just to mention a few extra details.

But to be quite honest, that's not the most interesting bit about us.

Whether it's the quality of our products or a delivery that matters, we always keep our promises and never compromise. 

Our customers benefit from the pure raw materials, the high fiber content and the whole grains that help to provide a really good satiety and maintains a stable blood sugar.

Roughly speaking, anyone who is interested in eating properly and taking care of themselves when they are slightly hungry and do not want to compromise on health.

We are small and agile, independent, ambitious, cheeky, and dedicated to the fingertips. 

We love to laugh. We do not laugh for fun, but because we believe it is a better business when we, our surroundings and our customers are happy.

Yours respectfully

Jesper Schmith Kampmann
Founder & CEO

Audientes’ mission is to make quality hearing solutions accessible and affordable to everyone who needs them. In other words, to help hearing-impaired people hear and interact freely. We will achieve this by designing, developing and bringing to market innovative solutions for the millions who simply cannot afford a traditional hearing aid or do not have access to an audiologist or hearing center. Audientes’ solutions address a large and growing global market. According to the WHO, of the 360 million people worldwide with disabling hearing loss, the needs of less than 10% are currently met. Therefore, while today’s worldwide market for quality fitted hearing aids is estimated at only 14 million single-ear units annually, our self-fitting solution addresses an important new market, consisting of over 300 million people, many in middle income or developing countries. Our goal is to have sold in excess of one million hearing aids, around the world, by 2025.

Stylein is a Swedish fashion company, launched in 2001 by founder and chief designer Elin Alemdar, while living in New York City where she studied at the Fashion Institute of Technology (F.I.T.). The first handmade collection was shown in 2001.

After Elin Alemdar returned to her native country of Sweden in 2003, Stylein moved to Gothenburg where the company had it’s base until 2009. Stylein headquarter and showroom is now located at Hökens gata 5 at Södermalm in Stockholm.
 
Stylein has continuously grown since its birth. Today Stylein has four collections each year, two main and two pre collections. As of 2015 the brand is available in selected stores in 13 countries. 

Stylein combines international femininity with contemporary edge in an unique simplistic expression. In the world of Stylein, these contrasts form a perfect harmony and what we’ve chosen to call Scandinavian luxury.

Welcome to the world of Stylein
We empower diversity by helping men grow and groom awesome beards.

Buying a Marda product is about joining a lifestyle that cares about our future. Every production step, from sourcing 100% recycled materials, to the design aesthetic right through to fabric innovation, is enriched by our creative touch and profound love for the earth.

Good Idea Drinks is the company behind Good Idea® - a naturally flavored sparkling water with a blend of amino acids and chromium proven to reduce the blood sugar spike following ordinary meals. Yeply is a bikeshop on wheels.

We bring bike maintenance to your neighbourhood and let you book service appointments online at your convenience. You can choose from monthly service plans or pay as you go. companyName: Lune Group Oy Ltd - Lunette Menstrual Cup
description:
Because we all deserve products that are better for our bodies, our bank accounts and the environment. 

The Lunette Menstrual Cup is the most convenient, ecological and economical way to live with periods. It’s a bell-shaped cup that gives a comfortable, safe, odorless and eco-friendly period. It’s also reusable and lasts several years, saving you time, money and stress! Lunette Menstrual Cup is the future of period care. 

Lunette’s mission is to change attitudes about periods: nobody should feel ashamed of them, nobody should miss a chance because of them. There has never been a better time to have a period. As we rise above gender questions and long-standing taboos, Lunette is proud to be part of the changing conversation. 

In 2020, Lunette became a part of Peptonic Medical AB, an innovative Swedish medical development company offering products for women’s health that contribute to increased sustainability and quality of life. This is an opportunity that has strengthened Lunette as a brand and opened up new possibilities for our dear customers.

Wehlers offers a circular economy solution.

All pieces of furniture are made by micro enterprises, family owned businesses, and they are encouraged to buy support material within a 200-mile radius of their facility - Wehlers furniture is designed, produced & recycled in Denmark.

http://www.onepercentfortheplanet.org (with the 1% Wehlers is planting trees)

The designs are Danish & minimalistic – This is our heritage and we love this. And we combine this with sustainability.
We are open for business, and we are excited.

Meet us on (copy/paste links below)

We create delicious products using nutritious and sustainable protein.

If we keep eating like there’s no tomorrow, we'll end up swallowing the entire planet and all her wonderful resources. And she can’t keep up.

It is, however, never too late to change things up. And If there ever was a good time to think outside the box, that time must surely be now. Right?

Some people say we are way ahead of our time, but honestly, our innovation is old news (we mean, people have been eating insect protein for centuries). And it’s definitely worth the fight.

Vi er A-View, et dansk express og onlinevenligt modebrand. Det ligger i vores DNA, at vi altid er med i forhold til sæsonens farver, print, snit og styling. Vi sørger for konstant at have et view over, hvad der rører sig og trender i modebranchen og lader os inspirere af de allerbedste og smukkeste trends, som vi ser lige nu. 

Da vi er helt nyopstartet i branchen, er vi lige nu et lille, men ambitiøst team, som ikke er så dyre. Det betyder, at vi kan tilbyde bedre avancer til vores kunder uden at gå ned på den gode service. Vores priser er skarpe, men samtidig har vi kvaliteten i højsædet. Vores vision er at levere dag til dag, skabe god omsætningshastighed og god avance for vores kunder. 
 
Følg med på vores Facebookside A-View og vores Instagram @aviewofficial, hvor vi i samarbejde med influencers løbende viser vores styles og kollektioner frem. Du kan desuden meget snart shoppe vores nyeste kollektion på vores webshop eller hos udvalgte forhandlere.

Signal was founded in 1967 in a store in Copenhagen, Denmark under the name of Buksesnedkeren. From the beginning the Buksesnedkeren concept was unisex trousers and leisurewear.

In 1973 the brand moved the production from Copenhagen to a newly built factory in Gilleleje, where all garments were designed and manufactured.

The brand name Buksesnedkeren was renamed Signal in 1996. The focus shifted from being a well-known brand in Denmark to building up a concept and a brand aimed at the international retail scene with both own retail stores and a wholesale business.

In 2009 the Signal brand was acquired by the management of the company together with a group of private investors and in the end of 2009 the company moved from Gilleleje to its own new premise in Kvistgård close to Copenhagen.

Hos Theis Vine arbejder vi med vin, fordi vi ikke kan lade være. Vi er 20 engagerede medarbejdere, der hver dag går på arbejde, fordi vi tror på, at vi med vores passion for vin kan give kunderne en unik oplevelse. Derfor arbejder vi også hele tiden med vores sortiment, der både rummer det klassiske og det moderne.

Bourgogne er en uhyre vigtig del af Theis Vines dna. Vi forhandler vine fra nogle af de vigtigste - ikke nødvendigvis største - domainer og har cementeret vores position som vinfirma med et stort udvalg af ganske enestående agenturer. Mængderne er ofte små, men vinoplevelserne kæmpestore. Både blandt de hvide og de røde finder du perler, der bekræfter, at ingen vinområder i verden kan frembringe så feminine, fløjlsbløde og forførende vine som Bourgogne.

Vi har en holdning til den vin, vi har på hylderne, hvad enten det er krydret og kraftig Ribera del Duero, elegant Champagne eller moden Bourgogne. Derfor prøver vi også at beskrive alle vores vine bedst muligt på theis-vine.dk, ligesom den personlige betjening i vores butikker betyder meget for os.

Theis Vine har et nært forhold til landets bedste restauranter, som helt oplagt ønsker at matche deres sublime gastronomi med verdens bedste vine. Vi rådgiver om sammensætning af mad og vin og hjælper gerne med at opbygge restauranternes vinkort. Det kan vi, fordi personalet har mange års erfaring i vin- og restaurationsbranchen - og fordi vi selv oplever en glæde i at få vin og mad til at gå op i en højere enhed.

Også erhvervsvirksomheder servicerer vi - både med udvikling af gaveløsninger, opbygning af virksomhedsvinkældre og levering af vin til firmaernes kantiner. Vi gør meget ud af at udbrede vores passion for vin til andre og afholder derfor løbende vinsmagninger og foredrag for firmaer og personaleforeninger.

In our quest to provide divers with the most capable, durable and safe equipment possible we as market leaders continue to drive the global development of diving technology. This makes us enablers of experiences, adventures, exploration, successful missions, of peace of mind. 

Our customers put their life in our hands when venturing out in to the oceans. It’s our responsibility to maintain and build this trust. Through the quality and technology of our products we provide our customers with the equipment that takes them safely and reliably where they want to go and back. We hold ourselves and our products the highest standards, and so does our customers.

Our goal is to fulfill and exceed our customers expectations, providing them with products that enable their experience. Our products are developed to exceed all safety standards, for all divers.

Welcome to Maze Interior, a world filled with clever storage solutions! 

With everything between cloth hangers and sideboards, we create opportunities for you to furnish your house in a pure and intelligent way. 

We care for the environment by working with local manufactures, packaging the products in recycled materials, never sourcing wood from endangered forest and refusing to transport the products in aircraft. We call it "slow production"​ and it's simply about producing and offering products that last for a long time, do as little impact on the environment as possible and that are produced by people who get decent wages and good working conditions.

ENCE was first launched in April of 2013 as a project to bring true professionalism to the Finnish esports landscape. Through 2013 and 2014 we dominated the domestic competitive field by winning all the important tournament titles in Counter-Strike: Global Offensive, Starcraft 2 and Tekken Tag2.

In January of 2016 we came back to continue on that journey in a pursuit to taking things to the next level. Games ENCE is involved currently in include Starcraft 2, Hearthstone, Rainbow Six: Siege, Overwatch and Counter-Strike: Global Offensive through organizing the Finnish Pro League, SFPL.

ENCE is ran by the most established esports pioneers of Finland, with over two decades worth of experience as professional gamers, event and tournament organizers along with marketing expertize in a fast evolving business such as esports is.

At La Cabra Coffee Roasters we source the highest quality green beans from around the world. We roast lightly to ensure that natural aromas and flavour notes are retained and fully developed rather than covered up by the roasting process. Our coffees are sold in specialty cafes in 40 countries around the world, as well as in our two cafes in the heart of Aarhus.

In January 2019 we are opening a new and larger roastery in Frederiksberg (greater Copenhagen area). We are excited to continue upholding high standards in coffee roasting, bread baking and coffee brewing, while also finding ways of being innovative. Our aim remains to provide our clients in Denmark and around the world with the best possible specialty coffee experience.

Da de to venner, Eric og Line, mødte hinanden i New York i 2009, kom de til at undre sig over hvorfor sodavandskategorien var så kedelig, når resten af den kulinariske scene var i så hastig udvikling. De genfandt en gammel, traditionel bryggeteknik
for alkoholfri drikke og brugte år på at finpudse fermenteringensprocessen i deres køkkener. En dag sad opskriften lige i skabet, og de havde skabt en unik kombucha med et lavt sukkerindhold - en læskedrik med en masser af forfriskende smag og probiotiske egenskaber.

I 2016 startede de Læsk Bryggeriet i Claus Meyers nedlagte restaurant Nam-Nam på Vesterbrogade blandt rispapirlamper og Buddhastatuer. Har du været i det område i 2016-2017 har du med garanti set dem stå i sene aftentimer og jonglere med slanger, tappemaskine og papkasser.

I dag er Læsk flyttet til To Øl City i Svinninge, og har for alvor haft vokseværk. Produktionskapacitet er mere end hundrededoblet, men der er ikke blevet gået på kompromis med kvaliteten: alt kombucha håndbrygges og fermenteres stadig på traditionel vis, sukkerindholdet holdes lavt, og der anvendes ikke pasteurisering.

Læsks mål er at gøre kombucha mere tilgængeligt - både i smag, synlighed og pris. Det lille team på nu 5 laver læskedrik til en sundere fremtid.

Looking for a specialist in polysaccharides? TdB Labs develops, produces and analyses dextran derivatives and other polysaccharides for a wide variety of applications within life science.
Whether you do live microscopy, colitis model, white blood cell isolation or medical device coating - we have biocompatible, stable and high performing materials for you with excellent batch tracking, detailed documentation and bulk order possibilities. We also do customised products perfectly tailored to your experiment. And we have been doing this for nearly 30 years already! 

TdB Labs was founded by the dextran pioneer Tony de Belder in 1991 in Uppsala, Sweden. We are now a global provider of dextran derivatives and other polysaccharides specialised in both manufacturing and further optimisation of the products, as well as developing innovative cutting-edge products for your unique needs.  

The company offers fluorescent derivatives with FITC, TRITC, ATTO™-dyes and our proprietary Antonia Red™-dye. Our non-fluorescent derivatives include different variants of dextran sulfate, including dextran sulfate sodium (DSS) for colitis, and much more. 

We also offer a series of chemical analyses specific to charged and uncharged dextran and polysaccharide derivatives, such as molecular weight determination by gel permeation chromatography.

For full list of products and services please contact us or visit our website.

DESIGN + FUNCTION = DEFUNC

OUR MISSION
Simplifying your choice of earbuds, headphones and speakers in today’s maze-like audio market is the core of what we do at Defunc. We’re a Swedish, Stockholm-based, brand that always strives to create products that add something unique to the world by seamlessly combining Scandinavian design and function to meet your specific everyday needs, passions and personal budget. We also enjoy experimenting to meet the future, believing that all ears around the world deserve good sound for a good price.

OUR PRODUCTS
To simplify people’s choices, our main range consists of four in-ear models and functions: MUSIC, TALK, HYBRID and SPORT. Our products are divided in three price collections: PLUS, GO and BASIC, and are available as wired, wireless Bluetooth and true wireless. Earbuds lie at the centre of our range, with complementing headphones and speakers. We continuously develop new special models, such as MUTE earbuds, DUO Bluetooth stereo speakers and TRUE true wireless earbuds with phone power bank in one. This Autumn, we’re proud to present new members of our audio family within gaming and true wireless.

OUR PEOPLE
We’re an independent, family-owned business, founded in 2015 and is still run by entrepreneur Johan Wahlbäck, who previously started pioneering bicycle brand Kronan Cykel and another earphone brand. Our hometown is Stockholm, from where our agile tight knit dedicated team of select talent grow our global presence through collaboration and partnerships.

Hope you like our stuff!

Inspire to better everyday living

Spring Copenhagen is a Danish design company, rooted in the Scandinavian design tradition.

We have a simple but clear purpose: Inspire to better everyday living 

We wish to create products that have the ability to grow into new classics, can be used every day, are beautiful and inspire people around the world to better everyday life.

Our name Spring Copenhagen refers to the season where everything grows, but indeedalso to feelings of rejuvenation, renewal and the celebration of ideas coming to life.

Great stories, good quality and craftsmanship are central strands in the Spring Copenhagen DNA, and we involve renowned, forgotten, unknown and upcoming designers and idea makers to create products that age with grace and last for generations to come.

Our unique portfolio spans interior designs from the 1930s to present day. Simple, timeless and functional design in the categories accessories, lighting and furniture.

Mars Valve Europe A/S er forhandler af MARS-kuglehaner og med producenten i ryggen bestræber vi os på at være førende, når det kommer til plant up time. Vi sælger kuglehaner, butterflyventiler, aktuatorer samt specialløsninger. 

At vi er en del af producenten, har den fordel, at der ikke er langt fra innovative tanker til produktion. Dette kommer eksempelvis til udtryk i vores nyudviklet Mars Service Beslag, der reducerer monteringstiden med 5-10 minutter pr. ventil. 

Med en komplet organisation bestående af erfarne branchefolk på samtlige poster, er vi klar til at betjene din virksomhed, således vi i fællesskab kan øge jeres produktions- og driftssikkerhed ift. de ventilspecifikke krav, I har. 

Et af vore strategisk mål er at øge synergien mellem de europæiske forhandlere af MARS i form af produktudvikling, godkendelser, certificeringer og lagerføring. Et fælles samarbejde rettes specifikt imod internationale firmaer. De kunder, som ser fordele, ved et partnerskab på tværs af landegrænser i form af komponentstandardiseringer, vil møde en meget proaktiv og kompetent leverandør. Vi har også organisationen, der kan håndtere og sikre direkte leverancer i ind- som udland.

Fabrikatet MARS er den mest anvendte kuglehane i den Danske Industri og har tidligere været markedsført igennem 15 år under typenumrene: 1310, 1311, 1210, 1211, 1313, 1213, 1440, 1611, 1612, 1711, 1712, 1111 samt som en succesfuld regulerings kuglehane V-notch. 

Typenumrene udgår i forbindelse med etableringen af Mars Valve Europe A/S, idet de fremover vil lyde deres originale produktbetegnelser. Kontakt os venligt for yderligere informationer. 

Produkterne og den høje kvalitet er den samme, hvorfor vi ser frem til at videreføre og udbygge produkternes position på det danske marked. Vi ser ligeledes frem til, som firma, at positionere os som Danmarks førende leverandør af kvalitetskuglehaner.
Welcome to the next generation of chewing gum.
A Finnish brand Fighting for Happiness and Sustainability in Housework by developing sustainable, surprising and super-useful products for cleaning and for minimizing bacterial contamination.

La Roar Life Science ApS er en dansk Consumer Healthcare virksomhed, der ikke tager til takke med pseudovidenskab, sundhedsmyter eller sundhedstrends. Derfor besluttede vi os for, at skabe La Roar FertilityCare baseret på forskning ved at udfordre førende forskerne til at komme op med den bedst tænkelige løsning. Resultatet er alt hvad en prenatal løsning bør indeholde.
 
For os er den optimale løsning ikke bare at sammensætte de bedste ingredienser - det er at arbejde sammen med leverandører, der går lige så meget op i forsyningskæden, som vi gør. Derfor har vi arbejdet hårdt på at finde de rigtige partnere - både i ind- og udland, som kan imødekomme vores standarder. 

Til dagligt bor vi på SUND innovation Hub - lige overfor Panum. Som en del af Københavns Universitet og Copenhagen Science City arbejder Sund for at hjælpe og tilvejebringe gode ideer og innovation indenfor sundhedssektoren. Herfra er vi altid i tæt netværk med eksperterne, forskningen, den nyeste viden og talenter indenfor fertilitet.

HOC Copenhagen is inspired from the clean Scandinavian look combined with the metropoles around the world. Special the colors of Los Angeles and the atmosphere of New York set the standards for HOC. 
 
HOC Copenhagen is a new established female fashion brand. HOC stands for “HAPPINESS OF COLORS”. The idea of HOC came up through a lot of traveling around the world and special to Los Angeles and New York – where the colorful atmosphere and the openminded and HAPPY people was and still is a huge inspiration for HOC combined with the clean Scandinavian styles. 
 
With office in Copenhagen and freelance people around the world, HOC constantly try to find new ideas to make a Happy and creative universe. We make fashion colorful and happy with a clean touch.
 
HOC Copenhagen is a fashion house working with the Happiness of Colors celebrating the individuality in every person. 
 
With a clean Scandinavian style and relaxed ease of the US East and West coast lifestyle HOC make it easy for the global women to make her own personality.
 
HOC is passionate about a cleaner world therefore we have from the beginning a sustainably strategy – but it’s just a part of the company and a natural way of thinking in respect for the world.

Current and future smart living and construction possibilities already at your disposal today.

The Cozify product pool covers solutions for individual homes, office spaces and entire apartment buildings.

Cozify ZEN is for smart homes and smart buildings designed and installed by professionals. ZEN provides extensive expansion and administration possibilities. With Cozify ZEN you can control individual homes and entire apartment buildings.

Cozify HUB is an affordable and do-it-yourself installable smart hub for a single home, apartment, or cabin. You can buy it from a normal electrical device shop or from the Cozify web shop.

Älykkään asumisen ja rakentamisen nykyiset ja tulevat mahdollisuudet käyttöösi jo nyt.

Cozify tuotevalikoimasta löydät ratkaisut yksittäisiin asuntoihin, toimitiloihin ja kokonaisiin kerrostalokiinteistöihin.

Cozify on älykkään kodin avoin alusta, jonka ympärille voit luoda omiin tarpeisiisi ja budjettiisi sopivan kokonaisuuden. Cozify-pohjaista järjestelmää voi myös helposti laajentaa, muokata ja päivittää.

COZIFY ZEN on ammattilaisten suunnittelemiin ja toteuttamiin älykoteihin ja älykiinteistöihin tarkoitettu ratkaisu, joka tarjoaa erittäin monipuoliset laajennus- ja hallintamahdollisuudet. Cozify ZENillä voit hallinnoida yksittäisiä koteja sekä kokonaisia kerrostalokiinteistöjä.

Cozify HUB on edullinen ja itseasennettava älyjärjestelmä yksittäiseen taloon, asuntoon tai mökille. Voit ostaa sen kodinelektroniikkaliikkestä tai Cozifyn verkkokaupasta.

Unique design and a great story? Are you sick of hearing the same description used over and over again by seemingly identical watch brands? We were. And that’s why we created REC.

We wanted to redefine how a timepiece can tell a (fantastic) story, and relate to you not as a customer, but as an individual. Watch fanatics to the bone, we wanted to create something different, unpretentious, and ultimately something we would simply crave ourselves. Hence, instead of some obscure year of establishment or vague ‘inspiration’, every single REC timepiece is made by salvaging classic cars and icons, and transforming them into watch components – a concept which we termed “RECOVER, RECYCLE, RECLAIM”.

The result? EVERY single REC watch is visually unique – that’s right, no two are identical - include handmade components, and are born with the story from the object of which it was made. Now that’s what unique design and great stories should mean!

Posh Living är ett inrednings- och livsstilskoncept med två butiker i Stockholm samt en web shop. Ett antal av våra möbler och inredningsdetaljer designar vi själva men de flesta produkterna är handplockade. Vårt utbud och vår stil har med tiden blivit allt mer välkänt och är numera ett begrepp inom design och inredning i Stockholm.

MessyWeekend is a brand dedicated to offering high-quality products for a fair price, while still doing our part for the environment by way of our Clean Oceans Initiative. DropBucket produces and markets a simple solution for events. With DropBucket event organisers can quickly increase the trash collection capacity at the event area. 
Organisers can then in a responsible manner help the attendees disposing their trash and reduce the littering at the event area.

SMALLrevolution - design med fremtid
SMALLrevolution laver produkter til ude- og inderum i cirkulært design af 100% genanvendt og genanvendeligt plast. Alle materialer består af dansk plastaffald, som sorteres og omstøbes til elegant og robust design. Alle SMALLrevolutions produkter er genanvendelige. Det betyder, at når et SMALLprodukt er slidt, kan det omstøbes til nye friske produkter, der lever op til aktuelle behov. Plast kan genstøbes 6-8 gange, og dermed tilfører SMALLrevolution dødsdømt plastaffald potentielt 6-8 nye liv. 

SMALLrevolutions produkter er farverige og elegante. De afspejler fuldkommen den plast, de er lavet af. Hvis et møbel består af blå låg fra vandflasker, bliver møblet blåt. Ganske enkelt. Køber du et SMALLprodukt deltager du i en fuldkommen transparent fortælling, hvor cirkulær produktion er omdrejningspunktet for en ny konsekvent dagsorden indenfor bæredygtighed. 
SMALLrevolution er stiftet af 2 kvindelige iværksættere, der brænder for miljøet og cirkulær produktion. De går forrest med radikale løsninger indenfor bæredygtighed og viser, at fremtidens produktionsmetode er cirkulær og samtidig en stærk forretning. 

SMALLrevolutions design er et synligt og konkret eksempel på, hvordan affald kan omdannes til værdi, der holder langt i ud i fremtiden.

Wedio is the new European sharing community for filmmakers and photographers. Wedio gives creators the opportunity to access their desired gear and financial flexibility in order to focus on their craft. Wedio provides creators with the essentials in order to share gear safe and smoothly. This implies excellent coverage conditions, thorough user verification, a rating system, an easy suited communication system, a user-friendly platform, and a transparent environment.

We make renting easy. By promoting the listed gear and handling the formalities we encourage conveniency towards our lenders. By gathering the supply of local gear in one marketplace, creators are able to make quick and informed decisions when renting. At the same time, Wedio provides creators with the opportunity to expand their network, and to interact with and help other like-minded artists.

Our mission is to keep great stories alive. We achieve this by offering the tools and services that benefit storytellers so that they can focus on their craft. We believe that visual content plays a crucial role in the future of communication, and thereby we have a vision of becoming the preferred global community for creators.

Basic & More er grundlagt med det formål at gøre en forskel og tage medansvar for den overflod af producerede varer der er omkring os. Disse vil vi gøre tilgængelig for vores kunder og lade det komme dem til gode i form af en god handel. Vi er drevet af den gode handel og godt købmandskab. 

Overproduktion, udgåede varer, fejl emballage og des lige - vi sælger varer, der ellers går til spilde. Vi vil være med til at gøre en forskel, og derfor gøre vores til at aktivere varer, som ellers ville blive destrueret.

Vi sælger kvalitetsvarer pakket ind i et lækkert og inspirerende univers. 
En del af vores sortiment er basis varer, men vi tilbyder også meget andet. Særligt har vi fokus på isenkram, bolig og interiør. Vi har kun få faste varer på hylderne, fordi vi hver dag køber varer til gode priser hjem til dig, og dermed er der nye varer i butikken hver uge. Størstedelen af vores sortiment er hjemkøbte ”spild” varer, og en stor del af disse varer er originale mærkevarer, de resterende varer er vores egen produktion - det særlige ekstra til hjemmet.

Vi bestræber os på at være gode mod miljøet, samtidig med, at vi jagter den gode handel. Vi gør vores allerbedste, og vi gør os umage! 
 
Ansvarlighed! 
Basic & More er ikke et bæredygtigt Retail koncept i traditionel forstand, men vi gør alt hvad vi kan for at tage ansvar! Vi køber originale mærkevarer fra underleverandører og fejlproduktionsvarer fra producenten, og dermed sikrer vi samtidig at produkterne ikke ender med destruktion, som vi mener er uansvarligt. 
Vi fokuserer på at være den bedste og mest ansvarlige version af os selv og vi har forpligtet os til at tage gode valg og minimere miljømæssig indvirkning.

Mazo is composed of a full spectrum of functionalism: With roots in Scandinavian tradition, a love of the simplicity of the Bauhaus era, and a reminiscence of ancient Japanese culture, we aim to provide people of this century the opportunity to choose furniture with long lasting design.

We produce and re-launch both the iconic international design classics, and the hidden gems that have only been produced in a small number in this design universe. We are serious about authenticity. We rely on it, as it is the core of our existence.

Humbled to be trusted with the exclusive rights to manufacture and launch furniture by the Danish architect Magnus Læssøe Stephensen (1903-1984), we believe the most foresighted design can be created by embracing the experience of the past. We aim though to also stay true to the revolutionary part of this heritage. That is why we partner with new and dedicated designers, who not only share our fondness of the Nordic and Japanese aesthetics and understand the balance of beauty and function, but also create new designs, in quality materials, suited for humans and homes of our days.
Mazo furniture is made for people, respectful of the past, yet mindful of the present. Looking for the balance between beauty and function. In a home. At the nearest café or restaurant. At the office or in the hotel lobby.

Fletna delivers smart beauty. 
By way of nature.

Time to think …

The year is 2009, and the place is the hometown of world-renowned storyteller H. C. Andersen. 

A businessman, who used to have his hands – and mind – full, sits down to think. The silence allows his mind to run free. With more than 25 years in the cargo security business, he has met many obstacles; heard every question. He knows just about every challenge.

He thinks of lashing equipment, which hasn’t changed since its invention. But why?

When it comes to safety and efficiency, there are obvious drawbacks to the existing equipment. For instance, inserting the webbing into the ratchet is a time-consuming process. He knows he can make this process both easier and quicker.

Countless thoughts, ideas, and gadgets see the light of day over the next couple of years. There’s progress, but also dead ends. Then, in 2016, he’s got it: a fully functional prototype. It’s easy to use and both economically and ergonomically superior to the original, so he names it Ergolash®.  

Determined to transform his prototype into a quality product ready to be used by the demanding cargo industry, he keeps working on it. This innovative version of an old product is sure to attract attention, and the cargo industry will benefit from it. 

Wanting to protect his invention, the businessman applies for a world patent.

Finally, in 2019, he gets his patent. Endless tests prove the worth of Ergolash® time and time again, and production begins. 

My name is Jackie, and I’m the businessman in the story. I’m happy to tell you that Ergolash® can save you both physical and economic resources.

Realism is subject to structure, provided by our surroundings and individualistic interaction Pensive yet defiant we tread onto urbane settings, calmly immersed in inner reflection. Evermore, humans remain solitary wanderers, comfortably equipped with sartorial anticipation.

THE LAST CONSPIRACY set out to provide quality artisan footwear, items withstanding any test of time, imbued by the sense of history. Each pair is handmade with profound attention to details, thus imprinted with a personal connection between shoemaker and wearer. This selective process is conducted with patience, willfulness and mindful purpose. Against a contrasting backdrop shaped by a continuous dialogue between Portuguese craftsmanship and Nordic minimalism.

THE LAST CONSPIRACY develops functional and essential footwear, with a proud artistic post-modern legacy. Each collection is built on the premises of experimental progress, allowing for new treatments and construction processes. Authentic shoemakers first and design studio second, we are ambiguous explorers of modern waders.

Krenkerup Brewery is a new and modern part of the old and distinguished Krenkerup Estate near Sakskoebing in Denmark. The estate has, since 1367, been passed on in the same family from generation to generation.

Krenkerup Brewery brews according to the Bavarian law of purity, which is a special brewing method that involves high quality standards for the raw material. This means that no preservatives are used – no E numbers, no added enzymes, colors or added sugar. We create quality beer with water, malt, hops, yeast and nothing else!

Great taste for life – and beer of a special supreme quality

Atacac is a Swedish based fashion studio founded by Jimmy Herdberg and Rickard Lindqvist. Atacac rethinks the way of design, present and sell garments by challenging every step in the process. 

Rickard Lindqvist is a fashion designer and researcher. His research proposes new foundations, theories and methods for pattern cutting and stretches between blue-skies research and applied projects. Rickard was originally trained as a men's tailor, in addition to studying fashion design at the Swedish School of Textiles from where he also holds a PhD in fashion design. Between 2007 and 2011 he ran the eponymous Rickard Lindqvist fashion label. As a consultant he has served clients such as Vivienne Westwood and Nudie Jeans.

Jimmy Herdberg is the founder of Kokokaka, a creative studio and producers of digital haute couture. Since the beginning of the 21st century Jimmy and his creative team have explored the world between digital and fashion for clients such as Wrangler, Prada, Burberry and Louis Vuitton.

Project Nord is the No. 1 destination for Nordic art prints that transform your home. Our designs are effortlessly stylish and rooted in rich Scandinavian tradition. We also follow Nordic practices by being a sustainably-minded company. 

So, let us bring a touch of Scandinavia into your home!

Our Story

Founded in Copenhagen, Project Nord has a clear vision - to enrich people's lives with stylish, Nordic home decor. We want to create spaces which people can truly relax in. And, that includes limiting our impact on the planet. Wondering how?

Small, thoughtful changes, like our posters, can make a huge difference to a space. In fact, something as simple as a poster can boost your happiness, productivity, and inner peace! We even plant a tree in your name for every poster you buy from us. That means your posters are having an effect in the wider world too!


Our Product

Our Nordic-inspired designs are created by artists from around the world! They are beautiful to look at, but also serve a purpose: they transform the spaces they're displayed in. Our posters are the perfect minimalist touch. Less really is more!

Our Nordic and minimalistic mindsets are also reflected in our attitude to resources. We are mindful about how our effect on the planet. Which is why we plant a tree for every poster you buy from us. It's that simple!

Cheers!

Den Sidste Flaske er en daglig leverandør af fine vine. Vi tilbyder bogstaveligt-talt en enkelt håndplukket vin om dagen, indtil den sælger ud (nogle gange på timer) og sender den så afsted til dig. En ny dag, en ny vin. Altid til utrolige priser (20% - 70% rabat ift. detailhandel). Det du ser, er det du får.
Vi er beliggende i det grønne og vinrevne Sønderjylland (host host) og drives af mig selv (Tobias) samt venner og partnere (og en masse fantastiske forbindelser), der har været i vinindustrien alt for længe.
Jeg er heldig (og stolt!) over at være godt forbundet med hundredvis af vingårde, mæglere, distributører og importører over hele verden, som jeg har brugt lang tid på at opbygge tillid til. Mine evner ligger i forhandlingen af gode vine. Jeg har haft en vinbar i indre KBH ved navn Tyskenhavn, men er nu gået all in på at levere god vin til så mange som jeg kan på e-commerce siden. Jeg har levet af salg af vin det meste af mit voksne liv, og vinkvaliteten står ALTID først, altid. 
Du kommer her til at se mange store navne, som du kender, ældre vin-vindere, samleobjekter og samtlige sjove tilbud af fantastiske "daglige drikkevare" som kommer I alle prisklasser fra både de store vinregioner, til de mindre. Jeg smager tusindvis af vine om året med mine forbindelser --- og er meget fokuseret på at finde de bedste vine, både på prisen og smagen.
Som vindrikker, samler og at have levet af den globale vinhandel - er jeg særligt god til at finde tilbud, som jeg videregiver til smukke mennesker som dig. Der er hverken fancy kontor, skulpturer i lobbyen, poolborde eller noget der forhindrer mig i at spare dig flere penge. Bare et lager / mit kontor og en masse af lidenskabelige mennesker jeg samarbejder med. Vi udsender ikke vores egne "ratings", vi bruger rigtige anmeldere til at danne den bedste tryghed der er. Jeg behandler mennesker som jeg selv forventer at blive behandlet - ærligt, retfærdigt og gennemsigtigt.

Point 65° North is a magical place. The island Rönnskär, near the Northern City of Skellefteå, Sweden and the home of the Pite-Rönnskär light house. Built in 1905 it is surrounded by an archipelago of hundreds of islands, ideal for exploring the outdoors.

When founding Point 65 Sweden in 1996, the beauty of the islands combined with the ingenuity and engineering of the lighthouse was the essence of what we wanted to achieve.

Today Point 65 products are sold all over the world and innovation is still our hallmark.

Our Philosophy
We are dedicated to quality, form and function. We are innovative, products are functional and design is Scandinavian.

Our mission is to inspire people to the outdoors through innovative, unique and outstanding products assured by the Point 65 brand.

We strive to offer a wide range of innovative, unique and outstanding outdoor products to bring out the explorer in people, starting from our roots in the world of paddling.

Our company
Point 65 Sweden, founded in 1996, is a leading outdoor brand in Northern Europe and one of the fastest growing outdoor brands in the world. 


Kayaks & more
Point 65 Sweden also offers a wide range of paddle sport products and is the company behind the ingenuous modular take-apart kayaks Apollo, Tequila!, Martini, Mercury and the SUP Rum Runner. 


Packs & bags
We offer a wide range of state of the art, truly unique and innovative bags and hard shell back packs which double as the highest rated spine protectors in the world and also protect your gear. 
These legendary packs & bags have previously been known as Boblbee. For more information on Boblbee becoming Point 65 Sweden.

Best described in magazine DAZED
"DRKN is perhaps the first-ever brand inspired wholly by gaming culture. It sounds pretty niche, but the virtual landscapes and online identities with which hundreds of millions of people engage with daily are, in fact, a global market yet untapped by the reaches of the fashion industry. But DRKN claims to be more than just fashion: it’s out to overturn cultural and social boundaries with its output, by applying the rules of virtual gaming realities to the physical world."​

Our Story 

Cross Sportswear have adapted to face and overcome the challenges that nature throws at us, but we have never sacrificed our freedom to move or our style in the process.

Sweden’s climate and environment have shaped us as people, golfers and designers. And that’s why we’re good at this. It’s embedded in our DNA. In Sweden, there’s this old saying, “There is no bad weather, only bad clothes.” This is where Cross Sportswear was born. And these are the words we’ve lived by ever since.

Cross Sportswear is a Swedish company that was founded in 1986 with headquarter in Stockholm. Cross Sportswear design and produce highly functional golf and skiwear for passionate athletes and is today available in 23 markets.

Established in the Spring of 2019, 7 DAYS Active is an activewear label dedicated to inspiring motion for the mind, body, and soul. From its home in Copenhagen, 7 DAYS propels the agile and sporty mindset by providing functional and fashionable pieces, easily adapting to an active lifestyle across all arenas.

Hos Social Brew er vi et mindre team med et stort hjerte for kaffe og bæredygtighed. Vi har mange års erfaring med udvælgelse af de bedste kaffebønner, og samarbejder kun med selvstændige bønder, som har gode forhold for de ansatte. Social Brew is an artisan coffee company with a passionate team of people who have love for specialty coffee. With a lot of experience in coffee industry we aim to provide some of the worlds finest coffees with sustainability and responsibility at the heart of what we do. Three words which describes us.

Ethical, Responsible, Sustainable
We view our wholesale accounts as collaborative partnerships and are happy to work with you, as roasters who have coffeeshop experience, we understand how to make coffees that impress customers and also some of the challenges faced within daily operations. We currently supply coffeeshops and restaurants with coffee throughout Denmark and beyond. We freshly batch roast your coffee and deliver it to you, to order.
