MAKE TIME MATTER

At Bornholm Spirits, we are passionate about creating unique and tasteful products such as snaps, vodka and other types of spirits. We strive to rethink the concept of snaps, while maintaining the proud traditions. We pay tribute to the diversity of the wonderful Nordic ingredients through quality spirits, which are a delight to the eye as well as to the palate. We love to stimulate and inspire other people with our great range of products. The passionate and authentic souls behind Bornholm Spirits are constantly working to create new exciting flavors. Snaps and other spirits are produced with love, curiosity and dedication on the basis of good raw ingredients and the super-soft, crystal-clear Bornholm water, which has stored on mineral-rich rocky ground for billions of years, which helps to give the spirit an even more balanced taste. Already now Bornholm Spirits can present a range of organic and premium products such as Snaps Bornholm, Vodka Bornholm, Sevablødda, Bornholmer Aquavit, 1855 Traditions Aquavit, Bitter and Christmas Aquavit - with the desire to spread the knowledge of the finest Bornholm spirits of the best quality.

Prolgae Spirulina Supplies Pvt. Ltd. is a Nordic-India joint operating company. Founded on Jan 2017 by Mr. Aakas Sadasivam (India) and Mr. Mika Rautio (Finland) among other microalgae farming passionate professionals. Our top-modern farm is ideally located - in a rural cozy village, far away from cities and traffic in Karur district, Tamilnadu, India. Area famous for flourishing agriculture within ultra pure nature and climate. 

In all our processes we follow Finnish Organic Food standards. See further http://proluomu.fi/english/.

Whyred is a Stockholm-based fashion brand. We channel our love for the classics through our designs, but always with an edge. Because we love independent, impeccable style.
So we produce garments that will live longer, in both quality and aesthetics. That’s also the most effective way to run a sustainable company - something we take seriously.

Turo. The story began in 1938, when three young entrepreneurs founded a company focused on men’s clothes and, soon after, specialising in suits.

The defining ideology of the company was clear and simple. The idea was ‘to benefit the customer with good products, shop owner with easy-to-sell goods, and the employees by providing enjoyable, well-paid work’.

And this is what put Turo ahead of its time: the ambition and skill to make suits that seamlessly fit into a man’s life. Timeless, high-quality, and easy to wear. Today, Turo is an international Finnish suit brand, with its roots in the heart of some of the most beautiful Nordic nature.

The collection is modern, distinctive and focussed, moving with the times, just like the men who wear these suits every day – or perhaps every other day, now and then, once a year, as the situation arises. Regardless of time, place and age.

Mellow was established in Copenhagen 2019 in the back of an old wooden attic room. Our objective is, and has always been, to craft chocolate of the purest and finest quality; from only two ingredients including thoughtfully sourced cocoa beans & unrefined coconut flower syrup. Our processes, products & goals are derived from a sustainable mindset of working with ethical cocoa farming, pure organic ingredients & renewable plastic-free packaging. We develop our processes from a scientific standpoint to contain the high natural concentrations of antioxidants, minerals & vitamins. All chocolate bars are handmade in small batches. We aim to inspire people by making well-designed products with help from local artists and creatives.

Our mission is to connect the most promising young artists of our generation with NextGen art lovers & neophytes. 

Art From Future, the premier young artist Accelerator & NextGen Art / NFT marketplace only showcasing the works of tomorrow's talents. 

We're on a mission to enable promising early-stage artists to shine internationally through digital technology and phygital events.

Invest in the future, today:
At Art From Future, we make it super easy and fun for you to buy a selection of high-quality physical and digital artworks at a price point that's still affordable. We are talent hunters. And we discover them before anyone else.

Blockchain certified artworks:
Each time you purchase an artwork via Art From Future, you will receive a Digital Certificate of Authenticity registered via Blockchain technology and hand-signed by the artist.

Join us in the future of art. Change the world.

HUR VÄNDER DU UPP OCH NER PÅ KAFFEBRANSCHEN?

Genom att driva egna kaffegårdar, kapa alla mellanhänder och se till att ingen och inget tar skada när du njuter av en god kopp kaffe. 

Vi är tillbaka i den bransch vi en gång förändrade. Men den här gången vill vi göra allt lite annorlunda. Lite bättre. Nej, mycket bättre. 

På högsta bergen i El Salvador och Panama, vid Andernas snövattenfyllda sluttningar och tillbaka upp till Brasiliens högland och över havet till kaffets vagga i Östafrika, sätter vi upp mönstergårdar där vi odlar kaffe precis som det ska odlas. Ekologiskt. Utan monokulturer, i perfekt harmoni med naturen och människorna. 

Och för att göra riktig skillnad på plats, delar vi med oss av vår kunskap. Vi hjälper våra kaffeodlande grannar att förbättra och förädla sitt redan goda kaffe till fantastiska kaffen, som de kan ta bättre betalt för. 

Lycka eller Lykke är ett gammalt fint nordiskt ord som beskriver en inhägnad bit jordbruksmark. Det är också benämningen på en knop formad som en åtta. Något som aldrig tar slut. 

Men Lykke är framförallt en känsla av välbehag.  En av många känslor vi alla strävar efter. 

Att må bra genom att göra bra saker.

Cirkus Cirkör was founded in 1995 with the vision to change the world through contemporary circus. Today Cirkus Cirkör tours the world with several performances, arranges circus events for companies and organisations, run weekly circus classes for children, youth and adults. We tour schools, youth recreational centres and nursing homes with pedagogical activities. Cirkör LAB is our own platform for international circus research and development. We also co-run an internationally renowned upper secondary school in contemporary circus and have implemented a university level circus education at the Dance and Circus University in Stockholm.

Den Frie er Kunstnernes Hus og viser udstillinger, der er produceret, initieret eller udvalgt af kunstnere. Den Frie har særligt fokus på samtidskunstneriske fællesskaber, kollektive udstillinger, kunstnersammenslutninger samt eksperimenterende grupperinger og netværk.
Huset er bygget af kunstnere til kunstnere og stræber i dag mod at sammensætte et interessant og varieret udstillingsprogram, der udfordrer udstillingsbygningens særlige arkitektur. Der vises årligt 8 udstillinger, hvoraf de fleste er gruppeudstillinger. Derudover præsenteres endvidere separatudstillinger af enten yngre lovende kunstnere eller kunstnere, der kunsthistorisk har ydet et betydningsfuldt bidrag.
Partihandel med järnhandelsvaror

LC-NO er et medlemsbasert nettverk for virksomheter, organisasjoner og FoU institusjoner som er interesserte i prosjektbasert planlegging, prosjektering og produksjon basert på Lean Construction, spesielt innen bygg og anlegg.

Sekretariatet for nettverket ligger for tiden hos BIs Senter for byggenæringen v/Lena E. Bygballe. Styret består av Ingvald Grindheim (Lean Konsult), Leif Rathe (Norconsult), Roar Fosse (Skanska), Tobias Saltveit (AF), Bo-Terje Kalsaas (Universitetet i Agder), Alexander Strand (Statsbygg), Lars Abrahamsen (Sykehusbygg AS) og styreleder Fredrik Svalestuen (Veidekke).

Based on more than fifty years of experience, Graae Copenhagen has accumulated a unique knowledge of hides, tanning, colouring, cutting and construction of leather goods.

The Graae quality
Leather craftsmanship created with passion for uncompromising quality.

First and foremost, we select the best hides and skin. We have always worked with some of the best tanneries in the world, including Italian tannery Tempesti through which we buy vegetable tanned and aniline dyed calfskin. This kind of leather is tanned from natural plant extracts such as oak bark, rhubarb,eucalyptus and acacia bark. Using the highest quality of skins, we make sure that our products patinate beautifully and stay with our customers for years. Another central component is the hardware we use, including belt buckles, hinges and locks. These are all our own design and all made from solid brass which is plated with silver and palladium. Plating with palladium on top of the silver secure that the hardware will maintain the same look, even after many years of daily use.

Design
A Graae product is characterised by functionality, quality and a timeless design that can stand the test of time. We cater to the classic - yet modern - man who is focused on product quality rather than logos. In everything we do, we strive to design leather goods that will stay with you for a lifetime.
Producer of freeride skis
The Resort Co was founded in 2019 with one clear mission; to craft the perfect vacation wardrobe. All products are eco-consciously handcrafted in Europe.

Meet Raging Pig - a revolution within bacon that lets you enjoy the taste that you love in a healthy, sustainable and cruelty-free way. 

We’ve set out on an exciting journey to merge the power of bacon, foodtech and pop culture to drive the positive change our world needed yesterday.

Treat yourself with a deep breath and imagine a world with peace. Imagine a world free from  hate, no matter where you’re born or who you happen to fall in love with. Imagine a world without gender, social or economic inequality. Imagine a world where no human needs to starve. Imagine a world  where all species live in harmony. Imagine a world that makes Mother Nature proud again. Sounds lovely, doesn’t it?

So, will Raging Pig Company make this Utopia become reality? Most definitely not.

However, the birth of Raging Pig Company will let us humans enjoy the delicious taste of bacon without having to be a part of the, not so delicious, pig slaughtering circus ending the life of 1.5 billion life-loving pigs every year. And that’s at least a pretty decent starting point, don’t you think?

Eager to join the revolution? We have an open door-policy for amazing people who want to contribute to our mission in any way. Don’t hesitate to reach out!

companyName: Mifuko - Work of hands and hearts
description:
WORK OF HANDS AND HEARTS
Mifuko is a Finnish design company that combines Finnish design with traditional Kenyan handicrafts. The company's product range includes baskets, bags and home decor items. 

As a Guaranteed WFTO member Mifuko adheres to the highest ethical requirements. This means the products you are getting are made in compliance with the 10 Principles of Fair Trade, which covers human and labour rights, as well as the buying and management processes that enable this.

The baskets are already made by more than 700 artisans and sold in about 30 countries.

MIFUKO MEANS POCKET

The word mifuko means pocket in Swahili. We make sure that everyone gets something in their pocket. Mifuko´s partner workshops and self-help groups employ many underprivileged, such as slum youth and people with disabilities or economically disadvantaged rural backgrounds. 

Our products bring joy and happiness to both their makers in Kenya and their users around the globe.

MIFUKO TRUST

Mifuko is founder of a charity association Mifuko Trust which aims to bring everyday life-enhancing improvements to rural women: an area where clean water is a luxury and there is no electricity. In just 8 years, Mifuko Trust has built dry toilets, bought rainwater tanks and donated solar lights to the artisan women’s communities in the area.

ReRobe AB is a retail and technology company based in Stockholm, Sweden. We were founded in 2019 on the belief that everyone should sustainably enjoy fashion, and our mission is to help people discover the joy of a circular shopping experience.

At our core, we focus on building tech-driven solutions that enable businesses and consumers to participate in the circular economy. 

For consumers, we serve them through our online and physical stores, all powered by our own web, mobile and hardware technologies. Our flagship store in Södermalm combines a physical and digital shopping experience designed for the modern consumer to discover, shop, and sell “pre-loved” fashion. 

For businesses, we are building innovative e-commerce and retail technology that will help them run an omni-channel business geared toward the resale economy. Our vision is to help businesses turn retail into re-sale, e-commerce into re-commerce, and consumption into conservation.

We don’t like to think of ourselves as operating within one vertical or niche. Instead, our vision is to set the standard for a new model of sustainable consumption, and we are doing it in partnership with consumers, brands, retailers, and department stores.

We're a hardworking, but fun-loving, team of software engineers, creatives, marketing pros, retail experts, and entrepreneurs who care about our planet, our communities, and conscious capitalism.

Download ReRobe today on the App or Play store and discover a whole new way to shop and sell pre-loved fashion. Follow us on Instagram @rerobestockholm for news, updates, and new feature announcements.

The family company Sv. Michelsen Chokolade was founded in 1933, when the newly qualified confectioner Svend Michelsen began to produce handmade chocolate.
Today, the third generation of Michelsens continues the legacy and the proud traditions.
Our chocolate is still made by hand and subject to the strictest of quality requirements.
Street wear fashion brand - we get inspired by the man on the street. We get inspired by you.

Onnexi tuo luotettavan ja laadukkaan naapuriavun kotitalouksille ja joustavat työmahdollisuudet eläkeläisille. 
Onnexi Oy välittää kotitalouksille ja yrityksille kokeneita tekijöitä erilaisiin arjen askareihin, olipa kyseessä puutarhatyöt tai hoitoapu. Mutta ei ketä tahansa apulaisia, vaan sellaisia, jotka myös itse saavat työstään erityistä sisältöä elämään.

AMOV is a new apparel brand for women and men. We will make it natural and easy to make sustainable choices when you shop for your new favorite wardrobe items.

Background:
We are at a point in history where it is fully possible for every living being to live a good life.

But what we are seeing is gross inequality, poverty, conflict and a breakdown of our fragile ecosystem. Even in the richest, most peaceful parts of the world, people are stressed out and far from being as happy as they could be.

We have come to look at the world through lenses of scarcity. We believe that in order for us to win someone has to lose.

This belief is deeply rooted in us, so we come to see getting and giving as mutually exclusive: You either chase your own happiness or your sacrifice your chance of success to help others.

But we are misguided. Surely there is a middle ground. Surely it is possible to create a healthy balance between doing good for ourselves and doing good for others.

AMOV will prove our old scripts wrong. We will show how success is best measured in human values, rather than just shareholder value, profit and GDP.
We will prove that happiness can come from balancing all things; especially getting and giving. 

Tackling a notoriously non-sustainable industry; we are creating an apparel brand. Through our work and example, we wish to start a movement. A movement towards a society where people, businesses and politicians find it natural to act responsibly and with compassion.

"Profit matching" is our way of balancing our financial success with our responsibility to give back; to do good in the world. Specifically it means that for every penny we earn (after taxes and interest) we must at least raise a similar amount for doing good through various activities, campaigns, funds, what not...

Read all about it on www.amovapparel.com

101 Copenhagen is a Danish design brand founded in 2017 with a strong vision to create a world of beautiful lighting and accessories of exquisite craftsmanship, quality and timeless design for Scandinavian living. With a passion for materials and refined textures combined with our design aesthetic and an organic, calm color scheme, we are proud to present a collection filled with must-have novelties and timeless classics.
Golf apparel concept founded by a group of dedicated sportswear designers and avid golfers on a mission to push the boundaries of traditional golf apparel.

Superclub AS is a one-game game studio from Norway. We’re determined to make the best football manager board game in the World. 

Superclub combines match day tactics with big picture decisions to give you football on every scale. Team selections, stadium expansions, staff hiring, scouting, player development – skills and luck – it’s all here! But what really sets Superclub apart from other football based board games that came before it, is the unique scoring system that ties it all together. Build a footballing powerhouse brick by brick over multiple seasons, all in one highly eventful game night.
We provide greener and cleaner solutions that motivate users to better care for their shoes, wear and gear. Our products are developed and designed in Sweden, planet friendly and climate neutral.

Affaldssortering skal være nemt og overskueligt for at fungere i hverdagen. ReCollector er et dansk designet system til affaldssortering og kan udvides efter behov. ReCollector fremstilles i Danmark af genanvendeligt pp plast og kan genanvendes.

SOLUTION
We bring real time underwater camera vision and insight on the biomass through cutting edge and affordable technology to the global aquaculture industry. We do real time in-situ monitoring on vital parameters of the entire biomass throughout the grow out period. 

Our products are easy to install, zero touch sensor products embedded with affordable Industry 4.0 technology, such as Artificial Intelligence, Computer Vision and Machine Learning. They are built to gather data on the biomass when it goes from nursery to grow out and 24/7/ monitoring throughout the entire grow out cycle. This will provide invaluable, real-time data, enabling the individual farms to get early warnings, accurate survival rates and the exact optimal time to harvest. 

MISSION
Our mission is to collect, monitor, analyze and present vital parameters on underwater biomass to enable farmers to be more efficient and help accelerate the land based protein production towards aquaculture species.

Enligt Sveriges regering så har varje person ett ansvar att klara sig i en vecka utan myndigheternas hjälp vid en eventuell kris.

Precis som att du har en brandsläckare eller en hemförsäkring så fungerar hemberedskap som en försäkring om samhället skulle vändas upp och ner. För vad gör du om du inte kan tillgodose dina basbehov? Om du inte kan ta ut pengar och få tag på någon information. Om vattnet inte rinner ur kranen och butikerna är stängda.

Beredlådan innehåller allt du behöver för att skapa en grundläggande hemberedskap för att klara dig i minst 1 vecka om de samhällsmässiga funktionerna inte fungerar som de ska.

Oikiat Design is a Finnish Startup company, working in the areas of circular and creative economy, sustainable textile industry. Our Innovation is customizable, sustainable and easy rub-on textile repair patch. Trademarks are Vaatelaastari and FabPatch.

Bubblebee Industries is Making Sound Sound Better by creating the world’s best quality microphone wind protection and other innovative sound accessories for serious sound professionals. Field recording often means capturing sound in very challenging environments and Bubblebee’s windscreens are designed to be good looking, easy to use and technically second to none to retain as much of the microphone’s natural sound as possible.

Bubblebee Industries'​ founder and designer Poul Mejer is a veteran field recorder for TV productions all over the world. On creating the Bubblebee windshields, Mejer says, “It has always been my passion to produce, channel and enjoy the best possible sound. I had to make my own lavalier windbubbles since the ones available on the market were not good enough, unattractive and a bit fiddly to use.”

Along with the Windbubbles, Bubblebee also makes other innovative products for sound designers, like the new Invisible Lav Covers, The Cable Saver and The Windkiller.

Norsk Kaffe er et selskap i vekst som:

Pr i dag holder til i Stavanger og Haugesund.
Sørger for LYKKE I HVER KOPP på arbeidsplassen.
Vet at vi sammen med våre kunder spiller hverandre gode.
Leverer ferske råvarer med kort responstid til din arbeidsplass.
Sørger for at man har den beste vann, og kaffeløsningen på arbeidsplassen.
Jobber tett med våre leverandører for at du som kunde får de beste betingelser.

✔️Hvordan skal vi lykkes
Vår visjon er at du som kunde skal føle deg som en av våre mange ambassadører. Det er bare en måte å sørge for at dere skal skryte hemningsløst av oss. Vi må sørge for at dere i pausen på arbeidsplassen koser dere med hver eneste kopp kaffe.

✔️Hvordan skapes våre verdier
Våre verdier skapes av fellesskapet. Vår kultur har ofte en tendens til å smitte over på våre kunder, og det tilrettelegger for at man lytter, forstår og gir råd! Sammen med våre kunder spiller vi hverandre gode, og dette gir oss konkurransefortrinnet som skal til for at man oppnår LYKKE I HVER KOPP.

✔️Hvordan sørge for kvalitet
Kvalitet hos oss finner man først og fremst i kulturen til Norsk Kaffe. Vi har det gøy på jobb hver dag, og dere der ute bidrar til dette. Dere skal oppleve det som enkelt og oversiktlig i hele prosessen med oss.

✔️Vi garanterer smaken
Vår kaffe produseres i samme by som vi holder til i, og det gjør at vi hele tiden har tett dialog med brenneriet. Dette sikrer smaksgaranti. Har dere vår kaffe på arbeidsplassen, vil våre smakseksperter alltid sørge for justeringer helt til dere er fornøyde.
A handmade universe

At Silkeborg Uldspinderi, wool is our foundation. We have worked with wool for three generations. From the lightest and softest qualities to heavy and warm Scandinavian wool; as well as from raw wool to the finished product.

Silkeborg Uldspinderi was established in 1987, but our know-how with regard to the material goes all the way back to the late 1940s when the spinning mill that later formed the basis of Silkeborg Uldspinderi was founded. 

Today, the old wool spinning mill is transformed into a modern Danish design brand with a focus on fine craftsmanship and sustainable design in both wool and alpaca.

Vi specialdesigner bæredygtige kvalitetskasketter af meget høj kvalitet, helt fra bunden - primært af genbrugsplast til start-ups, organisationer, foreninger, virksomheder, kommuner og andre fællesskaber.

Vi skaber en unik identitetsfølelse af et dansk interessefællesskab, hvor der er plads til alle uanset køn, alder, samfundslag, etnicitet, seksualitet, politisk- eller religiøs overbevisning - vi er med til at omfavne mennesket, for dem de er.

Det gør vi gennem vores unikke moderigtige kvalitetskasketter med fokus på bæredygtighed, derfor er vi sat i verden for at inkludere, støtte og skabe sammenhold. 

Vores kasket er designet til at forene. Af dig, af os – i fællesskab.

Kasketten er budbringeren, du er fanebæreren.

VORES KONCEPT
E-baren er din nye online bar, som du altid har lige ved hånden. Vores skønne cocktails er nu kun få klik væk på mobilen. Vi laver dine cocktails med det samme og leverer dem direkte til din dør, så du slipper for besværet. Nu skal det være  slut med flade dåsebajer og lunkne sodavandsopblandinger. Holder du fest, hygger du i parken, eller vil du forkæle din tinder date? Så kan du regne med os. Vi bestræber os på at give dig den perfekte cocktailoplevelse, hvor mødet mellem det visuelle og smagen vil ramme dig lige i hjertet.

HVEM ER VI?
Vi er to venner Malte og Benjamin, som sammen har stiftet E-baren. Vi har kendt hinanden siden vi var små og har arbejdet inden for restaurations- og barbranchen i mange år. I lang tid har vi gået med drømmen om at starte vores eget, og da ideen om E-baren opstod, var vi ikke i tvivl. Til dagligt færdes vi i et inspirerende miljø af dygtige folk, der deler vores passion for cocktails. Vi elsker klassikerne, men vi kan heller ikke lade være med at eksperimentere med nye smage.

Hos Watery giver vi mere sikker og inspirationsfyldt svømning på tværs af aldersgrupper og niveauer. Nærmere har vi hjulpet +75.000 danskere og +6.000 svenskere siden Daniel Johannesen, tidl. elitesvømmer, lancerede Watery 1. Oktober 2016. I dag er Watery den klart største svømmeudstyrs-forhandler i Skandinavien med 7.500 varenumre fra de største svømmebrands, men...

... Visionen med Watery er meget større. Watery skal være det nye globale direct-to-counsumer-svømmebrand med egen produktion af kvalitets-høje og ny-tænkende svømme-produkter. På nuværende tidspunkt har vi 46 produkter, men skal have yderligere 400 over de næste 2 år.

I August 2020 rykkede vi fra 300 kvm. til 1.600 kvm. ny-istandsatte lokaler lige skråt overfor Aqua Forum (svømmehallen) i 8700 Horsens, hvor 7 fuldtidsansatte og 6 time-ansatte hver dag knokler for at levere de fedeste facebook-annoncer, dag-til-dag levering altid og et smil på læben hos kunderne. 

Og ja, du har måske hørt om Watery og Daniel før? Vi deltog i Løvens Hule 2019, men valgte efterfølgende at sige nej til løverne, og i stedet tilføje tidl. CEO og nuværende bestyrelsesformand for Unisport A/S, Filip Domagala, samt de 4 founders af Hobbii ApS som investorer i Watery. Derudover har vi vundet og været nomineret til adskillige e-handelspriser. 

Vi søger altid skarpe og nytænkende folk - Vil du med på rejsen?

Our mission is simple; We want to create Playful Design. 
Design is more than meets the eye. Design must be experienced.

FableWood is quality wooden animals. Magnets allow you to disassemble and reassemble them as a three dimensional puzzle. The magic happens when you combine more animals! This way, you get to reassemble them into countless curious creations.

We are very passionate about making Danish Design playful, and we don’t compromise with quality and good craftmanship. We are engineers, product developers, designers and salesmen, and with all of the different tasks that these titles entail, every day we get the opportunity to bring our creativity into play. 

In collaboration with Eden Reforestation Projects, 5 trees are planted for every animal sold. We are very proud to be a Sapling Partner with Eden Projects and so far, we have contributed to the planting of more than 100.000 trees.

Danish Lucie Kaas has an eye for understated design that draws its influence from multiple sources. The brand collaborates with a range of international designers such as Lim+Lu, Christian Troels, Becky Kemp, and Masquespacio. The most recent product catalogue included lamps, tables, kokeshi dolls and design accessories for a trendy home.

Welcome to ATBO

Since 1967, ATBO has been supplying Danish consumers with classic, timeless solid wood shelving units, handmade by our own craftsmen at our workshop in Denmark. From the outset, the vision was to make quality furniture accessible to everyone and to share our love of durable, functional design. And it’s still the same today.

After producing durable craftsmanship for Danish consumers since 1967, we are now ready to take the next step on our journey. And it’s an ambitious one. The strategy is ready, and we are now on sound footing to create an international furniture company.

Our network of agents in Europe is in place, the offices opened in London, Paris, Oslo and Malmö with a strong new brand concept.

WHY spend time behind the mirror when you can spend your time DISCOVERING the world or creating memories with your LOVED ones. We WANT to make application as simple as throwing on a moisturizer. 
We DON'T want to hide your flaws, spackle your pores, or erase any other part that you are your 
fabulous YOU. We simply want to offer a SOLUTION so you can share what you want, when you want to and with whoever you feel like.

Vi hjälper företag att erbjuda sina anställda kvalitativa förmånscyklar som bidrar till bättre hälsa och ökad hållbarhet.

Vi har riktat in oss på cyklar av hög kvalité och säkerhet för bästa upplevelse för cyklisten. Konkurrensen för att rekrytera personal ökar ständig. Att kunna erbjuda de anställda en förmånscykel är för företaget ett kostnadseffektivt alternativ samtidigt som det är ett attraktivt erbjudande till personalen. 

Erbjudandet kan vara helt kostnadsfritt för företaget men det går även att företaget subventionerar förmånscykeln vilket ger lägre kostnad för medarbetarna.

Över 20 000 förmånscyklar är levererade i Sverige sedan 2015   

Företaget är den stora vinnaren på förmånscykel:
	Positiv image; attraherar nya medarbetare
	Förmånligt erbjudande till medarbetarna utan att det behöver kosta något
	Långsiktig hållbarhet (konkret miljöinsats)
	Konkret friskvårdsinsats med minskad sjukfrånvaro
	Minskat behov av parkeringsplatser på företaget

Förmånscykel är en mycket uppskattad förmån av medarbetarna:
	Kvalitetscykel till en låg månadskostnad
	Positiv miljöpåverkan
	Kostnadsbesparing; cykla till jobbet istället för att åka bil eller kollektivt
	Tidsbesparing; slippa sitta i bilköer 
	Tidseffektiv daglig träning och bättre hälsa
	Motionsredskap eller transportmedel på sin fritid
Totalt sätt är dessutom förmånscykel mer prisvärt jämfört med att köpa en cykel själv.

Locker Room Talk (LRT) är en svensk ideell organisation som vill skapa nästa generations förebilder och idrottsutövare genom att göra killarnas omklädningsrum till en tryggare plats så att de enkelt kan idrotta, mår bra och bli den bästa versionen av sig själv.

Locker Room Talk skapar målgruppsanpassade metoder med utgångspunkt inom lagidrotten- & skolans omklädningsrum för killar och deras ledare i jämställdhet, värdebaserat ledarskap, emotionell intelligens (EQ) och schyssta attityder. LRT identifierar andra rum som påverkar omklädningsrummet med anpassade metoder och jobbar med opinionsbildning för att uppnå en systemförändring i samhället på nationell och internationell nivå.

Karens bord er et serviceudlejningsfirma, der med unikke og personlige borddækninger ønsker at skabe nærværende rammer for et selskab eller et møde. Karens tror på, at enhver middag og et møde bliver bedre, hvis omgivelserne er personlige, fortællende og imødekommende. For at opnå dette bestræber vi os på at bruge produkter, der er håndlavede og producerede med en bæredygtig tankegang af ægte varme hænder og kreative hoveder - og krydre det med unikke vintage fund. 
Håndværk, æstetik, omtanke og nærvær er de bærende elementer i de produkter, vi bruger og de opdækninger, vi skaber. 

Du kan leje vores service og selv stå for opdækning og oppyntning, eller du kan leje vores service og også lade os stå for opdækningen og skabelsen af bordets visuelle udtryk. 

Kontakt os endelig, hvis du har spørgsmål eller ønsker at høre mere.

LOUISE ROE is a Copenhagen based interior design brand, established in 2010. Each and every object is sketched personally by Louise Roe with an artistic and edgy take on classics. The LOUISE ROE collection is sophisticated yet minimalistic, with a modern avantgarde style, and is always crafted from organic materials in carefully selected tones that highlight their sculptural and architectural features. The collection always pays attention to both aesthetics and high quality craftsmanship by skilled artisans, that truly has a long-lasting appeal.

We are a family owned tea company with a long traditions, specialized on a large variety of loose leaf teas. Our signature is high quality and innovative product portfolio.

 We export to multiple countries, for example to Russia, Sweden, Japan and Switzerland.

Modernity and traditional craft come together in an ever-evolving conversation at Rabens Saloner. Founded in 2007 by creative director Birgitte Raben, the house has become synonymous with contemporary, languid elegance dipped in swirls and splashes of colour. With a design team based in Copenhagen and an outpost in Bali where Birgitte spends six months out of the year, Rabens Saloner captures an adventurous eclecticism infused with a sensuous rock ‘n’ roll spirit.

Collaborating with a close-knit team of local Balinese artisans and dyers, authentic craftsmanship is distilled through Birgitte’s confident East-meets-West lens and translated into a wardrobe for today and beyond. The brand’s signature tie-dyes continually push creative boundaries, done entirely by hand with only the human eye as a guide, making each piece completely unique to the wearer.

Love, ease and abundance are the foundations for Birgitte’s visual language, celebrating individuality and the space to dream. Collections innately cater to the AM to PM wardrobe, where effortlessness and creativity collide in draped silhouettes that bring a sense of informality to the powerfully feminine.

Asap er et design- og reklamebureau. 

Vi bygger dit brand og skaber din virksomheds identitet. Hos os får du professionelt arbejde og respekt for din opgave. Du får også et engageret og imødekommende team, der elsker at være med til at skabe forandring. Både hos dig og i den verden, der omgiver os. Vi tror på at komme verden i møde alle de steder, der er brug for det.
 
Når du skal besøge os på bureauet, går du gennem vores galleri og showroom. Du kan også kigge ind, hvis du får lyst til at se, hvad vi laver, når vi ikke er på job. Vi ved ikke, om det er kunst. Men vi håber, at det gør en forskel, og vi elsker grafisk design med en mission. Den kærlighed praktiserer vi både i bureauets daglige arbejde, og når vi freestyler uden en briefing. 
 
På asap.dk/ashop kan du støtte kreativitet og social ansvarlighed ved at købe kunsttryk, plakater og bæredygtige papirvarer. Vi kalder det forandringsgrafik. En del af overskuddet går nemlig til at støtte projekter, der har et velgørende formål.

Bureau, galleri og butik ligger på Rosengården 8 lige ved Kultorvet i København. Med S-tog og metro kommer du stort set til døren, når du står af på Nørreport.
We simplify everyday work for Landscapers and Entrepreneurs. Making you work faster, with higher precision and less load.

Our name Sisterly is inspired by the word sister and sisterhood is one of our core values. We believe in women supporting and empowering each other and that by helping each other we all grow.

We provide Professional Grade DIY Ceramic Coatings for the Automotive, Marine and Aircraft industry. Our coatings are being used by many industry professionals and private individuals worldwide. 

Further to our products we also provide a commercial, ceramic coating cleaning system. The coating used in this cleaning system has been specifically engineered for the commercial vehicle industry and is considered the most advanced system of its kind. The coating and system is being used on planes, trains, trucks, wagons and various types of heavy machinery.

TASTY TREATS AND DELICIOUS DESIGN
We have selected some of the best from manufacturers of Danish gourmet confectionery and delicacies, as well as a selection of design products that represent Scandinavian style, innovation and a sustainable approach. Every product is made by a passionate Danish entrepreneur with love and respect for the craft and with the goal of creating something unique. This passion and dedication is something we would like to celebrate and share with you.

SPECIAL PRODUCTS FOR SPECIAL OCCASIONS 
Is your sweethearts birthday coming up? Did a colleague just have a baby? Would you like to treat your customers or employees with a Christmas present? We are happy to help you find the perfect gift for the occasion.

LAST MINUTE GIFTS
Did you forget a gift for the external speaker, or need a gift for the customer's reception this afternoon? We have gift boxes and gift bags ready in several different price ranges in the store; however, we can also quickly put together a gift of tasty treats and delicious design to suit the recipient's taste and your budget. Call us and we will have the gift nicely wrapped and ready for pickup in the store within a short time.

RECEPTIONS AND MEETINGS
Whether you are celebrating a success with a reception or you are having a meeting with customers, we offer a delicious selection of gourmet sweets, Sparkling Tea (low- or no-alcohol) from Copenhagen Sparkling Tea Company, organic juice and handmade “flødeboller” with marzipan bottoms from Anker Chokolade.

Contact us either by phone 7174 2714, email kontakt@nordictreats.dk or by visiting the store so we can talk about the many different options.

Aiways er blev etableret i 2017 af de to entreprenører Samuel Fu og Gary Gu. Teamet i udviklingsafdelingen og i produktionen tæller flere folk fra den etablerede bilindustri i Europa og Asien. 
Aiways repræsenteres i Danmark af Aiways Distribution Danmark A/S, som er ejet af Andersen Motors A/S, privat bilimportør gennem 25 år.

The founders of Medanta were united by their desire to create something better and by their strong belief in the importance of beautiful clothes in demanding professions. In our opinion, clothes in the health care industry needed freshening up. We wanted to add performance features to professional clothing and even more powerful design know-how.

The development work undertaken utilised the technical innovations in sportswear textiles. By carefully mapping our clients' needs and bringing together a selected circle of experts, it enabled us to produce our own materials. Today, Medanta Flex and Medanta Knit embody the very pinnacle of textile technology.

With our work, we aim to promote the well-being of people working in demanding tasks. Our work has meaning if we can make our client's work easier, more comfortable and aesthetically pleasing.

Our target is to produce workwear so that the environmental strain that they cause during their life cycle is as small as possible. Quality, product safety and the transparency of the production process are the cornerstones of responsibility.

We dare to think differently. We dare to challenge technology. We dare to fail and our comfort zone has expanded. We have developed the first elastic technical material to endure the industrial laundering. 

We have also created workwear collection which is motivating, it increases employee's commitment and improves the atmosphere at work. A trendy, functional work outfit creates a recognisable professional identity.

Today the competitors are trying to copy our desing and material. It is an honour. The world needs pioneers. It also means that the old traditional bulk is finally history. At the moment our design and development team is working with fresh ideas. We are happy to tell you soon more about antibacterial, wrinkle free and oil/dirt resistance coverings in Medanta Flex.

Work won't flow unless the workwear lets the professional flow with it.

Att leva låter och så ska det få vara. Ljud är liv, härliga samtal, springande fötter, skratt, gråt, bra musik men ibland kan det bara bli för mycket ljud, ljudnivån blir för hög och vi blir trötta, får huvudvärk och svårt att sova eller koncentrera oss. Våra moderna preferenser gällande avskalad form/design, öppen planlösning med stora fönsterpartier och hårda materialval gör att ljudmiljön försämras. Ljudet som vi skapar har ingenstans att ta vägen, det studsar runt och efterklangen gör vår hjärna trött

I dag när vi spenderar allt mer tid I våra egna moderna hem vill Poasana förbättra den upplevda ljudmiljön och den långsiktiga ljudhälsan. Våra ljudabsorbenter sänker ljudnivån och tar bort de högsta frekvenserna som påverkar oss negativt. Människor, vuxna som barn ska få fortsätta att låta, arbeta eller leka, ta plats, skratta och gråta UTAN att behöva tänka på hur högt det låter. Håll inte igen!

På maxer.dk handler det om styrketræning, kost, smerter og meget mere. Vi deler ekspertviden i form af videoer, podcasts og artikler, som kan hjælpe dig med at forbedre dine resultater. Uanset om du træner for styrke, smidighed, muskelmasse eller noget fjerde.

Maxer.dk blev startet i 2010 af Jacob Beermann. Vi savnede flere dansksprogede instruktionsvideoer på nettet, og derfor besluttede vi os for at producere egne videoer med Jacob som instruktør. Siden da har vi også lavet videoer med andre personlige trænere og eksperter indenfor kost og sundhed.

Vores mål er at gøre styrketræning og sundhed mere tilgængeligt. Både for den helt grønne begynder, som kæmper med at få teknikken på plads, og den garvede udøver med flere års erfaring, som leder efter avancerede tips. Vi deler ud af vores ekspertviden, så du kan tage din træning til næste niveau og få mest muligt ud af dine timer i træningscenteret.

Playfinity assembled in 2016 to become a force for good - realizing the global crisis on play, the decline in sports participation, and the growing physical and mental health concerns amongst children.

We're developing products, technology, and experiences that inspire, motivate, and connect children, coaches, parents, families, friends, and teammates around the world - providing new ways to discover, play, compete, and have fun together based on the sports they love.

Our ambition at Playfinity is to be the category leader in an emerging real-world gaming segment - combining gaming, sports, and physical activity in new and innovative ways.  

Putting the player in the center of the physical game - we’ve created fully-immersive experiences, with sound effects, music and live commentary - play by play.

The experiences that we create are built on our proprietary playOS platform combining sensors and mobile technology. playOS is designed as a system for repeatable development, allowing us to scale faster and cheaper for every new sport. Through this we’re targeting the 1.5+ Billion people playing sports, the $173B gaming industry, and the $388B sports industry.

Through partnerships in 2020 we launched Jump Games in Europe and in 2021 we followed up with Jump League in Australia - both trampoline inspired. 

In Fall of 2021 we launched the Backyard League Gaming Baseball in the United States, appealing to 24+ million players, 96% of whom are kids between the ages of 6-14 years. In the 2 months post-launch the Gaming Baseball earned #1 status for the holiday on Amazon Launchpad and was featured in Newsweek as the #2 technology gift for the holiday 2021.

Join Team Playfinity on our mission to impact millions of lives in youth sports!

BOOM Watches offers high-quality timepieces at an affordable price, and the opportunity to create the perfect personalized accessory to suit individual tastes and styles. Bounir is a Scandinavian based brand founded in Tribeca, New York City in late 2019 by Isolina Fedel. We are on a mission to disrupt the world of minimalistic and functional vegan accessories. Our goal is simple: to simplify your everyday life with products that last. By offering adhesive products and a wide spectrum of colors, you can create your own preferred combinations — from only a few products. This, aligned with our sustainable thinking, is how we can proudly contribute to slow fashion together.

Our design.

Every product is thoughtfully designed by the principles of minimalism, functionality, and consciousness, approved and certified by the world’s biggest animal organisation PETA. The products are designed for you who are always on the go, whether to the cinema, the French riviera, a hike in the Nordic mountains or a meeting — we’ve got you covered. All our packaging is FSC certified and 100% recyclable. We have eliminated plastic in all our packaging since it doesn’t serve any purpose (did you know it takes 100 years for Mother Nature to process a plastic bag?) Our dust bags are made out of raw organic cotton, which means it's not colored and contains no unnecessary chemicals.

Villahome.se är ett familjeägt företag med huvudsäte i Norrköping. I vår e-handel sätter vi fokus på försäljning av produkter inom bygg-, hem- och trädgårdsprodukter. Genom ett nära samarbete med välkända varumärken kan vi tillhandahålla produkter av högsta kvalitet inom kategorier som byggmaterial för hemrenovering, badrum, golv, och trädgård med flera.

Vi tror att vi, genom personlig kundservice, intresse och engagemang kan förenkla och förgylla vardagen för våra kunder. Vi ska vara det självklara valet för den pris- och kvalitetsmedvetna kunden vid val av byggvaruhus, samt leverera en fantastisk kundupplevelse.

We put bugs in juice. And it tastes great!

Syngja is a unique new Danish beverage. We make tasty, healthy juice and shots 
- with natural Vitamin B12 from crickets.

Syngja is the sustainable and mindful alternative. We make premium organic juice shots naturally enriched with insects 
- that benefit your health, promote vitality and challenge the norms.

Syngja is only 99% normal. Because our juice is naturally enriched with 1% cricket 
- which equivalents roughly 30 crickets in one bottle. 

This brings a subtle taste of umami to the beverage and is a natural, sustainable source of Vitamin B12 
- to help build protein in the body. 

Our crickets are grind into an extremely fine powder, and thereafter infused into the liquid via pasteurization. 
All our fruits and vegetables are organic - with no added sugars or preservatives.

STUDIO FEDER is Scandinavian simplicity in the shape of sustainable design.
The Danish brand is a on a journey towards creating conscious  and simultaneously aesthetic designs for the home.
The STUDIO FEDER design philosophy believes that interior design can be functional and aesthetic at the same time with a conscious approach whenever possible.
This philosophy characterizes every item in the STUDIO FEDER collection which caters for the grown-ups, the little ones and everyone in between.
The promise of premium quality and pure uncomplicated design.
STUDIO FEDER  offers affordable luxury indulging design lovers and the quality conscious audience with irresistible items.

We care about the environment and we care about the social responsibility.

STUDIO FEDER is a GOTS certified company. The Global Organic Textile Standard is recognized as the world's leading processing standard for textiles made from organic fibres.
This includes regulations for both production and social responsibility.
We take responsibility for the environment and for our children and for the people who are manufacturing our products.

STUDIO FEDER is on a mission to create long lasting products that fit the interior of the modern family.
The design is minimal bringing an understated message: representing aesthetics with an ethical approach where every piece is created with care and consideration.

Nördic Certified Cables – kvalitet som håller

FR Supply AS is a company based in Oslo.

We offer a variety of flame retardant products for the corporate market, as well industrial kitchen appliances and assecories, first aid products, protective clothing and profiling products. We supply mostly to the maritime industry, but also to other institutions and companies in need of products from our wide range. Feel free to contact us if you do not find what you are looking for. We are proud suppliers of well-known Norwegian brands such as Wonderland, Devold of Norway, Høie of Scandinavia, MP Storkjøkken, Snøgg and Wenaas. Our focus is on delivering quality products at the lowest prices. We are committed to service and you as a customer. 

During our time of operation, we have delivered goods to many maritime customers in Norway. Several of them are the largest shipping companies in Western Norway, but we also deliver to oil rigs, nursing homes, correctional facilities, etc. By tailoring each order to individual needs, we have established reciprocal relationships that have led to further collaboration, as well as excellent customer satisfactory.

In the process of putting together the assortment our primary focus was to make sure that product features were of the best quality. In addition, it was important that there was a recognition factor amongst the people which use our products. That’s why we decided to use Norwegian quality manufacturers that our clients have a relationship with from before. We emphasised the importance of durability of fabrics and state of the art materials. As of now, some of our products has been in usage for more than five years, and our customers are still reporting of excellent product condition.

We design clothing you just don't only work out in but you will want to spend the rest of your day in. We are a lifestyle brand with the perfect fusion of fashion, performance and function. 

It isn't just about finding the right clothing, but a mindset and a movement. It is about living an active and balanced life by doing things that inspire you to reach you goals.

Our collections include:

Lemus giver dig den perfekte balance mellem design, teknologisk ekspertise og følelsesmæssig appel - udformet i en stadig voksende kollektion, der spejler sig i vores vision "The future sound of HOME"​. 

Lemus som blev skabt i 2014, udnytter sin unge alder og udfordrer alle nuværende tendenser i lydens univers. 365 dage om året, bliver der arbejdet på at skabe nye produkter, der vil forme fremtidens indretning og lyd i én.  

Lemus'​ vision er, at integrere lyd i hjemmet og gøre det til en del af hjemmets indretning. Vi vil ændre måden vi tænker lyd i vores hjem, og med vores nye kollektion; Lemus HOME, integrerer vi lyd i smukke danskdesignet møbler til hjemmet. 

Lemus HOME er blot første skridt på vejen og ved, at tilbyde nye unikke innovative lydmøbler, der skaber nye katagorier ved banebrydende design, vil Lemus nå sin mission om, at blive førende leder indenfor integreret designlyd til hjemmet. 

Lemus er; 

The future sound of HOME

Lirumlarumleg.dk blev grundlagt af Anja Lytzen en forårsdag i 2006. Siden den spæde start har hovedkontoret med lager og showroom ligget i Hornbæk, mens vores prisvindende online shop har vokseværk og i dag findes både i Danmark og Norge. Sammen med vores medarbejdere, kunder, leverandører, samarbejdspartnere, følgere og støtter glæder vi os hver dag over at gøre børnelivet eventyrligt!

Vores hjerter banker for at gøre leg til eventyrlige åndehuller, hvor store og små glemmer tid og sted. Ikke bare på dage med magisk overskud, men især i en hektisk hverdag fuld af støj og tempo. 

Vi gør os oprigtigt umage for at hjælpe børns voksne, så de nemt og overskueligt kan skabe inspirerende rammer, hvor leg bliver kilde til hygge, sjov, nærvær og fordybelse. For os er det vigtige værdier i livet med børn. Derfor deler vi inspiration i hverdagshøjde på de sociale medier og i vores eget univers, og fylder online shoppen med nøje udvalgt kvalitetslegetøj til børn i alderen 0-10 år, interiør til børneværelset, babyudstyr og accessories og giver kundeservice med hjertet, uanset om vi binder sløjfer eller bytter gaver. 

. . .

Anja Lytzen blev i 2010 kåret til IVÆKSTprisen "Årets kvindelige iværksætter"​. Lirum Larum Leg vandt samme år E-handelsprisen for "Bedste Netbutik"​ i kategorien B2C for mindre virksomheder, og i 2015 blev vi kåret som "Bedste legetøjsbutik"​ ved Børn i byen-prisen.

Seatbags has in recent years experienced a renaissance. Our goal from the start has been to create the best Seatbag. The result is called SACKit and is a series of his bag, where all parameters have been optimized.

From being a fun gadget it´s now becoming mainstream. After SACKit had gained a foothold in Denmark and Norway, it is now come to Sweden with standard software released under the brand SACKit. The design is made by the famous French fashion designer Julien soone. Made from the quality that characterizes all products from SACKit.

All businesses are looking for innovative advertising values. Therefore, we started to make their bags with graphics and logos for different types of businesses. Take the well-known and popular their bags from SACKit and add your company logo or graphic design from the company, and the result is not likely to slow in coming - a real eye catcher and lounge feel. We think we've found a product with broad demand - from small businesses to big brands.

In the summer of 2012 extended Sack IT product range to include a mini speaker - the name is WOOFit. A wireless mini speaker for large format with bluetooth. WOOFit has also won several awards in the electronics testing magzins against other mini speakers in both Denmark and Norway. A perfect gift for staff and events.

We would also like to thank web agency Sitelife.se in Stockholm for their commitment to get all the digital channels to become extremely good and in record time.

Fat Moose was founded in Scandinavia in 2010 and has remained true to its roots of traditional craftmanship, performance wear, modern technology and adventure. Since then the brand has become a cult phenomenon finding its position as an outdoor performance brand for the modern man. 

Focused around the passion for extreme sports and adventure the use of high quality fabrics and breathable materials is key to Fat Moose. Our collections have focus on durable, comfortable rain wind- and storm proof leightweight jackets that are as tough as armour, but also with a fashion perspective in mind. What makes us different? 
Buchardt Audio is a Danish based high-end loudspeaker manufacturer. Our goal is to provide state-of-the-art sound at an affordable price. We have succeeded in this task with the help of some of the most talented developers and engineers in the industry. Our speakers are the product of a long and meticulous design process.

Don't let the cost of our speakers dissuade you. They can compete with products well above their price range.

Reaching these prices without compromise is impossible. If compromises on the product and development processes are not an option, we need to look elsewhere. We have eliminated expensive marketing, distributors, agents and Hi-Fi dealers. By selling directly to the end user, we eliminate about 60-70% of the cost in comparison to our competitors. Direct sales is not anything new. More and more small companies are doing this. What makes us different is that we rely on big scale production where we produce thousands of speakers in batches, so we benefit from the best possible prices on the parts we use.    

Our focus is purely on consistent performance and quality. To achieve this, we outsource production to a company that knows what it’s doing, and can handle the large scale production we need. The company is the respected Danish/Chinese-owned Company: Hansong in Nanjing, China. Hansong has extensive experience in manufacturing for some of the most well known High-End Hi-Fi brands in the world! 

To us, it is of vital importance that the production facility we use offers the best working conditions for the employees. Hansong offers special healthcare benefits to all employees along with apartments and free electric bus rides to the city. Hansong is ISO 9001 certified and has facilities in China, Denmark and USA.

Our products are finally shipped to our warehouse in Denmark where we do an final quality control before shipping to our customers.

Gladiator er et forlag på kanten.

Vi udgiver dansk litteratur fra oldtiden til i dag. Principielt set. Det vil sige den litteratur, der udvider undersøgelserne af hjernens geografi. We proudly present and welcome you to the universe and concept store of HARRESØ. HARRESØ is a culturally empowered, creatively driven concept store located in the heart of downtown Kolding.

Having a personal interest in fashion, the two brothers, who have worked within the fashion industry for the majority of their life’s, decided that it was time for them to create their own universe within fashion. The outcome of years of wishful thinking combined with hard work became a reality, ultimo 2015, when they opened the doors at HARRESØ Concept Store.

Since day one it has been our main goal not only to sell garments, but also to inspire and develop a collaborate coherency, all based on the lifestyle and personal interest of the brothers. We strive to serve our costumers with a personal experience. When visiting HARRESØ you therefore will be met with a personal serving by the brothers together with our crew, also known as our small ”family”.

We accentuate personal relations between all parts – costumers as well as brands. We excel to handpick our brands to serve you the latest and contemporary trends. The key in our selection is the fusion between upcoming small labels versus international brands. We identify us with every brand we carry in the store – mostly because we aesthetically truly believe in them.

Each day it’s an onward process towards developing the identity of HARRESØ, as it is our urge and vision to make sure we share our latest and greatest sources of inspiration. 

We hope to see you in the near future.

Team HARRESØ

For us, it means designing the best products, providing the best customer experience, the best community, and the best work environment we can only manage for ourselves and for everyone who buys FITJEANS. It is our job every day to decide what is best for our customers and for us.

We are a fast-growing global brand, with all the exciting challenges it brings. ENAMEL Copenhagen er et dansk smykkebrand, der har eksisteret siden 2012. Rejsen startede i en lille kælder og er i dag et af de bedst solgte smykkebrands i Skandinavien og godt på vej ind på det europæiske marked.

ENAMEL betyder emalje og har altid været et kendetegn ved smykkerne. I dag ses den fine farverige emalje som en skøn detalje på en stor del af smykkerne.

Legende lethed, moderne klassikere, yndefuld elegance og et strejf af humor. Det er filosofien bag smykkebrandet ENAMEL Copenhagen – et brand, der har godt fat i forbrugerne, og som er leveringsdygtigt i ikke bare nytænkende design og høj kvalitet, men også i moderne klassikere.

Det, der virkelig kendetegner ENAMEL Copenhagen er det legende lette, feminine univers. Smykkerne er et frisk pust til modebranchen med prisvenlige smykker, der adskiller sig fra det klassiske smykkebillede.

Smykker skaber historier og bringer mennesker tættere sammen. Det gælder også ENAMEL Copenhagens smykker.

The STYLE COLLECTION HOME Story began with a vision to offer products that will be the best option seen from both design, functionality and sustainability aspects. We are tired of only being offered solutions that means a compromise in one or more of these areas. We want it all and we aim to offer it all. Whether you as a consumer are looking for good design, functionality or all of them - by choosing our STYLE COLLECTION HOME you are by default making a good decision in all of these areas. Shopping sustainable and beautiful should not be something that should exclude one another. We believe that by creating what we refer to as sustainable elegance - will make this vision reality. We aim to make your everyday a little better with interior solutions and home decor that with its elegant design will last for long yet that will support a sustainable future by having circular capabilities. 

The products and solutions are designed and manufactured in Scandinavia minimising the carbon footprint as well as using biodegradable, recycled, recyclable and other environmentally friendly materials to a wide extent. Our core material is rPLA which is a bioderived material originally produced from corn starch but recycled again from food packaging waste sourced in the EU. 

By using an original expression we provide you with an elegant design of home decor products. With our solutions made of materials with circular capabilities we create and add sophisticated and organisational elements to your everyday environment where you can build, add and also change along the way. Collecting stylish solutions throughout life - Style Collection.

SIDENÖRNGOTTETS 5 SUPERSTYRKOR

The Original Dico Copenhagen boots were made in several natural colors as Dark tan, Light tan, Brown and Charcoal black, and presents cool and stylish fashion for the quality conscious consumer. Ion Game Design (ION) is a Swedish board game developer, publisher & board game consultant agency. We believe in the potential of boardgames as and art form, an excellent form of social relations and a creative tool. Since 2018 we also publish all Phil Eklund's games under the label Sierra Madre Games (SMG). Together we develop educational boardgames covering a broad range of subjects in science, history, prehistory, and natural history.
 
There are the three main divisions in the product portfolio of Ion Game Design:

ION:SMG - Under this label we mainly make “heavier” historical & scientific board games in the “hobby” category.

ION:LIGHT - Under this label we publish our lighter games, geared towards family settings, with a lesser degree of complexity, without loosing the inspiration from reality in our designs.

ION:VENTURE - We will from time to time work with potential projects alongside our main labels. This can be:
- Partnerships with other board game developers and developers of digital games.
- Consultancy in (board) game design.
- Development of games outside our two main focus areas.
- Game related activities such as fairs, conventions, competitions, demonstrations to promote it’s games and generally expand the hobby.
- Business ideas that does not necessarily include game design but that do include games :)

Runteq is a sports technology company that develops revolutionary skill evaluation products for recreational runners. Our solution helps runners to develop their running technique, running economy and prevent injury.

Verden er et fragmenteret sted, hvor vi nogle gange glemmer hinanden. Hos os ser vi det at sidde sammen over et godt måltid som den korteste vej til hinanden. Der er intet som at sidde rundt om et bord med dem, man holder allermest af. At have tid til hinanden og gøre måltidet til centrum for, at der bliver talt, grinet og hygget. Og at der bliver lagt planer om, at gøre verden til et bedre sted at være. At dele et måltid er at tage en pause fra verden, og bare være sammen.

Vores mission er, at der skal stå en flaske Sens Food dressing på alle borde, hvor der bliver delt et måltid.

Vi elsker mad, og vi vil gerne have det til at smage af lidt mere. For os er mad ikke bare noget, vi stopper i munden – det er en oplevelse. Vores dressing er no bullshit, og vi lover at dine gæster vil elske dig, når du sætter en flaske Sens Food Dressing på bordet.

Vi har lavet dressing siden 2004. I begyndelsen langede vi vores pizzadressing over disken i vores pizzeria i Morsø i Nordjylland. Udgangspunktet har altid været at lave en dressing, som vi selv havde lyst til at spise, men vi vidste, at vi havde fat i noget, da kunderne begyndte at bede om at kunne købe dressingen med hjem. Siden har vi forfinet opskriften, og nye dressinger er kommet til. Vores DNA er pizzadressing, men vi har gjort det til vores mission at vi vil gøre alle måltider lidt lækrere.

Repolar Pharmaceuticals Ltd is a family firm founded in 2006. The company researches, develops, produces and markets preparations for the treatment of wound, skin and nail bacterial and fungal inflammations, the effectiveness of which stems from the properties of components refined from the resin of the Finnish forest spruce (Picea abies). The headquarter of the Repolar Pharmaceuticals Ltd is located in Espoo and the company has production facilities in Kolari, Lapland. The company is a member of the Finnish Family Firms Association.

We thought there was a certain type of shoes missing in the market,
so we set out to establish a Lola Ramona  in order to make them ourselves.

“Lola Ramona shoes are a small piece of art you can carry on your feet”

Holmtaiki.com is a brand community and webshop for Taishō, Seramikku and Ida Holm. 


Taishō began with the fascination of similarities and contrasts between the Japanese and Scandinavian. In our first work together “Hungry Geisha” we focused on the contrasts which gave us the inspiration for our company name. In general we are inspired by contrasts, no matter if it is a contrast in culture, shape, color or others.

We’re a horse centric company breaking new ground in the equestrian world. With the Swedish equestrian and Olympian Lisen Bratt Fredricson in the lead we curate and create products for the horse, rider, stable and home.

It all started with a simple idea: to make pure, safe and highly absorbable products that we would use ourselves and give to our family.

Aarja Health® products are crafted using the purest and the most efficient ingredients in the world to create safe and highly absorbable solutions to support a healthy lifestyle. Aarja Health® is made for everyone - our products are vegan, GMO-free, gluten-free and lactose-free. We also avoid using unnecessary additives - for us, it is all about purity and efficiency.

Aarja means 'Energy' in the Sami language. Our roots are far up north in the land of wild nature, where our Sami forefathers have lived in harmony with nature - and depended upon it for food and medicine. The cold climate gives the plants a unique strength and life force. We have listened to this wisdom and carefully chosen Nordic ingredients in our supplements, that will give the best effect for your health and energy. Good health is easy as nature has all the answers for holistic wellbeing.

Mehta Heino Industries Oy was founded in 2015 with the aim to develop new, cost- effective and easy-to-use 3D printers, together with an excellent user experience. We believe that 3D Printing is a tool that can be used everywhere by everyone.

The company’s first product, MHI3D Printer is a 3D printer based on new solutions developed by us, based on existing FFF/FDM technology. Learning to use MHI3D Printer takes only few minutes and it saves machine users time and effort with industrial level build quality and no daily adjustments needed.

The machine’s high-end technical solutions helps to solve 3D printing problems faced with average priced desktop 3D Printers (such as bed levelling & nozzle calibration). MHI3D Printer combines reliable industrial 3D Printing experience with easy to use, affordable technology that fits on the desktop. It creates a new era of high-quality desktop-sized 3D-printing for filament-based 3D Printer machines

For your application, MHI3D Printer saves time and effort and enables you to focus on ideas, design and utilisation of parts time and again.
Our printers helps to keep project costs affordable and bridges desktop- manufacturing to industrial level 3D printers. It's the perfect fit for repeating commercial work or for accurate prototyping parts.

For example, MHI3D Printer can be used to quickly build prototypes and test ideas immediately in product development. It is able to make small series production without difficulty test R&D parts on a small scale faster than ever before. The parts produced by the machine are interchangeable, accurate and constant quality.

Dansk ejet webshop med lækre kvalitetsprodukter der gør det nemt at forkæle en medarbejder, forretningsforbindelser, jer selv eller en der har gjort sig fortjent til en lille extra ting.

description:
The Original Tech Jewelry for AirPods and AirPods Pro

Tapper is pioneering the new way to wear your AirPods. Stockholm-based Tapper is an innovative fashion-tech brand that creates the original straps, chains and metal cases for AirPods and AirPods Pro plated in precious metals. Tapper launched at the iconic concept store colette in Paris on the 1st of March 2017. 

Tapper’s debut product is a lamb leather strap with brass details, designed to magnetically snap your AirPods around your neck for convenient and hassle-free usage. Today the Tapper range includes nylon straps, leather straps, rope chains and metal neck cases for AirPods and AirPods Pro plated in 18K gold, 925 silver and hematite black that steps up your AirPods game beyond what you thought was even possible for a statement accessory. Handcrafted and designed in Sweden, Tapper also offers a solid 18K gold mesh chain for AirPods and AirPods Pro, like fine jewelry for your AirPods. In short, Tapper has become the must-have AirPods accessory brand. 

Available at SSENSE, Selfridges, Nordstrom, Saks Fifth Avenue, Bloomingdale’s, Flannels, KITH Paris, LEGACY Paris, SKP Beijing

Founded in 2016 - Launched at colette in 2017 - Designed in Sweden

www.gettapper.com
hey@gettapper.com
We are a business accessories brand for women. Sustainably produced at an affordable price. Designed in Sweden, handcrafted in Estonia.

Allsize Company Group er en international virksomhed som ejer følgende brands: REPLIKA JEANS, North 56°4 & SUIT.
                                        
Med REPLIKA JEANS & North 56°4 er vi i dag Europas førende Big & Tall leverandører på herresiden med størrelser fra S-8XL.

Vi er samlet set repræsenteret på mere end 40 markeder på verdensplan, 85% af vores omsætning er eksport

A new, exciting startup based in Copenhagen. Operating within the meal kit industry. With a subscription-based food service model. We aim to position ourselves as the first, organic, orgasmic pasta meal kit in Denmark offering vegetarian and gluten free options.We want to shift consumers’ perception of the “Italian food experience.” Mass consumption and a fast-paced lifestyle has made this experience monotonous, with mass produced pasta that has cheap ingredients and always paired with the same 4 standard sauces. It’s time to add a little color, a little spice! As Italians living abroad, we noticed that the average person outside of Italy struggles to have the true Italian experience. Their lack of knowledge in the Italian cuisine makes them only experience it in restaurants or with their Italian friends if they are lucky to have themWe are providing new and innovative options for people who want to taste healthy and fantastic Italian food in the comfort of their own home. Making it accessible and easy to do! So, no major cooking skills or knowledge is needed.

companyName: Nordic Nutriment ApS, VitaYummy, Team Minimates
description: Vi er et dansk vitaminfirma, med base i Roskilde. Vi ønsker at være relevant og vi følger tendenser for at sætte ind, hvor vi føler, at vi kan gøre en forskel. Derfor udvikler vi nye produkter, når vi opdager problemer, vi kan være med til at løse. Vi er sjove, fordi vi er formet som vingummi, men dybt seriøse når det kommer til indhold. Vi går aldrig på kompromis, og alt hvad vi gør er med respekt for den sidste nye viden inden for vores felt.

O`TAY udtales som OKAY – blot med T. 

En sød lille talefejl i Stephanies meget unge år gav inspiration til navnet til vores nye danske tøjbrand

O`TAY er et brand skabt af mor og datter. Et feminint online univers med fokus på Affordable Luxury. Vores store fælles glæde for at formidle velvære og stil via tøj & tilbehør har vi har nydt at kunne dele. Vi har i mange år leget med tanken om at kunne skabe en virksomhed sammen, hvor vores kreative ideer og tanker kunne gavne andre end os selv.

O’TAY er et feminint online univers, hvor du som kunde er i fokus. Vi har skabt et univers, hvor der er fokus på detaljer, kvalitet og tilgængelighed. Vi skaber kollektioner, der både kan bruges af yngre – og lidt ældre, smarte piger.
Vi vil væk fra ”køb og smid væk” kulturen og skabe mode, man har lyst til at bruge igen og igen. En stil – og materialer – der holder, blot sat sammen på forskellige måder.

Vores materialevalg og samarbejdspartnere har været gennem en kritisk rejse, for vi kræver lækkerhed og kvalitet til overkommelige priser. Det skal være tøj, som vi vil forkæle os selv med at tage på og gå ud i verden og udstråle selvsikkerhed og livsglæde.

Der er ikke et skel mellem generationer i forhold til, hvad man kan tage på. Det drejer sig udelukkende om, hvem du er, hvad du har det godt i, og hvad du gerne vil udstråle.

Føler man sig godt tilpas – så kan verden bare komme an! Ordsproget ”Klæder skaber folk” er sagt af en meget viis person, og det er så rigtigt. Vi ønsker med vores brand O`TAY at skabe en unik stil der også matcher noget du allerede har i din garderobe.

The products promote abundant yields and serve as part of the everyday surroundings of people and businesses. In addition to growing useful plants, the systems increase the attractiveness of various spaces.

Se vihreämpi vaihtoehto 

Yrityksemme syntyi halusta elää tasapainoisemmassa maailmassa ja olla tuottamatta ylimääräistä  jätettä tai saastetta. Vuodesta 2012 olemme noudattaneet tätä ohjenuoraa tarkasti. Jokainen tuote jonka valitsemme myyntiin  on luotu huomioiden tuotteen koko elinkaari ja sen aiheuttama rasitus ympäristölle ja terveydelle. Verkkokaupastamme löydät  eko-sertifioidut puhdistustuotteet sekä kuluttajille että yrityksille.
Jättämällä yhteydenottopyynnön saat avuksesi asiakasneuvojan , joka etsii yrityksellesi ympäristöystävälliset ja raskasmetallivapaat tulostustarvikkeet. 

Liity mukaan kasvavaan kestävänkehityksen joukkoomme ja tee ympäristöystävällisempi valinta luopumatta toimintatehokkuudesta!

Schormand was established in 2012 to offer a timeless fashion collection in a modern Scandinavian design with elegant colors. Our style reflects the dynamic everyday life of the modern urban man.

Our models are made in collaboration with designer Graham Addinall, who was for more than 18 years Head of Men’s Mainline collection at Paul Smith. We are proud to say that every piece of clothing we produce is our own and unique.

The vision of our collections is to create freedom for our customers. All our pieces are easy to combine with each other to create the right style regardless if the occasion is formal or casual. Basically, we want our customers to be able to style themselves with Schormand even in the dark!

JustEgg stands for health, purity, quality and bioavailability. After many years of experience in elite sports and the fitness industry, we have gained a deep knowledge of wellbeing, nutrition and performance. JustEgg creates the opportunity for the consumer to easily access a cleaner and quality-assured nutrition for both body and soul, A and O for both well-being and maximum recovery. All our products are egg white based and are always completely dairy free, lactose free, gluten free and cholesterol free to prevent harmful inflammation in the body.

PHOTOS & PRINTS
POD Gift Shop - camillasimonsen.com - since 2020
Files + print - camillasimonsen.store - since 2021

- Buy stock photos (Shutterstock, Wirestock, Adobe Stock, Colourbox) or digital images with exclusive use for your online and offline marketing.

- Buy different unique prints for your home, office or body on camillasimonsen.com and camillasimonsen.store. 

Add color to your everyday life. Colors bring joy.

Come and see my showroom in Fredericia.
Book an appointment on 60 87 30 08.

I want to help you see, enjoy, remember and appreciate life's unique moments.

Most prints are made from a photo - a unique moment - I have captured. Life is full of unique moments, but we may tend to forget or overlook them. When I got an old camera as a child and discovered how to capture ‘a moment’, I was fascinated. I loved the idea of capturering ‘moments in life’. I think we can get better at remembering and appreciating the unique moments - maybe where we are (most) happy? Appreciate the unique moments. Life is short.

 Let my products be your daily reminder.

---

- Learn how to optimize your website or webshop.

- Get help choosing the right CMS, structure, theme and plugins. Get feedback on choice of colors, images and setup.

- Get started with WordPress or get help with your current solution.

- Take advantage of my experience with social media and online tools.

At Goldfit, we take great pride in providing you as a customer with the best service in everything
from when you visit our website to when you have our products in hand. The name Goldfit has
been carefully conceived because we want to create a brand and a range of products based solely
on quality – from the start of production through to delivery of the product. We want to give you,
as customers, a sense of exclusivity and quality when using our products. All this must be felt,
tasted and felt on our carefully selected assortment. Everything is chosen with heart to give you
the best possible experience and progress towards your goals.
"NATURAL, NO SYNTHETIC TASTE AND MOST IMPORTANTLY, NO LUMPS"
Our protein powder comes directly from professional dairy farmers. Our focus is the taste and
texture. We all know that shaken can be hard to get down after the twentieth time. With us,
customers can look forward to drinking it without forcing it down. By minimizing the number of
additives, we are now launching a new product on the market of which we are extremely proud.
Our protein powder is Danish produced and has a clean natural taste. It is easily soluble and can
be shaken in 1 - 2 seconds, and has no added sugar. In addition, you will find a high protein
content, in GoldFit protein powder.

We are a multidisciplinary design studio creating and curating interiors and product design. 

With creativity and sustainability in our hearts we do full interiors, styling, set design, product design and furniture design.

In all our projects we aim to have a sustainable and circular approach. We constantly search vintage interior and objects to be used within our projects. We costumize each project from its unique conditions together with our client.

Follow us on Instagram @kollaget_studio to find out the latest news.

We love vintage and want you to love it too! Check out our vintage shop online at kollaget.com.
A one man band design and merchandise production company working from his basement. Trying to live the DIY dream.

I Framing People fremstiller vi rammer. 

Vi har idé om, at det hverken skal være raketvidenskab eller koste en bondegård at få indrammet sine værker. Uanset, om det er en plakat til 100 dkk eller et originalt kunstværk til 100.000 dkk. 

I Skive har vi vores egen 700 kvm fabrik, hvor vi fremstiller rammerne selv. Kvaliteten går vi ikke på kompromis med, men vi går især meget op i at kunne tilbyde rammer til den bedste pris og hurtigste levering. 

Du kan bestille dine rammer via vores webshop, og det tager ikke mere end 5 minutter. 

.. og hvis vi kan hjælpe med stort som småt, så skal du endelig bare række ud.
