Møblerne bliver lavet af kasserede møbler fra danske genbrugspladser eller virksomheder. Vi indsamler træ fra 3 genbrugspladser i 3 danske kommuner indtil videre og indgår i samarbejder med virksomheder og kommuner for at genbruge deres brugte møbler til nye møbler. 

Vores møbler bliver produceret af folk på kanten af arbejdsmarkedet, det kan være folk med større eller mindre handicaps, indsatte eller borgere på kanten af den kriminelle verden, som arbejder danske socialt økonomiske værksteder. 
af træ fra danske genbrugspladser. 

Vi sigter efter at lave lokale loops af genbrugsmaterialer, hvor hverken mennesker eller planeten bliver belastet.

For mere info kontakt Daniel på 91721817 eller info@reladesign.dk

Luxreaders is an international online shop with glasses for women and men. The company has created an innovative and digital platform with a wide range of glasses with fast delivery.

Today reading glasses are not just about strengthening their eyesight. In our eyes it is also about design, aesthetics, craftsmanship and quality. At Luxreaders we unite innovation and technology in a Danish luxury glasses concept at an affordable price. We think everyone should be able to look good. And looking good.

Luxreaders has a strong capital base and 25 years of experience from the spectacle industry.

Östersjösten Aktiebolag levererar kalksten till privatpersoner och företag helt enligt kundens önskemål. Tack vare flexibel stenförädlingsproduktion med en modern maskinpark kan vi erbjuda allt från golvplattor i mindre volymer till helt unika former i kalksten.

companyName: Animalia- Norwegian Meat and Poultry Research Center
description:
Animalia’s mission is to add value, reduce cost and create trust in the Norwegian meat and poultry industry.

To achieve this we believe in international cooperation. Collaboration with others contributes to finding “best practise” solutions for our customers, and challenges the Norwegian industry to benchmark itself against international companies. Animalia’s strengths are to provide new knowledge and targeted actions throughout the whole production chain, from animal husbandry via slaughtering and cutting, to processing and finally the meat or poultry product.

Bæredygtighed og blomster er ikke to ord, der normalt følges ad. Hos Living Flowers har vi gjort det til vores mission at sikre, at alle kan få en smuk buket blomster ind i hjemmet på en grøn og bæredygtig måde. Living Flowers er grundlagt af en familie fra Aarhus, og vi producerer bæredygtige og langtidsholdbare buketter af høj kvalitet, håndbundet på vores binderi udenfor Aarhus. Vi giver forbrugeren en unik mulighed for at træffe gode og klimavenlige valg i hverdagen, uden at gå på kompromis med kvalitet, forbrug og æstetik. 

Vores drøm er at blive det foretrukne alternativ til den almindelige, friske blomsterbuket, og vi gør på den måde op med “køb-og-smid-væk”- kulturen, som den afskårne blomsterindustri bærer præg af. Vores bæredygtige buketter står flot i minimum 6 måneder og reducerer derfor forbrugerens CO2-aftryk med 99 %*, sammenlignet med en almindelig, frisk buket. 

Vores rejse mod en mere bæredygtig fremtid er i gang, og derfor arbejder vi aktivt for at støtte op om FN’s 17 verdensmål. Vi har især fokus på 3 verdensmål, nemlig (12) Ansvarlig forbrug og produktion, (13) Klimaindsats og (15) Livet på land. Sammen gør vi en forskel - én bæredygtig buket ad gangen 💚
Market and Automation driven eCommerce Agency

Crunchy Frog was founded as a Copenhagen indie label by the four members of THAU back in 1994. Even though the label is no longer an underground operation, and despite the fact that nowadays Crunchy Frog has moved out of the flat that used to be the HQ, the philosophy and ambition is still the same: to release quality music in the area of alternative pop and rock under the conditions of full creative control for the bands. And since we started out as musicians, we know how much that counts. The important thing isn't always the bottom line and the $$$, but that we are able to maintain our position as the most interesting indie-label around! And not just around our native country of Denmark: Crunchy Frog is the best record label in the Universe! Ever!!

Olemme erikoistuneet käsinleivottuihin artesaanisämpylöihin, leipään ja makeisiin herkkuihin. Toimitamme tuotteitamme päivittäistavarakaupalle ja yritysasiakkaille sekä myymme niitä omassa leipomomyymälässämme Raision Tikanmaalla. Samassa paikassa toimii myös bistromme, josta saa arkisin lounasta ja iltaisin ja lauantaisin iltalistan ruoka-annoksia.
De lækreste donuts, lavet med passion og en masse kærlighed så du netop får en smagsoplevelse i verdensklasse. Til Fødselsdage, bryllupper, firmafester, eller bare en dag på sofaen

Climate change is an ever-present threat to the well-being of the world at large and societies all over the world. It seems only natural to be focusing on sustainability and innovation but we at Riot Innovations take the extra step. We know how hard it is for people to change existing behaviors, so we are constantly thinking about how environmental impacts can be reduced all while allowing people to remain lazy.

Riot Innovations is a startup from Finland aiming at creating and developing products and services focusing on the environment and design for the people that live in it. But while that might seem like buzzwords, we constantly aim at creating a greener future. We also happen to be good at designing things.

We rethink sustainability to make it effortless for you.
We redesign products to improve usability.
We recreate the user experience to make your life better.
We reimagine innovations of tomorrow.

We are Riot Innovations.

WITH STELLA ANGELO, THERE’S ENOUGH FOR EVERYONE

Sicodan strides to put the customer in focus. We can deliver solutions that fits our customers needs, with a wide product range. We can help you to combine multiple products, to improve and streamline your production.

Rentista er et 'cirkulært modekoncept'. Vi udlåner eksklusivt tøj på abonnement og når du er træt af tøjet, returnerer du det til os, hvorefter det kan udlånes til et andet medlem. Ingen binding, ingen fejlkøb og nul dårlig samvittighed. Og så er det tilmed godt for dit Co2e-aftryk og din pengepung.

Our production chain is designed to leave the smallest possible carbon footprint from material to delivery

We want companies and people to actively make a better choice of what they are consuming. Our subscription boxes with pure sustainable snacks and treats makes it easy & simple to do so. 
It doesn't have to be a hard choice, we simply strive to do BETTER for body, mind and nature in all our actions.

You won't find a team who takes more pride in curation. Each product is carefully selected to become the worlds best office snack. We never compromise on taste, quality and pureness - all must be sustainable.
Our healthy snack boxes are filled with energizers, not only boosting your afternoon productivity but also bridging the importance of a short break. Who knows, this could be a simple start of a healthier more sustainable company culture?

It is our call that you become the 'Everyday Hero'​ at work while being acknowledged for the right choice and great taste when choosing BETTERBOX.

We call it "Kindness on subscription!_x000B_"​

We sell handmade and high-quality interior, gifts and accessories from small-scale and Fair Trade Enterprises that empower women.

We want to create change and support a new generation of more responsible businesses. We want to increase the working and living standards for women around the world.

Every purchase makes a difference. With every purchase, you are empowering women artisans to have a safe, meaningful, and dignified job. Your support will create a positive long-lasting impact for the women and their families.

Danskproduceret maling i sæsonens fineste farver 🎨🌈

Med denne specialudviklede maling af højeste kvalitet er der kun brug for ÉN maling. Alle overflader får den samme farvenuance, mathed og stærke overflade. Color-Stories malingen er af højeste kvalitet og yderst dækkende. Color Stories er til dig, som ønsker at fortælle din farve-historie på en nem måde uden at gå på kompromis med kvaliteten.
Food Solutions A/S develops, produces and brands food products to the European retail and food industry.

After hectic years constantly seeking for energy we got tired of unhealthy energy drinks and traditional bitter coffees. 

We thought, there must be a better tasting and healthier alternative. 

In 2016, we started Mode together with Tim ”Avicii” Bergling with the vision to make coffee smarter so more people can function and feel better naturally. 

Mode is coffee with all the benefits, none of the drawbacks.
The 100% natural alternative to energy drinks and with it’s super smooth taste and functional benefits much more than the traditional cup of coffee can offer.

When Tim tragically passed away our purpose became clearer and more important than ever. 
A life surrounded by stress and must dos hard to get away from is not a sustainable way of living. With our philosophy “Find Your Mode” we want to inspire people to find balance and true passion in life. We believe this is the only way to function in the long run. 

Today, we support the Tim Bergling Foundation by donating 10% of our profit to raise mental health awareness among young people.

Making coffee smarter is great, but contributing to a better functioning world is even greater.
Some allergies can be life-threatening, but all allergies are life-changing. We’ve launched klarify to make living with allergy as easy as possible.

High-quality grooming for men that want to look and feel great, every day.
Carefully crafted, tested and perfected for your styling needs. Discover more ⤵️
www.99ml.com

LMG Scandinavia was founded in 2008 as a distributor for a number of skincare and lifestyle products with main operations in Scandinavia. We select our products with care and are very selective. Our products are available to buy in the most exclusive boutiques around the world. We work only with the best. For us a high level of service is very important and we value long-term relationships. We are constantly working to be as professional as possible and provide information, advice, training, sales and marketing tools. 
Our office is located in Stockholm. LMG Scandinavia has an AAA rating. 

CUSTOMERS
We value long-term relationships with our customers, where good service is our main goal. We work with some of Scandinavia's largest and most exclusive retailers. Some of our customers are KICKS, Åhlens, SEPHORA, VITA, Matas, eleven.se, Grand, NK, Electa, Youway and more than 500 spa and salons in Sweden, Norway and Denmark.

TRAINING
At LMG we do not believe that our products are sold, until they are sold out of the shop. Therefor  we focus on the sell through. Our training manager is out in the shops every week to meet with staff, provide information about the products, inventory, help with display and sales.

WAREHOUSE
All products are stocked in our warehouse outside Stockholm. Giving us fast, convenient and reliable deliveries. The logistics to work is essential for a successful cooperation. 
Our warehouse has extensive experience in warehouse, shipping and handling. 

CONTACT
Please do not hesitate to contact us for further inquiries: info@lmgscandinavia.se

Rug Solid was established in 2012 by founder, Tina Steneman, with a vision to create new design standards by using only sustainable materials. Leading by example, we believe it is our responsibility to challenge existing production processes as a design company. We walk the extra mile, to push the boundaries of both design and sustainability.

Today we collaborate with skilled artisans from India, and through generations of knowledge, these artisans have acquired unique methods of hand weaving rugs from the sustainable materials we use.

Creating a sustainable tomorrow, we know you cannot do it all at once, but you can start small. In everything we make, we consider the environment. That's why we print everything on recycled paper, our website is CO2 neutral, we ship all of our parcels CO2 neutral and in recycled boxes. Every step counts.
Sustainable design is better design. We create beautifully designed travel essentials that seamlessly merge the principles of Scandinavian design with the principles of global responsibility.

The award-winning ION Adventure Hotel is located in the middle of the Icelandic wilderness where exotic adventures meet luxurious accommodations. It‘s little sister, ION City Hotel is located right in the heart of Iceland´s capital, where guests breath in the urban culture and metropolitan lifestyle. Also pertaining to the ION conglomerate are Silfra restaurant, Sumac restaurant and Opal Apartments.

Carbon removal company - with ten years of experience. Created the world's first biochar carbon sink certificate. 

Mission
A sustainable and resilient agricultural system in harmony with the biosphere.

Company Overview
Ecoera removes carbon using biochar technology for soil carbon capture and bioenergy from biomass waste. Ecoera AB is a Swedish company founded at Chalmers Ventures.

Me & Eliza er et univers af de lækreste kollektioner fra modeverdenen, hvor du blandt andet finder et skønt udvalg af kjoler, bluser, bukser, sko, accessories og tasker, som vi har udvalgt fra de største brands fra ind og udland. Hos Me & Eliza håndplukker og udvælger vi et lækker udvalg til dig, så din garderobe bliver fyldt op med nye og unikke styles.

Mediplast er producent og forhandler af Medicinsk udstyr til  sundhedssektoren. Vi findes på flere kontinenter.

Sortimentet strækker sig fra simple engangsartikler til højteknologisk udstyr målrettet hospitaler.

Vi distribuerer udstyr udviklet af små iværksættervirksomheder og af store verdenskendte producenter. Vi producerer også egne produkter af høj kvalitet.

Vores mission er at arbejde tæt sammen med mennesker i sundhedsvæsenet, hvor vi bidrager med tilbud om viden og fremragende løsninger.

The Be Company ("Be") är ett Stockholmsbaserat dryckesvarumärke som startades 2020.

Genom att kombinera goda smaker med näringsrikt innehåll utan socker, skapar Be törstsläckande funktionsdrycker av högsta kvalitet. Produkter utan onödigt innehåll som är hälsosamma alternativ till energidrycker, läsk och juicer.

Be's första produkt "Relax" lanserades 2021 och finns i två smaker; Äpple & fläder och Gurka & mynta.
 
Återförsäljare är bla 7-Eleven och Pressbyrån. 

För att komma i kontakt med oss, maila info@be.se.

Freya Dalsjø is a contemporary luxury fashion brand founded in 2012 in Copenhagen by Freya Dalsjø. She studied at the prestigious fashion department of the Royal Academy of Art in Antwerp, before returning to Copenhagen in 2011 to launch her own ready to wear line. In 2012, her debut collection opened Copenhagen Fashion Week, with much critical acclaim – leading her to show her AW13 collection at London Fashion Week. That year, she won the esteemed award Søvtråden, which annually awards the most promising talents in the Danish fashion industry. Freya Dalsjø has since presented at Copenhagen Fashion Week biannually, continuing to receive growing international recognition. Freya Dalsjø is currently sold in Denmark, Middle east and North America. 

Freya Dalsjø’s garments are characterized by a strong appreciation for contemporary luxury, revitalizing heritage techniques with a fresh and avant-garde approach to the design process. "Design for me is about exploring and challenging the boundaries of material; the body and aesthetic,” she explains of her process: ”as a designer I aim to challenge these physical constraints and social constructs."​
Partihandel med diverse övriga maskiner och utrustning

Kedelig vin er den dyreste vin, der findes – uanset hvad den koster. 

Derfor har vi hos Noer Wines sat os det mål at levere spændende vin. Vin, der bliver husket. Det gode glas (eller lad os nu bare være ærlige, den gode flaske), der giver en oplevelse. Ikke på grund af prisen. Heller ikke den fancy etiket. Nej, vi vil have, man husker vores vin for det, der er i flasken.

Smager den godt? Vil den få maden til at smage bedre? Giver den lyst til at snakke? Det er nogle af de spørgsmål, vi stiller os selv, når vi smager på ny vin rundt om i verden.

Vi vil nemlig gerne leve vores liv, lære noget, opleve noget og drikke god vin til.

Hvad med dig?

Vi skal tilrettelegge for ditt neste eventyr gjennom våre produkter, gjennom ekspertisen til våre ansatte og gjennom vårt fysiske samlingssted - som er et utgangspunkt for å drømme stort (eller lite) og som skaper et miljø for dagens og morgendagens eventyrere.
Vi skal bli Norges mest attraktive utgangspunkt for drømmer, eventyr og opplevelser.

AITO hyvän olon kauppa (ent. Luontaistuntija) -ketjuun kuuluu yli 60 myymälää ympäri Suomea sekä laajan valikoiman verkkokauppa. Olemme 100 % suomalainen terveyskauppaketju, joka on perustettu vuonna 1983. Suomalaisen Työn Liitto on myöntänyt palvelullemme Avainlippu-tunnuksen. Toimimme osuuskuntana; kaikki AITO-kauppiaat ovat omistajiamme ja mukana päätöksenteossa. AITO-yrittäjät palvelevat Sinua asiantuntevasti ja luottamuksella. Asiakas on meille sydämen asia!

We would like to improve people’s daily life by providing them with opportunities to improve their health and wellbeing. AITO hyvän olon kauppa is Finland's oldest health stores chain (founded 1983). Our strengths are professionalism, reliability, as well as a wide range of products.

Argon Audio is a Danish audio company. Affordable audio luxury is our expertise. Argon Audio has over 20 years of experience in the business, and is working in close collaboration with the Danish retail business HiFi Klubben.

From our inception in Copenhagen in 2009 EMMA GO has steadily grown a crowd of devote followers. Our collections are rooted in the Danish design philosophy of quality, modernism and functionality whereas our choice of colours and materials are influenced by our cultural experiences, travels and taste of music. 

We do love to make beautiful shoes but we also want you to wear our shoes comfortably and with good conscience. To achieve this we are hand-making each and every pair near Alicante in Spain. The region has a long tradition for the quality and craftsmanship that we demand and the use of local suppliers and proximity to our main markets also reduces our CO2 footprint. There exists no sweatshops and the people making our shoes receives a fair salary and are all proud and experienced crafts-men and women. Our local suppliers also enable us to ascertain that our leather's are chrome free which is not only a relief for the environment but also our clients feet.

Till now we have reached far and wide and you can find EMMA GO in selected stores on every continent except Antarctica.

WELCOME TO A LIFE WITHOUT BOUNDARIES.

Polyver Sweden® is aSwedish brand providing premium PU-boots for whatever weather comes your way. Our Comfortable, light, insulated and waterproof boots is developed by Northern expertise tested in rough conditions between +10°C/+50°F  to -40°C/-40°F, all because we want you to live life to the fullest, in whatever wearther.

Polyver Sweden®  was born 2005, out of a pure love for the outdoors, and the desire to have warm, comfortable feet all year around. The idea was a Swedish outdoor brand focusing on premium boots, made in Sweden.

We developed what would become our classic, timeless product; a warm, light, waterproof and comfortable boot that is enjoyed by outdoor enthusiasts and families around the world, while also functional for everyday urban life.

Whether you are a nature lover, a city dweller or just someone who appreciates comfortable boots and warm, dry feet - our range of Polyver Sweden®  boots has something for you.

We simply want you to be able to enjoy outdoors - in whatever weather.

Provrummet designar och erbjuder kläder för kvinnor som tillverkas i Europa i mindre kollektioner som anpassas av efterfrågan. Design och kontor i Borås. Egna varumärken och designsamarbeten. 

Alla plagg arbetas fram för att få den perfekta passformen. De provas av noggrant på vår modellavdelning i Borås av kunnig direktris. Plaggets mått stämmer överens med angivna mått på vår sida. Vi har storlekar från XS till XXL. 

Tygerna köps in från välkända tillverkare som har certifierade tyger, Öko-tex  mm. Plaggen sys på mindre fabriker i Litauen under bra arbetsförhållanden. Provrummet har samarbetat med samtliga fabriker under en lång tid.

Provrummet har tre år i rad blivit utsedd till bästa e-handeln inom kategorin Kläder & Accessoarer av Pricerunner. Utmärkelsen baseras enbart på kundomdömen.

Contemporary Brazilian Wooden Jewellery full of life and colours. Inspired by the exceptional local NATURE, the powerful Brazilian Stones harmonize with the handcrafted hardwood sculpted by the goldsmith Jair Winckler with more than 30 years of experience. The concept is to reuse hardwood, silver and precious stones with innovative design process signed by the Founder & International Designer Fernanda Ritzdorf.

AB Provia Vägmärkning har som målsättning att förse marknaden med varor av hög kvalitet. Produkterna skall höja säkerheten, underlätta hantering och sänka kostnaderna vid drift och anläggning av gator, vägar och liknande miljöer. Produkternas utformning/framställning skall influeras av ett starkt miljötänkande. Vi skall vara flexibla ifråga om utveckling och trafiksäkerhet. Vi skall växa med marknadens krav och anpassa produktionen successivt för att verka på lång sikt.

Vi för idag ett mycket brett sortiment av produkter för dessa ändamål. AB Provia Vägmärkning är grundat 1971, därmed ett av de äldsta i branschen. AB Provia Vägmärkning representerar sedan 1987 ett av Europas ledande företag inom trafiksäkerhetsprodukter, Horizont-Klemmfix i form av Generalagent.

Liseborg er en webshop med en bæredygtig tilgang til alt indenfor boligindretning, interiør, brugskunst, design til hjemmet til folie, skilte og print - ialt lidt over 7.000 produkter.

Du finder alt hvad hjerte kan begære indenfor boligindretning, boligfornyelse og boligforskønnelses både færdige produkter, design selv produkter og gør det selv produkter. Både til private og erhverv. Vi har plakater til væggene fra bl. a. TheClayPlay, fine billeder fra Vintage by Incado, grafiske illustrationer fra ByLux til børne og -ungdomsværelset og dekorative og finurlige flisestickers bl. a. fra illustratoren Kirstine Falk. Vores store repertoire af folie til boligen og virksomheden ændrer sig hele tiden og nye produkter finder vej til shoppen. Om du har et badeværelsevindue hvor du vil undgå nysgerrige blikke eller du har et køkken der trænger til en makeover eller et kontor der mangler blikfang, så kan vi hjælpe med folie hertil. Vores kvalitet folie fra Oracal kan klare de fleste opgaver og fås både i ensfarvet, designet med motiv, mønster og struktur og tilmed kan vi printe dit eget motiv på folie. Det giver uanede muligheder for at udtrykke sig kreativt, få f.eks. lavet dit helt eget badeforhæng eller dug til årets store fest. Til årets store fest kan vi også tilbyde bannere, roll up eller tryksager til invitationerne. Mangler du en gave til fødselaren eller forkælelse til dig selv, kan du dykke ned i vores store udvalg af fine design ting under Boligindretning. Her finder du populære mærker som House Doctor, Smila, Lærke Langballe, Koustrup & co., ByRavn, Natures Collection, Pure Culture, blot for at nævne nogle af de lækre mærker du finder hos Liseborg.dk.
Skilte, print & bannere
Her finder du alt hvad hjerte begærer indenfor skilte og print. Vi har samlet alt det bedste af forskellige produkter som er nøje udvalgte efter kvalitet og funktionalitet. Produkter som kan give dig og din virksomhed et løft, give inspiration til spændende muligheder og unikke løsninger.

Merplast Ltd is a growing company which specializes in health care products. We import and distribute first aid products for workplaces and wide range of health care products which are used in- and outside hospital. Our company sells also first aid training and AED's (automated external defibrillator) to the workplaces. We have over 22 000 customers from different customer segments including military, hospitals, large companies etc.

Scandinavia Form is a design brand with an aim to push the boundaries of Scandinavian style inspired by the raw 
form of nature in an alternative context, pushing boundaries in search of something new.

Scandinavia Form began as a curious ambition of experimenting with Scandinavian design in an alternative context. We explore ”back to the origin” with Nature as the source of inspiration, creativity, structure, experiences and well-being. Nature’s Raw Form & Shape it’s biodiversity  a genuine feeling of authenticity. Nature’s built-in balance and harmony guide us to be as close to true nature as possible.

We are a bunch of friends deeply in love with cycling and Helsinki. Breakaway Helsinki has evolved into a multi-division local cycling powerhouse covering cyclists'​ needs from maintenance to international gravel events and from rentals to experience productions. 

We are looking to provide our premium services to customers through partnerships and businesses. If you are pondering about new ways to bring authentic experiences to your hotel guests or perhaps taking your clients for an unforgettable outing look no further. We are a small but flexible business with a vast network assuring your company makes a positive impression. 

Interested in more presence on the Finnish and Nordics market? Contact us, we have a range of partnership models. We are currently working with Cannondale, Shimano, Velocio, Komoot, Classified Cycling, Vittoria, PRO components, Bioracer Speedwear, REX, Sweet Protection and Chimpanzee Nutrition.

The Nordic Gravel Series promotes and supports gravel events in different regions throughout Finland and the Nordics. For the 2021 edition, we organize 9 events, providing you the finest gravel roads and trails. From Southern Sweden over the Finnish archipelago to above the Arctic Circle.

We are dedicated to open up gravel biking to a wider audience, from avid cyclists over urban commuters to outdoor enthusiasts. Our events welcome beginners and diehards alike. We welcome visitors, families, and kids in our event areas to share food and drinks with the riders and enjoy the outdoors.

We are a Norwegian watch brand.
 

The name ÁIGI originates from the Sámi language, the word for time.

Our purpose is to make cool and stylish minimalist watches with high quality.

Our designs are inspired by Scandinavian nature and culture.  

Our slogan is "Your Time Is Now"​. We live busy lives, where time is a commodity. We live for the future, while still in the past and tend to forget to live in the moment.Therefore we added the signature triangle to our watches. The triangle points to you when look at your ÁIGI timepiece to remind you your time is now, make the best of it.

From Finland
Make a statement with every step

Scintilla is a design company focusing on textiles and homewares. Its products are based on the designs of an internationally awarded artist and textile designer. Scintilla´s aesthetics are very contemporary and the design concept is focused on edgy graphics with a unique color palette. The graphic designs are combined with high quality materials to generate the distinctive look and feel of a Scintilla product.

About Soley Organics.
The woman behind Sóley Organics is Icelandic actress Sóley Elíasdóttir, a long-standing iconic figure of the country’s theatre and film world. Now she has left the stage to embrace a family tradition that goes back 16 generations: harnessing the healing properties of herbs. Following in the footsteps of her great grandmother, Sóley created Sóley Organics in 2007 and launched her first product, an all-purpose therapeutic cream called GRÆÐIR, which means ‘healer’ in Icelandic.
 
Philosophy.
Guided by tradition and the therapeutic qualities of wild Icelandic herbs, Sóley Organics strives to deliver pure products inspired by nature. From the integrity of our ingredients to the expertise we pass on to our customers, at Sóley Organics we are passionate about healthy skin and dedicated to keeping the environment pure.
 
Environment. 
Iceland’s nature is our legacy, and we are dedicated to reducing our environmental impact. There is always room for improvement – and the more we strive to improve, the more we contribute.
 
Finest ingredients. 
Our premium quality ingredients are 100% natural, safe and ecologically friendly. As a result, our products are free from parabens, preservatives, artificial colours and fragrances, phthalates, propylene glycol, mineral oils, PABA, petrolatum, paraffin or any other chemical agents that can harm man or nature.

Vi leverer profiltøj med tryk til firmaer, skoler, institutioner, foreninger og meget mere. Så står I og mangler nyt tøj der bærer jeres eget præg, leverer vi det ønskede produkt.

Vi har en lang række leverandører af profiltøj, og råder derfor også over et stort udvalg af tøj. På denne måde sikrer vi os, at vi kan tilbyde et bredt sortiment og dermed opfylde vores kunders ønsker og behov.

----------------------

Vi kan hjælpe med meget mere end tryk og broderi på tøj. Står du og skal have special designet tøj, håndklæder, indkøbsnet eller lignende, er dette også noget vi kan hjælpe med. 


-----------------------

Udover firmatøj med tryk leverer vi også tøj til private, både med og uden tryk. Til private levere vi dog kun tryk på tøj ved et køb på minimum 10 stk. 
Har I andre forespørgsler, er I velkommen til at kontakte os for at høre nærmere.

----------------------

Vi råder over et stort showroom, hvor vi har præsenteret et bredt udvalg af vores mest solgte firmatøj. Her er der mulighed for at komme og se vores mange produkter, samt mærke og føle på kvaliteten, så man er sikker på at få lige præcis det, man er på udkig efter.

----------------------

Som noget nyt tilbyder vi også at lave kundeaftener. Så er I en skole, klub eller en masse venner, holder vi gerne åbent om aftenen, så I kan komme ned og prøve de ting som har interesse. 
﻿Vi kommer også gerne ud og viser frem.

----------------------

Vi står altid klar til at hjælpe, og du er mere end velkommen til at kontakte os på mail, via telefon, eller kigge forbi vores showroom, indenfor vores åbningstider.

Vi ser frem til at byde Jer velkommen hos os.

Exclusive, handwoven cushion covers, throws, and blankets designed in collaboration with women in underserved communities worldwide.

Kinship Collective works together with female artisans to co-create and co-produce uniquely designed, handwoven cushion covers, throws and blankets which reflect and lift their local cultures and communities. These products are handwoven in a sustainable, ethical process and they are designed and sewn in collaboration with women in vulnerable and underserved communities worldwide.  

Kinship provides market access for these products via our global marketplace, www.kinship-collective.com - where our products will be available for sale to customers worldwide.

Additionally, Kinship ensures that the artisans are working in ethical working conditions and that they are paid directly and fairly for the work that they do. We actively engage them in the design/production process. And then, Kinship, with customer involvement and support, gives back to the community via our platform, Kinship Foundation, in order to optimize the possibility of long term success and potential for the women, their communities and their families. 

Our mission is to keep the artisans continuously employed, and to support them to not only live above the poverty line, but to be empowered to further develop their abilities and skills and create their own opportunities for personal and economic growth. 

Our Business Model allows us to create long term change through the delivery of social impact programmes for the artisans which are funded by donations from Kinship Collective to Kinship Foundation.

Welcome to Kinship Collective.
Conscious design for Intentional Living.

companyName: Art by Rikke Darling - Abstract Paintings

description:
Beautyforce er en dansk virksomhed, som udvikler kosttilskud der booster din skønhed indefra. Vores produkter produceres i Sverige og vi er stolte ejere af et skandinavisk brand, som udvikler produkter til dig der elsker din ydre og indre skønhed. Produkterne sælges på beautyforce.dk men bl.a. også hos Med24.dk - Helsam - Normal.

Vi udvælger unikke ingredienser som vi ved skaber en effekt for dig. Vi går ikke på kompromis med vores indhold og er meget fokuserede på kun at vælge ingredienser med en dokumenteret effekt.

Vores vision er at booste dig indefra så du kan møde verden, som den bedste udgave af dig selv. Vores produkter hjælper din krop med at regenerere og opbygge indefra. Dette giver resultater du kan mærke på din krop, dit sind og din udstråling.

Vi ser beauty som en indre styrke, der giver dig kraft til at modstå enhver udfordring i dit liv.

Gør Beautyforce til en del af din daglige skønhedsrutine.

Skønhed kommer indefra!

Sorun is our chase for freedom. A result of years of engagement to find a solution to that sudden feeling of insecurity that sometimes occurs when running alone, the feeling that prevents you from clearing your mind, get into full focus and reaching your “Runners High”.

Sorun is developed with focus on function and user experience. A safety device is something that needs to be reliable but you really don’t want to think about it. Like a safety belt Sorun is just there, keeping you safe and won’t interfere with your running experience. 

Sorun is designed, developed and produced in Sweden. After miles of test running in rain, snow and sunshine we finally found the perfect construction for a maximum free run.

SO RUN FREE.

We make feltpads for furnitures directly from the materials of tennis & padel balls. We collect the balls from padel and tennis clubs all over europe. Dots felt pads for furniture is the best solution when it comes to sustainable living and high quality materials. Our felt pads protects your floors from scratches. The rubber is shock-absorbing and gives the felt pad strength and durability. While the thick layer of felt slides easily and noise-free on all surfaces, thus protecting the floor from scratches.  

It all began back in 2020 with a curious heart, a love for Tennis and a passion for sustainable design. Tennis was at the time becoming a big part of our lives, but the more we played, the more we started to question the sustainability of the sport. After a little research, we found out that every year more than 300 million tennis balls are produced, used and thrown away. We had to do something, or at least try, if we wanted to continue playing our favorite sport with a clear conscience. 

We quickly connected the Dots (pun intended)! and soon after the first Dots were created. Now we collect padel and tennisballs from all over Europe and making them into Dots felt pads. We've teamed up with the Danish automation company BILA A/S who help us optimize our production by means of automation solutions.
We champion a lifestyle in sync with your female biology, for women to feel their best no matter what day of the month.
We design exclusive custom made wall murals.

Mellan åkrarna i utkanten av småländska Värnamo ligger Vandalorum, ett museum där vår tids mest tongivande konst och design visas. Ett stenkast bort möts E4:an och riksväg 27 som gemensamt binder samman Sverige. Stanna till för att uppleva våra utställningar, njuta av den vällagade maten och upptäcka god design i vår shop. Välkommen!

Här visas 10-15 unika utställningar per år som presenterar framstående nutida formgivare och konstnärer, såväl svenska som internationella. Byggnaderna, som minner om den monumentala torklada som en gång låg på platsen, är uppförda efter ett originalkoncept av den prisbelönte italienske arkitekten Renzo Piano. Inredningen är framtagen av den isländske arkitekten Sigurdur Gustafsson i samråd med Vandalorums initiativtagare Sven Lundh. MöbIerna är formgivna av bl.a. Mats Theselius, Bruno Mathsson, Hans J. Wegner och Jonas Bohlin. Inne och ute finns permanenta skulpturer av exempelvis Joseph Kosuth, Sivert Lindblom samt Gustav och Ulla Kraitz. 

En av Vandalorums fyra lador är hemvist åt Smålands Konstarkiv, vars utställningar främst lyfter fram konstnärer med koppling till Småland. Här finns även Konstarkivets omfattande samling som är öppen för allmänheten vid förbokning.

Många av Vandalorums gäster kommer inte bara för konst- och designupplevelsen utan även för den goda matens skull. I restaurangen lagas och bakas allt från grunden. Vi använder närproducerade, ekologiska råvaror och är KRAV-certifierade. Förutom dagens lunch på vardagar, serveras en à la carte-meny varje dag till kl 16. Till barnen erbjuds alla rätter till halva priset och för den som vill fika har Syltan ett stort utbud av smörrebröd och bakverk. Vinnare av "Årets Kulturrestaurang 2018" samt utsedd till "Bästa vägkrogen längs med E4:an 2019" (Jönköping-Helsingborg) enligt tidningen Vi Bilägare!

Sweetsorganic er....
- Danmarks økologiske online bland selv slikbutik
- Uimodståelige lækkert og unjunked slik
- Slik af allerhøjeste kvalitet - slik, der er lavet af dét, det smager af - vi har ingen hemmelige ingredienser
- En ægte kærlighedshistorie - det er historien om kærlighed til søde sager, begejstringen for smagen af unjunked og troen på, at økologi er et bedre valg for os mennesker og vores planet!
- En ægte iværksætterhistorie - det er historien om en skov- og landskabsingeniør, der stopper på arbejdsmarkedet efter 14 år for at følge iværksætterdrømmen og passionen for unjunked lækkerier.....

Fordi vi synes, at lidt af det du elsker, gør livet godt....

Isay is a fiery Danish fashion brand with something to say.
We believe in what is authentic, a sense of belonging and the right to be who you are.
We design clothes for "real"​ women - women with shapes, spark, courage, and opinions - who never sit still.
We are a small company who will always do their best for you.

Atlantic Delights of Norway is passionate about promoting great natural ingredients. Our mission is to advocate clean, healthy arctic seafood products traceable and safe for our family to enjoy.

 Why choose our Omega-3?

Because our Norwegian fish oils are a clean and natural source of Omega 3 from Arctic waters. Our Pure Fish and Cod Liver Oils are made locally, only 2 hours from catch to preserve freshness. Our Pure series are made from wild caught Codfish and sustainable caught salmon.  Norwegians have been producing fish and cod liver oils since the Viking age over 1000 years ago. It has been beneficial to people’s health, both in Norway and internationally since the 1800s. You can truly trust and value the history, heritage and generations worth of experience of locally made single ingredient fish oil with natural amounts of Omega-3.

Clean Cut Copenhagen is based on the vision of a menswear brand, that is able to offer a comfortable and stylish single-go-to solution on the modern men´s essential wardrobe. 

Our collection is inspired by the urban life and Copenhagen attitudec with focus on comfortable menswear that do not compromise style – clothing that is cool yet suitable for all occasion.
 
The collection fit into all wardrobes and the look is classic and typical Scandinavian, made in nice stretchy fabrics, organic and recycled yarns as sustainability means a lot for us. 

The brand is focused on:
X  High quality materials made to last beyond the season
X  Comfort that do not compromise style – with a strong program of styles with stretch
X  A strong basic and NOOS program plus seasonal clean Scandinavian fashion styles
X Collections with defined lines, classic silhouettes and muted colors
X A classic menswear wardrobe with urban influence inspired by our Scandinavian roots
X Sustainable materials and productions

KAPP ehf er fjölbreytt fjölskyldufyrirtæki sem byggir rekstur sinn á nokkrum rekstareiningum.
• OptimICE krapavélar
• Kæliverkstæði
• Umhverfisvæn kæling
• Vélaverkstæði

• Frysti- og kæliklefar
• Gámar

• O.fl.

Helstu viðskiptavinir eru í sjávarútvegi, matvælaiðnaði, smásölu, flutningum og í almennum iðnaði. 

KAPP framleiðir OptimICE® krapakerfi og forkæla og rekur öflugt renni, stál,  véla og kæliverkstæði.
Hjá KAPP starfa tæplega 50 starfsmenn, með aðstöðu í Kópavogi, Reykjavík. Þorlákshöfn og í Vestmannaeyjum.

KAPP has extensive history, knowledge and experience in producing, sales and services of OptimICE Slurry ice machines.

For years, the strong company has been leading in designing, manufacturing and servicing refrigeration and liquid ice systems for fisheries and industries.
We are also a mechanical and turning workshop. 

We service all kinds of industries:
- Seafood industry
- Food productions
- Cargo companies
- Car workshops
And many more...

KAPP  ehf. | The Optim-Ice® Company, has manufactured and sold over 400 Liquid Ice Systems both for ships and onshore processing under the name Optim-Ice® all over the world.

Since 1999.

Professional Publishing Finland Ltd is a unique publishing and consulting company with the mission of sharing Finnish know-how and competence with developers and managers around the world. 
Our focus areas are strategic, competence, innovation and change management in educational institutions as well as pedagogy and learning development.
We offer publications, educational and training materials, consultation and training together with our network.
Et klimavenligt legehus i pap

NORDIC WASABI is sustainably grown fresh wasabi, using 100% renewable hydroelectric power and fresh Icelandic drinking water combined with best practices in modern engineering. Our greenhouses are some of the most technologically advanced in Europe and farms fresh wasabi year-round. Nordic Wasabi is used by many of the best restaurants around Europe.

Hofmann Copenhagen was founded in 2011 by designer Heidi Hofmann. Having previously worked for Chloé, By Malene Birger and DAY Birger et Mikkelsen, Heidi has extensive, diverse experience in the fashion industry. 
 
Hofmann Copenhagen’s cool sophistication can be found in the brand’s attention to detail and high quality. The spirit is fresh and chic, while understanding the value of timeless style. Vår historie
Vår historie begynte i 2012 med internasjonale impulser og et ønske om å levere det lille ekstra innen møbler og interiør. Hos oss skal du få det du ikke finner alle andre steder.  Gjennom spennende kolleksjoner med internasjonalt uttrykk, kvalitet og fornuftige priser skal vi gjennom vår nettbutikk inspirere deg til et vakrere hjem.

BondStreet som Destinasjon
Historien bak nettbutikkens navn og konsept er inspirert av New York, og grundernes favorittrestaurant 6 Bond Street. Denne restauranten var en destinasjon på Manhatten som hadde en helt egen stemning og stil.

Stemningen, kvaliteten, interiøret og menneskene på restauranten ligger bak navnet SixBondStreet.no. Den internasjonale og eventyrlystne følelsen er videreformidlet i våre kolleksjoner og de fleste av produktene har alle fått tildelt amerikanske navn som skal beskrive en helt spesiell opplevelse av produktet og hva det representerer.

Vi er en liten dynamisk organisasjon som raskt kan snu oss rundt for å gi deg det beste av det siste innen møbler og interiør. Gjennom egenproduserte kolleksjoner og et online konsept har vi muligheten til å tilby kvalitet og design til riktige priser.

Skreddersøm og lagerførte modeller
Et hjem skal uttrykke personlighet og vi fokuserer derfor på valgmuligheter. Hos oss tilbyr vi skreddersøm hvor du kan velge mellom ulike tekstiler, farger og materialer for å lage ditt drømmemøbel. I tillegg til å tilby skreddersøm har vi til enhver tid våre bestselgere på lager for omgående levering.

Oialla chocolate is an organic Danish award-winning chocolate, made from wild cocoa beans. The cocoa trees grow in Mid and South America in the Amazon region. Oialla is the purest imaginable kind of chocolate and we control the entire process from beans to bars. Our chocolate is recognized by professional chefs at some of the best restaurants in the world.

Master Chocolatier Rasmus Bo Bojesen and Pernille Lüzthøft founded the company in 2010.

Danish Ministry of Foreign Affairs support the project and Oialla work closely together with the Bolivian cocoa company, Sumar. The production is controlled all the way from cocoa beans to chocolate bars. The partnership secures fair wages, higher living standards and education of the indigenous population in rural Middle America and the Amazon region.

The production of Oialla contributes to improvement of education of the indigenous population in the jungle, where the cocoa beans used for Oialla grow.

Our products are all pure, organic and made without any additives. Visit our webshop for more information and purchase. 

Visit Product and Shops to see the shops and restaurants already cooperating with Oialla. 

If you are interested in placing a business order, please email: oialla@oialla.com.

Melker of Sweden grundades 2015 av den lokala serie-entrepenören, innovatören och designern Pelle Stafshede, med det kaxiga målet att helt och hållet förändra industrin inom Outdoor Hardware.

Att hitta ett samspel där miljö och etik är lika viktigt som ekonomi är vår strävan - det gör det möjligt att göra skillnad på riktigt.

Vi ser vår innovation, design och R&D som långsiktiga investeringar för oss som företag men också för kommande generationer, naturen och friluftslivet. Att skapa de bästa produkterna är vårt mål, inte bara för dig som användare utan även för planeten.

Vi vet att all typ av företagande skapar miljöproblem - allt från el till datorerna till transporten av våra produkter. Vårt miljöarbete är en alltid pågående process där vi aktivt förändrar, förbättrar och delar med oss av det vi lär oss.

Våra kärnvärden inkluderar också att vi ska ha kul längst vägen och verkligen göra det vi älskar, tillsammans med vänner, familj och partners som delar vår filosofi.

Genom att leva efter vår filosofi kan vi skapa ett hållbart företag som vi är stolta över att driva och jobba för.

Unlock your unlimited wardrobe with Stilrent. Browse our selection and pick the outfits you would like to rent. Delivery, return & dry cleaning is included - now it's up to you to chose your favorite dress to rent! 

Stilrent also offer a selection of carefully curated accessories for sale from selected partners. 

OUR VISION
Fashion is fun and meant to be for everyone regardless of age, budget, size & style. Fashion is our way of expressing ourselves but should also not have to be something that compromises on our environmental and ethical values. We at Stilrent want to offer an easy, fun, environmentally friendly and affordable way of renting clothes & accessories to make fashion accessible for everyone.

 

OUR APPROACH
Sustainability is the very core of our business, and something we are not willing to compromise on. By renting instead of purchasing, we are providing an alternative option where we are increasing the life length of the clothes, fighting against fast-fashion and making sure that the clothes are taken care of like they should and spreading joy to multiple people instead of being left hanging in the back corner of a closet and forgotten about.

 

BEHIND THE SCENES
Stilrent was founded in 2020 by Ivonne Ruiz Olate & Erica Nieminen, two young entrepreneurs with the vision of changing the fashion industry for the good. The team is reinforced by Amy & Carolina, two fashionistas interning at Stilrent .

Incell is an interdisciplinary team of 13 students, representing the University of Copenhagen in the international iGEM competition 2017.  
Incell investigates the molecular mechanisms in endosymbiotic cell-relationships. The team applies a new bottom up approach to the field of current research, by individually studying three essential properties, necessary for a stable endosymbiotic relationship; protein-transport from the host cell to endosymbiont, the dependency between host cell and endosymbiont, and the control of a number of endosymbionts within the host cell. 
The aim is to establish a platform for future artificial endosymbiosis, which can have many applications in the medical-, synthetic biology-, and agricultural industry.

Bau Design is a Danish design studio established in 2016 by Spanish architect Santiago Bautista.

Bau design appears in a climate of extreme consumerism where big brands are inviting the customers to buy new products every season. As a result, the quality of the products is dropping significantly to make them cheaper and less durable, promoting the idea of disposable products. 

Our goal is to design, produce and sell beautiful and durable products manufactured under fair labor conditions and market them at a price which aligns with the intrinsic value of the object.

We control the whole process, from concept sketches to packaging. This is the only way to ensure that our products deliver our identity and values.

VISION:
møbel, we are passionate about innovative design mixed with classic high quality products and have the desire to offer our customers the best from the industry both in furniture and interior.

The aim is to create holistic experiences where both design, quality and the individual customer's needs are taken into account, but where both the visual and the sense of feeling are simultaneously stimulated.

The store's products are carefully selected with a focus on both design and craftsmanship. That's why, among other things, we have the negotiation of Danish iconic furniture designer Kai Kristensen, Inodasveje,miyazaki chair, karimoku kunst,  konsthändverk, pandull, kasthall, BPS and a collection of Bruunmunch furniture.

Owner :
Claudio Guarino (b. 1982)

Proprietor of the Furniture Store

Claudio has 12 years of experience in the Danish furniture industry. He has worked at one of Italy's largest sofa manufacturers, and at one of the biggest high end danish design furniture producer and stores in Denamrk, where Scandinavian design is at the front focus now.

Kvist and Dahl have been Claudio's teachers and provided him with a unique education and knowledge of furniture and design.

In both places, Claudio has worked on both private and business-oriented interior design tasks, always with the passion for beautiful design and good craftsmanship in focus.

He has over the years designed many unique productions, where the product is adapted to the individual customer's needs in terms of tables, benches and carpets.

DANSK IVÆRKSÆTTERI MED EN PASSION FOR GASTRONOMI

Gastrotools er en dansk virksomhed med rødder i København. Bag virksomheden står ildsjælen Julius Søndergård Schiller, som i 2016 satte sig for at udvikle en serie af køkkenværktøj ud fra et hovedkriterie - det skal holde hele livet.

Vi mener, at køkkenværktøj er værktøj - at det skal udføre en funktion til perfektion. Men vi mener også, at det skal støtte op om og bidrage til glæden ved at gå i køkkenet hver dag. Med udgangspunkt i nogle af verdens mest avancerede materialer og smedeteknikker, har vi skabt en køkkenkniv, som både byder på æstetisk skønhed og ekstrem skarphed. Uden at gå på kompromis med balance, slidstyrke og ergonomi.

Det er køkkenknive for livet.

Men tanken er også, at dine køkkenknive skal være til at betale. Vores køkkenknive smedes af enestående stål fra Japan i tæt samarbejde med nogle af verdens dygtigste smedemestre. Vi har ingen mellemled, som skal tjene penge, og derfor kan vi tilbyde en exceptionel kvalitet til lavere priser end køkkenknive i samme klasse.

Vores udvalg af køkkenværktøj er skåret helt ind til benet. Vi udbyder et smalt sortiment af køkkenknive og køkkenværktøj i et tidsløst og elegant design - smedet af japansk stål med en unik mineralsammensætning. Køkkenknive du kan have glæde af resten af livet.

Alle vores køkkenknive er udviklet som værktøj. Dine køkkenknive skal arbejde for dig, når du laver mad. Det sikrer vi, ved at tage udgangspunkt i ståltyper og skæftematerialer med ekstrem hårdhed og styrke.

Idéen bag Den ultimative køkkenkniv er egentlig enkel. Det handler i sin enkelthed om at skabe et værktøj, en køkkenkniv, som kombinerer æstetisk skønhed og funktionalitet. Men forud for udviklingen går en lang og kompleks proces, som skal sikre optimal ergonomi, balance og skarphed - i én pakke.

Art by Me er en kreativ café hvor du kan male med over 80 forskellige farver på over 200 forskellige stykker keramik. 
Vi tilbyder et afbræk i hverdagens travlhed og pligter. Vi tror nemlig på, at det er sundt at trække stikket en gang imellem og lade sig fordybe i kreativiteten i et stressfrit univers. 
”Det har jeg aldrig prøvet før, så det kan jeg helt sikkert godt” er vores motto og tilgang til kreativiteten. Hos os kan alle være med, for det er nemlig ikke kun pensler vi maler med. Vi har et stort udvalg af teknikker der inkluderer alles færdigheder. 
Vi tilgodeser ikke kun æstetisk smukt malet keramik, men går også̊ op i, at alt ikke skal være perfekt. Vi skaber nemlig ikke kun keramik, men også̊ minder og oplevelser du hver dag får glæde af.

COBAGS was founded in 2014 in Copenhagen, the bicycle capital of the world. With 62% of all trips in Copenhagen being made on a bicycle, COBAGS released the first tote shopping bag – the BIKEZAC – made to fit onto the luggage carrier of the bicycle.

The BIKEZAC is an innovative shopping bag, made of recycled woven PP, a solid and sustainable material. However, its special feature is its innovative, patented mounting rail. Thanks to it, the shopping bag can be attached to a bicycle's luggage rack with only 2 clicks, making shopping by bike easier and safe.

With the three buzzwords #convenient, #ecofriendly and #safe in mind, we have worked hard over the last few years to refine the idea of the BIKEZAC and improve and optimize its design. 
More than satisfied with the current solution, we now focus on making the alternative shopping bag accessible in Denmark and other European countries. 

We are convinced that the BIKEZAC is an innovative alternative for single use plastic bags. Yet, in order to have a positive effect on the preservation of the environment, many individuals have to choose the sustainable way. To make the BIKEZAC easily accessible, we are continuously expanding our network of retailers. Besides that, we are collaborating with various companies that customize the BIKEZAC  with their logo. Together, we can change the world of disposable plastic bags.

For the future we are full of exciting ideas and thus curious to discover where the COBAGS journey will take us.

Ludv. Bjørns Vinhandel A/S er blandt markedets førende indenfor salg og rådgivning om vin. Som landets ældste vinfirma har vi oparbejdet en ekspertise og viden om vin, som gør os i stand til at vejlede dig om de mange forskellige muligheder. Vores kunder er altid velkommen til at besøge os i den velassorterede butik og få en vinsnak eller opleve den store hyggelige vinkælder med de mange overraskelser.

Blandt forretningens kunder findes store private firmaer, bedre restauranter, hoteller, mange offentlige institutioner samt det danske kongehus.

Direkte import og salg. 
Vi importerer direkte fra producenterne og har derved hele tiden ”fingeren på pulsen”. Alle fordyrende mellemled er skåret væk, og vi kan derfor tilbyde de bedste og mest konkurrencedygtige priser på markedet.  

Sortiment 
Vi kan tilbyde kvalitetsvine i alle prisklasser fra det meste af den vinproducerende verden. Sortimentet spænder lige fra den prisvenlige hverdagsvin til den mere eksklusive vin til vinkælderen, medarbejderen eller den gode samarbejdspartner. 

Gaveløsninger 
Mange års erfaring med individuelle gaveløsninger til erhvervslivet har gjort os i stand til at skræddersy gaven til netop dit behov. Mulighederne er mange. Vi pakker i trækasser, kartoner, kurve m.v., og ønsker du en høj profilering af dit firma, er der mulighed for at trykke dit firmalogo på emballagen.
Victoria Vine importerer vine fra de bedste områder i Frankrig og Italien, og har personlig kontakt med alle sine leverandører. Vinene sælges primært i gourmet restauranter.
Vi i Din Holdning er her for å hjelpe deg med å redusere og bli kvitt ergonomiproblemene vår moderne livsstil medfører.

Designovation.dk - et bolig univers med alle de mest populære brands. 
Hos Designovation hylder vi det personlige hjem. Vi ønsker at inspirere dig til, at skabe de helt rigtige rammer, og sørge for at du får den
perfekte følelse og stemning omkring dig. Vi har derfor et bredt udvalg af designermøbler, interiør og belysning, der kan hjælpe dig godt på
vej med at skabe din personlige stil. Vores webshop tæller idag mere end 50 forskellige designerbrands med flere tusinde forskellige produkter indenfor boligindretning og belysning. Webshoppen er i konstant udvikling, og vi er altid på udkig efter nye spændende designere til vores boligunivers. Du kan finde alt hvad du har brug for i en moderne indretning på vores webshop - klik under de forskellige kategorier eller brands som du ønsker at se mere fra.

Nomaden har Norges mest bereiste ansatte som kan gi kunden veiledning på reisen de skal på såvel som på produktene vi fører.

Uteguiden AS is the leading adventure company on the Norwegian west coast. We offer a broad range of adventures, all year round, from ski touring to climbing and kayaking to glacier trips. Our goal has always been and will always be to provide the best guides and the best adventures possible between deep fjords and craggy summits.

How we design to make you happy
Children are open-minded, curious, playful and wonderfully creative. As parents, we, Mia and Louise, observe and enjoy this approach to life every day and we owe a lot of our best ideas to our children. Each style and every little detail are designed and made by us. Our designs are inspired by modern and conceptional arts and colors, different animal shapes and textures and the comfortable and functional elements of streetwear. We believe children are free to wear whatever they want, and a lot of our clothes are therefore not gender-specific. We tailor-make our prototypes to ensure the design fits children’s shape and movements. This makes our clothes comfortable to play in. When children play, they get messy – and children have to play! To resist the hard job of being worn by playing children all day, our clothes are made of high-quality textiles.
The artworks come to life!

Nordic Heat is an independent peer-to-peer training, advisory, resource pooling and business innovation service aiming to support the development of District Energy, Energy from Waste and Waste Management solutions in Europe and beyond.

Nordic Heat was founded in 2014 by a group of municipality owned energy operators in Sweden, all with more than 50 years of experience in installing and operating profitable district energy schemes in a deregulated energy market. The role of Nordic Heat is to assist project teams in securing the swift implementation of high performing, reliable and competitive waste management solutions while minimising investment levels, operational costs and risks. A wider objective is to optimising the commercial, social, environmental and political benefits of investments in sustainable energy. Nordic Heat also aims to actively facilitating efficient exchange of competences, experiences and new innovative technologies and practices, thereby strengthening the overall competitiveness of the sector. The Nordic energy operators involved in Nordic Heat have realised that the activity offers an opportunity not only to share experiences, but also to learn from peers abroad who in some respects are more advanced in application of new technologies and business practices, not least in the digital area. Additionally, having an international outlook has also proved to be beneficial in the process of recruiting and developing talented staff.

www.nordic-heat.eu/

KN Collection is a small Finnish hat- and apparel company founded in 1981.
At KN Collection we believe that hats are for everyone. Many people seem to be a little shy about wearing hats and have a hard time finding one that fits. We want to prove that there is a perfect hat for everyone – you just need to have courage to try!
KN Collection includes all sorts of hats from classical fedora hats to easygoing caps and beanies – and everything in between. We offer a wide selection of hats in a broad range of colours to make sure that everyone can find something they like from our collection.
Our hats are made in Italian and Polish family-owned factories and we are very proud of the excellent quality of our products. The materials are top quality – mainly made of virgin wool from Czech Republic and Italian lana cotta wool.

Our goal is to dress equestrians for the future, based on the classical traditions of design, quality and security. Consequently we are always looking out for original quality brands that can strengthen our selection, and add some extra to the market. When a product is distributed at Trolle Company, you will know that it is one of the best in its category.

When Trolle Company enters into a partnership with a brand supplier and a retailer, we are loyal, honest, trustworthy, and open minded in the collaborative relationship. To keep it simple we have named it Trollemanship.

We want to be the best alternative for reliable and qualitative second-life electronics in Europe.

Bij Schoonmakend Nederland zijn bijna 300 leden aangesloten die samen 70% van de markt realiseren. Zij zijn actief in schoonmaak van gebouwen, glazenwassen, gevelbehandeling, calamiteitenschoonmaak en reiniging in de voedingsmiddelenindustrie. In de branche werken 125.000 mensen, waarvan 100.000 bij leden van Schoonmakend Nederland.

De leden van Schoonmakend Nederland willen zich nadrukkelijk onderscheiden van bedrijven die het niet zo nauw nemen met de regels. Vandaar dat voor hen het Keurmerk Schoon verplicht is. Het keurmerk garandeert opdrachtgevers dat zij te maken hebben met bedrijven die de cao naleven en die staan voor kwaliteit, betrouwbaarheid en goed werkgeverschap. Ook geldt voor leden de Code Verantwoordelijk Marktgedrag, waarin is vastgelegd dat alle betrokken partijen bij aanbestedingen niet alleen kijken naar de prijs, maar ook kwaliteit van de uitvoering en de arbeidsomstandigheden moeten worden meegewogen. Daarmee geven de leden een helder en duidelijk signaal af: niet alleen de prijs telt, maar vooral kwaliteit staat voorop. Glas- en gevelreinigers kunnen daarboven op nog het keurmerk Glas & Gevel halen waarmee zij aantonen aam specifieke veiligheidseisen te voldoen.

Alle leden worden jaarlijks door een onafhankelijke inspectie instelling getoetst. In het overzicht bedrijven met Keurmerk Schoon staan alle bedrijven die aan de keurmerkeisen voldoen en bij Schoonmakend Nederland zijn aangesloten.

We’re here to propel businesses forward. To pursue amazing experiences that drive competitive advantage and sustainable growth. We believe there are great opportunities for everyone. But to get there faster you need an agency that helps you see beyond the horizon. And makes the digital dream work today.

We create unseen connections between technology, people and processes. Fueled by data and Artificial Intelligence. We close the gaps in the customer experience. Online, offline, wherever they are. We change the game by opening up new opportunities. Our mission is to outpace the competition and disrupt the entire market forward.

Connecting isn’t just our work. It’s the way we are. We don’t service clients; we embed them in our agency. We work with them, for them and alongside them, all at the same time. Even at their place, with inhouse solutions. In fact, we want to be an ecosystem rather than an agency. Adwise is a home for digital minds, clients and startups. Together we can achieve even greater things.

We are located in Utrecht and Almelo.

We build sports clubs in refugee camps and create sportswear to grow our club of supporters.

KLABU is a young organisation based mainly in Amsterdam, a social start-up with a scalable business model to power positive change.

Over the next decade, we aim to unlock access to sports for 1,000,000 refugees. To achieve this goal, we work closely with a wide range of partners and supporters including UNHCR, Paris Saint-Germain and Electronic Arts. 

The KLABU Foundation builds and operates our sports clubs on a non-profit basis. The Foundation is funded primarily through donations from institutions and private individuals, and proceeds from the sale of KLABU sportswear. 

The development and sale of KLABU sportswear is carried out by our social enterprise KLABU B.V. Developing and selling KLABU products gives us a level of independence to become a healthy organisation with long-term impact. Half the profits from sales go to the KLABU Foundation to maintain our sports clubs in refugee camps. The other half are reinvested to increase our brand’s impact. 

We invite everyone to join the club and support the unbeatable spirit at www.klabu.org.

Melkweg stands for pop culture in the most broad of senses. Each year, hundreds of concerts, club nights, films and music films, theatre performances, expositions and multidisciplinary events together attract more than 400,000 visitors.

The venue is located in the only surviving factory building on the Amsterdam canal ring, a former sugar and, later, milk factory. This historical building houses two concert halls, a cinema, a theatre, and an exposition space, which each can be used separately or combined together.

In the Melkweg, established names can be seen alongside new talent and emerging styles get the chance to reach a broader audience. The diversity of its programming and visitors, together with its different spaces and special location, have for years made the Melkweg a unique place.

Anyone can learn to program. We are convinced of that! Learning to work with code is becoming increasingly important. The tech industry is growing enormously, as a result of which the demand for people with the right skills is growing faster than the supply. With an innovative way of teaching, we ensure that our students develop these necessary skills. We train developers to start working immediately and teach professionals how to perform their work more efficiently with the help of (low/no-) code tools.

Winc Academy makes learning to program accessible to everyone by offering remote training courses, which you can start right away. All courses can be followed at your own pace and without any specific prior education. Despite this flexible approach, we find it important that Winc remains personal. We know our students and you know us and your fellow students! Learning (online) together is much more fun and instructive than alone.

Winc was founded in 2018 as a 100% remote school, so remote learning is in our DNA. We do not believe that it is enough to put a camera on a teacher and have everyone log in at home via a video conferencing tool. Remote teaching is much more than that. For example, how do you build a teaching program so students do not lose their attention? Or how do we ensure that we stay in touch with each other? How do we achieve a learning goal together? And how do we know if you really get it?

We've spent a lot of love and attention on all of these themes, and continue to do so on a daily basis. Because of this, our model has continued to improve in recent years.

O’Neill, the original California surf, snow and lifestyle brand, was founded in 1952 when a young man named Jack O’Neill took his unstoppable passion for surfing and used it to battle Mother Nature.  From the first neoprene surf wetsuit and board leash to the world’s first stitchless board shorts. O’Neill will always be committed to growing its reputation as one of the world’s leading youth lifestyle brands based on being the First Name in the water.

While many things have changed since those humble beginnings, Jack’s initial vision of producing functional and innovative board riding products continues to lie at the core of everything the company does. O’Neill’s core values — innovation in style and technology — have seen the brand devote itself wholeheartedly to the evolution of the action sports lifestyle. O’Neill’s progressive spirit will always drive the company forward.  For more information, please visit oneill.com.

Pieter Pot is a fast growing scale-up, which is offering groceries in circulair packaging. We started in 2019, as the first waste free online supermarket in The Netherlands. The founders started in a small attic room in Rotterdam, filled their glass jars and delivered them by cargo bike. Nowadays, we are delivering waste free shoppings in The Netherlands and Belgium and will add Germany soon. A world free of packaging is our limit.


We are an online supermarket with a physical operation. Which is managed by a young, innovative and committed team, which is driven by the growth and opportunity to make an enormous impact.
If we can make this circulair packaging model work, it will be disruptive. This inspires us every day to be passionate about Pieter Pot.

Please visit our website to see our job openings and start making impact.

Founded in 2000, Gaming Support designs and manufactures innovative products and technology solutions for the global gaming industry.

Its product line includes the BonusBox slot bonusing product, jackpot controllers, and the gaming industry’s leading media system specifically developed to broadcast the excitement and joy of players winning. The Company’s products also include the world’s first Slim line range of lightweight gaming signs, Standard casino signs, and LED displays.

Casino Services delivered by Gaming Support are based on its decades of experience installing, maintaining and refurbishing all 14 of the casinos operated by Holland Casino; this means that every day of the year, it looks after 7,000 or so gaming machines, almost 500 live tables, and all the peripheral equipment essential to operate these machines and tables.

Please take a look at our Products pages on LinkedIn or visit our website to find out more about Gaming Support; and feel free to contact us with any queries. You can follow us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/GamingSupport.

Armada Music is the biggest independent dance music label in the world, founded in 2003 by Armin van Buuren, Maykel Piron and David Lewis (AR-MA-DA). A six-time winner of the IDMA for ‘Best Global Label’, Armada Music boasts the globe’s biggest dance music catalog of over 40.000 titles and a mouth-watering artist roster. 

Promoting dance music all over the world from its offices in Amsterdam (HQ), New York and London, Armada Music represents and cultivates the creative exploits of some of the biggest players in the electronic music game, including Andrew Rayel, Armin van Buuren, ARTY, Brando, Cat Dealers, Ferry Corsten, Loud Luxury, Morgan Page, Sunnery James & Ryan Marciano and Tensnake. Through this star-studded dance music army, Armada Music collects over 500 million streams per month, secures weekly airplay on the biggest nation-wide broadcasting stations (such as BBC Radio 1 and Sirius XM), and frequents the top spots of the U.S. Mediabase Dance Airplay charts. Continually bringing out the best in its artists has led to various high-magnitude achievements, including Armin van Buuren’s Grammy nomination for ‘This Is What It Feels Like’, Lost Frequencies’ Diamond Award for exceeding the mark of one billion streams on Spotify and the huge success of Loud Luxury and Brando in the U.S. and beyond. 

A global brand outfitted with the esteemed ‘Armada Invites’ events, state-of-the-art, in-office facilities (The Club!, the radio studio and two production studios), producer platform Armada University and over 1 million followers across its biggest playlists, Armada Music can look back on many wondrous years while pulling out all the stops to ensure plenty more.

Thanks for taking an interest in Polaroid Originals. As of March 2020, Polaroid Originals has become Polaroid: one, unifying brand dedicated to analog instant photography. Find out more about us on our new profile.

We’re Polaroid: the original home of analog instant photography. Over our 82-year journey we’ve been called everything: The Impossible Project, Polaroid Originals, and now Polaroid; the brand where it all began. We create beautiful tools to bring people together in human and meaningful ways. In a world that’s more disconnected than ever, there’s never been a better time to appreciate what’s in front of you. From our refurbished vintage Polaroid cameras to our Phone to Polaroid™️ Lab, we create beautiful, life-enriching tools to ground you in the here and now. We exist to help you see everyday moments, to pause them, and to relive them in something you can hold in your hand and turn to forever. Join us.

Out of love and necessity rather than profit and novelty, Patta opened its doors in 2004. Situated right in the city heart of Amsterdam, the store literally became the center of attention by bringing new excitement to the Dutch street wear scene.

Founded by Edson Sabajo and Guillaume ‘Gee’ Schmidt as a means to provide themselves, as well as their friends and family with a steady supply of footwear and gear, that which has started as a hobby, has now flourished into a thriving business and recognizable brand. Both prominent figures in the Dutch Hip-Hop scene in the 90’s and early 2000’s, Edson as a DJ and Gee as host/MC, it was these common interests that grew into a strong friendship and viable business partnership.

Before the Tier 0, Quickstrike and Consortium accounts, the team traveled across the planet with wads of cash in their pockets, visiting obscure sneaker stores and buying vast amounts of footwear that was unavailable to the Dutch public. Without any shipping accounts or even knowledge of the like, they either posted huge boxes of shoes back to their hometown, or they threw them in big duffelbags and try to bring them back on the plane. This unwavering determination to make success happen, the just-do-it-yourself mentality and the willingness to go against the grain are the foundation of Patta's identity.

Aside from footwear staples such as Nike, adidas, Converse, ASICS, Reebok, KangaROOS, New Balance and Diadora, you can also find products from brands like Stüssy, Rockwell and Patta's in-house brand and more.

When Patta started out, the logo was used to make a small batch of t-shirts for friends, family and loyal customers. As demand was higher than expected, more were made and eventually evolved into our in-house brand. Starting out small with a capsule in the summer of 2011 available at five retailers worldwide, the collection has grown exponentially in size, quality and availability with 15 retailers stocking the brand.

Raw Color is co-founded by the designers Christoph Brach and Daniera ter Haar. The studios works interdisciplinary across the fields of graphic design, photography and product design. At the beginning of 2014 , father and son Wille started building their own filament extruder. They decided to do this because of the growing interest in 3D printing technology, the knowledge of plastic within the company and the company network. 3D4Makers is the result from a company that primarily dealt with selling plastic raw materials. Now the 3D4Makers team consists of five members, each with their own specialties. 

While building the filament extruder and testing it we found out that moisture in the filament can cause problems while printing. Moisture in the filament as wel as low purity of our material are the most important apects that will lower the quality of the printing product. 3D4Makers took this problem into account while building the filament extruder as well as buing the best raw material there is.On top of this our filament is directly- and vacuum packaged after the production process. 

Our material and production process makes the 3D4Makers filament particularly suitable for FDM and FFF 3D printers. The material has an excellent adhesion between the layers. This results in great improvement of the impact resistance, strength, durability, the printing process and “warping”.

We are able to respond to specific questions related to to specific applications of filament. I.e. medical, automotive, machinery and others. If you would like the check the possibilities, please contakt us.

Kivits Drunen is gespecialiseerd in het verlenen van diensten in de supply chain van geconditioneerde goederen. Onze activiteiten vinden plaats in het transport, distributie, warehousing en logistieke dienstverlening. Wij richten ons daarbij op ontvangst, opslag en registratie van de goederen tot het afleveren van de producten bij onze klanten. Daarnaast bieden wij klanten de mogelijkheid een kant-en-klare kantoorfaciliteit te huren en zijn wij in het bezit van een BRC-certificaat zodat de voedselveiligheid tijdens de gehele logistieke keten wordt gewaarborgd. Verder hebben wij de beschikking over een AEO-certificaat om als volwaardig douane-entrepot te kunnen functioneren.

Sprinklr zet je werkplek vol planten!

Planten brengen stresslevels omlaag, tussen planten werken mensen geconcentreerder, creatiever en productiever. Da's allemaal wetenschappelijk bewezen. Bovendien zijn ze uitstekend in het gezond maken van die kantoorlucht die vaak te droog is. Nog een plus van planten: ze absorberen geroezemoes en andere geluiden. 

Stel je wil planten op je werkplek! Dat regelen wij op twee manieren.

1. Makkelijk online bestellen
Jij kiest de planten via onze website, wij brengen ze bij je op kantoor. Met onze verzorgingstips houdt jij of een collega de planten jarenlang groen. 

Voor het bestellen even bellen voor advies over welke planten te kiezen kan natuurlijk altijd.

2. Jij pakt het groots aan, dus wij pakken het groots aan.
Wil je een transformatie? Top. Bel ons, mail ons! Met behulp van foto's, filmpjes of visite bekijken we je lichtinval, hoe de lucht stroomt, waar de verwarming zit... en zo komen we erachter welke planten goed zijn voor jouw kantoor. We bespreken de stijl die je tof vindt. Wil je strak? Wil je jungle? Wil je cactus? Wil je eighties? Wil je bamboe? Of het nou om planten gaat of potten, de keuze is reuze.

Naar aanleiding van jouw wensen en budget en de mogelijkheden die jouw kantoor biedt (wij weigeren planten neer te zetten op een plek waar ze niet gelukkig gaan zijn, sorry maar dat is ook echt beter voor jou), maken we een mooie offerte. Net zo lang tot je staat te juichen en niet kan wachten tot het groen naar binnen gesjouwd wordt en je kantoor getransformeerd is naar een heerlijk groene werkplek.

Verzorging kun je zelf gaan doe met onze tips, of we zorgen ervoor dat er regelmatig iemand met groene vingers bij je langskomt.
