Miele X is the global Digital Hub of Miele, and innovative platform where cross-functional teams in the area of E-commerce, Data & Analytics, Performance Marketing and IT work closely together to deliver a delightful consumer experience in the digital world. Miele X combines Miele premium brand heritage with an entrepreneurial vibe and agile working style. Thanks to our leading experts we are able to deliver excellent digital results with our local markets and headquarters.

Since being founded in 1899 Miele has followed its ‘Immer Besser’ brand promise. As the world’s leading manufacturer of premium domestic appliances, we create delightful experiences – not only with regard to the quality of our products, but also in terms of craftsmanship and design, performance, technology and sustainability.
Throughout the world, the family-run enterprise, now in its fourth generation, employs a workforce of 20.900 people.
At Miele, we set the highest quality standards for our products, and for ourselves. We work closely together and highly respect each other, with the common drive to be forever better.
As an innovation leader, we must always be ahead of the market – no matter how fast the world changes. That is why it is so important to us to discover the potential in people and to support them in a way that enables us to be better tomorrow than we are already today.

Goliath Games is an international manufacturer and distributor of toys and games (among our brands are Rummikub, Triominos, Rolit, Wordsearch, Pop the Pig, Doggie Doo, Gooey Looey, and many more).
 
Goliath is one of the few remaining family-owned businesses in the world of toys and games. Goliath was established in 1980 and ever since has grown tremendously. Currently, we hold offices in France, Germany, Spain/Portugal, Poland, Belgium, Netherlands, USA, Canada, Australia and Hong Kong. Our head office (R&D, financial administration and logistics) is located in the Netherlands, from where we export to approximately 60 countries world-wide.

Our slogan 'Clever Together!'​ applies not only to our products - that combine fun and wittiness - but also to the internal processes of creating them.

Vrumona is de frisdrankenonderneming van HEINEKEN. Vrumona's streven is om een betrouwbare, service georiënteerde en innovatieve organisatie te zijn, waarbij de consument centraal staat. 
Dit komt tot uiting in het gevarieerde aanbod van top kwaliteit drankmerken. Om de consument in z'n keuze van frisse dranken te kunnen voorzien hebben we niet alleen een goede relatie met de handel nodig, maar moeten we ook bewijzen beter te zijn dan onze concurrenten. Dat doen wij middels de service die we bieden en met continue merk- en productontwikkelingen.

Vrumona is in staat slagvaardig en initiërend om te gaan met veranderingen. Onze medewerkers vormen  hiervoor het fundament. Vrumona beschikt over ondernemende mensen  met een sterke drive. Medewerkers die oorspronkelijk durven te zijn en verantwoorde risico’s durven en mogen nemen. 

Op het gebied van maatschappelijk verantwoord ondernemen staat Vrumona midden in de samenleving en neemt zij haar verantwoordelijkheid. Bij het bereiden en verpakken van frisse dranken wordt voortdurend aandacht besteed aan het efficiënt gebruiken en verwerken van grondstoffen, verpakkingsmaterialen, water en energie. Hierbij wordt het milieu zo min mogelijk belast.

Vrumona heeft vele eigen merken en licentie merken onder beheer. Hieronder een overzicht van Vrumona's eigen merken en de licentie merken. 
Eigen merken: Crystal Clear, SiSi, Royal Club, Sourcy, Sourcy Vitaminwater en Climax
Licentie merken: Pepsi, 7UP, Gatorade en Rivella.

Vreugdenhil Dairy Foods is an independent dairy company based in the Netherlands that produces high-quality milk powders with passion and enthusiasm. We are deeply committed to the quality of our products, the services we provide to our customers and our partnerships with our suppliers. Vreugdenhil’s years of experience and professional expertise have made us a strong and reliable brand name, with millions of people throughout the world enjoying our quality products every day. We are currently one of the leading global suppliers of high-quality milk powders and dairy ingredients for the food and beverage industry.

De missie van HAK is om mensen altijd en overal te helpen meer groenten en peulvruchten te eten door het gemakkelijk en lekker te maken volgens de uitgangspunten van haar Groene keuken. Dat doet HAK met smakelijke en natuurlijke producten die snel en eenvoudig te bereiden zijn, van ingrediënten waarmee je zelf je eigen creaties maakt tot volwaardige maaltijden vol groenten en bonen. Producten die bovendien vol voedingsstoffen zitten zoals vezels, eiwitten en vitamines én die gemaakt zijn met een minimaal mogelijke negatieve impact op onze planeet. HAK oogst meer dan 80% van haar groenten en peulvruchten dicht bij huis binnen een straal van 125km. 

Groentefabrikant HAK werd in 1952 opgericht door de familie HAK in Giessen in het land van Heusden en Altena. HAK-waardige kwaliteit, nabijheid en verantwoordelijkheid van grond tot mond zijn de kernwaarden waar het bedrijf én het merk op gebouwd zijn en die nog altijd springlevend zijn.

HatchTech is a leading technology company, which enables poultry companies worldwide to maximise the genetic potential of their birds. Drawing on our unrivalled expertise in early-stage chicks, we create research-based products for incubation, chick transportation and brooding, and deliver and service our customers’ projects worldwide. Headquartered in the Netherlands, and with offices in China and Ukraine, HatchTech supports customers in over 40 countries. 

Part of HatchTech Group. https://hatchtechgroup.com/
Glencore Agriculture has rebranded to Viterra - The Agriculture Network.

Bolletje is een Hollandse bakker met een warm hart die lekkere producten bakt voor iedereen en voor elk moment van de dag. Dit doen wij al meer dan 140 jaar samen met ruim 500 medewerkers, verdeeld over onze bakkerijen in Almelo en Heerde.

Pas Reform is an international company that has specialised in the development of innovative, single-stage hatchery solutions for the poultry sector since 1919. The company has earned its position as one of the world’s leading hatchery equipment manufacturers, through decades of research into the biological and physiological aspects of embryo development. This, combined with a thorough understanding of all aspects of the poultry production chain and a dedicated focus on the future, places Pas Reform today as the only single-source supplier of integrated hatchery solutions in the world.

‘As a full-service partner we take care of spice challenges in food business’

Euroma is Europe’s foremost partner of taste, providing food business with a total range of spice-based solutions. 
Our people are dedicated to develop tasty, healthy, sustainable and safe ingredients, using spices and herbs from all over the world. Doing so, we build on a more than a century of expertise and entrepreneurship, blending tradition with cutting-edge and cost-effective processes.

Koffie op het werk wordt steeds belangrijker. Het drinken van een kop koffie is verbonden met de fijne momenten in ons leven. Zo zorgt Nestlé Professional altijd voor een verbindende factor op de werkvloer. 

Onze ambachtelijke ingrediënten, in combinatie met onze machines en service, zorgen voor de ultieme koffiebeleving op de werkvloer. Of het nu gaat om een klein kantoor of om een ziekenhuis, Nestlé Professional heeft altijd een passende oplossing. 

Met een breed assortiment van instantkoffie tot aan vers gebrande bonen biedt Nestlé Professional altijd de perfecte koffie voor de specifieke behoefte van uw bedrijf. 

Nestlé Professional heeft een bijzondere verantwoordelijkheid om ervoor te zorgen dat iedereen, nu en in de toekomst, kan genieten van heerlijke koffie tegen een redelijke prijs. Dit doen we door middel van Grown Respectfully – respect voor de koffieboeren, respect voor de gemeenschap en respect voor de planeet. Zo kunt u op het werk blijven genieten van de lekkerste koffie. 

Lees meer over Nestlé Professional op onze website.

Growing plants is our nature. We are firm believers in being the change for the global food chain. At PlantLab we produce fresh food locally, without pesticides, using 95% less water and less land. Developing and operating custom-built indoor farms at a commercial scale is our core business. We are already making an impact in the Netherlands, USA, and the Bahamas. We bring together highly motivated engineers, researchers, entrepreneurs, and global leaders to strengthen this movement.

Founded in 1898 and rooted in The Netherlands, HZPC has grown to become global market leader in seed potato trading, innovative breeding and concept development. We aim for durable growth. We offer innovative potato varieties that are optimized for local growing conditions. We share knowledge and serve solutions that dynamically anticipate the climatological, cultural and commercial challenges the entire field of food faces. With 400 employees across 19 countries, and exports to over 90 countries, we contribute to the availability of responsible food for the well-being of millions of people worldwide.

Costes is een lifestyle brand met een on-trend collectie. Hierin komen style, kwaliteit & persoonlijke service samen tot een unieke shopping experience voor de modebewuste vrouw. Costes is een merk van internationale allure waar je voor iedere gelegenheid terechtkunt voor een day-to-night look. Werken bij Costes is inspirerend, zowel in onze sfeervolle winkels als op het artistieke hoofdkantoor. Onze werknemers zijn de ambassadeurs van ons merk waarbij fun, no-nonsense en striving for the best hoog in het vaandel staan. We geven je graag alle ruimte om door te groeien en je ambities waar te maken. Inmiddels heeft Costes 40 stores, verspreid door heel Nederland. Sinds 2017 verrassen we ook de Vlaamse consument vanuit ons prachtige winkels in Antwerpen, Gent en Hasselt.

Get inspired & come join us!
 
Jobs:          http://jobs.costesfashion.com
Webshop:  http://costesfashion.com

Vanilia richt zich op het mooier maken van de vrouw. Dit doen wij vanuit de Adelaar, onze HeadQuarters. Zodra je het pand betreedt, stap je de wereld van Vanilia binnen. Hier komen 12 collecties per jaar tot stand. De hoogwaardige stoffen die wij hiervoor gebruiken worden veelal geïmporteerd uit Italië, Portugal, Turkije en soms zelfs van eigen bodem. Het design team gaat hiermee aan de slag, waarna de items stuk voor stuk uitvoerig worden getest in ons eigen laboratorium. Ook wordt de ambacht van het patronen maken hier nog steeds uitgeoefend.

14 keer per jaar presenteren wij een nieuwe collectie. Deze bestaat altijd uit drie verschillende lijnen, ieder ontworpen door een eigen designer. Deze exclusieve collecties worden in kleine oplages geproduceerd. De eerste lijn is er om de vrouw op een moderne manier naar het werk te laten gaan. Daarnaast richt een lijn zich op een sportieve look met couture afwerkingen. Tot slot is er een lijn die focust op de feestelijke momenten.

We zijn graag transparant over de herkomst van onze producten. Al meer dan 20 jaar vervaardigen we ruim 90% van de collecties in ons eigen atelier. Dit atelier ligt in het kenmerkende landschap van Cappadocië, Turkije. Hier werken vakmensen onder goede omstandigheden. Er is dagelijks nauw contact tussen de HQ en het atelier. 

Wij hechten waarde aan mens en milieu en vinden het belangrijk om transparant te zijn in de wijze waarop onze collecties tot stand komen. Sinds 1 mei 2014 zijn wij aangesloten bij Fair Wear Foundation (FWF). Dit is een non-profit organisatie die zich richt op het verbeteren van de werkcondities in de textielindustrie. Op het gebied van duurzaamheid zijn we continu bezig met het integreren van nieuwe technologieën in onze processen en bedrijfsvoering. 

In Nederland hebben wij 18 verschillende boutiques. Wij hebben ervoor gekozen om ons te vestigen in monumentale panden met een achtergrond en een eigen verhaal.

WE ARE GARCIA

Conceived in Italy, crafted in the Netherlands. GARCIA is the fashion brand with a denim heart.

We are part of the JOG Group, our mother company under which Jeans Centre (Jeans Specialist retailer with 100 stores & online), GARCIA Outlets (38 Outlet Stores across Europe), and GARCIA operate.

The company is family owned, was founded in 1977 and has over 1000 employees across Europe. 

GARCIA’s Head Office is based in Ablasserdam, a small city under the wings of Rotterdam, the Netherlands. 

In 2018 GARCIA is sold in 35 countries, with an estimated turnover of 110 million euro and with the DACH* Area as our biggest market.

Filling Pieces'​ mission is to provide the world with the ultimate footwear experience by pushing boundaries and challenging the status quo. The collections are all designed in Amsterdam and hand crafted by the finest family owned footwear ateliers in Portugal.

Taking pride in our roots, a melting pot of cultures, we maintain and encourage a contemporary, creative, innovative and very ambitious atmosphere. A major topic within our organization is innovation, not only in our designs but innovation in all aspects of the business. We’re always challenging ourselves to push the bar and never stop learning. The FP family consists out of a young, ambitious and above all, passionate team of talented people.

“Innovation is the essence of our brand. Pushing the boundaries in the field of leather and fabric use is something we strive for every season. While having our signature silhouettes as the foundation of each collection.” – Guillaume Philibert

DENHAM the Jeanmaker was founded in Amsterdam in 2008 by Jason Denham, an English jeanmaker who’s obsessed with creating premium quality denim. The brand has since expanded to offer a full range of collections for men and women including outerwear, tops, bottoms and accessories. Additional categories include children’s jeans and tops, footwear and eyewear.

Driven by the pioneering spirit of the original blue jean, DENHAM approaches design with a passion for innovation while honouring tradition. It combines its experience in wash recipes, fit perfection and contemporary cuts with fabrics from the world’s best mills in Italy and Japan. Inspired by the tagline ‘The Truth is in the Details,’ DENHAM obsesses over every detail of the design process and across every brand touchpoint.

DENHAM’s iconic scissor logo — inspired by Denham’s first pair of tailor scissors — is recognised worldwide as a symbol of quality. Every pair of DENHAM jeans is embroidered with this trademark, which is meticulously crafted from 691 stitches.

The brand is positioned in the premium segment. Its growing global retail network reaches over 20 countries, including key stores in Amsterdam, Antwerp, Hamburg, Tokyo, Osaka and Sydney. DENHAM is based in Amsterdam, with satellite offices in Düsseldorf, Shanghai and Tokyo.

Nuna, the global brand with Dutch roots has been focusing on creating smart, helpful and bold baby gear since 2007. 

First-hand experiences in parenthood show that practicality and beauty is the perfect balance when it comes to Nuna's clever solutions that spans across car seat, stroller, and in home categories. Inspired by the clean lines and ingenuity of Dutch design, the collection is as easy, safe, and as flexible as new parents need it to be. 

With thoughtful design put in to every detail, Nuna designs around your life.

elho is a flourishing, family-owned company with over 55 years of experience in making sustainable synthetic pottery and related products. It is our mission to connect as many people as possible with nature. We do so by creating and developing beautiful designer pots, along with everything you need to make your life easy when it comes to keeping your plants happy and healthy. Nature makes you feel happier and healthier and gives an energy boost. And, because nature is so important to us, we consider it our responsibility to do business in a conscientious and sustainable manner. Through constantly improving ourselves, we have developed elho into the European market leader and a frontrunner when it comes to sustainabilty. elho is proud to be a Certified B Corporation.

Thanks to the craft beer revolution, beer has boomed. The only trouble is
knowing what’s out there, what’s good, and how you go about getting it
from the brewery to your front door?

Which is where Beerwulf comes in.

Beerwulf was born from the belief beer deserved its own speciality
store - a place where everyone could access all the beers, the brewers,
information and inspiration they want (or never knew they wanted).

Simply put, Beerwulf is the platform to open your eyes, mind and taste
buds to the world of beer. It’s a web shop where you can choose from hundreds of beers, or simply select one of our curated packs. Added to
that, the best in home draught is on offer with a growing selection of kegs
and draught systems like THE SUB. And it’s all easily ordered online, at a
great price and delivered straight to your door.

But we’re as much about the brewers as we are about the beer - after all, where would we be without them? We passionately share stories from brewers around the world, and take pride in connecting those who like drinking beer with those that love brewing it.

So whether you’re pushing your palate with one of our packs, tapping
into the perfect pour from THE SUB or getting to know the brewer behind
your new favourite beer - we want you to have fun unlocking the world of
beer.

The Kingfish Company [Euronext:KING] sets a new standard of uncompromising quality and sustainability in technology driven aquaculture.

Fully operational with its first product- the Dutch Yellowtail- land raised in the Netherlands without antibiotics or vaccines, and operating on 100% renewable energy. 

Packed and processed fresh or sashimi grade frozen on day of harvest, and delivered across Europe in 24-48 hours.

The only Yellowtail [Hiramasa/Kingfish] certified by ASC & BAP. Official "Green Choice"​ of the Good Fish Foundation. Winner of the 2018 Horecava Innovation Award. Preferred Product Partner of the Jeunes Restaurateurs. Winner of the 2019 Seafood Global Excellence Award as best HORECA product at the Brussels Seafood Expo.

With an optimally located site on the shores of the Oosterschelde marine nature reserve in the Netherlands servicing the EU market daily, full cycle hatchery, an on site R&D facility, and an advanced grow-out system- and a 2nd site in development in Jonesport Maine for the US market- The Kingfish Company is a first mover operating at the cutting edge of land based high value marine aquaculture in the EU and the US.

Listed on Euronext Oslo under stock ticker KING

Eosta is a leading international distributor of organic fresh fruits and vegetables, with Nature & More as it's leading "trace & tell"​ consumer trademark. We combine a unique range of year-round products with efficient logistics, quality assurance and product development, as well as innovative pre-packing facilities and ecological and social responsibility via the Nature & More "trace and tell"​ system. For Eosta, economy and ecology are indissolubly connected and underlie all commercial services to growers, consumers and those involved in the international organic sector.


Nature & More originated last century as an additional quality assurance program of EOSTA. Eosta has been involved for many years to convince growers all over the world to change to organic or bio-dynamic practices and has assisted these growers with ecological advice to ensure their economic success. In response to consumer demand for healthy, organic and fairly traded food, Nature & More was created. The aim is to communicate the commitment and effort that individual organic growers make towards the planet and its people.

We believe that the market is changed by every purchasing decision.  We want to provide you with the necessary information so you can make an educated purchasing decision, because we believe that “a small group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world. Indeed, it's the only thing that ever has"​.   (Margaret Mead)

When it comes to fresh, Aartsen goes beyond the extra mile. We offer everything in the world of fruit and vegetables. Literally. Every day we make sure that our range of fresh fruit and vegetables from around the world finds its way to our customers. We call this NONSTOPFRESH. 

This makes Aartsen the one and only true international gateway for fruit and vegetables. Nothing is too far or  too crazy for us. We can even make a kiwi fly. Aartsen will do anything to deliver fruit and vegetables fresher than fresh to one of our Benelux destinations or  to Hong Kong. Partners based in all corners of the world make this possible. They grow the best and finest fruit and vegetables for us. This is the reason why we say that we go the extra mile for fresh fruit and vegetables at aartsenfruit. 

We are located in Breda, Venlo (the Netherlands), St. Katelijne-Waver (Belgium) and Hong Kong.

Koninklijke Peijnenburg, onderdeel van Lotus Bakeries NV, is een succesvolle fabrikant van kwalitatief hoogstaande consumentenproducten. 

Met bakkerijen in Geldrop, Sintjohannesga en Enkhuizen produceert Koninklijke Peijnenburg een breed assortiment koek en banketproducten onder de volgende merknamen:
• Peijnenburg
• Wieger Ketellapper
• Snelle Jelle
• Lotus
• Echte Enkhuizer

Daarnaast heeft Lotus Bakeries in 2015 een aantal grote merken in het segment van de natuurlijke tussendoortjes overgenomen, vanuit de overtuiging dat we naast producten die zich richten op verwenning, ook moeten investeren in een sterke healthy snacking activiteit. Hiervoor zijn de volgende merken overgenomen:
• Nakd
• BEAR
• TREK
• Urban Food
• Kiddylicious

Bij Koninklijke Peijnenburg zijn passie en teamspirit om het elke dag weer beter te doen het recept achter deze resultaten en de basis voor toekomstige groei en ontwikkeling.

'Care for today - respect for tomorrow'​, ondernemen met zorg voor vandaag en met respect voor morgen, daar geloven we rotsvast.

Geïnteresseerd in een baan of stage bij Koninklijke Peijnenburg? Reageer op de vacatures of stuur een open sollicitatie naar recruitment@peijnenburg.nl

New York Pizza operates as a pizza (delivery) company. It sells and delivers pizzas under ‘New York Pizza’ brand name. 

The company operates through a network of >190 company-owned and franchise stores, and it keeps on growing.

New York Pizza was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in The Netherlands (Amstelveen). 

Euro Pizza Products is the number one wholesaler for New York Pizza, as a buyer and supplier. The range varies from pizza dough, sauce, toppings to the pizza boxes. Euro Pizza Products has its own website: www.europizzaproducts.com. As of 2015 Euro Pizza Products has its own active LinkedIn page, where fun and informative content is shared every week.

HillFresh is an importer and exporter of fresh fruits, vegetables and exotics in The Netherlands.

HillFresh delivers top quality produce and is always looking for new varieties with more flavor and higher returns adding value to all partners in the chain. You can contact HillFresh for delicious tasting fruits like kiwifruit, citrus, grapes and melons. And vegetables like tomatoes, peppers, broccoli and iceberg lettuce.

HillFresh products are food safe, are GLOBAL certified and have full traceability.

HillFresh achieves this by sharing knowledge and experience and working in a transparent way allowing everybody involved a fair living.

For more information, don't hesitate to contact us!

Royal Auping is the largest independent Dutch bed manufacturer with its own production site in the Netherlands and sales offices in a number of European countries. In addition Auping works closely with international distributors. Auping started as a blacksmith in Deventer in 1888. Johannes Auping started a new trend 125 years ago with the spiral mesh base. After this the company specialised in beds with a spiral mesh base. This was later supplemented with mattresses and box springs. This way Auping transformed itself into the sleeping specialist and market leader in the Netherlands. By continuously investing in innovation and design, Auping has always maintained its status as a trendsetter in sleeping comfort. The focus in this regard is on three brand values: Ultimate Comfort, Design and Durable Quality.

Auping collaborates with scientists and renowned designers on ongoing product innovation. Knowledge of the sleeping process and the use of new materials and techniques form the basis of Auping's unique comfort. The craftsmanship, dedication and experience of employees guarantee durable quality and high service levels. By signing the C2C Charter, Auping became the first bed manufacturer in the world to be entitled to call itself a Cradle to Cradle organisation. Auping is aiming to make all business processes, products and services sustainable and compliant with C2C philosophy by 2020.

We create optimum sustainable environments, as designer, manufacturer and supplier, that have a positive influence on people and planet.

Core values: Sustainability & Design

Sustainability
Sustainability, how to maximize human well-being and at the same time to minimize environmental strain. Lifecycle and also recycling are always a starting point when drafting a design. These starting points determine the manner of production and ultimately recycling again. We also involve our clients continuously with our aspiration for maximum durability. Furthermore, we also offer new talented (designers) the chance to develop themselves on a social level.

Design
Design at its best, to improve your life. The more well-formed our products are, the more pleasure people will get out of it. Our designs are practical, well-thought-out, durable  and a little bit (smart). Together with our designers, clients and suppliers, we strive to optimize environments which are stable in value.

El objetivo de Bodegas Salentein es claro: elaborar vinos de la más alta calidad, comprometidos con la tierra en la que nacen. Durante su elaboración, Salentein respeta la naturaleza y, al mismo tiempo, se involucra con la comunidad de la zona; porque la gente se convierte en un componente esencial que se refleja en la expresión de los vinos

Our mission is to inspire young fashion-minded babes to be awesome, proud and confident - inside and out! 

At LOAVIES we create on-trend and affordable fashion with a fun-loving attitude. We are the fave influencer who excites and inspires the next generation to take on the world and live life like cool babes do! We spark them to take that spotlight. We do this by being the favourite influencer on their list.

Founded in 2012 by three friends who believed in changing the world of fashion, LOAVIES has been a Dutch success story ever since. With over 100 passionate team members, we are now keen to conquer the rest of Europe… and the world.

READY FOR YOUR NEXT ADVENTURE?

We believe LOAVIES is a fantastic place to work if you are looking to join a fast growing company with a dynamic culture. We are an innovative fashion brand, where our people are key and at the core of everything we do. We encourage them to take the lead and be as creative as possible. 

We are ready to take LOAVIES to the next level, and are looking for people who are ready to join us on this adventure. Are you ready to join our squad and grow with us? Check out our vacancies, we look forward to hearing from you.

#LOAVIES #lifeatloavies #iloaviesmyjob #growwithloavies #makefashionimpact

Once upon a time Jukka Setälä, a designer from Golla (Finland), was listening to the edgy tunes of Fatboy Slim (no, really!) while designing the 21st century beanbag. This combination of activities resulted in an oversized beanbag of the highest quality with a cheeky huge label on the side. Fatboy® the original was born.

Since the launch on the Dutch market in 2002, the design of Fatboy® proved to sell itself. Within 10 years Fatboy® successfully conquered country after country without using voodoo or cunning marketing tricks.
The only trick in the book was, and still is, to always treat Fatboy® as an established brand and to only act upon opportunities when it's good for Fatboy®.

And now.. there's no stopping the Fatboy® family tree! Gigantic lamps, über-sized umbrellas, magical hammocks and outdoor chandeliers, all designed to add a smile to life.

Selling in over 50 countries and every continent, plus a USA branch...keep your eyes peeled because it is only the start of the Fatboy® legacy.

Headquartered in the Netherlands, Dobotex is Europe’s fastest moving product licensee. Representing global A-brands like PUMA, Tommy Hilfiger, Levi’s, and HEAD, Dobotex is a market leader in designing, producing, and selling branded socks and underwear. We are an organization that keeps moving.

Hutspot offers a unique combination of timeless fashion, innovative design, and local art. Aiming to curate an accessible platform, we provide young designers and artists an opportunity to sell their goods alongside established brands.

HOW WE STARTED
Founded in 2012, Hutspot started as a small pop-up store in the Utrechtsestraat. This Amsterdam based concept offered a unique shopping experience, with extensive possibilities for local entrepreneurs and artists to showcase their product.

Our first official store opened in December 2012 at Van Woustraat in Amsterdam. Next to offering product, the store quickly became a popular hangout due to a spacious lunchroom and friendly barber. The concept was expanded with a second store at Rozengracht in Amsterdam one year later. Following, we opened stores in Utrecht (2015), Rotterdam (2016) and Eindhoven (2017). The Hutspot brand, including a webshop, was launched in 2018.

THREE NEW STORES IN 2019
In 2019, we are planning to open three new stores. Our third store in Amsterdam was opened at Magna Plaza in June, following a store in Breda in August. Hutspot store number eight will open its doors at an unknown location later this year.

WORKING AT HUTSPOT
Interested in joining our team? 
Check hutspot.com/jobs for our current vacancies.

Welcome to BenQ Corporation – a world-leading human technology and solutions provider driven by the corporate vision of “Bringing Enjoyment ‘N’ Quality to Life” to elevate and enrich the aspects of life that matter most to people today – lifestyle, business, healthcare and education.
 
Set apart by the unique philosophy of “Because it matters”, BenQ is committed to empower people today to live better, increase efficiency, feel healthier and enhance learning through people-driven, innovation-fueled products, services and solutions. The spirit, as our very existence to improve the experience of life in every aspect, underlies our product development, business model, partnerships and corporate culture. It is also what inspires our dedicated employees and directs us in global citizenry.
 
Because it matters, BenQ will continue to utilize substantial resources and proven expertise in product design, visual display, mobile solutions and network convergence technologies with the hope to delight the world, offering a broad range of products, services and solutions: digital projectors, professional monitors, interactive large-format displays, imaging solutions, mobile computing devices, and LED lighting solutions.

With substantial resources and proven expertise in product design, visual display, mobile solutions, and network convergence technologies, BenQ offers a broad range of products:

* Projectors
* LCD Monitors
* Large-Size LCD Display
* Digital Cameras
* Lighting Products
* Mobile Computing Devices

Denkavit is the specialist in young animal nutrition and a leading partner for farmers and feed industry. Denkavit has high-level expertise in developing and manufacturing a range of innovative Denkavit Feed Specialties, and in providing high grade support in animal nutrition during the first stages of life. In addition, the Denkavit Ingredients division is a respected supplier of special raw materials and selected additives to the animal feed industry.  

The Denkavit group is a family-owned, internationally oriented enterprise based in The Netherlands, with subsidiaries in France, Germany, Italy, Spain and USA. The Export Department is responsible for the distribution of Denkavit milk replacers and piglet feeds in over 60 countries throughout the world. 

Denkavit invests more than average in research and development. The research farms of Denkavit in The Netherlands and France accommodate veal calves, rearing calves, sows and piglets. Besides this, our activities are supported by a modern and fully equipped Denkavit laboratory for monitoring, research and development.

Denkavit, growing together!

Do you want more information or are you looking for career opportunities? Visit our website www.denkavit.com.  

Denkavit Nederland BV
Tolnegenweg 65
3781 PV Voorthuizen

Van Oers United is an internationally active supplier and producer of year-round fresh vegetables. It has been operating in the European market and beyond for decades. The intensive cooperation between Van Oers and its own and other growers assures Van Oers of the shortest and fastest possible chain, which results in a product of optimum freshness.

Van Oers United believes in making expertise, determination and commitment the most important of its core values. These are the pillars that enable us to achieve our goal of ‘Delivering Excellent Produce’. Van Oers United’ strives to be recognised and acknowledged as the premier partner in its market.

Delivering
Our logistic capabilities combined with optimum availability allow us to deliver a quality of delivery that surprises our customers day after day.

Excellent
Quality and customised service are key concepts within our organisation and they are put into practice by a supporting team of professionals.

Produce
We are fully involved in the cultivation process to guarantee quality and freshness. As we manage the chain from start to finish, we are able to offer you top-quality produce with an excellent shelf life.

Axia is an innovative breeding company, specialised in creating vegetable seeds for protected crops. We run a dedicated program for heated greenhouses, with or without artificial light. Our breeding programme is characterised by a strong focus at taste and healthy ingredients, with a very high yield. 

The philosopy behind the start of Axia is a strong drive to create new and innovative vegetable hybrids, that excel in the fields of both quantity as well quality. In other words: this means an exceptional taste and a surplus of healthy ingredients in good harmony with a very interesting high yield. In order to realise this ambition we use the latest techniques and facilities in the field of research and development.

In our state-of-the-art research centre in Naaldwijk a team of highly experienced professionals collaborates in developing and breeding new varieties, that are a promise for the future. In addition we run a major tomato breeding programme in our branches in China, Thailand and Italy.

The office and greenhouse are located in Naaldwijk.
Headquarters:
Burgemeester Elsenweg 53
2671 DP Naaldwijk
The Netherlands

Breeding Station:
Monnikenlaan 6a
2671 NE Naaldwijk
The Netherlands

Bij het maken van onze salades hebben we maar één doel voor ogen: Johma moet gewoon de
allerlekkerste zijn! 
Daarom gebruiken wij alleen de beste ingrediënten voor onze salades. 
En elke dag weer zijn we er trots op om met de mooiste kwaliteitsingrediënten te mogen werken.
Onze missie:
Wij laten iedereen genieten van de allerlekkerste salades.

De kernwaarden die Johma uitdraagt voor deze missie zijn: Vakmanschap, Klantgerichtheid, Noaberschap en Willen Winnen.

Agrico: your powerful partner from seedling to the supermarket shelf
 
A powerful, cooperative organisation that sells potatoes all over the world, breeds new varieties and develops innovative solutions. That sums up Agrico. From seedling to the supermarket shelf.

Koninklijke Verkade Nederland is opgericht in 1886 in Zaandam. Een oer-Hollands bedrijf in een internationale omgeving. Koninklijke Verkade heeft de ambitie om de meest gewaardeerde merkenfabrikant te zijn, met de lokale merken Verkade en Sultana en global merken Godiva en McVitie’s. Ruim 300 ambitieuze en gemotiveerde medewerkers werken dagelijks met plezier aan de sterke marktposities van onze merken binnen de categorieën biscuits, tussendoor en chocolade. Hiermee voorzien wij in de dagelijkse behoeften van de consumenten en klanten. Duurzaamheid en efficiency zijn hierbij belangrijke pijlers.  

Koninklijke Verkade is sinds 2014 onderdeel van Yildiz Holding. Yildiz Holding, CEEMEA's grootste voedingsmiddelenorganisatie, heeft zijn business in koek en chocolade bij elkaar gebracht onder de nieuwe wereldwijde onderneming: pladis (www.pladisglobal.com). pladis is een wereldwijde leider in koek en zoetwaren met activiteiten in 120 landen in Europa, het Midden-Oosten, Afrika, Azië en Amerika. Onder pladis vallen 36 fabrieken in 13 landen met ruim 26.000 werknemers. Met het streven naar "we promise hapiness to the world with every bite"​, verrijkt de organisatie de consumenten met producten in zoete en hartige koekjes, wafels, cake, chocolade, kauwgom en snoep.

Since 1971 Satelliet Meubelen has been a trustworthy supplier offering a varied, high-end, international furniture collection. Satelliet Meubelen likes to be a trendsetter. We have in depth knowledge of the market, follow trends carefully and share our ideas and knowledge with our customers. Visit our website for more information and order your copy of our new catalogue.

Founded in 2011 NIKKIE is now one of the fastest growing high fashion brands in The Netherlands, covering medium/high to high segment boutiques, department stores and mono brand stores. 

NIKKIE is rapidly growing internationally and distributed world wide by well known high-end fashion agents and distributors.

YAYA is a lifestyle brand. We create comfortable and feminine collections, which are easy to style and to love seasons long. We’re known for our designs in soft fabrics and tone down colors. It all results in items with surprising charm. Add a tough touch to the softness and you’ve got the full YAYA package.

Our collections are sold worldwide at over 2500 selling points. You can find more than 25 YAYA concept stores in 5 countries. Our headquarter is based in a tiny village near Amsterdam, where we do what we love and love what we do.

QWIC is a fast growing light electric vehicle brand based in Amsterdam, the Netherlands. We develop, manufacture and sell innovative electric bicycles for urban commuters.

At QWIC we believe electric mobility is the answer to today’s challenges of congestion and pollution. By developing and producing light electric vehicles we make products that are not only sustainable, but also cool to have and fun to ride.

Our innovative e-bikes get distributed through a fast growing network of >600 retailers in the Netherlands, Belgium, Germany and the UK. In addition, QWIC supplies products and services to OEM and professional distributors.  

At QWIC the whole team is pushing the boundaries of the bicycles as well as the electronics, marketing and logistics. To do so, we have built a strong network of partners around us. To take the next step together with our partners, we would like you to join our team!  

Looking for a new job at an international, fast growing organization with an average age of 31, an office in Amsterdam with an awesome waterfront view and a well prepared lunch every day. If that sounds good, keep reading..

Bata Industrials is a specialist in safety and protective footwear. We produce and sell over nine million pairs of safety shoes and 700k pairs of socks annually. The knowledge center of Bata Industrials is in the Netherlands.  We have factories and offices all over the world. As a leader in the safety footwear industry we have created a progressive Research and Development department and a Satra certified testing laboratory. Bata Industrials is part of the Bata Shoe Organisation, the world’s largest shoe manufacturer.

Smartwares Group is a consumer driven leading European player in smart safety, lighting & home appliances with offices in The Netherlands, UK, Germany, France, Spain, Portugal, Italy, Sweden, Lebanon, Turkey, Hong Kong and China. Our products are sold in more than 80 countries. 

Smartwares Group offers affordable, well designed and easy to use appliances and solutions that help make daily life easier, better and more fun. We offer the following brands: Tristar (www.tristar.eu), Princess (www.princesshome.eu), Campart (www.campart.eu), Smartwares (www.smartwares.eu), Topcom (www.topcom.eu) and Byron (www.chbyron.eu).

Our goal is to create value for our customers. We do this by quickly adopting global trends and translating them to exciting products, always at the required quality standards and supported by our R&D center. We invest in strong partnerships with our suppliers and customers and make sure we control every step in the value chain to deliver what we promise. By pursuing economies of scale, we keep our prices attractive. 

Want to know more? 
Additional information on Smartwares Group and our business activities can be found at www.smartwaresgroup.com

Van Gelder is een bedrijf dat zich richt op de levering van onbewerkte, panklare en gegaarde aardappelen, groenten en fruit, salades en maaltijden.

De producten van Van Gelder hebben invloed op honderdduizenden mensen in Nederland en België. Iedere dag worden onze producten bij duizenden professionele keukens, groenteboeren en supermarkten afgeleverd. 

We hebben de taak om te zorgen dat de producten die we afleveren goed, gezond en vers zijn. Zo zorgen we dat een kok, versondernemer of consument met plezier aan de slag gaat met aardappelen, groente en fruit. Daarom vinden we onszelf #volvanvers.

In 1993, Alltech Coppens was established. From the start the company's sole focus was on aquatic feeds. Committed as we are, it remains to be our sole focus today. Our experienced fish feed specialists develop high-quality, innovative fish feed programs for almost every species of farmed fish in all their development stages. For many years Alltech Coppens is also recognized as an important player in the ornamental fish sector.  

www.alltechcoppens.com
coppens@alltech.com

FruitMasters is the largest fruit cooperative in the Netherlands with unrivalled capacity to deliver Dutch quality fruit directly from the source. Combined with its versatile packaging and constant pursuit of innovation, FruitMasters creates a fruit experience for carefree enjoyment.

"Allowing growers to do business successfully"​

That’s what gets us out of bed in the morning. We facilitate the carefree enjoyment of fruit grown with care by the grower by organising volumes easily, faster and more innovatively. We are your partner when it comes to the flexible supply of fresh, natural and high quality fruit.

Getting the best out of man and nature
Fruit is a vulnerable product. We believe that the love put into the product is reflected in the quality. FruitMasters ensures a fair process in which the grower negotiates the best possible price for the product. Innovation and creativity are important building blocks for how we manage our business relations. The growers have been our source for many years. They get the best out of nature. We have been proud of that for 100 years.

Specialist in hard and soft fruits
FruitMasters is able to supply the fruit market all year round. FruitMasters mainly focuses on hard and soft fruits, but can also deliver stone fruits, grapes and exotic fruits. As a marketing organisation of Dutch growers, FruitMasters supplies fruit directly from the source. This enables us to manage the entire process better, from grower to consumer, from sorting to packing and from branding to shelf presentation. We also specialise in customised packaging, which you can either choose yourself or together with us. FruitMasters ensures a fruit experience for carefree enjoyment at home or abroad.

For more information about our products. Go to https://fruitmasters.com 🍓🍏🍒

Protifarm’s high-tech vertical farm and processing facility in the Netherlands produces innovative and sustainable ingredients for the food industry, derived from insects. Protifarm is the Dutch food branch of Ÿnsect. 

Our functional ingredients contain highly digestible proteins along with essential nutritional building blocks like vitamins, minerals, fiber and healthy fats.

In our controlled and highly scalable vertical farm, Protifarm reduces your global footprint in the most effective way.

Hilton Foods Holland is onderdeel van Hilton Food Group plc. Haarlem was once a city with many breweries. Place names such as Brouwersvaart (Brewers'​ Canal) Brouwerskade (Brewers'​ Quay) and Brouwershofje (Brewers'​ Yard) remind us of this rich history. Beer brewing was by 1400 the most important commercial activity of the city. By the late Middle Ages, beer from Haarlem was exported all over the world, indeed even used as a form of currency in the southern province of Oost Zeeland. It was shipped by the Dutch East India Company to the Orient, and was well known in Flanders (Belgium) and Northern France. In 1995, inspired by all this history and the loss of all the historic breweries, a group of enthusiastic Haarlemmers took up the challenge of putting Haarlem back on the world beer map. That year, after centuries of absence, Haarlems Jopenbier was brought back onto the market. This happily coincided with that year's celebrations of the city's 750th anniversary, bringing a taste of the past with Hoppenbier's recipe, which dates from the year 1501.The success of Jopen (Named after an ancient brewing vessel of 112 litres), was followed by the launch of Jopen KOYT, a beer in which the mediaeval recipe demanded the use of herbs for flavouring rather than hops. In 1999, Jopen ADRIAAN was introduced, a light varient of another herbal beer from 1407.
Encouraged by the success of these beers, the Haarlem brewers brought a unique Bokbier (Traditional Dutch Autumn beer) onto the market.This is brewed from four different grains (Malted barley, wheat, oats, rye), smooth tasting rather than sweet. Jopen Bokbier is the best selling beer from an independent brewery in The Netherlands. Since 2003, there is also a Jopen LENTEBIER (Spring beer) available, which is distinguished by the liberal amount of coriander seeds with which it is brewed.

Intergas: an introduction. 

Intergas has, for more than 40 years, been at the forefront of domestic boiler manufacture in the Netherlands. The invention of the 'Double High Efficiency'​ heat exchanger has revolutionized boiler technology. 

Double High Efficiency. 

The Intergas Combi Compact HRE boiler has ground breaking technology and incorporates the latest ’Double High Efficiency’ heat exchanger. Due to the separate central heating and hot water circuits the Intergas Combi Compact HRE doesn’t use a diverter valve and secondary domestic hot water plate heat exchanger. This eliminates a significant source of possible future component failures. Furthermore during hot water usage the pump isn’t in operation thus enhancing the lifespan of this critical component.

Reliable technology, easy to maintain. 

All parts in the Combi Compact HRE boiler are easily accessible as the boiler case can be easily removed from the front. Furthermore, most parts are interchangeable throughout the entire range thus reducing the need to carry endless amounts of spare parts. The double two-in-one heat exchanger of the Intergas Combi Compact HRE high-efficiency boiler has proven to be extremely reliable. That is why Intergas gives a warranty of 10 years on its heat exchanger. The Combi Compact boiler not only works with the regular ‘on/off’ thermostats but also with programmable room thermostats.

Sonneveld is an international company that develops innovative customer-specific solutions for the bakery sector and the closely-related food industry, for and with our customers with which we add value to the whole chain and especially to the customer. We offer technical support aimed at realising ideal process, bread and pastry quality, we share knowledge about bakery processes and ingredients, we develop innovative bread and pastry concepts and we also support activities that enhance the bakery sector. We use our knowledge and expertise - in terms of producing and supplying ingredients and products, as well as process-related knowledge and market insights - to work with customers on high quality and/or user-friendly products and concepts.

Inspiring Bakery Solutions
Collaborating with you, our customer, is crucial to us. After all, our solutions are the answers to your questions. The innovative products, both in ingredients and end products, is the result of our unrivalled knowledge, our pleasure in and passion for the bakery profession, our capacity to think in solutions and our intensive collaboration with you and the other bakers. The quality of our products is tested in consumer panels and Sonneveld products are also used with great success and satisfaction by you.

Markets
An important part of our turnover is earned through export to countries in Europe, the Middle East, South America and South East Asia. Sonneveld is market leader in the Netherlands and one of the most important players in the Benelux.

Mission
With passion for bakery we actively share our knowledge to jointly develop solutions which offer a competitive advantage throughout the baker’s businesses.

Vision
Intensive collaboration with our customers is key to mutual succes. Our total concepts offer benefits in terms of production time, process improvement, product development, better returns, sustainability and improved image.

Core values
- Inspiring
- Involved
- Ambitious

BIP successfully combines innovative healthy snacking, candy novelty and chocolate products with the most popular licenses. Everything comes together in a professionalbut playful manner.

BIP is inventor, manufacturer as well as distributor of these novelty products. BIP’s main office is located in the Netherlands. BIP also established successful sales offices in France, Spain, the Czech Republic, Poland, the United Kingdom and Hong Kong.

BIP’s goal is passionately supplying the world with innovative and creative novelty products using leading licenses.

BIP has become a worldwide market leader in its category by preserving a high standard in licensing branding, innovation, creativity and an extensive knowledge of the market. Since 1987 BIP has been active in supplying a wide range of confectionary and toy products for target groups all over the world. Ever since the start of the company, the success of BIP has been determined by a combination of Marketing and communications activities, packaging, premiums and our product. 

BIP proudly sells its products in over 70 countries. Using committed category management, sales data tracking and marketing research BIP supports every distributor and retailer on license, product and shelf level. Next to that, we are able to create both above and below the line marketing activities to boost the sales of our comprehensive products ranges. BIP serves a wide variety of distribution channels, such as:

• Food & Non-Food Retail
• Wholesale & Cash and Carry
• Out-of-home
• Duty free zones
• Specialty stores

It all started with a dream…In 2008 Solynta took up the challenge – and the responsibility – to revolutionize potato breeding. We chose this road because we know hybrid potatoes can enhance not only the livelihood of farmers, producers and consumers, but also because we believe it will enable a plentiful potato yield in every corner of the world.

In doing so we dare to push the boundaries of sustainable improvements in food and nutritional security worldwide.  Together with partners around the world we apply our ground-breaking technology and create long lasting impact on global food supply.  We believe in a future where hybrid potatoes are widely used. 

The road that Solynta builds, will contribute to a fundamental reduction of the environmental footprint of the potato value chain and will unlock the true potential of potatoes. 

Over recent years Solynta has grown rapidly and now employs over 70 people from different backgrounds and cultures. Together, the persistent team of Researchers, Breeders, Agronomists and many more at Solynta, have Unlocked the True Potential of Potatoes. 

Our success comes from working hard with a can-do mentality, never giving up, and striving to accomplish what others may say is impossible. But life at Solynta is more than work alone. We make time to engage with each other, have fun, develop ourselves, build meaningful relationships and support a work–life balance which supports the well-being of our people.

If you want to learn more about Hybrid True Potato Seeds, Solynta and our current vacancies, please visit our website Solynta.com.

Lucas Bols is the world’s oldest distilled spirit brand, dating back to 1575, when the Bols family opened a small distillery in Amsterdam. Since then, we have mastered the selection of the right ingredients and our expertise and curiosity has led to the creation of hundreds of delicious products. The original recipes are passed on from master distiller to master distiller and updated to suit contemporary tastes.
 
More than four centuries of craftsmanship, passion and experience join each other perfectly in the products of Lucas Bols; from the world’s best-selling genevers to the range of more than 48 quality liqueurs that are available in more than one hundred countries. From flavour innovations such as Bols Natural Yoghurt and Bols Cucumber, to all-time classics like Bols Genever and Bols Blue.
 
Lucas Bols works in close collaboration with professional bartenders from all over the world to develop new products, create new flavours and adapt old recipes, in-line with the cocktail trends of today. The result is a range of products with all of the essential flavours and tools that are vital for bartenders, and for mixing at home.

GASSAN Diamonds, van oudsher een familiebedrijf, is gevestigd in de oude stoom diamantslijperij in het historische centrum van Amsterdam. Het bedrijf houdt zich bezig met het slijpen van diamant, de groothandel en de detailhandel van losse en gezette diamanten, diamanten- en gouden juwelen en horloges. GASSAN Diamonds neemt een vooruitstrevende positie in binnen de diamantwereld mede door het introduceren van de nieuwe slijpvorm, de GASSAN 121.

Elk jaar ontvangt GASSAN Diamonds meer dan 400.000 toeristen in de historische diamantslijperij. De bezoekers krijgen een gratis rondleiding door de fabriek waarbij een uitleg wordt gegeven over de kwaliteitsbepaling van de diamant, waarna losse geslepen diamanten en juwelen worden getoond. GASSAN Diamonds biedt op maat gemaakte arrangementen in het historische pand aan voor individuelen als ook groepen tot 150 personen. Op dit moment werken er bij benadering 500 werknemers voor GASSAN Diamonds.

GASSAN onderkent het belang van het toeristische aspect binnen haar bedrijfstak. Om deze reden heeft GASSAN met haar dochterondernemingen de GASSAN Groep gevormd. Deze stelt zich ten doel om de bekendheid van Amsterdam als “City of Diamonds” te promoten, een reputatie die de stad zich al sinds 1586 heeft toegeëigend. De dochterondernemingen van GASSAN Diamonds zijn: GASSAN Dam Square, GASSAN Schiphol, GASSAN Plaza, GASSAN Singapore en GASSAN Londen City Airport.

It’s the Italian phrase “La Bella Figura” (presenting yourself in the best possible way) that truly epitomizes Cavallaro Napoli; from immaculately-tailored shirts to perfectly-fitted blazers, the brand’s signature style remains ever classic, ever alluring and ever Italian. 

Founded in 1999, Cavallaro Napoli was built on fashion entrepreneur Giuseppe Cavallaro’s love of pure Italian style and affinity with the heart of tailoring, Naples.  With a mission to bring Italy’s impeccable silhouettes and luxury fabrics to the Netherlands, Giuseppe began selling Neapolitan silk ties to friends and family. His eye for intricate design has seen the brand expand to where it stands today with 17 brand stores and 350 sales points nationally and internationally. 

Classic, refined, yet with a preppy twist, Cavallaro Napoli equals modern sophistication. Whether traversing the Amalfi coastline in a signature white shirt or meandering the cobbled streets of Milan’s Corso Como district in beautifully-tailored chinos, the brand’s unique, yet versatile style for men and women knows no bounds.

DIFUZED is a leading international business which develops lifestyle products for a wide range of entertainment, fashion, sports and consumer goods brands across apparel & fashion accessories.

We are proud to work with more than 100 of the world’s best known and most prestigious brands. DIFUZED fulfills the part of designer, producer and distributor of licensed lifestyle products to stores worldwide. 

We supply every retail tier across the EMEA region, including a range of outlets from independent gaming stores, specialty retail, department and fashion stores, super and hyper market through to e-commerce.

DIFUZED doesn’t simply offer a design on a product; we take care of every single detail to ensure we have the most innovative, effective and most relevant design for each license. To achieve this we work closely together with our licensors, as well as constantly analyzing the market trends.

What defines us:
- Unrivalled broad and deep product assortment
- Extensive license portfolio
- Sales from stock and made-to-order design
- Global distribution network
- Long-term retail and license partnerships

Kwaliteit & Duurzaamheid
Peeze koffie is in alle opzichten bijzondere koffie. Een combinatie van de rijke geschiedenis, het gebruik van alleen de allerbeste koffiebonen, de hoogste kwaliteit tijdens het productieproces en een duidelijke keuze voor duurzaamheid.

Het uiteindelijke resultaat is een kopje koffie om van te genieten, waarbij wij de wereld om ons heen niet vergeten. Ook dat vinden wij een vorm van goede smaak

MMD is a wholly owned company of TPV, the world’s largest monitor manufacturer. It was established in 2009 through a brand license agreement between Philips and TPV. As a brand new company MMD is dedicated to exclusively market and sell Philips branded LCD monitors and digital signage displays worldwide. The company’s design and development centers are located in Taiwan. MMD employs a dedicated team of experts with years of experience operating in the LCD displays market. 

By combining the Philips brand promise, with TPVs sourcing strength and flexibility, MMD uses a fast and focused approach to bringing innovative and reliable LCD products to market. Unlike diversified competitors MMD solely focuses on the LCD displays market, which enables the company to provide a dedicated service to all customers and business partners who wish to make a profit and provide a value add service to their customers. MMD is an ambitious company that is constantly looking to strengthen its distribution network and deepening the relationships with current partners. 

By adopting a consistent push & pull strategy, MMD strives to offer partners dedicated product ranges and improved relevancy for the end-user. With a strong focus on operational excellence, service and support, MMD is committed to becoming the most trusted partner for all channel intermediaries operating in the LCD displays market.

This is not a brand which exists of plastic boxes, plates, cups or products to carry food in. This is Mepal! With full dedication we invent solutions to make your life easier and more fun. A lot of thought goes into developing beautiful and original products which will allow you to enjoy the nicest moments of your life, because you can trust the quality and cleverness they offer. 

We are there for you and for everyone close to you. Everyday of your life. We are there during all the little moments which make life what it is. We are there on your first day at school, when you don’t want to let go of dad’s hand, but luckily also forget about him shortly after. We are there when you surprise your colleagues at work with the home baked quiche you made yesterday. We are there at the beach providing pieces of melon with happy faces. We are there when you go camping, eating and enjoying precious time together with the entire family. We are always there, wherever life may take you. For all those moments. We make the best memories together. So please take us along. We are unbreakable. Mepal. Forever.

Boerschappen is een leverancier van goed eten. Elke dag komen wij bij vele tientallen boeren in Brabant. Hier maken wij o.a. boodschappenboxen van met pure en seizoensgebonden producten, rechtstreeks afkomstig van de Brabantse boer. Daarnaast belevert Boerschappen restaurants, winkels en instellingen en ontwikkelt het concepten voor bedrijven, zoals vitaliteitsweken, kerstpakketten en denken we mee hoe bedrijven beter voor hun medewerkers kunnen zorgen.

We deliver spices, herbs and dehydrated vegetables in a sustainable way. We do this by consistently using natural and wholesome ingredients and by providing traceability, transparency, quality assurance, on-time delivery and high service levels. Our objective is to produce your products in a carefree manner according to your specifications and needs.

Wat in 1981 is begonnen met de verkoop van zuivelproducten vanaf de boerderij is in 35 jaar uitgegroeid tot een familiebedrijf, waar met gepaste trots dagelijks gewerkt wordt aan de lekkerste ambachtelijke zuivelproducten.

Onze plattelandszuivel wordt gemaakt van 100% verse weidemelk, deze melk komt van boeren uit onze directe omgeving. De combinatie van de stevige yoghurt, het lekkerste fruit en de transparante bijzondere verpakking maakt dat onze producten onderscheidend zijn in de markt. Met ons uitgebreide assortiment zijn diverse gebruiksmomenten in te vullen, maar allemaal ‘onmeunig lekker’. Ons motto is: als je weet wat je eet, proef je meer!

Wie zijn wij
DOC Kaas is een Nederlandse kaasproducent. De coöperatieve onderneming – opgericht in 1895 – produceert jaarlijks op twee productielocaties in Hoogeveen Nederlandse kaas die wereldwijd wordt afgezet. De bron van deze kaas, ongeveer 1 miljard liter melk, wordt geleverd door leden-melkveehouders. DOC Kaas heeft ongeveer 230 medewerkers.

DOC Kaas is op 1 april 2016 gefuseerd met de Duitse zuivelonderneming DMK GROUP. Daarmee is de onderneming DOC Kaas B.V. een dochteronderneming geworden van DMK en is de coöperatie DOC Kaas B.A. mede-eigenaar van DMK.

Voor meer informatie over DMK GROUP: www.dmk.de/nl

De kaas die DOC Kaas produceert (foliekaas en natuurgerijpte kaas) wordt door DOC Dairy Partners B.V. – eveneens een dochteronderneming van DMK – wereldwijd afgezet aan retail, foodservice en industriële afnemers. Zowel onder het eigen handelsmerk Dutch Original Cheese als onder private label. DOC Dairy Partners levert naast kaas een breed assortiment andere zuivelproducten van DMK.

Voor meer informatie over DOC Dairy Partners: www.docdairypartners.nl

Missie DOC Kaas 
Wij streven naar een zo hoog mogelijke melkprijs voor onze eigenaren: de leden-melkveehouders. Dat doen we door iedere dag goede Nederlandse kaas te maken die wereldwijd wordt afgezet.

companyName: Qlip B.V. - Quality Assurance in Dairy
description:
From milk to cheese, and milk powder to milk formula for infants. As a consumer, you naturally expect that these products are safe and of good quality.

Qlip plays an important role herein. We provide independent quality assurance throughout the dairy chain. We provide audits and analyses in the field of food safety, quality, composition and sustainability. And we do this for the entire dairy chain, from farm to retail.

Our auditors conduct over 13,000 audits and reviews of the functioning and fulfillment of specific quality systems annually. We also have the world's largest dairy laboratory with state-of-the-art technology. About 15 million milk samples from cows and goats are analyzed in this laboratory each year. Our qualified employees perform over half a million chemical and microbiological analyses. This results in large amounts of valuable data on a daily basis. With this information, dairy companies and dairy farmers can optimize their processes and business operations.

Our internal quality system is designed to ensure that our operations comply with recognized national and international standards, regulations and guidelines. Various accreditation norms describe how we have to deal with these critical points. The Dutch Accreditation Council, an independent body, determines annually whether our business fulfills the requirements. 

Continuous development of our knowledge and expertise is crucial. We collaborate with customers, research institutes and suppliers to develop new technologies, standards, methods and products. A striking example of successful innovation is the fresh grazed grass indicator. We have made it possible to determine in milk whether cows have been grazing grass outside in the meadow.

We share our specific knowledge and expertise with the international dairy chain through trainings and workshops. In Europe, but also in Asia.

Nice to Meat is een professionele horecaslagerij in Almere. Wij werken met de meest unieke vleesrassen van de hele wereld, waaronder: het exclusieve Japanse wagyu beef, USA Black Angus van de Creekstone farms, Iberico, en The Duke of Berkshire varkensvlees. Ook zijn we specialist in vlees van eigen bodem: MRIJ rundvlees van meesterslager Piet van der Berg en het Limburgse kloostervarken Livar. Nice to Meat heeft een totaal assortiment topkwaliteit vlees en vleeswaren voor de horeca. Benieuwd naar ons assortiment? Stuur een mail naar info@nicetomeat.nl of kijk op onze website nicetomeat.nl. 

Nice to Meat B.V.

1362 JM  Almere
