Remeha, the comfort innovators

Remeha ontwikkelt al sinds 1935 voortdurend innovatieve en energiezuinige producten voor warmte en warm water, zowel voor woningen als utiliteit. Ons productassortiment omvat cv-ketels, (zonne)boilers, thermostaten, warmtepompen en aanverwante techniek. Met onze innovaties streven wij ernaar te anticiperen op de wensen en behoeften van onze klanten, nu en in de toekomst. 

Remeha is een Nederlandse onderneming, gevestigd in Apeldoorn en één van de grote merken van BDR Thermea, een internationaal toonaangevende producten en distributeur van innovatieve verwarmingssystemen, warmwatersystemen en aanverwante diensten. BDR Thermea is leider in Europa en heeft wereldwijd vestigingen in ruim 70 landen.

Keune Haircosmetics is The Netherlands'​ largest manufacturer of professional hair products. Founded in 1922 by Jan Keune, one of the progenitors of the modern perm treatment, the company has expanded into the multinational it is today. Keune's international headquarters, laboratories and factories are situated in Soest, where all products are devised, developed and produced before they are shipped off to more than 80 different countries.

But no matter how much the company grows, we'll never forget our roots and our mission - helping salon professionals bring our their clients best version of themselves.

"We develop innovative, high quality products that inspire you to push your limits"​.

Tacx is an innovative company with great passion for sport and technique. This passion drives the organisation and can be seen in all departments; from purchasing to production and product development to logistics.

WE LOVE CYCLING
Since the beginning we have been highly involved in cycling, which has always guided us in our decisions and brought us to where we are today. When riders required high quality bike parts, we made this happen by producing them ourselves. When riders required a way to warm-up before a race, we started making rollers. When riders needed to train effectively during winter, we started making indoor bike trainers. And when more efficiency was required in their training, we made them interactive.  

INVENTING THE FUTURE
We have a history of inventing the future. We take up the greatest challenges and keep pushing limits of what is technically possible to create ground-breaking products with state-of-the-art designs. We were the first to connect computer electronics to bike trainers , in the year 2000, and introduce an entirely new way of training. In 2015 we develop the NEO Smart; the most accurate, realistic, powerful and silent trainer to date, thanks to a unique piece of trainer technology. Parallel to the development of the NEO we develop the Magnum: the first treadmill you can cycle on, enabling you to ride completely free and experience actual inclines.  

TACX FACTS

1957
Tacx was founded by Koos Tacx sr. on May 1st 1957 in the Netherlands.

Produced in the Netherlands
All our products are fully produced in the Netherlands.

Family company
Three generations of cyclist fanatics work together to create the impossible.

A Garmin company
In 2019 Garmin acquired Tacx, enabling endless technological possibilities.

Driven by innovation
Creating innovative products is what drives our organisation.
Cannondale (a part of Cycling Sports Group Europe B.V). is a bicycle company based out of Woudenberg, Netherlands.  Our Factory of the Future is located in Almelo, Netherlands.

Flex IT Distribution is the largest award winning Circular IT and end-of-life IT hardware distributor in Europe. We supply nearly all distribution - and factory overstock from different A-brands. This enables us to supply PC’s, notebooks, servers, printers and other hardware with full factory warranty at a reduced price. We help resellers become more profitable, because: • Flex IT Distribution offers better purchase prices for new and renew hardware • Flex IT Distribution provides standardization hardware and spare parts for a longer period of time • Flex IT Distribution also offers high quality ex-lease and refurbished hardware. With this you can provide reduced purchase costs to your customers. 

Furthermore, we offer the following additional services:
 • IT Asset Recovery, Buyback and recycling of hardware
 • Storing, enrolling and configuring hardware
 • Supplying software
 • Installing software or images
 • Hardware rental for your customers who are in a temporary need of hardware.

Flex IT Distribution guarantees you more profit and improved customer loyalty. A proposition that has made us and our customers successful since 1991.

Our aim is to enrich lives with beautifully designed product concepts for living and giving that are a pleasure to use. Transforming domestic chores into daily pleasures. We care about the products we create and the impact they have on people and the planet. Concepts with promise, that are made sustainably and leave a better world for generations to come. A family company with family values.

May 2019, awarded with the designation 'Koninklijk'​ (‘Royal’) 
Brabantia celebrates its 100th birthday in 2019

CEO Tijn van Elderen chosen as Entrepreneur of the Year 2017.  
Finalist of the The Drum Marketing can change the world Awards 2017
Finalist of the Family Business Award 2017. 
Proud winner of the Dutch Design Awards, Best Client Award 2016.
Also in 2015 we were winner of a Best Managed Company award.
In 2015 we are 1 of 13 nominees of the Family Business Award.
In 2014 we were winner of a Best Managed Company award.

Official partner of The Hunger Project, 2017-2020
Official partner of The Ocean Cleanup, 2016-2020
Top sponsor of WeForest, since 2015 - more than 2.3 million trees planted so far.

More than 1000 products Cradle-to-Cradle Certified at the Bronze level

REV’IT! Sport International designs and manufactures fashionable motorcycle gear for aficionados – functional clothing of the highest quality. Operating out of offices in Oss, the Netherlands, New York City and in the nearby future Hong Kong, REV’IT! is one of the fastest growing motorcycle clothing brands worldwide. Recognized as a benchmark for good product design in the industry, REV'IT! is available in more than 70 countries and worn by avid bikers throughout the world.

At REV'IT! we want to inspire people to ride, in everything we do. We want to inspire by making well designed and innovative products, allowing people to ride better, safer and looking good. 

We believe in an open and transparent culture and in the quality and skills of our people. We have no directive, micro-managing leadership. Managers have moreover a coaching, guiding and facilitating role. This freedom and trust, requires a high level of involvement and responsibility of our people. Beside of that a good collaboration is essential to achieve the desired results.

The Organic Cotton Accelerator (OCA) is the only multi-stakeholder organisation dedicated to organic cotton. As a global platform, we are committed to bringing integrity, supply security and measurable social and environmental impact to organic cotton. 

OCA envisions a future where we have fully realised the Organic Cotton Effect - organic cotton’s powerful and positive impact on people, planet and prosperity. We unite the sector to unleash the potential of organic cotton because we believe that by working together, we can create the conditions for organic cotton to thrive. 

Since our establishment in 2016, with founding partners Laudes Foundation, H&M, Kering, Eileen Fisher, Textile Exchange, Tchibo, Inditex and C&A, OCA has been committed to convening the sector around a common agenda and using our platform’s collective investments to act as a catalyst for change. 

Every dollar invested in OCA Programmes improves farmer profitability and prosperity, contributes to environmental sustainability, and ultimately bolsters the integrity of the cotton sector. But for us to fully unlock the Organic Cotton Effect, to truly unleash the potential of organic cotton, to genuinely drive behaviour change throughout the chain - we need sustained investment across the sector. 

We know we can’t do this alone, so we warmly welcome partners to join our movement. Partners who understand that organic cotton is not simply an end goal to meet demand. Neither is it simply a set of practices that can be mastered overnight. Partners who are willing to join us on a journey – of which the first milestone is farmers and the final milestone is volume targets. Partners who know there is no such thing as a turnkey organic solution; they’re as committed as we are to the long-term work required to create meaningful change in this sector. 

Change is possible. The time to act is now.

With our electric cargo bikes, we want to make the city a greener and quieter place.

We also want to make attractive and high quality cargo bikes that use the newest technology and state of the art materials to move people and freight through town in the fastest possible way. By doing so we aim to reduce the use of scooters and cars. Not just in the Netherlands. Our goal is to make the best cargo bikes in the world. That’s why today we are already doing business in 18 countries.

Underwear becomes outerwear! 

Beautiful, comfortable and perfect fitting pieces. In eclectic styles, unexpected fabrics and surprising designs. No sets, so blend your own style. A personal experience, not because nobody sees it, but because it is a way to express yourself.

Segway-Ninebot: Globally operating company manufacturing and selling luxury electronic goods, from a set-up European regional office based in Amsterdam.  
The company started in 1999 with inventor Dean Kamen, who invented the product where Segway is known for, the personal transporter. After years of selling the products to tour operators, security, police, warehouses and other B2B solutions, the company merged with Chinese company Ninebot in 2015. The combined company now focuses on the research and development, design, manufacturing, distribution and sales of short-distance transportation products for enterprises as well as consumers. Since the merge, the product line-up has expanded rapidly with products in the micro-mobility category as well as fun and robotics solutions. The ultimate goal is to promote the evolution of our products to become the world’s leading provider of mobile robotics solutions. 
For more information go to www.segway.com.

Stitch 3D combines modern software and technology with apparel design expertise to help brands transition towards a 3D driven workflow. With the power and knowledge of these two fields, we develop unique strategies and tools to inspire designers and users to fully adopt digital product development.

INGLOT Company was established over 25 years ago by Wojtek Inglot, a young chemist working at that time in R&D department in pharmaceutical company.

His principal objective was to produce high quality products at fair and reasonable prices, using only the best possible ingredients and raw materials from the most reputable suppliers.
Wojtek Inglot is still directly involved in the formulation and design process of all new Inglot products.
All Inglot cosmetics are produced within the European Union and 95% of them are manufactured in our own state of the art production facilities.

We work with make-up artists and colour consultants to bring the latest trends in colour, texture and form to the market. We are constantly developing new products and have just launched the world’s first ever Breathable Nail Enamel ensuring better health care for nails whilst enhancing their beauty.

Our unique Freedom System allows customers to experiment with countless shades and colour combinations of different face products, giving them the opportunity to create their own customized colour palette.
We are present in 280 retail locations worldwide.

We make good-looking gear that saves you time. First, we reimagined the traditional wallet, making it easier to use and harder to lose. Now we're upgrading the rest of your carry essentials so you have time to focus on what really matters.

companyName: AAEON Europe | Innovative AI Edge Computing Provider
description:
Established in 1992, AAEON is one of the leading designers and manufacturers of advanced industrial and embedded computing platforms today. Committed to innovative engineering, AAEON produces integrated Industry 4.0 solutions, cutting-edge AI hardware, and IoT solution platforms that seamlessly consolidate virtual and physical networks. We also develop hardware and intelligent automated services for premier OEM/ODMs and system integrators worldwide. Our reliable, high-quality computing platforms include industrial motherboards and systems, industrial displays, rugged tablets, PC/104, PICMG and COM modules, embedded SBCs, embedded controllers, network appliances and related accessories. AAEON also offers customized end-to-end services from initial product conceptualization and product development through to volume manufacturing and after-sales service programs, and we are committed to the continuous advancement of the industry’s management and development processes.

With its constant pursuit of innovation and excellence, AAEON became a member of the ASUS group in 2011, enabling the company to further strengthen its leadership, access advanced technology from ASUS, and leverage resources from within the group. AAEON is poised to offer more diversified embedded products and solutions at higher quality standards to meet world-class design and manufacturing demands in the years to come.

AAEON is an Associate member of the Intel® Internet of Things Solutions Alliance.

Seepje maakt natuurlijke was- en poetsmiddelen. De ingrediënten worden zorgvuldig gekozen op basis van herkomst en de gezondheid voor mens en milieu. Seepje is goed én goed. Het doet wat 't moet doen én draagt bij aan 'n beter klimaat. 

Melvin en Jasper - beide met 'n passie voor wassen - begonnen Seepje met hun stufi in 2013. Inmiddels heeft Seepje meer dan 25 was- en poetsproducten die te koop zijn bij meer dan 5800 winkels in Nederland, België en Duitsland. En dat niet alleen... Seepje is zó hard gegroeid dat 't team meer dan 20 fulltimers heeft! Werken doen we in ons Haagse Washok waar 't al-tijd gezellig is, waar we elkaar inspireren en samen werken aan onze uiterst belangrijke missie: een schonere én mooiere wereld!

Naïf is a natural skincare line for women, babies and children, made only from the best ingredients. We only use ingredients we can pronounce, like linseed, cottonseed oil, sweet almond oil, macadamia oil and avocado oil. You will not find any nonsense in Naïf skincare products, and that is why they are suited for any skin type. From babies to babes. And from little ones to grown ups.

BYBORRE is an Amsterdam based textile innovation studio working on the frontiers of material development, functionality and aesthetics through engineered knits. Our signature is the innovative hand-rendered techniques that, through direct interaction with their circular knitting machines, gives us full creative freedom to play with patterns, colours, and textures within textiles.

Designing from the yarn up allows us to discover new possibilities both within our own collections and for leading brands. Over the past six years we have worked with clients such as Rapha, adidas, BMW, and Natuzzi. Through consultation and collaboration with other brands, we push knit innovation to find creative ways to achieve the project’s goal.

Our Amsterdam based HQ studio houses a knitting and innovation Lab, a fully outfitted atelier, a team of specialists and experts, a BYBORRE archive, and endless amounts of crazy textiles.

Welcome to the LinkedIn company page of ATAG Benelux. Follow us and stay informed of our (product) innovations in the field of kitchen appliances. Through this company page you always have the latest news, new (product) innovations and vacancies.

ATAG Benelux is a leading supplier of kitchen appliances and consumer electronics. We are a Dutch company and sell kitchen appliances via the brands ATAG, Pelgrim, ETNA, Hisense and ASKO. These brands have a high name recognition in the Benelux.

ATAG Benelux has more than 500 employees and the head office is located in Duiven, near Arnhem in The Netherlands.

Bolton Adhesives represents the adhesives division of Bolton Group and stands for four leading brands: Bison, UHU, Griffon and Air Max. Bolton Adhesives products offer the best solutions for bonding or sealing paper and cardboard, leather, fabric and wood, as well as for joining metal and plastic. At home, in the office, at school, for DIY projects as well as professional jobs. The company's distribution channels consist of supermarkets, office supply stores, do-it-yourself stores and the professional market. Bolton Adhesives employs approximately 700 employees.

Bolton Adhesives is part of Bolton Group. Bolton Group is a fast-growing international company, manufacturing and marketing a wide range of high quality branded consumer goods available in over 125 countries around the world. The Group holds an outstanding portfolio of competitive brands with over 50 product lines in the categories of Food, Household Care, Adhesives & Glues, Personal & Health Care and Beauty Care. Bolton brands have achieved strong household penetration, reaching over 100 million families worldwide.

B&S becomes one: in our 2021 – 2023 strategy we have introduced our “one company, one brand” approach. We are eliminating our segmental communications step by step to become a stronger, more powerful and unified B&S brand. Our HTG communications will therefore merge with parent B&S. Join us there!

Nefit is the most renowned heating brand in the Netherlands. Choosing Nefit means one can count on the best quality. Ease of use, comfort, energy saving and durability: all products and systems meet the highest standards. Nefit was the brand that successfully introduced the world’s first condensing boiler in the 1980s. Today as a brand of European market leader Bosch, Nefit offers the widest range of sustainable solutions for heating, hot water and energy. The latest  technologies and knowledge assemble within Nefit. Millions of households and businesses depend on our systems on a daily basis.

De missie van illy 
Door ons enthousiasme, teamwork en onze waarden streven we ernaar om in de hele wereld fijnproevers het genot te schenken van de beste koffie die de natuur te bieden heeft. De meest vernieuwende technologieën en onze inspirerende emotionele en intellectuele betrokkenheid bij het zoeken naar schoonheid in alles dat we doen dragen bij tot de perfectie van ons product. 

illy waarden
Het streven naar perfectie is onze belangrijkste waarde die rust op twee hoekstenen. Enerzijds is er de passie voor uitmuntendheid, die tot uiting komt in onze liefde voor schoonheid en vakmanschap. En anderzijds is er het belang van ethische principes, dat tot uiting komt in de creatie van waarde op termijn, via duurzaamheid, openheid en de ontwikkeling van mensen. We willen de levenskwaliteit van onze belanghebbenden verhogen, en laten ons hierbij leiden door onze passie voor alles dat we doen. 

illy visie
We willen wereldwijd een baken zijn voor de cultuur van het koffiedrinken. Een vernieuwend bedrijf dat dankzij zijn voortreffelijke assortiment van de fijnste producten en consumptielocaties steeds verder blijft uitgroeien tot een kwalitatief hoogstaande marktleider.

JOSH V offers accessible fashion for every woman who wants to look and feel stylish. JOSH V collections are characterized by the use of high-quality materials and the application of in-house designed details, like branded buttons and luxurious in-house designed prints. The brand and its collections are known for the flattering and at the same time comfortable fit, and its characteristic use of color in natural tones, and tonal looks. JOSH V delivers exclusive products, and offers luxury and quality for a commercial price.
					
The mission of JOSH V is to make all women look and feel spectacular, in which the pillars of body positivity, diversity, and sustainability are highly valued.

Since 2017 we’ve been working hard on making the most advanced and durable menswear in the world.

This is our way of cleaning up the fashion industry. Wash less. Wear more. Buy less. That’s good news for both your wallet and the planet. 

We’re from Amsterdam and Copenhagen, our customers are in 98 countries, and our products are made in Switzerland and Portugal.

Oh and you can ask us and our designers, engineers, and marketeers about anything. 

Sincerely, 
Lotte & Kasper
Cofounders

★Proudest moments★

- €1m+ raised on Kickstarter and Indiegogo
- Took our team of 13 talents to Bali for 1 month of working and surfing
- Supported by MIT Noord Holland and WBSO to take our R&D to the next level
- 100,000+ customers in 98 countries

SenseGlove enables touch interaction in VR through some of the worlds most intuitive and affordable hardware and software.

Touch lets you experience digital worlds through intuitive real-world behaviors and facilitates more effective virtual training, design review, rehabilitation, telerobotics, and more! 

With the SenseGlove’s DK1, Nova, and supporting software, virtual objects are brought to live. You can feel, touch and interact with them as if they are real. Contact us to set up a demo.

KNITWEAR LAB develops smart technological applications for knitwear. Our knitwear specialists combine material research with the latest knitwear technologies. We have 5 multi-gauge flat-bed knitting machines from STOLL, among which 3 of the latest and most advanced STOLL ADF machines. The multi-gauge of our machines range from 3,5gg to 18gg. Our programmers all have a background in design. The combination of technological innovation and a design-driven perspective is what makes KNITWEAR LAB truly unique.

At our LAB in Almere, the Netherlands our team of programmers and designers develop prototypes and run on a small scale productions. Our production LAB in Istanbul, Turkey is specialized in producing high-end knitwear in small quantities. Our experienced production team uses their exceptional craftsmanship to create specialized knitwear. With our experience in the industry and extended network we make sure productions will be successfully completed and delivered.

Our team of experienced knitwear specialists offer consultancy on all issues that may arise with designing or producing knitwear products. Our LAB is specialized in sustainable production methods, recycled yarns, smart textiles and 3D knitting techniques. 

We have a progressive vision on sustainability. At KNITWEAR LAB we are constantly developing ethical knitwear made from biodegradable materials, regenerated and certified yarns. Moreover, we place a high emphasis on zero-waste production methods. Through 3D knitting techniques we are capable of knitting designs entirely out of one piece, without any waste. It is our responsibility to educate our clients on the impact their production will have on our ecosystem.

We drive design, innovation and sustainability in the fashion industry, by delivering high quality, design-led products to some of the world's leading brands and retailers. We offer bespoke Design and Product Development services tailored to each customer's needs via our network of Design offices throughout Europe, and fast, flexible and on time manufacturing from Bangladesh, Turkey, Portugal and China. We cover woven, jersey/knit, shoes and accessories across all categories (women's, men's, kids). Our customers include Tommy Hilfiger, Calvin Klein, Inditex (Zara/Bershka/Pull&Bear), Primark, Mango, John Lewis, and many more.

Feel free to contact us.

The Netherlands is a vibrant international hotspot for quantum technology, with leading science, technology and talent. With Quantum Delta NL, we are creating a fully functional national ecosystem for excellence in quantum innovation, for highly talented professionals to bring quantum computers, quantum networks and quantum sensors to the market.

Accell Western Europe maakt onderdeel uit van Accell Group N.V. en is gevestigd in Apeldoorn en Heerenveen. Accell Western Europe ontwikkelt, produceert en verkoopt fietsen en onderdelen onder de merknamen Batavus, Juncker Bike Parts, Koga, Loekie, Sparta, Van Nicholas en XLC-componenten. 
 
De organisatie speelt sterk in op de veranderende consumentenmarkt door een breed en modern assortiment en een voor de branche opvallende marktbewerking, zowel richting het dealernetwerk als de consument. Het grootste deel van de afzet vindt plaats via de professionele vakhandel. De exportactiviteiten in met name België, Duitsland, Denemarken, Zwitserland en Engeland completeren de afzet.

Cutting the cost of electricity storage is our mission. This is why we use low cost and abundant materials (hydrogen and bromine), a compact cell that is easily manufactured, and a (patented) simplified system. This triple cost reduction strategy enables the lowest possible cost for storing electricity.
Elestor's storage systems are robust, durable, have no self discharge and deliver power quickly.

Driven by craftsmanship, powered by innovation.
	
We are innovative, creative, Dutch, rebellious and young. We work in customization, design development and production of mannequins. Our organization is young, flexible and we have a professional background in retail.
Our vision: being the authority in the shopwindow mannequin world through inspiration and innovation.
Our mission: we are the most desired ‘fit to measure’ company in the fashion world.

Be ahead of the game in an ever evolving industry of innovation.

Every brand has its own identity: colour, style, font, look and feel. But also, their specific customer. Hans Boodt Mannequins knows how to develop a mannequin that fits smoothly into your existing or new identity. After fully understanding what you want, we usually start from scratch. It has grown into our specialty, just because we like to do it and it is what we do best.

A character which fits your brand. A character just for you.

As a very advanced mannequin manufacturer, the latest 3D-printers and technologies are our daily tools to make the impossible come true.  Our design lab can speed up things as customers require. whether it is a specific personalized fabric, colour or a never seen before position; as a mannequin manufacturer with many years of experience we know what it needs to tell a proper story.
3D printing has revolutionized the way we work at Hans Boodt mannequins. With our current 3D design and prototyping, we are more creative, faster and more cost efficient than ever before.

Endless possibilities.

We believe it is our responsibility to focus on environment, ethical business strategies and social responsibility at Hans Boodt Mannequins and all our suppliers. We are SEDEX proof and ISO approved. 
We are constantly improving:
- the production of sustainable products.
- the working conditions in our factories.
- the reduction of the environmental impact in production, transportation and packaging.

Visit us and get inspired.

With extensive knowledge of the (bio)plastics industry, colorants and additives, colorFabb explored the opportunities in the world of 3D printing. 
Rigorous testing and experimenting made a new grade of PLA (PLA/PHA) became available in 2013. Followed by special filaments like woodFill, bronzeFill, the first filament with actual bronze particles in it, resulting in truly stunning prints when post-processed. 

Meanwhile, light weight PLA (LW-PLA) filament was born. It uses active foam technology to 3D print low weight and low-density PLA parts.

In 2018, colorFabb launched Color on Demand, a first step in true customization of filaments and polymers to suit the customers' specific needs.

colorFabb filaments are applied in a large scale of applications, Automotive, Medical and Dental, Aerospace & Defense, and very often in Art and Design.

The colorFabb team consists of extrusion operators ensuring quality control, a logistics department that ships to over 60 countries worldwide every year, 3D print engineers who test all filaments and many more professionals. All of them dedicated to the quality and service the colorFabb brand is known for.

Contact us via sales@colorfabb.com to see how we can help you to implement 3D printing in your company.

STARSKIN® was launched in September 2015. Now, STARSKIN®’s premium skincare and beauty products are sold in more than 45 countries at triple-A, high-end beauty retailers and Department Stores like Sephora, Douglas, Selfridges, Harrods, Harvey Nichols, Barneys, Bloomingdales, Nordstrom and many more in Europe, the Middle-East, USA, South East Asia, Australia and New Zealand. STARSKIN® has offices in Switzerland, Netherlands, New York, Dubai, and Singapore. STARRSKIN® offers the most effective beauty products in a curated assortment that delivers instant and visible results at an unprecedented price-quality level to everyone.
 
STARSKIN® is the trendsetter in the skincare beauty market, developing innovative cosmetic products that never compromise on q

STARSKIN® has worked extensively with dermatologists, aestheticians and makeup artists-to-the-stars to distill the true secrets behind celebrity skin. While celebrities may have an arsenal of beauty experts at their disposal to get camera-ready, what we’ve learned from top experts is that with the right products, Hollywood-worthy results are completely within reach. 

Now, the secrets behind some of the world’s most radiant complexions are out. STARSKIN® has chosen the world’s most innovative, exclusive beauty technologies and formulas so that you can give your skin the star treatment it deserves at home. A selection of skin-pampering Bio-Cellulose Second Skin Masks that deliver the luminous results of an expert facial in just 20 minutes at home. Cutting-edge professional Double-Layer Technology body masks that leave the body silky, toned and youthful, from head to toe. A range of professional-grade makeup and next-generation applicator devices that mimics the expert airbrushing of a star makeup artist, and more. With STARSKIN®, the previously unattainable glamour of a movie star-appearance is now at your fingertips. 

Discover the secrets behind award-winning skin – you’ll be ready for your close-up in no time.

We aim to change fashion wholesale for good with our Digital Showroom and Digital Transformation Services and bring them to the future of digital selling.

HATCH was born from fashion - literally. Spinning off the team that created the industry-leading Digital Showroom solution for Tommy Hilfiger. Based in Amsterdam as a standalone business, we are bringing the same digital showroom to market as a SaaS product. HATCH Digital Showroom combined with Digital Transformation Services provide fashion brands with a better wholesale experience, sustainability, time to market, digital strategy, and better sales insights.

The Hatchies are the amazing team working on making this happen. A crew of digital transformation specialists, software engineers, designers, and fashion people. We share a passion for creating digital experiences in physical spaces, using whatever means possible.

Informatique is opgericht in 1995 en verkoopt een uitgebreid assortiment computers, notebooks, componenten, netwerkapparatuur, randapparatuur, electronica, digitale fotografie, dvd en games.
Service en kwaliteit staan hoog in het vaandel. Informatique levert aan consumenten, bedrijven en overheid.

At brunotti, boardsports is about fun and sharing moments of joy. We enjoyed our first jump as much as we did our latest trick. It’s not about how big your trick is, it’s about how big your smile is. Brunotti wants to share this awesome feeling and make all disciplines of boardsports accessible for everyone.

Brunotti was founded in 1979 by windsurfer and board shaper Claudio Brunotti. Claudio, originally from Italy, came to Dutch coast town Scheveningen and started shaping his own boards. Now, almost 39 years later, Brunotti has become an all boardsports brand with more than 50 employees. The products are sold in more than 38 countries worldwide. The Brunotti head office is based in Amersfoort, the Netherlands. Since the beginning of 2017 we have had an office in Scheveningen as well, where our design department is located.

Brunotti represents snow and water sports. We embrace the surf & snow lifestyle in which everyone does sports with drive and enthusiasm. For the past years we have continued developing ourselves in board sports (RDP // Rider Developed Product) and sports fashion (NMTC // No Matter The Conditions). This way we can provide board athletes and board sports lovers with sports clothing, functional fashion items, accessories, hardware, soft goods and board sports accessories.

We are always looking for more innovative people with a passion for board sports. Check our vacancies and internships on: www.brunotti.com/en/jobs/

Fortune favors the bold. Rosefield reimagines watches & jewelry for relaxed elegance and easy living.
We make fashion-forward styles that blend the classic with the modern – at a price that works for today's cosmopolitan consumer. Using only high-quality materials and metals, our product design philosophy takes inspiration from global contemporary fashion aesthetics and Dutch design, pairing the classic with the modern. Our collections incorporate elements of vintage beauty from classic pieces mixed with the creativity of the future.

It's about being timeless, not trendy.

Rebottled is een sociale onderneming die lege wijnflessen upcyclet tot coole drinkglazen. Hiermee gaan we het energie-intensieve proces van recyclen tegen. We doen dit samen met mensen die een afstand tot de arbeidsmarkt hebben, zodat zij de kans krijgen zich verder te ontwikkelen

When we say iiyama, we’re proud because iiyama ultimately means over 25 million of different stories. Your stories of connecting with the world.
Based in Japan, iiyama is a leading international display solutions manufacturer enabling individuals and organizations to interact with the world around them since 1973. iiyama desktop monitors accompany people at work and at home. iiyama Large Format Displays and touchscreen solutions help businesses get their message across to their partners and clients. And the iiyama G-Master #monitors4gamers aid gamers to unlock their full gaming potential.

Azerty, only the best.

Azerty is de one-stop-shop voor IT-hardware. Wij bieden een uitgebreid en actueel assortiment, razendsnelle levering en een goede prijs. Maar wij gaan verder dan dat. Wij streven naar 100% klanttevredenheid. Onze klanten het beste bieden is voor ons dagelijks werk.

Flamingo Flowers BV is part of the wider UK based Flamingo Horticulture group. We directly source from growers in Kenya and South Africa and provide the key link to European sourced products. Our commercial focus is on European retailers, wholesalers and specialty stores.

Flamingo Flowers BV is located in Westland; our office and distribution facility is right next to the Flora Holland flower auction. From the heart of the Dutch flower trade we operate as a service provider for our African farms. We sell, handle and transport cut flowers from our African nurseries directly to retailers and specialty stores throughout Europe.

We offer traditional premium flowers, but we also tailor specifications to the needs of our clients. A sizeable part of our operations is concerned with providing premium flowers and services to our sister company in the UK to supply the largest British retail multiples.
Beauty & Glamour is Europe’s leading distributor of luxurious brands offering fragrances, color cosmetics, skincare, grooming, home scents and bath & body products from world's key beauty capitals.

What started with a handful of products has grown to a full range of cycling parts and accessories. Products that have received more than 100 product and innovation awards over the years and are serving the needs of cycling enthusiasts from all over the world. After 25 years it’s safe to say BBB Cycling is part of your ride.

Part of your ride
BBB Cycling wants to be there for every cyclist. We are out there on each and every ride, bringing fun to cycling, and making sure cyclists are spending more time on their bikes together with their friends. Riding your bike is something special. It makes you feel carefree and lets you enjoy the moment. It’s exactly this feeling that we treasure and want to elevate with our products.

Awards don’t win themselves
Being cycling enthusiasts ourselves makes it fun for us to do the utmost in creating a thoughtful product range. Each colleague contributes to the development of the products by gathering feedback from end users, giving input from their own experience in cycling and other sporting activities or testing prototypes. The product development team itself consists of specialists in specific product groups. It is because of our staff’s infinite motivation that we managed to win over 100 product and innovation awards.

What the future holds
In the future we want to build further on our ‘part of your ride’ . We want to connect even more with our audience. Part of your ride works both ways and we cherish our connection with the cycling community. By making this a more interactive process we can align our innovations even better to your needs and provide products that are almost individually created.

BARTS is specialised in high quality fashion accessories for adults and kids. The brand’s origin lays in Amsterdam and we design accessories that keep you warm in the winter and cool in the summer. 

At BARTS we believe that life is all about connecting and sharing moments together. Going on an adventure, enjoying a journey, discovering new places and having fun. With that spirit in mind we design our collections that offer a favourite piece for everyone on any occasion. From hand-knitted beanies, soft scarves and warm gloves in the winter to a stylish and versatile swimwear collection in the summer.

GAUGE81 (pronounced GO-SH eighty-one) embraces striking angles and playful proportions, while blurring the line between evening and casual wear – bringing sexy into daytime. Undisputedly feminine, the brand is a study in contrast and retro references that are at once familiar and completely unexpected.

Designed to empower

Wij zijn Studio Anneloes, een fashion brand voor ambitieuze vrouwen. We willen een wereld creëren waarin zij zich sterk, zelfverzekerd en comfortabel voelen. Ze kunnen onze prints en premium stoffen eindeloos mixen en matchen om zowel op de werkvloer als daarbuiten goed voor de dag te komen. Bekijk onze website and get to know us!

We are Studio Anneloes, a fashion brand for ambitious women. Our goal is to create a world where women can feel strong, confident and comfortable. By mixing and matching our patterns, colours and premium fabrics they can look their absolute best, during office hours and in their spare time. Visit our website and get to know us!

Since 1925, Fristads has focused on developing durable and functional workwear, always with professionals in mind and with innovation and sustainability as its drivers. Our clothing range includes both classic and contemporary clothing for a wide range of industries and our clothing meets the highest standards of quality, safety and comfort. Fristads is part of the Hultafors Group, which is owned by Investment Latour AB, and offers a wide portfolio of products and brands for professional craftsmen.

We believe in a social and circular society. A society where everyone contributes and no one is excluded. That is why we guide people who have been on welfare payments for a very long time to work by making acoustic products.

We also discovered that discarded clothing produces a new raw material. A design felt, in which the character of the original clothing can be seen. We combine our recycled felt with acoustic felt from recycled jeans and hardboard made from cellulose waist to produce beautiful and functional acoustic design solutions as well as other design products such as bags and accessories.

For nearly half a century now, we are specialised in the design, production, and delivery of safety apparel and PPE to the maritime, offshore, and cruise industries.
We are a family business, deeply connected to the work of our longstanding clients and committed to protecting the crews we outfit and equip.
 
Our extensive range of essential safety products includes coveralls, footwear, gloves, galley wear, personal protective equipment, off duty leisure wear, and everything you need for work in extreme conditions.
Defined by strength, style, durability, and compliance with applicable norms and standards, our product line is backed by competitive pricing, rapid worldwide delivery from stock, and excellent after sales service.
 
Given the primacy in our work of ensuring the safety and health of workforces at sea, we are committed to protecting the ecosystems that surround us and to creating a more socially responsible supply chain.
With these commitments, as always, there are no compromises.
Direct from Rotterdam, Singapore, Houston, and Dubai to wherever you are at sea.
 
We are Scandia Gear.
Maritime Outfitters since 1974.

ClusterVision specialises in high performance computing (HPC) solutions. We design, build, manage, and support supercomputers.

HPC accelerates scientific discovery. It is with this in mind that ClusterVision provides state-of-the-art, fully tailored HPC clusters to researchers and innovators all over Europe. With in-house software development and a large team of technical specialists (60% technical staff), we work to not just participate in HPC, but to advance the technology behind it.

By providing customised solutions accompanied by an exhaustive set of services and trainings, we ensure that our customers can take maximum advantage of HPC technology in order to expand knowledge and advance their respective fields of study.

Werken bij Aktiesport is meer dan een baan. Je wordt onderdeel van het team, van de club. Samen met het team ga je de strijd aan. Elke dag weer. Altijd klaar voor competitie. Jouw spot? Die claim je. Want in de strijd komen jouw talenten naar boven die het verschil maken. Voor je team, voor de klant.  Wie je bent, waar je vandaan komt en wat je doet maakt niet uit. In de winkel of op kantoor. Iedereen is belangrijk. We zien jou en jouw omgeving. Zo zijn we continu bezig om onze impact op de planeet te verminderen.

Aktiesport Spelersprofiel
Je bent een winnaar, gaat er altijd voor. Samen met ons ga jij de uitdaging aan en word je de beste in wat je doet. Met je commerciële en klantgerichte instelling laat je geen kans onbenut. Je bezit net als wij de volgende kernwaarden:

Klantgericht
Resultaatgericht
Discipline
Luisteren
Samenwerken
Energiek

Je bent no-nonsens, houdt van plezier maken en bent gefocust. Daarom kan jij je goed vinden in ons motto: ‘Get naked, have fun & get the job done’
Je enthousiasme, leergierigheid en ambitie spatten er van af. Dit maakt jou de perfecte match met Aktiesport. Je doorgroeikansen binnen Aktiesport zijn oneindig. Pak jij je kansen bij de hoorns? 
 
Join the club. Game On!

Aktiesport maakt samen met Perry deel uit van Sports Unlimited Retail (SUR) en richten zich beide op de verkoop van Sports & Adventure producten met een lifestyle vertaling. Het zijn twee sterke retailformules die verder gaan, waar andere sportretailers stilstaan!

SUR is sinds 1 juli 2021 onderdeel van de Iberian Sports Retail Group. ISRG is één van de belangrijkste en grootste sportretailers van Europa met meer dan 350 vestigingen in Spanje en Portugal onder de naam Sprinter en Sportzone. De JD Sports winkels in Spanje en Portugal vallen eveneens onder ISRG. In totaal heeft ISRG meer dan 6.000 medewerkers. Samen bundelen we onze krachten om de markt te veroveren!

WakaWaka is an award-winning social enterprise that develops, manufactures and markets the world’s most efficient solar lamps and chargers. Our mission is to share the abundant power of the sun with more than a billion people worldwide who don’t have the luxury of a light switch and another billion who don’t have reliable access. 

WakaWaka’s safe, sustainable and clean solar solutions serve both developed and developing countries: the same premium, high-quality products for all markets. Through our line of portable solar products crafted from world-famous Dutch design, WakaWaka  (which means “shine bright” in Swahili) provides an abundant and reliable alternative to kerosene. Kerosene, the most frequently used substitute for those living without access to electricity, comes at a high cost to health and pocketbook: It is highly flammable, toxic and associated with a host of serious health problems. Our products have empowered more than a million people, boosting family and community health, and providing families with longer productive hours during which to work, study, eat and pray.

As a global social enterprise, WakaWaka has leveraged the high demand for its products to maximize impact by instituting a Share the Sun model: Buy a WakaWaka and you also share the sun with someone without access to electricity.

Ik ben Nikon. Al 100 jaar help ik fotografen groot en klein, professioneel en hobbyist om hun verhaal te vertellen via fotografie. Verhalen waarin fotograaf en onderwerp zichzelf en hun realiteit ontstijgen. Met onze innovatieve camera's, lenzen en accessoires is het resultaat altijd fantastisch. Nikon maakt het onbereikbare bereikbaar.

Royal Asscher Diamond Company has been crafting the world’s ultimate diamonds & fine jewelry since 1854. The Asscher family built their impeccable reputation as the greatest diamond cutters in the world across six generations. For over 150 years, they have been entrusted to handle the most precious gemstones in history, including the largest rough diamond ever found - the Cullinan. They own the first-ever patented diamond-cut, and today, Royal Asscher counts multiple patented diamond-cuts to their name. With a clientele that includes celebrity, royalty, and true diamond lovers, Royal Asscher Diamond Company is a brand unsurpassed in legacy, quality, and reputation in the brilliant realm of diamonds.

We believe shopping should be enjoyable rather than a frustrating chore. Men shouldn’t spend their weekends in crowded malls shopping for clothes. That’s exactly where we come in!

The Cloakroom is a new and better way for you to upgrade your wardrobe without leaving the comfort of your own home. We offer you the service of a personal shopper 100% free of charge! After a short style session she will hand pick every item and send it to you in a box. You can try everything at home and send back the items you don’t want to keep. We only charge you for the items you decided to keep.

Founded in a tiny apartment in Amsterdam in May 2013 The Cloakroom has today grown to more than 40 personal shoppers in our office in the center of Amsterdam. We are live in The Netherlands, Belgium, Sweden and Denmark,  and yes my friend we are indeed looking for top talents for a lot of positions: 

http://thecloakroom.com/careers

Onze missie
Vitakraft draagt continu bij aan de gezondheid en het geluk van het huisdier als lid van het gezin!

Onze visie
Vitakraft ontwikkelt, produceert en levert innovatieve en kwalitatief hoogwaardige producten en diensten op ieder moment, op elke gewenste plaats, voor ieder huisdier specifiek, onder de merknaam Vitakraft. Door duidelijke communicatie helpen wij de consument bij het maken van de juiste keuze voor het juiste product of dienst op de juiste tijd en plaats voor dat specifieke dier.

Nail Creation is an international brand for professional nail styling products that was established in 1993. Dedicated to supply nail technicians with the best nail products available, Nail Creation has been advancing the technology of nail products in order to achieve maximum performance and perfect results. Nail Creation is among the leading brands in nail design worldwide. Our largest market is Europe, where we are the market leader in several countries. Nail Creation specializes in both gel and acrylic for nail design and sculpturing. Nail Creation is a strong brand, has a uniform international image, high-class presentation, and great profit margins. The nail industry is exceptionally dynamic and has its own unique developments and styling trends. With our own R&D department and production facilities, we have all products, know-how and training facilities in-house, which makes it possible to offer all new creative developments to the nail industry. We are committed to creating timesaving, effective products to enable technicians to work more efficiently, profitably and perfectly, nail after nail.

* 26+ years experience
* High quality product range
* Gel, acrylic and supplementary products
* Competitive pricing
* Great profit margins
* High-class international brand image
* In-house R&D department
* In-house production facilities
* Turnkey marketing concept
* New Partner Program

Zens is an innovative company, focusing on the development and production of wireless charging products that make life easier. 

No more messy wires, multiple chargers and overloaded sockets. With Zens wireless charging, you can live a life of liberation.

Our range of innovative wireless charging products can set you free. At home, at the office and on the go.

Located in the heart of Europe’s ‘Silicon Valley’, Zens is at the epicentre of technology and innovation. Brainport Eindhoven is home to some of the world’s most reliable technological experts, thinkers, doers and collaborative minds.

Packed with state-of-the-art technology, Zens range of innovative wireless chargers are developed for both consumers and businesses, and designed to empower people to improve the way they live.

Big Green Egg Europe B.V., started April 1st 2002 (the Netherlands), but founded on December 1st 1974 in Atlanta, Georgia (USA)
Big Green Egg, pioneer in manufacturing modern kamados, is the original in the market, The Evergreen. The outdoor cooking and barbecue appliance is named what it look likes, Big Green Egg. 
Big Green Egg is an outdoor cooker. It is based on the ancient Asian clay oven – a traditional wood-fired oven. A very exclusive, high-quality ceramic material advanced by NASA.
The Big Green Egg can be used for all manner of cooking techniques, including grilling, searing, baking, stewing, smoking and slow cooking.
We want to inspire people and their loved ones with the ultimate outdoor flavour experience by exciting their senses and sharing the finest nature has to offer. 

The products of Big Green Egg are available all over Europe.

𝐻𝑜𝒾 𝐵𝒾𝑔 𝒢𝓇𝑒𝑒𝓃 𝐸𝑔𝑔 𝐻𝓊𝓃𝓉 𝓈𝓅𝑒𝓊𝓇𝓃𝑒𝓊𝓈! 𝐻𝑒𝓉 𝒶𝓃𝓉𝓌𝑜𝑜𝓇𝒹 𝒾𝓈 𝟦𝟣.

Dr. Jetske Ultee herself is a research physician in cosmetic dermatology with a passion for the skin.


Dr. Jetske Ultee is the main brand for the personal blog, Uncover Skincare product line, research institute Skinwiser and non-profit initiative Sunwiser.

The blog is all about skincare: every month, dr. Jetske Ultee writes several blogs about products, mythes & claims, skinproblems and so on. The blog is available in Dutch, Deutsch and English. 
www.dr-jetskeultee.nl | www.dr-jetskeultee.com | www.dr-jetskeultee.de

The Uncover Skincare product line is developed by dr. Jetske Ultee herself. They are mild products with high concentrations of active ingredients and anti-oxidants in airtight containers, all of which are supported by scientific research.
www.uncover-skincare.nl

Research institute Skinwiser engages in innovative scientific research into cosmetics, sunprotection and skinproblems; essentially anything that has to do with skincare.
www.skinwiser.com

Sunwiser is a non-profit organization that conducts research on tanning behavior, develops teaching materials for schools, and creates consumer campaigns that aim to achieve more awareness of the need for sun protection. 
www.smeerjein.nl

Al 30 jaar een begrip in projectstoffering, vloerbedekking en raambekleding.

Leveren doen wij op maat. Per project. Telkens anders. Wij renoveren vloeren en leggen vloerbedekkingen voor allerlei toepassingen. We maken en monteren raamdecoraties voor binnen en buiten. Zelfs voor kantoormeubilair kunt u bij ons terecht.

Onze organisatie kent een platte structuur waardoor de lijnen, voor u als klant, helder en kort zijn. Ook op de werkvloer geldt dit principe, een verantwoordelijke eerste stoffeerder waar u overleg mee kunt voeren als er bijvoorbeeld een verandering moet worden doorgevoerd. Kortom wij zijn een bedrijf waar u zaken mee kunt doen.

Kwaliteit, duurzaamheid, flexibiliteit en uiteraard betrouwbaarheid. Allemaal even belangrijk om u goed van dienst te kunnen zijn. U komt tenslotte niet voor niets naar ons toe. Ons is er alles aan gelegen u het product, de service en de garantie te geven die u van ons mag verwachten. Door de jaren heen hebben wij een betrouwbare reputatie opgebouwd.

Two steps ahead

When Tony Tonnaer founded the Kings of Indigo company eight years ago, his objective was clear; to produce clothing in a sustainable way both socially and environmentally, without compromising on quality. He believed that neither sustainability nor quality had to be sacrificed in order to make beautiful garments. Since then, what it means to be 'sustainable' has evolved and become more intricate, and the future promises further changes.

The brand works with a clear objective to lead the industry to change. But that forward thinking has helped shape and change the path of fashion, Kings of Indigo always being two steps ahead of the rest. Kings of Indigo positions itself as a pioneer in this ever-changing sustainable fashion world, innovating with materials and sustainable production methods, constantly exploring how to reduce the impact on the planet and people; using its Five Pillars of Sustainability as cornerstones.

BUDDHA TO BUDDHA: EMBRACE LIFE
Buddha to Buddha was born in 1997 during a meditation holiday in Asia. In his quest, the founder wanted to capture the deeper experience of both contemplation and celebration. He drew a sketch of a bracelet and a sample was made by a local silversmith. The first bracelet was born and named Batul. Through the years Buddha to Buddha became renowned for its handmade premium bracelets. The Buddha to Buddha jewellery collection is the embodiment of that deeper feeling. Designed in Amsterdam and handcrafted by the finest silversmiths in the Asian Pacific region.

PURE CELEBRATION AND PURE CONTEMPLATION
Today Buddha to Buddha is more than jewellery. It’s a lifestyle. A style that embraces life. That embraces the contradictions in life. It connects and shines like silver and it’s raw and warm like leather. Solid and organic. Buddha to Buddha is pure in its extremes. No blending. No compromises. 100% passion and pride.

We create mobile must-haves with a fashionable touch and in colourful designs. Based in Rotterdam, the creative heart of the Netherlands, we create Dutch design for people who want to stand out.

All our products are durable and meet the latest fashion and interior trends. Choose your favourite colour and blend in or pop out!

Roetz is een sociale onderneming, die zich als doel heeft gesteld om bij te dragen aan een inclusieve en circulaire samenleving. Roetz maakt fietsen op basis van hergebruikte onderdelen van weesfietsen en creëert daarmee werk en een opleidingstraject binnen een industrie die zit te springen om mensen. In augustus 2016 heeft Roetz een sociale fietsfabriek geopend aan het Gedempt Hamerkanaal in Amsterdam Noord.

Roetz heeft zowel een groene als een sociale missie. Fietsen krijgen een tweede leven, mensen een tweede kans. We zijn ervan overtuigd dat mensen met kwetsbaarheden even goed mee kunnen draaien op de reguliere arbeidsmarkt. Om deze overtuiging kracht bij te zetten hebben we ons middels een prestatielening gecommitteerd aan een concrete doelstelling; in 2021 hebben 10 makers een arbeidsovereenkomst van 24u per week voor de duur van ten minste 1 jaar. 

Voor het aanmelden van kandidaten kan je contact opnemen met onze participatieregisseur via info@roetz-bikes.nl. 

----------

At Roetz, we believe in second chances and pursue a circular and inclusive future. We don’t judge a book by its cover: where others see waste and inability, we see useful materials and promising talent. At the Amsterdam-based Roetz Fair Factory, men and women with poor job prospects make new bikes from discarded ones. By hand and with pride. We train them to become skilled bicycle technicians and do everything in our power to help them find permanent employment. 

We want nothing less than changing the world for the better. That is why we are a Social Enterprise putting social impact first. With the Fair Factory, we prove that running a business and having a social heart can go hand in hand.

At Easywalker we make award winning strollers and buggies. We live and breathe the Easywalker slogan: ‘Life is glorious. Let’s go.’, stimulating parents to go out and explore the world with their children. 

Our company was founded in Amsterdam in 1989, introducing a radical new stroller concept: the first three-wheel stroller in Europe. That challenger mentality is still very much alive, and we pride ourselves in making award winning products that are easy to use, cleverly designed and highly comfortable for parents and kids. We believe that happiness lies in connecting with the world and the people around you.

Still based in Amsterdam, we are active in 45 countries with three product brands: Easywalker, MINI by Easywalker and Disney by Easywalker. All clearly positioned brands with their own story and assortment. 

The Easywalker family is a closely connected and dedicated team full of entrepreneurial spirits. We aim to challenge, to innovate and to grow.

For more information visit www.easywalker.com

Infento is the first in the world to develop a kit for families that lets them build real constructible rides together. We offer a unique durable concept that gives children a technical skill set for the future and empowers them to become a maker. You only need one kit and some tools to create unlimited rides for their whole childhood. From toddler to teenager. From a walker, scooter, tricycle, bicycle, go-kart, skibock to a sledge and more. Infento’s modular parts allow endless possibilities. 

-

Infento is dé nieuwe beleving op het gebied van constructiespeelgoed. Met dit unieke Nederlandse merk bouw je op eenvoudige wijze de coolste voertuigen. Van step naar driewieler, van driewieler tot skelter! Infento groeit mee met de behoefte en de creativiteit van je kind. Infento kenmerkt zich door de kwaliteit; een mooie stoere vormgeving met gebruik van hoogwaardige materialen. De bouwpakketten bestaan onder andere uit: aluminium profielen, RVS schijfremmen, kunststof koppelstukken en lichtmetalen velgen. Daar wil je mee gezien worden!

From city streets to sandy beaches. We know a thing or two about getting around. 

Born on the streets of Amsterdam and made for the international rider, you can catch us cruising from Sydney to San Fran. And with brand stores in Amsterdam, Melbourne and Sydney, this is just the beginning. 

LEKKER Bikes is all about quality, comfort and practicality. We put our riders first and leave the glitchy gizmos behind. The result? No-fuss, low-maintenance, and stylish bicycles that are built to last. 

Join the ride and make the journey the destination.

Change the world with your armpits. Meet the innocent, effective & planet-loving deodorant. Nuud is 100% natural, vegan 🌱 and cruelty-free. Nuud comes CO2 neutral to your doorstep in in a sugar cane tube. Over 1.6 million happy armpits already ❤️

At Playseat®, we have winning DNA. 

With the introduction of its first revolutionary racing chair in 1995, Playseat® was founded with the goal of creating the most enhanced home-racing experience. Since then, Playseat® has defined the off-track racing market by bringing the top-quality designs you would find in the cockpit of a race car, into the homes of millions of users around the world.	

Today, Playseat® continues to combine top-quality designs and a winning mentality to offer every type of racer the most immersive experience on the market. Our global reach and insight into the racing industry ensure that our products provide the authenticity needed for an optimal gaming adventure.

We thrive off of collaboration and currently work with a range of partners like Red Bull, Mercedes, WRC, and Puma. Through these partnerships, we strive to provide every racer with the chance to enjoy, compete, and win like a professional.

companyName: GranFood (Grand'Italia, D&L, Jozo, Saitaku, Ocean Spray, Sapori, Ponti)

description:
Al 30 jaar is 999 Games actief als uitgever en distributeur van bord- en kaartspellen in de Benelux en staat zij bekend om titels zoals Catan, 30 Seconds, Halli Galli, Regenwormen, Boonanza, Saboteur, Carcassonne, Dominion en vele andere. 

Toen Michael Bruinsma al die jaren geleden 999 Games begon, was het aanbod op de spelletjesmarkt in Nederland al tientallen jaren nagenoeg onveranderd, vernieuwing was er nauwelijks. Op de buitenlandse markt was niet alleen dat aanbod er wel, het was ook nog eens uitdagender en leuker dan de spellen die in Nederland beschikbaar waren. Zorgen dat mensen zich hier bewust van worden, hen nieuwe spellen laten ervaren en deze zo goed mogelijk op de Nederlandse en Belgische markt beschikbaar te laten komen op een manier waarop consumenten dat het liefst zien, is sindsdien de missie van 999 Games. 

De focus van 999 Games ligt primair op de familiespeler, maar in de basis proberen we heel Nederland en België net zo enthousiast te krijgen voor (bord)spelletjes als wij zelf ook zijn. Dat betekent dat wij ook spellen voor andere doelgroepen uitgeven. Denk hierbij aan jongvolwassenen en starters, “hardcore” bordspelfanaten en jonge kinderen (en alles wat daar tussenin zit). Daarbij proberen we spellen met verschillende mechanismen en in diverse prijscategorieën aan te bieden. Diversificatie en productontwikkeling zijn dus de belangrijkste pilaren van ons bedrijf. 
999 Games wil graag de beste en leukste bordspellen brengen voor iedereen, voor iedere gelegenheid op ieder moment.

Roxtec is adviseur en leverancier van brandwerende, water- en gasdichte multi-diameter doorvoeringen. 

Het gemak van onze doorvoeringen is terug te vinden in onze multi-diameter technologie. Dit heeft voordelen qua engineering, werkvoorbereiding, inkoop, montage en handling. 

Roxtec producten worden gebruikt in industrie, offshore, scheepvaart, petrochemische bedrijven, utiliteit, telecom, spoorwegen en OEM. Omdat wij veel van onze producten uit voorraad kunnen leveren en dankzij onze goede kwaliteit is Roxtec de beste keuze voor onze afnemers

Bekend van onze merken voor consumenten: Johma, Delio, Westland, Heks'nkaas, Vlammetjes, KaasTengels, Los Taqueros en Maga. En onze merken voor professionals: Hamal, Johma professional, Le Cobourg, VH en Gourmet.

Oriflame is gestart in 1967 in Zweden en sinds 1972 in Nederland actief. Inmiddels zijn wij vertegenwoordigd in meer dan 60 landen over de gehele wereld. Wij hebben nooit ons unieke business concept laten varen: een Zweedse beauty company waar persoonlijk contact van vriendin tot vriendin erg belangrijk is maar waar je ook je bestelling online kunt plaatsen.

Onze producten zijn van een fantastische hoogwaardige kwaliteit en worden niet op dieren getest. Oriflame producten zijn niet in de winkel te koop. Wij geloven in persoonlijke aandacht en goede adviezen.

Since 2016, MR MARVIS combines the ultimate fit and timeless style into the perfect shorts & trousers. All products are handmade in Portugal from high quality materials. The fit and style of the shorts & trousers never change. The only thing that changes is the number of colour options. The shorts & trousers from MR MARVIS are available online at mrmarvis.com, in the flagship store at the P.C. Hoofstraat 21 in Amsterdam or in the pop-up store at Schuttershofstraat 41 in Antwerp.

Xtorm is part of the Dutch company Telco Accessories b.v. and was founded in 2008 with the idea that we want to provide people with More Energy. Xtorm is a manufacturer in the field of innovative portable power solutions for everyday use, that will give you the freedom and energy to go anywhere you want. Our products are now available at various (online) stores in more than 60 countries in the world.

Products
Our innovative power banks and solar chargers are durable and can easily recharge your mobile devices (e.g. smartphone, tablet, laptop or GPS) anywhere, anytime. The products that are specifically designed for Apple products are all officially certified and approved by Apple (MFi). Xtorm products are perfect while on the go and make carrying (many) different adapters, converters and various plugs a thing of the past! 

Promotional gifts 
All Xtorm products are very suitable as a (business) gift, which is why Xtorm Business is specialized in personalized products. We have in-house possibilities and the expertise to develop products, as well as print or engrave a logo or slogan on a product.

At Arion, we believe that every runner, and every run, is completely unique.

Unfortunately, overwhelming data and excessive options mean many of us are running the wrong way and in the wrong shoes. Reducing our performance and increasing our injuries.

We require a better understanding of ourselves as individual runners. Our unique metrics, the meaning behind them, and the relationships between them.  Specific to our bodies, our technique, and our goals. Our individual "Running Identity"

Running is over categorized and under personalized making it can feel almost impossible to adapt our movement and improve our performance.

ARION is a next-generation innovation that grants you an unparalleled understanding of your Running Identity. Helping you run faster, longer, and safer. 

ARION is based on 10+ years of research and 7 patents and has been created by a team of highly motivated scientists, engineers and fitness enthusiasts. ARION comprises ultra-thin pressure-sensitive insoles that slip neatly and unnoticed under a runner’s own running shoe insoles. 

This transforms the shoe into a running lab that analyzes technique and identifies strengths, weaknesses and injury risks. The runner receives easy to understand real-time feedback to improve their technique which will bring more results and a lower risk of injury without years of training.

NOW HIRING! Check out jobs.aquablu.com for our new positions. 

Aquablu is a fast-growing start-up that is disrupting the way we consume water. A new wave within the water industry, driven by smart technology and advanced engineering. We built smart hydrations solutions that are placed in homes, offices, and professional applications, making way for a (plastic) bottle-less lifestyle. Our young team consists of wavemakers who are dedicated to making a lasting impact on our planet. Better water for a better future - Are you ready to become part of our refillution?

BRINGING ON TREND & MEANING TOGETHER.

WE DISTRIBUTE AND CREATE ON-TREND JEWELLERY, WATCHES & ACCESSORIES.
WE FOCUS ON MID TO HIGH END DEPARTMENT STORES, JEWELLERY STORES, CONCEPT AND LIFESTYLE STORES, E-COMMERCE AND ANY OTHER INFLUENTIAL RETAIL CHANNEL.
WHERE OUR CONSUMERS ARE LOOKING TO BUY AND GET INSPIRED.

WE TAKE CARE OF OUR PEOPLE, THE ENVIRONMENT AND HOW AND WHERE WE MAKE OUR BRANDS

Craft staat voor innovatie en design. Functionele sportkleding welke je ervaring tijdens het sporten in elk aspect verbeteren. Van collecties met ademende sportshirts, tot comfortabele sportbroeken en functionele baselayers. 

Het merk Craft, bekend van het baselayer-principe en de professionele bike & running-collectie, vindt zijn oorsprong in 1973 in Zweden. Oprichter Anders Bengtsson kreeg de opdracht om voor de luchtmacht functioneel ondergoed te ontwikkelen, welke geen vocht vasthoudt, zodat bij gebruik van de schietstoel de piloten niet konden bevriezen.  Hieruit ontstond in 1977 het merk Craft. #craftsportswear

Norah is opgericht in 2014 en heeft sindsdien een explosieve groei doorgemaakt. In de zeer korte periode is het dameskledingmerk uitgegroeid tot ruim 80 stores verspreid door heel Nederland en België.
 
Het is niet meer weg te denken uit het winkelbeeld en ook online actief aanwezig. Een internationale webshop, meerdere social media kanalen en een wekelijkse nieuwsbrief zorgen voor het bedienen van vele Norah-fans binnen Nederland. 

De collectie van Norah bestaat uit dameskleding in de maten 36 t/m 48, gebaseerd op de laatste trends. Iedere week verschijnen er nieuwe items in de collectie. Items waarmee je jouw eigen stijl creëert voor elke gelegenheid. En dat allemaal voor aantrekkelijke prijzen. 

De collecties van Norah kenmerken zich door de verscheidenheid aan prints, materialen en kleuren passend binnen het modebeeld van het seizoen. Norah biedt je een collectie met trendy jurken, hippe tunieken en draagbare shirts & tops. Uiteraard kun je ook bij Norah terecht voor basis vesten, tunieken en shirts verkrijgbaar in basis- en seizoenskleuren. De denim collectie van Norah kan je eindeloos combineren!

Shop eenvoudig online of in één van de fysieke winkels. Shop je online jouw favoriete items, dan kan je je bestelling thuis laten bezorgen of in één van de winkels. Daarnaast komen er nog steeds nieuwe vestigingen bij, wat blijft zorgen voor een grotere naamsbekendheid.

Incooling was founded after a joint initiative of Eindhoven Start-up Alliance with members including ASML and Philips, using CERN developed technology to create strategically important deep tech ventures.
Originally designed to cool the largest scientific experiment on the planet – the Large Hadron Collider at CERN, Incooling adapted the unique properties of two phase cooling and created a next generation 2 phase cooled server dedicated to achieving the full potential of the data centre industry.

Buitenspeelgoed maken waar kinderen en ouders écht blij van worden. Met die droom begonnen Leopold, Marcel en Stijn in 2011 met het ontwikkelen van buitenspeelgoed onder de naam EXIT Toys. Eén ding wisten zij zeker: plezier en veiligheid staan altijd voorop!

In de jaren die volgden ontdekten steeds meer consumenten de producten van het merk EXIT Toys. We zijn tegenwoordig actief in maar liefst dertig landen in Europa én zelfs tot ver daarbuiten met een breed assortiment aan buitenspeelgoed, zoals: 

•	voetbaldoelen en rebounders
•	trampolines
•	zwembaden
•	basketbalsystemen
•	houten speelhuisjes
•	buitenkeukens, waterbanen en zand- en watertafels
•	skelters en trikers

Bij EXIT Toys zijn we ervan overtuigd dat leuk buitenspeelgoed zorgt voor éxtra veel speelplezier. Want hoe stoerder, mooier en speelser het speelgoed, hoe liever kinderen ermee spelen. Juist daarom staat het ontwerp van onze producten voorop. 

Ook ouders maken we bij EXIT Toys graag blij met onze producten. Daarom gebruiken we alleen de allerbeste materialen, zodat ons buitenspeelgoed jarenlang meegaat en staat veiligheid tijdens het spelen altijd voorop. Daarnaast misstaan onze producten zeker niet in de tuin dankzij de strakke en moderne vormgeving. Het oog wil tenslotte ook wat!

En is een veer van de trampoline na verloop van tijd aan vervanging toe of wil je graag nog een aanhangwagen bij je skelter? Dan bestel je eenvoudig en snel de losse onderdelen en accessoires van onze producten via de webshop. Zo blijft buitenspelen een feest!

Creators of Homey - Everything at home connected

Homey combines al your wireless and smart devices at home into a single, easy-to-use and smart system. Control your entire home with the free App for Android and iPhone, and make all your devices work together in harmony, regardless of brand or technology.

With the free Homey Smartphone App, you’re always a little bit at home. Receive notifications from sensors or doorbells, and control lights, locks, alarm systems and thermostats- wherever you are.

Combining and linking devices becomes child’s play with Homey Flows, in which you can create your own scenarios through simple drag and drop.
Make your lights dim when you watch TV. Play your favorite music when you disarm your alarm on getting home. Shut down your home when getting to bed. Make the hallway light turn on when your doorbell rings – let your creativity run free!

To make that possible, Homey features 7(!) different radio technologies, ranging from the older standards to the newest home automation tech. Next to that, it holds a powerful infrared LED to control your Television Set, TV Tuner, HiFi installation and more!

In what drawer are you keeping your medals ?
 
From this question we founded Victory Hangers, in order to remind all of the champions that effort and discipline must not be forgotten in a drawer or in a dusty box.
 
To win a medal it takes hours, days, weeks or even years of hard work, training, sacrifices, energy and dedication. And when that moment comes and it shines proudly on your chest, you feel that all the effort was crowned, you're a winner, a true champion
But we all know what happens next. It's sad when your work comes to be symbols hidden somewhere in a drawer or shoebox.
 
So, we, Victory Hangers decided to offer a second chance at life for champions medals from all over the world.
No matter how simple it may seem, when you see the shining medals each day with dignity on support, we guarantee that you will feel full of positive energy, strong emotions and a deep sense of accomplishment.
  
The Victory Hangers medal support is more than a gift, is a must and we ensure you high quality services, starting from the moment you arrive on site until the one where you sit in front of it and you proudly admire your medals.
 
At Victory Hangers, we decided to offer a second chance to life for the champions medals from all over the world.
As simple as it may seem, when you see your medals every day shining with dignity on your hanger display, we guarantee that you will feel full of positive energy, strong emotions and a deep sensation of fulfillment.
 
VictoryHangers.com - High Quality Victorious Gifts!

About the brand
 
From a small attic room in the Netherlands, Rinke van der Helm and her sister started to create and sell their own lampshades. Two years into the development, she started her own label Little Dutch. In 10 years’ time, Little Dutch has grown to be an established name in both the Netherlands and other countries across Europe. The brand offers modern nursery essentials, accessories and toys for babies and children. Its products are not only functional, but also safe and of a very high quality.
 
With an extensive product range, it is Little Dutch’s mission to contribute to the important formative years of a child. With our textile products, we offer little ones warmth and comfort and with our toys we provide support in the different stages of children’s development. Our contemporary design appeals to a child’s imagination which, in turn, guarantees hours of playing fun.
 
Every year, Little Dutch launches a new theme and textile collection. The themes, designs and colours of the various collections have been thoughtfully put together by our team. The designs are incorporated in all product categories. This means that all colours match different collections and products from other categories. Whether they are essentials, toys, clothing or decoration, Little Dutch items are trendy yet timeless - making sure you can easily combine and endlessly enjoy them.
 
Our team is filled with skilled and creative people who work passionately to create and expand the Little Dutch product range. You will find us at the most important fairs to share our creations with you. You can also find us on social media, where we have built a strong and personal interaction with our true followers worldwide.

Become a fan as well, as a customer or consumer. Or why not both!

Little Dutch. Enjoy the little things.

A fashion and lifestyle brand, aiming to give the world more colour and make it less boring.

A fish named Fred offers a wide range of lifestyle items such as: Shirts, Pullovers, Waistcoats, Chino’s, Blazers, Caps, Bags, Wallets, Underwear, Socks, Shoes, Wine, Beer and a lot more. With colourful and original designs, AFNF works hard to keep every collection fresh, sharp and impossible to miss out on. Most fashion stores offer a select range of uniform looking brands.
